blurb: Vertical Gardens set up at schools that are fully subsidized.  Our mission is to make cities GREEN!
description: Vertical Gardens set up at schools that are fully subsidized.  Our mission is to make cities GREEN!
name: Vertica Green - Mission to make cities green!
title: Vertica Green - Mission to make cities green!
Title: Vertica Green - Mission to make cities green!
Description: Vertical Gardens set up at schools that are fully subsidized.  Our mission is to make cities GREEN!
Link: Vertica Green - Mission to make cities green!Vertical Gardens set up at schools that are fully subsidized.  Our mission is to make cities GREEN!
description_story:
StoryThat’s me (on the left). Anything related to sustainability gets me excited! 









 There has been a huge shift in awareness of what we do and the impact it has on the planet. Everywhere you look you see people, concepts and projects that are aligned towards sustainability.
Vertica Green helps to accelerate this movement by connecting interested communities, raising funds for each project and working with schools and buildings to make their vertical landscape, green.
I just want to do my part to make sure our planet will be healthy and thriving for the next generation to follow.
WHY?
Crucial things that trees do for cities:

   Make the air cleaner - Trees can absorb up to 150kg of CO2 per year helping to reduce pollution
   Keep us cool - Cities aligned with trees can experience temperatures lowered by 6 degrees
   Makes us happier - Being surrounded by trees makes us less stressed and generally happier

HOW?
Through Green Estate, Vertica Green allows you to support this initiative by contributing a piece of green in the city.

   Leverage - Leveraging the vertical landscape of buildings within cities and transforming them into vertical gardens.
   Partner - Partnering with schools and commercial buildings to ”use” or “rent” their vertical landscape to set up indoor and/or outdoor vertical gardens
   Scale - Through crowdsourcing platforms and corporate sponsorship, we support this initiative by raising funds for each project.

Schools and buildings have the option between a plant based vertical garden, or a vertical farmscape. With a vertical farmscape, we can further reduce CO2 from being released into the air by reducing the need for transportation of fruits and vegetables.









PROJECT DETAILS
Here are previous projects completed by our Landscaping Partner,  in business for over 50 years: 









BUDGET
Each 100 square meter wall costs $195,000 SGD to set up and maintain for a period of 5 years. This caters for the following:

  Equipment & set up
  Plants
  Irrigation systems
  Maintenance

Also includes operational costs, marketing (videos and building awareness through social media), legal fees for contracts and agreements and the fee for raising funds.
This works out to be under $33 per month per square meter of green!
For any amount raised above $195,000 SGD, we will use it towards additional projects. Depending on the amount, this may range from a 10, 25, or another 100 square meter project.
SCHEDULE & DETAILS
We are in discussion with a number of schools in Singapore that are interested to proceed with this project. The names will be published in the “Updates” section of this campaign.
The first project will be a 100 sqm wall for one school.  Subsequent projects will vary in size. 
A VGP system will be used as it is the most cost effective and flexible.  It allows for easy design change and on-going maintenance. 
The timeline to deliver a project will be as follows:

  Commercial sign off – 2-4 weeks (depending on school and their decision making process)
  Scope of Works – 2-3 weeks
  Project sign off – 2-3 weeks
  Equipment preparation and deliver – 2 weeks
  Set up – 1-2 weeks



GOAL
Our goal is to have 1M sqm of vertical gardens covered by 2020 (that's  roughly 187 football fields)
Feel free to check out our website for more info: www.verticagreen.com
description_risks: The majority of the cost for the project is upfront for the equipment itself and the deployment.   As the only requirement after deployment is monthly maintenance, It becomes more commercially sustainable when we structure his over a minimum of a 5 year commitment for each school/building.

Link: The TrojanA crossbreed of armies & animals, innocence & deceit, all in a deck of cards.
description_story:
StoryWhat's The Deal?
"All warfare is based on deception." ~Sun Tzu~
In this simple game of army building, one relies on misdirection & subterfuge to win battles. Deploy your Trojan Horse to keep your foes on their toes, no knowing which direction your back-stabbing sword will come from. But of course, you will be subjected to the same twisted fate. 
Oh, did I also mention it includes INCREDIBLY PUNNY NAMES & ADORABLY VICIOUS CREATURES? Animals blend with ancient armies to form the likes of SPUGTANS (Pugs + Spartans) and PURRSIANS (Cats + Persians).









How To Play?
Learn to play this game in 8 easy steps:
How To Play The Trojan


What's In A Deck?







Reward Tiers







Funding Milestones







Campaign Schedule







Shipping & Fulfillment







Commanders-In-Chief








The Creators 
Yoke Ideas was birthed around the same time as the current globe trotting, economy-smashing, life-shattering virus i.e. late 2019, with an infectious zeal to nurture critical thinking skills & foster collaborative efforts.
The pandemic has put paid to many our initial, on-ground plans. We hit the ground running but soon found ourselves out of breath...hmmm...
Remaining all-around positive (except for our Covid test results), we went into full-on brainstorming mode. Quarantine has provided opportunity & free time for random thoughts to marinate & mature into actionable ideas. As recent viewings of Nat Geo's ancient warfare & animals from Blue Planet coalesce in our minds, the idea to crossbreed creatures, combats & card game slowly materialize...
And as they say, the rest is HISTORICALLY UP TO YOU! We hope you'll subscribe to our vision and help make this project a successful one!
Special thanks to TheMooseMind (@theneveryak) for the adorable illustrations & Iconian Fonts (www.iconian.com) for the font.
description_risks: Logistic is one of the main challenges in making this project a success. Due to the pandemic, the shipping costs have risen several fold. The project timeline was pushed back several times due to efforts to source for more economical means of fulfilling orders. The Trojan family is praying to all its respective gods for more stable times ahead to ensure you receive your rewards in a timely manner (& or course, for everyone, especially you, to be protected from any harm caused by the pandemic).

blurb: an orphan boy must choose between future he dreams of or his grandmother. He needs to choose this grandmother or she will be evicted
description: an orphan boy must choose between future he dreams of or his grandmother. He needs to choose this grandmother or she will be evicted
name: Plain Sight, a 4 Dimension production
title: Plain Sight, a 4 Dimension production
Title: Plain Sight, a 4 Dimension production
Description: an orphan boy must choose between future he dreams of or his grandmother. He needs to choose this grandmother or she will be evicted
Link: Plain Sight, a 4 Dimension productionan orphan boy must choose between future he dreams of or his grandmother. He needs to choose this grandmother or she will be evicted
description_story:
StoryPlain Sight is a 10 minute short film story that follows Alex, a Polytechnic student whom parents left him when he was little. Alex stays with his grandmother, Wai Fun in a simple rented apartment. The problem of the story reveals itself when the audiences finds out that while Alex is struggling with the money he needs to secure a scholarship for his further studies, Wai Fun, also needs money to pay for the rent which she had been owing their landlord for three months. Alex did not tell Wai Fun as he did not see Wai Fun as a parent figure or family. However, Wai Fun did not tell Alex about the rent as she did not want to worry him. In the story, Alex was not able to see the love of his grandmother, like a lot of young people, Alex sees the love and concern of Wai Fun as constant nagging.
 Wai Fun eventually manages to win the lottery that gave her enough to pay for the rent, she then proceeds to seek help from Alex to collect the prize. Alex could not care less about what Wai Fun has to say, thus he threw the ticket aside. The due date to Alex’s scholarship and Wai Fun’s rent was fast approaching, Alex becomes more frustrated that he does not have enough money to secure the scholarship and Wai Fun grows more worried about the rent. 
Alex founds out that the ticket had indeed won the money that he needed, thus he tries to hide it from Wai Fun. 
The climax of the story is about how Alex struggles between selfish and selfless. Alex eventually gave up on the scholarship and used the money to pay off the rent when Wai Fun is about to be chased out of the apartment.
The film ends with Wai Fun and Alex enjoying a simple meal together, the ending shows that Alex finally learns that nothing is as important as Wai Fun, he finally sees the love of Wai Fun for him. It is in plain sight, thus the title. This is a student project, unfortunately, we as students are unable to sustain such a production with the little resources, so we need you! we need you to help us fulfil our dreams to become successful film makers one day!The schedule, budget planning is all ready! Although we are students, our production do have a director, an assistant director, a producer, cinematographer, editor and a production designer and that is is not a project we came up with for fun, we will finish the project on schedule.  we hope to assure you that your support will not go to waste!
description_risks: Although we have the skills for each roles, director, editor etc . What we lack of the most as students, is definitely money. We came up with the most economically conservative budget plan, and we are indeed going to use our own money. The budget plan for everything came up to be $2000, however, being afraid that we are unable to raise that amount of money, we lowered it to $1000 due to the all or nothing policy. We hope that kickstarter will be the platform we meet the people that let us meet our dreams.

description_story:
Story







What is a No-Brainer?
No-Brainer is a solo comix anthology featuring different stories in different styles by the same cartoonist. Each issue contains a main serialized story in the first half along with a bunch of shorter stories in the second half.
The short stories range from kids growing up and dealing with changing friendships, to salmon trying to survive the treacherous upriver journey to their spawning grounds. 









 Next Goal: 100 Backers (7 more!)
Stretch goal rewards will be automatically added to all physical backers' packages unless otherwise stated.
125 Backers - ???
100 Backers - King Kiramon 7" x 10" Print!











75 Backers - Nobaigudon 7" x 10" Print (Goal Reached!) 




Nobaigudon!





Fully Funded - Interstellar Defense Alliance Insignia Sticker (Goal Reached!)























Standard Edition! Both sides can be used as covers ;)








Exclusive Variant Edition!













In this issue of No-Brainer, we have 2 big stories! Thoomgard Chapter 4 and Kaiju Ka$h!
 Thoomgard: Final Mission Chapter 4 (18 pages)
"Earths greatest protector gets retrenched after five decades of service, due to declining performance and a new wave of upcoming talent. As he struggles to come to terms with reality, he embarks on what seems to be his final mission - be a panel speaker at the academy's recruitment expo."
As depressing as that sounds, Thoomgard is essentially a buddy sci-fi action-adventure where a gorilla man and his cat-like sidekick fights ferocious aliens while dealing with the reality of growing old.
*Catch up with Chapter 1-3 in No-Brainer #1-3 bundle in the add-ons section*

















Here's some preview pages for chapter 4:



















KAIJU KA$H( 26 pages)
A Kaiju story! 
"The rich elite gambling degenerates of the world take part in an online Kaiju betting ring called KAIJU KA$H where they place their money and lives on the line to bet on Kaiju Battles. Ace24, a young lady on holiday, faces literal elimination as a sudden Kaiju Battle takes place during the off-season."
Kaiju Ka$h features classic Kaiju monsters fighting and thrashing buildings, seen through the lens of a secret and mysterious world only accessible to the 1%. 

























































































===================================================================

===================================================================

  Get the digital PDFs of both No-Brainer #1, #2 and #3

===================================================================
No-Brainer Physical Catch-Up Bundle- $15

Original Art Add-Ons
Get some original pages from this issue and the previous ones!
*All original art is 11" x 17" bristol board unless otherwise stated*
Pages from No-Brainer #2, #3 and #4 will be available.

  Catalog of original art will be sent over as a PDF.
  For pages that have an additional cost to the base price, you can edit your pledge and add the amount  in the 'Bonus Support' field.
  You can get multiple pages, just inform me of the page code, and add the increased price by editing your pledge and adding the amount in the 'Bonus Support' field.
  First come, first served - Pages are considered locked in and reserved once your pledge amount is correct and you've informed me of which pages you want :)

*All Prices are in Singapore Dollars (SGD) and includes shipping*

























===================================================================
Snake Claws Vol 1 Collected Edition - $30
===================================================================
Snake Claws is a fun and wacky martial arts series following the exploits of Snake Claws, a villainous pugilist dealing with the guilt of his former actions.  You can read it for free on my website. However, if you'd like to get a physical collected edition, feel free to add it on to your pledge :)
- All 6 issues of Snake Claws collected in one book
- Additional bonus content at the back
- 1 x 172-page Perfect-bound Graphic Novel, Standard Sized









Here's a flip-through video of the book!

            

          









Here's a size comparison of the commission options:

The book will be in both digital and physical forms.
Digital - A 45-page PDF file
Physical - A 48-page saddle-stitched ashcan-sized comic book
The comic is printed at a smaller size than the standard comic book, for cheaper prices, easier shipping and takes up less space in your storage. For the collected editions in the future, it will be standard-sized :)
Here's a comparison:




















Each book will come in a standard-size comic book bag and board and fit in a nice, sturdy and strong rigid envelope. By default, each package will be sent under unregistered mail, and thus there will be no tracking information, but no worries, all my packages for all the Snake Claws and No-Brainer issues have been delivered successfully to different countries.









Approximate expected shipping times (based on past orders)

   🇸🇬  Singapore - 2 - 3 days
  🇬🇧  United Kingdom/Europe - 7 - 14 days( usually arrives in a week)
  🇺🇸  United States - 2 - 4 weeks (duration has improved considerably since last year )
  Asia:  7-14 days
  Rest of the word - 2 - 6 weeks










The content of the book is meant for all ages to read. If you're a parent wondering if it's suitable for your kid, some points to note will be appearances of monsters and creatures, light violence, and light blood and gore. No profanity in the dialogue as well. If you have other concerns, please feel free to contact me.

All backers should receive their copies latest in September:)

description_story:
StoryMeet our chunky little bandit mask friend, Toast the Raccoon!
It’s huggable, squishy and smooth to touch for maximum comfort!




I’ve transformed Toast.png into a snuggly doll, can you believe it?





Plushy Details
The plushy is made of soft minky mochi fabric with PP cotton filling!




Front view & Side view








21cm x 32cm x 35cm (tail and ears length included) approx. 12 inches approximately








fluffy faux fur tail with embroidery detail!








He is squishable, pinchable and snuggable if you are feeling it! 





Be gentle though, even a chunky boy like Toast has his limits!




Huggies Toast! 








Toast meets Toast








Reading with Twins








Removeable neck





Plushie Details 
Embroidery Plushy
Size in approx. • 21 cm Width, 32cm Height, 35cm Depth / 12 inches Plushy 
Weight in approx. • 700gram, 1.55lb PER plushie (not include carton box weight for shipment)
Materials • Minky Mochi Fabric, PP Cotton Filling, Faux Fur
Washing instruction symbol included
 CE safety checks verified [12/3/2022]
Age of use : [Not stated, but recommend to be 12 years older due to small pieces of plastic]


 Plushy Precautions 

  Please put in a dry and well ventilated environment to avoid dampness.
  Do not scratch the doll with sharp objects.
  Do not put near or come into direct contact with open flames.
   When obtained for children ages 12 below, please unpack with a parent or guardian present. With a parent or guardian present, please remove all plastic around embroidery and tags before giving it to children. 





Keychain Pouch Details
Our sample have finally arrived! [Edit : 1 April 2022]
















Apologies for the lack of information and details for this keychain. 
Photograph are taken directly from the manufacturer hence I cannot provide any accurate information of the exact fabric and measurement.


Please do note that its designed to fits the size of your bank card :>






Enamel Pin Details 









[Kickstarter Exclusive]
Photograph are taken directly from the manufacturer.
Every per pledge comes with a free 1 pin
Size in approx. • 3.1cm Width, 3.8cm Height / 1 inches Pin
Materials • Hard enamel, Black nickel, Two rubber clutches
Packaging • Ungraded (No Grading) / Ziplock bag






 ADD ONs 
For those who have missed our early deals, or wish to add more of selected plushies,  keychains and enamel pins for personal reasons. You will be able to choose your quantity under this option.


Disclaimer

  Colors may vary between the colors displayed on your screens and the physical product.
  After receiving the plushie, if it’s misshapen, please reshape the plushie by squashing and gently stretching it. He had a bad hair day.
  Plushies are handcrafted by multiple individuals hence each plushie comes with its own unique shape, some may appear misaligned and others may come with loose or 1 ~ 2 missing threads in their embroidery. This are common flaws in mass production, hence please refrain from expecting a perfect plushie to be made. Here are some examples you may commonly find in your plushie.





A, B, E : Loose threads, can be solved by cutting the extra thread. C : Sometimes fabric just come in wrinkled that can't be fixed. D : every embroidery parts of this doll carries tiny plastic pieces that need to be manually removed, simply use tweezers to solve this issue.  F : Sample of a missing thread, usually you won't notice it from afar!






  [Last Update : 4 Feb 22] - The dolls are currently under safety checks. We hope to get it approved by the end of the campaign and will update you immediately on this platform as we receive updates ourselves. 





ABOUT MYSELF 
Hi, I’m the artist Yencatx, alias Yen, who created Toast the Raccoon. I'm not fluent in English, so I apologize if I made any mistakes in my words may came across as rude.  


You can follow me on Twitter / Instagram for daily posts featuring Toast the Raccoon! or directly support me on Ko-fi  I've also created discord emotes of Toast the Raccoon for anyone to use and as well as Line stickers if you are interested in spreading the Raccoon gang. 


A little story behind this project; we ran into multiple difficulties and faced many rejections before we found the right company and with our finally hunt successful, Toast could be brought into its snuggleable, cuddleable form, but during that process we’ve used almost all of our expenses. This is where you, the supporters, shine!
We look forward to Part 2 of Toast the Raccoon if this project is successfully funded! Our next feature is coloration doll & body pillow size versions of this baby!
Thank you for your consideration and thank you very much for supporting me and taking the time to meet Toast the Racoon! 


Time-lapse
February to March. Two month of time to fully focused on developing keychain pouch while the project is still on. With high hopes to present a physical sample within this period frame in addition to receive safety checks approval.
April to June. The campaign ends on April, production period waiting time, this may extend depending on the amount of orders placed. 
July to August / ???. Shipping period, this may also extend depending on the amount of orders. It may take longer than average to get all of the order shipped as a solo artist handling all of this orders.


Fulfillment / Shipping
We are honored to be work with WhiteSquirrel. The wonderful heroic team will be handling all International / Global shipping.  Exception to only Singapore & Malaysia which I will personally packed them so I don't feel overwhelmed with orders, and get resulting an upset stomach due to anxiety to get all orders out quickly on my own. They're a wonderful team, so please treat with respect for their hard work if you ran into difficulties with your shipment and required assistance when contacting them.


New to Kickstarter 
Kickstarter is a "pledge now and pay later system" similar with pre-order system if you have experience in making purchases online. You'll need an account in order to pledge on our project. 
During the campaign period, you may cancel or change your pledge at any time using the pledge manager. Once our project base goal is successfully funded, you will then be charged at the end of the project. Consequently, if the base goal failed, your pledge will not be charged at all.
description_risks:
Challenges we faced are often lies on overall cost.

Knowing where your money is going, especially when it is a high expense, is immensely important so please read further to understand why the costs shown above are as they are.

The plushie itself is expensive due to the complexity of it’s patterns and production. However, these aren’t the only fee’s that are faced in its creation which can be a common misconception. Freight costs to get the product from the factory to my fulfillment center and then on to me is also another high cost, before even touching customer shipping, fulfillment cost, safety certification fees and Kickstarter fees. 

We apologize ahead of time if you find this project to be expensive when compared to other outlets/projects hosted on this platform. This is our little project, our one of a kind collectors item that is only available for a limited time period. A large amount of time, though and patience has gone into the production of the Toast plushie and we hope that you will enjoy him in whatever forms he takes.

description_story:
Story







Hey there! Im Dhany, a creative based in Singapore and I am the face behind fictive.co. Welcome to my 5th kickstarter.
To celebrate the upcoming new season of Umbrella Academy on Netflix, I'll be trying to get these enamel pin designs put into production. In providing your support and pledge, all funds raised during this campaign will go towards - pin production, shipping fees, packaging, and kickstarter fees.









Want to support this project but are currently short on funds?
No worries, kickstarter has your back! Pledge now to secure your spot, and worry about payments later. All payments will only go through when the project ends successfully.
Editing Pledges: During the 30 days before the project ends, you can edit your pledge however you'd like to. (increase, decrease, cancel)
Unlocking Designs: If there is a pin you want that's still locked when place your pledge, don't worry! By pledging now, you're helping to raise the funds to unlock new designs that you can then choose when the project ends.
Leftover pins from this project will be listed on my shop, though with a hiked price. All prices seen on this campaign are specially for backers of this kickstarter campaign only. If you find yourself interested in any of the designs, do secure your spot during the run of this kickstarter campaign to enjoy discounts while you can!
TLDR : ALL FUNDS WILL NOT BE PROCESSED TILL THE END OF THIS CAMPAIGN 









These pins are inspired by and designed based off of the characters in the live action Umbrella Academy series by Netflix.
All pins will be hard enamel and will measure approx 1.5" lengthwise.

  Double post with rubber clutch (on main part of the pin)
  Gold plated metal
  Screen printed details

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
✦ The Base Goal ✦ is set to SGD$1400 to provide funding for the first 2 pins - Luther and Diego, along with bonus rewards. After the initial goal is reached, the remaining designs will subsequently be unlocked as we hit their respective funding goals. (refer below)









✦ The Ultimate Goal ✦ is to raise SGD$4900 to fund all 7 pin designs + bonus rewards. However to keep things in scope, each design is broken down into smaller stretch goals (as displayed below). This means that, the more we can raise, the more pins I will be able to end up producing! 

















































PLEASE NOTE : FINAL VERSIONS MAY VARY SLIGHTLY IN COLOUR OR THICKNESS OF OUTLINES DUE TO THE POSSIBLE TWEAKING NEEDED DURING PRODUCTION









Stickers come with your pledge! (for additional stickers, see below*)
Each sticker design will be given alongside its corresponding pin design. For example, the Ben sticker will be given when you pledge for the Ben pin.
Stickers will stay true to the original concept, but with exclusion of the dangling numbered umbrella as per their pin counterparts. The sizes for each sticker may vary depending on design, but will be approximately 2" each.









 *FOR ADDITIONAL STICKERS TO YOUR PLEDGE :

  Please add on $2 per design to your total
   To add a full set of 7 stickers, please add $10 to your total.

Click the green "Back this Project" or "Manage Your Pledge" button, select a reward level, then increase the pledge amount by $2. You'll receive your stickers at the same time you receive your pins.
After the Kickstarter, these stickers will be available in my shop, but with a hiked price.










   July 25th: Kickstarter is LIVE
   Approx mid August : Surveys sent 
   Approx end August : Kickstarter funds received / Pin productions start
   Mid to end September : Pins are completed/shipped to me
   Approx October : Pins are shipped out!

*Domestic (Singapore) backers: Package will arrive in 3-5 days from date of dispatch
*International backers: Package will take anywhere between 2-8 weeks for delivery
Please be aware that International backers are responsible for any customs fees their country may ask for, so plan accordingly!









A big ol' heartfelt thanks to you for checking out & backing this project! You're bringing a passionate dream to life and supporting a growing artist, while collecting and gaining new babies to add to your Harry Potter pin collection!
Here's to you adoring them as much as I do! ♥
Thank you to all my friends, family & followers who've extended their endless love & support through this process! I definitely couldn't have done this without you.









Do feel free to give me a follow on Instagram for any updates! I'd also appreciate it so much if you could take the time to share this project. The more exposure we get through your shares, the higher a chance we get to reaching all goals set for this campaign!
If you are interested in checking out the other pins I have created, here's a quick link to my shop.
description_risks:
There is always a possibility that the campaigns fail to reach their funding goal. If this campaign happens to fall short of its goal, the campaign will be automatically cancelled by kickstarted and all funds pledged towards it will be fully refunded.

As is normal with pin manufacturing, small hiccups such as delay in production due to product not meeting the quality checks may occur.
Eventhough I have reached out to the manufacturer to ensure that the pin design is possible to be made into a physical product, there may be final adjustments before actual production.

I will definitely keep you guys updated throughout the campaign, just so I can keep my supporters in the loop with things.

For quicker responses on urgent matters, dont hesitate to drop me a DM over on instagram @fictive.co

description_story:
Story















Hi there! I am Reyr, the artist behind Aethereyr. I like to draw cute and colourful things!


I am super excited to run this little Kickstarter campaign. I hope you will enjoy it!


Spring is in the air~ It's the sakura blooming season and these cute chibi animals are hiding among the cherry blossom, ready to give you a cute little surprise! ❤


























   Gold finish hard enamel pins
   2 back posts (to secure the pin and prevent rotation)
  Approx. 1.3" - 1.5" in size
  Mounted on a backing card 

What are Hard Enamel Pins?
Hard enamel pins (lapel pins/brooches) are decorative art that can be worn or otherwise displayed.




Past Campaign Sample Pins (Pokey)














   Pledge now and pay later.
  You can always change your pledge anytime during the campaign.
  You will not be charged until the end of a successful Kickstarter campaign.
  By pledging for all your desired designs even if they have not been unlocked, you will help the campaign work towards unlocking them.










Here is the estimated timeline if everything goes smoothly:

  Start of April to Mid April: Campaign funding phase
  End of April: Surveys sent through Kickstarter for you to choose your preferred pins and add-ons
  Start of June to Mid June: Products are received and shipped out to backers
  July to August: Products received by backers. Please allow additional time for international shipping.

After the campaign is fully funded, a survey will be sent through Kickstarter for you to specify your shipping address, preferred pins and add-ons. Please ensure that your shipping address is correct.
In order to prevent any delayed shipment, please fill up the survey as soon as possible.
Tracking numbers will be sent to you once the order is mailed.
I will do my utmost to make sure that all packages are properly packed. Thank you.









Heartfelt thanks to all of you for viewing the campaign. I hope you enjoyed it as much as I do! Feel free to share the campaign with your friends!
Follow me on Instagram for more of my art
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/aethereyr/
With love ❤ Aethereyr
description_risks:
Pin designs shown above are for illustrative purposes only and are subjected to minor changes during final production.

(1) Possible manufacturing defects

I have made many of my pins with my current manufacturers and they are of high standards. Hence, I have good faith that my current manufacturers will do the same for this collection of pins. However, if there should be any defect, I will reproduce the pins which may cause shipping to be delayed.

(2) Colour variations

Actual colours of the pins may differ from the images you see on your screen. I will try my best to ensure that the actual colours resemble the original pin designs.

(3) Line variations

Slight changes in the line art may be made if manufacturers need to do so, as the lines are made of metal and may fused into each other.

(4) Shipping duration

There may be unforeseen delay due to different countries' customs clearance procedures, which are beyond my control.

I will do my best to ensure that packages are packed properly and handed to my local courier service provider promptly. However, please note that anything that happens during the shipping process is beyond my control.

Any additional tax, fees or customs’ charges are the responsibility of the backer.

Backers will be responsible for any returned parcels due to negligence such as providing the wrong shipping address or failing to collect the parcels from their local post office during the collection period. Additional shipping cost to ship the parcels again will be charged accordingly.

If there should be any queries or issues with your orders, please contact me via Kickstarter and I will try my best to assist you.

blurb: The Quire is finally here! The ultimate BUDGET drawstring for your everyday needs, without breaking the bank.
description: The Quire is finally here! The ultimate BUDGET drawstring for your everyday needs, without breaking the bank.
name: Quire | The ULTIMATE Budget Drawstring Backpack | 24 HOURS!!
title: Quire | The ULTIMATE Budget Drawstring Backpack | 24 HOURS!!
Title: Quire | The ULTIMATE Budget Drawstring Backpack |
Description: The Quire is finally here! The ultimate BUDGET drawstring for your everyday needs, without breaking the bank.
Link: Quire | The ULTIMATE Budget Drawstring Backpack |The Quire is finally here! The ultimate BUDGET drawstring for your everyday needs, without breaking the bank.
description_story:
Story







Introducing Quire by AUSTERToday's generation, everyone always has something to do. Everyone has a very active and on-the-go lifestyle. We want to provide consumers with a backpack perfect for any circumstance with all the features to satisfy the needs and wants of anybody in this day and age. Introducing, the Quire drawstring.







Why use a drawstring bag anyway?Drawstring bags can be a perfect addition to your everyday items. They are quick, easy and compact. Perfect for a stroll in the park, an afternoon outing, or maybe you just need to pack light.So why use the Quire?Our drawstring bag is not limited to only these features. The Quire drawstring goes far and beyond, making it the perfect drawstring for any type of circumstance. Our bag has implemented features that make it one of the most versatile bags available on the market. We are also great for people on a budget as our prices are very low.FeaturesWater-ResistanceThe Quire is designed with your daily lives in mind. And this is one of the reasons we have implemented high-quality water resistant polyester to make sure the rain never stops you.Rain HoodWe have also implemented a Rain Hood to make sure no water ever enters the backpack. So you can run your life with out worrying about your personal belongings inside the backpack. The Rain Hood also acts as another security feature to prevent pickpockets to ever reach your belongings.







 








 External PocketsA downside of a regular Drawstring bag is the inability to organise your items within the bag. The Quire has been designed with 2 external pockets for your organisational needs. These pockets also double up for Bottle holders to make sure no liquid needs to be put inside the backpack. These pockets use an extra durable velcro making sure nothing falls out of the bag.CompressibilityWe all travel a lot, and may have limited space in our luggage to carry more items. The Quire is an extremely durable backpack which allows it to be folded and clipped to take as little room as possible, allowing you to always keep The Quire by your side.







 








Quick Access ZipA downside of using an original drawstring bag is that you have to open the backpack every time, you want to remove or put something in the backpack. With the Quire the whole problem is removed as we have added a quick access zip to let you access your items easily without having to reopen the backpack continuously.







 Detachable StringsDrawstring bags are extremely hard to customise to your daily situations. As the strings are rigidly in place and cannot be changed. Our backpack eliminates this problem as we use high quality velcro to allow you to split and attach it to anywhere you like. As we use one of the best velcro in the market the velcro will never split even when there is a lot of pressure on it.These detachable strings also help balance the strings out as there is a central connection point, which keeps it balanced.







 








 







 The Quire Bag is perfect for travelling, adventures and everyday use. Our mission with this product was to provide users with a bag that can be used anywhere anytime and can serve all the functions needed to carry out different activities.PriceOur prices are extremely low so that we can provide high-quality items to everyone around. Instead of making large amounts of profits, we chose to increase the accessibility of our products to the larger market for everyone to enjoy.







Stretch Goals:SG$6000 - We will release a new color!  Onyx Black to add to the slick design of the backpack.  







SG$7000 - Superior packaging to give your bag a premium feeling at first sight.SG$10000 - We will give away freebies with every Quire that is sold! (More info closer to reaching the goal)More stretch goals will be added if we move past our goal.Rewards







All prices above are rounded and given in USD. SGD prices are given below the USD prices.Our prices are extremely amazing as you get a super quality drawstring backpack for as low as $9 (S$12). Our other early bird specials and Kickstarter exclusive prices are also amazing deals and we would hope you support our campaign and secure your self an Quire.Our GoalOur campaign goal along side raising $3,000, to bring great products for a very low cost. This then boosts the competitive nature of Kickstarter. We also want to produce something that has some use to your everyday lives no matter what activity you are doing. We want to make something for you to remember.PolicySingapore Shipments:All Singapore Shipments are priced at 5 SGD (on top of the original Quire cost), and will be delivered to your given address within 5 - 10 business days of receiving the Email confirmation for delivery. Delivery times will be given within the email confirmation for delivery.International Shipping:All International Shipments are priced at 10 SGD (on top of the original The Quire cost ), and will be delivered to your given address within 1 - 2 weeks of receiving the Email confirmation for delivery. The delivery is not trackable, and the delivery is satisfied using SingPost.Note: Shipments for 10x Backpack will cost 80 SGD and Shipments for 2x Will cost 15 SGD for International, and 7.5 SGD for Singapore.
description_risks: Starting our debut campaign we've had many risks and challenges like the inability to raise the goal. Our team has worked for over 2 years on putting this campaign together, so that there will be zero hassle for the customers we will be delivering to. Our obstacles are immediately decreased as we are getting fixed funding which means our costs will never change. This allows us to deliver our items at the best price without any sudden surprises for our customers.

blurb: Time travel is not exclusive to fiction but a condition for reality. I'd like to tell my story.
description: Time travel is not exclusive to fiction but a condition for reality. I'd like to tell my story.
name: Xsanity Origin
title: Xsanity Origin
Title: Xsanity Origin
Description: Time travel is not exclusive to fiction but a condition for reality. I'd like to tell my story.
Link: Xsanity OriginTime travel is not exclusive to fiction but a condition for reality. I'd like to tell my story.
description_story:
StoryI would like to share a story. It's a true story and it's about time travel.
It's a story of good and bad, kindness and betrayal, hope and despair, victory and defeat and many other things that make it real. It is my story and I would like to tell it as a book. 
The art of written word seems lost upon the current generation, with information availability almost as fast as speed of human thought.
So, I have decided to write this story as a book. 
Importantly to me, it is a true story of my past, which I have witnessed and I am the best to tell it. With social media, we forgot how to openly speak our mind without considering what is that we'd like to tell the world. Everything is questioned and everything is doubted, it's hard to even know, what truth is, anymore.
I am turning 30 in a month. Those who know my story, are quite amused by it, it's difficult to tell for me, because I lived it, so it's simply real, and not that amusing after all. 
Perhaps it's similar to story of Forest Gump. I was born at an interesting time, and I had a loving mother. Just like Forest, I was a little slow. My application to school was rejected because it did not pass some tests, so I had to stay back another year in kindergarten before I was accepted to begin my learning journey.
Just like Forest, at times I had to face some bullies, and that is where it starts to deviate. 
My story starts in 1989 in an interesting and mysterious place called the USSR. The first memories I start to recall, it was already re-branded to Russian Federation, 1 superpower fell apart to create 15 countries. We had democracy and freedom, and all those amazing things that resulted in crimes, and gangs and oligarchs.  Overnight, Russia became the land of opportunity where freedom was not that free. We did not have the beautiful story of how founding fathers fought the wars, and came together to sign the declaration of Independence with 14 amendments that are the holiest of laws. In Russia, we had rich history of many wars that were fought and human will and spirit that it took to fight for the motherland.
So, early 90s, the opportunity was available, but it was also a land where survival of the weak was something the country could no longer afford. After 70 over years of that fake equality and propaganda, when democracy and capitalism came, there was no time to wait. The weak were preyed, the strong prevailed.
I was a kid, and witnessed some of it. A lot of it, I managed to live through, thanks to the price my parents paid. But I was slow. My mother had to work, and so did my dad. Being slow, was weakness, and the bullying that happened in schools back then, would probably amount to juvenile detention based on foreign standards of today. For me, that was daily life. So, mama did not have much choice. She could not look after me and herself at the same time. She loved me dearly, but I was a slow kid. I was potential prey. So, instead of the iconic "Run, Forrest Run!" My mama taught how to retaliate, and punch back those who dared to hit me first.
....
I am 29 years old. I live in Singapore. You can see the previous and unsuccessful kick-starter campaign at (link). My bio is from then, so now, it is exactly that + what I've done since then. Please take into account that it was a few years ago, that kid was kind of arrogant, and had a lot to learn.  I started Project28, had ups and downs, and overall it is a pretty interesting story as well. 
...
 I'll expand this section further when time permits.
...
Expected delivery: Jan-March 2020 
Stretch goals will be revealed upon hitting funding goals.
...
I would like to print it into hard copy as well, have yet to do research on that. 
Also, I would like to write in two languages at the very least. My English is ok, my Russian is on 8th grader's level. So that will require more time to proof read and translate. 
...
Time is money, therefore, this kickstarter will help me manage my time accordingly to allocate for this project. 
...
I'll expand the rewards, after launching.
X.

blurb: tweeq is a powerful and open micro-sized arduino compatible platform, with a whole range of teeny tiny add-ons!
description: tweeq is a powerful and open micro-sized arduino compatible platform, with a whole range of teeny tiny add-ons!
name: tweeq: Micro-sized Arduino Compatible Platform & Add-ons!
title: tweeq: Micro-sized Arduino Compatible Platform & Add-ons!
Title: tweeq: Micro-sized Arduino Compatible Platform & Add-ons!
Description: tweeq is a powerful and open micro-sized arduino compatible platform, with a whole range of teeny tiny add-ons!
Link: tweeq: Micro-sized Arduino Compatible Platform & Add-ons!tweeq is a powerful and open micro-sized arduino compatible platform, with a whole range of teeny tiny add-ons!
description_story:
Story








Micro-sized boards, modules, everything!




A small portion of what the tweeq platform has to offer





The tweeq platfom is designed to meet the demands of multiple functionality in a really small, low energy platform, while retaining user flexibility and ease of use.






K.I.S.S PrincipleYou'll probably know the K.I.S.S acronym as the famous "Keep It Simple, Stupid",  or the tons of other variations there are out there.During the hardware and software design process, we put a twist onto the acronym and stuck by the "Keep It Simple & Small" rule.The hardware platform and software that comes with it are to be kept really small, be it in physical dimensions or code size, and also have to be really simple to use across the board.The result, is the tweeq platform.Tiny, Powerful Cores




Our largest and smallest core next to each other for scale





Introducing tweeq cores. They might look tiny in the palm of your hands, but these little fellas boast a 32-bit micro-controller with loads of memory (up to 256KB!), and they come in 6 different configurations designed to best meet your wildest gadget ideas. 







Teeny Tiny Stamp Modulestweeq's stamp modules are possibly the world's smallest series of cascade-able modules that add a singular function to any tweeq core without any addition to the size of the overall board configuration.










Our largest stamp module currently available (EEPROM) measures 9.5 x 11mm. That's smaller than an average m&m chocolate!





Take a stamp module and make it an on-board feature!





All stamp modules are cascade-able thanks to the I2C bus line. This allows you to connect multiple stamp functionalities using the same 2 pins, leaving the other pins free for multi-functional and intermediate boards, as well as the many external modules available for plug-and-play.


At the back of each core is a space to put one (or more!) of these tiny lil' stamp modules.





Micro-sized Multi Functional Boards

We know how difficult it is to get your cool DIY gadget ideas looking as slim and sexy as possible, without having to design and build the PCB on your own. For things to be really slim, we found that stacking anything more than 3 boards starts getting way too thick. 




All stamp modules are kept to a maximum height of 3mm so that a multi functional board can be added on top of it, like this!






The tweeq cores are extended with the use of multi-functional boards, designed to provide at least 2 functionalities on a tiny footprint, in order to reduce the amount of board stacking needed.









Every FUNctional board is a marriage of functions that will either need each other, or an ingenious complement to the main function.We currently have 4 multi-functional boards available, with even more on the way. These 4 boards are a great start for a whole ton of applications, ranging from wearables to tiny robots!Intermediate Boards (IB)Intermediate boards are great for adding functionalities that complement the multi-functional boards. 







For this reason, having intermediate boards like the WIFI IB go in between a core board and, say, an audio board, opens up cool applications like a talking desktop companion that nags when you spend too much time on Facebook, or a talking virtual butler.


MITO:mOLED, IB:WIFI and FB:Audio





With just 3 boards stacked together, that's a whole lot of features in a really small area! (Slim too!)

Tiny Peripherals & Accessories


The tweeq platform is made awesome with the support of an ever growing range of tiny peripherals and accessories.








Tiny, meet tiny Plug and play external modules (extMod), cable connectors, speakers, motor actuators, batteries and more, are hand picked and/or custom made to help ensure that the entire set-up is kept tiny.Breadboard ModulesWe love breadboarding. And in the process of building the tweeq platform, we found the perfect companion when breadboarding circuits. We call them breadboard modules. 







Ever since we designed these breadboard modules more than a year ago, they have been crucial in every breadboard set up, with or without the tweeq platform. 







Plug the modules into the power rails, and use our jumper wires at the top to connect things up right where you can see them. We've used these modules so much, we came up with 3 breadboard perfect lengths of jumper wires that keep the set-up looking really neat.
For every breadboard module there is, a tiny external module(extMod) version for it is available for plug and play. This makes it easy for you to set up your tiny version of what you prototype on your breadboard later on!tweeq is OpenWe're looking forward to growing with you as part of a community that shares everything around the tweeq together. We're talking Schematics, PCB Designs, Hardware Libraries, Software Libraries, 3D Models, 3D Printing and Laser Cutting Designs (eg. Enclosures)... Everything.







All of tweeq's current and future hardware design files will be freely available for download from Github.Download, view, modify, and design around it. When you're ready to build your own boards for use with the tweeq, we'll be there to support you with the parts that tweeq uses, or even build it for you (we're awesome like that).Have Free Rein Developing With tweeq 




Have your pick - 3 Languages, 3 IDEs, All Free





At the heart of tweeq's  PIC32 32-bit core is an optimized chipKIT bootloader, allowing you to choose among 3 popular programming languages and IDEs you're comfortable with, and use the same USB to Serial Downloader across all compilers to program the cores.tweeq is Arduino Compatible







 The tweeq's onboard chipKIT bootloader allows you to program using the open source Arduino compatible MPIDE, which works with existing Arduino Libraries and Sketches. You'll be able to select the tweeq core boards from the drop-down menu in MPIDE, and use them with the open source libraries we'll be releasing that works great with our add-ons.If you're already familiar with the Arduino style of programming, you'll feel right at home when programming your tweeq platform.tweeq is Great for Advanced Users tweeq's onboard serial bootloader also means that you can program using Microchip's MPLAB X IDE in Microchip's PIC C Language, and download programs using just a USB to Serial Converter, without the need for a programmer/ICD.If you're no stranger to PIC or PIC32 chips and are looking for a tiny development platform, the tweeq is for you.tweeq is BASIC







Using the tweeq platform with Allegro IDE is perfect for those who just have too many want-to-dos. (You know who you are) Programs are written in BASIC minor (B minor), a subset of VB.NET that is very much like the English language, making it easy to pick up and getting things done.







Along with intelli-sense and syntax helpers, Allegro IDE also comes with utilities that make preparing graphics/User Interface a breeze.All tweeq hardware available currently and in the future will have full software library support, and tutorials to go along with it.  Allegro IDE is free, and will be available for download for both Windows and MAC OS.Open Source USB OTG Libraries We are glad to announce that among the list of open source libraries released with Allegro IDE, is a fully open source USB HID Driver written in BASIC for tweeq USB OTG MITO cores, with CDC support on its way. tweeq is Low Costtweeq is a low cost platform for rapid prototyping and proof of concept. Save time, save money.


Cores start as low as £8.90 (USD$14.90)







 Project ShowcaseHere's a showcase of some of the more note-worthy projects that have been done using the tweeq.







 Hack&Mod: Wheatley
Interactive Jack-O-Lanterns
DIY wearable smart band
Wearables! 
Selfie printer with the PROTO:CAM core and a thermal printer!
Check out our showcase gallery here for more projects! Tutorials for the above shown projects will be ready in time for you to try out when you receive your own little tweeq kits!Technical Specifications







Boards In The Process Of FinalizationThe following boards are undergoing the process of finalization. They are available for pre-order along with the rest of tweeq platform and will be shipped at the same time as the rest of your order.
Core: PROTO:CAM (Vision)

Core: PROTO:MOTOR
Stamp Module: Proximity + Light Sensor (VCNL4020)

FUNcBoard: IO+Servo
extMod: RGB LED
Stamp Module: 9-DOF IMU


Boards in DevelopmentThese boards are slated for future release and will be available for order after the campaign is over.

FUNcBoard: Audio Codec


Reward Tiers










































Take your pick of teeny tiny add-ons!





                         

What's planned over the next few months









Credits
Product Photography - Kent Nguyen Photography
description_risks:
Risks and challenges will definitely be evident when hardware manufacturing and logistics is concerned, as it involves quite a few stages. 

Our core team has had more than 10 years of experience working together to release hardware development kits over the years, and we've established good long-term business relationships with a few key manufacturers and suppliers that we have been using regularly for more than 4 years. 

Should any of them fail to deliver due to any reason, alternative suppliers  that we have done business with have also been prepared, so as to reduce any possible delays in the process of component and parts procurement, fabrication, assembly and any other process that requires custom work to be done.

All hardware items will be inspected, tested, and packed in-house by our team in Singapore, before shipping worldwide via registered airmail to backers using Singapore Post. This is a trackable option which takes about 2 weeks to reach most destinations.

Of course, while we can try to pre-empt and prepare for as many obstacles and issues that may arise in the time before we ship (or even after we do), should there be any roadblocks due to unforeseen circumstances, please rest assured that we'll do our utmost best to overcome it and be as transparent as possible throughout the entire process.

Thank you so much for your support!

description_story:
StoryAbout Me
Hello! I'm Mai, an artist from Singapore. This is my first ever Kickstarter, and I'm happy to share it with the world! Introducing Love is Sweet! a set of original pride flag enamel pins for those who love their Pride on the sweeter side.
You can find me on my socials at ADREM0RA!
About This Project
I have always wanted to create enamel pins, especially those to show off LGBT pride. 
The goal of SGD1500 is to unlock all 8 enamel pins offered in the banner - yes, all 8 of them! It didn't feel right to "lock" any sexualities and gender identities behind a paywall. Instead of conventional unlock new designs every X amount of dollars, I am offering a singular stretch goal, as well as possibly adding more flags or freebies to the mix if the reception is overwhelmingly positive.
WHY Kickstarter?
Kickstarter offers a back now, pay later model - your money will not be spent until the end of the campaign, and it only is spent if the project is fully funded! 
The Pins Offered
The pins will be approximately 1 inches wide, hard enamel with gold plating.
I have 8 designs to choose from! In no particular order, LGBT Pride, Lesbian, Bisexual, Pansexual, Transgender, Nonbinary, Asexual and Aromantic.
Colours shown are for visualisation purposes only and may vary in final product. The pin itself will be made of gold plating.

































































The Stretch Goal (singular)
At $3500, every pledge $14 or above will receive a Rainbow Candy PVC charm at no additional cost! Colours may vary in final product.
description_risks:
I have not created enamel pins before, however, I have created zines and miscellaneous merchandise in the past, so I am confident in my ability to deliver.

I also am working with an established enamel pin manufacturer to bring this project to life.

description_story:
Story







Hi! I'm Rachel, also known as @theconfettihands on Instagram! I have run a few similar campaigns before and I'm back again!


In this campaign, I created a series of Christmas character enamel pins and other goodies! Check out these three characters designed specially to get you in the mood.


The goals are listed below, so let’s unlock everything if you love Christmas and are ready to get into the festive mood!









Kickstarter uses a pledge now - pay later all or nothing system. You will not be charged anything unless the campaign is successfully funded on 9th December 2021.


Pledges are tied to pin quantities (1,2 or 3 pins) and not to pin designs so please pledge freely.  Surveys will be sent out to you once the campaign ends on 9th December so that you can choose your pins and other goodies.


You can cancel/edit your pledge any time before the campaign ends but of course I would love if you keep your pledge. Every time I see someone pledge, it makes a small business owner very happy and is very encouraging.


If you have any questions, send me a message rather than post it as a comment as I will be paying closer attention to my messages.






















































Items that will be included in every reward package.
1 Sticker Strip 
1 Merry Friend Card
Stickers are waterproof and best peelable only twice.
For both the sticker and the card it will be a random design but I will try to match it to your pin choice. The cards feature 6 more Merry Friend variations not from the pins so you may get a surprise character!















Discounted price for 2 pin tiers (1 pin and all 3 pins)
2 Sticker Strips instead of 1
Early bird promo ends on 28th November (10 day period)








Add these items to your rewards through the add-ons page. 


Sticker pack: Featuring 6 more Merry Friends, making a total of 9 stickers.
Stickers are waterproof and best peelable only twice.
Sticker sheet: Perfect for scrapbooking and journaling (matte paper stickers)























Local Shipping: Within Singapore through Singpost Normal Mail. If you would like Tracked Mail, please top up SGD 2.00 to your pledge and notify me through a message.


Your rewards package will reach 1-1.5 weeks


International Shipping: Only Singpost Tracked Mail is available to ensure your package is not lost. This is based on my past experiences.


You will be sent your tracking number and if you are unable to find it,  please send me a message. Track your package here: www.singpost.com/track-items/


Your rewards package will reach in maximum 8 weeks. UK & EU pledgers will probably receive rewards earlier than US pledgers.


I hope to mail out within a week of receiving the enamel pins. Please check both the status of your individual rewards as well as the campaign updates. I can only mail out rewards once Kickstarter has accepted payment from your card/account.
























18th November: Start of Campaign (Early Bird promo included)
28th November: Early Bird Promo ends
11pm (SGT) 9th December: Campaign ends. Surveys sent out to you (please check around this time to answer your surveys)
Mid December: Most of your packages should be sent out
February: Re-live Christmas with happy pin mail!
description_risks:
During this ongoing pandemic, I will be disinfecting each item individually once I receive them. To ensure your safety and health, we encourage recipients to disinfect packages prior to and even after opening the package as a form of normal practice.

Based on our experience during COVID-19, they will take an estimate of 2 months from the date of mailing out for pledgers outside of Singapore.

I will post updates on the progress of the campaign and production if successful. Do drop me an email at theconfettihands@gmail.com if you have any questions.

blurb: Searching for the love he lost due to Covid

Title: Love After Covid
Description: Searching for the love he lost due to Covid

description_story:
StoryThe Pandemic plaguing us in recent months has created a dent in the life we were accustomed to. However, I - like many others - strive to make the best out of it; by taking the time and personal space we otherwise wouldn't get to have, to fulfil a lifelong dream of writing and publishing a novel with a story about love that will hopefully pique your interest and inspire you to treasure your loved ones. 
The story is about a time after a cure has been found for the pandemic. But by that time, a large part of the world has already been destroyed from it. Most of Asia has been crippled by it and live in a world of ensuing anarchy. Singapore perished due to its small population and is a country no more. The protagonist of the book, who survived embarks on a journey on land,  across Asia to Shanghai to find his wife. She had returned to Shanghai before Covid got out of hand in Singapore and they had not been able to contact each other since.  This is story about his unrelenting journey in search of his Love. 
The funds raised shall help with creative, printing and editorial costs mainly. I'd like to print enough copies to share them with more people. I shudder to think that one day the digital age will fully deprive the newer generation the simple pleasure of sitting at home or at a cafe with a drink by the side and reading a hard copy in their hands. I would like to obstinately stand by printing hard copies; old school way.
This venture to realise the book will not only serve my own aspiration as I hope it also serves to encourage any individual keen to pursue a life of the arts; of creation, to persevere.  With the help of a community dedicated to supporting the arts, if I can do it, anyone can.
I hope to get better acquainted with all my pledgers in time to come and hopefully be able to foster a community where we can support one another's desire and enthusiasm for creation. 
Best
JoeQ'r

blurb: No software, just a sticker. All of the prestige, all of the drawbacks. A seamless experience across all devices ✨

name: Notch | The Only Notch For Your Devices.
title: Notch | The Only Notch For Your Devices.
Title: Notch | The Only Notch For Your Devices.
Description: No software, just a sticker. All of the prestige, all of the drawbacks. A seamless experience across all devices 📱💻🤦✨
Link: Notch | The Only Notch For Your Devices.No software, just a sticker. All of the prestige, all of the drawbacks. A seamless experience across all devices 📱💻🤦✨
description_story:
Story







Notch envy.Love your iPhone X? Wish your plebeian phone stood up to the towering elegance of Apple's finest? Now all your devices can revel in the magic of the best the industry has to offer.Notch emulates the intense emotions of gazing in captive wonder at the stunning edge-to-edge display of the iPhone X. With manufacturers across the mobile industry scrambling to put phones out with the iconic top-mounted obstruction, it became clear that this was something all users needed.Here's what Notch does for you.Notch is anything you want it to be. A simple sticker. A symbol. A lifestyle.


Up your phone prestige game.








Bask in Notch's brilliance at work.








Timeless design.








Absolute magic.








No limits to Notch.





Stunning design & build.Exceptional materials. Razor-thin PVC*. Resilient adhesive backing.Over 600 DPI. Achieved with a precision die-cut process.


Make a statement.





Two incredible sizes.Notch comes in two beautifully judged flavours. Colossal and Classic.


Size matters.





It's just a sticker, guys.Greetings, fellow millennials! We're Charles and Aditya, software and automotive engineers from sunny Singapore. We’ve been longtime lurkers and backers on Kickstarter. With the release of the iPhone XS, Pixel 3 and other notched devices, we thought it would be hilarious to get our feet wet and deliver a fun project on one of our favourite platforms.


This is peak technology today.





It started as a joke among friends (across the whole internet, really). The iPhone X’s controversial design clearly put everyone’s knickers in a twist, and the trend continues to grow... for some reason.What really floored us were the copycats it spawned, from huge Chinese manufacturers to household names (lookin’ at you Motorola). This got us thinking, “What if all devices had a notch?” A month later, et voila.Think of Notch as a tongue-in-cheek jab at the ridiculous state of consumer technology and branding today. If you love avocado toast served with a side of dank memes, this is definitely for you.  Have fun!- Charles & Aditya*I said paper in the video. I apologise. Pretentiousness has its limits.UPDATES:12.10.18 - We're featured on Coconuts! Check it out here.
14.10.18 - We made the front page of Product Hunt! Show us love here.
description_risks:
- We might get sued by Apple. That won't happen... Right?
- We're getting stickers printed. I think we can handle that.
- Stickers are small and a bit tricky to cut, but we'll figure it out.
- Only challenge is our delivery strategy. We'll likely be serving our NA/EU backers with a printing company in NA, and Asia backers from Singapore.
- We've identified a number of excellent printing companies in NA, but open to suggestions from the community!

description_story:
Story










Hello! My name is Tiffanie/Tiff, I draw and create cute artworks under the name Truffle Arts. I am a full time artist and designer based in Singapore and I have made lots of merch & stationery such as stickers, washi tapes, enamel pins, keychains and more. 
I recently started my shop about a year ago (I launched this campaign on my shop anniversary) I draw lots of my own characters and mainly adorable animals! 💗
For more updates on this campaign, I regularly update on my Twitter and Instagram.




Examples of my enamel pin and washi tape













I started this Breakfast Chonky Friends Mini Enamel Pin Series as I love drawing cute tiny things with faces on them, and it just so happens that it was breakfast themed! I decided to make them mini enamel pins 2.5cm~ as I like how intricate tiny enamel pins can be. As I always wanted to do a series of enamel pins, I have decided Kickstarter is the best way to go for me.










  Surveys will be given out at the end of the campaign to choose your rewards. 
  Prices below are in SGD (Singapore Dollar)









   Colours might not reflect how it looks when it is being produced due to the screen and lighting. Pantone colours has been settled but do note that Toast & Waffle has been slightly modified as the colours look different in real life & digital.











  All enamel pins comes with a Truffle Arts backstamp and a matching backing card!



































   Prices are in SGD (Singapore Dollar) but here is an estimated price guide for other currencies. 
  After this campaign is over and fully funded they will be added to my shop for a higher rate.



















   Kickstarter campaign starts (Late August)
  Campaign ends + surveys given out (Late September)
  Manufacturing begins (Late September - Early November)
   Pins arrive + Mailing them out (Mid November - Early December)










 Nearer to the date where the pins are shipped out, backers would be able to combine orders from my shop and shipping will be waived when checking out on my site!
  International Shipping

  All International orders are shipped with TRACKED SHIPPING at a flat rate of SGD9 (USD 6~) regardless of the quantity! Takes about 8-30 days, subjected to delays.
  All backers especially UK & EU backers are responsible for customs and import taxes that may apply. I'm not responsible for delays due to customs.

International Shipping (Most Asian Countries)

  Orders coming from countries near Singapore are shipped with TRACKED SHIPPING at a flat rate of SGD7 except Malaysia at SGD4 regardless of the quantity! Takes about 8-30 days, subjected to delays.

Domestic Shipping (Singapore)

  All mails are shipped with NO TRACKING at a flat rate of $1.50. (if you would like a tracked option please free to email me or message me on my socials!) Takes about 2-7 days, subjected to delays. Lost of shipment will not be replaced, please get tracked.











  Shop (International): https://www.trufflearts.com/ 
  Shopee (Singapore): https://shopee.sg/shop/3726640/ 
  Twitter: https://twitter.com/trufflearts 
  Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/truffle.arts/ 
  TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@trufflearts 
  Email: trufflearts@hotmail.com
description_risks:
PRODUCTION
- Since enamel pins are handmade, it's normal for them to have minor imperfections such as scratches etc. Though I will be grading them and making sure it is up to standard to be sent over.
- I have settled all the pantone colours digitally, the colours might look different depending on your screen.

SHIPPING
- Due to COVID-19 mails being delayed are inevitable.
- To make sure all backers get their reward all pins will be shipped out using TRACKED mail.

REWARDS
- Once the campaign has been successfully funded, surveys will be given out! backers are responsible for filling it out by the given deadline. Or else I will hound you for it. Please check your emails!

If you have any questions feel free to email me at trufflearts@hotmail.com and or my socials @trufflearts (Twitter) and @truffle.arts (Instagram)
