blurb: At the MIT Media Lab, we invented a device that captures air pollution. We turned this pollution into safe, high-quality ink for art.
description: At the MIT Media Lab, we invented a device that captures air pollution. We turned this pollution into safe, high-quality ink for art.
name: AIR-INK: The world's first ink made out of air pollution
title: AIR-INK: The world's first ink made out of air pollution
Title: AIR-INK: The world's first ink made out of air pollution
Description: At the MIT Media Lab, we invented a device that captures air pollution. We turned this pollution into safe, high-quality ink for art.
Link: AIR-INK: The world's first ink made out of air pollutionAt the MIT Media Lab, we invented a device that captures air pollution. We turned this pollution into safe, high-quality ink for art.
description_story:
StoryWired | Fast Company | Mashable | CNET | Popular Mechanics | Digital Trends | Fortune | Business Insider | Futurism | Quartz | Upworthy | Uncrate | Daily Dot | Curbed | designboom | The Ecologist | Seeker | Tree Hugger | Yahoo Finance | Autoblog | New Atlas | Asian Age | KioskWhile at the MIT Media Lab, we asked ourselves a simple question. How can we turn something as ugly as air pollution into something as useful as ink?That’s how we came up with AIR-INK. Through this Kickstarter, we are offering AIR-INK for the first time––as safe, refillable, high-quality, water resistant markers and screen printing ink. By using 30ml of AIR-INK, you can negate 45 minutes worth of pollution.







 



We are offering AIR-INK for the first time through this Kickstarter.  AIR-INK is currently available as 2mm, 15mm, 30mm and 50mm markers, and as 150ml of screen printing ink.








Artist Kristopher Ho using AIR-INK to beautify a public space in Hong Kong.





What is AIR-INK made of?








AIR-INK is made out of air pollution particulate matter––namely the unburned carbon soot you see coming out of the exhaust pipe of cars, chimneys, generators, and more.

The process
AIR-INK is created through a three-step process.Step 1. While cheaper carbon black inks are manufactured through the deliberate burning of fossil fuels, we use our proprietary device––what we call KAALINK––to capture soot that is already being emitted from vehicles. KAALINK is retrofitted to the exhaust pipe of vehicles/generators to capture the outgoing pollutants. It takes just 45 minutes worth of vehicular emissions captured by Kaalink to produce 1 fluid ounce of ink––enough to fill one of the pens being offered through this Kickstarter campaign. 



Our device attached to the exhaust pipe of a car.








Emission samples from various engines over a period of time.





Step 2. The soot we collect undergoes various proprietary processes to remove heavy metals and carcinogens. The end product is a purified carbon rich pigment.


Experimenting with the captured soot to extract pigments.








We purify the carbon pigment by cutting out the heavy metals, dust particles, and all other harmful materials.





Step 3. The carbon is then used to make different types of inks and paints.


We use standard industrial processes to create ink that is as safe as any on the market.





The end resultWe have created several grades of AIR-INK with different applications: 2mm round tip and 15mm, 30mm and 50mm chisel tip markers, and screen printing ink.




Helmet designed with AIR-INK round tip marker.








Swag decorated with AIR-INK markers, paints, and screen printing inks.








AIR-INK sketchbook made in collaboration with Anteism.





How can I use AIR-INK? AIR-INK is currently available as 2mm, 15mm, 30mm and 50mm markers, and a 150ml screen printing ink set. If this campaign is a success, we will be able to work towards releasing oil based paints, fabric paints, outdoor paints, and more. 


2mm round tip markers for fine strokes. Confines 40 mins worth of pollution








15mm + 50mm chisel tip markers for curved strokes.








Screen printing ink set for screen printing.





RewardsWe are proud to offer the following rewards. If you'd like to add any additional items to your pledge (extra t-shirt, markers, post cards, etc.), just send us a message and we will do our best to accommodate!  The prices in the graphic below are in US Dollars (USD). They may differ slightly from the rewards prices on your right, which are converted from Singapore dollars (SGD). 















Where the money is goingAIR-INK follows industrial grade guidelines, and artists have been using AIR-INK for the past 6 months without issues.  Now, we are turning to Kickstarter to refine our KAALINK device and help scale up production.With every donation, you are giving back to the environment. In fact, you can negate 45 minutes worth of car pollution by using 30ml of AIR-INK.Even if just 15 percent of the world’s black ink supply is replaced with AIR-INK, we could end up cutting a lot of air pollution. Artist testimonialsIn July 2016, we collaborated with Tiger Beer and released a video about AIR-INK. The video was a huge success and was picked up by news outlets around the world. Artists from all over began asking how they could get their hands on the ink. Here are some of the kind words they shared.


Dibarah Mahmoob, Illustrator, Dhaka





"We're at a time where we need art not just for beauty. We need it for social and political purposes. We need it to create environmental awareness because pollution is at an all time high. AIR-INK will help a lot of people." 


Sneha Sreshtha, South Asia Institute at Harvard University





"I wrote with ink made from 3 hours worth of pollution from Bangalore, India. It gave my art more purpose. This is how inks should be made"  


Kristopher Ho, Muralist, Hong Kong





"AIR-INK provides an environmentally friendly option for creatives and is high quality. The ink itself is thicker than most and can paint on rough surfaces without bleeding. The color of the ink is solid black which fits perfectly with my usual practice."Our story







 


MIT Media Lab, Cambridge, MA





AIR-INK started out as an experiment at the MIT Media Lab in Cambridge, MA. We wanted to run a handheld printer that prints from candle soot, and demonstrated the rough prototype at several conferences. We quickly learned that environmentalists and artists loved it.


First prototype, 2013: Handheld printer that captures candle soot and prints from it





Later in 2014, we kicked off technological iterations in two Indian cities that are greatly affected by pollution––Delhi and Bangalore. We ideated further, prototyped, and saw that it could make a real world impact.







Moving beyond the prototypes, we started to "harvest" air pollution from engines and other sources. After treating that harvested air pollution, we turned it into inks. 


Early stages: Our team working in garages with cars and engines to capture air pollution before its released into the environment





Then in July 2016 is when we collaborated with Tiger Beer. Check out the video highlighting the experience below. 


Timeline 







Past media Fast Company | CNN | Gizmodo | The Creator's Project | Huffington Post | Hyperallergic | Business Insider | Design Taxi | Yahoo News | Creativity-Online

Why KickstarterPeople from all over constantly ask us how they can get their hands on AIR-INK and use it in their everyday lives. But at this time our pollution capture process is very labor intensive and can only happen at a very small scale. This campaign will allow us scale up and bring AIR-INK to as many of you as possible. On top of that, Kickstarter presents us with an incredible opportunity to form a creative community of human beings who hope to make the world a little more sustainable and beautiful. The Kickstarter community is already filled with these types of people, and we could not think of anywhere better to bring AIR-INK to life.We could not be more excited to give you the power to reduce your carbon-footprint and ultimately save lives while you create the things you love.








Team 




Anirudh, Nikhil, Nisheeth, Nitesh













Anirudh Sharma, Co-founder, Innovation Lead: Anirudh is a graduate from the Fluid Interfaces Group at MIT Media Lab, at Massachusetts Institute of Technology.  Anirudh has the knack of coming up with innovations in the area of wearable computing, accessibility and has taken various such concepts/innovations from proof of concept to product and deployment stage. Anirudh developed the initial idea and developed first prototype for making inks out of pollution and at present leads the innovation and engineering of pollution capture at Graviky Labs.Nikhil Kaushik, Co-founder, Business Lead: Nikhil leads the business and strategic development at Graviky Labs.  He handles the overall business relations, supply chain and operations.

Nisheeth Singh, Technical Development Lead: Nisheethleads technical development on our pollution capture technologies.  Experienced with cross-domain prototyping and rapid evaluation, he integrates different technical inputs from team members, our advisors and other stakeholders to develop Kaalink.  Nitesh Kadyan, Co-founder, Electronics and AI lead: Nitesh holds a degree in CS from IIIT, Bangalore and did his Masters thesis at Freie University. He has worked on self driving vehicles and as a masters thesis he has built a model self driving car.Our Advisors
Suranga Nayannkara: Suranga is an Assistant Professor from the Engineering Product Development Pillar at Singapore University of Technology and Design (SUTD). In 2011, he founded the Augmented Human Lab (www.ahlab.org) to explore ways of creating ‘enabling’ human-computer interfaces as natural extensions of our body, mind and behaviour. Suranga seeks a sense of ‘humanity’ in technology. For the totality and breadth of achievements, he has won many awards including young inventor under 35 (TR35 award) in the Asia Pacific region by MIT TechReview, Outstanding Young Persons of Sri Lanka (TOYP), and INK Fellowship 2016.Austin Lee: Austin is an Assistant Professor in the Carnegie Mellon School of Design. A former Research Assistant in the Tangible Media Group at the MIT Media Lab, he has explored system design for spatial drawing and 3D collaboration. As a designer, he has advised and supported UX and visual design for NASA JPL, Fortune 500 companies and startups. His professional work at Microsoft include interaction design for Skype's HoloLens companion experience and communication design in AR systems. He was the lead coordinator representing Korea for the London Design Biennale 2016 and has shown design work at London’s Somerset House, Red Dot awards and the Exploratorium.Nell Watson: Nell Watson is an engineer, entrepreneur, and futurist thinker who grew up in Northern Ireland. She has a longstanding interest in the philosophy of technology, and how extensions of human capacity drive emerging social trends. Nell serves as Associate Faculty at Singularity University. Her ability to bridge the world of technology and the Humanities makes it easy for her to translate complex subjects so that they can be clearly understood. In 2010 Nell founded Poikos, a machine learning-driven AI for for body measurement. Nell serves as Senior Advisor to The Future Society at Harvard, as well as serving as an advisory technologist to several startups, accelerators, and venture capital funds. She is also Co-Founder of OpenEth, an ethical explication engine that aims to crowdsource ethical heuristics for autonomous systems.

We have spent the past three years perfecting both our capture and proprietary processes. 

That said, there are always risks and unforeseen challenges when increasing the scale of a project! We will always be sure to update you if anything that could cause shipping delays arises. 

Thank you for your support!

Title: JETBLACK - Compact Smart FPV Drone Camera

Link: JETBLACK - Compact Smart FPV Drone CameraHelp us raise enough for manufacturing of Jetblack, a palm-sized smart drone that streams and records live video on mobile device
description_story:
StoryAs engineers, we always dream of making a remarkable flying machine. Sean, our design and mechanical engineer draws inspiration from foldable drones in the market. The concept revolves around portability. The initial sketch was a combination of the strength of different drones we pick up.


Sean, our design and mechanical engineer, started to pen out the concept of jetblack





And the journey starts to take the concept to reality ..


Sean taking it to the next level





With the finished CAD drawing, we were lucky to have a 3D printer at our place to print the separate components and pieced them together.


The 3D-printed prototype is thus born





The 3D-printed prototype reflected some structural issue. The back arms are loose. To make a foldable drone, we adopted a downward folding back arms, however the gap created the problem of securing the arms in place. Another problem was the initial thickness of 0.8mm, which results in 22g of extra weight. This exceeded our motor's specification by its 50% hovering threshold. The move to thin the thickness to 0.6mm started, and by thining, we have to reinforce the structure with perpendicular structs.


Closing up the gap of the back arms to secure for flight








Reinforcing the structure after thining, the structs are at the inner side of the frame





We leave the coloring process to our product manager, Ryan. He came up with a combination of a few colors using the theory of Color, Material and Finishing. Adding the iconic middle prop-up to reflect the curve of Jetblack. 


The initial vibrant orange was not being shown on the initial prototype due to printing on black surface





While the design was ongoing, we were working on a reliable altitude control, trajectory flying through finger drawing, and voice recognition features in our test area marked with motion capture cameras.


Testing in lab, and soldering components of the transmitting module








The mess of doing hardware, going through different components for test. Spot how many familiar devices and sensors you recognized!








Lots of batteries went through ups and downs to get where we are







Going through the manufacturing directives and instructions for Jetblack, the top row has the most problematic brushed motor component which the gear has to be mounted properly on the motor's rod





This is our very first time doing a drone for the masses, and we hope to have people experience Jetblack, that's our benchmark and standard for product. We adopted users' feedback through the initial batch of prototype at the courtesy our manufacturing partner, and have since improved Jetblack with reliable sensors, better camera, and longer flight time. Now that we are done with the prototype, we need to enter manufacturing with a minimum quantity. As we have exhausted our resources in the initial prototypes manufacturing, it has created massive financial stress on our team. We hope through Kickstarter we could convince our manufacturing partner to support us and also pay the initial deposit to kickstart the manufacturing. Help us realize our dream of having our plane fly in the sky. _______________________________________________________







Easy To Setup!


Fast to set up with easy-to-lock motor arms and pairing with APP to get flying!





 Draw To Fly!


Advanced smart mode that enables the drone to follow what you draw on the APP!





 Voice Control!


Using voice processing, the drone can be controlled using voice instruction. This free up your hands to truly go hands-free!





 Stable Altitude Height Control!


Advanced sensor and data fusion enable accurate height control





 _______________________________________________________










Dedicated carrier bag for Jetblack



 * Free carrier bag (updated as of 5 September)




Twice the batteries, twice the fun



* Free additional 900mAh battery (updated as of 3 September)









 _______________________________________________________

















 _______________________________________________________









It took us a long grueling journey to reach the stage of post-prototype production run. Why all the way to post-prototype? We want to be very sure that we are fully prepared to scale up for mass production.The only obstacle that is holding us back from a full-swing production compared to a prototype production run is cost. It takes a lot more money to run a bigger scale production, and more manpower, components and tools. The supports we have here at kickstarter give the team and the production partners confidence to make our dream a reality. We are here in Kickstarter to crowd fund a manufacturing run. We believed Kickstarter allows us to overcome the barrier, no matter which stage we are at. As a young team, we faced a huge financial challenge to produce a drone, it has exceeded our initial expectation. The prototype run we had have taught us many lessons regarding agreement, partnership, storage of sensitive chips like barometer, and the painfully expensive injection molding process. We were caught off guard with the cost of a manufacturing run. The manufacturing run is the very last stage, and by overcoming this stage here, we will be able to deliver our promise to our backers.Our strategy now is to raise just enough for the initial deposit for the manufacturing to kickstart the process. This is our immediate challenge, and the reason we are in kickstarter. We are very thankful for your support, and we appreciate all the backers’ support to help us make our idea a reality and share our excitement towards jetblack.Thank you from the bottom of our hearts,Alan, SK & RyanCo-founders - YYPLAY_______________________________________________________FAA? EASA? CAA? CASA? No worry, JETBLACK is so light, it is out of the regulated weight range of aviation authority.

 







    Weighing only 0.135 kg or 0.3 pounds_______________________________________________________


Click here for updates on our Facebook page!
description_risks:
Hardware is one hell of a challenge, especially when we are working on a flying device. It is a piece of very delicate and complex machine. 

As shown in the video, we have a completely functional prototype. The challenge here is to make more of them through a manufacturing process and ensuring they are identical in term of quality and reliability.

Here are the challenges that the team think we are up against:
-  Injection molding process. It costs a fair amount to set a mold for the process. 
- Procuring parts based on the BOM, and ensuring every single piece is reliable for delivery
- We have more testing to be done. Like more flight hours, more different environment (windy, cold just to list a few). Especially since we are shipping globally, we hope it will work in all the environment it is shipped to.

blurb: MATTER is bringing our 4th generation artisan partner, Khushiram, down to Singapore to conduct blockprinting workshops in November.
description: MATTER is bringing our 4th generation artisan partner, Khushiram, down to Singapore to conduct blockprinting workshops in November.
name: Blockprinting Workshop
title: Blockprinting Workshop
Title: Blockprinting Workshop
Description: MATTER is bringing our 4th generation artisan partner, Khushiram, down to Singapore to conduct blockprinting workshops in November.
Link: Blockprinting WorkshopMATTER is bringing our 4th generation artisan partner, Khushiram, down to Singapore to conduct blockprinting workshops in November.
description_story:
StoryHello from MATTER!We are a socially motivated brand based in Singapore with the mission to make the beautiful practice of textile craft sustainable. We create comfortable, versatile clothing and accessories that are loved around the world.  At the moment we work with over 7 communities, 5 techniques ranging from blockprinting, to ikat, to jamdani, and create an average of 20 hours of employment with each product sold.







Earlier this year, we brought our 4th generation artisan partner, Kushiram, down to Singapore to conduct blockprinting workshops at the National Gallery. It was his first time out of Singapore, and a great success. We’re looking to bring him down again for a second time this year in November, and for this we need to raise some funds, and so we’re reaching out to you.  







MATTER is built on the concept of connectedness and bringing the world closer together. If you’re a lover of craft, of block printing, of fabrics, culture, provenance, then this is perfect for you. Bring your friends and better halves and join in our movement to make where and why something is made matter.  







 Save
description_risks: Every project could potentially encounter unexpected obstacles (we hope it doesn’t come up, but it happens!). Should we not be able to raise the total funds sufficient to bring Kushiram to Singapore, we will unfortunately have to cancel the workshop and all pledges will be refunded. This means tell your friends about this project now, so it happens!

blurb: Redefining intimates. Made for females leading extraordinary lives. Comfort, aesthetic, and organic in its DNA.
description: Redefining intimates. Made for females leading extraordinary lives. Comfort, aesthetic, and organic in its DNA.
name: SUGARPLUM Lingerie
title: SUGARPLUM Lingerie
Title: SUGARPLUM Lingerie
Description: Redefining intimates. Made for females leading extraordinary lives. Comfort, aesthetic, and organic in its DNA.
Link: SUGARPLUM LingerieRedefining intimates. Made for females leading extraordinary lives. Comfort, aesthetic, and organic in its DNA.
description_story:
StoryDefine lingerie shopping. You spend so much money (You do know that those  bras can buy you a concert experience that lasts a lifetime) only to have those wires stick out to your skin. Everything is black, white, or beige - like, there is a reason movies are in colour now. Oh, and what about those days where you are offered lingerie that can pass of as your grandma’s? Ok stop. Not another dull day or dull stuff. Sugarplum Lingerie is a Singapore-based e-commerce startup with a mission to provide comfort in the most expressive way we know. Our bras and panties are designed with you in mind. No boring basics and overly sensual pieces here. A little spoiler? Constellations. Decadent sweets. Your dream island escape. Don’t worry, it’s going to be insta-worthy. 





We believe that shopping for intimates should not be a vexing activity, but a fun one. But not everything exciting has to harm others. The materials we use are organic cotton and environmentally-friendly elastane, because we owe nature at least that much. The finished product is not only sustainable, but also soft & comfortable to wear. To put this project into full force, we would need your support. The brand will only launch once our target is covered :) Inspiration Board


Moodboard of Sugarplum Lingerie's concept.





Boy, where do we start? It’s based on our true stories. How friends would talk about what their horoscopes say about an ideal partner. A Korean song written based on one of my favourite books. Photos curated for the ‘gram. Cult favourite brands beloved by the global audience. A sketch I made after a biology exam that led me to fashion school. Really, it’s pretty much infinite. The Debut CollectionEntitled Paradise Kiss, the debut collection features 3 bra models: Honeydew (Push-Up), Smooch (Seamless), and Bounce (Sports). The last two models won’t come with underwire for your wearing pleasure. Panties will be available in 3 models: Hipster, Bikini, and Boyshort. We created the collection based on the question “What would young women would be comfortable of wearing? What models would fit into their lifestyle well?” As we are (hyperly) active individuals leading dynamic lives, we put fit & comfort into top priority. The designs based on wishful vacations and dreamy escapes with a Tumblr aesthetic spin.On Sizing & FitWe understand that size is a major concern when you are shopping online, especially for something as fit-sensitive as lingerie! That’s why our website will feature a size calculator, where you can input your measurements in. In the coming period, we will have a virtual mannequin that you can use to mix and match models with each other or with your skin tone. Or if you’re short on time, you can always opt on the size you would go for, since our sizing system complies to the international industry standard.
description_risks: The project is only in its conceptualisation stages, therefore subject to a various degree of risks and challenges. Due to the unique nature of our business, production only commenced for sample pieces. Only when the project is tested and approved in the market would we start mass production. Delays in shipping are beyond our control.

description: Choose your DreamCatcher and let them guide you on correct inner path!

title: My DREAMCATCHER Enamel Pins
Title: My DREAMCATCHER Enamel Pins
Description: Choose your DreamCatcher and let them guide you on correct inner path!
Link: My DREAMCATCHER Enamel PinsChoose your DreamCatcher and let them guide you on correct inner path!
description_story:
Story


✧ My DREAMCATCHER ✧ Enamel Pins













Hi Everyone!I’m Thaddeus, an artist from Asia. Welcome to my first Kickstarter campaign! I'm so excited on this campaign and I need your help to make it come true!MY DREAMCATCHER is a series of large enamel pins and the concept behind it stemmed from an inspiration borne out of two elements: Animal Guardian Spirit & DreamCatcher. Animal Guardian Spirit was conceptualized from the belief that deep down, everyone has their unique character and the personality that they dream of emulating. I made use of different animals to represent individual character/role in our heart as a guardian spirit to lead us through. The second element, DreamCatcher it originated from the Native America. It’s believed that DreamCatcher helps to chase away negative dreams and attract positive ones.
I artistically combine these two deeply significant elements into one piece of modern geometry art to create different personalities that each user can relate with. For instance, one of my wolf pin design was named The Pathfinder DreamCatcher because wolf signifies courage, leadership, determination and perseverance while the DreamCatcher inspires people be brave in the pursuit of their true inner dreams and aspirations.   No matter what your character is, we've got something for everybody. What’s your personality? Are you a challenger? Go for Bear Pin. The Pathfinder with great courage? Try the Wolf Pin. Are you a Visionary? Nothing suits you like the Eagle Pin! Or you want something unique and exclusive? An Enchantress pin is your perfect fit! 

The choice is yours, Dream Catchers!
Please help me spread the word to your friends! Many Thanks!http://kck.st/2E2XpCA































The Pin Specifications:White & Glitter Series:

All pins come with individual glitter and dangling accessories design as shown above
Rose gold plated with soft enamel
All pins come with a pair of rubber clutch and backing card

Black & Glow Series:

All pins come with glow in dark and dangling accessories design as shown above
Gold plated with soft enamel
All pins come with a pair of rubber clutch and backing card










At S$4000 the Black & Glow series will be available to all backers!




Hi Dream Catchers, are you ready for some special midnight glow? This series is perfectly fit for your mystical journey!





At S$5000 all backers will receive a special 5" hologram sticker as a thank you gift for FOC!









At S$6000 The Enchantress series will be available to all backers!As this is my first project in Kickstarter, I came out with something very special design for all backers that support this campaign. The Enchantress DreamCatcher pin! These 2 pins are Kickstarter Exclusive and limited period only. Which means this design will not be available in other place once the campaign is over!


Kickstarter Exclusive ✧✧ The Enchantress DreamCatcher ✧✧















OCTOBER : Kickstarter campaign begins!



NOVEMBER : Kickstarter campaign ends and survey begins!



DECEMBER : Production begins!



Mid JAN/Mid FEB : Shipping begins!

Once the campaign is over, I’ll send a survey out to let you choose which pins you like according to your contribution!







70% of the total goal will be for production of the 100 of each pin, the remaining cost will go to shipping supplies, fees, backing cards, and extras.
description_risks:
I’m working with an experienced pin company that authorization from Disney, Universal Studio, Starbucks and other famous brands as well. I have a lot of confident on them and believe they will come out with superior quality for my pins.

I worked very hard to make sure everything was calculated and thought but as common with international shipping, there can be delays due to weather conditions, customs or some delay due to manufacturing errors that beyond my control. 

All the pins above are final designs, but there can be some small difference made due to the process of pin manufacturing. All the colors are chosen from Pantone chart to minimize the unnecessary errors but small changes in color still can be possible due to every screens accuracy may vary.

However, I will do my best and keep all backers the latest update.


Many Thanks!

blurb: Be part of us to kickstart this effort to preserve the tea-making heritage and tea-drinking culture. It's a worthy cause.
description: Be part of us to kickstart this effort to preserve the tea-making heritage and tea-drinking culture. It's a worthy cause.
name: Tea Descendants | Let's preserve the tea-making heritage.
title: Tea Descendants | Let's preserve the tea-making heritage.
Title: Tea Descendants | Let's preserve the tea-making heritage.
Description: Be part of us to kickstart this effort to preserve the tea-making heritage and tea-drinking culture. It's a worthy cause.
Link: Tea Descendants | Let's preserve the tea-making heritage.Be part of us to kickstart this effort to preserve the tea-making heritage and tea-drinking culture. It's a worthy cause.
description_story:
StoryAbout us:Born in Singapore, we are the third generation of a tea-planting family from Fujian, China. Our forefathers came to Singapore early last century in seek of a better life, while the rest stayed in the tea plantations to continue the family trade of planting and crafting Iron Goddess Tea.

Decades and generations passed, but the tea business continues to this day. 


Our tea master picking the right tea leaves.





Tea Descendants was born out of a family trip to trace our ancestral roots back in the He Mei Village, Anxi, China. The Anxi county, south of the Fujian province, is best known for a number of varieties of the Oolong tea, the most revered among them is the Iron Goddess Tea due to its immense health benefits: high content of amino acids, vitamins and antioxidants; weight loss properties, etc. 


A bird's-eyed view of the village.





 Our village is a charming maze of Iron Goddess tea plantations. Every turn is greeted with a whiff of chlorophyll and a picturesque greenscape. The Iron Goddess tea we tasted is piping hot from harvest oozing with dew-coated freshness, much unlike the overly-processed and baked black-tea variety that we are often served in our usual Chinese restaurants. This finding inspired the birth Tea Descendants: a vision to preserve the tea-making heritage created by our ancestors and fashion it into a modern-day brand to promote tea culture. The tea Through the generations, the village produces only 1 type of tea – Iron Goddess Tea. The taste and scent varies depending on climate, seasons, method of processing and storage. 

The tea-making process is complex and generally the tea producers will keep a tight lip of their method of processing. 


A tea bud under the sun.





Our family member has inherited and perfected the tea-making art over the last 30 years. He needs to judge the conditions of the plant and soil, sunlight and water, temperature and oxidation process plus many other variables to produce a tea that tickles the taste buds and satiate the senses. 

Our family has a few plots of tea garden that are about 350 metres above sea level. Though they are not on the highest mountain in Anxi, the clean air, temperature and soil conditions are beneficial towards producing high quality tea. 


Making tea is a delicate art.





Fresh Iron Goddess tea is pale yellow-green with a floral taste and aroma. The baked variety is darker, with a strong earthy rich aroma. If a premium batch of baked tea is kept well, it will aged finely over the years and considered a collectible among tea collectors. 

We have sent our tea leaves to Agri-Food & Veterinary Authority of Singapore (AVA) to test for presence of pesticides. The report concluded that there are no traces of pesticides. We have modernized and fashioned a traditional Chinese tea to suit the taste and lifestyle of younger, international drinkers. The tea caddy collection we designed consists of a pastel palette to diffentiate among the tea varieties. We are excited to share these tea caddies with you when you become a backer. 


Tea Descendants Collection.





Our plan: We want to preserve our family’s tea-making heritage and sharing the culture with a larger audience internationally. We seek your help in a number of ways.Through your pledges we will purchase tea leaves from the village and offer to you as a token of appreciation. 
Your pledge will help them upgrade their production facilities and building. 
Your pledge will allow us to produce marketing materials for our retail distribution to cafes in Singapore. 
Your pledge will support our plan to design and produce packaging materials for a gifting company that will act as a trader to distribute the tea. 
Your pledge will help us develop innovative products. We will work with Food Innovation and Resource Centre (FIRC), a joint initiative by Singapore Polytechnic and SPRING Singapore, to develop formulas for the Ready-to-drink market. 
Your support will also help the village's young education efforts, to buy books for the poor children. 

The fundsThe Kickstarter funding will help to finance activities that are in line with our vision. We will distribute and govern the funds objectively and prudently. With your support, we aim to raise S$12,000. 


Distribution of fund.





The timelineOur plan is huge but our resources are scarce. At the moment, this entire project and the follow-up activities is only managed and executed by 2 partners. We need to commute between China and Singapore (5.5 hours by plane) in the next few months to organize all the activities. 


Timeline of project.





Shipping limitationsWe wish to send everyone the rewards. You deserve it! However, due to logistics limitations, we are not able to deliver to Russia, India, United Arab Emirates, South Africa, Brazil, Cuba, Iran, Iraq, Lebanon, Libya, Myanmar/Burma, North Korea, Somalia, Sudan, Syria, Ukraine, Yemen and Chile. So please pardon us for missing you out on the rewards for now if you are from these countries. Please also note that all local import taxes and duties will be paid for by yourself. What tea bloggers said about us?First Sip Thought: “Garden in a cup.” by Lu Ann Pannunzio, The Tea Cup of Life.



A tweet by Lu Ann





 "Vegetal notes of sugar snap peas faded into an intense orchid aroma. The mouth-feel was buttery and thick with no dryness or astringency. I lost track of the number of infusions but that alone should tell you that there was a lot of them." by Nicole Martin, Tea For Me Please.


A tweet by Nicole Martin.





"No astringency, making this a smooth, hearty cup." by Robin, Tapio Cat.



A tweet by Robin.





 The PartnershipThe idea for this project was conceived, brewed and managed by us. For over 20 years we provide brand and visual design services to corporations across different industries in Asia. Last year, we decided to pursue our dreams and took up the challenge to preserve our family's tea-making heritage before they are lost forever. We know that the road ahead will be bumpy but with your generous support and encouragement, we believe we can achieve our goals. We hope you can join our vision and take this first step with us. This small step can potentially become a big leap for the tea industry in our lifetime. Drink. Share. Give.

Thank you. 


Christopher and Sun Ne.
description_risks:
Our project is relatively low in risk. We will do our very best to fulfill our objectives and if you can contribute any ideas or connect us to the right stakeholders, the chances of our success will be even higher. 

Due to our budget constraints, we did not hire a professional research company to understand the needs and perception of consumer. We plan to launch our product in friends' and acquaintances cafes at the start to study market acceptance. We will need more investment in future to reach out to a larger market. We will update you. 

The raised fund might not be sufficient to engage Food Innovation and Resource Centre (FIRC) to innovate 3 products. We will seek Singapore Government agency, SPRING for grants if we need to. In the event that the shortfall is too great to meet FIRC consulting fee, we will notify and update you of our plan to re-channel the funds.

blurb: One design per episode to illustrate the iconic moments in the drama.
description: One design per episode to illustrate the iconic moments in the drama.
name: Black Mirror Inspired Soft Enamel Pins
title: Black Mirror Inspired Soft Enamel Pins
Title: Black Mirror Inspired Soft Enamel Pins
Description: One design per episode to illustrate the iconic moments in the drama.
Link: Black Mirror Inspired Soft Enamel PinsOne design per episode to illustrate the iconic moments in the drama.
description_story:
StoryHello everyone!This is my first kickstarter and I would like to start from my favourite Netflix series, Black Mirror! As a huge fan of this series, I've been drawing about them for some time and now I would like to turn my artworks into pins :) Since each episode brings a powerful message to the world and has their own iconic scene, one pin for each episode seems perfect :)Collaboration

 I'm so glad that @thefoxknows_ decided to collaborate with me in this series of pins! The Fox Knows is a pin retailer and manufacturer that based in Singapore, their pins' quality is good and they have collaborated with a few other designers as well!Updates! Follow @thefoxknows_ on Instagram to see our updates on how the pin progress is going!


Netflix Black Mirror San Junipero Pride Lapel Pins








Netflix Black Mirror Black Museum Monkey Lapel Pin







Netflix Black Mirror Shut Up And Dance Enamel Pin







Netflix Black Mirror Be Right Back Enamel Pins







Pins specifications:Craft: soft enamelClutch: 2 black rubber claspsDimensions: 3.5 cm, except for San Junipero* All comes with a Black Mirror themed backing card! Since there are 19 episodes in total, I'm hoping to make these 5 designs first (the most popular and influencing episodes). If I manage to get enough funds for these, I will manufacture the others as well!Here's the details about them:


Nosedive





How perfect it will be when you can live in a luxury apartment by gaining a 4.5 rating; how freeing it will be when you can just be yourself without caring for other’s opinion. The insecure Lacie had the perfect experience and would like to share it with you. Would you please give her a good rating now?




San Junipero





A romantic spark between an introvert and an outgoing girl in the background of each other’s broken life. A simulation of our afterlife, San Junipero gave those marred by the cruel realities of life the courage to pursue what they truly want.




Shut Up and Dance





 Who’s the real victim here? A mysterious hacker who blackmailed Kenny to complete a series of events with other ‘victims’, or an online vigilante? This episode showed a twisted reflection of ‘reap what one has sown’. Careful, they're always watching.




USS Callister





Imagine if you were unwittingly cloned and that clone was uploaded into a video game, where your survival depends on the so-called ‘Captain’. This episode caught the attention of many Star Trek fans for good reason!




Be Right Back





The grief of losing your beloved ones is never going to be fully recovered although modern technology has proposed a way out. Can technology fill the void of joy and warmth?Stretch GoalsIf I manage to get the funds successfully, these other designs will be unlocked!Season 1: to be unlocked at $1000Season 2: to be unlocked at $1300Season 3: to be unlocked at $1800Season 4: to be unlocked at $2300More about other episode's design:


other designs





 I'm still working on the last 2 episodes to complete the series! Here's the drafts about them :




Work in Progress





Funding Goal I hope to get at least S$700 to kickstart this project (make 5 pins). Here's a breakdown on how I will use the funds:Production Cost: 60%Packaging & Shipping Cost: 30%Kickstarter Fees: 10%If you're a fan of this series, please help me to spread a word and get other fans to back me as well!
description_risks: There are a few risks and challenges in making these pins, since soft enamel is the craft (more adhered to details) that I chose and the manufacturer is reliable. I will keep you all up to date with progress pictures etc. and inform you all ASAP if there's any sudden issue.

Link: SmoreMermaid Town Teddyton Plush, Plushie and Kawaii BagMeet Teddyton the English Cub who is on a lovely adventure in the blooming springtime. He wants to preserve your childlike heart.
description_story:
Story































































































































































Hello lovely pals! If you're new to SmoreMermaid town or backing a Kickstarter project, let Teddy explains why you should definitely pledge here:

  By supporting this project, you're able to have Teddyton plush and Teddy's evolved Mont Blanc bag send to you FOR REAL!  We are bringing our ideas into life.  Also, this is the lowest adoption cost you can get and it comes with some hidden surprises.
  By backing now, you will not be charged until this project is  successfully funded. As we unlocked new stretch goals, you may also make changes to it before the end of  the funding period.
  This project has gone through hours of designing, creating,  liaising stage to make it happened. It is not a buy-sell product. Thus,  it is unique to this brand only.
  Your support is a strong affirmation to us to keep it going. We thank you first.










To local Backers in Singapore :

  To minimize the risk of lost parcels, Teddy wishes to have postal  tracking while he is on his way to his new home. All parcels will have  a special tracking number.
  Please be reminded to double-check your details before submitting so that Teddy won't be confused looking for his new home.
  Estimated Shipping Time: 2-3 business days.

To Backers all around the globe:

  To minimize the risk of lost parcels, Teddy wishes to have postal tracking while he is on her way to his new home. All parcels will have a special tracking number.
  You might be required to pay tax/ VAT when Teddy arrives at your destination.
  Please be reminded to double-check your details before submitting so that Teddy won't be confused looking for his new home.
  Please contact us if you have not received your parcel for over 2 months.

Shipping Cost:

  Singapore: S$5
  Malaysia: S$7
  The rest of the globe: S$15 (FOR ONE Teddyton PLUSH/ MONT BLANC BAG), ADDITIONAL S$7 will be added for additional plush/bag.
  For overseas pals, if you are planning to get 4 or more plushies and bags please approach me via messages.











   28th March 2022 : Kickstarter is live and will last for 25 days only.




   22nd April 2022 : After Kickstarter ends, we will need to accumulate at least S$3720 to  make Teddyton's Merch come true. In the event of if it's successfully  funded, I will send out a survey to all the backers who backed this  project! Finally, you  will also be charged for your pledge.




   End of May 2022 : All Unlocked Teddyton Merch in the making...




   End of July 2022 : All the completed merch will arrive at my place. If there's no flaw or adjustment they should be good to go to their forever home.




   Mid-Late August 2022 : Packing and giving them my blessing before they depart to their new home.




   September 2022 : Backers begin to receive Teddyton and his merch.

*Please note that the timeline given above is just a rough estimation. It will be great if we can get everything sorts out earlier and on time. If not, we implore you to have patience because good things are definitely worth the wait. *









Thank you, Thank you, and more Thank you! Even though you might not be able to back this project, I'm so thankful  that you spend some time reading my stories. 
Our brand is inspired by the elegant French Rococo Art and some English traditions like afternoon tea and cottage living. If you would love to see more of my work, stories, cottage pals, etc... You may find me in the following. There, you will find a slow life and perhaps your long-lost childlike heart.

  {Instagram}
  {Official Store/Teddy Cafe}
  {Tiktok}
  {Twitter}
  {Pinterest}

- There might be some time needed for the factory to produce all the merch at the same time which might cause a little delay. This includes a quality check of plushies. However, we will try our best to meet the dates.

-Teddy will keep you posted on all updates along the way using Kickstarter's project "Updates" tab and also Instagram.

-Also, there are some minor changes to be done to make the perfect Teddy and his bag. 

- Even though we do not have a massive amount of following on social media but we will still try our best and hope you can assist us to make this project come true.

blurb: A different spin on icebreakers.
description: A different spin on icebreakers.
name: Sloosh Cards
title: Sloosh Cards
Title: Sloosh Cards
Description: A different spin on icebreakers.
Link: Sloosh CardsA different spin on icebreakers.
description_story:
StoryHave you ever walked into a room of strangers and felt overwhelmed ?
Small talk is hard enough, and it’s even trickier to delve into deeper topics right off the bat. Icebreakers have been used to welcome and warm up conversations among people and enable them to comfortably interact with each other. 
However, most icebreakers can be socially risky, we don't want to reveal too much of ourselves when we've only met in the past 5-10 minutes. We want icebreakers that helps us feel comfortable and encourage us to open up at our own pace. 
Our team understands it can be challenging to identify and narrow down meaningful or interesting icebreakers from the gamut of icebreaker activities on the internet. 
We believe there is an opportunity for us to curate and create a card deck that blends fun and socialising into a single deck. 
That's why we created Sloosh Cards. 
What's Sloosh Cards ? 
Sloosh Cards is a different take on icebreakers that promises to make socialising and play meaningful yet fun. The entire deck has been curated and designed to elicit a 'rush' of energy and sensation when you're playing and socialising. 









So tell me about these cards....
Each Sloosh card deck contains 40 cards (15 blue + 15 red activity cards + 10 catalyst cards + 1 instruction booklet!)




A splash of colour to uplift and energise your socialising and play experience !





Our Red and Blue activity cards contains handpicked icebreaker activities that you can utilise in any group setting/function. These activities have been carefully curated and shortlisted after multiple rounds of testing and iterations with different people, and we're proud to present them to you today!




Front + Back of each red and blue activity cards 





The Blue Activity Cards contains warm-up icebreakers that helps 'break the ice' and kickstarts relationships among strangers and even friends!




Blue Activity Cards





The Red Activity Cards contains icebreakers that strive to break down barriers and dive deep, catalysing opportunities for deeper, meaningful conversations and relationships!




Red Activity Cards





Pen em' down
It wouldn't be fun if everyone is just verbalising what they have to say. We felt that the socialising and play experience should be interactive, and allow people to express themselves in different ways beyond verbal communication, so we decided to add our own twist to the traditional icebreaker activity : The Catalyst Card 




The Catalyst Card





The catalyst card is essentially a blank canvas for everyone to visually express their personal responses in words, drawings or doodles! The goal is to move away from merely just verbal communication, and enable a different mode of expression for everyone to share  their thoughts and stories with others. 









It's our hope that the personal responses written and/or drawn on the catalyst cards will become catalysts in sparking and eliciting conversations about the stories shared long after the activity has ended. 
Did we already mention the catalyst cards are made of an erasable surface for repeated use ?  

            

          

Just wipe away to use it again !
How to play :
It works in just three simple steps: 









1. Hand each player a catalyst card. (e.g. If there are 4 players, 4 catalyst cards will be drawn.) 
2. Select a red or blue activity card as the activity everyone will be playing. 
3. Let the game begin!
That's it! It's extremely simple and fun. 
Sloosh Cards in action : 
Though a seemingly easy idea, we went through multiple rounds of considerations. We looked at identifying meaningful activities that could catalyse socialising and play. The activities we eventually selected were vetted through multiple play-testing sessions with different users. Instructions of the different activities were proofread and tweaked to ensure easy understandability yet provided a fun experience and a good time for everyone. 

























About Sloosh Inc :









We are a team of passionate individuals who believe socialising and play go hand in hand with each other. Our team has worked tirelessly to curate and assemble a deck of icebreakers and activities that we ourselves will play with. 
What's the meaning of Sloosh ? 




Why Sloosh ? 





Like it's meaning, we believe socialising and play go hand in hand with each other, and we want to help you feel that 'rush' of energy and sensation when you're playing and socialising.
Inspired by the 'rush of water' and 'energy'. 
We decided to adopt the 'waves motif' on our cards. 
We wanted our interpretation of the waves to be joyful, energetic, fun, casual and approachable. We wanted to capture the emotion and translate it into graphics that expressed such qualities. 




Wave Patterns on Sloosh Cards





Reward Tiers









 What comes next ?  




Our game plan





To ensure the quality of Sloosh Cards, we'll be working with Print Ninja as our printing provider.









Contact us 
If you have any queries, please feel free to contact us at slooshthegame@gmail.com 
Find us on Instagram atslooshcards


Soundtrack Credit:
Partner, S. (2015). Bright Future. [online] Audio Library. Available at: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=j-eUXXW95Rg [Accessed 6 Feb. 2019].
description_risks:
We decided to keep the game and pledge goals extremely simple on purpose. We’re planning to work with Printninja to make sure we have the highest quality game that ships on time. We also included some buffer time to account for shipping & manufacturing delays.

Of course, there is always a chance of unforeseen issues delaying the manufacturing or the shipping of the product but we promise to do everything in our power to provide the highest quality game to you in a timely manner.

Story


The monster








it messed the world








The fairy fought against it.








The fairy defeated the monster.








The fairy locked it up and send a beast to watch








The beast become a god tree.








Now the monster will wake up, please save the world.

1) We need the fund to continue the story. 
2) We will update the development progress of the game from time to time and accept your opinions.
Our plan to use the found:
1) To design the sketches
2) A fun and special game.
3)  To add human voice and music  properly
4)  To finish the story and make more people know.
Our heroes:
1) Those three men will save the world
2) They are very famous in China as Three Kingdoms
3) It's a new story which is aim to environment and human future.
Special explanation:
1) Our minimal is 50$, because we want to easily to reach
2)We want to more people to care about traditional culture not only in China, but also in other world.
Final Thing:
I think this game can be released to a game platform like Google play.
Waiting for your participation！

blurb: We believe that the world needs a fresh look at clothes. We are here to combine technology with elegance, beauty with comfort.
description: We believe that the world needs a fresh look at clothes. We are here to combine technology with elegance, beauty with comfort.
name: High-tech breathable and elastic men's shirt
title: High-tech breathable and elastic men's shirt
Title: High-tech breathable and elastic men's shirt
Description: We believe that the world needs a fresh look at clothes. We are here to combine technology with elegance, beauty with comfort.
Link: High-tech breathable and elastic men's shirtWe believe that the world needs a fresh look at clothes. We are here to combine technology with elegance, beauty with comfort.
description_story:
StoryWe believe that business should make people's lives better. We are here today to ask you to help us do this.
Like more than 120 million people worldwide, we are involved in fitness. Yes, in the gym we look great and we are comfortable in sportswear. But what to wear if we go to work, a business meetings or cultural events? And what to wear for those who prefer always looks stylish and neat?
The clothes that the mass market offers are not very suitable for a sports physique. If your shoulders and back are a little larger, your pectoral muscles are a little more massive, then it is not easy for you to find clothes that will fit well. Such people should buy something of a very large size so as not to feel constrained in their upper body, and as a result, the clothes look baggy and loose.
We realized that many people really lack clothing that would be elegant as classic and comfortable as sportswear.









The first product of our brand is a white men's shirt, which you see in these photos. But this is only the beginning.
We have many interesting ideas, and not only for men, and not only for people in fitness. Today we would like to make the clothes of the future. A product in which new technologies help us to take a fresh look at clothes and how we feel in them.
We do not just suggest you buy a shirt at a particularly favorable price. We suggest you give life to the whole direction of comfortable, beautiful and technologically advanced clothes for people of a new time and their lifestyle.









Technology for the production of clothing and fabrics has gone far ahead in recent decades. Modern high-tech materials can not only provide comfort due to elasticity, but also provide breathing for the body, moisture removal for evaporation, and much more.









We wondered why progressive fabrics are used only in sportswear. And we decided to use materials developed for sports to create beautiful and elegant clothes for people of modern times.









A beautiful and toned body will never be an extra complement to the intellect and wealth of a modern man, so more and more people are finding time for fitness. But sometimes intense athletic training leads to muscle pain. In such cases, clothing with a high level of comfort becomes necessary.









We did not focus too much on old trends. Our main goal was to create a comfortable and truly stylish shirt. We experimented a lot and came to the stand-up collar, instead of the classic collar, since it is the small collar that provides maximum comfort. We know how important neck comfort is for people who are under physical stress or stress at work and in business. And also this form of a collar emphasizes your individuality.









The 70th floor shirt has a special cut: a narrowed waist, a wide upper back and wider sleeves. The 70th floor shirt is designed for those who have something to show and almost nothing to hide. But do not worry, it will not completely fit the abdomen, so that a little fullness after eating will remain invisible. But the wide back, built by hard training, will feel absolutely free. '70th floor' shirt is an athletic elegance that all of us lacked.









Yes, modern fabrics can have a smooth structure while being breathable and elastic. But we decided to go a step further and used a special weaving fabric with holes in order to provide maximum breathing for the body. The holes in the shirt are created in a special way to remove moisture from the skin and evaporate it from the surface. And also such weaving of a fabric creates a unique appearance. This is the design of a new time.









For development and great achievements, we must optimize our time in order to keep up with everything. If there is a tight schedule for the day, then you definitely do not have time to iron shirts in the morning. The 70th floor shirt is surprisingly easy to clean. The shirt does not need to be ironed if you dry it on a hanger. Just drop it in the washing machine for 30 minutes in the evening, and then hang it on the hanger. Even if you live in a humid climate, in the morning it will be dry and smooth.











* The appearance of the product and material may differ from the image in the photographs.
description_risks:
Now that we have described the product and its advantages to you, we would like to make clear why we came to kickstarter.

Current market conditions are very harsh. Advertising budgets play a very important role in brand promotion. Therefore, it is difficult for small teams like ours to start moving in a competitive environment without a large budget.

We are not sure that we are ready for investments in the usual form, since we are still at the stage of building our unique identity, and we would like to maintain independence at this stage.

Therefore, we came to Kickstarter to appeal to you, to people who are ready to support fresh and bold projects.

Over the past half year, we have been fully focused on product development. This required considerable expenses for experiments and searches. Our main goal was to create a unique and expressive product that would be ahead of the products on the market. And it seems to us that we did it.

But now we need your help, since the first sales and the first steps are the most difficult.

We specifically set a quiet low funding goal, since we need only a little push to start moving. But we also hope that we will have a chance to exceed the established amount.

blurb: You are not disorganized, you just haven't found the most functional messenger bag yet!
description: You are not disorganized, you just haven't found the most functional messenger bag yet!
name: EDGYZO Infinity Messenger Bag
title: EDGYZO Infinity Messenger Bag
Title: EDGYZO Infinity Messenger Bag
Description: You are not disorganized, you just haven't found the most functional messenger bag yet!
Link: EDGYZO Infinity Messenger BagYou are not disorganized, you just haven't found the most functional messenger bag yet!
description_story:
Story















Minimalist design, best functionality, top-notch quality and excellent workmanship!




ABOUT
Meet the EDGYZO Infinity Messenger Bag, the ultimate functional bag designed for work, travel and leisure!




Look stylish, confident and smart with Edgyzo Infinity Messenger Bag!







DESIGN PHILOSOPHIES
Our bags are designed and crafted with the following philosophies:
· Timeless Functionality: Our bags aim to serve all your functional needs.
· Lasting Companion: Our bags are crafted with highest quality and super durable materials that will last forever.











Bag Organization - All storage compartments are surrounded individually by padded foam to protect your contents from all collision!






DIMENSIONS & MATERIALS









Bag dimensions comparison: Before and after expansion. The expanded dimensions meet the airport carry-on requirement of 22" x 14" x 9" (56cm x 35cm x 22cm) allowing you to bring up to 4 days of travel clothing with laptop and other essentials/accessories.











360° full-perimeter expansion to increase the storage capacity by 50% from 20L liters to 30L liters, giving you full flexibility to carry more whenever you need!











Our bag is 1.26kg, you still have the remaining 5.74kg buffer to hold travel clothing, working documents and laptop with charging cables/adapter before you hit the 7.0kg airport carry-on requirement.











Super tough highest denier 1680D tear resistance waterproof nylon exterior that lasts forever!











Waterproof lining, your electronic devices and important items are well-protected from internal water bottle leakage and double-protected from external weather!











We use the most reputable and durable YKK anti-burst zippers.






80cm to 140cm long.





80cm - 140cm adjustable nylon shoulder strap with 9" x 2.5" shoulder pad made of 1680D nylon (top) and comfortable foam padding (below), allowing any body shape and size to carry the bag across your body and keep both your hands free for other purposes. The pass-through hole on the shoulder pad is wide enough for the adjustment buckle to pass through easily.











Not one but two lockable YKK zippers for both the Main (center) and Gadget (back) compartments.  Both your main contents and electronic devices can be safely locked when necessary.











No matter empty or fully loaded, this bag will stand upright by itself, looking smart and sturdy.  No more worry on the bag falling side way when you leave it on a desk or floor.






FRONT QUICK ACCESS POCKET



























FRONT quick pocket consists of 1x large pocket and 2x medium-sized pockets for you to easily organize and access your most commonly used items or devices (e.g. mobile phone, charger, earpieces, cables, notepad, medicines, hand sanitizer, lip balm, torch, small stationery like pens and markers etc).






ACCESSORIES (FRONT) COMPARTMENT











4x mesh pockets, 4x lining pockets, 4x card holders, 2x pen holders, 8" strap detachable key chain and an A4-size document/notepad sleeve.  Whatever you carry, this bag has a place for it, no more searching your bag for lost items!











Front panel: 3x open mesh pockets and 1x large zipper mesh pocket, more than sufficient to organize all your accessories including small items like SIM cards, microSD cards, in-flight earpieces/headphone adapters and big items like neck tie.











Back panel: 3x zipper lining pockets, 1x open lining pocket, 4x card holders, 2x pen holders, 8" strap detachable key chain and an A4-size document sleeve.











4x card holders to keep yours and other name cards, transportation card, building access card and any other cards.  You can pass through Metro/MRT/MTR gantry and apartment/office security gate by touching the sensor with the bag holding the cards inside.











The 8" strap detachable key chain allows you to lock/unlock without detaching the key chain from the bag.  You can either keep the key chain in the top right open lining pocket or within the A4-size document sleeve.




MAIN (CENTER) COMPARTMENT











The Main Compartment is where you keep your everyday essentials like working files, travel documents, stationery, lunch box, water bottle, umbrella, shoes, camera etc.  It can be expanded to carry up to 4 days of travel clothing too!











Front panel: 2x zipper lining pocket and a large lockable RFID-safe pocket.











Large 16" x5" lockable RFID safe pocket spacious enough to hold your passport (even with passport holder), wallet, purse and other valuables, all under lock when necessary!











Back panel: 2x A4-size document pockets to keep your working files, documents, notepads and books.






GADGET (BACK) COMPARTMENT











The Gadget Compartment is where you keep your laptop and other electronic devices and accessories.











Front panel: Padded device pockets to hold your smaller electronic devices and accessories like iPad, tablet, ebook reader, portable hard disk, headphones, laptop adapter, charger, cables etc.











Back panel: The laptop pocket is 3-dimensional with 1" thickness so it can easily fit a 15.6" laptop, even for older and thicker models.  Its padding is twice the thickness of other padded parts in the bag to ensure your laptop and important data are well-protected.






BACK QUICK ACCESS POCKET









BACK quick access pocket comes with a large magazine/newspaper pocket and a hidden luggage handle sleeve.











The BACK quick access pocket is large enough to keep any books, magazines and newspapers so you can read anything on the move.











 Hidden luggage sleeve allows you to slide the bag onto luggage handle when you travel.




REWARDS & TIMELINE





















PACKING STYLES






Whatever you want to carry, this bag has a place for it!








Get ready for work or lesson!








Going gym after work/lesson?








Inspired to take some city tour photos?








Perfect carry-on for up to 4 days travel trip!











PRODUCTION TESTS
Our bags are thoroughly tested to ensure the materials and hardware pass the normal wear and tear of daily usage and travel purpose.
10kg (22lbs) of weight was placed in the bag for 1000 jerks to test both the shoulder strap and handles.
Test result: The shoulder strap, handles and hardware withstand the tests without any breakage!  You can rest assured that the bag will last you a long long time if not forever!




One of the factory tests on the bag handles.









OUR JOURNEY






Stay stylish and professional everywhere you go!







Before we start to design this bag, we spend many months to research on the most sought after functions that users seek, the missing elements that users desire and the redundant features that users dislike. We want to avoid "fanciful gadgets" and "cool features" that have little purpose beyond mere ornamentation, worse often break down easily or cause inconveniences or limitation on daily usage.  We want to create the most functional bag that offers excellent functionality, top-notch quality and workmanship that last a long time.




11 prototypes made towards perfection!





After more than a year of hard work crafting 11 prototypes and spending hundreds of hours to perfect this bag, we are ready to launch it for real.  We want to craft the ultimate functional bag that will help you go everywhere and do everything in the most productive and organized manner!




Start every great day with the Infinity Messenger Bag!





If you love to make things happen and and can't wait to get up every morning to start a brand new adventure, the Infinity Messenger Bag by Edgyzo is the perfect bag for you!






ABOUT EDGYZO
EDGYZO is a Kickstarter born company that designs and retails highly functional bags and accessories. The name “EDGYZO” is created to remind our team to always stay at the forefront of the functionality trend to design bags and accessories that offer timeless functionality and lasting companion. For more information please visit www.edgyzo.com.











































INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING
Due to logistics viability and efficiency reasons, we can only ship to the following destinations listed below:
Australia, Austria, Belgium, Canada, China, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hong Kong, Hungary, Ireland, Israel, Italy, Japan, Luxembourg, Malaysia, Netherlands, New Zealand, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Russia, Singapore, South Korea, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, Taiwan, Thailand, United Kingdom and United States.
If your location is not listed above, we suggest you find a freight forwarder or freight consolidator that specializes in shipping to your country.  If you need any clarification or assistance, feel free to contact us at hello@edgyzo.com.






SHIPPING POLICY
If our shipping carrier attempts delivery to you and the package returns to our fulfillment warehouse (either because you’re not there, wrong address was provided or you moved without telling us), it will be the backer's responsibility to pay the shipping fee to re-ship the order.  When you receive your tracking number, please keep an eye out for the package.






CUSTOMS & DUTIES
Our prices do not include VAT, GST or other country taxes and duties.  As we are shipping these products all over the world, it is impossible for us to build in the various taxes, duties, VAT and GST for each location through Kickstarter.  We will not be able to cover for these costs and would advise that you contact your local customs office if you are unsure of what these costs may be.
description_risks:
We know that unexpected delays could happen, but we're fully committed to ensuring all our backers will get the best product and on time.

We have already finalized most of the production and fulfillment details with our business partners even before we launch this campaign.  Once this campaign goes live, we can get the survey done and work with the manufacturing factory to order the raw materials and commence production very soon.

Production - There will always be some degree of uncertainty when it comes to crowdfunding because you are backing projects that are creating brand new products.  We are working with an established ISO9001 certified manufacturing factory which has have been making bags and travel products for more than 20 years (with >100,000 monthly output) so we are confident to meet the production output and projected timeline.   

Shipping - Shipping is another big challenge for a project like this because it is one of those few aspects that we do not directly control.  We work directly with a fulfillment company who has many years of experience in managing e-commerce fulfillment.  We do understand that if a problem does present itself, it is our duty to work with the fulfillment company to resolve the problem until you receive your bag so you will not be left hanging.

blurb: Finally, a compact hardbound sketchbook that is filled with Artist-Grade 100% cotton paper, value chart and "18% photography grey"
description: Finally, a compact hardbound sketchbook that is filled with Artist-Grade 100% cotton paper, value chart and "18% photography grey"
name: The Perfect Sketchbook for Travel Artists & Art Enthusiasts
title: The Perfect Sketchbook for Travel Artists & Art Enthusiasts
Title: The Perfect Sketchbook for Travel Artists & Art Enthusiasts
Description: Finally, a compact hardbound sketchbook that is filled with Artist-Grade 100% cotton paper, value chart and "18% photography grey"
Link: The Perfect Sketchbook for Travel Artists & Art EnthusiastsFinally, a compact hardbound sketchbook that is filled with Artist-Grade 100% cotton paper, value chart and "18% photography grey"
description_story:
StoryWE DID IT !! THANK YOU SO MUCH FOR THE SUPPORT GUYS !!!------------------------------------------The Perfect Sketchbook
(60 pages of Artist Grade 100% Cotton, watercolor paper) 
by Erwin lian & Bynd Artisan


The Story
Over the past 14 months or so, I have been traveling around the world and sketching... France, Germany, Spain, Italy, across Asia and the list continues to grow. The term "sketch-hunter", coined by Robert Henri, describes me best. I sketch almost daily, noting down everything from interesting people to the places I have visited. Whether it is in a moving subway cabin, a car, a bus or on a Tut-Tut, I sketch.
http://cherngzhi.tumblr.com/


me, my sketchbook and world travels












My passion has led me to try out numerous sketchbooks and I have tried using everything available in the market. With the need to perfect my watercolor sketches, I began to search for that perfect sketchbook. One that should be hardbound, compact, binds well, opens flat, and filled with  Artist Grade 100% cotton paper (makes it strong but pliable). Unfortunately, I couldn't find such a sketchbook out there... so, I decided to make one.








I went on and searched for quality sketchbooks manufacturers and discovered Bynd Artisan®; a premium leather and paper label in Singapore. The people behind this brand have been in the book-making business for more than 70 years, and were very receptive of my ideas on a sketchbook. They agreed to collaborate on this project, and their sincerity & earnestness to create the Perfect Sketchbook moved me beyond words.
The Perfect Sketchbook is a top-of-the-line sketchbook made with quality materials sourced from around the world.

Stay updated with our Facebook page:
 https://www.facebook.com/theperfectsketchbook















_____________________________________________________________     





You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play


































Replay with sound









Play with 
 sound












00:00


00:00













































photography by Erwin Lian













The ability to assess + establish correct values are two of the most important skills required in painting. Chroma inherits values and this is why many painters will first complete an under-painting (with only values) before applying chroma. Having a value chart with you, allows for you to place it against the subject to properly assess values.







Most artists hold their sketchbook in a certain way to keep it flat. The value chart was designed for ease of use for both left- and right-handed Artists. So if you are a left holder, you may flip to the left for the value chart and if you are a right holder, you may flip to the right for it. While this could be more user-friendly with a portrait- format book. The decision for a landscape-format was strictly based off reliable data which informs us that users who use a book of this size would prefer the landscape-format. Of course, given a chance in the future, I will release a series of different sizes and formats


Locating the right value with a value chart













You may be able to upgrade the existing value chart by punching holes on each step. As seen in the image above, I managed to pick the right value for the grass by hovering my value chart over it. Squinting your eyes helps a little with the assessment process. However, this would entail that your sketchbook be less aesthetically pleasing, and this is why The Perfect Sketchbook that you will receive will not come with these punched holes.







___________________________________________________________
GRAIN DIRECTION IN PAPER.

The Perfect Sketchbook requires up to 3 full sheets of watercolor paper. Why so many for such a small book?
Well, that’s due to proper grain direction. 
 Why paper grain is important?
If the grain is wrong, many undesirable things will happen:
1) The book will not open very well. 
2) The paper will crease and buckle 
(due to paper expansion) 3) Stress is put on the stitching and could even break it; An illustration to the utilization of paper with proper grain direction:







As there would be more paper wastage when we consider grain direction,  I am working on possibly re-cutting the waste to create paper swatches that can be inserted into The Perfect Sketchbook's inner pocket. The Artist can make use of these inserts to test their colors prior to actual application. This suggestion has yet been finalized, and I will keep everyone updated.







Many sketchbook-makers may not consider the grain direction in order to reduce cost of production. However, this will result in poor quality.


















                                                         

Please note that Singapore-based backers will also enjoy the free shipping offered to America-based backers. Simply back the reward at the amount without international shipping charges. Free shipment is ONLY for Singapore and U.S. based backers. Thank You
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
