00:00


































------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------The Team
Erwin Lian | Artist / Educator/ Designer


Me, sketching in the kingdom of Bhutan





My name is Erwin and I am an Artist from Singapore. I received my Bachelor of Fine Arts in Time-Based Media
Studies from the Columbus College of Art (2004) and completed my Master of Arts
in Design Development from The Ohio State University (2009).  I lecture at the Film Media Studies department in Ngee Ann Polytechnic, Singapore.

I travel extensively with my sketchbooks, recording the visages of the people who I meet, places I have been to and cultures that I have personally experienced. Through my craft, I hope to inspire and share the peace and joy I feel whenever I create and paint.I painted all the paintings,shot all the photographs and did part of the computer animation featured in this kick starter
project. The entire project was completed by me and two students, Jason Yong and Jacon Lim from DVFX, Ngee Ann Polytechnic

(www.cherngzhi.com)BYND ARTISTAN | Partner & Manufacturer







The Goy Liang Book-Making Company had its first true home in 1945 when it was set up in a little shop house along Mohamed Sultan Road. It was a family-run business that served a genuine need and it gradually grew beyond the boundaries of Singapore and Malaysia.
Through the intervening years, the business of book-binding has moved inexorably with the progress of technology. Yet at its heart, each and every book had its beginning much like in the days of old - hand-designed and prototyped by a small band of craftsmen who grew up in the trade.Bynd Artisan was conceptualized to celebrate the joy of traditional paper and leather making.  Bynd Artisan hopes to write its own history through the remarkable output of Singapore’s greatest practicing craftsmen.

The Company has manufacturing facilities both in Singapore & Malaysia.
(http://www.byndartisan.com)Grandluxe is the parent company of the Label Bynd Artisan


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Estimated Time Schedule










The thicker the arrow = more funds goes there






This really is a project derived through an impulse based on personal need. Due to the requirement of new materials that was unavailable at the manufacturer, the cost of materials would be very high if I only made enough for personal consumption, so I decided to open up the availability of this pet project so that supporters may enjoy the same high quality that I personally demand while driving costs down for all of us. Kindly note that funds are subjected to 5% commission from Kickstarter and 5% from Amazon for credit card transaction fees. I have made most of the graphics and shot the photographs myself. The computer animation was completed with help from two students of mine (Jason & Jacob) and a stipend was paid to them.
description_risks:
Risk: 
1)Since this book is constructed with quality materials from all over the world, shipment may run into delays. Prices and availability of raw materials may also fluctuate. We have cushioned our budget with a modest amount to account for such events. In the event that raw materials have to be replaced, I will update everyone accordingly (very unlikely).

2) Bynd Artistan has more than 70 years of experience in book-making. I have visited their manufacturing facility and am confident that we can produce this sketchbook. I will update the manufacturing progress accordingly.

description_story:
Story































Wake up, brush teeth, morning routine, wardrobe selection. Squashed up blouse vs unintentionally shrunken sweater. Inward groan. Decisions, decisions. Life shouldn't be so hard, right?


Exactly.


So we've developed your ultimate wardrobe hack. With the combined efforts of leading design experts from Singapore and New York, sourcing GOTS and Fairtrade-certified fibres, we created the ultimate Organic Mock Neck T-Shirt. Yes, a T Shirt.









It's essential, it's reliable, and the backbones to your closet.









#1 Made with 100% Organic Cotton - soft to touch, gentle on the environment.









#2 Certified Environmentally Friendly Dyes - all of the colours, none of the nasties.









#3 Ultra Comfortable - the next best thing to wearing nothing, but elevated.











#4 Designed for a Relaxed Fit - When They Go Low, We Go Comfy.









































Not to flex, but LW001 is made from 100% certified Organic Cotton by the Global Organic Textile Standard (GOTS), grown by sustainable farms in India.









When you choose Organic Cotton, you're not just making an environmental impact, you're making a humanitarian one as well — you make a world of difference to livelihoods.











Growing organic cotton keeps farmers and their families away from toxic chemicals in the field, or through their food and water supply. It also sustains their livelihoods — farmers can grow more than one crop, which increases their food and income.



















The dyes we use are certified — meaning they are non-toxic and contain ZERO harmful chemicals. Our dyes also use less water and undergo treatment processes that recycle waste water, reducing the toxic impact of effluent generation, while promoting reduced water consumption. Our colours are bright, toxic-free and better for our Planet's future.









Co-designed in Singapore and New York, we collaborated with a leading technical designer with over 16 years of international industry experience. After months of tweaking and finessing, we finally landed on the perfect Relaxed Fit T-shirt that would fit all.









Not "all" as in 'one size fits all' — but actual, living, breathing human bodies of all shapes and sizes. We used over hundreds of body scans in our 3D designing process. Obsessed? You bet.









Our clothes will fit your body — not the other way around.









You know that feeling? The feeling when you referred to a size chart to make a purchase, and when you try it on after it arrives — it's totally off the *charts* (lol).
That was the problem we faced as online shoppers ourselves. What's the problem? 


 Most Size Charts are created after the clothing is designed — that literally means you are fitting into the clothes, and not the other way around. Hello? Reality check: the clothes are supposed to fit you. 


We know everyone is different, and each of us has a preferred fit. Some of us like it snugger, some prefer it nicely fitted... Others, perhaps, a bit more relaxed and oversized.
That's not an issue.


We've redefined Size Charts — elevating it into an art. But backed by data. For you, for effortless living.


How?



















We created our body forms before we started designing our clothes. Using our understanding of how the body changes, depending on age and gender, alongside with data from over 6000 virtual bodies and multiple sizing studies done around the world, we've created our own brand specific bodies forms, designed specially for Livingwear's vision to making our clothes fit a range of body shapes well.



















We designed the process from ground-up, in order to make sure that our clothes fit the way they were intended to, celebrating and loving differences in human bodies — not in spite of.









The details matter — our creative director measured every seam, angle, nook and cranny, together with our New York-based technical design consultant to ensure that each piece is cut as humanly close to perfect for our entire size range — from 2XS to 2XL. 



















Lastly, we've tested our size charts on real people to make sure that they work — for all genders. The results? A 92% accuracy based on the testers' individual fit preferences.
Still hesitant about finding your ideal fit? No worries — speak to us via DM and we're more than happy to help!

























We spun it tightly and densely, creating a mechanical knit that is much more durable than regular T-Shirts. Our T-Shirts won't bail on you — wear it yesterday, today, and tomorrow — it's going to look brand new.



















By using a heavier weight and tightly-knitted fabric, our T-Shirt will wrinkle less, naturally, after washing and drying — with no extra chemical finishing. Just pop on this trend-resistant staple and you're good to go!





















Organic Cotton is one of the better natural fabrics that allows air to pass through easily— allowing your skin to breathe and regulate moisture.


 Super Soft because your comfort is our priority 











Organic Cotton is known to be softer than conventional cotton due to it being grown organically. It is also OEKO-TEX100 certified, meaning there are no harmful chemicals or residues, so it's better and milder for our skin.











































Our ALL GENDER Size Chart

















Our First Try Promise ensures 100% satisfaction on your first purchase of a new Category of Livingwear products. This means that if the size is wrong for you, we would gladly do an exchange within 30 days of you receiving your product.











We currently do not offer refunds or returns but in the event that you receive any defective pieces, please speak to us immediately at help@livingwear.co and we’ll rectify it immediately. We value our Kickstarter Community & Backers—rest assured! We will do everything we can to ensure you have a great experience with Livingwear.

















Please note that each reward TIER represents only the PRICE and QUANTITY you are backing, not the colour or size. 
We will send out a survey to all our backers to get information on COLOUR and SIZE selection, once after backing & once again, after the Campaign ends.
Backers have the choice to mix both sizes and colours within the tier they have backed.






















SUPPORT PERKS
To all the Backers who supported this Campaign, you will be part of our Early Release List — this means you'll have:

  early access for all our upcoming Capsule Release
  this includes Previews, Product Release Notifications 24hrs in Advance, Product Showcases, and exclusive deals.
  watch out for our upcoming capsule launches in June!



SHIPPING
Livingwear is committed to providing you the best shipping rates — We are offering a discounted shipping rate for all our Backers.
We ship worldwide with our partners - Asendia, DHL or Fedex.









All packages will be fully trackable.
*Please check out our Shipping Rates in the FAQ section


TAXES
You are responsible for paying all local tax and duties when applicable.
Only for our UK customers, Taxes will be collected during the post Campaign Survey**


For all our Customers outside of Singapore, please use the following link to help you calculate your estimated tax and duties: https://www.simplyduty.com/import-calculator/


(HOW TO FILL UP) the Tax Estimation Form - Look for it in our FAQ!! 
-----

















Lastly - Garment Care
Check out our FAQ! 
-----
description_risks:
This isn't our 1st project. When we launched our first Kickstarter in 2019, we delivered all products to our backers— even compensating missing packages on us, because we are committed to creating a company with great customer service at its core. Our customers appreciate the openness, transparency, and accessibility that comes with purchasing each Livingwear product. 

When this campaign ends, we are confident to deliver it to you by Mid-June for the first batch and August for the second batch.

Because of that, we will go with a *first backed, first delivered* policy for this campaign. 

Please take note in the event that we are oversold on a particular size and color, our 2nd batch of LW001- Organic Mock Neck T-Shirt will arrive in August, alongside our next 2 capsule items (LW002 & LW003) in our following KS Campaign.

WE AIM TO PLEASE > 

You can be assured that we are fully committed to delivering these products to you. We're proud to say that over the years, we have not received feedback on unsatisfied backers or customers- any error on our part has consistently been resolved promptly with utmost care and quality service. 

*If you're a backer slated to receive our 2nd batch of delivery, and have also backed our next campaign (LW002 and LW003)—you will receive both together.

Due to the ongoing COVID-19 pandemic, please take note that there may be delivery delays worldwide for packages. In the event of a delay, fear not! We will resolve it for you. All we ask for is a little bit of patience. To illustrate an example— we've experienced cases where packages have been held in transit customs for 14 days before getting shipped out successfully to the destination country. 

As we are doing our best to offer lower shipping costs for you, we largely do not mail out on express delivery, unless absolutely necessary. This is why we are able to offer you discounted shipping fees below SGD$10. 

However, if you do require Express or Expedited Shipping, please let us know and note that there will be an extra charge of approx. total of US$20+ for Express Shipping Worldwide (applicable only for our 1-5 Piece Tiers) .

description_story: StoryI used to write quite awhile back when life was not as hectic as now.Though I love writing, i never had a plan to publish my writings as I always thought my stories are never good enough (with the horrendous English).Yet, people who had read my story, were encouraging me to self publish the stories that I wrote.This project on kickstarter is not about seeking funds, although having funds might bring the book to life as a hardcopy (and also a real editor!)It is about sharing what i have written, appreciated by a small group of people, who thinks that other groups of people might like it too.You can access the stories directly here:http://ghostiewritestory.blogspot.sg/2007/08/handkerchief-i.htmlShould you believe that these stories can go to print or has at least keep you entertained and wish to pledge, I sincerely thank you.
description_risks:
I am not a professional writer, I did not graduate with a degree or masters in English or Literature.

So the biggest risk of now is actually bad English and you know, punctuation

What i can offer to you are stories which were written with passion and effort.

Like I said again, funding is not important, sharing is.
However, if you decide to pledge/fund, take note that if the goal is met, I will contact a book printer, get a cover designer and if possible, get an editor.

blurb: Enamel Pins based on the deities of ancient Greek mythology.
description: Enamel Pins based on the deities of ancient Greek mythology.
name: Greek Gods Enamel Pins - Part 1
title: Greek Gods Enamel Pins - Part 1
Title: Greek Gods Enamel Pins - Part 1
Description: Enamel Pins based on the deities of ancient Greek mythology.
Link: Greek Gods Enamel Pins - Part 1Enamel Pins based on the deities of ancient Greek mythology.
description_story:
Story










"Then the omnipotent Father with his thunder made Olympus tremble, and from Ossa hurled Pelion." 
-Ovid


Welcome to Mount Olympus, where the Gods of Ancient Greece resides. I am Magnus, a humble artisan who works on enamel pins to glorify the Gods. I see that you are here to acquire some pins. If you are searching for additional pins or good luck charms, you may browse my Instagram by clicking here.











I've included EARLY BIRD reward tiers for early backers.
Each EARLY BIRD tier has a limited discount available for the first SIX backers who pledge that tier,  so pledge ASAP to secure your spot and get your rewards at a discount. 


Designs will be unlocked as the campaign progresses and a funding milestone is hit. That is because the Gods require more offerings from us to satiate our devotion to them (Well.. the real reason is to get more funds to pay the pin manufacturer).


But don't fret, you won't be choosing your designs until the campaign is over, so by pledging now, you'll help push the goal forward to unlock the designs you want!













The pin designs are based on the theme of ancient Greek mural and pottery. 




Ancient Greek Painting               





Every rounded gold-plated hard enamel pins comes with an elegant Olympian design backing card. The size of the pins are 1.5" X 1.5" (3.8cm X 3.8cm).


































































Most of the funds will go towards:
◈ Production and delivery of the pins
◈ Shipping
◈ 10% Kickstarter fees
◈ Taxes











Please note the timeline below is just an estimation.
◈ Early December: Kickstarter starts! (29 days campaign) 
◈ Early January: Kickstarter ends and surveys are sent out shortly after 
◈ Early February: Funds are collected and production begins 
◈ Early March: Pins arrive
◈ Early April: Shipping begins











It is hard to predict when the pins will arrive to your doorstep due to the Covid-19 pandemic. The pin industry is currently experiencing lots of slowdowns related to power shortages, high demand, and shipping delays. So expect your pins in mid 2022 (from May onwards).


Once the pins have arrived, each pin will be inspected, packed and shipped out. Given the current unpredictability of shipping, please allow:
◈ 3-5 weeks


(Note: Please be aware that you may be responsible for additional import taxes prior to delivery.  UK and EU backers may be charged with additional VAT tax.)


If you have any questions regarding your order, please feel free to contact me via Kickstarter or by email at magnusarts79@gmail.com.











◈ I don't have a credit card/missed the Kickstarter, how can I buy these pins?
After the Kickstarter campaign is being fulfilled and after I have shipped to all the Kickstarter backers, what stock I have left over will also be for sale.
You can PM me on my Instagram. I also intend to setup an Etsy account to sell the remaining pins.


◈ My favorite character isn't unlocked, should I wait?
Please consider pledging early to help unlock new designs! All pledges are valid for all items from launch, regardless of their status at the time of the pledge. If it doesn't seem like the funds will reach the amount needed to unlock the design you want then you can cancel or change your pledge at any point during the campaign.


◈ Why is this project called Part 1? Where is the rest of the twelve Olympians?
Part 2 is dependent on the success of Part 1. I want to break the pins into two parts to allow for sufficient funding for the first six pins before designing the rest of the twelve Olympians. So please help me to fulfill my dream on producing all twelve Olympians and more Greek gods.
description_risks:
After this Kickstarter campaign has ended and the supplier has sent me the pins, I will do my best to send out the pins as soon as possible. However there might be a few problems and issues along the way, in which case please contact me and I will do my best to solve them. 

Also, as mentioned previously, manufacturing and shipping times are unpredictable and may lead to unforeseen delays.

(Note - There may be minor differences in the actual pin vs what you see on the screen due to hand enamel filled precision, color matching.)

blurb: Display piece x cat toy
description: Display piece x cat toy
name: Swrl
title: Swrl
Title: Swrl
Description: Display piece x cat toy
Link: SwrlDisplay piece x cat toy
description_story:
StoryCat toys can be "unsightly" it's bright and the color might be hard to make it fit in with your modern home. Swrl is the answer to that. It is able to function as a display and can be converted o a cat toy and back with ease. It is essentially a roly poly, taking a lot of effort to make it tumble and with its movement once hit, it will surely entertain your cat for hours.







  Having cat toys means that when guest are around, you have to find somewhere to hid the toys and it can be quite troublesome. Furthermore, having a cat toy that is able to keep a cat interested for hours was important since everyone may not have the time to always entertain their cat. Thus this was what inspired Swrl, a cat toy that was able to fulfill both the needs and wants of the pet and the owner.







   Swrl is made with a concrete bottom making each piece unique from the rest with different patterns resulted from the pouring process without compromising the durability or the functionality of it. Besides the base, the top section is made from 3D printed acrylic ensuring that the material is not only light but also durable, able to take any blows from your furry companion. 
  We also did not forget about you, Aside from the concrete base, the colors are yours to decide, with the ability to select from multiple colors, you can have Swrl fit perfectly into your household no matter what style you have.
description_risks: Due to the weight of each piece, transportation is estimated to be quite costly. Furthermore the construction of Swrl is based of multiple components with different manufacturing for each and especially during Covid 19 there will be some delays.

blurb: One of a kind Deck featuring 52 prominent characters in Tech/Startup. Printed by USPCC
description: One of a kind Deck featuring 52 prominent characters in Tech/Startup. Printed by USPCC
name: The Dentmakers Deck
title: The Dentmakers Deck
Title: The Dentmakers Deck
Description: One of a kind Deck featuring 52 prominent characters in Tech/Startup. Printed by USPCC
Link: The Dentmakers DeckOne of a kind Deck featuring 52 prominent characters in Tech/Startup. Printed by USPCC
description_story:
StoryVisit our website thedentmakers.com to see our deck in highest image quality.
*The currency units of pledges are Singaporean dollars. 




Images posted on Kickstarter are significantly deceased in term of sharpness, therefore, we've built a landing page so you guys could take a true, closer look at our deck
















Image from NASA's open archive on unsplash.com





Based on the famous saying of Steve Jobs to each and everyone of us on living with a sense of purpose, The Dentmakers deck featuring 52 prominent characters in Tech/Startup. 
52 cards are 52 different characters. They're geeks, tinkerers, founders, investors, CEOs, etc. They come in all shapes and sizes, from all walks of life, but the things that they have in common are working hard and dreaming big. 
They're the ones who have put a dent in this universe, the ones who made the future different from the past. We humbly call all of them as The Dentmakers.
This deck is a tribute to them, to celebrate the dreams they have brought to the world.  This is also a sort of inspirations for all dreamers out there who're gonna leave their own dents to this world.  









Each card in the deck represents a character in Tech with their signature quote 
This is the main difference as well as the most interesting feature of our deck compared to any other deck out there. 
Most decks only focus special designs and distinctive illustrations on A, J, Q, K cards while every single one card in The Dentmakers deck is special and unique.  
With 52 unique characters, the Dentmakers deck contains a roller coaster ride of emotions. Funny, witty, inspiring, encouraging, serious, harsh truth , insightful quotes, we have it all.
---
Whoever you are, whatever you’re working on, there will be dark days 🌘, there will be time when everything goes south 🌩. It’s when you pick a Dentmakers card, read it and just keep on moving 🏇

 

 That’s what the Dentmakers deck is all about, 🎲 in poker or in life, we cannot change the cards we are dealt, but we can always choose how to play them!. Let’s play them with dignity, passions and relentlessness 🙌




Our Kings








King of Spades








King of Diamonds








King of Hearts








Classic Rivalry








Ace of Spades





            

          
Check out the full deck at:  https://www.behance.net/gallery/89984265/The-Dentmakers  
The Dentmakers Deck is also loaded with many mini-battles just like what happening in the Tech world. Below are some of these. 



Click here to see in larger version







Click here to see in larger version








Click here to see in larger version













Based on inspiration from the name - Dentmakers, our Tuckbox and the Back are designed with an image of craters on the surface of the moon from NASA open archive.

































 We are so grateful to know that many of you who support us are from the cardistry and magician community, therefore, we've committed our best to bring the highest quality to our deck to serve your high standard.
Printing

  Printed by USPCC.
  54 Poker size / Completely custom playing cards.
  Bicycle Paper Stock.
  Air Cushion / Classic Finish.

Shipping
We choose Gambler's Warehouse as the fulfillment partner because of their expertise and well-known reputation for playing card handling and fulfillment. They have also been the trusted partner for many other similar Kickstarter projects. 
Some of their features include: global shipping, lower international shipping rates and safe delivery. You can be sure that your order will be handled with utmost care.  

















You might expect us as professional designers, magicians or cardists but No, we're not. We're just some broke guys from some corners of South East Asia, working on a startup, hoping to make an impact in this small world. And as every startup founders who struggle to survive, we gotta find ways to make it through. 
Therefore, we've poured all of our hearts into this deck, we hope it could serve as a daily dose of inspiration and determination for anyone out there who are working hard and dreaming big dreams. 









 Thank you so much for reading all of this, we got some final words to you guys.
We gotta be honest, it takes a hell lot of work to run a Kickstarter project. We started out thinking that this side-project would only take 1-2 months maximum to finish, give us some cash to continue our startup dreams. But it took us 5 months so far. OMG. 
I remember many late nights researching about all these terms from Embossing to Air Cushion to a million kinds of stock paper.  Well, sometimes, in the middle of the night, staring at the screen, I wondered if what the heck am I doing? this is like learning rocket science for a newbie like me :(
But the more time we spent on this, the more something dawned on us. We realize that this project itself is something, it's not just a side-project, it's bigger than that.
We used Wix built a landing page to introduce the deck prelaunch. The thing is that Wix has a function to notify you when someone visit the website and where they come from. I don't know how to describe it but I'll never forget the feeling after waking up from a short nap, checking my phone, and saw this list of notification. 

            

          

OMG, people all over the world are checking it. The prospect of delivering something meaningful that you made to people around the globe is just exhilarating.  
These little Wix notifications and Instagram followers kept us pushing forward. Fortunately, everything gradually fell into place. 
Finally,  we wish you all the best in what you're working on, no matter what it is.  Like this project, great things take time, just ignore the naysayers and keep on moving guys, keep bringing positive vibes to world.
And most importantly, remember that the journey is the reward, enjoy it, just like how we enjoyed this project. 
- Minh Phan -
*In case you wonder that what are we working on at our startup, take a quick look here. 
**We would like to have a special thanks to @cardwatcher for helping us spreading the words, it’s an amazing place for you to be informed about latest playing cards releases. Follow them at instagram.com/cardwatcher




Follow us on Instagram for latest update
description_risks:
United States Playing Card Company is one of the most reliable playing card factories worldwide, thus there is no risk in production. The cards will be printed on the best quality possible.

The estimated delivery date is just that, an estimate. it depends on the factory and their workload.

Be aware that the colors on the screen will not perfectly match the colors on printed paper. Graphics may improve or change slightly in the final printed version.

For more information, please visit our website www.thedentmakers.com or send us an email at: contact.dentmakers@gmail.com.

Thank you so much and have an amazing day!

blurb: To make good use of the banana stems, tote bags made by cotton and banana fibers with floral embroideries are coming out!
description: To make good use of the banana stems, tote bags made by cotton and banana fibers with floral embroideries are coming out!
name: Go Green! Embroidered Tote Bags
title: Go Green! Embroidered Tote Bags
Title: Go Green! Embroidered Tote Bags
Description: To make good use of the banana stems, tote bags made by cotton and banana fibers with floral embroideries are coming out!
Link: Go Green! Embroidered Tote BagsTo make good use of the banana stems, tote bags made by cotton and banana fibers with floral embroideries are coming out!
description_story: Story     My project is to establish an Eco-friendly embroidered tote bag business based in Singapore which I wish to develop my career as a fashion marketing person and take action to embrace sustainable fashion. As consumers are increasingly being environment conscious, ethical shopping is in vogue worldwide, this catches on in Singapore as well, hence, it sees an opportunity.     The tote bags are made by cotton and banana fibers which are practical and sustainable with floral embroideries. The tote bags are presenting in an A4 and an A3 size that both are easy-carrying. Ladies could carry this comfortable tote bag to any informal occasions which makes their life easeful, simultaneously, they are doing good to the society as making use of banana fiber helps to protect the environment.     The products are going to be sold in the lifestyle boutique, Monoyono in Singapura Plaza where is bustling every day.      The following image shows the big idea of my tote bags as they are in the process of manufacturing at present. Aside from that, embroideries are going to be sewn on one side of the surfaces.
description_risks:
Risks:
- The price for banana fibers may not be cost-efficient due to the difficulties of manufacturing into fabrics.
- The transportation process sometimes could take a comparatively long time while shipping from China to Singapore.

Challenges:
- Negotiating the price for banana fiber is quite challenging as banana fiber is not very cost-effective material comparing to many others fabrics.
- There are several times of revision on manufacturing at the beginning once the outcomes do not end up with a good quality. This process takes a lot of times to revise the prototypes and discuss with the manufacturers.

blurb: A new collection of pins featuring my take on the Chibi Cows - Dairy Friends with a pinch of cuteness!
description: A new collection of pins featuring my take on the Chibi Cows - Dairy Friends with a pinch of cuteness!
name: Moomoo Cow Dairy Friends Enamel Pins
title: Moomoo Cow Dairy Friends Enamel Pins
Title: Moomoo Cow Dairy Friends Enamel Pins
Description: A new collection of pins featuring my take on the Chibi Cows - Dairy Friends with a pinch of cuteness!
Link: Moomoo Cow Dairy Friends Enamel PinsA new collection of pins featuring my take on the Chibi Cows - Dairy Friends with a pinch of cuteness!
description_story:
Story







Hi friends! My name's Jamie and I'm the owner of Amorettes Story.


This is my 9th Kickstarter and I would like to introduce my lovely little head, 'Dairy Friends'! This project features my take on a variety of our milky friends with a little flavor thrown into the mix! The possibilities of different flavoured milk usually seen in groceries stores remained in a cuter and lovelier way in their raw forms! I hope that you'll enjoy my lovely dairy friends!


Pledging will help these pins get produced, and all additional stock will go into my online shop soon after the Kickstarter is over! By pledging, backers get a discounted price, as well as freebies!


Let's pledge and unlock your favorite Dairy Friends!










  Kickstarter operates via Pledge Now, Pay Later system. This means that Kickstarter will not charge you until the end of the campaign and only if our initial goal is funded.
  Pledges are entitled to modify their pledges (i.e. Edits/cancel) at any given point provided that it is made before the deadline of the pledging period.
  The pledges accumulated will initially unlock the starting goal, Milky Moo ($400) as well as many others on the own respective milestones, with additional designs/ variants or special gifts the more milestones this project unlocks.
  By pledging, you'll get your favorite Pins at a discounted rate with freebies and also with standard grade (Grade A) - any extras Pins will then be sold on my Online Store at a higher price in the future.
  During the end of the pledging period, you will automatically be sent a kickstarter survey that asks inquire about your shipping details i.e. Delivery address, and which pin(s) you would like to receive. Please not that colors may slightly vary from monitor to monitor.









































My Dairy Friends will all be made as Hard Enamel Pins, each with a classical metal plating in colour Gold. Size will vary between 1.25 inch to 1.35 inch depending on designs. There are countless uses for pins such as accessories for clothing, collections, gifts and many more! We're aiming for the unlock or all our Dairy Friends and with that, bring about more hidden goodies! You will be eligible to pick any of the unlocked pins after the pledging campaign through a survey which will be sent to your e-mail!


Sticker packs are separated into 2 different version and consist of 10 different designs of each packs. Sticker size will be about 5cm and in sparkle holographic lamination. 
Every backer who pledged for 10 pins and above will also receive a sticker sheet consisted of 20 designs for free. 


(Do not hesitate to contact me via message through kickstarter or social media!)
I´m very active on Instagram and you can follow me for more information and updates!


Pledge Now, Pay Later! This means that Kickstarter will not charge you until the end of the campaign and only if our initial goal is funded. This helps to unlock the alternate designs as shown as stretch goals too!


When the project ends, you will automatically be sent a Kickstarter survey that asks for your delivery address, and which pin(s) you would like. Please note that colors may slightly vary from monitor to monitor.









 June: The campaign runs.


July-August: The campaign ends, all pledges are collected/cards are charged, and I will get the backer reward surveys set up and sent out.


August-September: It takes about 2 weeks for Kickstarter to release the funds raised to me. Once I get the funds, production shall commence! Production should take around 2-3 weeks with about a week of transit time for the pins to arrive to me after being shipped out.


September-October: Pins arrive! I will quality check and review everything before starting to pack up rewards and send them to their new homes.


Ps. This is a tentative timeline. I have included buffer time for in-case there are production snags or any delays. I will update backers throughout the whole process on Kickstarter and Instagram.









 Due to global slowdowns as a result of the Covid-19 situation, international shipping will be expecting an additional 2-3 months delay in addition to the usual shipping time.


All shipment will be ordinarily shipped from Singapore using SingPost's Standard Shipping. We are will be providing registered mails for all pledges received. A tracking number will be provided with all pledges once the shipment is ready to be shipped. The update quality of the status for your tracking information is based solely on each individual country's postal services.


Please be informed that the shipping duration will be equal for all forms of mail. On average, packages may take up to approximately 4-6 weeks to reach their destination. However, in rare occasions packages may be delayed up to 3 months due to factors beyond my control such as delays at custom, high delivery load during festive seasons and many others.
description_risks:
Risks are always involved during the entire procedure to the final product. From the manufacturing errors to extended production and also shipping delays, there are many factors that needs to be taken into account when providing an accurate shipping time. For this reason, I have decided to allot an extra month for the completion of this project. I have been running kick-starter projects for two years running and had made multiple pin projects along the way! As such, I'm confident in my management capabilities in monitoring a smooth cycle through the experiences I gained along the way.

I'm currently anticipating the risks that could arise when dealing with the manufacturers. I'm doing my best to work closely with my designated manufacturers to reduce any chances of possible risks that might happen during the manufacturing period. You might experience a little variant in the colors as it varies from screen to screen. They may also look slightly different from the featured designed in accordance to their production. As most variants have minimal effect on the final product, it will not result in any changes to the overall aspects of the pins.

Therefore, with all the factors in mind, I would like to remind everyone that the time line may not be reliable due to the different factors out of my control which resulted in my decision to allot an extra month for the completion of this project. I will be relentlessly trying my outmost best to be able to provide a solution for any given situation at the shortest possible time frame. I will also be sure to keep everyone posted and updated on all situations. Thank you kindly for your support and Have a great day!

blurb: Choose The Function You Want - Carry More or Less Things - It's Your Decision! High-capacity Minimalist Wallet with RFID Blocking.
description: Choose The Function You Want - Carry More or Less Things - It's Your Decision! High-capacity Minimalist Wallet with RFID Blocking.
name: Qutton - The First Binder Wallet That Let You In Control
title: Qutton - The First Binder Wallet That Let You In Control
Title: Qutton - The First Binder Wallet That Let You In Control
Description: Choose The Function You Want - Carry More or Less Things - It's Your Decision! High-capacity Minimalist Wallet with RFID Blocking.
Link: Qutton - The First Binder Wallet That Let You In ControlChoose The Function You Want - Carry More or Less Things - It's Your Decision! High-capacity Minimalist Wallet with RFID Blocking.
description_story:
StoryIntroducing Qutton Wallet - Unique. Compact. Stylist.







Combine It!
 Our wallet’s innovative design offers the flexibility to let you combine the sections according to your need. Or you can use it individually.
 







Add or Remove It!
 It allows you the flexibility to change from time to time as the rings allow you to add or remove the sections. Need to carry more things? Just add the section. Don’t want to carry more things? Just remove the section. It is hassle free and you are in control. 

 







 

 







 







Our Story  

We all owned a wallet. As wallet users, we have faced with the inflexibility in a wallet. Our need change from time to time. Sometime, we want to carry more things but our wallet cannot fit. And other time, we want to carry lesser things but we cannot remove the part that not in used. We wanted a minimalist wallet that is more distinctive in its function and help to organize better. This is when Qutton Wallet is designed. The Design The design of the wallet inspired from a binder book that allows flexibility to remove or add pages. It is designed to keep credit cards, business cards, bank notes, passport, coins and small items. The Cover (front and back) with RFID Blocking











The cover can be use to insert credit cards, business cards and bank notes. You can use the cover on its own or combine it with the sections.

Dimensions

 








 









RFID Blocking helps insulate you from a very particular brand of electronic pickpocketing.

The Sections
 
There are five sections available. Each section has different design and function. 
Section 1: for credit cards, business cards and bank notes.








 Section 2: for credit cards, business cards and bank notes








 



Section 3: for coins, keys and small items








 




 Section 4: for bank notes (fit almost all bank notes)








 




 Section 5: for passport and flight ticket (this wallet allow you to keep all your important belongings in one place when you travelling)








 Dimensions

 








 
Comparison








Choice of Colors
 Classic Black







 









 Sapphire Blue

 







 







 Red Velvet

 







 







 Rewards (in US Dollars)







 Timeline







 Help us get the word out to make it a reality!  Thank you. 







 


       







 


 Connect with Us

description_story:
Story WE ARE BACK!




with more colour options!





After our first successful project MONSTERA FOTEBAG, we are expanding our Monstera family.  We asked everyone from the last project to help fill up our backer's survey and the product in highest demand is a backpack! We gave a new spin to the ubiquitous backpack, we did thorough research on user experience and came up with something that is adaptable to any situation in your day!




Survey Result





Ladies and Gentlemen, LOOP DESIGN STUDIO proudly presents to you.
MONSTERA BEPACK.









Our New BePack is a slim bag but it's incredibly spacious inside, we designed it with loads of organisational compartments and smart features.


BePack comes in two different sizes: 13” and 16” and we are launching with four colour options: For the first time in our product range we will have the colour "Lake". Lake is a dark green colour that is subtle yet elegant, it is something very special and not easy to find in the market as a backpack option. We are launching Lake Green along with Mystery Black, Navy Blue and Dawn Maroon!









It is super lightweight, secure, slim, minimalist, and convenient as an everyday backpack.









FEATURES.

















The 16" size has a dual compartment, which first two small items such as, External Hard disk / Powerbanks, etc. The 13" size come with a single large compartment, which fits any iPad.












No matter which occasion, BePack. BeReady!





SPECIFICATION.












size reference





COLOURS.
We are launching our new colour Lake Green! Alongside our signature Mystery Black, Navy Blue and Dawn Maroon on our lineup as they are the favourite colour of your choice for our fotebag Kickstarter project!




All four colours in 13" or 16" sizes





*Actual colours may vary. This is due to computer monitors displaying colours differently and everyone can see these colours differently. We try extremely hard to ensure our photos are as life-like as possible, but please understand the actual colour may vary slightly from your monitor.









DESIGN PROCESS.
We have been working hard from design research and engineering to making changes through user feedback until we are satisfied with the final design. Find out more about our Design Process below.







You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play


































Replay with sound









Play with 
 sound












00:00


00:00


































We tested it. It works.









With high-quality material and workmanship, our BePack is built to last. Our stringent quality control includes a tensile test on the aluminum alloy hook, the maximum exerted force before failure is 77.072kgf. That's a lot of force before it breaks!
ENVIRONMENT.
BePack.BeBlue.









At Loop Design Studio it's in our DNA to take care of the environment. We carefully select components that are equally responsible to the environment where possible. For example, we selected Duraflex for our plastic components. Duraflex is one of the leaders in plastic components and they are part of the Bluesign System Partner. Our goal is to reduce the use of non-recyclable material as we grow.
Resource savings at Duraflex's factory since partnering with Bluesign:
1. Energy: over 60% reduction
2. Water: approximately 20% reduction
3. Waste: approximately 40% reduction

  (Data source: "A PATH TO RESPONSIBLE TRIMS MANUFACTURING" - 28. Nov 2019)





We use Bluesign system partner accessories





TIMELINE.









REWARDS.




Limited Time and slots! Don't miss it!








Early Bird













You could always add more items before check out! We even have our Monstera Fotebag and Xbody strap both are on promotion offer at the Add-on section! 









FIND US ON.




www.loop-designstudio.com








IG: loopdesignofficial








FB: loopdesignofficial

We take realistic approaches to deal with unforeseen circumstances. We have been conservative with our timeline and make sure it is cushioned in case of possible delays. We want to ensure you would get our Monstera BePack on schedule.

Again due to COVID-19, shipping charges are not in our favour and unfortunately it is more expensive to ship during this period. However, we will absorb as much as possible to try to keep the shipping cost that you pay is as low and reasonable as possible. Appreciate your support and understanding.

blurb: A key holder that grows with you! Ships in time for Christmas!
description: A key holder that grows with you! Ships in time for Christmas!
name: Keystone in Color
title: Keystone in Color
Title: Keystone in Color
Description: A key holder that grows with you! Ships in time for Christmas!
Link: Keystone in ColorA key holder that grows with you! Ships in time for Christmas!
description_story:
Story


Click here to see the first Kickstarter!





In June 2013, Abel decided to craft a makeshift key holder from scrap aluminium. This personal project took on a life of its own.In September 2014, the Keystone made its debut on Kickstarter!Now in September 2015, the Keystone is back with an improved design and exciting colors!











Compact - Hold all your keys in a 20mm x 90mm space.








Silent - Your keys will never jingle.








Stylish - The Swiss Army Knife design will catch the attention of those around you.








Expandable - Your Keystone holds 2 to 24 keys accurately.








Functional - The spacers isolate each key and allows your keys to turn out smoothly.








Universal - As long as your keys are flat and has a hole larger than 3mm, they will fit.











You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play


































Replay with sound









Play with 
 sound












00:00


00:00








































You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play


































Replay with sound









Play with 
 sound












00:00


00:00










































The Keystone is designed to hold any flat key.


All your flat keys will fit, regardless of length or hole size.




The Keystone is designed to grow with you.



Your Keystone comes with 2 sets of stainless steel screws, including one that holds just 2 keys!








Your Keystone comes with 4 pairs of stainless steel extension posts. Mix and match to adjust to any combination of keys you plan to have!








Your Keystone comes with 30 stainless steel spacers that allows you to turn out your keys smoothly.








Your Keystone adjusts to hold from 2 to 24 keys!





Have odd-shaped keys or trinkets you want to hold with your Keystone? 


Your Keystone comes with a Kickstarter-exculsive carabiner and rodium-plated keyring!








Hold your trinkets and car keys with the carabiner and key ring attachment!





The Keystone is the perfect gift! 


The handcrafted foil embossed gift box makes the Keystone a great Christmas gift!








The simple instructions will guide them to construct their very own piece of art!





Admire the beautiful brushed-finish of the Keystone!


































    No-frills. No add-ons. No gimmicks. One complete set. You will receive a simple stylish holder that expands to fit any number of keys you have! 
Shipping is free for all tiers! And we will ship way before Christmas!





Your Keystone comes now with an extra pair of screws that holds just 2 keys!






The new screw head is now 33% slimmer!








Your Keystone now comes with more variations of extensions!








The stainless steel spacer now fits the screw post more accurately!








The frame now fits the screw post more accurately!








The frame now fits longer keys and comes in a beautiful brush-finish!





I am grateful if you share this project!
description_risks:
Upfront Development: 
The design and development work have been completed. Samples have been made, tested and approved. Our suppliers are ready for manufacture. Some of the components(like packaging, key rings and carabiners) have already been ordered. We are confident of making, packing and sending out your Keystones on time.

Delivery:
From our experience with our previous Kickstarter, shipping to certain countries like Brazil and Mexico have proved to be challenging. Even though there is tracking for all packages, there is still a chance that the local post offices of these countries will misplace or take a long time to deliver.
If you are from a country where your local post office is unreliable, please note this risk.

First come First served:
The Keystones will be delivered in batches.
If you pledged in an earlier batch, your Keystones will be delivered to you earlier.

I was thinking why not make Teddy alive too? Always remember that this cannot happen with YOU. 
If the funding reaches S$6000 Teddy will be unlocked, which means at the end of the funding period I will send out a survey form to all the backers. Then you are able to add on Teddy for the cheapest rate to your current reward pledge. That will make your final bill.









Hi pals! If you're feeling new to backing a Kickstarter project, let Raybie explains why you should definitely pledge here:

  By supporting this project, you're able to adopt Raybie FOR REAL! This whole crazy cottagecore inspired pals can slowly come into life. Also, this is the lowest adoption cost you can get and it comes with some hidden surprises. 
  By backing now, you will not be charged until this project is successfully funded. You may also make changes to it before the end of the funding period.
  This project has gone through hours of designing, creating, liaising stage to make it happened. It is not a buy-sell product. Thus, it is unique to this brand only. 
  Your support is a strong affirmation to us to keep it going. We thank you first.










To local Backers in Singapore :

  To minimize the risk of lost parcels, Raybie wishes to have postal tracking while she is on her way to her new home. All parcels will have a special tracking number. 
  Please be reminded to double-check your details before submitting so that Raybie won't be confused looking for her new home.
  Estimated Shipping Time: 2-3 business days.

To Backers all around the globe: 

  To minimize the risk of lost parcels, Raybie wishes to have postal tracking while she is on her way to her new home. All parcels will have a special tracking number. 
  You might be required to pay tax/ VAT when Raybie arrives at your destination.
  Please be reminded to double-check your details before submitting so that Raybie won't be confused looking for her new home.
  Please contact us if you have not received your parcel for over 2 months. 

Shipping Cost:

  Singapore: S$5 
  Malaysia: S$7 
  The rest of the globe: S$15 (FOR ONE RAYBIE PLUSH), S$22 (FOR TWO PLUSHIES AND ABOVE)
   In the event of Teddy plush is unlocked, the shipping fee will remain the same as we will ship everything together. 











   3rd October 2021: Kickstarter is live and will last for 30 days only. 




   2nd November 2021: After Kickstarter ends, we will need to accumulate at least S$1600 to make Raybie's dream come true. In the event of if it's successfully funded, I will send out a survey to all the backers who backed this project! Also, during this time you are able to choose to add on items from all the unlocked stretch goals. Finally, you will also be charged for your pledge. 




   End of November 2021: Raybie in the making...




   Early January 2022: The army of Raybie will arrive at my place. If there's no flaw or adjustment they should be good to go to their forever home.




   Mid-Late January 2022: Packing and giving them my blessing before they depart to their new home.




   February-March 2022: Backers begin to receive Raybie as their forever friend.



*Please note that the timeline given above is just a rough estimation. It will be great if we can get everything sorts out earlier and on time. If not, we implore you to have patience because good things are definitely worth the wait. *

















Thank you, Thank you, and more Thank you! Even though you might not be able to back this project, I'm so thankful that you spend some time reading my stories. If you would love to see more of my work, stories, cottage pals, etc... You may find me in the following:

  {Instagram}
  {Official Store/Teddy Cafe}
  {Tiktok}
  {Twitter}
  {Pinterest}

-Also, there are some minor changes to be done to make the perfect Raybie. 

- Even though we do not have a massive amount of following on social media but we will still try our best and hope you can assist us to make this project come true.

blurb: The Phantom is a head-turning timepiece. Sportive, Elegant and made with precision with quality parts at a price beyond imagination.
description: The Phantom is a head-turning timepiece. Sportive, Elegant and made with precision with quality parts at a price beyond imagination.
name: Spectre Phantom: A Sportive Automatic Watch
title: Spectre Phantom: A Sportive Automatic Watch
Title: Spectre Phantom: A Sportive Automatic Watch
Description: The Phantom is a head-turning timepiece. Sportive, Elegant and made with precision with quality parts at a price beyond imagination.
Link: Spectre Phantom: A Sportive Automatic WatchThe Phantom is a head-turning timepiece. Sportive, Elegant and made with precision with quality parts at a price beyond imagination.
description_story:
Story







   







 
About UsMy name is Gulshan and i am the founder of Spectre Time.The word Spectre, which means "Ghost" or "Presence" when looked up in the dictionary, came about when i wanted my my watch to have a dark and mysterious feel with a strong presence felt on any wrist. This flows down to the design of the watch as well.I have always been amazed of timepiece movement especially automatic movements. The miniature size of the clockwork from the gears to the escapement to the turning of the hands was something i found very fascinating. My first Automatic watch was chinese made and i took it apart to study how everything worked and what was in it. When i bought my first swiss made watch, i was totally blown away by the precision and quality of the entire watch. I found out why it was worth paying the premium price for such a watch.It got me thinking and after a few years i told myself that i want to create my very own watch that had close to swiss standards but at a price not marked up by premium brands and i knew this was possible. I then started working on my watch which i envisioned. Before i knew it, the design was put into production and the response i received was outstanding. Heads were turning and people asked where i bought the watch from and how much it costs. This made me decide to start this campaign to offer people a watch of such stunning designs with a premium quality and feel at a price which was very attractive.The JourneyThe time taken to produce this protoype has been a long and arduous one. It was difficult to find a manufacturer that had the same amount of passion as me for producing timepieces as I require perfection. Countless changes and tweaks were made just to meet my expectations on quality and precision.
 With the CAD designs, sketches and prototype in hand i am ready to start production of the Phantom Series watches. The watches will be produced of different variants ranging from steel bracelets to quality leather bands and so on. Updates will be released regularly as this project is being backed.All i need now is your support to back me up and make this journey a successful one.



The StylesThere will be 3 dial colors:
- Black (Original)
- Deep Blue
- Titanium Grey

All 3 will feature an integrated bracelet as shown in the image below.There will also be leather band options available at an additional cost:
- Black w/ White Stitching
- Blue w/ White Stitching
- Dark Brown w/ White Stitching Refer to the image below to see how the leather bands will look like.
*Note: More images will be put up as the campaign progresses.







This Sketches are for illustration only and defer from the actual product. Actual product will have eg. Butterfly Clasps, etc..







 







 







 Specifications

Caliber: Japanese, Miyota 9015 Automatic (as reliable as a swiss movement)

Case Material: 316L Stainless Steel

Case Diameter: 41 mm

Case Thickness: 11.00 mm

Crystal: Sapphire, Flat

Caseback: Open, Hardened Mineral Glass

Bracelet: Stainless Steel and 100% Genuine Leather w/ Butterfly Clasp

Water Resistance: 5 ATM (50 m)

Misc: Luminous Hands and Indexes
Warranty you say?18 - Months Warranty for all watches from Spectre!
Note: Covers functional parts only eg.movement, crown functionality, etc..







 


 







 







 







 

  

 







 







 







 








 Contact UsEmail us at info@spectre-time.com for any queries.
description_risks:
Delivery time: In manufacturing, there's always a risk that suppliers do not fulfill orders on time. We're working very closely with a manufacturer that is very professional and organized to make sure production goes smoothly.

Duty/VAT charges: If you live outside Asia, you will be responsible for any applicable duty/VAT charges.

Shipping charges: There will be a standard shipping charge for countries out of Singapore as we will use a reputable courier with tracking services.

Customs: Some countries are known for being very slow with customs, and you probably know if you live in one.

We'll update you frequently about our progress, and if there are any blips along the way, we'll let you know!

Title: MCU Avengers enamel pins II
Description: Second line of Cute enamel pins of your fave MCU characters
Link: MCU Avengers enamel pins IISecond line of Cute enamel pins of your fave MCU characters
description_story:
Story







Patreon | Etsy Store | Instagram | Facebook 
Hello! My name is Addigni and I'm an artist and a fan of MCU, among other things. After the success of my first MCU Pin kickstarter, I have received feedback about your interest in more MCU character pins. After conducting a survey, these are the 5 most requested characters: Black Panther, Shuri, Black Widow, Hawkeye, and More Bucky. So here they are! Additionally, Loki is also getting much more interest than I expected so here he is again, for even more Loki restocking!









Here are the plans for the pins. It will be made of iron or zinc (to be confirmed), gold coated, hard enamel, and with butterfly clutch back. 
Here are the designs!

















The Casual Bucky Pin will be unlocked if we exceed $5000 :)

















♥ ADD MORE PINS  — $15 per extra pin
You can add more pin to your reward. For each additional pin, you add S$15. You can add pins of the following design: Shuri, Black Panther, Black Widow, Hawkeye, Loki, Casual Bucky (if unlocked)
♥ Getting the other Pins — MY ETSY STORE
If you would like to have any other pins (Dr Strange, Thor, Ironman, Spiderman, Bucky&Rocket, Steve&Groot), you may purchase them separately from MY ETSY STORE. 
This is because the stock of the above stated pins are limited in stock and therefore I cannot provide it freely here since it will be very difficult for me to gauge if I have enough stock left or not. 
However, the following pins (Dr Strange, Thor, Ironman, Spiderman) are included in the final reward tier but that tier is limited to 5 backers only.

















♥ Once the Kickstarter ends, you'll be able to pick your pins from any of the following designs: Shuri, Black Panther, Black Widow, Hawkeye, Loki, Casual Bucky (if unlocked) - I'll send out different surveys for different tiers for everyone to fill out with their picks.
 ♥ With the exception of the last tier, every other reward tier allows you to pick multiples of the same design. Just specify it in your survey answers (e.g. 1 shuri, 2 black widow)
 ♥ You can edit your pledge at any time - you won't be charged until the Kickstarter ends. 
 ♥ Shipping costs for the pins are as follows: - Singapore: S$1 

     - Rest of the world (Tracking number provided) : S$9 - 14 (Rewards with more items will mean heavier packets, which means shipping cost will become more expensive)
♥ Rewards with A5 art print will get a print of either MCU Chibi II or MCU Chibi I, depending on the specifics stated for your tier reward.
description_risks:
Most frequent problem encountered is not really a problem that I can control: it's shipping time. Tracking is provided for all international shipping, however for some countries, tracking may not be available throughout the shipping/transit process. Another thing to consider is the duration the packages are being held up at customs. Unfortunately I do not know and cannot control how long your country's customs is holding up your package. The only thing we can do is just wait. Based on my experience, shipping time is quite fast for Asian region ( you receive your package in 1-2 weeks). However for countries further away from Singapore (such as Australia, US, Europe region, etc), it may take up to 4-6 weeks to arrive.

The shipping service I use is Singpost, for details on their international tracking capabilities, please check: https://www.singpost.com/send-receive/service-announcements/international?date_filter[value]=&page=56

blurb: "iykyk", also known as "if you know, you know", is a performative documentary about love.
description: "iykyk", also known as "if you know, you know", is a performative documentary about love.
name: iykyk
title: iykyk
Title: iykyk
Description: "iykyk", also known as "if you know, you know", is a performative documentary about love.
Link: iykyk"iykyk", also known as "if you know, you know", is a performative documentary about love.
description_story:
Story"iykyk", also known as "if you know, you know", is a documentary about love.
Love. The most abstract, all-encompassing feeling, thought, experience - it creeps into our lives with unassuming gentleness, or rushes in like a roaring fire. But what exactly is love?
This documentary focuses on how youths of our generation perceive, feel and express love. We dive into love through the stories of different individuals - what is the difference between infatuation and love? How does social media affect our perceptions on love? Can life exist without love?
Through this project, we want to unravel what love truly means to the young people of our generation; to inspire them to form their own definitions of love, and find the courage to pursue it.
To have a holistic understanding of how our generation perceives love, we will be listening to the stories of profiles with different backgrounds. We follow five profiles and their personal journeys, as they uncover and discover the truth of love. As we do so, we hope our audiences, themselves, will form their own definition of love by the end of the film.
We are also using elements of the performative documentary style along with real life footage to express the abstract feelings of love. We wish to show the stories of our profiles through reenactments and also dancing as a performative form to emphasise the emotions and create a mood to engage the audience better.
description_risks: Even though the film itself is a documentary, we are portraying the stories using performative elements such as dancing and reenactments. In the case that we are making a docudrama which is based on real-life profiles but they are represented by the performers in the film. In essence, we are constructing the visuals of this film unlike other documentaries and we are having difficulties covering our expenses with the limited funding we have. We are trying to cut costs as much as possible but at the same time, we are trying to maintain our standard of production and tell the story in the direction we strive to achieve.
