blurb: Trick your opponents into buying cryptocurrency scams while you trade, mine and rumormonger to riches in this 2-4 players boardgame.
description: Trick your opponents into buying cryptocurrency scams while you trade, mine and rumormonger to riches in this 2-4 players boardgame.
name: Cryptocurrency - The Board Game
title: Cryptocurrency - The Board Game
Title: Cryptocurrency - The Board Game
Description: Trick your opponents into buying cryptocurrency scams while you trade, mine and rumormonger to riches in this 2-4 players boardgame.
Link: Cryptocurrency - The Board GameTrick your opponents into buying cryptocurrency scams while you trade, mine and rumormonger to riches in this 2-4 players boardgame.
description_story:
Story Wondering if Cryptocurrency will be the next digital revolution or just one big scam? Now you can decide the fate of Cryptocurrency, by helping to design the ultimate crypto scam, or mine and trade your way to riches!







Cryptocurrency is a 2-4 players game that puts the players in a battle of wits to make the most amount of money from trading and mining cryptocurrencies. You will take on the role of the CEO of a fintech startup, leading a specialized team of technological experts who will help you to evaluate, trade and mine various cryptocurrencies. However, some of the cryptocurrencies are scams, designed to rob the unwary investors of their money and it is up to the player to manipulate the information, to design the ultimate scam while tricking other players to invest in it. You must make strategic decisions in hiring technological experts, solve cryptocurrency mining algorithms and manipulate the information network, all while engaging in tactical coin trading and getting rid of the questionable coins before the game ends.

Do you have the wit to avoid the pitfalls and thrive in the volatile world of Cryptocurrency?































All Kickstarter backers will receive the Event Expansion with their copy of Cryptocurrency. The Event expansion mimics the fast moving global environment whereby governments and big corporations intervene in the cryptocurrency markets, changing the rules as the game progresses. Instead of 1 scam cryptocurrency, there may now be 3! Players need to adapt quickly or perish while trying. This expansion is not included in the Freemium edition.









Experts help you to spread rumor, trade or mine cryptocurrency more efficiently and you hire them to optimize your winning strategy! The Experts are organized into different categories, with each specializing a different type of strategy. Each expert has specific abilities that can be used each time you activate them to perform an action. Who you hire is the strategic part of Cryptocurrency as it will determine your dominant strategy in the game.









 When you choose to mine a cryptocurrency, you have to deploy your experts to solve a digital algorithm using the Hash cards in a push your luck mini game. Devote enough experts and your mining success is guaranteed, while using less will decrease your chances of success, but preserving your resource for future actions. Just like in real world Cryptocurrency, mining will get more difficult as more and more people mined the same resource.  A successful mining exercise will reward you with cryptocurrencies and transaction fees, while a failed attempt will yield you nothing. Will you depend on lady luck for exponential rewards or use your company's full capability to eliminate all luck? 









Cryptocurrency is still in an infant stage and big traders (called Whales) have the ability to influence the market through selling and buying. You can send your experts to buy and sell cryptocurrencies and every 4 units you buy or sell will push the price up or down. Meanwhile, you can take out a loan to speculate in various cryptocurrencies allowing you to multiply your profits quickly, or use the loan to hire the right experts, who will help you to manipulate the market prices with ease!







If fake news and social media is your domain, consider the rumor mongering strategy. At the end of each turn, each player will have a chance to deploy one open or hidden rumor card on each cryptocurrency. As a rumormonger, you do not have much mining or trading power but you can manipulate rumors at will and discover the hidden landmines your opponents placed at various cryptocurrencies. You will probably be the first to find out which cryptocurrency is the scam in disguised..








At the end of the game, all hidden rumor cards will be unveiled and the cryptocurrency with the lowest rumor points will be declared as a scam and will become worthless. The problem is, the player that holds the most amount of a particular coin will be richly rewarded with bonus points..  As each of you participate in laying down the rumor cards, you will need to deduce which coin is a scam based on the cards you laid and other players' actions. Do you HODL (crypto slang for Hold On for Dear Life) or do you SELL before the game ends...If you managed to avoid the scam, you may have a good chance to be the one to accumulate the most amount of money and be declared as the ultimate cryptocurrency investor!







If you feel that you have mastered the game, it is time for the advanced mode! Each Cryptocurrency game comes with a set of info and market boards where each cryptocurrency will have its unique characteristics, creating more varied play. You can mix and match them with the basic boards creating a different cryptocurrency world each time you play.





















                                            

 One key design philosophy of Capital Gains Studio is to design games that closely resemblance real world finance mechanics. We always embark on an intensive research before designing any of our finance games and the education guide is a summary of our research. It also serves as an interesting insight on how the game is designed and an introduction to the world of cryptocurrency. A hard copy of the guide will be included in every standard edition of the game and a preview of the education guide can be downloaded in the link below!  

























                                              

















                            

                  

 









  



























The Freemium Edition backer limit has been lowered from 300 as there are many backers who backed more than 1 sets of Freemium Edition. The backer limit will be lowered as time goes by to reflect this condition.
You must be asking... Why are we giving away free sets of our board game to people? Our play test survey results have produced extremely positive results across a wide spectrum of playtesters and we hope to share this game with as many people as we can.








​We have been wrecking our brains on how to get Cryptocurrency to more people and we decided to copy the freemium model of digital games with a slight twist - Backers have to pay for the shipping cost of a stripped down game. Shipping is one of the most expensive component when it comes to getting the game to our backers and cardboard is heavy. In order to keep shipping cost low for the freemium sets, we stripped the game down by removing the bulky and heavy parts such as the box, meeples, boards and punchboards, while preserving the lighter cards which makes up the core of the game. Meanwhile,  the boards are designed in such a way that they can be printed out quickly using standard size paper and the backers can quickly start a game almost immediately after receiving the free core game cards from us. Having said that, the core component of the game still has 207 cards and there is more than enough value to justify for its shipping price.

​
 

We hope that this promotion will help to bring in more people to the world of tabletop gaming and enjoy the games designed by us.

​  
Click here for more details of the promotion. 








We have NO STRETCH GOALS!
We believe that our backers deserve our best and have decided not to hold back any contents for stretch goals. The game will come with full linen components and all intended stretch goals contents. What you see is what you get!








For extra copies of Cryptocurency (up to 12 copies), just add the following amounts to your pledge based on your shipping destination. 
For more than 12 copies, please email us at info@capitalgainsgroup.com 








HOW TO PLEDGE A FREEMIUM + STANDARD EDITION.
For those who wants to get a Freemium edition + Standard edition, pledge on the Freemium edition and add the amount for additional copies onto your pledge (Example, to ship to USA, Freemium Tier + SG$40). 
If you choose to self-collect from Spiel Essen or Singapore WTP, add SG$28. The Freemium edition will still be shipped to you as we will be fulfilling all Freemium edition from the fulfillment center in China.
US & EU FRIENDLY SHIPPING
This project is US-Friendly and EU-Friendly, and therefore no additional charges or fees will apply due to taxes or customs. If you do come across issues on tax and custom fees, do drop us an email and we will take care of it. 
Capital Gains Studio will be subsidizing a large portion of the shipping cost as a promotion for our campaign.

We also reserve the right to decline any shipping to countries with an active armed conflict or a country with a high chance of non-delivery. We will refund any pledges made in this case after a review with our logistics partners.

 
The expected delivery date of Cryptocurrency is November 2018.
SELF COLLECTION AT SPIEL ESSEN 2018
For Spiel Essen Self Collection backers, if we are unable to fulfill the pledge during Spiel Essen due to unforeseen circumstances (Custom and shipping problems are our main suspects!), we will offer a full refund or offer subsidized shipping rate for the game to be shipped to your place. Our booth will be at Hall 5-C119
LIVE FUNDING WITH WE THE PEOPLE
We will be live-funding at We The People Store at Millenia Walk #02-57 for the duration of the Kickstarter Campaign. Come by to say hi to Debtzilla, touch and feel the product!








 We The People Store is the only physical store in the world to exclusively retail products funded with the community Kickstarter. They have 5 stores in Singapore and 1 store in Korea. They have spaces in store dedicated to live-kickstarter campaigns where creators can display their prototypes and engage with customers, turning them into backers. An online to offline initiative.









We have developed a series of finance theme games base on a shared universe in the fictional nation of Banana Republic where our company mascot, Debtzilla can be seen plotting to take over the world.
Wongamania: Banana Economy is a 2-5 player game that portrays the macro economics of Banana Republic and focuses on navigating the economic cycle while buying and selling stocks, bonds and properties.
Debtzilla is a 2-4 player co-operative game where you play as a budget strapped vigilante hero trying to take down Debtzilla before it destroys Banana Republic. You may need to take out a loan to buy those fancy gadgets but each loan you take on makes Debtzilla stronger..
Want EXTRA copies of Debtzilla or Wongamania: Banana Economy? Simply add the amounts below to the total (pledge + shipping) of your current pledge level.








There is a Spiel Essen self-pick up option for the add-ons. Please refer to Self Pickup tier for details.
















During the Summer of 2017, major financial news wire around the world saw the rise of a new asset class: Bitcoin and cryptocurrency. As Bitcoin passes the $5,000 mark and news of newly minted cryptocurrency millionaires captured the imagination of the masses, people started paying attention and brave investors began to explore the wild wild west of cryptocurrency. Tech savvy people rushed to buy mining rigs to mine cryptocurrencies, hoping to unearth what is the equivalent of gold, in the digital world.  Shortly after, new cryptocurrencies are created via initial coin offerings (ICO) and some of these creators became overnight millionaires. However, many of these ICOs and newly minted cryptocurrencies are simply scams in disguise, hoping to rip off the unaware investors. 
We started asking ourselves, can we create a fun game, that can portray the dangers of cryptocurrency, while representing how it works accurately on a board game? With that challenge in mind, the team delved into the new frontier of cryptocurrency and designed a game that explores the goods and pitfalls of this new digital financial technology.








Steve Ng was fascinated by games as a kid, and began creating games with pencil and paper from the age of 8. His games spoke of adventure and heroism, and proved popular amongst his peers. It was not until later in his years of education in game design did he discover the world of board games beyond Monopoly. Something ignited within him, calling him towards a path of designing board games. 
Wong Chunxi  has been drawing stuff since young. Aspiring writer, creator, artist, and full time dreamer. Likes computer gaming and painting miniatures, and getting inspired by others.
Xeo Lye is the lead developer behind the games produced by Capital Gains Studio. Previously, he spent a decade in the financial world managing money, authoring financial books & blogs and giving public talks.
Ashley Woo is the ultimate fire fighter and problem solver in Capital Gains Studio. Armed with more than a decade of experience as a compliance manager in MNCs, she handles game design and training projects for institutions and corporations. 
Sam Chang has more than 20 years of experience in Banking and Technology and is the financial gate-keeper that prevents the product and marketing people from spending out of control. He also navigates the complex global supply chain and ensures that our products reach the hands of our backers.
description_risks:
Cryptocurrency is our 5th game and our 4th crowdfunding campaign. By now, our team has a solid grasp on the process of designing, developing, manufacturing and delivering a high quality tabletop game. When it comes to a project like this, there are always risks regarding production and delivery that are beyond our control and may cause delays. We are already in the process of working with our manufacturer to get our game produced and we are confident that we should be able to deliver on Nov 2018.  

For Spiel Self Collection backers, if we are unable to fulfill the pledge during Spiel due to unforeseen circumstances (Custom and shipping problems are our main suspects!), we will offer a full refund or offer subsidized shipping rate for the game to be shipped to your place.

As with any foreign production/logistics, we may still be faced with unforeseen circumstances such as manufacturing and shipment delays or errors. If we were to meet with an issue, we promise to keep everyone updated and will share details of the problems and our solutions. Check out our previous campaign on the kind of communication you can expect due to any manufacturing issues or shipping delays. If you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact us at info@capitalgainsgroup.com. Thank you.

Thank you in advance for believing in us and supporting Cryptocurrency!

description_story:
StoryDoctors vs Zombies is a highly strategic game that involves curing or infecting humans (or as we call them, "hoomans"). Players take on the role of doctors or zombies and play against each other to try to win hoomans to their side. As the roles are hidden, there is an element of deception and surprise. The side with the most hoomans will win the game! 







 







*See the instruction sheet for even more details.The Team 
 Isaac Yamin and Li Kunying are two buddies who love tabletop games—especially card games. We want to share our excitement and enthusiasm for card games by creating awesome card games that you can play with family and friends.

 Help us launch Doctors vs Zombies
 We want you to not only play our game and enjoy it but also to share it with friends and family. After all, having fun with friends and family is important and we want this game to be a part of that. 
 We’ve had a limited soft launch with a fair amount of success before. Now, we want to reach a bigger audience. However, the cost of developing, manufacturing and shipping is expensive, and we need your support. We think this game is awesome, but we can’t get it out without you. 
 - Card Game Innovators (Isaac and Kunying) Shout-out
 We would like to thank our family and friends who helped test Doctors vs Zombies and the support they gave :) Special thanks to Jason Ng for helping us in the creation of the Doctors vs Zombies and Lin Sihan (from Mamahand) for doing the artwork for us!Music (in video): Beat Your Competition by Vibe Tracks (from YouTube Audio Library)   -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Follow usFacebook   Instagram   Twitter   YouTube
description_risks: We’ve spent months developing, prototyping, testing, playing and improving Doctors vs Zombies. We have made several prototypes and, after playtesting, finalized on the Doctors vs Zombies that you see now. Funding will be used on manufacturing the cards, boxes and instruction sheets as well as for shipping. The last challenge is getting support for our project, so that we can produce and send the game to you to play and enjoy!

blurb: This summer, we will be going on an anthropological expedition across Singapore, Manila, Jakarta, Ho Chi Minh City, and Bangkok.
description: This summer, we will be going on an anthropological expedition across Singapore, Manila, Jakarta, Ho Chi Minh City, and Bangkok.
name: Anmei & Nicole's Search for Migrant Identities
title: Anmei & Nicole's Search for Migrant Identities
Title: Anmei & Nicole's Search for Migrant Identities
Description: This summer, we will be going on an anthropological expedition across Singapore, Manila, Jakarta, Ho Chi Minh City, and Bangkok.
Link: Anmei & Nicole's Search for Migrant IdentitiesThis summer, we will be going on an anthropological expedition across Singapore, Manila, Jakarta, Ho Chi Minh City, and Bangkok.
description_story: StoryHello! Our names are Anmei Zeng and Nicole Quah, and we are current students of Yale-NUS College in Singapore. This summer, we will be traveling across Southeast Asia to complete an anthropological investigation of how migration alters the national, ethnic, and personal identities of ethnically Chinese individuals. To do this, we will film interviews, conduct ethnographic research, visit historical and cultural sites, and engage with Chinese diaspora communities in five cities: Singapore, Bangkok, Ho Chi Minh City, Jakarta, and Manila.Anmei is a second-generation Chinese immigrant and Nicole is a fourth-generation Chinese immigrant. Realizing that the migration histories in our families have led us to develop mixed and sometimes ambiguous cultural identities, we wish to learn more about how aspects of identity can be preserved, lost, or expanded upon when people situate themselves in foreign environments. What are the choices, whether conscious or subconscious, that people make in characterizing their identities? In addition, what external factors influence these choices?To complete this expedition, we will need to sustain ourselves and our project for seven weeks. Although our school has graciously agreed to sponsor a significant portion of our trip, we are still in need of funds for accommodation, museum tickets, film gear, etc. Any amount of assistance for our cause would be greatly appreciated and go a long way towards helping us realize our project!At the end of our travel fellowship, we will be compiling a series of immigrant stories that we will share to the Yale-NUS community and hold an exhibition of our photos and findings on October 8, 2018. We would like to thank you in advance for your support and would be happy to update you on our project when it is finished-- whether through writing messages or texts, sending videos and photos, or inviting you to our exhibition opening. Thank you for your interest and contribution!
description_risks: Our project is a work in progress, and we have significantly considered the risks and challenges of our expedition with our school's Center for International and Professional Experience team.

description_story:
Story

Hi Everyone, my name is James Yip
大家好，我叫James Yip    
皆さん、こんにちは。私の名前はJames Yipです。
 สวัสดีทุกคนฉันชื่อ James Yip

Привет всем, меня зовут Джеймс Йип
안녕하세요 여러분, 제 이름은 제임스 ip입니다
Xin chào mọi người, tôi tên là James Yip
Hallo allerseits, mein Name ist James Yip








Here begins my story on the concept and objective behind designing and developing a Sports Bluetooth Outdoor Speaker. We all love to listen to music during our sports activities, and especially during outdoors.
Wearing headphones and in-ear true wireless earbuds is probably the  best option but to be truly hands-free having a wireless speaker allows you to do virtually anything with your hands while enjoying great music.
One of the constant challenges I have is to be able to enjoy music while ensuring I'm aware of what's happening around me.
With a device over my ear (especially those with in-ear design and noise cancellation technology), I have minimal knowledge of any danger that I might be exposed to.
And with a great speaker, you can share good music as well with your friends.
My first idea about designing a Bluetooth speaker for sports and outdoor is to make it virtually indestructible. 
The initial design i done was a hexagonal shaped speaker, but finally, i've designed it rounded to allow users to have a comfortable and good grip. 







You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play


































Replay with sound









Play with 
 sound












00:00


00:00


































Code named BTS-NPLUS2 will have PLUS2 features on top of (N=Normal):
1. Drop resistance up to 1m
2. IPX5 water and dust resistance
*And to make it more accessible to use in multiple scenarios, we have included a free carabiner and a suction cup.
**The special feature of the NPLUS2 speaker is it's ability to be able to connect two speakers simultaneously from one source to boost the sound volume and bass.







You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play


































Replay with sound









Play with 
 sound












00:00


00:00










































After several 2D drawings we proceed to work with our design engineers to create 3D design of BTS-NPLUS2. With 3D software we are able to measure every detailed dimensions of the speaker structure and work on a 3D model prototype.







You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play


































Replay with sound









Play with 
 sound












00:00


00:00


































The structure of the speaker is important, to withstand drops at 1m it must be able to protect the internal circuit module and speaker architecture. To do this we have housed a rubber absorption cover around the speaker to minimize the impact. At the same time, we use a dual-layer ABS plastic with a softer outer layer and an inner hard layer.







You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play


































Replay with sound









Play with 
 sound












00:00


00:00


































At the heart of this speaker will include an IPX5 rating which allows the speaker to withstand low jet water pressure and resistant to dust. The speaker will come with a 40mm 4W double wave-type diaphragm design internal speaker which offers good sound reproduction at a frequency band between 100Hz to 16KHz. The built-in battery will use a polymer lithium battery that comes with a soft layer protective cover to ensure safe from knocks and prevent an explosion. The battery will have a variation of 500mah and 1,000mah. Charging the speaker will be around 2 hours while usage can last up to 6 hours for 500mah built-in battery and up to 12 hours for 1,000mah version.
The name of the speaker will be D.LAB Sports Bluetooth Outdoor Speaker. The model number will be BTS-NPLUS2 for 500mah battery and BTS-NPLUS2X for 1000mah battery. BTS translates to Bluetooth Speaker and more importantly, NPLUS2 refers to Normal + 2 unique features. The principle behind N+2 has got to be my time working at Asus which designs and manufactures PC laptops. We will win the competition only if we have a unique strength. Each product we design must have at least one unique strength which sets us apart from the competition. 
The speaker strengths would be 
1. IPX5 rating also known as International Protection Marking or Ingress Protection Marking classified under 5 which offer:
a. Dust protection - Ingress of dust is partially prevented, and cannot enter unless over-excessive quantity to interfere with the satisfactory operation of the equipment
b. Water-resistance - Water projected by a nozzle (6.3mm) against the enclosure from any direction shall have no harmful effects against the equipment
2. Double wave diaphragm design which is actually a combination of lightweight metal and plastic cone at the front of the speaker. The design architecture of the diaphragm is two-fold, one which is fastened to the outer part of the speaker outer metal rim and the inner part fixed to an iron coil (field magnet) that feed electrical signals through the speaker cables into the coil. With the double wave design, it effectively moves the coil and cone in a more stable motion and reproduces higher quality sound into the air.









We have designed the speaker keeping in mind comfort and a good grip. Since our initial prototype, we have continued to find better materials to construct BTS-NPLUS2. Finally, we have achieved our desired results for BTS-NPLUS2 after months of continual improvements. We are proud to say we have made it possible for small but powerful sports and outdoor speakers. 









With the round and hexagon shape design, you can rest assured you can have a good grip on the speaker without any discomfort.









You don't need to bring a big and heavy speaker, weighing less than 125 grams bringing along this speaker is a breeze.









You can hang it on your bag pack, perfect for any outdoor activities. 









You can also hang it on any personal mobility device (such as mountain bike or e-scooter) using a carabiner. 









And even while showering, you can mount onto the wall using a suction cup.  









Apart from direct Bluetooth connection with your mobile devices, you can also playback from a 32GB SD Card









Enjoy hands-free call with BTS-NPLUS2 which supports active noise cancellation. You can have a conference with your friends while having fun outdoors.









The speaker is powered with a polymer lithium battery (PLB) with an outer layer soft protective coat to protect it from hard knocks, so do not worry about any explosion caused by impact.











With all these features, head out to your sports and outdoors with D.LAB Sports Bluetooth Outdoor Speaker BTS-NPLUS2 and BTS-NPLUS2X and enjoy great music on the go!

















For product specifications and how to use, every speaker will come with an English and Mandarin manual. At this stage, we might not be able to provide different languages but we can provide the English words in the manual in PDF or Microsoft word upon request for your translation purposes. You can email to customer@dezign-lab.com.

















There will be 3 accessories included:
1. Micro USB charging cable
2. Carabiner
3. Suction cup









There are also 3 exciting colors for you to choose from.









Bringing BTS-NPLUS2 out to the resort makes the experience so much better.









You can bring BTS-NPLUS2 out to the outdoor showers









Tune in to some romantic music while at the sea side.









Do not worry about sand and rocks, BTS-NPLUS2 is strong.









Laze at the beach with some nice music.









Hang BTS-NPLUS2 at the beach tent to enjoy good music.









Use the suction cup (included) to mount BTS-NPLUS2 onto surf board or boats.









If you do extreme sports, hook on with the carabiner (provided) and take BTS-NPLUS2 for your activities.









I hope you enjoy my story and contribute to the success of my kickstarter campaign.
For more enquiries please email to james@dezign-lab.com
Yours sincerely
James Yip
description_risks:
1. Find suitable raw material suppliers for good quality speaker parts

Solution: Sourcing trip completed in China on June 2019 with 3 quotes, visited the supplier warehouse and collected sample materials for testing.

2. Inspect assembly factory and investigate Quality Control and Quality Assurance

Solution: Several factory inspections were completed middle of 2019, and after consolidating all factory inspection reports we have confirmed the factory suitable to perform actual production for BTS-NPLUS2X. A separate finished goods quality inspection will be completed 2 weeks before it is shipped out to Singapore central warehouse for distribution.

3. Ensure all customers who purchased D.LAB Sports Bluetooth Outdoor Speaker BTS-NPLUS2X speakers have the physical stock delivered to their doorsteps.

Solution: We have worked with Singapore local cross-border logistics partner (https://www.janio.asia/) to deliver the stocks by air shipment.

4. In the event factory production and delivery is delayed.

Solution: We will inform all customers who have purchased the D.LAB Sports Bluetooth Outdoor Speaker BTS-NPLUS2X on the delay and expected new delivery date.

5. Our confidence in product quality and delivery.

Solution: We are currently manufacturing the first batch of stocks for our retailer in Singapore (BTS-NPLUS2), a lot of fine-tuning and improvements will be made on the new BTS-NPLUS2X speaker which is a bonus for Kickstarter customers. We are confident the new generation speaker which boasts 2 times longer playback will be a good buy for Kickstarter customers.

description_story:
Story







Hi! I’m MJ and this is my fourth Kickstarter project for my brand, o.mj studio! 
This collection will feature CUTE PUPPERS that all dog lovers will love (: 









Reaching the initial goal of S$300 would unlock the first pin, the cutest SHIBA! 
The remaining breeds will be available as Stretch Goals so if the design you are interested in is still locked, please still pledge to help unlock them since you can edit your pledge anytime before the campaign ends if it remains locked! 
By pledging, you'll get the pins at a discount and any extras will then be sold on my Etsy store. Also, your credit card will not be charged until the campaign ends successfully so don’t worry (':   
The pins are hard enamel (smooth finish) and range around 0.9 - 1.5 inches (specifics are provided below) with varying finishes (gold, rose gold, black nickel plating etc.) They will come with my brand logo at the back as well as colored rubber clutches and a specially designed backing card (to be revealed soon)!

























(1) Mini Glossy Sticker of corresponding design with each pin pledged
(UNLOCKED)
These stickers will be the same size as the actual pins and can be pasted over the holes left by the pins on the backing card. Please don't throw the backing cards away (': They can be reused as bookmarks etc.
(2) Mini Sticker Pack (of all 7 designs!) for each backer
(UNLOCKED)
These sticker packs are handmade by me in my humble abode as gratitude to you guys and a lil' extra something for your support! These will be on Glossy Sticker Paper and they'll be perfect to spice up your bullet journals etc. They are waterproof but not weatherproof so please don't subject them to the forces of nature /: It's my way of showing my appreciation for you guys so I hope you'll like it (': 
(3) Good Boy Treat Hard Enamel Pin for backers pledging for 3 pins and above
(UNLOCKED)
This enamel pin can be used as a board filler to tell everyone which pupper is the Goodest Boy (: 
It has a Gold Finish and two White Rubber Clutches at the back. 









Please add the corresponding amount to your current pledge amount for the ADD-ONS as stated below:
(1) Freebie Mini Sticker Pack: SGD$3 (Refer to Freebie Section)
(2) Good Boy Treat Hard Enamel Pin: SGD$7 (Refer to Freebie Section)
(3) Dessert Animals Hard Enamel Pin: SGD$10
(4) Jellybean Lovebirds Hard Enamel Pin Set: SGD$24
(5) Fantastically Cute Beasts Hard Enamel Pin: SGD$14 
All prices are inclusive of shipping fees for the additional products and will be mailed together with your puppers (:  Please let me know the add-ons you pledged for subsequently in the survey!  

















PIN MANUFACTURING: 60% of the funds will go towards the production of the pins. This includes the pins itself, rubber pin clutches and the shipment of pins to me.
PACKAGING & SHIPPING: 30% of the funds will go into packaging and shipping. This includes bubble mailers, cellophane sleeves, shipping labels and backing card.
KICKSTARTER FEES: 10% of the fund goes towards Kickstarter as they charge every successful campaign a small fee for using their platform as well as transaction fees.  









24 March 2019: Kickstarter Launches!  
8 April 2019: Last Day of Campaign!
9 April 2019: Kickstarter Ends // Survey Sent Out within 3 days // Production order placed 
May 2019: Pins arrive // Packaging and Shipping commences
June 2019: All Pins shipped out (Will be as early as possible!)   









If the project is funded successfully, a survey will be sent to each backer upon the campaign’s completion within 3 days, allowing you to select the pin(s) of your choice from the unlocked pins. Please complete the survey by the stipulated deadline or your pins will be selected at random. Please also note that if you do not fill up the survey with shipping information, I will not be able to mail your Kickstarter rewards to you since there is no address provided :O  









Each pin package will be sent out in a plastic bubble mailer / cardboard box depending on the quantity of pins. Shipping fees will be added on to any pledge you make. 
Rewards will be shipped via SingPost and shipping fees are stated after selecting your reward tier. 
Additional S$3 would be charged if backers prefer to have the package mailed as a Registered article with limited tracking information depending on the overseas postal administration. Lost packages will be insured up to the lower of S$68 or package value.
Any additional tax, fees or customs’ charges are the responsibility of the backer.
Lost packages: To keep shipping costs low, all other packages will be mailed via Normal Mail without tracking.  I will not be able to cover the cost in the case of lost packages for Normal Mail but if there are any issues with the delivery, do let me know. Shipping your package as a Registered article is available at an additional cost of S$3 so please adjust your pledge amount accordingly and let me know!  









Instagram: @o.mj_studio
Etsy Store: www.etsy.com/shop/omjstudio 
Email: studio.omj@gmail.com
You can see more pictures of my enamel pins and merchandise on my Instagram page and Etsy Store and feel free to drop me an email/message if you have any queries! (:

I will also personally scrutinize the quality of each and every pin prior to shipment to ensure that every backer receives their rewards in the best condition.

blurb: Revolutionary pet bed for a much healthier and happier furbaby
description: Revolutionary pet bed for a much healthier and happier furbaby
name: DreamCastle | A Totally Natural & Adaptive Pet Bed
title: DreamCastle | A Totally Natural & Adaptive Pet Bed
Title: DreamCastle | A Totally Natural & Adaptive Pet Bed
Description: Revolutionary pet bed for a much healthier and happier furbaby
Link: DreamCastle | A Totally Natural & Adaptive Pet BedRevolutionary pet bed for a much healthier and happier furbaby
description_story:
Story








The only adaptive and natural pet bed, DreamCastle pet bed uses only 100% natural fabrics & fibre fillings to weave the most luxurious sleeping experience for your pets. Imagine a pet bed that offers peace of mind as it is safe, chemical-free, hypoallergenic, odourless, breathable, clump-free, lightweight, and more importantly, comes in trendy designs that make your neighbours & their fur-babies jealous.







We saw a huge problem for the current market trend in pet's bedding which is leading towards synthetics, petroleum by-products and labeled them as GREEN. This is not only away from the truth but may also cause health problems for fur-kids especially those with sensitive skin and allergies.

Pet bed is composed of 99% filling/stuffing and 1% shell cover. If you go to your nearest pet store, you will either find a pet bed that is stuffed with polyester or foam. So what is wrong? they are SYNTHETIC & treated with loads of chemical.







Synthetic fillings are made from the chemical reaction involving coal & petroleum by-products. They are not breathable, perfect habitat for bacteria & fungus and worst of all it hold on to odors & chemical vapor.

To make the matter worst, most pet beds also use polyester fabric to seal the bed fillings. if you ever throw a polyester pet bed into the washing machine, you will find that the fillings will start to get clumpy and soggy as they absorb the moisture which creates a perfect habitat for fungus, mold, and bacteria. Some synthetic pet beds come with a natural cotton cover. However, the chemical-laden filling can still negatively impact our pet's health. This is an even more serious issue with fur-kids who have sensitive skin, dry skin, or allergies. Synthetic bedding can irritate the skin, causing itching and redness.









Being a small dog owner ourselves and having too many past experiences of purchasing pet bed that our dog wouldn't want to settle on, we had a clear vision, to create a pet bed that weaves the best sleeping experience for fur-kids.
The results of this vision is a DreamCastle pet bed, a bed that is not only a pleasure to sleep on, but also contains no harmful materials, not only easy to maintain but also attractive in designs. After searching high & low, we finally found the answer..the perfect natural fibers to fill each of our bed..KAPOK FIBER.









These fibers came from the majestic rainforest trees that only exist along Earth's equator, and we use only the fiber from the best species which is found in Java, Indonesia. They are totally organic, breathable, clump-free, light-weight, hypo-allergenic, odorless, moisture-repellent, and most importantly sustainably cultivated.
Kapok fiber creates a gentle, cloud-like feel that adapts to the fur-kids' body, helping canine companions get an incredible sleep.








To seal all the goodness from nature, we use only pure natural cotton fabric that provides that extra-soft touch on your pets delicate skin. And the best part is that the tops are easy to wash and exchangeable, making it super easy to maintain, and fits almost anywhere in your home.

DreamCastle pet bed will be your pet urban affairs partners for life, without asking for anything in return... well, maybe a little bit of love.

































We understand how time-consuming it is to maintain a hygienic, safe and clean bed for your pets, that's why our bed composed of a layer of inner mattress shell & a layer of cover.
Most of the time, you will only need to clean the outer cover as it will get soiled from their outdoor activities, all you need to do is to unzip the cover, place it to the washing machine & tuck in a new cover. That's it. The decorative cover comes in many designs; so you could treat the cleaning chore as a fun activity instead of a tiring one.

While most dogs and cats will not pee/poop anywhere near where they eat or sleep, accident sometimes does happen. If it does happen, separates the cover from the inner mattress shell and place them in your washing machine.

























Besides providing superior support for your pets, the unique properties of our fiber also plays a very important role to keep your pets feel comfortable while resting. 
Being an excellent insulator, kapok fibers regulates the temperature of the bed which keeps your pets cool in the summer and warm during throughout the winter night.

















This unique fiber is coated with natural wax thus it has a very low moisture absorption. If your pets accidentally wet the bed, the fiber will not absorb their 'pee-pee' thus the bed stay fluffy & odor-free for wayyy longer than your ordinary pet beds, although you still need to spot clean the crime-scene :)
















With our colorful & 100% natural cotton decorative cover designs, there are always choices that will delight both you and your pets.
































































Let your pet enjoy the luxurious sleeping experience of a down without having to feel guilty for the poor geese. Our source of fibers came from the fruit of the trees, they are sustainably & locally grown by our hardworking farmer in Java, Indonesia.








































Plastic horror is real, they are nonbiodegradable and therefore sticks around for a lot longer (like up to 1,000 years longer) than other forms of trash and if we do not take action now there might be no more clean beach left to walk our pets. 

At DreamCastle, we work very hard to reduce our dependency on plastic except for packaging purposes & zippers, our products are completely plastic-free.

















































This campaign is really just the begining of a journey to something much bigger. We want to make your DreamCastle literally the only pet bed that you will ever need. We have been prototyping with different types of bedding style such as sofa bed and that’s not the end. 

With adaptive covers, the possibilities of giving your pets the best sleeping experience are limitless.
description_risks:
Our #1 goal is to deliver the best quality and safest product. We've put together an amazing team with over 5 years of experience in design and in manufacturing. 

In this first production run, we will ensure all aspects of the product will not be compromised, with safety as the priority. 

With most manufacturing, there can be potential delays in the tooling process, leading to further production delays. 

However, we will do everything in our power to deliver the best product to you on time and to keep you informed along the way.

blurb: A disc sport in your living room but without breaking any lamps.
description: A disc sport in your living room but without breaking any lamps.
name: The Ultimate Board Game
title: The Ultimate Board Game
Title: The Ultimate Board Game
Description: A disc sport in your living room but without breaking any lamps.
Link: The Ultimate Board GameA disc sport in your living room but without breaking any lamps.
description_story:
StoryThe Ultimate Board Game
🇺🇸 Disc Sport in your living room without breaking any lamps
🇫🇷 Texte en français dessous, les règles seroent traduites et téléchargeables en français




The Ultimate Board Game











The Ultimate Board Game is an exciting, competitive, fun game for 2 to 8 adults. The game is inspired by the Ultimate sport and reproduces the dynamics of a tournament between two teams, consisting of a Match, a Party and a Final Match. To become The Ultimate Champion Team, collect the most victory points from the three stages of the game:

  The Two Matches
  The Spirit of the game
  The Party





Phases of the game







> A basic knowledge of the rules of Ultimate is helpful, but not necessary to play this game.

            

          





Unboxing the game is always bringing smiles
Here is a short compilation of unboxing moments







You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play


































Replay with sound









Play with 
 sound












00:00


00:00




































Gameplay of Phase 1 - Match
The game begins with the team that is in possession of the disc on Offence. The opponent’s team plays Defence. If the team in Offence scores or cannot complete a pass, then a Turnover occurs - this means  that the teams switch roles and the disc goes to the opponent’s team. The goal is to score 2 points in the opponent's End-Zone.
Offence
On your turn in Offence, you could do any of the following actions:
1. (Optional) Play as many Fitness/Spirit Cards as you want
2. Play a Pass Card or Increase the Stall Count
When the Current Player on Offence (thrower) plays a Pass Card - the Current Player on Defence can attempt to intercept it. After playing a Pass Card, the Defence Player performs their actions to determine if the pass is successful - by rolling a die and/or playing a Defence Card.
End of the Match

  The first team to score 2 points ends the Match. This team is the winner of the Match.
  The winner of the Match earns 2 Victory Points.
  The winner of the Spirit Of The Game earns 2 Victory Points.

 

Phase 2 - The Party


       At The Party phase, you are meeting your teammates and opponents after the first Match. The goal is to have fun and use the Party Cards to influence each other’s Party and Fitness levels.
Gameplay of Phase 3 - The Final Match
Now with the new Fitness levels you play The Final - let's see if those who partied too hard will be able to play well on the next day. Fitness levels will reduce the range of cards you can play. But no worries - there is always a way to come back.










The Team Behind





 The Origin Story
Martin met Gabi while playing Ultimate (what else 😄) in Singapore 🇸🇬. The two quickly became friends and when one day, Martin dropped the idea of creating a board game based on Ultimate, the duo's creativity was unleashed.
People joined along our idea and helped us to build it all together - our team is from Bulgaria, France, Singapore, The Netherlands, Slovakia and Brazil. And we got a ton of help from friends from Austria and USA, too.




Bottom of the game





Check out our website and subscribe to our newsletter to get more information.
And here is our Instagram and Facebook




Languages unlocked





_______________________________________________________________


🇫🇷Français
L' Ultimate Board Game est un jeu de plateau pour 2-8 joueurs. Le jeu est basé sur un tournoi avec ses matchs et sa soirée. Le spirit a évidemment sa place dans la course pour remporter le tournoi.




Phases of the game







 > Connaitre les règles de l'ultimate est utile mais n'est pas nécessaire. 

            

          





Phase 1 - Match
L'objectif est de marquer deux points en attrapant le disc dans la end zone adverse.


Offence
En attaque, il est possible de faire ces différentes actions:
1. (Optionnel) Jouez autant de cartes Fitness/Spirit que vous voulez
2. Play a Pass Card or Increase the Stall Count Jouez une carte de pass ou augmenter le stall count.
Quand l'attaque joue une carte de passe, le joueur actuellement en defence peut le blocker avec une carte ou par un jet de dé.
Fin du match

  La premiere équipe a marque deux points finie le match. Cette équipe a gagné le match.
  Le vainqueur du match remporte deux points de victoire.
  Le vainqueur du spirit remporte un point.

 

Phase 2 - La soirée


       Durant la soirée, l'objectif est de raconter la meilleur histoire tout en s'assurant que le niveau de fitness de vos adversaires diminue après toutes ces bières. 
Phase 3 - Le dernier match
Après la soirée, dur dur de jouer mais tout est possible.










The Team Behind











Bottom of the game





Notre website et suivez notre newsletter pour plus de news sur le projet.
Notre Instagram et Facebook

Link: Zelos: Swiss Automatic Watches Unlike Any Other3 groundbreaking collections offering Swiss quality at an unmatched price. Featuring premium materials such as Bronze and Meteorite.
description_story:
StoryFor more info after the Kickstarter campaign, please visit us at www.zeloswatches.com 





 







 







 










 







 







 







Contemporary designs, manufactured with premium materials only seen on watches in five-figure price ranges. That was our aim when we started designing this range of watches. We surpassed this goal with three collections offering a distinct character, yet at accessible prices.Each watch case is meticulously constructed with the latest CNC technologies. It is then individually handcrafted to bring out the contrasting polished and brushed surfaces.The dial is a brilliant array of surfaces. The sunburst brushed dial is paired with the finely engraved stepped dial. A minute rings sits high above the dial offering a multi-layered visual experience. 







 







 







We wanted to offer a timepiece that is unique to you. Marine grade bronze is a metal commonly used for ship propellers due to its corrosion resistance. An oxide layer, called a patina, forms a protective skin over time to protect the metal. This patina individualises each timepiece, creating pieces completely unique to you.  What starts out as a shiny rose-gold, ages with the atmosphere into a rustic brown. 







Meteorite is also used for the ‘Visionary’ collection. This amazing metal is 4.5 billion years old with a striking design unlike any other material. Each and every meteorite dial has a different pattern, otherwise known as the Widmanstatten Pattern. This is formed over millions of years of slow cooling, and cannot be reproduced synthetically. We use material from the Muonionalusta meteorite which is found in Sweden and landed over a million years ago.Meteorite dials have been used in Swiss luxury brands, costing more than $10,000. We are now able to offer this at an accessible price. 







 









Swiss automatic movements have been the benchmark of quality for decades. We wanted to offer these Swiss movements at a price accessible to all.Unlike a quartz watch which requires a new battery, automatic movements rely on your motion for power. They will run for decades with the right care.The ETA 2824 or Selitta SW200 are extremely reliable and proven automatic movements. They have proven themselves with years of accurate service among various luxury Swiss brands. 







The unique bronze cases deserves a strap to match, and we settled for only the best leathers. 







Each strap is made from Horween Chromexel leather. Horween is the oldest leather tannery in the USA and produces the best leathers using techniques dating back a 100 years. This leather will patina with use, just like the beautiful bronze case.







 









 Watch case: Stainless Steel (grade 316L) or Marine Bronze (grade CUSN8)Watch size (Diameter/ Thickness): 40mm/ 11mm Water resistant: 50 meters  Strap size: 20mmGlass: Sapphire Font Crystal. Scratched only by DiamondMovement: Swiss AutomaticSwiss ETA 2824 or SW200Dial: Multi Layered Strap: Horween leather for Bronze models. Croc printed leather for Steel modelsBuckle: Deployant Clasp Warranty: 1 Year
description_risks:
Having completed many production runs of watches, we have anticipated any delays that might arise during production. 

We have reliable suppliers who ensure that the watches delivered are of the best quality, although this sometimes come at the expense of time. However, this attention to quality is extremely important to us as other suppliers might be quicker to deliver an inferior product. We hope you guys agree with our beliefs!

StoryFly the Nest is a thesis short film that deals with themes of identity, self-empowerment and parent-child relationships.synopsis:
A child imprisoned by her mother’s manipulation, Clara is an adult robbed of childhood and freedom. Carrying the responsibility of being her mother's only kin, Clara is forever anchored to a home full of guilt. One night, when Clara tells Mother about her boyfriend's suggestion that they move in together, she begins to question her life at home and uncovers a dark family secret. about the filmmakers:
fourth year films is a group of four undergraduates from the Wee Kim Wee School of Communication and Information in Singapore's Nanyang Technological University. We'd love your support in helping us make our short film a reality.

blurb: 400 pages of martial arts, action and drama goodness. Join Nathan and Co to discover the world of Kung Fu.
description: 400 pages of martial arts, action and drama goodness. Join Nathan and Co to discover the world of Kung Fu.
name: The World My Arena Vol 1 - 2
title: The World My Arena Vol 1 - 2
Title: The World My Arena Vol 1 - 2
Description: 400 pages of martial arts, action and drama goodness. Join Nathan and Co to discover the world of Kung Fu.
Link: The World My Arena Vol 1 - 2400 pages of martial arts, action and drama goodness. Join Nathan and Co to discover the world of Kung Fu.
description_story:
Story














 *Elvin's original artwork is also available now as an add on! Only 1 piece available! 
-----------------------------------------------------------
Do you like action filled with realistic martial arts moves?
Are you excited by intense drama that keeps you anticipating how the next scene will turn out?
Have you ever wondered what kind of surprises you may get, when a low self-esteem oversized teenager meets with... Kung Fu?
Then you're going to love...

















The World My Arena Vol 1 is a 200 pages hardcover graphic novel which was successfully funded in September 2021.  









After 1 year, the highly anticipated "The World My Arena Vol 2" is finally here! The World My Arena Vol 2 is also a 200 pages hardcover graphic novel, picking up from where we left off in Vol 1.




The World My Arena Vol 2 Cover Page





Armed with hard-won skills and a new positive outlook, Nathan is poised at the beginning of a life freed from the misery that has weighed him down.









But when his little sister Chloe is kidnapped by a hooded figure in a back alley, it precipitates Nathan into the wider world of his allies and enemies, and a whole new level of danger.









Nathan is joined by Ethan, who helps to save Chloe’s life. In return, Nathan finds himself striving to help Ethan unlock the mysteries of his past, and to keep Ethan from throwing away his soul in a nightmare-fueled quest for vengeance.









As their paths cross, diverge, and cross again, Nathan and Ethan begin to learn the terrible secret that has driven Sifu Gideon into hiding - a secret which ties all of their destinies together.









Are you excited already? Check out more pages below!

































Besides the main story, are there any bonus content?
A whole lot of it!
We are very happy to share that in The World My Arena Vol 2, we are joined by not only one, but TWO amazing Singaporean artists as guest artists. They are RossMonday and Haider, and both of them bring along their own brilliant styles in two short stories written by KJ. We'll show you a sneak preview right away!




'I Want to Fight Ten Men'. Written by KJ, Art by RossMonday








'The Ultimate Workout'. Written by KJ, Art by Haider





Not only that, you will also get to enjoy many behind the scenes content too!









Those who have supported The World My Arena Vol 1 previously would know first hand the quality of the comic book! The World My Arena Vol 1 and 2 are hardcover graphic novel, each containing 200 pages of goodness. The hardcovers line up perfectly with Marvel OHCs, DC Deluxe HC and Image Deluxe HC, so our hardcovers will definitely be a beautiful addition to your bookshelves.









That's not all! Starting from this Kickstarter Campaign, we will also be launching our Chiral Comics Exclusive Collectable Card. The launch of a graphic novel will be accompanied by an exclusive collectable card, printed to a limited quantity only, depending on the number of Kickstarter Backers. Each hardcover purchased will be accompanied with a collectable card, at no additional cost! Check out our first two designs below for this campaign, beautifully coloured and designed by Pavith C, with art by KJ.




(Left) Nathan Card - Vol 1 (Centre) Gideon Card - Vol 2 (Right) Card back





*Anyone who had already purchased The World My Arena Vol 1 thus far, and backs this campaign will receive the Nathan Exclusive card too!









就像当年的香港武打漫画, 这是一本充满自强不息精神的漫画书。
The World My Arena is centered upon the spirit of continuous self-renewal, evocative of the classic Hong Kong Martial Arts Comics. [Translated]
- CT Lim, Country Editor (Singapore) International Journal of Comic Art


Watching him overcome his suffering and learn to defend himself as well as his sister is truly touching.
- Layna Putterman, Author at AP2HYC









All prices are in SGD.

















Besides the reward tiers above, you can choose to add on additional copies of The World My Arena, or grab yourself a customised commission art piece of various sizes. If you don't see the commission size that you are keen on, feel free to drop us a message and we will get back to you promptly!

















For all Singapore backers during the Kickstarter campaign, you get to enjoy free shipping/delivery! We are committed in ensuring that you guys get to enjoy the best value for money. So this time round, we are using courier service (Ninja Van/Pickupp) and all original art will be packed securely in hard plastic cover for extra protection.


Alternatively Singapore backers can choose to collect the rewards in person from our partner local comic book store, Pink Ponk Comics or during Singapore Comic Con (10 - 11 Dec 22).
Pink Ponk Comics Address: Katong Plaza, 1 Brooke Rd, B1-12, Singapore 429979


For international backers, we want to ensure that you receive your items safely in excellent conditions. Therefore, we will be mailing with tracking number provided. Your rewards will be bubble wrapped and packed tight and safe.

















STORY AND ART by
KJ is a Singapore comics creator and the founder of Chiral Comics. In 2019, KJ released his debut comic series, “The World My Arena”, through Kickstarter. The martial arts series has since been featured on local media (justsaying.ASIA, CNA Lifestyle) and adapted into animated videos (ComicVid by VividThree Productions). It has also led to a spin-off bilingual webcomic series, "Save me from Chloe".
In addition, KJ has also seen his works published in comic anthologies internationally, including the Covid Chronicles by Graphic Mundi, which was selected by The Washington Post as one of the "Best Graphic Novels of 2021".
Website Facebook Instagram


SCREENTONE by
"Ace" is a name that started off as a challenge to myself on my 20th birthday, to be what my namesake suggest, in art and in life. When I finally decided to take my art seriously and accepted that I could no longer afford to half-ass my art if I wanted to earn a living as a professional artist. I love drawing as a story telling medium and have always enjoyed the freedom it granted artists to express themselves in no other way, be it as a hobby, or a therapy, and sometimes both. I love cats. I love dogs too, but I am more of a cat person.
Instagram


COVER COLOURS by
Alan Bay is an illustrator and comic artist, whose art have appeared in comic books, cartoons and an extensive list of video game projects including Assassin's Creeds: Brotherhood, TMNT, Prince of Persia: Forgotten Sands, Ghost Recon and Romance of Three Kingdoms Online.
His first printed comic book titled Atlas (2010), was a collaboration between Media Development Authority of Singapore (MDA) and ChuangYi Publishing.
In 2020, Alan teamed up with tokuAsia’s Aydeel Djoeharie to create the graphic novel origin story of the tokusatsu-inspired live-action series Sacred Guardians, published by Asiapac Books.
Instagram


EDITED by
Tara Clarkson is a writer and a mother of five, and in collaboration with KJ has contributed to several upcoming comic book anthologies. These include “The Fermi Paradox” for 21st Century Pulp: New Weird World, “Delivery” for Cthulhu is Hard to Spell Vol 3, and “The Argonaut” for Twisting Time Anthology. Tara loves editing, Jane Austen and the Ninja Turtles, and is also very fond of humans, small farms, and trees. She lives on t’sou-ke traditional territory in Canada.
Instagram


GUEST ARTIST 
RossMonday is a Singapore digital illustrator and aspiring comic artist. He made his debut as a book cover illustrator, working with local writers in 2019 with “Redhill Days” and “Zac Rushd”. He pursued his dreams to become an illustrator by studying Concept Design and illustration with 3DSense Media School. His published works include variant comic covers with Pink Ponk Comics such as “Raw Gem”, “Hello 2” and most recently, comic collaboration with KJ for “The World My Arena Vol 2”. He is also currently collaborating with a local company, working on a digital comic short series, Sacred Guardian Singa."
Instagram


GUEST ARTIST 
Haider is a Singapore-based comic and cover artist. His works have been published by Aspen Comics (Tribute to Michael Turner), Pink Ponk Comics (Zodiac #2 & #4, Hello, Hello again, Level Up), CS comics (Hero) and Chiral Comics (The World My Arena vol 1).
In his free time, he enjoys reading and collecting all sorts of comics and playing tabletop RPG games such as dungeons and dragons as it allows him to improve his creativity, think on his feet and interact with his friends and family.
Instagram









Thank you for dropping by this Kickstarter campaign page and I truly hope that you are intrigued enough to back this project. This is a very unique story that breaks all boundaries of what you would expect!


Help us share the campaign around because we want more people to read The World My Arena. Share it with your Dad, Mum, Brothers, Sisters, Wife, Husband, Girlfriend, Boyfriend, Relatives, Friends, Enemies, or even that stranger on the road that you see.


Help us reach the goal! Help us break the goal! Help us smash the goal! Back us today!
description_risks: The book is expected to be 100% completed by the time the campaign ends and all we need is the funds to print. We have ran four successful Kickstarter campaigns prior to this, and have delivered all rewards promptly within 2 months after the campaigns ended. Hence, we can confidently say that there are very minimal risks involved and you will definitely be enjoying the graphic novel in your hands if you back us today!

blurb: Gear up for the fight of your life! Show no mercy to dragons or babies in your path. Will you or your friends be the last one standing?
description: Gear up for the fight of your life! Show no mercy to dragons or babies in your path. Will you or your friends be the last one standing?
name: Dodgeball with Dragons and Babies
title: Dodgeball with Dragons and Babies
Title: Dodgeball with Dragons and Babies
Description: Gear up for the fight of your life! Show no mercy to dragons or babies in your path. Will you or your friends be the last one standing?
Link: Dodgeball with Dragons and BabiesGear up for the fight of your life! Show no mercy to dragons or babies in your path. Will you or your friends be the last one standing?
description_story:
Story







Dodgeball with Dragons and Babies is a fun, strategic card game meant for the whole family!  Each pack of the game is meant for two to four players. Combine two or more packs to accommodate more players.

Our Story:  This is The Adventure Studios’ debut work. We aim to create great games for you to rediscover the magic of childhood. Together, the team has over decades of experience in bringing products and games to life.As part of Kickstarter Commissions Initiative, we are also creating custom-made cards for you! Just pledge for "The Collector's Box" and you will get two custom-made cards, two signed boxes!Check out this design we made for a fan!





Playing the Game:







Each player starts with 5 x Action and Counter cards.







Start each turn by drawing one card from the Action and Counter Cards deck. At the start of your turn, play an Action Card from your hand. 'A' on the card stands for 'Action Card'







 







The targeted player can negate the effect using a Counter Card. 'C' on the cards stands for 'Counter Card'.







You can choose to play as many Action Cards you wish in a turn.Next, draw one dodgeball card. Dodgeball cards count as damage but can act as ammunition for a player as well.







Some dodgeball cards can activate Event cards too. An Event card affects most or all of the players.







A player with five or more dodgeball cards in the damage zone loses the game. What's in the box?







100 Cards:
70 x Action and Counter cards
20 x Dodgeball Cards
10 x Event Cards
1 RuleBook REWARDSEvery reward comes with:
10 x digital wallpapers
Your name in the credits
Our deepest gratitude :)
Our Limited Edition Cards:






 







 







 







 







I. SUPER EARLY BIRD (from 14 November to 17 November 2017) Single Pack- S$15 (US$10) + 1 LIMITED EDITION CARDII. SUPER EARLY BIRD (from 14 November to 17 November 2017) Twin Pack - $30 (US$10) + 3 LIMITED EDITION CARDSIII. EARLY BIRD (from 17 November to 20 November 2017) - Single Pack- S$20 (US$15)IV. SUPER EARLY BIRD (from 17 November to 20 November 2017) Twin Pack - $40 (US$30) + 3 LIMITED EDITION CARDSV. Single Pack - $28 (20USD)VI. Twin Pack - $55 (US$40) + 3 LIMITED EDITION CARDSVII. The Collector's Box - $270 (US$200)
Two signed boxes
Limited edition cards x 5
We create custom-made cards for you x 2
A4 Prints of your custom-made cards!
Your name in the VIP credits
Free shipping!
Add-ons:A4 Print - S$15







 







 







Monster Baby Expansion Pack (40 cards) - $15 (US$10)







 







Stretch Goals$10,000 - Get two additional cards with your pledge!

















$20,000 - Get ten monster baby cards with your pledge!
Timeline:  November 2017: Start of Kickstarter campaign  December 2017: End of Kickstarter campaign  June 2017 – March 2018: Designing of cards  February 2017 – May 2018: Manufacturing  March - May 2018: Start of shipping/ Quality check  May – July 2018: Your item is delivered!Shipping:Item is EU-friendly.Shipping costs should range from 10 USD to 15 USD. We understand that shipping costs are expensive relative to the price of the game. We would do our best to subsidize the costs as much as possible. If this is not possible, we would provide an additional booster pack with twenty cards as a token and further discounts on our future products. In fact, there are some areas where the shipping costs go beyond 15 USD but we would absorb any amounts that go beyond 15 USD. Thank you!We appreciate your support for the project. In appreciation of your support, one backer would be choosing one backer daily and he would be getting his or her pledge for free. We will announce the winners weekly. We would love to hear any questions or inquiries from you @ junkai@theadventurestudios.com. If you liked this project, make a pledge and share it with your friends!
description_risks: As with any projects, there can be unforeseen production, shipping or customs delays. However, we included some buffer time in our delivery schedule and we promise to deliver the items by July 2018 (much earlier if everything goes smoothly!)

blurb: Pins inspired by some of my favorite lines from Lang Leav's poetry.
description: Pins inspired by some of my favorite lines from Lang Leav's poetry.
name: Poetry Enamel Pins by Pin Fix
title: Poetry Enamel Pins by Pin Fix
Title: Poetry Enamel Pins by Pin Fix
Description: Pins inspired by some of my favorite lines from Lang Leav's poetry.
Link: Poetry Enamel Pins by Pin FixPins inspired by some of my favorite lines from Lang Leav's poetry.
description_story:
StoryHi there! Thanks for checking my project out! I've been a big fan of Lang Leav's poetry since forever. I've picked out some of my favorite lines that spoke out to me from her poems and turned them into enamel pins.The goal covers the production of pins, backing cards, shipping, packaging, and Kickstarter fees.
 I'll be adding more designs along the way and will be throwing something special if we hit at least 3 goals!PIN SPECIFICATIONS
Hard Enamel
Gold Plating
Rubber Clutch
Specially Designed Backing Card
1 Inch Widest/Tallest
INITIAL GOAL - To you, love was about multitudes. To me, love was inordinate.






STRETCH GOAL #1 | $660 - We fly closer to the moon; we fall closer to the sun. 






STRETCH GOAL #2 | $990 - Like we existed in a time before love. 






TIMELINEMy Kickstarter runs for 30 days and is estimated to end on 16 November. After receiving the funds, I will place an order with my manufacturer and production will begin. Production and shipping of the pins takes approximately 3 weeks. I will be sending out a survey to collect your mailing address and pin selection options during this period. Once the pins arrive, I'll have it packaged and shipped out within 1 week. Do note that there will be a tracking number provided for every package.

You can expect to receive your Poetry Enamel Pins by PinFix around Mid-December. Perfect for an early Christmas gift! Updates will be sent out should there be any delays.
description_risks:
I have confidence in ensuring that every process goes smoothly and the pins should reach you perfectly. I have also owned a business previously and am experienced in packaging, shipping and updates.

Therefore, I would say that the two biggest risk I would face is not having this Kickstarter fully funded and shipping delays as overseas packages may take a longer time due to customs. Nonetheless, I will update accordingly should there be any delays.

Should you need to contact me, do email me at pinfixmail@gmail.com and I'll be glad to answer your questions!

description_story: StoryWe want parents and kids to spend time together making things. To kickstart this process you have five kits that you can buy. these are kits that we have tried and tested at our community sessions. These include:mini story garden kit:Using materials like water beads polymer clay and fake moss you will create a garden depicting your favorite story. It is recommended for children who are 3 years or older.vehicles kit:Make a ramp and a car which are both small and transportable. It is recommended for children who are 4 years or older.light kit:Even 2 year old kids can do this. You will learn to attach a LED to a battery and create a simple circuetknitting kit:                                                                                         With this kit you can learn to knit. You will also learn two different knitting techniques in the video.  It is recommended for children who are 5 years or older.magnetic puppet play kit: Make puppets out of cardboard and let them come alive with magnets.  It is recommended for children who don't swallow small objectsWe are supported by:

blurb: A note-taking board, so you never leave the shower without your genius ideas again
description: A note-taking board, so you never leave the shower without your genius ideas again
name: Shower Thoughts Board
title: Shower Thoughts Board
Title: Shower Thoughts Board
Description: A note-taking board, so you never leave the shower without your genius ideas again
Link: Shower Thoughts BoardA note-taking board, so you never leave the shower without your genius ideas again
description_story:
StoryImagine this, after a long day of hard work you hop into your shower, allowing the water to hit your face & your mind to wonder.  While being in a relaxed state of mind, you suddenly figured out the missing piece that you've looking for. So you finish up your shower routine, & when you stepped out of the shower you realized you've forgotten that missing piece. 
What a bummer right? But fret not as this is common! 
It has been proven that we recall information better when we pen it down, of course bringing a paper notepad into the steaming shower is not the best solution.
Introducing Shower Thought Board, a Waterproof-Portable whiteboard that allows you to note down any big ideas of yours in the shower so you never have to leave the shower without it again!
This set comes with, a Whiteboard




Whiteboard





Whiteboard marker




Whiteboard Marker





and a suction cup stand that you can attach to any shower surface and it holders both your board & the marker




Board Stand







Not only is it water-proof, but it also features a portable function where the board is easily detached from the stand and can be carried back to your workspace where you can continue with your work. Also, the design of the stand is thought out to blend 'seamlessly' to your shower (Well, as seamless as a whiteboard gets in a shower).
The stand currently only comes in white, but if there is a huge demand, more colors will definitely be out to better suit your shower!

blurb: A sleek solution to portable toiletries, your entire shower routine in the palm of your hand. Simply unroll & mount on any smooth wall.
description: A sleek solution to portable toiletries, your entire shower routine in the palm of your hand. Simply unroll & mount on any smooth wall.
name: XUBE - streamline your shower experience on the go
title: XUBE - streamline your shower experience on the go
Title: XUBE - Streamline Your Shower Experience On the Go
Description: A sleek solution to portable toiletries, your entire shower routine in the palm of your hand. Simply unroll & mount on any smooth wall.
Link: XUBE - Streamline Your Shower Experience On the GoA sleek solution to portable toiletries, your entire shower routine in the palm of your hand. Simply unroll & mount on any smooth wall.
description_story:
Story*XUBE is not yet officially TSA-approved for carry-on. Please see our FAQ/Update #3 for more information.





Meet XUBE 







XUBE offers a sleek, beautiful solution for portable toiletries - simply fill with your chosen products, then bring it anywhere to unroll and mount on any smooth wall. And when it’s time to go, roll it back up for easy packing.




Perfect for the beach, yoga, travel or gym





No More Squats


Not all pain is gain





We believe that showertime is sacred; the time to be alone with your thoughts. But just when you’re about to have eureka moment, you have to reach for the shampoo on the floor. Maybe you power-squat, or put one knee on the floor (ew) - but whatever your choice of acrobatics, that showerthought is gone now.









We want to dive into our adventures full-speed, without the drag of travel inconveniences. XUBE gives you the comfort of having all your trusted products at your fingertips (ironically hands-free), anywhere, effortlessly. Your Personal Dispenser - Anywhere!







Can’t fit all your bottles on that tiny soap ledge? Never put them on the floor again. XUBE lets you mount your soap on any smooth wall, and take it right off afterwards. Microsuction is reusable, never loses its cling, and leaves no residue. Just wash and dry, and it’s good as new. 


Take XUBE anywhere





Cut The Clutter







XUBE keeps all your essentials together; it holds what you need, and not a touch more. 
Now you can bring everything you need from locker to shower, no more balancing acts. XUBE is Versatile







Fill XUBE with whatever you want - Face wash, shampoo, conditioner, body soap, etc. 
Need to use specific brand of shampoo? Prefer to use one bottle for lotion instead? 
You just do you; let XUBE do the rest. Just Roll and Go







Make packing easier.
Say goodbye to stuffing oddly-shaped bottles into a toiletry bag. XUBE tessellates with itself, and then with everything else. Its compact cuboidal shape makes it stackable and packable.Save the Environment







Now you can stop buying tons of travel-sized versions of your shampoos, and replace your disposable bottles with a refillable dispenser.Made of silicone







●  XUBE is made of BPA silicone, so it’s 100% waterproof, hygienic, and easy to clean. 
































Process and Inspiration









We went through many, many rounds of ideation, prototyping and variations. Pencils were sharpened. All-nighters and doritos were had. We pondered our own travel ideals and were inspired by the form of mountain peaks. Taking this organic starting point, we abstracted it into a concept that was geometrically satisfying. The decision to work with silicone proved challenging, and we spent many weeks 3D-modelling through iterations to find the right balance between designing for manufacturing considerations, functionality, and aesthetic based on feedback from our community. No detail was left unscrutinized!














 















     










Meet the Team







We’re a small team of Singapore-based designers who believe that beautiful and functional products can make even everyday routines a pleasure. We believe that in life’s great adventures, there is joy to be found in the little things too. And nothing beats the simple, everyday joy of having streamlined, beautiful products that just work. Help us make XUBE a reality, and together we can change the way we live, starting with the essentials.
description_risks:
We are a team of designers that believe in delivering beautifully functional, quality products, and are committed to ensuring that backers are satisfied with what they receive. We have produced a working prototype, and are working towards final product refinement and volume production as soon as our project gets funded.

Over the last few months, we have worked closely with our manufacturers to ensure that everything runs smoothly. We will continue to maintain clear communication and conduct quality checks with them.

We are a small team, but we will try our very best to deliver in a timely manner! A ton of sweat and tears went into this project, and we would hate to see it fail. We're almost there, the only thing we need is your support. Manufacturing with silicone and plastic is an arduous process, but we will try our best! In the event of unforeseen circumstances, we will be transparent with you and keep you updated on the steps we will take to manage everything. 

We promise to keep everyone closely updated as we bring our dream to life! Thank you so much for your support.

Suds and love,
Team Xube

description_story:
StoryTransfer your table-top game to the digital worldYou would have heard of internet banking or even cryptocurrency. However, there are no currency transfer method available for any table-top games. Fortunately, Wallet - For all table top games are created !







Wallet - For all table top games is a basic expenses or progress tracking appYou are able to send and receive game currency between multiple users at a touch of the finger. The app will calculate your existing balance, total win and total loss.







 







Supported GamesAs of now, the basic frameworks allow transfer of money for games such as Monopoly.
However, we would like to expand the functionality of this app to include Health Points and other game counters.Stretch GoalsWhen we meet our goal of S$1,000, we are able to give you a near perfected Wallet - For all table top games experience only for IOS. But we have bigger goals which we would like to achieve which includes:
