blurb: Mahjong cards with a pinch of design and modernisation made to look good and feel good.
description: Mahjong cards with a pinch of design and modernisation made to look good and feel good.

Title: Hú, Mahjong cards
Description: Mahjong cards with a pinch of design and modernisation made to look good and feel good.
Link: Hú, Mahjong cardsMahjong cards with a pinch of design and modernisation made to look good and feel good.
description_story:
StoryHú | Mahjong Anywhere
  I set out with a goal to create a portable mahjong set that looks good and feels good with the intention of making this product for people who would love to play mahjong anywhere they went.
  Why? Because I enjoy playing mahjong and it's not very accessible to play anywhere especially with the size of the tiles and table set up required. Some alternative solutions online include a mini mahjong set that seems cheap and hard to handle and cheap mahjong poker cards with no thought behind it.
Traditional mahjong is bulky, heavy and noisy. Thus what I was looking for from my solution is something small, light and quiet. 
 Without the intention of replacing your traditional mahjong but rather to make it more accessible to bring around, play anywhere and not disturb anyone with loud noises. With that, I decided to create a small portable mahjong set that looks good and feels good with a touch of modernization. 
  After testing and prototyping the cards ended up being 60 x 30 which I felt was just the right size. While playing, the cards will be placed on a mahjong card stand that will hold 13 cards while you draw and discard one card every turn to prevent overdrawing of cards.
  With a small profile, the mahjong set includes 148 mahjong cards, 4 sets of card stand, 1 NSEW tracker, 3 dice. Play mahjong anywhere.
Mahjong Anywhere

blurb: GreenChamp Bikes is a kid's balance bike that is made from bamboo. We only use the best from what nature has to offer.
description: GreenChamp Bikes is a kid's balance bike that is made from bamboo. We only use the best from what nature has to offer.
name: GreenChamp Bikes - Sustainable Bamboo Balance Bikes for Kids
title: GreenChamp Bikes - Sustainable Bamboo Balance Bikes for Kids
Title: GreenChamp Bikes - Sustainable Bamboo Balance Bikes for Kids
Description: GreenChamp Bikes is a kid's balance bike that is made from bamboo. We only use the best from what nature has to offer.
Link: GreenChamp Bikes - Sustainable Bamboo Balance Bikes for KidsGreenChamp Bikes is a kid's balance bike that is made from bamboo. We only use the best from what nature has to offer.
description_story:
StoryWebsite | Facebook | TwitterUpdate#
Since we have reached our goal a few new pledges will be available.
1.Add €5 to your €110 GreenChamp Bike pledge and receive a leather saddle ( brown or flora)
2. Champ of GreenChamp Package (€2500). 
Visit our office in Singapore and experience the GreenChamp Designing process  + design 3x your very own GreenChamp Bike and last but not least join a bamboo bike tour in Singapore (excluding family package).
3. Local package (€1250)
Meet the GreenChamp team and see how are bikes are designed + a full list of our products (excluding family package)!



Wow so beautiful and unique!





 



Cycling fast!!!






GreenChamp Bikes, a new and dynamic start-up, makes bamboo balance bikes for children from as young as 18+ months to 5 years! 

































We are also featured in more than 100 websites and magazines! Visit our website for more details!About us

GreenChamp Bikes is based on the founders’ belief that children’s toys should be made from eco-friendly and sustainable materials. They believe that this would encourage parents to educate their children about the environment from a young age, in the hope that this will provide them with a greener future. 


Educating children about the environment starts young, really young!





Besides its eco-friendliness, GreenChamp Bikes are super durable, ensuring easy manoeuvring for children who are learning to ride a bike. GreenChamp Bikes is the brainchild of Daniel and Sunny. Sunny went on a solo expedition around the world that spanned 6,123km on his first handmade bamboo bicycle. 


Sunny with his hand crafted bamboo bike and fellow cyclist





After returning, he met his Dutch cycling partner, Daniel, who shared the same passion for cycling, sustainability and bamboo. 


Daniel and his love for bamboo





After studying many children’s bikes, they saw that many balance bikes in the market were not sustainable (e.g. made from plastic, plywood and aluminium) and lacked the lightness and durability of bamboo. 


Non-sustainable balance bikes





They spent 2 years creating and designing a bamboo balance bike for young kids, hoping to let them know that they can have fun and be eco-friendly at the same time. 


Prototype drawings








Prototype drawings








Final prototype drawings








Final prototype drawings different angles





“Through the GreenChamp Bikes we hope this will encourage parents to educate their young children on the environment and provide children a greener future.” Daniel Heerkens, GreenChamp Bikes.GreenChamp Bikes Facts1)	Made from bamboo - one of nature’s most renewable sources of raw material. It requires only sunlight and water and grows very fast, up to 1 meter a day!


Bamboo used to make GreenChamp Bikes





2)	Specially developed bamboo technologies: GreenChamp uses two specially developed technologies during production. Honey is infused into the bamboo fibre to prevent it from cracking. 


1st In-house technology: Honey Wax Infused Tech







GreenChamp bike frames are double-walled, in which 1 bamboo is fused between 2 bamboo walls to ensure the durability of the bike. This also increases the strength of the bamboo frame by approximately 50%.


2nd In-house technology: Double Power Fibre





3)	Smoothest ride possible for your child: Our nature-based joints and bamboo framework promotes the smoothest ride possible for your child, so no matter how they ride, the vibration dampening effects of our natural materials compliment their riding style for a glide-like feeling with maximum comfort.4) Super durable: ensuring easy manoeuvring for young kids who are first learning to ride a bike.Workshop in GuangzhouGreenChamp Bikes only employs local villagers in Guangzhou, China, who have extensive experience in harvesting bamboo for decades. They only select 0.01% of the best available bamboo for our bikes. By using this method of sourcing, we guarantee a stronger-than-steel frame for all GreenChamp Bikes. GreenChamp Bikes are crafted by talented local artisans, turning them into a unique and beautiful piece of art. They have more than 20 years of experience working with all kind of bamboo products.


GreenChamp Bikes artisans at work!








One of our skilled craftsman





GreenChamp Original


Ready and GO!








Front view








Side view








Front view 2







                    

You can even personalise your own GreenChamp Bike by engraving your (child's) name on it for an additional €10!
Pledges:










Engraving and saddle options







Meet the GreenChamp Team







Champ Of GreenChamp





Why Kickstarter?After 3 years of research, designing and prototyping, GreenChamp Bikes has developed bamboo balance bikes.We want to make the GreenChamp Bike dream come true with the help of our supporters, not a bank.Our target of €20,000 will allow us to create the moulds and procure the other parts of the bicycle in bulk to lower production costs. Kickstarter is the perfect platform to raise funds, share and receive support for GreenChamp Bikes.Production TimelineFor GreenChamp bamboo balance bikes
July 11th - Kickstarter ends, we will email you to ask which
accessories you want (sizes, names etc.)

GreenChamp Bikes

description_risks:
At our current stage, we have accumulated enough knowledge and expertise such that GreenChamp Bikes are no longer a home-made beginner's product. It is a product backed up with 2 years of research testing, in-house technologies and certifications. Our workshop is not operated by computer systems or machines but by skilled artisans.

As each bamboo is different, the material and color of the bikes will vary according to many factors such as, the time at which the bamboo is harvested or unpredictable weather conditions around the village. 

1) Natural Bamboo's Surface 
Each bamboo is unique in terms of its thickness, natural surface finishing and color tone. GreenChamp Bikes are kept as natural as possible.

GreenChamp Bikes has stringent quality control protocols in place for all aspects of bikes, including aesthetics. For example, if there are too many spots on the bamboo or if the smaller branches on the bamboo affects the overall aesthetics, it will be rejected.

2) Natural Bamboo's Probability of Cracking

Problem: 
Bamboo may crack. It is its natural tendency to crack as the fibers of bamboo are parallel to each other. When bamboo dries up, the water between them will cause the fiber to split.

Solution: 
GreenChamp Bikes has 2 in-house technologies ( honey infused technology and double walled bamboo) to tackle this problem. Our bamboo have been tested in many different places under different weather conditions. After 6 months of testing, we are proud to say that our technologies have proven to be very effective. 


3) GreenChamp Bikes Delivery Schedule - 
Problem: 
GreenChamp Bikes does not rely on robots to build your bicycle. We commit to deliver on time and if in the case where we cannot meet the deadline, we will inform 2 weeks in advance.

Solution: 
After 2 years of experimenting and formalising the processes, we are committed to make it happen. With your support, we may be able to purchase better tools and hire more skilled craftsmen to increase the production and deliver earlier.
 
Please note: The bamboo used is specially selected, some delays may occur to ensure the highest quality promised. We will inform you in advance in the event that your shipment is delayed, and seek your understanding in this matter.

blurb: Portable feng shui water feature to reduce anxiety and improve well being for urbanites
description: Portable feng shui water feature to reduce anxiety and improve well being for urbanites
name: SHUI
title: SHUI
Title: SHUI
Description: Portable feng shui water feature to reduce anxiety and improve well being for urbanites
Link: SHUIPortable feng shui water feature to reduce anxiety and improve well being for urbanites
description_story:
StoryFeng Shui, (literal translation to Wind and Water) is an ancient Chinese art of arranging buildings, objects, and space in an environment to achieve harmony and balance in a way that will bring peace and prosperity. Feng Shui teaches the ways to balance the free-flowing of this energy, which is known as ‘Qi’.









Throughout the years, we have witnessed how Feng Shui has evolved with time. From a huge water fountain that can be found near commercial buildings to a smaller scale water fountain that now many people embrace in their home and living spaces. Based on statistics, water features are the most common Feng Shui as they bring about therapeutic effect and aid in the relaxation of the human mind. The continuous water flow and movement are believed to regulate the flow of the energy (Qi) in the atmosphere for the environment. Feng Shui followers believed that regulated energy (Qi) will improve their surrounding in terms of their well being.   


In our current generation, we are all cooped up with work commitments and there is little time for us to have our own leisure activities. Often than not, we urbanites are used to the long working hours and after a long hectic day of work back at our home, we would often be too tired and not want to do other activities than to rest. Often, this hectic lifestyle causes anxiety to build up in us from fatigue and stress. In lieu of the outbreak of the coronavirus and circuit breaker, working from home has caused a detrimental blow to many urbanites’ wellbeing as they are expected to work for longer hours and be more responsive to superiors’ demands.      


On the other hand, getting cooped up within all four walls and not being able to go out also adds up to the anxiety faced by the urbanites.












SHUI Front View








SHUI Rear View








SHUI Inner Compartment








SHUI Exploded View with Water Pump





























Thus, we have decided to come out with our product, a portable water feature, SHUI, that is easy to maintain and user-friendly.


Our product is simple! It made use of a mini water pump and can be placed in any medium that can hold water. The water pump creates a steady rate flow that produces a therapeutic ripple effect for the sight of the users with a subtle hint of water flowing sound that soothes our ears.


At home, urbanites can easily retrieve water through the tap into a cup or bowl. They will then place SHUI inside the container. By turning on the power, a water feature is formed. Urbanites can place this portable water feature anywhere as it does not take up a lot of space.  


Our product, SHUI, is thought to address the current issue that urbanites faced from the anxiety from work, and the small space environment that we are living in. Relatable, isn’t it? We are here to help with the well being of urbanites so that their day will be better with healthier and stronger mental health.


Process
As product designers, the stage of researching and development is our well known trait before deriving with the working prototype. For a period of 9 weeks, we have documented our process of working towards our final prototype.

































From top to bottom in order. 1) Removable battery housing lid 2) Battery holder 3) Wooden buoyant 4) Water pump 5) Water pump housing structure









Initial idea for SHUI is a battery-powered floating water feature with the buoyancy support from the wood.









Our team realised the bulkiness of the whole structure and we decided to omit the aspect of floating, meaning that we want our final product to be sunk to the bottom of the water body. This was our initial testing with putting the water pump into a housing structure. The pump will then be powered external from a battery source.

















We made use of the 3D printing for fabrication as it is the most effective and efficient choice to produce a functioning model within a short span of time.









































The testing of the 3d printed SHUI model. We have finally achieved the ripple and sound effect accordingly to what we have planned for the portable Feng Shui water feature! It creates a therapeutic soothing effect for stress relieving and anxiety reduction.







You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play


































Replay with sound









Play with 
 sound












00:00


00:00








































You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play


































Replay with sound









Play with 
 sound












00:00


00:00


































Final assembly of working prototype and packaging

























































































What is Inside the package?

































We have SHUI with the water pump and battery compartment, mini SHUI keychain, 3D Printed lithopone thank you card and a written thank you card from our dedicated team for appreciating your kind support!

















Mini SHUI keychain that users can hang onto their keys, mobile phone or bag as an accessory.









3D Printed lithopone thank you card. This card previews like a seen-through holograph with light shine through.









A heartfelt message from our dedicated team for those who purchase our SHUI product!


About Us
We are three quirky product designers hailing from Singapore. Ik Hwa favourite past time is to research the latest healthcare products and keeping to date with ideas for the latest functional design trends, Chien Ping favourite past time is to spend his time in his workspace doing woodcrafts while blasting Mandopop from his mobile phone and Fyza favourite past time is to spend her time cuddling with her two favourite felines at home and going for a long run to stay fit. 


More importantly, we are making a bold paradigm shift to bring in modernization and refinement for SHUI, in the portability of the product and packaging for easy transportation. The small size allows urbanites to place SHUI in different water compartment body without the need to source for an external container. Lastly, our concept still carries the philosophical traits of Feng Shui with the continuous water flow and sound to provide soothing and therapy to soothe the stressful environment for the urbanites.


Once again, thank you for taking your precious time to read through our 9 weeks of portable Feng Shui water feature journey. If you appreciate our product, we would appreciate your kindness in pledging to our project and make SHUI a reality!




SHUI trio - Ik Hwa, Chien Ping and Fyza








SHUI with Us







Research References

  https://academic.mu.edu/meissnerd/samson.html
  https://www.cambridge.org/core/journals/journal-of-asian-studies/article/abs/an-appreciation-of-chinese-geomancy/6427DBCC86F186D45675E313DFF99D98
  https://www.forbes.com/sites/jamiegold/2020/05/19/feng-shuis-potential-health-benefits/?sh=1b95bd561d68
  https://www.thespruce.com/use-fountains-for-good-feng-shui-in-home-1274637#:~:text=First%2C%20a%20fountain%20can%20help,you%20may%20be%20holding%20onto.&text=Water%2C%20especially%20flowing%20water%2C%20is,%2C%20abundance%2C%20and%20cash%20flow.
  https://lifeskillsinstitute.sg/are-you-part-of-the-92-singapore-stress-report/
  https://aquila.usm.edu/cgi/viewcontent.cgi?article=1363&context=honors_theses
  https://www.naturalcoolair.com.au/sustainable-cooling/top-5-benefits-of-water-features-in-your-town-home-workplace/
  https://academic.mu.edu/meissnerd/samson.html
  https://www.cambridge.org/core/journals/journal-of-asian-studies/article/abs/an-appreciation-of-chinese-geomancy/6427DBCC86F186D45675E313DFF99D98
  https://www.pacificprime.sg/blog/employee-burnout-in-singapore/
   https://www.totalpond.com/blog/psychological-benefits-to-owning-a-water-feature
description_risks:
The risks and challenges we faced revolves more towards the rewards system where we allow our pledgers to have their own individual customized pattern designs to be engraved on the SHUI product and the packaging. As we are currently not sure if we would require special injection molding for imprinting the customized engravings for everyone. 

The prototype that we are currently using is actually done by 3D printing, one main problem with 3D printing lies in the consistency and time taken. Although 3D printing is able to achieve the customized pattern designs, it would not be able to accommodate all kind of designs and 3D printing has the threshold and limitation for prints, which will result in certain designs to not be able to be printed out. 

Our current solution is to either come up with a list of fixed variations, like five different patterns that allows pledgers to choose from. This is to ensure that there is uniformity in the patterns.

description_story:
StoryQuotes offer an unlimited source of ideas. Awaken, Guide, Motivate and Remind us of what is truly precious in life.  


"365 I.Q Collectible" By Backers For Backers





Through this campaign, I invite you to publish your Inspiring Quote to a customised desktop quote-calendar, the "365 I.Q Collectible".





You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play


































Replay with sound









Play with 
 sound












00:00


00:00


































Your Inspiring Quote will be published and printed on one of the pages of the "365 I.Q Collectible". Together with 364 pages of Inspiring Quotes contributed by other backers, the "365 I.Q Collectible" becomes a reality! By Backers, For Backers :)




Side view of the "365 I.Q Collectible"




 




Front view of the "365 I.Q Collectible"




Yes, the emphasis here is your original, self-created, Inspiring Quote -- which has inspired you! Publish and share your quote via "365 I.Q Collectible" to inspire others to reach their greatest potential in life!


Source(s) of your self-created Inspiring Quote





 


Sample of self created, Inspiring Quote printed on the "365 I.Q Collectible"





 


Let's publish your original, Inspiring Quote in the "365 I.Q Collectible"





With co-creators in synergy, everyone is an author of "365 I.Q Collectible" in his/her right! Welcome on board, co-author :)






 
 


Front cover sketch of the "365 I.Q Collectible"





 



Physical features of the "365 I.Q Collectible"





Unique Features:     
365 co-authors in synergy, turning this idea into a reality
365 self-created quotes, inspired by backers
365 unique individuals from various parts of the world, leaving a legacy

Collectible inspired by backers for backers (and for people around the world, receiving the collectible as gifts from backers)

Physical Features: 
 
 
Estimated measurement = Length 13.5cm, height 12.5cm (including 2cm wire-o binding) and thickness 3.5cm (when in packaging, mail in transit) or thickness 8.0cm (when free-standing and placed on flat surface)

Estimated weight = 400g to 500g (Light and portable)

Printed double sided on FSC (Forestry Stewardship Council) certified papers (Friendly to Earth)


Free-standing and joined by wire-o binding (Strong and durable for sustainability and ideal for frequent usage) 

Spaces surrounding the Inspiring Quotes for personal reflection and customization (For your thoughts, drawings, notes and etc)


Reusable for different years (No dated years) (Discover different experiences of the same Inspiring Quotes)

Comes with a FREE pouch (Design varies, while stock lasts) (For portability and safe transit via mail)









 







 


   







 


 
 







 










 







 

Upon successful funding of this campaign, a survey link will be emailed to backers to collect self-created Inspiring Quotes and shipping information.


More details of timeline here:



Timeline of the "365 I.Q Collectible"





Want to quote but not sure how to create one? No worries :) I will share a mini guide with backers and you could use it to develop your self-created Inspiring Quote.






Publishing your quote in the "365 I.Q Collectible"





With "365 I.Q Collectible", we are reminded that each day is a beautiful day waiting to be unfold; and life is lovingly lived as we continue to inspire one another to reach our greatest potential in life.


















      







 
  



"365 I.Q Collectible" for Daily Inspiration

The printer is on standby and awaiting the Inspiring Quotes to start printing.

In fact, each sharing of this "365 I.Q Collectible" campaign will help it come closer to becoming a reality! Thank you for inspiring others through your sharing :)

Link: Lutu.A knee compression sleeve that allows user to be confident when being active without worrying others of their past injury.
description_story:
StoryHi, I am Fatihah.
I am creating a knee compression sleeve that allows users to feel more confident when being active without worring others of their capabilities due to their past injuries.


The Features

  Adjustable Compression
  Minimalist Fishtail Braid Design

How to use
Step 1: Locate the top of sleeve and place on knee. 











Step 2: Secure bottom of sleeve below the knee.









Step 3: Pull top layer of sleeve above the knee.









Step 4: Pull side tabs to tighten and adjust middle layer till comfort.











What it looks like being used











Colours Available

















Purpose of Product
Lutu compression sleeves is a redesigned knee compression sleeves that does not amplify the attention that a normal knee compression sleeve gives off. The worry others gives off the moment a user wear a normal knee compression sleeve, doubting their ability to do any physical activity. With Lutu, it blends the sleeve and user's activewear seamlessly. Looks like it is part of the outfit.
description_risks: Sizing of sleeves may vary with the ones in the current market as the application of the design is different.

Title: Burning Bridges - A Party Game to Set Friendships on FIRE
Description: Ever wondered what dark thoughts fill the minds of your friends? Say no more, we've got the game. A social game for 5 - 12 players.
Link: Burning Bridges - A Party Game to Set Friendships on FIREEver wondered what dark thoughts fill the minds of your friends? Say no more, we've got the game. A social game for 5 - 12 players.
description_story:
Story

























Get ready to set your friendships on fire!
Some things are better left unsaid, but where’s the fun in that? Burning Bridges is guaranteed to turn up the heat in any room by putting your friendships to the test.









WHAT IS IT?
Burning Bridges is a 5-12 player party game that unleashes a series of difficult questions for you and your friends (for now) to answer. Prepare yourself for political incorrectness, hard truths, and a whole lot of laughter in this fun-sized box!

 

      These questions are nasty and 100% sh*t-stirring. A simple game to play with disastrous and humorous outcomes, a perfect fit for any evening at home or at a bar.
WHAT’S IN THE BOX









The Core Box includes:

  120 devastating Question Cards

 
  2 sets of Fire, Water, Gasoline!

 
  12 sets of 3 Lifelines

 

ALL BACKERS WILL ALSO RECEIVE ANY STRETCH GOALS UNLOCKED DURING THE COURSE OF THE CAMPAIGN
Here’s what they look like:









































































































            

          









            

          




































THE TEAM









Start Something Studios is a Singapore-based board game design studio that takes fun very seriously. Founded in 2018, Start Something was built to allow designers, artists, and gamers with crazy ideas to create new experiences in the realm of tabletop gaming.









This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 850+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $370M raised between them.
description_risks:
Burning Bridges is ready for print and all we need is your help to fund it! That being said, we understand that there are some basic risks and challenges that are beyond our circle of control.

Here are some of the issues we might face through the course of production:

MANUFACTURING & PRODUCTION
While we have an established relationship with our factory in China that has produced our first Kickstarter game, Unbearable Winter - the biggest challenge we face is the instability of potential natural or political disasters in China.

SHIPPING AND FULFILLMENT
We know that getting your product on time is of the utmost importance, and that is why we are working very closely with trusted shipping and fulfillment companies to get your copy of the game safely into your hands. We're working with trusted fulfillment companies right out of Singapore and Hong Kong so that there are minimal hiccups. These companies have shipped other successful Kickstarter board games before at various scales, and based on our consultations and conversations with them, should have no issues whatsoever with regards to our campaign fulfillment.

For all further queries and questions, you may also contact us at hello@startsomething.com.sg

blurb: Makes Anywhere Ergonomics. Sit Effortlessly Upright. Track & Improve Your Posture and Habit
description: Makes Anywhere Ergonomics. Sit Effortlessly Upright. Track & Improve Your Posture and Habit
name: Enyware : The Smart Seat that Transforms Posture & Habit
title: Enyware : The Smart Seat that Transforms Posture & Habit
Title: Enyware : The Smart Seat that Transforms Posture & Habit
Description: Makes Anywhere Ergonomics. Sit Effortlessly Upright. Track & Improve Your Posture and Habit
Link: Enyware : The Smart Seat that Transforms Posture & HabitMakes Anywhere Ergonomics. Sit Effortlessly Upright. Track & Improve Your Posture and Habit
description_story:
Story


























Enyware lets you do the impossible. Sit in a “zero-stress” posture where your spine is stacked in an ideal S-shape while your body is upright, balanced, with back muscles comfortably relaxed.
A few minutes in Enyware and you will never want to sit the same way again.









Enyware applies just the right amount of force from its dual lumbar to roll up your pelvis and shape your spine into a neutral S-Shape. At the same time, its patent-pending posture shaper structure gently lifts the front of your chest into a power pose that eliminates slouching in a way no other chairs can.









This unique approach stacks your spine into an upright and relaxed posture, with only minimal muscle force required to maintain this perfect balance.









Enyware does not lock the body in one posture. You are still free to write, look through the microscope or create a work of art. Enyware will continuously support your body, reducing the load on the spine and returning you to the zero-stress posture whenever you need.









Your phone, iPad, laptop and joypad require our arms and shoulders to be in different positions, but most armrests are set too far apart or at wrong height to support modern devices.
These poorly designed armrests force us into awkward postures. Leaning to one side to use a phone, slouching down to find armrest support when typing or bending our neck down to view contents on the tablet.









Enyware's dynamic, detachable armrest is created as the result of our research and forms a critical part of the total support your body needs at work.
Our armrest is adjustable to let the elbows rest at the right height to reinforce your "zero-stress" upright posture.
It moves out to support your arms when typing or moves in create a support platform to let both hands hold phones & tablets at a healthy eye level so you don't need to bend down.









With your neck properly aligned and the shoulders relaxed, the risk of shoulder pain and text neck are greatly reduced. 

















Combining dynamic armrest with the zero-stress posture is how Enyware provides total support to the body and helps transform your posture away from the ergonomic pain affecting most of us today.

















Even with Enyware’s zero-stress sitting posture and dynamic armrest, static posture for long stretches is still unhealthy.
To encourage dynamic sitting, we integrate a sensor into Enyware to be your habit coach throughout the day. 









Enyware tracks your torso movement and angle so it knows if you are sitting still for too long or too reliant on the forward support.  









Choose to set active time goals and reminders to get up for a short stretch. Since Enyware is smart enough to know if you have left the seat or shifted posture, it will send a nudge only when necessary.









Enyware lets you set active goals and work with you either through app notification, browser notification or just a report at the end of the day.









Enyware can remind you to periodically alternate between inclined seating in the backrest and perching on the seat. The perching posture opens the hip to the optimal 135 degrees, engages the core muscles and further reduces tension on your spine. With the support provided by Enyware, you can perch more comfortably for longer. 









By putting you in control of your health goals, Enyware provides the positive reinforcement you need to transform sedentary habits into a more active lifestyle.

















Enyware is the world’s first smart seat that considers both the physical and mental aspect of sitting.
While our physical support helps you achieve a “zero-stress” sitting posture. Our intelligent system also gives you a powerful tool to reach a “zero-stress” state of mind.
Integrated in Enyware's posture shaper is a sensor that calculates your breathing rate and even detects stress based on your breathing pattern. 









Breathing is a conscious act that you can create dramatic changes in your body. It can increase oxygen level in the bloodstream and reduce stress without the need for medication. 









Now with Enyware, you will be able to see your breathing rate, set a stress alarm in case of elevated breathing. Pick a technique to help manage your stress in the same way top executives employ mindful breathing to boost their performance. 









As a society, we are obsessed with how much calories we burn and what muscle group we exercise from just 1 hour in the gym. But we believe what we do during 8 hours of sitting is no less important and should be intelligently managed by you.
Enyware makes sitting as intelligent as our other devices, not to distract you with another piece of technology, but to help your body and mind live in the same moment, and enriching both.

















Enyware lets you take the zero-stress sitting experience anywhere. All you need is an even surface and Enyware will turn and place your ergonomic space.
Enyware weighs only 2.6 kg and is easily portable so you can use it in your kitchen chair for work and easily put it away during meals.   Freeing up the need to place out-of-place furniture like an office chair in your living space.
Just about everything about Enyware is adjustable. You can change the pan size, height and depth of the posture shaper to snugly fit your body type. its armrest is also detachable depending on your needs and sitting style.

















We designed Enyware for everyone. We took great care to test Enyware with people of all sex, body size, and ethnicity to ensure maximum comfort and support.











You need ergonomics everywhere and Enyware makes that possible, anywhere.




































            

          

See how Enyware gives our testers a posture that changes their lives, in and out of Enyware.

            

          

            

          

            

          









Enyware was vigorously tested with medical-grade motion capture sensors and EMG to measure both the participant’s posture and muscle strain over a 30-minute sitting session simulating tasks performed by modern workers.
The result proves that using Enyware can help you sit upright for much longer while imposing only half the muscle strain compared to sitting upright without support.









In time-lapsed comparisons, participants can keep the optimal spine posture without slouching throughout the entire testing period, with better neck and shoulder alignment.
The EMG results show that our “zero-stress” posture imposes only half the strain on the lower back muscle (Thoracolumbar fascia) and middle back muscle (Trapezius) when compared to sitting upright without support.
Even better, sitting upright with Enyware strains your muscle less than slumping.









This impressive result has been repeated both under laboratory condition and in real world scenarios with our beta testers.  




























            

          

In 2018, our team made the LEX Bionic chair and the kind people of Kickstarter made LEX the most crowdfunded wearable robotics product ever. LEX had a 100% Kickstarter delivery date went on to star in one episode of HBO's Silicon Valley.

















This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 1,100+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $460M raised between them.
description_risks:
Enyware is not our first project and we use our learning from LEX project to minimize the risk as much as possible. One of our key objective has always been 100% delivery, just like with LEX.

Firstly, we are using some of the best manufacturing vendors in the industry who, apart from previously working with us on many projects has a long experience producing precision components for tier-one consumer device companies.  

Secondly, Our team of award-winning robot engineers, designers, software engineers and production experts have been expanded even further from 2018. We now have consultants with experience working with fortune 500 companies guiding us through our design process. Every components are put through vigorous testings and manufacturing feasibility study before it is made. 

Thirdly, Enyware draws from our experience working with aerospace companies in addressing their wearable robotics needs, combined with extensive interviews and studies of modern workers.

Lastly, This is not our first rodeo. In 2018 the kind people of Kickstarter made LEX the most crowfunded wearable robotics product ever. We learned a lot from both our mistakes and successes in order to make everything runs even smoother this time around.

We are not saying some problems will not arise, some design may need to be changed in the final run due to regulatory requirement or expanded test group feedback, but what will not change is the ability of Enyware to give "zero-stress" seating experience to every backers on time with no unexpected costs. 

Whatever the challenges or delays, we give pledge to you the same pledges. Transparency, timely communications, responsiveness and 100% delivery.

Description: Technical Timeware, made for the urban nomads, for everyday extreme use. Automatic movement for the new movement.
Link: Atomic Project AG-01 // Automatic Technical TimewareTechnical Timeware, made for the urban nomads, for everyday extreme use. Automatic movement for the new movement.
description_story:
Story
Welcome to Atomic Project // Technical Timeware, designed for urban nomads, for everyday extreme use.







INSPIRED BY NEO-FUTURISM AND SPIRIT OF 'GODZILLA',
THE RESULT IS A FUNCTIONAL TOOL, WE CALLED IT TECHNICAL TIMEWARE








Table of Contents  

01. Our story
02. Problem and Solution for you
03. Design
04. Specifications: Prime components 
05. For You: Rewards 
06. Stretch goals


07. Timeline: Where we've been and what's next
08. International Shipment 


09. Who are we / Credits
10. Like & Share
11. Future Road map








01. Our StoryWHERE IT ALL BEGINS















 02. Problem and Solution for you
ATOMIC PROJECT  was founded on the basis of an urban utilitarian tool, made for the urban nomads, for everyday extreme use.

We began by questioning ourselves what impending design problems our common watch has. We narrowed down our thorough research and have identified crown-tuning and strap swapping issues as a potential suspect for further design intervention.

After a year of toiling hard work and design, this is our design solutions.



Introducing AG-01 | Technical Timeware










 
SOLUTION-01








The watch lugs is fused into a beautiful singular uni-body, making it unbreakable and durable. You can swap straps easily without any tool.


SOLUTION-2








Addressing the crown, we did a concise study of the movement. Our solution lied in rotating the automatic movement 90 degrees clockwise and positioned our crown at 6’O clock position. 








We achieved a symmetry and a seamless uni-body, with no protruding corridor. Thus, we have achieved ambidextrous usage.





 












03. Design

Our design process consists of 4 pillars, AG-01 Technical Timeware, Colorways, Atomic Straps, and Packaging.
AG-01 Technical Timeware
Design Process








 Moodboard in Atomic Studios. Heavily influenced by Tech Future.




Fig.01





We make use of 3D printing technique to test trial a couple of designs (as seen in Fig. 01 above) before deciding on the final design. We concentrate on the essentials and the timeware is not burdened with non-essentials. The final design is an unibody design, with a singular solid body. 


DIAL 
The challenge was to create a dial that is easy to read when needed, and faded in the background when not necessary. 









 After 7 trials and testing, the final dial design is our dual contrast effect dial. With the play of matte black base dial and transparent gloss coating, the markers shine when light hits on it.
DATE WINDOW
The date window is one of the most important aspect of the design, as we use it a lot personally. We like to celebrate the date dial and make it one of the highlight of the whole design. Our specification is not easy and not a lot of manufacturers like to take the risk to challenge the status quo, where the usual 3 or 4 O' clock position is at.  










6 O' clock position designed symmetrically to attain perfect balance.

One of a kind 3D red arrow aero indicator
Work seamlessly with our machined crown

CROWN
The crown is the most challenging component of the entire design. Our design is inspired from the rising sun and our design hero, Dieter Ram's principles, "Less is more"
We spent countless back and forth with our vendor and 2 prototypes before we got it right at the balanced proportion and design details. 


 RISING SUN










Rising sun dot indicator 


Red Dot on PVD matte black hard coating 
Crown positioned at 6 O' clock position
3 levels control (Lock > Date > Time)

SUPER-WHITE











Super-White Dot Indicator

Super-white on stainless steel crown
Crown positioned at 6 O' clock position
3 levels control (Lock > Date > Time)




AUTOMATIC MOVEMENT 
When we went out to source movement for our Timeware, we want it to be rock solid and invincible in the field. Finally, we are tied between Miyota Caliber 8215 movement or the SII caliber NH-35A movement. 
Eventually, we chose the latter, which is known among watch circles as a workhorse and made by Seiko.
This robust machine is rated to run for a couple decades before needing a service.
TRULY THE SPIRIT OF 'GODZILLA'








GODZILLA GUTS // SII NH-35A SPECS:
 


Jewels: 24 synthetic rubies, used to reduce friction and increase the lifespan of the movement
 
Vibrations Per Hour: 21,600 BPH, means silky smooth satisfying mechanical sweep 
Power Reserve: 36 hours, keep running this long even if you completely stop moving. 
Winding Direction: Bi-directional,  translate your movement into power.  
Hacking: Yes, it’s easy to set the exact time because you can stop time(on the watch) Synchronize.

NIGHT GLOW LUME
Usage under extreme urban night conditions, hi-visibility is an essential. We need a durable and long-lasting glow that will functions without failure. Hence, we picked the Swiss-made Superluminova C3 glow lume to fuse into our Timeware's dial markers. 









Swiss Superluminova C3 (white that glows neon green)


Easily one of the most visible lume you can find. 


ATOMIC STRAPS



Strap Design Process
 








For our strap's design brief, our goal is simple, to design and craft an aesthetically beautiful, strong and utilitarian NATO strap. We test trial 3 rounds with our selected vendor, before we came to our satisfied solution where is up to our peak standards. 





Specifications










Format: ATOMIC straps are NATO format straps specified with the highest quality hardware and materials.



Hardware: Made from stainless steel hardware. 22mm in width x 1.4mm strap thickness.










Details: Black Ballistic herringbone weave design. Silky smooth to touch and ultra comfortable to wear on all day. 









We are thankful that we worked with a great vendor that deals with our sky high expectations. With your support and funding, we can make ATOMIC strap design a reality, onto your wrist.
COLORWAYS

ATOMIC PROJECT AG-01 comes in 2 colorways for you. The question is, which side are you on?


STEALTH BLACK EDITION 
Bold yet stealthy, Black-out edition. Surgical grade 316L Stainless Steel with Matte black w/ PVD hard coating. 








 
STAINLESS STEEL EDITION
Beautifully polished hairline textured Surgical grade 316L Stainless steel.









PACKAGING


Exclusive Stealth Black Package
We spent an equal amount of effort and time to make our packaging unified with AG-01. Our packaging design is inspired by utility toolbox. 








'Godzilla' AG-01 nested neatly upon unboxing. This packaging box is functional and can be used for storage of your accessories.










EVA black foam -Better protection and higher quality compared to black sponge foam

Matte black paper wrap with gloss black detailing - The details is stealthy, yet tastefully beautiful.

We are revealing thus far. The fun is when you unbox it yourself. We can't wait till you hold it in your hands!




Disclaimer Notice:
All photos were shot with our prototypes(Timeware, Strap, Packaging) made from our selected vendors, that we worked with over the last 6 months to 1 year. The final mass production unit might differ a little in details due to manufacturing refinements. We will update you what changes we make along the way to create a greater design for you. When it reaches your hand, you can appreciate every corners and details of the Timeware.











04. Atomic Project AG-01 //- Component Specifications:  


Case material: Surgical grade 316L Stainless Steel

Caseback: Stainless Steel fitted back w/ engraving details
Display: Flat Sapphire crystal, Anti reflective coating
Movement: Seiko SII NH35A , up to 36 hours reserve

Date: Window, 6PM 

Case: Width: 40mm

Length: 54mm
Thickness: 11.2mm
Lug-to-lug (strap entry): 22 mm or smaller
Print dial. 
Superluminova C3
Hands: Superluminova C3
Water resistant: 5 ATM - 50M / Rainproof
Crown position: 6PM 
Weight (timepiece): 60g / 2.12 oz. 
Strap Weight: 20g / 0.7 oz.
Strap: Black Ballistic herringbone weave mil-strap, PVD hardware 
1 year guarantee against defects

















05. Rewards
We break down into different backer's tier and you decide in your own comfortable way which rewards tier you can support us. 
TOGETHER, WE ARE ATOMIC SQUAD








 *Please take note, we can't ship to certain countries and additional costs to certain countries. Please refer to 08-INTERNATIONAL SHIPMENT below.









06. Stretch Goals
This is an additional sweet bonus for you. Goals unlocked will be at no additional costs to you. This is our small way of saying thank you for helping us reach our pinnacle!








Further details will be released if we manage to unlock these goals together!









07. Timeline
 We came so far and this is the moment.








Our campaign plan 
Our goal is to ship the rewards out as soon as it is ready, and we are estimating July 2019 to have it in your hands. If there are any unforeseen delay that we can't control, we will let you know firsthand. 
















 08. International Shipment
 
We ship internationally, with the exception of Argentina, Belarus, Cuba, Iran, Lebanon, Somalia, Sudan, Syria and Yemen. Do take note shipping to Russia will require additional costs. Please take note that you may be responsible for duties, fees and taxes applicable to your region. Sorry for any inconvenience caused.









09. Who are we / Credits










 

Credits  
FILM


Director/Cinematographer: Douglas Tan -  Instagram 

Photography: Douglas Tan - Instagram

Post production editing: Daryl Tang
Post production Supervisor: Jered Ti
Film Music: A Himitsu - Soundcloud | Soundtrack

Shot in beautiful Bangkok, Thailand & Lion City, Singapore

PROJECT


Sourcing: Ng Siang Joo - Site | Instagram 

Copy-writing/ Proof-reading: Samuel Lim - Site












10. Like & Share


We're ready for production, we have samples in hand, the technical drawings, I have the vendors ready to start production. The only thing missing is the initial order fee. I need to order a minimum of 500 watches, and that's where you come in.


By becoming a backer for this project, you help us fund the first production run, and you score an awesome Timeware at a great discount!

 




LIKE & FOLLOW US FOR UPDATES ON:





FOLLOW US ON FACEBOOK(CLICK-THROUGH)










FOLLOW US ON INSTAGRAM(CLICK-THROUGH)





 

Next, join our Mailing list for the latest update:



TO OUR MAIN SITE (CLICK-THROUGH)















The funds today will allow us to build the future. Hence our funding goal are slightly higher. The breakdown are as such:

Production samples of AG-01

Mass production budget MOQ of 500 pieces
Travel to vendors just outside of Hong Kong and meet with vendors, mainly to conduct inspection check
Packaging costs
Additional Shipment costs for delivery 
Atomic Studios' Administration and day-to-day running
Purchases of studio shooting & post production equipment
Marketing Budget
AG-02 R&D and prototype samples
AG-02 production 


We have our future road map planned up to AG-03 in 2022, if you back us today, you will be part of Atomic Project's history book. Our team are already in the pre-planning stage for AG-02 and we are absolutely excited for the future.  



For any inquires, please email to us at atomicproject88@gmail.com
Lastly,
A gargantuan thank you from all of us at ATOMIC PROJECT!
Now, let's make Godzilla come alive!
description_risks:
Dear potential backers,

Firstly, thank you for your trust. With your support, it is our duty and  responsibility to bring the project alive, and deliver the prized timepiece to you.
 
As a designer myself, I understood the hard work, struggle and time to bring a product from concept to mass production.  

Manufacturing any product takes a lot of hard work, and things sometimes go wrong, with unexpected hiccups along the way. I've shared a few potholes above, but that is why we have been preparing for over a year now.

It means a lot to me and my team to meet the June 2019 deadline, and we'll do everything in our power to do so. I promise to do a weekly update for you till the product ships and reaches you.

If somewhere along the way we find that there is a setback in production, or that we cannot make the timeline, we promise to be as transparent as possible to keep you informed.

Best,
Alden 
Designer | Atomic Project

description_story:
StoryBelt is an accessory wear almost everyday. So when come to belt, we demand a lot. We want to have many features on a belt such as
we want a belt that can be wear in any occasion, be it formal to casual to everyday wear, 
we want an easy release and fasten belt,
we do not want holes on a belt as it is not fit accurately and
we do not want bulky buckle as it looks bulging.    

Belts play the important role of keeping our clothing in place, for a presentable outlook, anytime or anywhere, at work or at play. We often wish for that wonder belt that can grace any occasion, be it formal or casual to everyday wear. That belt that look elegant, easy to fasten and release, no bulky belt buckle or unsightly belt holes.











 Introducing M*Belt  

M*Belt is a must-have belt that fit the requisites for both function or fashion. It is a belt designed for any occasion, ranging from formal, casual, outdoor activity and travelling engagements. 








 



Formal or Casual Wear





 
 The Design
Belts should not be customized and fitted for individuals just by belt holes. When designing M*Belt, we focus on making the M*Belt not only functionable but stylish, durable and minimalist, yet easy to wear.








 



Up to 20 Color Combinations





 
 Specifications









 
 Our Rewards (in US Dollars)   








We will send you a survey to ask for your choice of color(s) and size(s) after the campaign. 

 Available Sizes 
Measure your actual waistline in inches. If you are not sure how to measure your waist, click here. 








Note: There will be additional 3 – 6 inches to the overall length of the belt. If your waist size grow by 3 inches, you can still wear the belt.
 Choice of Colors




Buckles: Silver, Gold, Black and Blue.  Straps: Black, Brown, Light Brown, Green and Khaki.





 M*Belt Vs. Traditional Belt
 

Turn belt into pull up and down.  



It's convenient, easy, and saves time. You'll notice it once you never have to insert the buckle into one of the holes again.





 

No more belt with holes that stretch and crease making them look awful.



Belt without holes retains their ‘like new’ appearance. Rest assured, your belt will always be secured. Run, walk, and play without interruptions.





 

Create your own style



Blend in or stand out. With M*Belt design you have the option to use many different colors to create your own signature look.





 

Compliment your look of the day. 



No bulky buckle. A clean, streamlined look.





 



Timeline
description_risks:
Initially, it boil down as an idea to design a belt, that can be easily packed and brought about, with no unsightly belt holes and yet is elegant enough to be used for any occasion. 

The challenge came in designing a buckle that would function as according to what we wanted. We experimented through many prototypes. To produce the prototypes, we worked with 3D drawing artist and 3D printing company. 

The belt buckle need to be precise, as even a 1mm difference would had affected the M*belt’s form, fit and functionality. Although it had been a time consuming affair, we are glad our continued efforts and dedication got this right.

description_story:
StoryDesigned and Made with love from A Mother's heart. This project started when we received the best gift ever - Emma! She was born with Down Syndrome but beautiful nonetheless, and we loved her so. Emma's awesome daddy worked hard so that I could quit my job to be with our beloved girl 24/7. Yet, it was too heavy a burden for him when Emma was further diagnosed with heart defects. The very first embroidered pillow was made with love by Mummy, hoping it could act as a small comforter for our baby girl as she sleeps with it in her little arms.This is where A Mother's Heart Project comes in. 






 My wish and goal is for this project to be successfully funded, so that I could have the sufficient funds to officially start it as an online business, having enough resources to make good and personalised pillows meant for infants and toddlers. Actually, even for the adults who were once children. Each embroidered pillow takes roughly 16 hours to complete, 10 of them helps our little family with the medical bills for 1 week.  My aim is to sell at least 200 of them. This will help cover the medical bills for short term, and most importantly to kickstart the business that could run on long term.






 






 






Colours Available (Scroll to bottom for pictures!) : White/Pale Blue/Pale Pink/Pink Green/Grey/Navy/Dark Grey/Dusty Pink/ Orange Pink/Greyish GreenShape and Sizes:Stars/Hearts/Clouds 42X47cm (Estimated guide)






 






 






 






 


dark grey




 


dusty pink




 


white




 


pale pink




 


pale green




 


pale blue




 


orange pink




 


navy




 


greyish green




 


grey
description_risks:
Risks are minimal. The embroidery work is time consuming but Emma's granny is a great support and is even better with the sewing than I am. I have worked out a time-table in which I could invest my time in creating the pillows and at the same time spending quality time with Emma. She loves watching me with these pillows!

Up to date progress will be frequently updated.

blurb: Amazing Metal Detector Shoes
description: Amazing Metal Detector Shoes
name: Treasure Hunter: Metal Detecting Sandals
title: Treasure Hunter: Metal Detecting Sandals
Title: Treasure Hunter: Metal Detecting Sandals
Description: Amazing Metal Detector Shoes
Link: Treasure Hunter: Metal Detecting SandalsAmazing Metal Detector Shoes
description_story:
Story















A metal detecting system is designed and packaged into footwear such that it can be worn on both feet in lieu of carrying a hand held metal detecting device. The metal detecting hardware, coil and battery are installed in its entirety inside the sole and in the shoe.  In the event that a buried metal object is found along the path of the shoe swinging in the air while walking, the buzzers will sound through spiker, headphones or mobile app to alarm the user, thus fulfilling its purpose. This Metal Detector Shoes provides a convenient method of metal detection for treasure hunters and as a toy for children to wear metal detecting shoes instead of hand held devices that are inconvenient and attract attention from passersby. 


Amidst the multitudes of treasure hunters, hobbyists and children that roam the beaches, woods, and ancient sites this Treasure Hunter Metal Detector Shoes would be much appreciated. Thousands scour the beaches each year in hopes of finding precious gold. For the casual treasure hunter to even the avid explorer having this shoes would be a great addition to their arsenal. Since there is no visible hand held device. Metal detecting shoes are convenient to use and draw less attention from the passersby. Instead of leaving the site with a hunched back or weary arms all that a user must do with the portable metal detecting shoe is walk around wearing them and wait for a signal. 

















Metal detector shoes work by transmitting an electromagnetic field from the search coil into the ground. Any metal objects within the electromagnetic field will become energized and retransmit an electromagnetic field of their own. The detector’s search coil receives the retransmitted field and alerts the user by producing a target response. 


A metal detecting shoe consisting of:
- insulated wire coils for electromagnetic field generation, and field changes detection packaged inside the frontal (toe) area of ​​the sole of the shoe.
- an electronic module packaged in the middle (Fast Finder and Sand's Worker) or heel (Mountain Walker) area of ​​the sole.
- a battery packaged in the heel area of ​​the sole like on Fast Finder and Sand's Worker models or packaged inside a pouch that is attached to the outer upper body of the shoe like on Mountain Walker model.
- power switch mounted to the back of the shoe. 


The battery rechargeable by wall current or Treasure Hunter signature power bank. A recharging jack is installed inside the shoe and has magnet port for easy charger cable connecting. 



            

          









 Fast Finder









Fast Finder is the first model of Treasure Hunter Metal Detector Shoes. This model has audio bluetooth to your headphones and speakers, which can be disabled. Wireless connecting distance is up to 10 meters. Fast Finder has waterproof design and equipped with a LiFePo4 rechargeable battery. Coin search depth – 20 cm. 









 This model is equipped with a LiFePo4 battery, a full charge lasts for 22 hours of Treasure Hunting.  Battery indicator on the shoe will let you know when you should charge it.  









 Sand's Worker









Sand’s Worker is the second model of Treasure Hunter Metal Detector Shoes. This model has BLE connection to your mobile phone, smart watch and headphones. Wireless connecting distance is up to 10 meters. Sand’s Worker has waterproof design and equipped with a LiFePo4 rechargeable battery. Coin search depth – 30 cm.









Like a Fast Finder, Sand’s Worker has equipped with a LiFePo4 battery, a full charge lasts for 12 hours of Treasure Hunting. 
A special feature of this model is Metal Detecting Shoes iOS and Android application that controls communication with shoes. With this mobile app you can connect your headphones and/or smart watch and get a target signal about the metal under your feet. Mobile app works in underground mode means no need to hold the phone in hands constantly. This is very useful when you don't want to attract attention of passersby.









 Mountain Walker









Mountain Walker is the third model of Treasure Hunter Metal Detector Shoes. This model has BLE connection to your mobile phone, smart watch and headphones. Wireless connecting distance is up to 10 meters. Mountain Walker has waterproof design and equipped with a LiFePo4 rechargeable battery. Coin search depth – 30 cm.









Like a Sand’s Worker, Mountain Walker has equipped with a LiFePo4 battery, a full charge lasts for 24 hours of Treasure Hunting, battery packaged inside a pouch that is attached to the outer upper body of the shoe to give the user opportunity to replace the batteries on the go for long lasting Treasure Hunting.  
Mountain Walker connects with Metal Detecting Shoes iOS and Android application with the same features as Sand’s Worker. Metal Detecting Shoes iOS and Android application controls communication with shoes. With this mobile app you can connect your headphones and/or smart watch and get a target signal about the metal under your feet. Mobile app works in underground mode means no need to hold the phone in hands constantly. This is very useful when you don't want to attract attention of passersby.
This hiking shoes are good for walking through woods, weald or in the mountains and can be the best friend to find gold nuggets or meteorites.



















Brain of metal detecting hardware in Sand’s Worker & Mountain Walker is an ESP32 module.  ESP32 is a low-power system on a chip microcontrollers with integrated Wi-Fi and dual-mode Bluetooth. The ESP32 employs a dual-core microprocessor. ESP32 is created and developed by Espressif Systems, a Shanghai-based Chinese company. This little assistant does all the calculations and transfers the data via Bluetooth Low Energy technology (BLE) to the phone device.









With all the efforts we have developed a metal detector PCB to assemble with ESP32 module. We spent hours in developing and selecting the right components for PCB.









After great work done, we are able to create a truly unique device and now it is ready to serve all treasure hunters in our Metal Detector Shoes.









Our main goal is to assemble the most reliable PCB, mount the correct components and reduce the size to fit into the sole of the shoe.  And we proud to archive!

















In such a specific device as Metal Detector Shoes, reliability and safety are essential. We have selected the most reliable and safe batteries available at the moment - LiFePO4. These batteries are very reliable and have a long service life of 2,000-12,000 charge / discharge cycles.


LiFePO4 (also known as Lithium Iron Phosphate) batteries are a huge improvement over lead acid in weight, capacity and shelf life. The LiFePO4 batteries are the safest type of Lithium batteries as they will not overheat, and even if punctured they will not catch on fire. The cathode material in LiFePO4 batteries is not hazardous, and so poses no negative health hazards or environmental hazards. Due to the oxygen being bonded tightly to the molecule, there is no danger of the battery erupting into flames like there is with Lithium-Ion. The chemistry is so stable that LiFePO4 batteries will accept a charge from a lead-acid configured battery charger. LiFePO4 life expectancy is approximately 5-7 years.


Lithium-Ion batteries and Lithium Polymer batteries are the most energy dense of the Lithium batteries, but they are lacking in safety. The most common type of Lithium-Ion is LiCoO2, or Lithium Cobalt Oxide. In this chemistry, the oxygen is not strongly bonded to the cobalt, so when the battery heats up, such as in rapid charging or discharging, or just heavy use, the battery can catch fire. To help counteract this problem, devices that use Lithium-Ion and Lithium Polymer batteries are required to have extremely sensitive and often expensive electronics to monitor them. While Lithium Ion batteries have an intrinsically high energy density, after one year of use the capacity of the Lithium Ion will have fallen so much that the LiFePO4 will have the same energy density, and after two years LiFePO4 will have significantly greater energy density. Another disadvantage of these types is that Cobalt can be hazardous, raising both health concerns and environmental disposal costs. The projected life of a Lithium-Ion battery is approximately 3 years from production.


Based on the research data, we decided to use the safe LiFePO4 rechargeable batteries.









The Fast Finder model is equipped with a magnetic charging cable that makes it easy to connect power to battery charging.









Treasure Hunter signature charger specially made for safe charging LiFePo4 battery to maximize battery life. 









 Like the Fast Finder model, Sand's Worker is equipped with a magnetic charging cable that makes it easy to connect power to battery charging.









And Treasure Hunter signature charger made for safe charging LiFePo4 battery to maximize battery life. 









Mountain Walker has equipped with a LiFePo4 batteries in charge case. Battery packaged inside a pouch that is attached to the outer upper body of the shoe so give user opportunity not only charge battery but also replace the batteries for faster back to Treasure Hunting.

















All Treasure Hunter Metal Detector Shoes models has Bluetooth connection functionality.  The Fast Finder model has Bluetooth 5.0 module to send audio sounds of detected items to your headphones. Sand's Worker & Mountain Walker have BLE 5.0 as using ESP32 in hardware to send data to mobile device.


The use of bluetooth technology in the treasure hunting opens up new opportunities, and with the Metal Detector Shoes we were able to make a product of high technological quality that allows the user to make daily activities and at the same time search for the treasures!

















 Sand's Worker and Mountain Walker models work with the Metal Detecting Shoes mobile application, available for iOS and Android. The microcomputer of the metal detector communicates via BLE with the mobile application and transmits all values and signals for detecting metal objects, the mobile application analyses the received data and display it on the screen.  You can easily connect bluetooth headphones and smart watches to your phone and track signals coming from sensitive detectors of shoes.  There is no need to hold the phone in your hands - the application works in the background mode, so you can simply close the application and hide the phone and you will still receive signals through your smartwatch or bluetooth headphones.









 We have developed the most convenient and intuitive application, there are no complicated settings in it - all settings of the coil and search modes are automatic and do not require any special actions from the user.  We are constantly working on app improvement and looking forward to receive comments and wishes from our fellow Treasure Hunters. 
































One of the obligatory features of our shoes is water resistance. This is especially important for beach treasure searches where you can get in the water at any time. 


Metal Detector Shoes have waterproof components and assembled the way its electronics and battery are totally protected. This allows the metal detecting shoes to be worn during rain or beach searches without fear to ruin the shoes.

















 Our shoes are strong, withstand the weight of their wearer and keep the internal components of the detector protected. We created and tested our Metal Detector Shoes for shock destruction. We have done hard work to develop the most stable and durable structure of the shoes. 


You can be confident in the durability of our shoes as evidenced by our warranty policy.




























This amazing stuff will be included in every Treasure Hunter's reward after we reach STRETCH GOALS. Please share our campaign on your social media to help us reach these goals!

















































 Currently you can find a huge number of metal detectors on the market, but there are no metal detector shoes! We are pleased to present our wonderful Metal Detector Shoe models to the whole world. Despite the fact we have no direct competitors, however hand-held metal detectors used by a huge number of people for treasure hunting around the world have certain similarities and purposes.  In the table below, you can find significant differences between handheld metal detectors and our metal detector shoes.









As can be seen from the table metal detector shoes have features which are not supported by classic metal detectors. Metal detector shoes:
- bluetooth connection with headphones and mobile app;
- safe LiFePo4 battery, service life up to 12,000 charge-discharge cycles;
- waterproof;
- lightweight;
- can be used for hidden treasure hunt.
And all this you get with a full-fledged metal detector for each foot at a competitive price.

































Hi, I'm Alex, and I've been always passionate about treasure hunting. Anyone who does feel the same way knows how difficult is to find the right equipment. When the idea of metal detector shoes came I've dedicated myself for developing the really good one, convenient and functional tool. For the last year, from idea to ready product started as hobby it grown to a project with promising future. For this year I spent hundreds of hours in prototyping and testing this amazing shoes and finally ready to bring it to you with the best possible quality and functionality.
If you have any questions please contact me at alex@treasurehuntershoes.com









Treasure Hunter's shoes sold within or outside of Singapore are covered by  Limited Lifetime Warranty (see details here: https://treasurehuntershoes.com/general-lifetime-limited-warranty/)


Treasure Hunter products have been manufactured under the highest standards of quality and workmanship. Treasure Hunter warrants to the original consumer purchaser for as long as the original consumer purchaser use their shoes (the “Warranty Period”), the metal detector shoes will work and detect metal, the battery will work properly and maintain a full charge when using the original charger.


We are Singapore based support team. Our working hours are from 9 am to 6 pm Monday to Friday, Singapore time, support@treasurehuntershoes.com






























































What is the shipping price?
Shipping price include in PLEDGE and will be NO additional fee for shipping rewards. We are working on getting the best deal for the shipping process to offer you the best way and fastest delivery times.
Are there taxes, duties and VAT?
Our price does not include any kind of fee imposed by your country. Those are regulated by the laws of each individual country, but we will do our best to minimize the additional cost.
description_risks:
Production Risks:

For over a year we have worked hard to create incredible treasure hunting shoes. We have developed software, firmware, design of the motherboard and shoes, conducted all possible tests and are completely ready for the mass production of the shoes for treasure hunting. The manufacturing process has been worked out and our facilities at this stage are ready to process and produce up to 300 pairs of shoes per month. Our agreements with the manufacturers of shoe parts, electrical components, batteries allow us to be sure of an immediate increase in production volumes up to 1,000 pairs of shoes per month if necessary.

Component Supply Risks:

We carefully select suppliers of spare parts for shoes, electrical components, batteries, have held numerous negotiations, visited factories and are confident in the reliability of our partners. However, we want to acknowledge the fact that unforeseen incidents such as power outages, delays in the delivery of any parts, delivery of wrong parts, malfunctioning of machines and tools can affect the time it takes us to create products according to the timeline.

Shipping Risks:

We have worked very hard to make the delivery process as smooth as possible, but forces outside our control may occur, resulting in a delay in delivery.
