blurb: Easy to use Icons for design lovers. Libraries for developers. All playfully crafted.
description: Easy to use Icons for design lovers. Libraries for developers. All playfully crafted.
name: Abbr: Shorten your development
title: Abbr: Shorten your development
Title: Abbr: Shorten your development
Description: Easy to use Icons for design lovers. Libraries for developers. All playfully crafted.
Link: Abbr: Shorten your developmentEasy to use Icons for design lovers. Libraries for developers. All playfully crafted.
description_story:
StoryWe are a small development studio who believes that IT should be affordable and simple. For close to a decade, we have worked primarily with smaller businesses and helped them improve their processes through custom B2B web-based solutions.
The current global pandemic has affected our clients who are mainly smaller, independent businesses, and that has inevitably impacted us. Like many others, we are trying to navigate a new way out through this crisis. Through this campaign, we wish to present our craft beyond our usual clientele and to anyone who works with media, even slideshows or a documents. 
Why Kickstarter and Why Back Now 
Even though we already have most of the libraries converted and ready, running a platform on servers is not a small sum. We need some funds to pay for the servers and professional services that we need.
The prices that we have now are only for this Kickstarter campaign. Prices will be set at higher rates, in USD when we do go 'live' if we are successful. Also, as our backer, you will be able to renew your subscription for another year at the same rate that you have backed. 
What we are planning to make
1. For designers or non-technical backers, we have included two icon rewards. Icons are always created in-house by our artists for our code projects, and we are now releasing them as a standalone library in this campaign. The icons will be available in SVG and PNG formats, so that you can use them in a range of applications. 
a. Icons Pack
For this campaign we will release a small standalone pack of 100 icons in SVG format for a small annual subscription. This final number will increase if icons are commissioned and/or stretch goals are met. You can use these icons in your website and your daily work (for more details, please see exporter demo at the bottom of this section, and license details in Terms below).  
Currently we have around 25 icons, which are largely technical now. We will send out a survey for you to vote for your preferred categories for the remaining icons, when the campaign ends successfully. 
See samples in image below:-




Preview of our Icons Pack







SVG files have the advantage of retaining its resolution even when resized, but they can be hard to use for non-technical users. Our Icons Pack subscription will include access to a convenient export tool (available after logging in) for you to export the SVG file into a more familiar PNG format, in your required color and dimensions. This eliminates the need for image editing software just to modify color, which is particularly useful for users not using the icons on a HTML file.
A working demo can be found here on the webpage:  SVG exporter demo  (Also read Risks & Challenges for exporter limitations)







You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play


































Replay with sound









Play with 
 sound












00:00


00:00




































b. Campaign Special - Commission an Icon
Maybe you own a small business and you want an icon depicting your logo or your flagship product. Or maybe you just need a set of icons for your latest presentation that finally looks different from everyone else. 
Here is a chance to get the exact icon that you have always needed but couldn't find. Tell us about the icon design and we will create it for you.
Your icon design will be added to the Icons Pack and released as part of the collection. The icon name will contain your initials, and your name will appear in the icon's page as its sponsor. (Also read Terms below, for more regarding icon requests)


******************* BONUS for crossing 15% (almost at 20%) ******************
All our backers now get access to a new, small code library - Switch Button, if our campaign ends successfully. (Working demo here:  Switch Button Demo )




The bonus Switch Button library





Don't worry if you have never used a library before. We will include code documentations (see The Libraries are documented section below) and simple tutorials. If you have always wanted to try creating a website, what better timing than now?
******************************************************************************
2. For the programmers, we are offering access to a collection of codes that we have built and fine-tuned over the years through the unique requirements of our clients. Without going through that same mill, these codes can now become a valuable asset in reducing your development efforts.
a. Basic UI Code Pack
Stylized basic form elements with validation. (Note: File Input is for local file selection, see <input type="file">) You can access the interactive menu here:  Interactive Menu for Basic Code Pack 







You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play


































Replay with sound









Play with 
 sound












00:00


00:00


































A plain summary of the above video here:




Library List in Basic UI Pack





b. UI+ Code Pack
Custom-built useful UX elements for the more advanced.




Library List in UI+ Pack





The libraries are..
1. Easy to Use
You can create a lean, professional-looking website even if you are a beginner. Include the library, add a class to the element and set the attributes. It's literally just 1,2,3.




Step by step on Date Picker











You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play


































Replay with sound









Play with 
 sound












00:00


00:00


































2. Extendable (for field validation)
If our standard validation criteria are not good enough, you can include an attribute that points to your custom function instead. An example use case will be checking if a username is already in use on your servers. Your custom function will override our validation methods. 




Overriding field validation with your custom function





The standard validation messages are also localizable through a separate file. You can see a demo here:  Speak your Language for standard validation messages 




Speak your Language for standard validation messages





3.  Documented
We have been working with clients with zero IT backgrounds. We understand that documentation (and communication) should be clear and engaging, instead of verbose.







You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play


































Replay with sound









Play with 
 sound












00:00


00:00


































4. And More..









Stretch Goals
This campaign is our first release, but we intend to keep updating or creating new expansion packs if proven viable. Here are our first stretch goals:
Stretch Goal #1 ( At $5,000 ): 

  Addition to UI+: Drop Selects 
  Addition to Icon Pack: +20 icons

Like the others, Drop Select is in use in our 'live' projects. Attached is how it looks like in its older iteration. 




Old version of Drop Select, subject to change







Other Information
Terms

  For Code Packs: One license is intended for one domain (sub-domains included) only. It's like you have engaged us to work on the javascript part of your project, minus the long development time.
  For Icon Packs: One license is tied to one individual. You can use it on your website or your presentations etc.

If you are a studio or freelancer who needs more licenses please let us know and we can design a reward for you. 
Important Note: Standard Software license's terms applies (e.g. non-exclusive, no warranty and not for resale on its own). By using our libraries, you agree to our terms of  use.

  For 'Commission an Icon: Backers can submit your icon(s) request once, with one allowed edit per icon. Icons will be drawn in our style (see samples above). Note that you risk forfeiture if you request for icons that are i) NSFW, ii) violent, suggestive, offensive or discriminatory, iii) not owned by you or trademarked by others e.g. logo of a business that you do not own. Like any Kickstarter reward, you do not own any exclusive rights to the icon(s), and we will include them in our codes and/or icons pack which we will sell. 'Commission an Icon' is purely for requesting an icon that might not exist in our icons pack otherwise. Also, note that an icon is a small graphic with only outlines, not an illustration - it should be legible within a 24 x 24px space. If a business logo: we do not design a new logo for you, but only convert your logo into an icon.

If in doubt, please contact us before you commit to a reward. We will be glad to clarify any queries.
Deliverables

  For code packs: Access to .js files in minified, obfuscated formats only. CSS files will be available in both minified and non-minified formats so that you can change the styling as required.
  For commission an icon: Your icon will be included in the Icon Pack, and we will include your initials in its name. Your name will also appear in the icon page, as its sponsor.
  For icon pack: The icon library will be provided in minified, obfuscated format. The icons are served primarily in SVG format on our site, and the PNG format will be made available for download via the exporter tool.
  All backers will be named in our thank you page (unless opted-out).

Subscription
Code Pack/Icons Pack rewards are termed as a 1 (one) year subscription. Subscriptions allow you to access any updates to your code/icon packs within a year. You can continue to use the libraries in your chosen domain/website, with the latest version you had downloaded before your subscription expires. For Icons Pack subscribers, access to the exporter tool is only available during your subscription period. You can still continue to use any image that you have downloaded during your subscription.
Timeline and schedule
All the listed libraries are used in live projects, in their respective older versions. For this campaign, we have cleaned up and written a new version of them in vanillajs, before the launch. However, we will still need to build a minimal portal for users to manage their subscriptions and access. This is projected to take approximately 2 (+/-1) months (with some buffer, in case).
Background Story
Why we began working on our own libraries
Like many developers, we used to work with free open source libraries. One fateful year, exactly when we were midway with a massive project, two frameworks we were using announced their major updates.
We tested the betas and the new frameworks will break all of the free libraries we were using. With the frameworks still in beta themselves, a library patch or update was not going to happen. We were then at the crossroads: continue with the version we were using and know we will be 'outdated' at launch, or adopt the new version. 
At the same time, there were several smaller issues nibbling us: libraries (from different sources) conflicted each other, codes were getting inflated because we were overriding or forcing in more modifications. The answer seemed clear.
description_risks:
All the libraries are in use in real projects. However, since it is our first time releasing a javascript library, there is a chance where the library does not fit perfectly in your existing framework. In such cases we will strive to resolve it as best as we can, after we have the minimum that we promised here delivered. It is also possible for a library to have logical bugs, which we will work on to fix once reported. The backer is able to download updated versions within their subscription period. Standard software license terms applies, including no warranty. Please do not use the libraries on live or critical projects without tests.

There is a also a small possibility that an interface is patented. While we try to do our best in our research, we do not have the resources to hire a patent agent to do this for us. In the event that a complaint is lodged, we will freeze the affected library while we work out an alternative.

All functions listed in both UI and UI+ have been tested on the major browsers: Chrome, Firefox and Safari. IE is not tested at the moment. Older browsers (e.g. IE7) are not supported. Development and testing was done in the Mac environment. Do test the libraries on your own development environment first before deployment.

The exporter tool will have a maximum file or dimension size limit, due to individual system limitations. It has been tested on Chrome, Firefox and Safari only and may not work on other browsers. If you need to export a large file for print etc., please consider using the SVG format instead.

description_story:
StoryHi! I am Alice (@alicehwyy) and this is my first Kickstarter project which I am excited to share with you! I have been obsessed with Genshin Impact and their characters and I really wanted to make pins of them! This campaign will help put these enamel pin designs into production! 
In addition to the initial goal, this project also has multiple stretch goals; the higher the funding, the more new characters will be unlocked.


★ About Kickstarter: When you pledge on Kickstarter, you'll not be charged right away, you will only be charged after the Kickstarter ends and only if the initial goal is met! If the campaign is unsuccessful, you will not be charged at all. You can upgrade, downgrade or cancel your pledge at any time before the campaign ends!


★ About Pledging: Pledging helps unlock designs! So if a design you want is still locked, don't wait for it to be unlocked and make your pledge to help unlock them! You can edit your pledge any time before the campaign ends.


★About Shipping: Shipping is NOT included in the tier pricing! Shipping will be calculated and charged via Backerkit AFTER the campaign is over based on your country. Please do not add any shipping costs to your pledge! Please see the shipping costs charts below for an estimate of the shipping costs. All shipping costs are inclusive of tracking!


★ About Backerkit: I will send out a Backerkit survey to collect your shipping address and the specific unlocked pins you want to choose. 



























































































































































This campaign will run for 3 weeks and then there is an additional 2 week period before I receive the fund from Kickstarter. Once the campaign is over, I'll send out surveys through Backerkit for everyone to choose their products and fill out shipping addresses (to make payment for shipping, please refer to the chart below for the shipping rates). You will have 1 week to fill out the survey and during this one week waiting period, the Backerkit preorder shop will also be available to everyone!
Once everyone has filled out the survey and I have a final count on the quantities I need to order, production for all the products will begin! Hard Enamel Pins production should take less than 2 months, factoring shipping time to me, I expect to receive them in April. Once I receive everything, I'll quality check, package, and start shipping everything out to you guys! Current estimated delivery is Apr to early May!
Please note that this is just a rough estimate of the timeline and that exact times may vary depending on number of backers, external situations and holidays, etc.



















★ If you have any more questions, please don't hesitate to leave a comment, or you can email me at alicehwyystore@gmail.com
description_risks:
1) Although the manufacturer has previously delivered great quality pins, there is a chance something may to go wrong in production and that may result in a delay in mailing of rewards as I get designs remade.

2) There will be some difference between the colors you see on screen and colors on the physical pin due to colors being different on monitors. The designs you see are mock ups so there may be slight changes to the design before manufacture due to practicality.

3) As there are a lot of designs, there is a chance the design you want may not be unlocked by the end of the campaign. Depending on the outcome, I will see if I can afford to fund any remaining designs myself and keep you updated through Kickstarter

description_story:
Story"Just to Let You Know" Cute Bunnies Card Set
Hello! I started this card series to raise awareness for mental health, and to celebrate Pride Month. Due to the Covid-19 lockdown in many countries, many people have found it excruciatingly difficult being cooped up at home. This is especially felt more so for those who might face mental issues, such as depression and anxiety.
I wanted something cute to brighten up the day and cheer people onwards, hence the bunnies and all of colours of the rainbow leading up to a full rainbow. The message I wanted to send across, along with the title "Just so you know" could point to many different things. For me, I want to let you know that I care, that I am here to listen to you. I hear you, and I want you to know that step by step, you'll eventually be able to reach the rainbow. I hope you'll be able to smile like the bunnies in the card!
Follow me on instagram @evoaml for more designs!

blurb: An exhibition co-curated by Xuan and Sheryl, coming to fruition in August 2022, hosted by starch.
description: An exhibition co-curated by Xuan and Sheryl, coming to fruition in August 2022, hosted by starch.
name: THRESHOLDS OF BEING
title: THRESHOLDS OF BEING
Title: THRESHOLDS OF BEING
Description: An exhibition co-curated by Xuan and Sheryl, coming to fruition in August 2022, hosted by starch.
Link: THRESHOLDS OF BEINGAn exhibition co-curated by Xuan and Sheryl, coming to fruition in August 2022, hosted by starch.
description_story:
Story





Thresholds of Being official poster







“The poet speaks on the threshold of being,” observes philosopher Gaston Bachelard in The Poetics of Space. So too does the artist. 


Our exhibition, Thresholds of Being, stages a meditative inquiry into what it means to be caught in the indeterminate spaces between established structures of thought, feeling, and experience. What is the poetic and artistic imagination? What happens when the artist stands in the liminal spaces between the familiar and alien, the known and the unknown?


❁❁❁❁❁❁❁❁❁❁❁❁


In 2018, Xuan and Sheryl saw (and recognised) that each other’s works were, for all their differences, curiously complementary. The seeds of the show were sown a long way back, when Mr Ivan Ng and Mr Chia Wei Hou were our A-Level teachers; they encouraged us to show our works together, and we met for the first time in 2019 to try to make this possible.
However, being 6747 miles apart, and going through a global pandemic threw a spanner in the works, and having our works held in such uncertainty drew a lot of fear. Eventually, in 2021, we finally managed to find a space that would be willing to take us in. Walking around the empty room, somehow we, and our works, felt lonely, holding a space that could accommodate so much more. How could we expand ourselves, so that the themes and sensibilities that we were so interested in might come into view more meaningfully?
We decided to reach out to other artists who we knew, and whose practices had left an impression on us, to see if they had works which dealt with a similar sense of being caught between things — of needing to speak, without words, in the gaps between established structures of thought, feeling, and experience.




Sheryl Gwee, Earth Sky (2018). Projection, bowls, mirrors.





The works we have encountered embody this quality of suspension between defined binaries. Xuan’s ma (妈) and Celine’s birth life death rebirth probe the porous boundaries between life and death, while Elizabeth’s animations and Joel’s paintings evoke dreamlike states of consciousness where everyday realities dissolve into a sense of the sublime. In A Brief Moment Of and Untitled (12:34), Angelica and Ker Wey grapple with the experience of time, which renders all things transitory. Even matter, in one of its most substantial forms — ceramics — takes on an ambiguous, almost nebulous quality of in-betweenness in Sheryl’s installation, Contain. Anya’s work destabilises the lines between the natural and the spiritual, inviting viewers to stand on the threshold between the material and the immaterial.







You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play


































Replay with sound









Play with 
 sound












00:00


00:00


































❁❁❁❁❁❁❁❁❁❁❁❁




Yeo Xuan, Ma (2018). Projection on ginger tea, ginger oil, and fish tank.





This is the first time that the both of us are curating and organising an exhibition and we’re excited to present some really impressive work at starch, an independent artist-run space in Singapore. For some of us, it will be our first show back home after interacting in educational spaces beyond Singapore, as well as an avenue to give back to home, and it means a lot to us to be able to make this happen. We are all young, emerging artists and your support will go a long way in bringing our practices to light. We’re hoping to give a token of appreciation to starch too, as the space has provided us with lots of resources, and is an important venue in Singapore for new and experimental work beyond state-run arts institutions.


❁❁❁❁❁❁❁❁❁❁❁❁


The successful funding of our show will contribute to these specific costs;

  Printing costs (exhibition handouts, catalogue, posters, postcards) - 25%
  Artist’s fee: Profits from sale of extra catalogues, posters and postcards during the duration of the exhibition will also go to artists - 30% 
  Donation to starch - 11%
  Food for the artists and the opening reception - 6%
  Miscellaneous costs (eg. repairing equipment, patching walls, Instagram Ads) - 15%
  Kickstarter/payment processing fee - 10%
  Buffer costs - 3%

Orders may not be completed by the opening night, especially with catalogues, but we will expect them to be completed by the end of the show month.

description_story:
Story























Our goal at MILÉNEAL  (mi·lɛ nēəl) is to be a new and emerging brand of watches catering to an exclusive niche - the young and dynamic working class mainly comprised of millennials. Our design is an emphasis of a stylish combination of comfort, quality and versatility. We want to provide a solution to the millennials to own a timepiece that is of good quality, design & style. Saving up for an overpriced luxury watch would take a while, but time waits for nobody. At Mileneal, we believe the time is now.























 The Majestic Ocean Blue | A design inspired by the ocean's blue waters







 The Luminous Aurora Green | A design inspired by the northern lights phenomenon









The Winter Silver | A design inspired by one of the four seasons.























Inspired By Nature
 The Prestige is a piece inspired by nature - The Majestic Blue of the Deep Oceans & The Luminous Green of The Northern Lights. In order to re-create the breathtaking beauty of these two wondrous phenomenons on a timepiece, we came down to the idea of fume dials. Fume dials are not new and have already been seen in some luxury brands such as H. Moser & Cie. These dials are created using a method of multiple-layer paint application in order to achieve a smooth and beautiful gradient. Coupled with a "sunray" pattern, we were able to create a face that captures light at different angles, mimicking the changing glows seen in both natural phenomenons








With the idea in mind, we started of with a rough sketch and then transitioning into a 3D wireframe.









After which, we had the construction drawing drafted and started making samples out of it.

















 For each sample, we have our team wear it over a course of 6 months to see how it fairs over time.







 And over the course of 6 months, we noted areas which need to be improved or modified. 








With these, we went through a few revisions until we were finally satisfied with the outcome.















                             

























































Since day 1 MILÉNEAL was created, our intent was to introduce quality watches made accessible to everyone. The Prestige's case is made of 316L Surgical Grade Stainless Steel, making it resistant to corrosion over time. In the heart of the watch, two options will be given - Swiss Ronda Quartz / Miyota Automatic. Both movements have been used extensively in the watch making industry and have proven reliability. Meanwhile, the watch face will be protected by a Sapphire Coated K1 Crystal with a raised dome shape, giving the watch much organic touch, very much like that of the nature phenomenons. 









Specifications

Movement: Miyota 9015 (Automatic) OR Ronda 705 (Quartz)

Case: 316L Staineless Steel

Case Finish: Polished Bezel + Brushed Body

Watch Face: Fumé Dial With Sunburst Pattern

Lens: Sapphire Coated K1 Hardened Mineral

Caseback: Mineral Glass (Automatic); Etched 316 SS (Quartz)

Water Resistance: 5 ATM

Straps: Full Grain Leather With Emboss Croc Pattern

Others: Quick-release pin for strap change
Dimensions

Case diameter: 40 mm 

Case diameter with crown: 43 mm 

Case depth: 11.25 mm 

Lug (band) width: 20 mm 

Lug-to-lug: 47 mm













Glass caseback for Automatic | Etched caseback for Quartz













Here's a detailed breakdown of our reward. For an upgrade from quartz to automatic, just add S$ 137 (US$ 100) to your pledge for each watch.









 All possible combinations..





















































































We will also be rewarding our first 50 backers with a premium card holder. This card holder is made out of high quality full grain leather, coupled with exceptional stitching works and finished with a smooth burnishing on the edges! Just be one of the first 50 to back any of the above rewards!If you're not one of the 50, you can also opt to pledge an additional S$20 (US$15) to add a card holder to your rewards.






You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.

 The Prestige watch will be packaged in a sleek black leather box, enclosed in a hard cardbox. 

































































Each watch will come with its own certificate of authenticity.











 Unlock the Milanese mesh straps by helping us reach S$45,000 stretch goal! Once we achieve a funding of the said amount, you would get to choose these amazing looking stainless steel mesh straps as your preferred watch band!















After the end of our campaign, we will be collecting your details and production will start in November 2018. All rewards will be shipped out early February 2019















































































 At MILENEAL, we strive to create products of good quality at competitive prices. With that said, our future plan is to introduce more line of products while at the same time improving on our process and quality.Videography by:

In order to minimize such unforeseen hiccups, we have worked closely with our manufacturer to ensure the product is ready to be mass produced. We will also work around the clock to ensure everything goes according to our plan and schedule.

description_story:
Story


FLORENCE BIENNALE






BLUE SPIRIT, 74 cm x 51 cm , gouage on stretched linen on canvas





     


WAITING BEHIND GLASS ,122 cm x 92 cm ,oil on canvas.





SHOWCASING MY PAINTINGS AT THE FLORENCE BIENNALE INTERNATIONAL ART EXHIBITION - NOV 30TH- DEC 8TH. 2013 ,FORTEZZA DA BASSO,FLORENCE,ITALYTHE FLORENCE BIENNALE IS ONE OF THE FEW INTERNATIONAL ART EVENTS STRUCTURED AS A SELF FINANCING INDEPENDENT PLATFORM FOR CONTEMPORARY ART.ONLY THREE TO FOUR HUNDRED  ARTISTS WORLD WIDE ARE SELECTED FOR THIS BIENNALE FROM A PANEL OF INTERNATIONAL ART CRITICS,ART HISTORIANS  AND ART CURATORS .AS WELL AS BEING AN IMPORTANT ART EVENT IT IS ALSO A CULTURAL EVENT WHERE THE ARTISTS  REPRESENT THEIR  COUNTRIES AND IT TAKES PLACE  ONLY EVERY TWO YEARS.I WILL BE REPRESENTING BOTH SCOTLAND ,UK AND SINGAPORE.THE FUNDING REQUIRED IS TO PRODUCE,TRANSPORT THE ARTWORKS FROM SINGAPORE TO FLORENCE,TO DISPLAY THE ARTWORKS AT THE FLORENCE BIENNALE,THE COSTS FOR ME TO ATTEND THE EXHIBITION FOR TWO WEEKS,ALLOWING TIME FOR SETTING UP AND TAKING DOWN ARTWORKS .THIS INCLUDES TRAVEL COST FROM SINGAPORE TO FLORENCE PLUS SUBSISTENCE WHILE THERE.,AND ACCOMMODATION  , ALSO FRAMING OF ARTWORKS,INSURANCE OF ARTWORKS,DESIGN 20,000 BROCHURES AND BUSINESS CARDS .TO GIVE OUT TO AROUND 20,000 VISITORS AT EVENT,MARKETING  AND ADMINISTRATIVE  FEES ,TO VIDEO AND PHOTOGRAPH THE EVENT, INSTALLATION AND DE-INSTALLATION OF ARTWORKS AND THE PARTICIPATION FEES.IN THE EVENT OF OVER FUNDING I WILL USE THE MONEY FOR A HOME COMING EXHIBITION AFTER THE BIENNALE.THE PAINTINGS ARE COMPLETE, PARTICIPATION FEES HAVE BEEN PAID. I HAVE TAKEN ALL THE NECESSARY STEPS TO MAKE SURE EVERYTHING IS COMPLETED ON TIME .THE REST OF THE STAGES REQUIRES FUNDING SO I NEED YOUR HELP TO MAKE MY PARTICIPATION IN THE FLORENCE BIENNALE A REALITY.PARTICIPATING IN THIS EVENT IS A GREAT HONOR AND A FANTASTIC OPPORTUNITY THAT WILL OPEN  LOTS OF  DOORS GIVING ME IMMENSE INTERNATIONAL EXPOSURE. IT WILL PUT ME IN A GREAT POSITION TO SELL MY PAINTINGS TO IMPORTANT ART BUYERS HAVING  DIRECT CONTACT AT THE BIENNALE,TO RECEIVE INVITATIONS FOR GALLERY REPRESENTATION BEING IN  DIRECT CONTACT WITH IMPORTANT ART DEALERS AND GALLERIES THERE AND OF COURSE THE HUGE  INTERNATIONAL PUBLICITY THAT THIS EVENT ATTRACTS WILL CHANGE  MY STATUS AS AN ARTIST  PLACING ME ON THE INTERNATIONAL ART PLATFORM.THIS WILL BE A HUGE MILESTONE IN MY CAREER AND A TREMENDOUS TURNING POINT IN MY LIFE. I HOPE YOU JOIN ME ON THIS JOURNEY. I AM VERY GRATEFUL  FOR YOUR GENEROUS CONTRIBUTIONSAND THANK YOU FOR YOUR  KIND HELP AND SUPPORT.PLEASE CLICK ON THE FLORENCE BIENNALE WEBSITE BELOW TO GET A FULL APPRECIATION  OF THE IMPORTANCE OF THIS EVENT AND MORE INFO ABOUT ME ON MY WEBSITES HERE. TO SEE MY OFFICIAL PARTICIPATION IN THE FLORENCE BIENNALE SEE PARTICIPATING ARTISTS  ON THE FLORENCE BIENNALE WEBSITE BELOW.www.florencebiennale.orgwww.magietraynor.comhttp://magietraynor.virtualgallery.comhttp://www.linkedin.com/pubmagietraynor/39/8a6/98http://unitedstatesbiennaleartists.ning.com/magietraynor

I HAVE TAKEN ALL THE NECESSARY  STEPS TO MAKE SURE THAT EVERYTHING IS COMPLETED ON TIME.
 
THERE HAS BEEN MANY OBSTACLES ALONG THE WAY INCLUDING A REJECTION ON AN ART GRANT.
I HAVE BEEN WORKING ON THIS PROJECT FOR THE LAST 4 MONTHS.
I HAVE TAKEN A BIG FINANCIAL RISK ON THIS PROJECT.

   THE  BIGGEST CHALLENGE, IS THAT I HAVE ALREADY  PAYED THE PARTICIPATION FEES,WHICH CANNOT BE REFUNDED AND IF THE FUNDS ARE NOT RAISED I WILL NOT BE ABLE TO PARTICIPATE AS IT IS A REQUIREMENT OF THE BIENNALE THAT I MUST  BE THERE TO ACCOMPANY MY ART .
WITH YOUR GENEROUS CONTRIBUTIONS WE CAN MAKE IT HAPPEN.

name: Debtzilla | Secret Identity Superhero Board Game
title: Debtzilla | Secret Identity Superhero Board Game
Title: Debtzilla | Secret Identity Superhero Board Game
Description: Play as Superheroes with a secret civilian identity in a quest to save the world by monsters of mass destruction! +Commission
Link: Debtzilla | Secret Identity Superhero Board GamePlay as Superheroes with a secret civilian identity in a quest to save the world by monsters of mass destruction! +Commission
description_story:
StoryWe are exploring if we should manufacture Debtzilla miniatures as a project add-on. Backers, please visit https://www.wongamania.com/poll to vote on the poll and indicate your interest!

 







Our Current Stretch Goal!





 Have you ever wanted to be a seemingly ordinary person with a superhero secret identity, just like what you see in a superhero movie?Now you can enjoy the that experience on a revolutionary superhero board game!







Debtzilla is a 2 - 4 player, cooperative superhero board game that puts you in the nation of Banana Republic, where the incompetent and corrupt government has unleashed a wave of crime and lawlessness. You play as an ordinary citizen with a superhero secret identity, working with other superheroes to patrol the streets at night and battling villains. Debtzilla awaits you and your team as the final boss at the end of the game and defeat him before he can destroy Banana Republic.You and your team  must learn to manage both your ordinary citizen and secret superhero identities well, in order for you to beat this challenging and addictive superhero boardgame.

Can you save the world from Debtzilla before it's too late?   






 







 









   Game Specifications
 
Board game for 2 to 4 players 

Plays between 60 - 90 mins


Ages 14 and up (Family mode: Ages 8 and up)

Cooperative simultaneous gameplay

Variable character powers 

Deck building mechanism 
Dice battle, dice manipulation and dice placement









 







 







Man vs Meeples produced a concise 15 mins walk-through of Debtzilla. Check out the video for a quick understanding on how Debtzilla works. 


For an in-depth walkthrough of the game, check out the 30 mins game walkthrough by Undead Vikings on how to play Debtzilla. 


Debtzilla is a fun cooperative Superhero board game where players have to work together to achieve victory over Debtzilla and its villains. To achieve victory, players must power up their heroes and defeat all the villains and confront Debtzilla as the final boss before Debtzilla grows too powerful and initiates the Debt Apocalypse or when all the citizens are bankrupted. Each superhero has a different playing style and hero synergies are important in beating the game.







A turn is played over the following PHASES:







The key to winning the game is to find the balance between powering up your heroes and preventing Debtzilla from becoming too strong:
 
Powering up your heroes too quickly by over borrowing money to buy gadgets will allow you to defeat Villains quickly and prevent citizen bankruptcy. However, your borrowings will grow Debtzilla's power more, speeding up Debt Apocalypse.
Powering up your heroes too slowly by saving money conservatively will allow villains to run rampant and bankrupt too many citizens, leading to defeat as Debtzilla will quickly wipe out the few surviving citizens   


To win the game, all heroes are to work as a team and take on the below duties to maximize the chance of killing the ultimate boss - Debtzilla :   

Early Game hero - Borrows money aggressively and buy gadgets early to prevent villains from running rampant.
 

Late Game hero - Starts slow but build up a strong cashflow to buy powerful Gadgets to take out difficult villains and Debtzilla later in the game.


Support hero - Focuses on slowing down Debtzilla by paying down debt and buying team support gadgets. Generally weak during fights. 

Specialist hero - Specializes in clearing difficult villains with weak points such as "0" and "7" that is outside of the normal dice range.


Once you have taken out Debtzilla, challenge a even more difficult boss: Instead of debt, Inflationsaurus feeds on luxury spendings and team discipline is key in defeating it.







 







 


 







                                                    







  







 



 









 


  







 


 







 


 







 


 







 


 







 








 


 







  







 

 







 







Debtzilla was initially conceptualized during our design of Wongamania: Banana Economy. At that point of time, we wanted to present the 2007 financial debt crisis in a more creative manner and we got our inspiration from Godzilla. Godzilla is a fearsome Kaiju that feeds on nuclear power and is a force that destroys both friends and foes. Debt has the same double edged sword effect as nuclear power and hence Debtzilla is born as a representation of the destructive power of the growing debt problem around the world.Debtzilla, was well received after Wongamania: Banana Economy is launched and many people asked us, "Why is Debtzilla only represented by a card in the game? We want to fight Debtzilla!" Hence the idea of turning Debtzilla into a standalone board game was conceived. At that point of time, there was a lot of discussion about Spiderman as a result of the reintroduction of the character back into the Marvel universe. We were inspired by the struggles of Peter Parker as a financially strapped young man, trying to juggle between school work, part time jobs and vigilante activities. That's when the key design concept of Debtzilla was born: Players get to role play as a secret identity superheros dealing with problems as a salaryman and as a vigilante. And if that's not bad enough, we have Debtzilla as the final boss lurking in the background feeding on the very financial woes of the superheroes. We shared the theme and concept with many people and the idea received universal thumbs up and hence, Project Debtzilla is born.... Check out our designer diary and find out more about the design and production process of Debtzilla!    







 Are you in Singapore? Interested backers can check out our 'live funding' booth at the We The People Store at Millenia Walk, Level 2. You will get a first-hand experience of the game. 









Xeo Lye is the lead developer behind the games produced by Capital Gains Studio. Previously, he spent a decade in the financial world managing money, authoring financial books & blogs and giving public talks.Andy Choo is a top comic artist in Singapore and pokes fun at some of the social issues and weird quirks of Singaporeans, helping people to laugh at some of the silly things that they do.

 Alan Bay is an illustrator and comic artist from Singapore and has worked on video game titles like Dynasty Warriors and Ghost Recon previously. Latest projects include own titles ChewyToon and Atlas Realm, available on Webtoons and Tapastics.

 Chin Kee Yong is a design and art student at the National Technological University of Singapore who is passionate about games.

 Wong Chunxi

 has been drawing stuff since young. Aspiring writer, creator, artist, and full time dreamer. Likes computer gaming and painting miniatures, and getting inspired by others."Video Animation: Regina Lai

 Consultant: Eddie Ching









This project is US-Friendly and EU-Friendly, and therefore no additional charges or fees will apply due to taxes or customs. If you do come across issues on tax and custom fees, do drop us an email and we will take care of it. We apologize that we are unable to extend the shipping friendly status to Australia and Canada, but if you have a solution for us to help our backers from these two regions, please drop us a message.Debtzilla will weigh around 1.5 kilos and Capital Gains Studio will be subsidizing a large portion of the shipping as a promotion for our campaign.We also reserve the right to decline any shipping to countries with an active armed conflict or a country with a high chance of non-delivery. We will refund any pledges made in this case after a review with our logistics partners.The expected delivery date of Debtzilla is August 2018.
description_risks:
Debtzilla is our 4th game and our 2nd Kickstarter campaign. By now, our team has a solid grasp on the process of designing, developing, manufacturing and delivering a high quality tabletop game. When it comes to a project like this, there are always certain risks regarding production and delivery that are beyond our control and may cause delays. That said, the Aug 2018 delivery deadline is a safe estimation that we are confident we can keep.

As with any foreign production/logistics, we may still be faced with unforeseen circumstances such as manufacturing and shipment delays or errors. If we were to meet with an issue, we promise to keep everyone updated and will share details of the problems and our solutions. Check out our previous campaign on the kind of communication you can expect due to any manufacturing issues or shipping delays. If you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact us at info@capitalgainsgroup.com. Thank you.

Thank you in advance for believing in us and supporting Debtzilla!

name: Fluorescent Dice
title: Fluorescent Dice
Title: Fluorescent Dice
Description: Fluorescent polyhedral dice set made by hand.
Link: Fluorescent DiceFluorescent polyhedral dice set made by hand.
description_story:
StoryWe are glad to introduce our new dice project - Fluorescent Dice. These dice series are using fluorescent materials in combination with glitters.

 











Each polyhedral set includes seven pieces: d4, d6, d8, d10, d%, d12, and d20. There is only one design available at the moment. They can be used for Table RPG games, or as an upgrade of other board games.

















At the same time, it is highly appreciated if you can share about our project with friends, online groups or the local community. We are manufacturing the dice in parallel. Once the campaign is over, hopefully, we can ship the dice immediately. 



































Shipping
Dice ship directly from the factory to your doormat, still hot!
Shipping will be charged in the pledge manager after the campaign based on how many you buy and where you live. The estimated cost for the first set of dice is 6 USD. For each subsequent set is 2 USD.
The estimated ship date is May 2021. We will keep the backers updated with the shipping status.









New to Kickstarter?
Just follow the steps below to become a backer:

  Step 1. Choose the reward level you want to back at the right side of this page.
  Step 2. Fill in all the necessary information about you, especially the address you want the dices to mail to.
  Step 3. Click the "pledge" button on the page! Just wait for the Fluorescent Dices!










Why are we doing crowdfunding?
Kickstarting will help us exposed the dice to lovers, to understand what they like and what they want. It is a direct communication channel where we can get first-hand message. More importantly, the funding result gives us an idea of how many to produce.
When the fund is collected, we are going to use them for manufacturing: raw material purchasing and cover man-hours. We already have the existing mold cast. So our colleagues will pour the resin inside the molds. After cooling, taking them out and polish them. After polishing, we will paint the numbers by hand. This takes a lot of effort and cannot be automated. So your kindly support is highly appreciated.








Manufactured by NANJIAN Games

Warning
This warning is found from Dispel Dice. We found it applies to our project as well.


Despite what you may read about the dice on the internet, they are in fact, inedible. These dice are not meant for children or to be ingested. Please keep them away from pets, children, feet and mouths. Failure to do so could result in injury or death.
description_risks:
In order for the dice to fluorescent, one may expose the dice under light for a while to "charge".

Due to COVID-19, the delivery might face unpredictable challenges. We are trying our best with fulfillment partners to eliminate the potential risks.

VAT TAXES, IMPORT FEES, CUSTOMS FEES, & DUTIES ARE NOT INCLUDED. Backers in certain regions might encounter such taxes and fees.

Pip & Jo : Organic Childrenswear for Little SeedlingsAn organic childrenswear brand with OEKO-Tex 100 certified eco-friendly reactive dyes.
Comfortable. Stylish. Sustainable.
description_story:
Story





You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play


































Replay with sound









Play with 
 sound












00:00


00:00


































Pip&Jo is a Singaporean children’s wear brand. We commit to producing the highest quality organic childrenswear that provides the best comfort and is harmless to the child’s health and environment. 


We offer gender-neutral clothing for newborns up to children of four years old. A minimalist design is incorporated with fresh, playful prints and colors. Each collection is designed to be comfortable, sustainable, and stylish. 


The brand name Pip&Jo came from the term ‘Pip’ defined as ‘seeds’ and ‘Jo’ that is taken from the word ‘joy’. The ‘Pip’ also represents the brand’s commitment in using organic and natural materials. With this, the brand would like to give the best joy to the little growing seeds.









Pip&Jo's goal in creating Kickstarter is to raise funds for us to do more research on the sustainable childrenswear market and finding more ethical and sustainable materials and production processes. It has been challenging to find a manufacturer in Indonesia and Singapore that supply GOTS organic cotton with the same commitment to quality, sustainability and transparency. Thus, the funds earned will also be used to find more ethical and sustainable materials and manufacturers. We hope to bring this brand to life in the near future. Every dollar earned from this campaign is bringing Pip&Jo closer to achieving its dream.


This crowdfunding project will also be supporting and helping little friends who are less fortunate. We will be donating to MILK Fund, a Singapore-based non-profit organization, to provide our little friends with medical treatment, educational support, and other special needs.









Pip&Jo was developed by Audrey Clarissa, an International Fashion Business student in Singapore. The thought of creating a childrenswear brand started when I noticed that my younger cousins and nephews have sensitive skin and get rashes easily. I began to have an interest in the childrenswear market and decided to use the idea to create a brand for my Bachelor's Degree final project. I carried out research on suitable materials and also the market demand. The results pointed to organic cotton materials that are designed into fashionable and comfortable children's clothing. 


Thus, Pip&Jo is created with the idea to bring comfortable and playful clothing children can grow in. 









Pip&Jo aims to be Singapore's leading children's wear brand that can bring happiness to the little loved ones. Pip&Jo is dedicated to produce and offer the finest quality children's wear by using organic and natural materials that provide the best comfort and are harmless to the child’s health and the environment. Our products are made of organic cotton fabric that is hypoallergenic and breathable. It is also printed and dyed with eco-friendly dyes that are OEKO-Tex Standard 100 certified, which ensures textiles are safe from harmful substances and environmentally friendly. Eco-friendly dyes use less water in the process which only requires 10% of water compared to traditional dyes.


Additionally, Pip&Jo also commits to being socially responsible and will be sharing our happiness with those who are less fortunate by donating to MILK Fund (Mainly I Love Kids Fund). MILK Fund is a Singapore based non-profit organization that supports children from low-income families suffering from medical issues and special needs. The organization assists with educational support and medical treatments.
description_risks:
The most challenging factor of this project is to find suppliers and manufacturers with GOTS certified organic cotton that meet Pip&Jo's sustainability criteria, with a low minimum order quantity. Our aim is to find suppliers and manufacturers who are local or near Singapore to fit the brand's expected production cost. 

As for this campaign, there will be several risks and challenges. There is a chance of unexpected delays in production and shipping. The prints and colors of the garments may be slightly different from the images due to lighting and editing. We are also still adjusting and the colors that have a similar tone with Pip&Jo's color palette. 

For those who pledged S$85 or S$100, please make sure to order the right size that will fit for a month later.

name: Last Empire - Silver/Gold Poker Playing Cards

Link: Last Empire - Silver/Gold Poker Playing CardsSilver/Gold poker playing cards featuring uniquely designed artworks inspired by renowned individuals of different civilizations
description_story:
StoryFor more recent updates: https://www.facebook.com/lastempirecard/We are the duo team designers behind the Last Empire Project. We are Albert & Owen, a team of landscape architecture design students embarking on our journey to design, create and realize our very first crowdfunding project on kickstarter.
Last Empire took months to be complete as we wanted to express our skill in design and imagination in the best possible way for our first kickstarter.







Besides creating a deck that is visually stunning, We also aim to create a deck of cards that features the histories of mankind and civilizations to give each card its' own character and personality. Bringing the game of poker to the next level.







Last Empire is an art and history driven concept that contains a set of 52-poker cards in each deck, featuring four vastly different civilizations that are Rome, Persia, China and Britons. All of which are represented by renowned and notable kings, queens and warriors of their own respective civilizations in the form of a monochromatic design. Using the hierarchy of shapes and patterns we aim to create interesting visuals that enhances the character and presence of each card. Our cards will be printed on silver / gold base colored cards. Some of the samples can be seen in the image below. (Cards printed are all WJPCC approved cards)


Preview of The Cards













Last Empire is simply more than just another deck of poker cards. Every card is specially designed individually by us and features different characters, history and culture.

Each poker card suit (Spade, Hearts, Clubs, Diamonds) features a different civilization. The spade features the Britons, the diamond features Rome, the Jack features the Chinese while the hearts features the Persians.







Each character has its' own personalized story that are based on historical records as close as possible which will also featured in the fold-up pamphlets that is part of the stretch goals.


Sample of Silver Cards








Sample of Gold Cards








Left; Original Box. Right; Upgraded Box





On the left features the original intended box design. While on the right side features an upgraded version for the box that we will be switching to once we hit the stretch goal of US$7,000.


Original Box Design








Upgraded Box Design





Our box is specially designed to bring off the idea and essence of medieval warfare which is in-tune with our design concept for all our card designs. The inspiration for the box design stems from the idea and arrangement of chess pieces for the back cover. While the design for the front is inspired by the designs of war banners most notably the Briton war banners.


Left; Custom Seal. Right; Last Empire Coin





 Items shown above may still change according to feedback







Cant wait to make this deck a reality? Click "back this project" on the right, and select a reward tier!








At the end of the successful campaign, you will received an update from us regarding the delivery.We also do delivery through Fedex, DHL, TNT, UPS and Singpost !









US$6,000 (LOCKED) - CUSTOM SEALS FOR ALL DECKSConversion rate : USD$6,000 = SGD$7,800 -A uniquely designed customized
 seal on the opening of every deck to keep your cards tight and secure.US$7,000 (LOCKED) - UPGRADED BOX FOR ALL DECKSConversion rate : USD$7,000 = S$9,100-All deck's box will be upgraded to the brown and black box design featured above.US$8,000 (LOCKED) - CHARACTER PROLOGUE FOR ALL DECKSConversion rate : USD$8,000 = SGD$10,500- All decks will include a fold up pamphlet of the characters featured in the Last Empire Deck. Featuring artworks and lore behind every character.U$10,000 (LOCKED) - SPECIAL GOLD EDITION LAST EMPIRE CARDConversion rate: USD$8,000 = SGD$13,100-All decks will be issued one specially designed golden certificate of authenticity card together with the Last Empire deck.
description_risks:
The Last Empire deck have been in the works for months. The reason why it took so long to complete is because we wanted to have everything from the designs to the production all thought out of before looking to crowdfund our first product.

Possible challenges that we may face along the way are the delivery of cards and the printing quality for each card. There is always a possibility of delay of the delivery date due to unforeseeable and foreseeable circumstances such as printing and packaging delay by the manufacturer which are out of our control. However, these are all minor issues as the product will still be sent to the backers once received regardless of delay. As for the printing quality for each card, it will be resolved by us requesting for a sample deck before production to assure that the cards are up to quality for using and selecting the right company to process and print out the cards.

blurb: A monumental (Genesis) story that adopted in playing cards; the RADIANT TREASURES that we believe should be a piece of everyone’s life.
description: A monumental (Genesis) story that adopted in playing cards; the RADIANT TREASURES that we believe should be a piece of everyone’s life.
name: The Origin (3D GENESIS) Playing Cards
title: The Origin (3D GENESIS) Playing Cards
Title: The Origin (3D GENESIS) Playing Cards
Description: A monumental (Genesis) story that adopted in playing cards; the RADIANT TREASURES that we believe should be a piece of everyone’s life.
Link: The Origin (3D GENESIS) Playing CardsA monumental (Genesis) story that adopted in playing cards; the RADIANT TREASURES that we believe should be a piece of everyone’s life.
description_story:
Story





















50K Stretch Goal Unlocked! Say hello to Romance Edition
















Limited Edition. Only 520 deck will be made.








Romance Edition Back Design








Rose Gold Single 3D Cuts ( Adam & Eve )  +  Crystal Case 













$170K NEW STRETCH GOAL!!
We want to make the Deluxe Edition even greater! Don't get us wrong. The current Deluxe Edition is really good, but it can be greater.  How about each deck from the Deluxe Edition has different Aces of Spades?
By reaching USD 170K, we would produce Deluxe Edition in 3 different aces.  Truly outstanding premium playing cards set you can own. Different 3D cuts, color gilding, and aces.




Perfect Canvas to display the beauty of "Genesis."





This Kickstarter campaign aims to bring the beauty of Genesis into everyone's life through Austin's illustration. We chose Playing Cards & 3D Paper Cut Art as the medium.


Three options: Collector, Deluxe & Special Edition




Three options for the deck: Collector, Deluxe & Special Edition.





The Origin Family




Olympians matches & harmonizes perfectly with the Collector & Special Edition





 THE ORIGIN PLAYING CARDS DESIGN




















            

          




Comparison Table - Collector & Deluxe Edition







Collector Edition (1 deck)




Collector Edition





The Collector Edition is the soul of "The Origin." It inherited the Olympians tuck case design, the book-style that holds stories through art. When you open it, you will be welcomed with a striking 3D multi-layer cuts frame that replicates the scenes of "Genesis" and reveals the secret story. The deck is printed in moderated metallic inks to replicate oil ink painting and finished with Rainbow Silver Gilding. Each element and illustration has a meaning, truly breathing life into the artwork. The whole deck tells the "Genesis" story based on Austin's imaginary world. Printed in-house TOPCC.




Collector Edition Tuck Case Close-Up View





RAINBOW SILVER -GILDING CLOSE-UP VIEW

            

          



Deluxe Edition; a set of Collector Edition




Deluxe Edition - TOPCC





The Deluxe Edition comes with a certificate that features a piece of art Austin is ecstatic to share. 3 exclusive decks with different colored gilding and 3D cuts frame are housed gorgeously in a premium black box. A stealthy exterior, but shines with radiant treasures the moment you open it up.


What you receive (Deluxe Edition)




Exclusively to Deluxe Edition








The Snake Frame (SATAN) - Devil Red Gilding








Exclusively to Deluxe Edition





Special Edition




Special Edition - Tuck Case (Heidelberg UV on holographic paper)





The Special edition is an alternative option to the Collector Edition. It's made for those who prefer a classic style but wrapped in a modern design. The deck is printed by USPCC (not gilded) and housed in the TOPCC tuck case. It's a bold and big approach from Austin because it's the first time he has utilized feedback to create a non-monochromatic design. The tuck case is printed with UV technology on holographic paper. It matches & harmonizes perfectly with the Collector Origin & Olympians.












Special Edition Tuck Case - Front & Back View









Introducing The One Playing Cards Company (TOPCC)









Collector & Deluxe Set Features 




Premium Paper Card stock with "Icy" finishing (TOPCC)








Posh-gilding technology, which is reserved for Luxury Brands.








The Longest & Precision Stamping on a Tuck Case.








World's first tuck case that embedded 3D multi-layered laser cut frame







Add-On List 













Add-On Breakdown 
1: Custom Crystal Case for Collector Edition




Sample for TCC Crystal Case





Protect your precious collector deck with the custom crystal case from TCC. You know you can't go wrong with their quality.


2: 3D Laser Cuts Frame with Crystal Case; Single or Triple (No Decks)




This is an Add-On item; Triple 3D with TCC Crystal Case (No decks included)











You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play


































Replay with sound









Play with 
 sound












00:00


00:00


































Want to have a collectible that would most definitely “wow” your friends & family members the moment they see it? Our 3D Laser Cuts Case will have you covered.
Available in single(Adam & deer) and triple case options; housed beautifully in TCC crystal case.


3: Austin Handcrafts 3D Playing Cards A5-Size Frame









Not satisfied with just the 3D layer cuts? Level up your collection with our 3D Playing Card Cut A5 size frame. Made with real playing cards and handcrafts by the artist himself. Perfect for displaying it on your work table or hang it on your wall. 15 designs available and will get randomly assigned. If you are in luck, you will get the limited edition out of 15.




Hours in making....







Behind the Scene

            

          







Multi-Layer HANDCRAFTED by Austin himself





Behind The Scene






4: Glass Tube Set


Our glass tube set come in 3 glass tube filled with a playing card. Perfect for decorating your table/rack without taking too much space.


 5: Olympians Playing Cards - TOPCC Rainbow Gold Gilded (FULLY RESERVED.  Please contact for availablity)




Olympians Playing Cards Gilded With TOPCC Rainbow Gold





After receiving tremendous feedback from the community to bring back the Olympians, we decided to take our last private reserved stock back on sale! To spice up the game, we decided to gild them with our Rainbow Gold. Limited to 144 decks. If you couldn't hop on it the first time, you can't afford to miss this time. Complete your Origin collection while stock lasts. First come, first serve.




6: A2 Size Canvas Sets




A2 Canvas Option 1





A2 size canvas (no framed) set is designed to stylize your living room, printed on the high-quality canvas material that will bound to last for many years.




A2 Canvas Option 2








A2 Canvas Option 3





 7: A4 & A5 Size Poster 









The A4 sets come in 3 pieces while the A5 poster as standalone which designed to be framed as a table-top. You may make your decision after the campaign has ended.


8: The Ring Set - Custom Ring + Necklace




The Origin Custom Ring Set 





The ring set includes a high-quality custom-made finger ring with a gold plated necklace.









 9: The Destiny Coins




Vintage and Gold Color is available. The add-on price is per coin





Destiny coin is designed to advise you as to which option to choose when you have trouble deciding.
The Tree of Knowledge representing the "Heads" symbolizes "Yes", while the Serpent represents "Tails" symbolizing "No."


10: Graphic Tee 




Option available after campaign 





The Origin in fashion! A beautiful illustration printed on a comfortable and cozy tee.



















Summary
The Origin; a beginning of everything. It’s a story forever marked in humankind that we believe should be a piece of everyone’s life. Whether it’s carried in your pocket or displayed beautifully on your wall, we can’t wait for it to be in your hands. 


Back us now on Kickstarter, and together, let’s breathe life... into The Origin.
 ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
OUR PAST WORKS




Playing Cards by Skymember Presents
description_risks:
As discussed in the trailer and story, one of the biggest challenges for our team was finding the right manufacturer for such an ambitious project. By having a dedicated production line in the factory, we can proudly say that we’re now able to print playing cards and tuck cases entirely in-house. We have complete control of the production, so no worries here. 

We have solved the production issue, so what's next? Fulfillment. To ensure you guys can receive your pledge as soon as possible, we've teamed up with DHL E-commerce to fulfill the NON-USA orders. For all USA orders, we will ship with our fulfillment partner in the USA. No worries, they are professional in this. To reduce the risk of parcels getting damage during transit, our team has decided not only to subsidy the shipping fees but also designed a custom protector for this project. 

The only problem that we foresaw at the moment is uncertainty due to the outbreak of COVID-19. The pandemic might cause a slight delay in shipping or minor changes in the raw materials for production. Despite that, as a professional Playing Cards and Magic tricks publishing company, Skymember Presents committed to provide the best experiences to you guys. We will do whatever we capable of of to complete the products in tip-top quality and hands them to you in no time.

blurb: Part-real-Part-virtual gameplay integrating laser tag, computer gaming and other games like archery tag, nerf, foam sword etc.
description: Part-real-Part-virtual gameplay integrating laser tag, computer gaming and other games like archery tag, nerf, foam sword etc.
name: Laser Tag Sword, Kungfu Tag Vest for Gaming
title: Laser Tag Sword, Kungfu Tag Vest for Gaming
Title: Laser Tag Sword, Kungfu Tag Vest for Gaming
Description: Part-real-Part-virtual gameplay integrating laser tag, computer gaming and other games like archery tag, nerf, foam sword etc.
Link: Laser Tag Sword, Kungfu Tag Vest for GamingPart-real-Part-virtual gameplay integrating laser tag, computer gaming and other games like archery tag, nerf, foam sword etc.
description_story:
StoryShort Summary about Us Tony Tan and his 2 young sons: Yong Yao and Yong Yi enjoy laser tag and love to have other laser tag weapons to play with, apart from shooting. They enjoy nerf, archery tag or foam sword tag but these games lack unbias scoring, and they could not have gameplay involving laser tag and other tag gaming or computer fighting games.   Tony commenced the development of a gaming sword that can be used for laser tag and various gaming in 2014. Currently the team has 6 engineers, 3 designers and 2 business persons: •	Tony Tan, Multipurpose Ninja, (University of Cambridge, UK), •	Vincent Lee, Hardware Ninja (Loughborough University, UK), •	Jacqueline, Money Ninja (NTU, Singapore), 
•	John, Marketing Ninja (SMU, Singapore), •	Vincent Poon, Production Ninja (Singapore Polytechnics), •	Starie, Design Ninja (NUS, Singapore), •	Winston, Electronic Ninja (University of Southeastern Philippines), •	Kelvin, Electronic Ninja (NUS, Singapore), •	Shuling, IT Ninja (Nanyang Polytechnics), •	Jefri, Animation Ninja (LaSalle College of the Arts, Singapore), •	Arthur Gomes, Graphic Ninja (Gracom School of Visual Effects, Brazil) working to improve the capabilities of the gaming sword in consultation with manufacturers in Singapore and China. The 1st laser tag sword is called RezaSword (Reza means laser in Japanese), which has motion triggered sound effects. The wireless sensor, RezaSensor, is secured onto belt and packs itself with sensors for both long and short range sensing.  After 2 years of development, and feedbacks from showcasing the prototypes in USA New York Toy Fair in Feb 2015, Singapore's Largest Indoor Laser Tag Centre in Mar 2015 and Hong Kong Rise in Jul 2015, 1st laser tag sword with dual mode: sword/gun and is launched in the laser tag facility in Singapore in Nov 2015. Online articles about the launch @ http://goodmenproject.com/featured-content/unleash-the-ninja-within-xela/  
http://ilovedefamily.blogspot.sg/2016/01/having-fun-at-tag-team-and-giveaway.html   http://www.lifeisinthesmallthings.com/levelling-up-our-ninja-skills-tag-team-downtown-east-giveaway/ 
 Next frontier for Laser Tag is Part-real-Part-virtual Gameplay. Packed with a suite of wireless modules, emitters and sensors, the laser tag sword is built to integrate with sensor belt and Kungfu tag vest, and to wirelessly connect to PC/mobile platform and/or smartglass/oculus for gaming.This project aims to realise the Part-real-Part-virtual gameplay concept as described below.
•	Laser tag and PC games    	A laser tag player partners its 3D character e.g. a Dragon running on PC game for a part-real-part-virtual gameplay against another laser tag player who partners a 3D Ninja character for a gaming duel.  In this game setting, the “real” portion is the 2 laser tag players and “virtual” portion is the 3D dragon and ninja characters developed using Unity3D and coming alive on a PC/mobile platform and/or smartglass/oculus. To realise this, we need to develop the API for the RezaSword and its SDK for Unity3D. 
•	Laser, archery and various tag games    	A laser tag gaming is mixed with archery tag using non-lethal arrows, or nerf or foam sword fight for a part-real-part-virtual gameplay.  In this game setting, the “virtual” portion is the laser tag where the “laser” beam is invisible while the “real” portion is non-lethal arrow / foam sword / nerf darts. To realise this, we need to integrate the wireless sensors to produce the Kungfu Tag Vest.What We Need & What You Get
The USD$18,000 fund is required to pay for 
•	US$13,000 to fund the external development of the API for the RezaSword and its SDK for Unity3D which can be used for development of PC games using the RezaSword on window platforms. •	US$5,000 to fund further prototyping and production of the Kungfu Tag Vest and the integration of the sensors to ensure that the long range and short range sensing works harmoniously, and the sensitivity of the sensing does not give rise to incorrect scoring like when one accidentally touches the vest.In return, we are •	Providing VVIP e-tickets for supporters in or flying into Singapore, where one of our team members will host the gameplay at http://www.tagteaminc.sg/downtown-east/ and update our supporters the latest development •	Offering laser tag swords and kungfu tag vest ahead of sale to the public and at promotional price •	Offering exclusive partnership business deals for those who are interested to be our resellers of the laser tag sword and kungfu tag vestOther Way You Can Help
Please visit our website @ rezaninja.com and find out more about us. Visit us at RezaNinja.com or Booth 5054 @ New York Toy Fair 2016 or Laser Tag Convention Fair in Las Vegas in March 2016. We look forward to your kind assistance in supporting us and helping us spread the words. Thank you.Let the Ninja War begins! Unleash the Ninja within.
description_risks: One key challenge is to develop the SDK for unity3D concurrently with the game design, and to roll out the PC games in time with the hardware. The idea is to roll out beta version of the PC game alongside the hardware latest at the end of 2016 to supporters while improving the sophistication of the games over time.

blurb: A soft dream guardian plush companion.
description: A soft dream guardian plush companion.
name: BAKU: The Nightmare Devouring Yokai Plush
title: BAKU: The Nightmare Devouring Yokai Plush
Title: BAKU: The Nightmare Devouring Yokai Plush
Description: A soft dream guardian plush companion.
Link: BAKU: The Nightmare Devouring Yokai PlushA soft dream guardian plush companion.
description_story:
Story















Baku are supernatural, mythological creatures from japanese folklore that are said to devour dreams and nightmares. A child experiencing a nightmare will wake up and repeat three times, "Baku-san, come eat my dream." Legends say that the baku will come into the child’s room and devour the bad dream, allowing the child to go back to sleep peacefully. The baku can also be summoned for protection from bad dreams prior to falling asleep at night. It was common for children in the past to keep a baku talisman nearby when they slept.







The goal amount will allow me to produce 100 of these cuddly Baku plushes, cover shipping, packaging, rewards and kickstarter fees.















The Baku plush measures a big 30cm / 11.8inches and is a perfectly huggable size for keeping by your bedside or for comfort during scary nights. Made out of soft minky fabric, the plush features all the details from my illustrated design including a defined round shape, soft fluffy ears, embroidered eyes and spots as well as a large, detailed tail































The plush has gone through many reiterations over the past year and i'm really satisfied with this current prototype so far. I do however have plans to just change the position and colour of the embroidered spots to a similar colour to its limbs to keep it consistent and accurate with the main concept. Here's a small look at the design process! 















 Baku Plush - SGD$40









 Small talisman rewards - SGD$13 each
 














 More Small talisman reward  choices available if stretch goal is reached!! 









 Small talisman rewards + 















 Plush +































Project funding: Whole of JuneWaiting for fees to reach me, approval with suppliers etc: Mid July-End JulyProduction: Beginning August - end September (a few weeks buffer)Packaging / Delivery to all backers: Mid October

















My name is Shermaine Tan (call me Sherms!) and I am an illustrator and designer based in Singapore. Growing up steeped in Asian culture, my goal is to draw awareness to and share the many tales that have been passed down from generation to generation! I am especially drawn to folktales and mythical creatures from japan. As someone who was always afraid of nightmares, the story about Baku was one of my favourite stories from childhood and was a creature that stood out to me. This Baku design was first conceptualised in a short student film done during my time in animation school and has since then been redesigned many times throughout the years.

 Thank you so much for taking the time to look at this project and I hope that you enjoy this Baku design. :)

 If you're interested in my work, I can be found on social media here:www.shermstan.com

 www.instagram.com/shermstan/
www.twitter.com/shermstan
description_risks:
I have successfully completed 2 Kickstarter projects so far and am very familiar with the process! However, this will be the first time I will be working on plush toys, so there might be a learning curve to master. Fortunately, the company I am working with has been super helpful in guiding me through the process. After long nights of slogging away at the computer designing and making the template for the plush, everything is completed, and all we need now are funds and loving homes for the Baku plush.

I have given the campaign a month's buffer time just in case there are any problems with production! If the new colour variant stretch goal is reached, the production time might increase as well. I will update my backers every step of the way so that you will always know which part of the production process we're currently in.

I run an online shop selling fanart and original merch and am confident in packaging and sending out the items on time.

blurb: High Voltage Edition Playing Cards
description: High Voltage Edition Playing Cards
name: Danger Decks
title: Danger Decks
Title: Danger Decks
Description: High Voltage Edition Playing Cards
Link: Danger DecksHigh Voltage Edition Playing Cards
description_story:
StoryHi, my name is Wen Xiu and I'm known as The Cardpenter. I have been collecting playing cards and creating playing card art since 2009. In the past two years, I've also dabbled in resin art and have produced numerous cardistry trainers, including collaborations with other companies. 
My goal with the Danger Decks is to produce something that I think you will love to use every single day, whether you are a magician, cardist, or even a card collector looking for a unique deck of cards.
Let's face it: most playing card Kickstarters often take too long from the project's release date to the backers actually receiving their pledge rewards.
However, with the Danger Decks, the cards themselves are already in production as you are reading this! The aim of running this campaign is therefore to raise awareness and funds for logistics and fulfillment fees once it is funded. This also means that if you support the Danger Decks, you will receive your rewards FASTER than most other playing card projects out there!




High Voltage Sign found locally in Singapore





Danger Decks are inspired by the signs we see around us in our everyday life. Be it directional, safety, or warning signs, they are very eye-catching despite the minimalistic design.  We want to capture the magic behind these designs and bring to you playing cards that are simple and bold.




Danger: High Voltage Tuck Box








Danger: High Voltage Back Design








Danger: High Voltage Ace of Spades








Danger: High Voltage Custom Tuck Seal





Features of the High Voltage Deck:

  Printed by USPCC with their Classic Bicycle Stock
  Two-Way Back Design (Casino Deck Style)
  Full Standard Faces
  Custom Danger Deck Seal
  One-time limited run of 1000 decks
  No Jokers, 4 practical gaff cards for your everyday magic use
  Available exclusively on Kickstarter and Cardpenter Productions online store

The 4 Gaff Cards:

  Double Backed Card
  Queen of Clubs / Queen of Clubs Double Faced Card
  Ace of Hearts / Seven of Clubs Double Faced Card
  Ace of Spades / Ace of Hearts Double Faced Card





Danger: High Voltage Card Display








Danger: High Voltage Card Display





We have the hardcopy proof of High Voltage Deck from USPCC and we're happy to say that the decks you see in these photos will be the same quality and design as what we'll be delivering out to all the backers!


OH! Have I forgotten to mention that every order includes an exclusive High Voltage Sticker? These are high-quality, waterproof, removable white vinyl-style stickers with a semi-glossy look. As these are more limited than the number of decks printed, while stock lasts!




Danger: High Voltage Sticker







In this project, I have also made a very limited run of hand-made trainers.  There will only be 5 sets available. Each set contains 5 pieces of trainers for your cardistry practice needs! They will only be available through the "$96 High Voltage Trainer Set" Pledge Tier.
I have spent 2 years experimenting with different methods of creating trainers and testing out the various brands of resin. I strive to deliver the best cardistry trainers in the world, with each and every single piece being hand-made individually. 
Each set of trainers also come packaged in high-quality polypropylene (PP) plastic case. Frosted coating on sides and backs for easy grip. Hinged on one side connecting lid and body and snaps closes on the other side. Protects your trainers from bumps and scratches.
Features of our hand-made trainers:

  Solid, clear, glossy look (non-yellow)
  Transparent borders
  Practice cardistry easily as it slides effortlessly when broken in
  Sticks together when pressure is applied against each other
  Double-backed design 
  Thickness of 5 pieces is equivalent to the thickness of a deck of cards
  Waterproof and virtually split proof

*Please expect slight variation due to the nature of hand-made products*




High Voltage Cardistry Trainer








High Voltage Cardistry Trainer








Custom High Voltage Trainer Tuck Box





 Cardistry trainers in action:

            

          

            

          



Add-on Earrings: 
I have also included a special run of hand-made hook-style High Voltage earrings, which will only be available exclusively to this Kickstarter project. With a design inspired by the cards themselves, the earrings possess a translucent look where the design can be seen through from the front to the back.
The hook of the earrings is made of electroplated metal.
They will be fulfilled separately from your main orders. The earrings will be shipped out by June 2021. Please add-on $28  to your existing pledge should you wish to order a pair of these bold but beautiful earrings.
**Please expect slight variation due to the nature of hand-made products




Left: Earring Front, Right: Earring Back








High Voltage Earring







Special Thanks:
@harapanong (Harapan Ong) - Continuous design improvement, and gaff cards contribution
@ldcsle (Kenneth Lee) -  for working with us on the Danger Deck: High Voltage Trailer
@the_cardpenter - Founder of Danger Decks 
@dangerdecks - Please follow us for more future decks in this series
