blurb: KEY(College Level Grad Project)- an omnichannel sustainable fashion magazine which plans to make sustainability exciting and desirable.
description: KEY(College Level Grad Project)- an omnichannel sustainable fashion magazine which plans to make sustainability exciting and desirable.
name: KEY Magazine: A Sustainable Fashion Magazine
title: KEY Magazine: A Sustainable Fashion Magazine
Title: KEY Magazine: A Sustainable Fashion Magazine
Description: KEY(College Level Grad Project)- an omnichannel sustainable fashion magazine which plans to make sustainability exciting and desirable.
Link: KEY Magazine: A Sustainable Fashion MagazineKEY(College Level Grad Project)- an omnichannel sustainable fashion magazine which plans to make sustainability exciting and desirable.
description_story:
StoryKEY magazine is the result of my final graduation thesis (college level). The project is the outcome of months of research and development and it has finally reached a stage where it is ready to test into the Singapore market. About the ProjectFast fashion is changing the face of the planet as we know it not in terms of the number of customers opting for it or its high turn over but in a way you would never imagine: the fashion industry is one of the highest polluters in terms of the carbon emission and textile waste it is leaves.There is a noticeable shift from quantity to quality due to the change of mindset as the shoppers get more mature. There is a lack of awareness amongst the population is one of the major causes (due to the lack of manufacturing in the country) which gives way to these novelty buys. Their exposure to the impact is the bare minimum and they have to convey this information in a which is digestible and desirable to the Singapore market through a sustainable fashion magazine. This is where KEY was born. The magazine will have two hard copy issue a year (bookzine to engage in experiential marketing) as well as an e-magazine platform. It will also have a subscription box service in collaboration with sustainable brands to gain more revenue and treat their clientele. In collaboration with sustainable fashion organisations, the aim is to be an approachable, stylish, contemporary magazine which creates a desire for the products.The First Issue: TRANSPARENCYEach issue of the magazine will center around an important issue in the sustainability field that needs to be addressed. The first issue is centered around the importance of transparency in the fashion industry.  I few tpics we cover in the first issue are as follows:
Susutainable fashion designer's (zero waste garments) editorial shoot
Wearing is Caring- the impact on what we wear
Fashion week's top trends replicated 
Celebrities take on Sustainable fashion 
Luxury finds on a budget
And much more!
Why we need your help?


COVER




 Changing a mindset takes a lot of TLC- you heard that right, Time, Labour and Compensation/ Contributions. The concept is something that needs to be known, shared and desired and we know with your help that's achievable. Over the last 3 months, we have created the content for the first issue and it's wonderful. We have put in the time and the labour but we need your help to fulfil the C. Given the amount of research we have conducted we feel like we are ready to test the market with the final product and for this, we need to print the first batch of issues (50) which will be presented at an exhibition (To be announced at a later date). We want to be able to hold KEY in our hands, share it with our family and be a part of something bigger. Meet The TeamNatasha Rodrigues (Founder): Along with creating the magazine, I'm in charge of almost all the activities including- art direction of the magazine, creative direction on shoots, coordination and operations of the departments and the logistics departments, graphic design activities, etc.The team is entirely student-produced (undergraduates/ freshers)Paper Plane Productions: Video Production and Promotion Partners of the Magazine Creative Team:
Photographer: Ho Zheng Feng
Makeup Artists: Mimansa Puri
Stylist: Shraddha Shetty 
Model: Dao Thi Thu
Authors:
Deputy Editor: Lucie Periera
Tarun Chandy 
Saraswathy Kumaran 
Diya Pinto
K. Rachel Stephen 
Parinita P.K.
The Future of KEYOnce we have got the ball rolling there's no telling where this project could go. The first print could open up avenues we never thought were imaginable and look at the responsiveness of the market could lead to the second round of production along with the second issue being produced. An entire phase programme has been created for its launch and after and if all goes well there nowhere but up and execution. More Fashion, More Quality, A Better World. 


Cover Shoot: Shot by HO ZHENG FENG
description_risks: The final copy is ready to go, we just need your help to spread the word. The toughest challenge with a project like this is in terms of investments to keep the magazine running while the brand is being created. It requires financial investments for the printing of the first issue to test it at the exhibition. If the magazine doesn't get funded it will remind an online platform but will lack an experiential element (omnichannel- hard copy issue).

blurb: An affordable & minimalistic clothing line.
description: An affordable & minimalistic clothing line.
name: V1PER Collection
title: V1PER Collection
Title: V1PER Collection
Description: An affordable & minimalistic clothing line.
Link: V1PER CollectionAn affordable & minimalistic clothing line.
description_story:
StoryV1PER, an affordable and minimalistic clothing line project


A short introduction
Hey there, we are V1PER, a small business where we turn our ideas into fine quality products. We are very excited to be launching our first Kickstarter as well as our first clothing line. We strive to achieve products that you can wear on any occasion, ranging from the gym all the way to casual daily wear.


V1PER Collection
V1PER started when we realised that many well-known companies charge a hefty price for a piece of clothing that doesn't require as much cost as they sell it for. We at V1PER plan to even out the stakes and provide reasonable prices for products that are actually worth the amount our customers are paying. We have a wide range of sizes ranging from 4XS all the way to 5XL(for the T-shirts) and all the way to 2XL(for the hoodies), we would like to cater to every need of our customers. To make it even better, the prices remain the same for all the clothes sizes!


Our goal is for V1PER to be a name that is on par with other smaller companies before we proceed to become a bigger and more established brand with the help of our customers. As we grow together as a brand, there will most definitely be an increase of products made under us, ranging from big popular items like joggers to small accessories such as hats and so much more! 


V1PER T-Shirts









The picture above shows the 4 colours that we are intending to manufacture for now. But do not fret, as we will definitely include even more popular colours for the public if this kick starter is a success! 
The pictures below are a closer in-depth look at our simple yet stylish design as well as the 2 Fabrics that we intend to use as our materials known as "Comfy Cotton CT51" and "Cool Tech Dri Fit".  The design is kept simple with our logo on the left side of the upper chest and the name of our brand on the right sleeve.














Front shot








Side shot
















Front shot








Side shot
















Front shot








Side shot
















Front shot








Side shot








These are the Sizes for the Cool Tech Dri Fit Material(100% Polyester)








These are the Sizes for the Comfy Cotton CT51 Material








These are the other potential colors that we offer our lovely customers if this Kickstarter is a huge success! (Cool Tech Dri-Fit)








These are the other potential colors that we offer our lovely customers if this Kickstarter is a huge success! (Comfy Cotton CT51)





V1PER Pull-over Hoodies









Similarly to our T-shirts, the picture above shows the 4 colours we intend to manufacture for now. But again do not fret, as we will definitely include even more popular colours for the public if this Kickstarter is a success! 
The pictures below are a closer in-depth look at our design for the Hoodies as well as the colours that are available after success. For the Hoodies, we are using 50% Cotton & 50% Polyester The design is kept simple with our logo on the left side of the upper chest. 




































These are the attractive colours we offer!





To wrangle it all up!
We hope that V1PER does take off to become a decent business that benefits everyone. The reason we chose the name V1PER is that the number 1 in the name stands for how we intend to treat our customers; with the best. V1PER is also inspired by the fact that vipers have a worldwide habitat range which is what we are trying to accomplish too; to be able to reach worldwide and be used in any form of scenarios. To get updates, follow us here;  https://www.instagram.com/tk.v1per/ 


Do take note
The dates which we give to our customers are only a rough schedule based on predictions that everything goes well. The majority of it is dependant on the number of backers who are interested but our team will do its best to send out orders as quickly to our customers as possible. 
It takes roughly 2 weeks for the funds from you guys to reach us, during this time, our team will try their best to contact you regarding what you had Pledge.  Manufacturing from our supplier is estimated to be roughly 7 days. As soon as the products arrive to us, our team will try its best to ship them out the same following day. If there happens to be any issue or delay, our team will keep you updated to ease your worries.


Shipping Information to take note
Any orders made in Singapore may be passed by contactless delivery which may occur on the same day as ordering if stock is available.
International shipping could take a while longer depending on your area. Our team will inform you of when it will arrive after we post it with constant updates to ease your mind.
Please note that if any customs or import charges occur, you are responsible for them.
description_risks: With any projects, there are always risks that arrive when creating them. Our team at V1PER plans to reduce and eliminate as many of the risks that may appear. We have predicted a smooth sailing launch and distribution of our clothing line to which we are confident it will run smoothly.

Story

 Cartoon: a traveller with fius pillow







 What is the FIUS PILLOW?FIUS pillow is the first smart travel pillow in the worldWhy do I need the FIUS PILLOW?FIUS pillow creates a comfortable humidified environment wherever you are. It’s highly portable and convenient.How do I use the FIUS PILLOW? Is it easy?Super easy. All you need is to put it on your neck and press panel to select your preferred working modes.Why should I back you on Kickstarter?We need your help to make FIUs pillow come to life, and we are offering:•	Lowest ever pricing of $39 SGD for a FIUs pillow.•	Fast Singapore Delivery in May 2017.•	International Delivery in July 2017, just in time for Summer (US and EU).Read on for more about the FIUS pillow development journey!







  








 

 







 







 







 







 









 







 Shipping Costs and Custom Duties  INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING:  Every pledge for the Arc Board outside of Singapore will include an indicative cost for shipping. When we finalize shipping costs after the Kickstarter campaign ends, we will have an update on the actual costs with you.   PLEASE NOTE:  Some countries may have additional duties, taxes or other charges applied through customs. We will not be able to cover for these costs and would advise that you contact your local customs office if you are unsure of what these costs may be.
description_risks:
Certification is a notoriously challenging task to get done for hardware products. We have built strong corporation relationship with manufacturers in Shenzhen, who will assist us in getting relative certifications. And we still have five months to work on the documents.
We are still working on the product to make it more diversified and adaptable. And there is a chance that you may like the product we put forward later after some modifications. In addressing that, we will offer you a chance to change the type of pillow you want before shipping off the product for you.
So far, we have been forecasting our past timelines and sticking to them accurately. With our productivity and enthusiasm, we are firmly convinced that we will be able to stick to the timeline in the future.

blurb: Enamel Pin Collection inspired by the anime and manga series Jujutsu Kaisen!
description: Enamel Pin Collection inspired by the anime and manga series Jujutsu Kaisen!
name: Cute Jujutsu Kaisen Enamel pins

Link: � Cute Jujutsu Kaisen Enamel pins �Enamel Pin Collection inspired by the anime and manga series Jujutsu Kaisen!
description_story:
Story










Hello! I’m Manyaa, a Digital artist. This is my First EVER Kickstarter!!  I am a graduate who is working hard to become an independent artist! This campaign is a huge step towards my goal. By supporting me through this Kickstarter, you will not only get to see this pin collection come to life but will also get a greater discount! Any pins leftover from the campaign will be sold in my shop at a higher price. I can't wait for you all to be a part of this journey !!!
You can check out my previous and current work on my Instagram!











My designs have been inspired by Jujutsu Kaisen by Gege Akutami. I love the characters so much.  I combined my ideas and things I like (flowers and soda) to create these designs of Enamel Pins.


 In order to bring this project to life, I need your support! Pledging to this project will help assist and cover the production costs of the pins!!


In order to make this a Successful campaign the starting pledge to UNLOCK the first  Design is 520$ USD / 700$ SGD!

  All prices below are in USD  















💌 only for 1 $ pledges 💌
















🌸 2 - 3 inch 🌸








🌸 .75 - 1 inch 🌸





 free pins when unlocked


Sticker Details :

  2 ~ 3"
  water-resistant vinyl Stickers

Mini Pin Details :

  hard enamel pins
  .75 ~1"
  rose gold plating















   All pins are 1.5 inches rose gold plated with 2 Pink rubber clutches. 
   All pins delivered to backers are A grade  
   All prices below are in USD 









🍭 Gojo Cat Mini Pin : UNLOCKED 🍭



















🧁 Yuji Peonies 🧁








🍋 Nanami Soda 🍋








🌼 Megumi Lily 🌼








🍓 Choso Soda 🍓








💜 Keychain 💜








🌻 Nobara Sunflower 🌻 








🍡 Stickers🍡








🍑 Maki Soda 🍑








🍙 Inumaki Onigiri 🍙








🍈 Geto Soda 🍈











🎀  Gojo Lotus 🎀








🍧 Mahito Soda 🍧








🌹 Sukuna Roses 🌹








☘ JJK boys  ☘








Riversal Red








Demon Dogs








~ Tuna ~








Divergent Fist





🍓 Enamel pins are also available as an ADD ON🍓
🍓 All prints are 5 x 7 inches🍓
🍓 Unlocks at 700$ 🍓
🍓 A Single Print is available as ADD ON 🍓












💌 Free with 4+ enamel pins 💌








💌 MINI PIN 💌





















 MONOTONE STICKER SET




MONOTONE STICKER SET





 🍓 You can also add on Any of the UNLCOKED Enamel pins!🍓 











Kickstarter has a “pledge now, pay at the end of the campaign” option. Meaning that you will only be charged if this project reaches its goal. You can change your pledge or cancel your pledge at any point during the campaign. which means :  



  🌻  If the goal is not reached, everything will be cancelled and you will not be charged for anything!




  🌻  If the goal is reached, you will be charged for the amount you pledge. A survey will then be sent out so that you can let me know which pin(s)/Print(s)/Charm you want. 




  🌻 Kickstarter then will take anywhere from 2 weeks to a month to transfer the amount to me after that the production will start!❤ once I receive the pins, they will be quickly inspected and then a second survey will be sent out asking for your address so that your pins can be sent to you!



At the end of the campaign, only the pins that have been unlocked are the ones everyone will have a choice between! pledge to unlock the design you want  🌸 
After which I will send out a survey via Backer kit for you to select your chose which items you want!


Please note that you cannot change your pledge amount or add items after the campaign ends. Please pledge for all the items you may want during the funding period to get the special Kickstarter pricing.


Pledging actively helps unlock designs! Just because a stretch goal is locked, doesn't mean you can't pledge for it. Pledge for all items you want, regardless of unlock status to ensure that stretch goals get unlocked.


If you have any questions I am always available. This can be done by contacting me via Instagram which is the fastest method or leaving a comment!  My email is manmiart@gmail.com so you can email me if you wish to ask me anything about this campaign or any products now and in the future!


UK BACKERS PLEASE NOTE THE VAT AND CUSTOM DUTIES WOULD BE NEEDED TO BE PAID BY YOU. 









🧁June 20th: Campaign launches


🧁Late July: Campaign ends


🧁Early August: Send surveys out


🧁Mid-August: Begin ordering reward items
🧁Mid-September: Start receiving items


🧁November: Start shipping items to backers (should receive by Mid-December 2021)
description_risks:
Some challenges for this project:

-Delay in arrival of products due to COVID-19.
-Delay in receiving your orders due to COVID-19
-There can be minor variation in the final products

Luckily, there aren't too many risks with making pins! However, delays can happen. Mistakes can be made in production, and pins would have to be remade. This does ensure that the pins you get are as close to perfect as possible though. The final products may be slightly different in colours, or small alterations to the design depending on the manufacturing process. I will be checking each proof thoroughly before I approve production. If any significant changes are to be made, backers will be notified.

There is the possibility of shipping delays due to the ongoing COVID-19 pandemic. Because of the concern for lost packages, there will be tracked shipping added on to your package when you add on shipping. Although I cannot guarantee shipping times, tracking will greatly alleviate any concerns. I am grateful for your continued patience and understanding.

Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

name: SenLin: 100% Natural Modeling Mask
title: SenLin: 100% Natural Modeling Mask
Title: SenLin: 100% Natural Modeling Mask
Description:
A modeling mask or a rubber mask whose formula 
rubberizes so it's easy to peel off, and it makes skin 
moisturized and tighten.
Link:
SenLin: 100% Natural Modeling MaskA modeling mask or a rubber mask whose formula 
rubberizes so it's easy to peel off, and it makes skin 
moisturized and tighten.
description_story:
Story‘Sen Lin(森林)’ is a skin care brand based in Singapore which specializes in modeling masks. It was created by a fashion marketing student as a school project. The brand name came from Chinese characters which mean ‘forest’.  We support sustainable fashion and beauty by offering 100% natural face mask and adopting eco-friendly and sustainable packaging.


Brand Story




Circular Economy(SenLin)





In the middle of our brand, there are bamboo trees because use them for our packaging. Bamboo fibers are well-known for its biodegradable properties, which means bamboo products can be naturally decomposed by bacteria when it is deposed.  After it is disposed, it decomposes naturally and turns into soil. From the bamboo trees grown up from the soil, we source our packaging which are a glass jar with bamboo cap and a bamboo drawstring bag. This eco-friendly and sustainable cycle is called "Circular Economy", and we completely support this idea.


100% Eco-friendly and Harmless Ingredients




Modelling Mask Powder(SenLin)





Our product is made from 100% natural ingredients such as coal, tea tree and lavender. The components have gone through a safety test already.  After you mix with water and apply on your face, it turns dry and hard. When it hardens enough, you can simply peel it off. 


Tree-planting Campaign
Bamboo tree is one of the fast-growing trees and bamboo planting slow deforestation. We would like to join a ‘Plant-A-Tree’ programme twice a year held by GCF(Garden City Fund) and SEC(Singapore Environmental Council). At the same time, we will create a campaign named #plantatreesg with the tree planting communities. We will let our customers know that they can use the hashtag for their post every time they purchase our products, and they can be a part of the community just by hash tagging. Our ultimate objective of this campaign is to increase engagement with our customers and to form a big tree planting community in Singapore and overseas in the future. * No money raised through this Kickstarter campaign will be donated to charity, community or a campaign.
description_risks: Since we are a small start-up business, we have low brand awareness. Moreover, still many people are not conscious of sustainability. In order to increase brand awareness and sustainable consciousness, we are planning to connect with other communities caring about the environment, and we will participate in green events and shout out our messages.

blurb: Adorable dinnerware of unexpected details, hand-drawn artistry and centuries old traditions with a twist.
description: Adorable dinnerware of unexpected details, hand-drawn artistry and centuries old traditions with a twist.
name: Karin: Monster Platter Dinnerware
title: Karin: Monster Platter Dinnerware
Title: Karin: Monster Platter Dinnerware
Description: Adorable dinnerware of unexpected details, hand-drawn artistry and centuries old traditions with a twist.
Link: Karin: Monster Platter DinnerwareAdorable dinnerware of unexpected details, hand-drawn artistry and centuries old traditions with a twist.
description_story:
Story





















Karin: Monster Platter Dinnerware comes in a set of 4 different designs. These 9 inch dinner plates are designed in Singapore and produced in the province of GuangXi.

























Fired at high temperature, the Karin: Monster Platter Dinnerware bears great strength and chip resistance, making them versatile for everyday use and special occasions.




































































Have you ever thought how the simplest things in life can change your mood? How something as basic as dinner plates can perk up your day. Designer dinnerwares are often so costly that none of us will even dare think of owning any. We gave this a long thought and wanted to give our home dining experience a facelift it deserves. No more chipped off, scratched, color-running dinnerwares, no more paper plates for your dinner guests, no more boring generic designs. We want to be part of your daily dinner smiles and laughter. We want to bring joy over your dinner table. We want to reignite your home dining experience today! Imagine throwing a fancy dinner party in the comfort of your own home and in your pjs but still impressing your guests with a platter of finesse. Turn your dinner time into a wild occasion with these meticulously hand-drawn monster platter dinnerware.There are moments in life where you need a little surprise for everything to be just right and these cheeky little creations are the excellent example of our little surprise. They are a household of little mischievous monsters, reminding you of the abundance of joy, surprises and charms life can offer you.

















However your table setting, these cheeky dinnerware will blend in and adapt to your creativity on the dinner table!  

















































































































































































        



















TO NOTE: 1 SET OF KARIN: MONSTER PLATTER DINNERWARE CONSIST OF 4 DIFFERENT DESIGNS OF DINNER PLATES.
description_risks:
We looked at every possible nook and cranny to best pair with how we want our designer plates to be made available. They not only had to look good but also affordable and durable for everyday use and special occasions. Because it's made of porcelain, these plates are considered fragile and heavy which is also equivalent to logistics nightmare. 

Finding the right factory to work with was challenge #1. We needed a reliable manufacturer, who was patient enough to answer every one of our questions (this took 2 months), who was equipped with great experience and knowledge of the base product we wanted to produce and who understood well enough how we wanted our plates to be portrayed. -- Yes! We found an extremely reliable and patient manufacturer. 

Challenge #2. Because we wanted these plates to not only be affordable and durable but also made available to as many people we can reach out to, we had to go on a mission to find the right fulfilment company, a company with worldwide warehouses. After 4 months of hunting, emails, conference calls, webinars and odd hour phone calls, we found the perfect company. They have warehouses all over the world and are also very understanding and extremely patient to figure out which warehouse/scenarios best suits us. 

Challenge #3. Once we've locked in the fulfilment portion, we had to deal with a haystack of custom mess. The three countries we've decided to send our shipment to meant tons of complicating shipping terms and paper work. Finding the perfect customs broker thus became our biggest challenge. This person had to be experienced, reliable, patient enough to answer questions, putting every shipping language into laymen terms and had to have extensive knowledgable of the industry. Very thankfully, we found one that stood out of the crowd. They are knowledgable and beyond efficient enough to give us all the custom knowledge we needed. 

After a little more than 6 months, we not only increased our knowledge with international logistics but secured great working relationships with professionals who will deliver these dinnerware to your door step in mint condition.

blurb: The world's first pocketable chewable reusable  straw with a case to spin dry your straw for multiple uses through the day.
description: The world's first pocketable chewable reusable  straw with a case to spin dry your straw for multiple uses through the day.
name: CHEW: A New Spin on Reusable Straws
title: CHEW: A New Spin on Reusable Straws
Title: CHEW: A New Spin on Reusable Straws
Description: The world's first pocketable chewable reusable  straw with a case to spin dry your straw for multiple uses through the day.
Link: CHEW: A New Spin on Reusable StrawsThe world's first pocketable chewable reusable  straw with a case to spin dry your straw for multiple uses through the day.
description_story:
StoryAS FEATURED ON














              







  







 

Nice to meet CHEW


Meet CHEW





CHEW is the world’s first Pocketable, Chewable, Reusable straw that comes with a recycled plastic case to Spin-Dry your straw for multiple uses through the day. Whew that’s a mouthful.


Pocketable Spin Dry!








Small and compact





CHEW is a redesign on reusable straws, planning for the whole journey rather than just the moment you drink. You should be able to enjoy your drink to the fullest, which is why we wanted to keep sipping the drink of your choice effortless and enjoyable while still letting you be eco-friendly.Reusable Straws... Kind of Suck...You always end up having to adjust to their straws rather than the other way around.Residual WaterAfter using and washing your straw, you are left with a moist and dark inner straw wall to sustain a little microbe farm.


Unexpected Accidents...





And where does all this leftover water go? Into whatever you store your straw in.



Moisture in all the wrong places





Tooth Collision


*CHINK*





Each reposition or sip becomes a painful reminder of the presence of your reusable straw.Too Long to Pocket


Butts out are hot, but straw out... maybe not...





Reusable straws are always too long to comfortably carry around.CHEW is here for you TAKE IT FOR A WHIRLCHEW allows you to dry your reusable straw by taking it out for a spin.


Spin out all the moisture! Your case features precisely engineered vents for maximum dryness!





If you hate moisture in closed cases or just the idea of moist straws freak you out, don't worry. You can spin that residual water out of your case. Although once you spin we doubt you will want to stop.CHEW TO YOUR HEART'S CONTENT


Finally! A straw you can chew on!





Finally, someone did it! A chewable, reusable straw.







Chew on food grade silicone tips inspired by nature and classic geometric elements


From left to right: Wavy, Basic, Hexagonal and Tessalate





Including one Kickstarter exclusive design based on the waves of the sea.







Pocket your straw


A split so that it can fit





Designed to be portable, breaking CHEW into two allows you to slip it into any pocket. 




Unlock yourself a cool move and finish this spinning + sliding move. Slick and sexy.








Sits snugly inside your pocket.








A sleek slide into any pocket








iPhone 6 Comparison





CHEW's case even aids you in easy assembly with a simple click.


Lock it in place with a *click*





Cutting Edge For those still transitioning into an eco-friendly lifestyle, CHEW's case includes a small tip for you to cut a slit in the cover of your drink.


A cut above the rest





Struggle no more against that final barrier to your sweet drink as this simple cut allows your reusable straw to slide smoothly into your cup.




Paving the way to your sip





How do you use CHEW 


Uncap and Assemble








Pop, Lock and Pull








Slide into your drink








Sip and cHew, Chew, cheW, chEw... you get it





Minor cleaning on the go To clean your straw 


Just rinse








Slide CHEW back into it's case








Click to Cap








And spin!





Major cleaning at homeWe have also included a small brush in the whole package so you can satisfy your OCD in cleaning the case thoroughly at home. Oh that feeling.


A rinse through of your silicone tip








A scrub through your straw








And a final rinse and brush of your case at home








Strategically placed vents to allow water to flow out





Process and Inspiration










Kickstarter Exclusive PDF containing our preliminary sketches of our ideations





We went through many, many rounds of ideation, prototyping and variations. After considering, what would be the simplest wildest way to dry a straw, we arrived at a new spin on things. Taking this as a starting point we designed a straw and case which would offer a fun way to jump onto using reusable straws.Rewards









Stretch Goals

















The money from the campaign will be used to start up manufacturing cost for CHEW. After which we hope to reach more people. By backing us, you get to be a part of the change that is about to come!Meet the Team


From left to right: Tommy, Kevin, JingJie





We are a team of 3 Singapore based industrial designers. We believe that being eco-friendly is easy, if you are given the right tools. By injecting a little fun and insanity into everyday problems, we can find the solution to save the world in our own little ways.The three of us have always considered buying reusable straws, but never quite found one that met our needs. Along with many major companies choosing to ban reusable straws, we decided it was time to do something about it. Thus, CHEW was born!Share our Story
description_risks:
Risks and Challenges
At this stage we are in conversation with several manufacturers to find the right one to produce CHEW.
Due to tooling costs, The start up cost to manufacture is also fairly high.
Do not worry though as once we get successfully funded, we will set up a trip to the factory of our manufacturers and discussing in detail how to manufacture Chew. 
We will also personally do Quality Checks before we ship out the products to you. We do not want the case where you have to wait for us to ship you another Chew. It saves you and us time.
There are also some aspects of the CHEW which we are still refining. 
And to be very honest with you, there will be changes, but these changes will be to give you the best CHEW experience.

blurb: A companion app backed by positive psychology to regulate your wellness
description: A companion app backed by positive psychology to regulate your wellness
name: Kura Kura
title: Kura Kura
Title: Kura Kura
Description: A companion app backed by positive psychology to regulate your wellness
Link: Kura KuraA companion app backed by positive psychology to regulate your wellness
description_story:
Story


















 Better wellness is just a Kura away. 
The Problem
While people attempt to cultivate well-being practices into their daily routine, there is a lack of flexibility in existing programs, causing a failure to cater to different needs.















You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play


































Replay with sound









Play with 
 sound












00:00


00:00


































































Why is Positive Psychology important?
Positive emotions boost job performance and are contagious in the workplace. Small, simple actions can have a big impact on our happiness, meaning that it doesn’t take much to encourage your workplace to become a happier and more positive place (Kjerulf, 2016).


One of the benefits of practising a positive psychological outlook is, to put it broadly, success! Not only does success make us happier, feeling happy and experiencing positive emotions actually increases our chances of success (Lyubomirsky, King, & Diener, 2005).

 

















Bite-sized reflections that take less than a minute to allow you to set intentions for the day. Carves out and reinforces positive neural pathways.









With the Spotify-integrated music reflection, immerse yourself in your favourite tunes. 

















 These reflections become content for the games that you play with Kura Kura, using positive psychology intervention to build emotion control which cultivates positive habits!

















 For Premium users, view your statistics for the month and review how you've grown together with Kura. 

























Mental wellness is not easy, but we're here to help you with that through a fun, gamified experience. 


Take a look at what some of our early adopters have to say!







You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play


































Replay with sound









Play with 
 sound












00:00


00:00










































The Research on Positive Psychology
Why practice gratitude?
Being grateful for the things you encounter daily can brighten up your days! Incorporating gratitude in your day-to-day routine lets you view life from a more optimistic and happier perspective, and experience an increased level of positive emotions (Emmons & McCullough, 2003). Practicing gratitude can reduce the chances of you feeling anxious, depressed or stressed. Plus, it can help you get better sleep (Southwell & Gould, 2017)!


Acts of kindness can also help!
Acts of kindness for others not only help people around you, but doing them also helps you feel better! Being kind to both others and yourself will bring about many benefits to your overall well-being, and provide you with improved mental health (Curry et al., 2018).  They also allow you to understand others better and put you in a more positive environment surrounded by your peers (Ghergel et al., 2019).









 We can't thank you enough for backing our mission but what we can do is offer you exclusive perks that will only be available through our Kickstarter campaign!
description_risks:
App Shipment

We are working hard to push Kura Kura into your hands. As an app, we want to understand your feedback to continuously iterate Kura Kura into a companion app you'd love. This means that we might push different features that we believe will help and take down those that do not work. Our app will change when feedback is internalized to create a better product for you.

Fulfillment

We have considerable experience in fulfillment of physical products though we are a software company. Considering the current state of transportation and shipping in the world, we foresee that there might be some setbacks. Therefore we have given ourselves sufficient time to sort out any fulfillment issues so that you will receive the perks we have promised.

Unforeseen Circumstances

Team Kura wants to deliver the best Kura Kura to you. If we do run into issues that we did not expect, we will endeavor to inform you ahead of time.

blurb: Ultra-compact and lightweight. Simply Roll, Hook and Go.
description: Ultra-compact and lightweight. Simply Roll, Hook and Go.
name: World's First Modular Travel Pillow - CORI TRAVELLER Pillow
title: World's First Modular Travel Pillow - CORI TRAVELLER Pillow
Title: World's First Modular Travel Pillow - CORI TRAVELLER Pillow
Description: Ultra-compact and lightweight. Simply Roll, Hook and Go.
Link: World's First Modular Travel Pillow - CORI TRAVELLER PillowUltra-compact and lightweight. Simply Roll, Hook and Go.
description_story:
StoryUser Trial and Feedback 





You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play


































Replay with sound









Play with 
 sound












00:00


00:00


































 









 No More Uncomfortable Travel Pillows.Travel pillows have one basic job: Make travelling more comfortable, whether on the plane, train, bus or car. Why can't travel pillows be the perfect combination of comfort, support and compactibility?My travel pillow should be fulfilling all 3 of these attributes:

 







 







The Perfect PillowSay hello to the CORI TRAVELLER Pillow, the World’s 1st modular travel pillow.Ever wonder if the pillows you buy can suit you? Now it can! Designed with the understanding that not all humans are made exactly the same, we want to cater to all travellers with different needs and preferences.







One of my personal favourite configuration of the cushions (L-shaped) ensures the deliberate support of the neck and chin that is required when resting.The CORI TRAVELLER Pillow allows for both customisation and adjustments to suit the user’s preferred resting position and neck size.  Try it and share your favourite with us.

Share The Joy & Comfort







 








 
Why CORI TRAVELLER? As curious beings, we are naturally inclined to explore and discover. And that’s why we love to travel.Being comfortable while travelling can really set the tone for the day (or a trip for that matter). I’ve tried many different travel pillows to fix this problem, but none of the current options on the market seemed to fit me right.And that’s when I decided to inject a little creativity to fix my problem, by creating the travel pillow that fits.  Modularity is VersatilityThe CORI TRAVELLER Pillow comprises of 3 separate modular components; “Bobby” (the short cushion), “Leonard” (the tall cushion) and the “Couch” (the holding strap). Decide how you want them to sit. Your imagination is your limit.









Compact Design

The compact design means no fret over the bulkiness of bringing a travel pillow. Measuring a mere 12cm in diameter, it is a great travel buddy anywhere you go. 







  Wearing Is Easy!







Features







Use CORI TRAVELLER Pillow Anywhere







Inspiration Behind CORI TRAVELLER

 Hi, I'm Phyllis. The idea for CORI TRAVELLER started with my love for travelling. Taking inspiration from the beautiful, simple and creative modern origami, I wish to bring more Joy and Happiness to travellers around the world.   







Working closely with great partners in design & manufacturing. I am happy to create the world's first modular travel pillow which promises to bring joy to fellow travellers whether for a short 10 minutes nap, hours of snooze or simply neck relaxation anywhere.    Grab a CORI TRAVELLER Pillow to feel the difference for yourself. 







 















 









Rewards

















 
Timeline

blurb: Pass It On plantable candles 2.0 is back with new scents & product upgrades! Candle holders possess a 2nd life as planting pots.
description: Pass It On plantable candles 2.0 is back with new scents & product upgrades! Candle holders possess a 2nd life as planting pots.
name: Pass It On 2.0: Plantable candles that help you do your part
title: Pass It On 2.0: Plantable candles that help you do your part
Title: Pass It On 2.0: Plantable candles that help you do your part
Description: Pass It On plantable candles 2.0 is back with new scents & product upgrades! Candle holders possess a 2nd life as planting pots.
Link: Pass It On 2.0: Plantable candles that help you do your partPass It On plantable candles 2.0 is back with new scents & product upgrades! Candle holders possess a 2nd life as planting pots.
description_story:
Story















[UPDATE] There's an error in the estimated delivery time - it should be July 2020 not July 2022. We will ship out the products in 2 months after the campaign ends. Thank you for your support!


About Us

























Pass It On plantable candles pay tribute to iconic destinations that are endangered due to climate change.
Our candles are made of sustainable materials and are designed to encourage our users to give the candles a second life by repurposing them as planting pots.
Most importantly, for every purchase of a Pass It On candle, we will donate a portion of the proceeds to Eden Reforestation Projects to plant 10 trees. 




New scents, product upgrades and better rewards!
Thanks to your support towards our first successful campaign, we are back with new scents, products upgrades and better rewards!


(1) NEW SCENTS
For our two new scents, we draw inspiration from the lush Congo Basin and Venice’s breezy waterways. Finished in two beautiful earth tones, these new scents expand our colour palette.









NEW: Congo Basin - Orchid & Vetiver

                      In the Democratic Republic of Congo, refugees from armed conflict are forced to live off the land with severe impacts to forests and wildlife. Palm oil plantations and other commercial agriculture operations are a growing threat, putting greater pressure on the Congo’s forests and rivers.
NEW: Venice - Rose & Patchouli

                      As the city is built on marshland at the edge of a lagoon, its existence has always required maintaining a careful balance between the city and the natural world. But in recent years, rising sea levels due to climate change has threatened to throw off the balance.


(2) PRODUCT UPGRADES
Since our first campaign, we've gathered feedback and spent weeks enhancing our product to be even more socially responsible.
First, we realised that although many people loved the idea of planting our seed-infused candle lids, not many users did.
So here's the good news: We're providing you with soil!
For this batch, every candle will come with compressed soil pellets. All you have to do is add some water, and the pellets will expand into a handful of soil!

            

          

Second, we're upgrading our wicks to be twice the thickness so that it burns the candle more evenly, giving you stronger scent throw.









Lastly, our packaging is now made from FSC-certified cardboard. The FSC certification is considered the "gold standard" in eco terms for papermaking, as wood is harvested from forests that are responsibly managed, socially beneficial, environmentally conscious and economically viable.


(3) BETTER REWARDS
Previously, we gave away postcards; this time, we're giving away a bamboo candle cover to those who purchase 2 or more candles!









Bamboo is a kind of grass, which makes growing it about as easy as it gets.  Being extremely adaptable and resilient, bamboo is a super sustainable alternative to wood or plastic.
Also, we're offering 4 sets of limited edition larger-sized candles for our ultimate changemakers! Each set will include an exclusive 185g candle in these beautiful cement pots:




Alps (large) & Venice (standard)








Amazon (large) & Congo (standard)







The Green Factor 









Pass It On candles are made of sustainable materials. The candle wax is made with 100% soy wax, and does not contain any dyes, parabens, paraffin or phthalates.
Turn Pass It On candle holders into flower pots!

















Our candle holders have been designed to be repurposed as gardening cement pots (which is why they’re not glass jars), and our candle lids are made of biodegradable paper infused with wildflower seeds. So plant candle lid into pot after finishing your candle. 

            

          

Packaging boxes are made of FSC-certified cardboard. No bubble wrap or plastic materials are used.











The Scents
Pass It On presents its new collection of scented candles, inspired by iconic destinations around the world that are endangered due to climate change. 




The scents were created to remind us of these endangered destinations with the hope to encourage the current generation to do their part in protecting our environment.





NEW: Congo Basin - Orchid & Vetiver

                     In the Democratic Republic of Congo, refugees from armed conflict are forced to live off the land with severe impacts to forests and wildlife. Palm oil plantations and other commercial agriculture operations are a growing threat, putting greater pressure on the Congo’s forests and rivers.
NEW: Venice - Rose & Patchouli

                     As the city is built on marshland at the edge of a lagoon, its existence has always required maintaining a careful balance between the city and the natural world. But in recent years, rising sea levels due to climate change has threatened to throw off the balance.
Amazon - Goji & Tarocco Blood Orange

                     Brazil's Amazon is the largest rainforest in the world. It is home to the world's most diverse species, but expansion of agriculture has led to the destruction of the rainforest and wildlife.
Alps - English Pear & Freesia

                     Every year, the European mountain range loses around 3% of glacial ice, which means that by 2050, there might not be any more glaciers.
Great Barrier Reef - Wood Sage & Sea Salt

                        The world's largest coral reef, Australia's Great Barrier Reef, has decreased by more than half its size because of rising temperatures in the past 30 years.
Taj Mahal - White Tea & Ginger

                     The Taj Mahal is one of the most iconic buildings in the world, but some experts worry that the site could collapse because of erosion and pollution.


The Mission
The purpose of creating this product stems from our mission to grow more trees on our planet to combat devastating levels of carbon emissions. With every purchase of a Pass It On candle, a donation will be made to Eden Reforestation Projects to plant 10 trees.









Pass It On partners with Eden Reforestation Projects providing locals employment for their reforestation projects.
Why Eden Reforestation Projects?
Eden Reforestation Projects is a 501c3 non-profit who goes beyond planting trees and adopts the mission to provide fair wage employment to impoverished villagers as agents of global forest restoration.
Beyond planting trees, Eden Reforestation adopts the mission to provide fair wage employment to impoverished villagers as agents of global forest restoration.









"We hire the poorest of the poor to grow, plant, and guard to maturity native species forest on a massive scale. Our “employ to plant methodology” results in a multiplication of positive socio-economic and environment measures."









Scientific studies have shown that Mangroves “sequester carbon at a rate two to four times greater than mature tropical forests”, and contain “the highest carbon density of all terrestrial ecosystems.”
Mangrove restoration on these islands are essential to reducing the effects of flooding, tsunami’s and soil erosion
Trees are extremely efficient at carbon sequestration and one of the most effective tools in the fight against dangerous Greenhouse Gases that contribute to climate change and global warming.
To keep track of the number of trees being planted, we have created a Trillion Tree account to ensure traceability for each donation. To see our tracker on Trillion Trees, click here.


Media Mentions
Pass It On plantable candle was previously 516% funded on our first ever kickstarter campaign.
During our campaign, we were also featured on the following titles:

































The Story
While on a trip to Australia's Great Barrier Reef, our founder, Michelle, was both astounded by its beauty amidst the destruction and saddened by the dire state of our planet’s largest coral reef.









When corals get stressed, from things such as heat or pollution, they react by expelling a marine algae, leaving a ghostly, transparent skeleton behind. This is known as ‘coral bleaching’. If we continue to pollute the air and the ocean with carbon emissions at our high rate, coral reefs around the world will face a catastrophic future in coming decades – in our lifetime.









A trip to Southern Great Barrier Reef in Australia, triggered a chain of emotions and actions, birthing Pass It On just 1 month after.
Thankfully, areas such as Lady Elliot Island in Australia, is still very much protected and many new initiatives and sustainable resorts have been sprouting up to conserve what's left of the Great Barrier Reef.
Despite the efforts of many, Michelle felt that more could and had to be done. Like what 16 year old Greta Thunberg aptly put it across
"We already have the facts and solution. All we have to do is wake up and change.”
description_risks:
Due to the natural ingredients and handcrafted nature of our products, refunds are not allowed. However, occasionally items are damaged during the shipping and transit process, and other unforeseen things happen. If the item arrives either broken, leaking or damaged, please send us a note with details of the issues within 7 working days of receiving the defective item. No refunds or exchanges on broken items will be granted after the 7 day time period.

Kindly email us at hello@pass-it-on.co and let us know the reason for the return, examples below:

Was your order damaged during shipping?
Is it somehow faulty?
Did we send the wrong product?
Not what you expected?

If your order arrived damaged, or a shipping error occurred, we will gladly replace your order free of charge. (Please be prepared to send a photo of the damaged item and shipping label). If you are returning your product for any other reason, please ensure that the product is returned to us in resalable condition and everything that was in the box remains in the box.

Title: BRING THE DÉBUTANTE TO UDO WORLD CHAMPIONSHIPS 2018!
Description: After winning the UDO Australia 2017, we have been seeded to the World Finals 2018 and need your help to continue this journey!
Link: BRING THE DÉBUTANTE TO UDO WORLD CHAMPIONSHIPS 2018!After winning the UDO Australia 2017, we have been seeded to the World Finals 2018 and need your help to continue this journey!
description_story: StoryThe Débutante is an five-women Singapore street dance crew established in 2014. Sharing more than our passion for dance, and led by mentor Amin Alifin, we came together inspired by a similar desire to explore beyond their familiar genres. In 2017, The Débutante had won the United Dance Organisation (UDO) Street Dance Australia and took home 2 other awards on top of the Champion title - the "Most Inspirational Award" for our competition piece and a crew member crowned, "Favourite Female Dancer". We've since qualified for this year's UDO Street Dance World Championships which will be held in Glasgow, UK from 23-26 August 2018. With UDO as the largest street dance organisation in Europe with over 40,000 members and affiliates on 5 continents, The Débutante will be up against winners from countries such as Germany, Belgium, Japan, America, Thailand and more in the World Finals 2018. The opportunity for us to showcase our signature style to more international audiences is precious and we look forward to bringing home good news in time to come. Aside from competing, we'll also be taking part in dance exchanges and workshops with our mentor and creative mastermind, Amin Alifin to learn from others from around the world too.We need your help to make this vision come true! Being an independent dance crew with limited resources, any amount is deeply appreciated. Whether you're a friend, family, an organisation, or a patron of the arts, we'd love to have you involved in our journey. Donations will go towards funding our flights, accommodation, and dancers' pass fee. We'd also like to take this chance to thank all those who have supported us in the past years and believed in our work. WE LOVE YOU!PSA: If you have not received your merchandise from our previous round of fundraising, please contact us at thedebutante.dance@gmail.com. Thank you!More about The Débutante:The Débutante is an ordinary group of girls who started dancing when they were young, didn't quit when it got hard and now, share the love of creating.Showcasing their strong techniques in various styles, their uniqueness has been well-received in Singapore and internationally. The Débutante displays their versatility as they emerged Champions at both the street dance competition, "United Dance Organisation Australia 2017" and the contemporary dance competition, "The Royal Dance-Off".Most recently, The Débutante won All Babes Cineieisure Dance 2017 (Singapore). They also competed in the finals of a prestigious local showcase competition known as Singapore Dance Delight Volume 6 and left the audience with their alluring signature style. This group also consists of three dancers who represented Singapore at "Gatsby Dance Contest 2014", bringing home the title of the “1st runner-up”.Through their personas as they take the stage, these five ladies embody an inner strength that is distinct and one that the audience remembers. For them, dance moves beyond visual beauty - it is about camaraderie, captivating the audience, and breaking down the boundaries between genres.UDO Street Dance World Championships 2018: https://gb.udostreetdance.com/events/udo-world-street-dance-championships-2018UDO AUSTRALIA 2017 PRESS COVERAGE:Lianhe Zaobao's "Live Your Dream": http://bit.ly/zb_LiveYourDreamEP6The Straits Times https://www.straitstimes.com/singapore/live-your-dream-ep-6-the-world-is-our-stageAsia One: http://www.asiaone.com/singapore/singapore-dance-group-dreams-world-recognition-despite-oddsA-List SG: http://a-list.sg/singapore-crew-the-debutante-wins-udo-australia-dance-competition/

blurb: Unique Kinetic Art watches that turn time into mesmerizing art. Powered by your own movement and crafted from premium materials.
description: Unique Kinetic Art watches that turn time into mesmerizing art. Powered by your own movement and crafted from premium materials.
name: Humism: Automatic Watches that turn Time into Art
title: Humism: Automatic Watches that turn Time into Art
Title: Humism: Automatic Watches that turn Time into Art
Description: Unique Kinetic Art watches that turn time into mesmerizing art. Powered by your own movement and crafted from premium materials.
Link: Humism: Automatic Watches that turn Time into ArtUnique Kinetic Art watches that turn time into mesmerizing art. Powered by your own movement and crafted from premium materials.
description_story:
Story



















































01: Eudaimonia








02: Geist








03: Dasein





















































Our designs emerged from a dissatisfaction with the generic minimalism that is currently flooding the micro-brand watch field. As designers, we view the watch as an artistic canvas, and are excited by its unique creative possibilities. But most watches never fulfill this potential.  
 We wanted to completely re-imagine watch design, to create a timepiece that makes the most of this medium's uniqueness. And the most unique and fundamental part of a watch, as we see it, is movement. We were inspired by the potential of using time's movement to create visual beauty, and perhaps even philosophical meaning. In our design research, we drew inspiration from the Kinetic Art movement, vibrant in the early 20th century. Kinetic artists broke from traditional static art pieces, and created art that produced beauty through movement. These innovative visual experiences created new interactive relationships between the artwork and the viewer. 


Tinguely (1954), Duchamp (1913), Riley (1964)





Design is an incremental and often meandering process as we research, experiment, discard, and refine. The journey from initial idea to final prototype took more than a year.  More than a thousand drafts were created as ideas evolved. We conducted five rounds of reviews and testing involving more than 50 people. It didn't help that we are perfectionists, tweaking every detail and casting way too many prototypes to make sure each nanometer was perfect.  
We are proud to present three designs, the final evolutions of a year of inspiration.Thank you for supporting us.























Since the industrial revolution, we have become subservient to external routines. Time has become a number used to regiment our lives.   
Our Kinetic Art designs use the movement of time to reconceive the watch's purpose. 
Instead of a keeper of routine, our watches turn time into spellbinding art, revealing the beauty of the flowing present.Time is no longer a number — time is beauty, time is art. The present is no longer to be planned away, but to be appreciated, as the flow of time mesmerizes and enchants us. 















Beyond pointing out a few unique visual aspects of each work, we will refrain from in-depth exposition here, as we believe the meaning of a work shouldn't be shackled by the creator.  Instead, the abstract kinetics in each design are springboards from which each viewer can draw different personal meanings and inspirations. We have already been pleasantly surprised by the diversity of interpretations we have received. We hope our watches will move you, too.






You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play


































Replay with sound









Play with 
 sound












00:00


00:00


















































Four concentric rings of circles constitute this design. Alternating expansion and contraction make a play of perspective. Round forms, linear layers and smooth animation scales work together to produce a balanced design.  































This ambitious design discards geometricism, using the overlapping of uneven layers to produce organic forms that morph as they spiral outwards. Varying angles create an illusion of differing speeds, adding to the design's dynamism.  































Using three sculpted discs instead of two, this design allows for more variation across time. Patterns change in symmetry and size as the hour and minute discs move across one another. 
 

































If David hadn't stepped into the world of design, he would have been working in the non-profit field. Even now, giving back remains a personal necessity in each of his design projects.  To keep with this vision, 5% of our sales will be donated to The Red Pencil, a non-profit that uses arts therapy to help those suffering from emotional trauma. Read more about their work with survivors of natural disasters, domestic abuse and human trafficking here. 















Designing a watch requires hundreds of small choices, and at every crossroads, we have chosen the path that leads to quality. Here's an introduction to the premium components we use to craft our watches.























Unlike quartz watches which are powered by batteries, automatic watches are powered by human motion. Your arm's movement propels the hundreds of gears and springs precisely assembled in the watch mechanism — a feat of engineering artistry, and a refreshing change from the electronic circuitry we have gotten so used to. After much research, we chose the Japanese Seiko NH35A movement to power our watch, famed for its durability and reliability. A generation ahead of the already robust 7S26 and 8215, the NH35A is more refined, more accurate, and comes with hand-winding and hacking capabilities. 







Our custom movement design is a tribute to the Kinetic artists of the last century, who struggled with the tensions between human and machine as their lives became increasingly mechanized, even as they used these new machines in their art. In a way, the automatic watch, as a human-powered mechanism, is a vivid illustration of that relationship. It is poetic that the mesmerizing movement of time in your Kinetic Art watch will be propelled by your own movement.























To frame our kinetic art, we designed a case that is minimalistic, almost geometric, with carefully balanced proportions, symmetrical bevels, and clean, angular forms. The case is made from brushed 316L surgical steel, which is much hardier than the cheaper and more common 304L steel.Designed to be water resistant to 5 ATM, our watches can be brought to the shower or the pool. However, we suggest you order an extra Milanese mesh band if you intend to get your watch wet, as  leather straps are prone to water damage.























Sapphire Crystal is incredibly scratch-resistant, rating '9' on the Mohs scale of hardness, just one spot behind diamonds. We use sapphire crystal for both the top and bottom glass, with additional anti-reflective coating applied on the top glass.























Our straps are vegetable-tanned — a natural leather processing method that's much more time consuming than the more commonly found chemical-based chrome-tanning method. Vegetable-tanned leather ages beautifully, developing a patina over time.  We use full-grain leather for our straps — the strongest and most natural-looking type of leather, as it comes from the uppermost surface of the hide, where all the "grain" is preserved. Our leather straps come with quick release pins for easy removal. You can order additional 316L Milanese mesh straps for a different look.























All our watches are painstakingly hand-assembled. The expert levels of dexterity and skill required to handle our vanishingly thin discs mean that only veteran watch makers are able to assemble our watches. 























We are perfectionists here at Humism, and we take quality very seriously. All watch components are meticulously inspected before assembly, and multiple thorough inspections are carried out throughout the assembly process.  All watches are put through a series of stringent quality control tests, such as water resistance and drop tests. We take the additional step of manually regulating each watch's movement to ensure they keep time accurately. Our watches come with an 18 month warranty. 























































* Please note that duties and VAT are not included.















To commemorate the launch of our first collection on Kickstarter, the first 50 backers of each design, 150 total, will receive limited 'Founders Edition' watches.  























First forged in 19th century Italy, these straps are uniquely stylish, comfortable, and hardy. Add a set to your pledge if you'll like a different style option, or see yourself getting your watch wet. 


Milanese Mesh Strap in Silver








Milanese Mesh Strap in Black





















With 39mm case sizes, our watches can be worn by both men and women. Our leather straps will fit most wrist sizes.  























Kickstarter is a funding platform that gathers people to bring creative projects to life. We chose Kickstarter to launch our first collection because of Kickstarter's vibrant, entrepreneurial, and artistic community.  For Humism, you can see our Kickstarter as an opportunity to pre-order our watches before everyone else. To back us (i.e. make a pledge; i.e. pre-order your watch), simply click the green 'Back this project' button on the top right of this page, and select your reward tier (i.e. the number of watches you want) on the next page. Note that you can only choose one reward tier.









All in all, to bring you the perfect Kinetic Art watch, it has taken us more than a year, upwards of a thousand design drafts, and half a dozen prototypes. Here's a brief timeline of our journey.  

























We believe in our watches. That's why we have invested our own money in them, and are already deep in the production process. Our early start ensures that you can receive your Kinetic Art watch as soon as possible.
description_risks: Making these watches has not been easy, as both precision and innovation were required to bring our artistic vision to life. However, as we are already deep in the production process, we are several steps ahead of other projects, and have greatly lessened the number of hoops our project will have to jump through after our campaign ends. It is always possible for delays with production though, so we have added some buffer time in our estimates to provide for this. We'll keep you informed every step of the way.

blurb: LAVNG Wallet - Smartly Designed in Luxurious Full Grain Vegetable Tanned Leather at Never Seen Before Price.
description: LAVNG Wallet - Smartly Designed in Luxurious Full Grain Vegetable Tanned Leather at Never Seen Before Price.
name: Full Grain RFID Blocking Bi-Fold and Zip Leather Wallet
title: Full Grain RFID Blocking Bi-Fold and Zip Leather Wallet
Title: YOUR GREEN LEATHER SHOP IN SINGAPORE
Description: LAVNG Wallet - Smartly Designed in Luxurious Full Grain Vegetable Tanned Leather at Never Seen Before Price.
Link: YOUR GREEN LEATHER SHOP IN SINGAPORELAVNG Wallet - Smartly Designed in Luxurious Full Grain Vegetable Tanned Leather at Never Seen Before Price.
description_story:
Story















LAVNG's BIRTH
LAVNG was launched and successfully funded on Kickstarter in July 2018 with the collection of the Finest Natural Leather goods
We have since sold hundreds of bags and wallets to happy customers exclusively via our website 
Our choices of design are usually Minimalist yet loaded with innovative modern features.
We strongly believe in our Motto of QUALITY FOR ALL and will continue to innovate and iterate to better our-self - Only the best leather makes the cut for our designs









Here we go AGAIN
Ever striving to outdo our-self, we have continued our search to find the finest material for our leather goods collection. 
Introducing ECO Leather:

  Real Calf Leather
  Full-Grain
  Vegetable Tanned
  100% Eco-Friendly
  Naked and Aniline





The best material!





 To Ensure that our wallets are strong and long-lasting, we only use full-grain, vegetable-tanned Calf leather.




LAVNG ECO Leather Wallet








LAVNG Zip Wallet ECO Leather







 Not only are they more durable and functional, but the naked natural surface of full grain leather shows the character called PATINA making our wallets age beautifully just like YOU









 At just S$29, it’s probably the only full-grain leather wallet available at that price!




With All Seriousness - Kickstarter has never seen before such honest pricing!































SLIM WALLET ECO LEATHER
Dimensions : 4.2”W X 3.9”H 




COLORS - BLACK, TAN AND MID-NIGHT GREEN





 A must-have back pocket companion, this Slim Leather Wallet is small, yet accommodating leather wallet for men that can keep all of your financial necessities close at hand. This slim and lightweight wallet is made from luxuriously soft leather.




Forever Young Simple and Minimalist Design





 Fit your cash and cards in a slim profile. Slim your wallet, without turning your world upside down.




The Simplicity Continues In Each Aspect













 And obviously the Slim Wallet Eco Leather has the MUST required feature of RFID Protection, but at the same time keeping the functional use in mind












The Slim profile is always better than the Fat one.








Better SAFE than sorry





 With the digitization of money, losing a card can be a costly affair. Unlike most of the other wallets which come with vertical alignment, LAVNG offers a more convenient and safe solution thanks to the horizontal alignment of your cards. It is your personal bank to keep your money safe!
 Compartments :










  1 currency compartment
   6 + 2 card slots 





Don't leave them behind - it stores all your cards





2 compartments capable to fit BIGGER AND THICKER cards -  the bottom-most card slots on both sides (total 2 compartments) are little wider and deeper. They can easily fit bigger and thicker cards like ID cards, Gate Cards, Office ID cards, Laminated cards, etc.









 These slots are 86mm deep and 89mm wide. A credit card is usually around 85.5mm wide and 54mm height.


Dedicated full-width slip pocket to keep your CURRENCY. We have tested with multiple ASIAN, European and American currencies; usually, they all fit in well.
It can easily carry up to 15 currency notes while still maintaining a slim profile.




Dedicated Currency Compartment








The perfect gift





Need a bulk gift idea? What better than this minimalist, environment-friendly wallet!
Unique Mid-Night Green Color - Even Apple Loves it




MidNight Green Color unveiled by Apple on 10 Sep and used by LAVNG since 1+ year.





The Story of our mid-night green color started around 3 years back, when instead of the blue I selected green color as the third color for our collection (first two being black and tan. Read more in Update # 6




The PERFECT companion!





ZIP WALLET ECO LEATHER
Dimensions : 7.5”W X 4.1”H X 0.6”D 




COLORS - BLACK, TAN AND MID-NIGHT GREEN








Simple is Beautiful





 The beautiful wallet offers the best of both worlds, classic yet functional!
The durable materials make sure the wallet will offer you years of use with no fuss.




Full-width YKK zip. Functional and elegant





The fabrics we use are sustainably produced and chosen for their durability and lightweight performance.  




The snap faster keeps it organized








RFID Blocking to keep you safe from skimming.








The zippers are from Japanese engineering marvel - YKK 





Compartments :

  8 Vertical card pocket and 1 vertical ID card pocket
  6 horizontal card pockets











  1 Full-width zip pocket for key and coins
  3 full width slip pockets for currency and bills
  Leather flap with snap fastener button to keep your wallet organized





Don't choose what to store - STORE THEM ALL





 It has the place for all the card, cash and coin you may need to carry yet keeping the slim profile




Still Believe in Cash? Of-course, Cash is KING








Coins are still relevant!








Simple is beautiful!








Go GREEN with this super functional Eco-friendly wallet!





Love Patina? Get LAVNG! 




LAVNG wallet getting beautiful Patina over time!





For those who don’t own something made with natural leather, might be wondering: What’s the big deal about owning a leather product? The big deal can be summarized in one word: Patina.
Leather ages in a similar way, much like your favorite pair of raw denim, developing a “patina” as oils from your skin and other elements of the environment absorbs into it. Like our tan color bags, starting with a beautiful pale tan shade, it eventually develops into any range of browns through wear and use.









BUNDLE PRICE - Available in the rewards section
 Simple Calculation : 
Quantity * Early Bird Unit Price for the wallets.
Big savings on shipping cost. The most shippers have a fixed starting price, regardless of weight and then progressive price increase based on weight. Since we will ship all your rewards together, obviously we will pass on the shipping savings to you. 













 Jan to August 2019

  Multiple iterations on the prototype
  Source Leather for the first batch of 240 Slim Wallets and 120 Zip Wallets
  Prepare Kickstarter Campaign

September 2019

  Kickstarter Launch - fingers crossed for successful funding
  Manufacture first batch

October 2019

  Kickstarter Successful - Celebrations? Not yet, we have got work to do.
  Deliver the first batch
  Source leather for remaining rewards
  Start Manufacturing

November 2019

  Complete Manufacturing
  Start Delivery

December 2019

  Complete all deliveries



 Leather 
We use full-grain, vegetable-tanned naked leather: we love it and we think you will too! 









 It is the leather that you can feel good about owning as it is totally environmentally friendly, our leather is luxuriously soft with grains that can outlast the many years to come 
 "Veg-TANNED"
Our leather is tanned in an eco-friendly manner using vegetable extracts. There is no use of chrome, heavy metal, formal dehydrate or volatile solvents in tanning process; unaided by potent chemicals, organic tanning takes much longer than chrome tanning (several weeks/months vs a day).









"FULL-GRAIN"
The top surface of a hide, or the grain, is the strongest part of the hide. "Full-grain" means that the surface has not been buffed or sanded to remove imperfections. 









"ANILINE"
Our leather has been dyed the whole way 'through and through'. Pigmented leather, in contrast, has a coat of paint sprayed on top and is cheaper to make. Aniline leather without further artificial finishing is a fully natural product.
Care Instruction
Our leathers are naked and have no artificial finish - hence making is a fully natural product. A few scratches, marks, irregularity in color and texture are a part of this leather and only goes to show that it is a natural product; it is not water-resistant, prolonged exposure to water can cause splotches or marks - eventually becoming part of the patina.









The leather color appears slightly different in a different light and is noticeable while photographing it, especially the Tan color. Under the bright sun, it appears lighter and inside a room, it appears a little darker. This is the characteristics of natural leather. The pigmented leather, on the other hand, has the same appearance irrespective of the light.
 Shipping and Custom Duty
We have tried to be reasonable with shipping. We would use Singpost for shipping most of the rewards.
Singapore and Malaysia- No Shipping charges
Rest of the World - Nominal charge of S$13 to S$60 depending on the reward
Duty/VAT/GST charges: If you live outside of Singapore, you will be responsible for applicable duty/VAT/GST charges, if any. In many of the countries, there is no duty or taxes on online shopping up to a certain amount.
Customs: Some countries are known for being very slow with customs, and you probably know if you live in one. We're sorry that, in such case, we can't have any mechanism to help them get through faster.
 People and Mission




Geetanjali - The Founder of LAVNG





Hi, I am Geetanjali the founder and designer at LAVNG.
I love handbags but would not settle for low-quality fast fashion and would always end up overpaying for quality which I would not even know is environment-friendly or not.
The idea of starting LAVNG first clicked me when I was staying in Amsterdam in the year 2009 and visited Italy on a vacation trip. For the first time, I got to know the real price of high-quality leather goods which are made in an environment-friendly manner.
Its quite common for luxury brands to increase their price up to 10 times as compared to manufacturing price to fund the middlemen, expensive real estate and celebrity marketing.
We thought there must be a better way and hence we started LAVNG - Our reason reflects our desire to make high-quality leather goods which are made to last while preserving the environment.
More Photos



















































Some Feedback on our first collection.

























 Giveaway Contest: Only for Backers!
Help us spread awareness about our campaign and stand a chance to double your reward.

We are very confident about professionalism and craftsmanship of the tannery and the factory. We have put proper contingencies in our planning to ensure the timely completion of each milestone in our production run.

Still, the deep experience of industry and life has taught us that although we are prepared in every way possible, unexpected events may come up that are not in our control. We assure you to be completely transparent and honest in all our communications going along the way.
