description_story:
StoryHappy Folks-  Local Social Enterprise for our Elderly Parents & Community.
We get it- life is hectic in Singapore, but let's not forget the important things in life amidst our ever busy schedule. Family.









Happy Folks was created as an avenue to shower our elderly with gifts of love. 
The founder was inspired by her father, currently a retiree who enjoys solving the Sudoku puzzles she regularly gifts. It was clear that it was impossible for this retiree to sit back, and do nothing contrary to popular belief.
Children are getting caught up with their increasingly busy everyday lives! The precious bonding and interaction time, is far and in between. 
She realized how a simple gift can bring her parents so much joy and is thoroughly convinced that it is not the price tag of the gift, rather the action of receiving something from their loved ones that brings about the warmth in their hearts.

























 SUPPORT US BY: 
Option 1: Opting for a Classic or Premium Box for your parents!  
Cheerful Box with bundle of healthy snack packs ranging from nuts, dried fruits, seeds, fruit chips, premium tea blends, healthy mate cereal drinks & pampering eye & face mask.  
What's more, activities such as Word Search, Sudoku, Riddles, Did You Know Facts, Exercise Tips & Social Events Update-  Keeping our folks ever sharp ,active and happy. 
+ 1 Free Send A Smile Box donated to elderly residing in homes for every supporter of ours.


Option 2:  Opting for our Send A Smile Project! 
For every purchase, we match 1 box to our elderly folks in homes.
Dedicated to personally hand-delivering these cheerful boxes into the hands of elderly residents in nursing homes.  
In this exclusive launch, we have partnered with All Saints Home! They provide comprehensive and professional eldercare services to the aged of all backgrounds, many of whom are destitute or from low-income families.
You are more than welcome to join us:)









Small Gesture, Big Impact. It's the thought that counts. 
By backing us at Kickstarter, this helps us validate our vision that we set out to fulfill within Singapore. 
★★★AS AN EXTENSION OF GRATITUDE TO ALL OUR INITIAL BACKERS & SUPPORTERS★★★
An additional 15% discount rate will be offered and locked-in exclusively, off retail prices once this campaign ends. 
Email will be sent out to notify our supporters with special locked-in rates :) 
[ Limited to maximum of 200 supporters] 









Let's make this happen together.  Join us and send smiles!
For more information, do check us out at www.myhappyfolks.com
                                                                                  :)
description_risks:
The only risk is not having enough supporters for this project to kick off. 
We aim to deliver smiles, meaningful smiles to our elderly folks across Singapore. 
We can do this with the support of our people, backing this project will mean a lot to us in getting this out to homes.

description_story:
StoryHello everyone! The Puppies enamel pin set consist of 4 adorable muffins (corgi, pug, beagle and dachshund) However, we will be funding by tier for these pins. The basic funding of S$650 (USD500) will enable us to produce the Corgi puppies, and with each stretch goal we meet, we will be able to produce another one. Each stretch goal is an additional S$300. (approx. USD230) The Corgi Puppy







 

 Pin Specifications• Each pin is measured at 40mmH,  width based on design 
• Hard enamel with gold plating
• 1 pinback
• Each pin comes with a backing card to hold itStretch Goal: S$950 (approx. USD730)The Beagle Puppy







 

Stretch Goal: S$1250 (approx. USD960)The Pug Puppy







 

Stretch Goal: S$1550  (approx. USD1190)The Dachshund Puppy







 

Our Funding Goal We hope to be able to fund at least S$650 (USD500) to kickstart this project. Here is a breakdown of where our funds will go.1. Production cost - 60%
2. Packaging cost - 30%
3. Kickstarter Fees - 10%







If you love the puppies, please be sure to help us spread a word and get your friends to back us as well! We really hope to be able to produce these!Do follow us on instagram @madebymate for more updates!

blurb: Do you recall the moment you fell in love? Explore, discover & re-discover your partner more intimately on this 52-week journey!
description: Do you recall the moment you fell in love? Explore, discover & re-discover your partner more intimately on this 52-week journey!
name: A Year of Us | Relationship Card Game
title: A Year of Us | Relationship Card Game
Title: A Year of Us | Relationship Card Game
Description: Do you recall the moment you fell in love? Explore, discover & re-discover your partner more intimately on this 52-week journey!
Link: A Year of Us | Relationship Card GameDo you recall the moment you fell in love? Explore, discover & re-discover your partner more intimately on this 52-week journey!
description_story:
StoryLove, Laughter and Growth
Hello, we are Charmaine, Junel and Ruth. Before A Year of Us, we were running a sexual health and wellness platform in Singapore (because God forbid anyone talks about that in Asia!). 2 years in and countless chats with our followers later, we realized that underpinning all our readers’ questions and concerns was the desire to build better relationships.
From talking about “What to do after sex?”, to “How frequently should my partner and I go for an STD check?”, we realised that what people really wanted to know was “How should I build a better relationship with my partner?”
Complex, needy like a child, but also oh-so-beautiful ❤️
Our relationship with our significant other is one of the most important ones we will have in our lives - trust us, we’ve been through our fair share of not-so-great relationships! (You have our exes to thank for this game, tbh) 




A Year of Us!





Humans are complicated. We make understanding one another fun. With 9 different categories, learn about your partner in a more holistic way from communication styles, to what they like in bed.
Like a plant, love takes time to grow 🌱
Apart from looking like a cute journal to chronicle your favourite couple memories, A Year of Us is intentionally designed as a yearlong series of questions and activities for you and your partner to get to know one another on a regular basis. Weekly date night, settled!




Make our game a part of your dates





Make this the best year of your life
Designed with love, crafted for all couples. We use inclusive language in our cards so every couple can enjoy the game! 




A Year of Us is made for anyone and everyone 





🌱 New relationships: Learn more about your partner as you embark on an adventure  of a lifetime together
🪴Mature relationships: Rediscover your partner, recount your shared journey and renew your desire
We have spent the past 6 months researching, interviewing and lovingly planning for this card game. Our pilot run sold out within weeks, and we are excited to introduce our new and improved international version here! 




What people say about us!





We hope our game brings you as much joy as it has to us. Follow our instagram page for updates about this project, and also loving reminders to you, and your loved ones.


With love, 
Charmaine, Junel & Ruth
Milestone Goals 









Support our project
The best way to support our project is to pre-order your set(s)! Back this project and pick the reward package of your preference. 









You can also help by sharing about us Instagram, Facebook and Twitter! We love love, love all of you reading this, and appreciate your support wholeheartedly. Cheers!
description_risks:
This is our very first kickstarter project, so we have tried our best to minimise risks by testing and prototyping as much as possible. 

Our prototype has been completed, printed, and tested with friends and family. Since this is our first venture, we wanted to go one step further to produce a small number of games in order to gauge sales and get more feedback from our target audience. Even though this increases our costs up front, it has greatly benefited us in improving our product for its final and best version – for you guys!

Right now, we are finalising our improvements to the design of the cards and is near completion.

We have budgeted for kickstarter platform, taxes, credit card, failed shipments in our minimum goal of producing 1000 sets of our game!

blurb: Enamel pins inspired by the popular sitcom, Brooklyn 99!
description: Enamel pins inspired by the popular sitcom, Brooklyn 99!
name: Brooklyn 99 Enamel Pins
title: Brooklyn 99 Enamel Pins
Title: Brooklyn 99 Enamel Pins
Description: Enamel pins inspired by the popular sitcom, Brooklyn 99!
Link: Brooklyn 99 Enamel PinsEnamel pins inspired by the popular sitcom, Brooklyn 99!
description_story:
Story







 Hi! I'm Sabrina, more prominently known as the owner of @justpeachysg on Instagram. Apart from designing, I love to eat sashimi and baking. Recently I've gotten hooked onto Brooklyn 99, which resulted in this little project. 







The pins will be about 35mm (3.5cm), soft enamel, comes with a standard butterfly clasp and will be packaged with a specially designed backing for protection during shipment.







Jake Peralta's iconic "cool cool cool cool no doubt no doubt no doubt" phrase.







Jake Peralta's "title of your sex tape" gag in all seasons whenever someone says something with a sexual innuendo.







 We've all seen Terry sinning on yogurt, so why not create a pin that glorifies his strong appreciation for yogurt, amirite? I'm sure he'd be ecstatic if this actually existed. 







We all know Gina's not only a talented dancer and online streamer, but also always right in most situations. This pin will be gold plated, befitting of such a glamorous character. 







 I will be very happy to reach the goal of SGD$700 to make all of these pins and if this actually picks up, I might actually create more. 







 Apart from being a gay icon, Holt's expressions (or lack thereof) are a literal mood. Due to the details on Holt's uniform, this pin will only be unlocked after this project has reached the target goal. I've been designing enamel pins for a while now and I really love Brooklyn 99, so it'd be great to see this project take off. I've got plenty of ideas for another batch of B99 pin designs, especially since I haven't included Amy Santiago, Rosa, Boyle, Scully or Hitchcock in this collection. If you like the way these pins look, do support this project and I'll work even harder to ensure a second collection will come to life! UPDATE:


ta-da! A sixth pin for getting this kickstarter to over $2000!



If you guys haven't noticed yet, there's now a reward for backing $48 or more due to the additional sixth pin to this collection, as an additional reward for everyone who has supported this Kickstarter so far. 








Kickstarter Fees- 10%
Pins Production- 69%
Shipping and Packaging- 31%
If I reach my goal in September, it would take another month (or less, no promises though!) for all the pins to be made and another month for me to send the pins after receiving them from my manufacturer. I'll also be schooling then, and will be focusing on this whenever time allows me to.  Thank you all so much for taking a look at my project and I hope to show you all the wonderful pins come November!
description_risks:
I have already chosen and spoken with a manufacturer and they are ready to make the pins for me. They've sent me images of the pins they've created and I believe they are reliable and highly recommended, so I don't foresee any problems arising with them. 

The risks/challenges I have is whether this project will be fully funded or not and if I am able to find a carrier that is able to ship out the pins in time to everyone. I'm currently still searching for a suitable carrier and will update you guys once I've found the right one.

blurb: Easy fit bidet bars to give your tender areas a spa treatment every time you go.
description: Easy fit bidet bars to give your tender areas a spa treatment every time you go.
name: Wipeless™ Bidet Bars. The new home of better bum care.
title: Wipeless™ Bidet Bars. The new home of better bum care.
Title: Wipeless™ Bidet Bars. The new home of better bum care.
Description: Easy fit bidet bars to give your tender areas a spa treatment every time you go.
Link: Wipeless™ Bidet Bars. The new home of better bum care.Easy fit bidet bars to give your tender areas a spa treatment every time you go.
description_story:
StoryHi there!
We are The Nurturing Co, an award-winning sustainable products start-up based in Singapore and the UK. 
We are a new generation sustainable products company focused on the creation of sustainable less impactful alternatives and have already launched the world's first "retailer ready" zero plastic bamboo home care brand, Bambooloo, in 2018.


Like many of us concerned about the world's resources, we spent endless hours thinking about the problems we face and how we might best manage them. That's why we have created Wipeless™.









We think its time you became 'Master of your Throne"


We've all been spending more and more time in our homes, with the new normal. With all the new Zoom meetings, a new way of hanging out with friends. But we are still doing one thing the same old way.  Going to the toilet. Yes, going to the toilet...  









We use the toilet three to four times a day but yet we are still dragging dry paper (when the stores are running out) across our tender regions, spreading what we are seeking to clean up, and kidding ourselves we are all cleaned up! It is time to give our bums the treatment they deserve and care more about the planet at the same time.


Go Wipeless™: Greener cleaner cleaning, down there









The person's got a point don't you think? Why do we spread things around and expect that to be clean when we wouldn't do that with any other part of the body, let alone the dirtiest? We've all been there where we had one too many toilet visits that left the cheeks in great despair or had an especially big poop and left scrambling to clean up with sheet after sheet. 




Be a sprayer, not a spreader





With Wipeless™, any toilet scenario would have a clean and peaceful ending. No more worries of dingleberries or irritated bum cheeks. 






















Reduce toilet paper usage





Every roll of wood pulp toilet paper out there takes 37 gallons of water to make!  That's a lot of water we are using folks. Plus each sheet uses 2 grams of carbon to make and deliver to the stores... yes, that's per sheet, plus there are the 27,000 trees a day we cut down just to make wood pulp toilet paper. None of this is good news we think you will agree...












Save up to 6000 gallons of water





But by adding a Wipeless™ Bidet Bar to your toilet you will reduce the amount of toilet paper used by 65-80%. Immediately this will cut your overall water use, your carbon footprint, help save trees and save you money. You may still need some toilet paper when using your Wipeless ™ Bidet Bar, and we highly recommend our sister brand, Bambooloo®.












Be a sprayer, not a spreader





Peanut butter on nice warm toast, yeh go ahead and spread that on there! Divine smelling lotion on your body after a nice warm shower, of course!  These sound great, but not everything is meant for spreading. 












Be gentle with your tender areas





We've all dealt with times where toilet paper has left us itchy and uncomfortable. Put an end to that with the Wipeless bidet bar. With an easy soft turn dial and variable pressure it is perfect for children, adults and the elderly. Give your bum the respect that you would give the rest of your body and give it the cleaning it deserves. Plus, it avoids having to deal with unpleasant dingleberries and remnants.














Bernie knows comfort, be like Bernie





One thing COVID has reminded us is when you keep your hands clean, you keep yourself safe. With the Wipeless™ bidet bar, cleaning is as simple as a turn of a knob and patting yourself dry. No more having to contort our hands to get the angle just right and wiping carefully to make sure you don't get any on your hands. It is so simple that you can even do it with your gloves on.









We have put everything you need is in the Wipeless™ Kit so you don't need to go to the hardware store to get fancy tapes or tubes, or hire a plumber. 




Unboxing Wipeless: What's in the box?





The DIY Instruction Manual will break down every single step and sub-step so that you feel at ease throughout the installation. 
The 6mm Slim Wipeless™ Bidet Bar universally fits 90% of toilets (unless you have a really fancy-schmancy designer toilet bowl). The accessories kit includes all the necessary fittings you would need. 
For all the handy household folks out there, you would find the list below very familiar.
Accessories include:

  1/2" brass adaptor
  1/2" rubber washer
  80cm TPU hose
  Teflon Tape
  1-year warranty card
  Instruction Manual













Meet the Wipeless Bidet Bars








Wipeless Bidet Bar Model GT








Wipeless Bidet Bar Model MK1














  Soft Turn Dial

With the soft turn dial, you can always get the pressure that is just right for you. Every time you use the Wipeless™ bidet bar, the nozzles go through a self cleaning before water sprays out onto you. This make sure that only clean water will hit your tender areas, no leftover nasties. 




Using the soft turn dial to get the pressure that is just right





The Wipeless™ bidet bars come with variable pressure control so that you can always get the pressure that is just right for the situation.




Get the pressure that is just right








  PeeGuard© (Only on the Wipeless™ Model MK1)





Keeping the nozzles clean at all times





The PeeGuard© is for the man of the house whose aim is not always perfect. It keeps the nozzles clean at all times from nasty splashes and bad aim. However, the PeeGuard is only an added extra level of protection. Both the Model GT and the Model MK1 come with self cleaning nozzles that clean themselves up before they clean you up. So PeeGuard© or no guard, you will always be kept safe and clean. 



  Front and Rear Spray Nozzles










Use the dial to control whether you want a front wash or a rear wash and let the bidet take care of the rest. The nozzle needed would go through a self cleaning, descend and spray the water so that it hits you just right and cleans you up. Just a little wiggle to adjust and you'll be clean in seconds. 




Gentle on your tender areas













All you need to fit a Wipeless™ Bidet Bar is about 20-30 minutes of time and a screwdriver and maybe a spanner if you have to deal with a tight nut. 
Everything else that you need, from detailed fitting instructions to all the fitting accessories, come in the kit that you receive, which also come in one-time-use plastics free packaging. 
So normally there is no need to spend time and money calling out a plumber to figure it out for you, but we absolutely won't judge you if you want to.


In summary, it is easy as 1,2,3.
1 Turn off the water supply and remove the toilet seat completely. 
2 Place Wipeless Bidet Bar on and screw it into place.
3 Connect the bidet bar to the water supply, reattach the toilet seat and you're done!

            

          












The main man- David





Toilet talk is not new to us. Wipeless™ is created by the team behind sustainable homecare products brand Bambooloo©, which is loved for its 100% bamboo toilet paper.  The 0% plastic, 100% love product has been focused on reducing the use of carbon, water and single use plastic and has saved 1728kg of plastic from being used in just 2020 alone. We have been caring for bums all around the world from 2018 and we are now taking it one step further and coming to you with the Wipeless™ Bidet Bar.




During the product design stage of Wipeless





Our plan and our pride and joy
We have been designing Wipeless since 2020 and it went through many different rounds of tweaking and testing and we finally arrived at the Wipeless Model GT and the Wipeless Model MK1.  




Sample that we tested in our own office





We brought in the Wipeless Model MK1 and installed it in our shared office space and it was an instant hit! With the feedback we got, we made a few more tweaks and now we have the final products ready to be shipped out to you!




Yes, we shoot in the toilet





All the videos that you see are shot in real toilets with real plumbing and real issues.  Wipeless is designed for all our toilets and we made sure that the installation is easy (takes under 30 mins and doesn't require special tools) and that's why you'll see no studio shots in our videos. They are all shot in real toilets and show you the bidet as it is.




Our crew has spent alot of time in toilets













Be smart and treat your bum right with a Wipeless Bidet Bar today! Take the pledge and our bidets are ready to make their way to you!



   Pledge 1: Go Fast Not Furious





Go Fast Not Furious Bundle





When you need to go, you should be able to go fast, not furious. Become a sprayer and not a spreader, give your bum the royal treatment with our twin nozzled, soft-touch dial, self-cleaning, MK1 Wipeless Bidet Bar. We added in a cool "Claim Your Throne" tee-shirt, a sheet of Wipeless "poop-punny" stickers. This total bundle has a retail value of $90 SGD.


1 x MK1 Wipeless Bidet Bar 
1 x Claim Your Throne T-shirt
1 x Poop Punny Sticker Sheet



  Pledge 2: Chillin' and Cruisin' 





Chillin' and Cruisin' Bundle





Trust us, once you go bidet, you won't want to go back. Make sure your toilet is in great shape and get yourself a GT Wipeless Bidet bar.  With that comes the mod "Somethings are not" tee. Dress up your bidet, notebook or laptop with the sheet of "poop-punny" stickers. This total bundle has a retail value of $90 SGD.


1 x GT Wipeless Bidet Bar
1 x 'Somethings are not' T-shirt
1 x Poop Punny Sticker Sheets



  Pledge 3: The Dream Team 





The Dream Team Bundle







Give your buns the love they deserve with the MK1 Wipeless Bidet Bar and GT Wipeless Bidet bar.  With that comes not one but two tees, the cool "Claim Your Throne" tee and a nice and mod "Somethings are not" tee. Dress up your bidet, notebook or laptop with the two sheets of "poop-punny" stickers. This bundle comes with an exclusive microfiber towel that you can use to pat dry just about anywhere. This total bundle has a retail value of $190.


1 x MK1 Wipeless Bidet Bar 
1 x GT Wipeless Bidet Bar
1 x Claim Your Throne T-shirt
1 x Not Everything T-shirt
1 x Wipeless Microfiber Towel 
2 x Poop Punny Sticker Sheets









 We will be bulk shipping volumes to main markets such as the United States, the United Kingdom, Australia in order to take better advantage of local shipping and tracking support. We have a third-party logistics partner arranged in each of the above markets to help us better manage the final mile.


Below are guideline prices for shipping. Final shipping costs may vary.









For more details check out our website and social media pages!
description_risks: Sometimes with new products, there is a fear of when the design will actually become a product and reach your hands. With the Wipeless Bidet Bar, worry no more as both the MK1 and GT units have gone through research, development, and production and are ready to be shipped out to you soon after you place your order.

blurb: Stories Beyond the pages, Beyond the book, Beyond the Ordinary
description: Stories Beyond the pages, Beyond the book, Beyond the Ordinary
name: Stories Beyond the pages : Parker goes to Space
title: Stories Beyond the pages : Parker goes to Space
Title: Stories Beyond the pages : Parker goes to Space
Description: Stories Beyond the pages, Beyond the book, Beyond the Ordinary
Link: Stories Beyond the pages : Parker goes to SpaceStories Beyond the pages, Beyond the book, Beyond the Ordinary
description_story:
StoryWhat I am planning to make
Beyond the pages, Beyond the stories Beyond the ordinary, as the tagline refers to the books We produce are beyond the ordinary. It is not like other books, that dives into a story. Beyond ORDY books, break the boundaries of book and the surrounding. By having a storybook with activities on different pages to engage both the right and left brain as well as their 6 senses. To spark their curiosity and imagination Furthermore, have the freedom to express themselves and to have a stand and option on something they believe in.
 It is redesigning a book and creating different, unique experiences with it. With the help of words and graphics, the book uses the child's imagination, makes every interaction and experience unique to each child. 




Full set (storybook + compass) 








Arts and craft activities for all ages 








Providing the space for creative expression





 Having different activities to engage them as well as to give them an area to explore 




Exploring other areas of interest to give them options to find out what they enjoy 





Using items eg (light) to play and activate their imagination to work as they explain, what goes on in their worlds 




Interaction with the surroundings (shadow play) 








Book photoshoot 





How the project Begin
This project begins when I went back to my childhood home and memories of my childhood follow back the times where we build forts, act out stories and play dress up. Whether it was an adventure to space or Finding for Dinosaurs in the storeroom, my imagination was boundless and limitless.
As technology advances, I saw the benefits that it brings, but I also saw the downfall of children playing with toys and engaging their imagination without the help of technology. Especially being the oldest of 6 children. That inspired me to want to share my experience and help them to expand their imagination to wide horizons while also forming unforgettable childhood memories that would last a lifetime.




Imagination took me everywhere (according to my relatives i was claimed to be digging for gold here) 2002








Watching youtube at a young age 2015







Why do I care?
As a person who had a pretty imaginative childhood it has brought me here I am today. Being Imaginative has given me a leg up on being able to think differently and break the boundaries that many people
Being imaginative as a child has given me a leg up in many situations, as I was able to think outside of the box, and differently from others which led me to many out of the world ideas and concepts that are eye-catching and refreshing. Instead of mundane ideas that now with even Artificial intelligence can come up with very easily.
Jack Ma once said: ‘ The only way we can compete with machines, is by changing our educational system.” Which was referring to soft skills. Which includes being able to be creative with what one can do, and being flexible at with the form and interpret emotions and feelings.
Why support us and how will your support help
Like mentioned, we stand for being creative and different to go out of the norm and experience the world without boundaries. We come to this world with a promise to make the mundane fun again. Thus your support will help make these dreams come true and our first step is to redesign children’s books that can be used to interact with the surrounding to create different experiences overall.
We also carefully selected the age group, due to widening their horizons from a young age. To inform that being creative and different is not bad but a good; positive trait that they can anchor on and bring it to the next generation. To make design and good experience a norm rather than a luxury.
Risk and Challenges in pictures 
- Books that are very 1 time off, can be engaging at the moment but does not sustain the kids' attention very long. 




Photo: Where's waldo - https://www.amazon.in/Miraview-1000Piece-Portrait-Exhibition-Decoration/dp/B074PTP3MW








Providing a tool to keep widen the interaction radius 





Hype Realism style 




Photo/Image courtesy of Ocean Plastic Book by Chervelle Fryer








 1st draft (hyperrealism style) 





Watercolour style 




Watercolour style Photo courtesy of   VALÉRIE PICARD ; ILLUSTRATED BY MARIANNE FERRER 








Hand-drawn by our team (watercolour style)





 Final Illustration style 




Main Character's Assert board 








Expression Board  








Planets Board
description_risks:
Although an inspiring and fun concept, it definitely has its ups and downs. 

One of them is the research part as the book was mainly Targeted at kids age 5-8, years old, which was a narrow age range and was an in-between the different stages of a child's development.

Thus the front process took a while to figure out before being able to even come out with the storyline and interactive elements

Other challenges presented its way when there was a user that mentioned that books typically only appear interesting and new to a kid probably only once or twice. Anything after that seems boring. 

Which made me think long and hard of how to make the activity more engaging and something that can be done a few times but still engaging them. With the help of a few tools and experiences, I was able to come up with activities that will give them a unique and different experience despite doing it a few times.


 With the help of the compass, they could use different directions to widen the radius of interaction between the book and their surroundings. 

Apart from the above-stated problems, as we are a small team most of us had to help with each other's tasks. Where we have little to no training in that field. One of which was the graphics of the book, none of us had much knowledge of graphic design other than the basics so it took us a lot of researching of styles we can do and styles that appeal to children.

One of the styles we tried was hype-realism.
Seeing that most books seemed too kiddy for the older kids. We wanted to cater to this group too.



Next, we tried watercolour, a typical children's storybook type of style. After testing it with children and even people who work with children, most have expressed that it seems a bit dull and unsaturated to be a children's book and it seems too dark overall.

Eventually, one of us was able to find a style we all like and was realistic enough to draw and produce. 
Many of our friends, mention to outsource or have a collaboration with other artists and designers. But we thought it would mean so much if it came personally from us. Apart from that, we are a tight team and would be able to control the quality control of the product.

blurb: Sharing the journey of an unordinary life towards happiness & fulfilment. Cos' trying to lead an ordinary life can be very frustrating!
description: Sharing the journey of an unordinary life towards happiness & fulfilment. Cos' trying to lead an ordinary life can be very frustrating!
name: Living an Unordinary Life - A talk on starting the journey
title: Living an Unordinary Life - A talk on starting the journey
Title: Living an Unordinary Life - A talk on starting the journey
Description: Sharing the journey of an unordinary life towards happiness & fulfilment. Cos' trying to lead an ordinary life can be very frustrating!
Link: Living an Unordinary Life - A talk on starting the journeySharing the journey of an unordinary life towards happiness & fulfilment. Cos' trying to lead an ordinary life can be very frustrating!
description_story:
StoryHello! My name is Boon Keng and I’m an aspiring motivational speaker.I am different. I have a condition called Duchenne Muscular Dystrophy that gradually weakens the muscles in my body. Because of that, I rely on a powerchair to help me move around and there are many things I need some additional help in.But I didn’t quite like to admit that I’m different. In fact, I wanted to live a 'normal' and ordinary life. I want to get good grades, get a good job, make many friends, fall in love, get married… be just like anyone! I don’t want to be different in any way despite my physical disability.Things didn’t work out exactly how I wanted. And a few years ago, I got really unhappy (probably an understatement). I felt increasingly frustrated and in despair despite having a good and supportive environment.I realised that I felt so lousy because of this expectation to have an ordinary life. I had actually let go of living my own life just to chase the wind of an ordinary life.I learnt that…

It’s okay to be different
Different ≠ negative things
You can live an unordinary life and be happier
And I want to share this with a lot more people!









I did a degree in social work as part of my plans to become a motivational speaker. I had intended to gain experience in working with a diverse group of people and also learn from their story too. But somehow I got lost in my ambitions (had to make a U-turn to be back here!).You might be wondering what initially inspired me to be a motivational speaker...

Ideally, the talk will be open to the general public so I can share LUL with more people! Seats will first be given to the Kickstarter supporters who have pledged for their attendance, as well as close friends and family whom have been always there for me. Any leftover seats will be open for public registration at a later date. There will also be a tea reception (cos’ we all love food, don’t we?).When?
The talk will start sharp at 1.30pm. Registration starts at 1.10pm.For those holding VIP passes, it’ll be an additional 30 minutes of meet and greet! So please leave a 2-hour slot in your calendar for the talk.
Where? The venue would be at Devan Nair Institute for Employment and Employability. It should be able to comfortably accommodate 60 seated attendees (with some on wheelchairs). (It can get more cosy with more than 70 attendees!)What? The talk will cover a couple of things including:
Choosing the life of the unordinary over an ordinary or even extraordinary life


Gratitude
How an unordinary life encompasses being realistic in life
What living an unordinary life truly means
And more! (Eh I can’t possibly write a thesis here...)Note: Tickets are transferable. Don't worry that you’ll be wasting a seat even if you’re unavailable on that date!















How will this breakdown change with more money raised?
Bigger venue will be sought to accommodate more people. It costs at least $100 more for venues that can accommodate more than 100 people.
More food will be catered if there are more attendees. It costs around $5 each for additional persons.
Hiring of AV technicians for a smoother seminar experience. All the venues charge a fee of at least $200 for AV technician. As such, I'm only planning to get a friend to help out with the AV unless the funding allows for a professional.
Of course, a little more training allowance to give me an extra motivational boost!
Refer to Stretch Goals below for more details!







The budget of $1000 is meant for a turnout of 70-80 attendees. I’ve actually catered the pledge amount for 100 Kickstarter supporters/attendees… and possibly 20 more for the public or my beloved family and friends!
$1100 for better food with more variety!$1250 is for a bigger venue (and more food) that can comfortably accommodate at least 100 persons.$1500 allows for the hiring of AV technicians (of the venue) for a smoother seminar experience. But oh well... this probably doesn't sound like a Stretch Goal benefit except for reducing the chances of Murphy's Law occurrence.$2000 will allow for an even bigger venue (and yes, more food!) for at least 180 persons. However, I’m hoping to use the money to hold 2 talks (70-80 attendees each) instead of 1 to give everyone a better experience.$2400 and more… Wow thanks! I think I can erm… let everyone invite 1 more guest? Maybe we can get better food? I don’t know, but I know for sure I can start to conduct more talks. (We’ll talk more about that when we get there!)
description_risks:
It’s my first Kickstarter project and I’m sure there are some things lacking. So do let me know if I’ve missed out anything!

I’m taking a more cautious approach in planning for my talk’s logistics (and calculating the budget!). So I hope you understand why most of the details are tentative until I’m certain that the funds are going to come in.

The talk will only happen if the project reaches its funding goal. But once the funding goal is reached, I’ll start to liaise with the venue providers and finalise the details within a month after the funding period. You’ll be notified at least 3 weeks in advance of the talk’s location, date and time.

In the event that you’re unavailable for the date, you can transfer the tickets to anybody you know. Simply register the other person’s name (instead of yours) under the email address you provided (at the end of the funding period).

It’ll be a massive help if you can pledge your support as early as possible!

description_story:
Story
The Mini Essentials creates mini bags using 100% biodegradable vegan leather made from Pineapple fibres, sustainably sourced. The brand supports the Pineapple farming communities in rural Philippines, providing an income stream for them. 









The brand started with addressing the problem of bringing bulky bags while encouraging women to evaluate the purpose of every item carried and be more organised. Created for carefree women. 








Comes in different shapes to fit your daily essentials such as phone, cards and money. As a multi-bag set comes in 3, you could customise it in different bag shapes available such as round, square and rectangular. 
The bag is retailing exclusively on the brand's website to keep a competitive pricing while providing an affordable alternative for leather bags' enthusiasts. 
In order to provide more colour options for customisation, we are raising funds to research and develop the leather in custom-made colours such as Beige, Khaki and Nude Pink. The funds including a trip to the rural Philippines and visit the making of the leather. 
We started to plan the business from the past 3 months, followed by the sourcing of the sustainable materials. We are now exploring on the customisation part of the business, hoping to launch in early 2020.
The S$9000 funding goal breaks down into the flight and accommodation to the rural Philippines, the customisation, the shipping of the leather to Singapore and the making of the rewards.
description_risks: The potential challenge could be a delay in the production of leather in custom-made colours. We would then stick to only one colour (Black) until the customisation is successfully produced.

description_story:
StoryWE MADE IT!!! (Time for 'em Stretch Goals)

$2,500: Helps me pay the person who's been helping me craft this project since its conception (she's a great friend and doing this pro-bono, but everyone's time deserves to be compensated for, right?)



$3,000-$4,000: Now this is the important part. The work I am setting out to do does not end with Vietnam or Bali. When I am back in the NYC, I want to continue to:

1) Keep documenting how different people are working to create sustainable modes of fabric and textile through their organic cotton practices, hand spun wool, weaving communities in New York, and beyond.

2) Give you a sneak peak into the world of New York's fashion industry and the manufacturing processes of our sample rooms, and what a production line in our industry looks like.


Help me plan towards the future of this project and beyond!
Only a few more hours!

---“Dare to dream about a world that hasn't existed, and design for that world.” - let’s change the fashion world, starting now. Project DescriptionThis project aims to fund my research trip to Ubud, Bali, which will be one of many more research trips in Asia to come. From these research trips, I am hoping to learn and build avenues of collaboration with local communities, in understanding how to build a more responsible way of making and using clothing. In the long run, this will help me create a more informed fashion business system, by being able to understand firsthand, who makes the materials, how they make the materials, and how these materials can be utilized to their fullest potential.-“From the runways of Paris, Milan and New York, to rural garment factories worldwide… The production of clothing and textiles has grown into the second most polluting global industry— employing millions around the world in working conditions that are often unsafe and unhealthy. From widespread chemical dumping, pesticide and toxic chemical overuse, worker abuses and child labor to unprecedented levels of air pollution, carbon emissions and waste, the list of the industry's issues is too long and too urgent to ignore.” – www.ResponsibilityInFashion.orgIt’s no secret. The fashion industry’s production ethics and standards leaves much to be desired, and less talked about is the cultural propaganda and appropriation it assumes. And within this narrative is us, the consumers, who are complicit with these unsustainable practices when we continue to buy from these corporations. This has to end. The current modes of production fail to think about little else except arbitrary trends, benefiting their profit margins and fail to recognize that we are human, we are smart, and we care about the world we live in. I dream of a world that values transparency and removes the invisible barriers between the people wearing the clothes, the people making the clothes, and the resources we are exploiting. Fashion wields this admirable power of narrative -- but it has been used to tell us what we are “supposed” to wear, what we should consider beautiful, what we need, what we want, what color is “in” this season, and the list goes on. However, I believe that we can generate a fashion business that prioritizes human engagement, treats our environment responsibly, and respects all cultures equally.This TripFor this trip, I want to travel to Bali to learn from Made and Iwan of TARUM NATURAL DYE, and Ibu Tjok Agung of BISA in Pejeng. After spending more than 13 years of research combined to perfect this science of natural dying, their work aims to produce textiles that do not harm our natural environment. Both studios also work to sustain not only their natural environments, but to provide a sustainable livelihood for the local community they work in.TARUM NATURAL DYE:
Made and Iwan dedicated themselves to establishing protocols and tools for a palette of plant dyes using sustainable, locally available materials. Nine years of research revealed that most of the colours they needed could be obtained from the leaves of common plants, and four of those years were dedicated to standardizing the colours. They set out to find solutions that didn't harm the environment in any way.Today, their studio dyes both textiles and finished garments for clients, but also spins and weaves hand-loomed cotton, silk, wool and hemp fabrics to order. Off-cuts and scraps from Bali's garment factories are also over-dyed and woven into sturdy upholstery fabric.BISA: Tjok Agung Pemayun is probably Bali's leading indigo wizard. He's studied the plants and indigo dyeing techniques intensively for four years. An economics graduate, he worked as a financial controller for a Bali-based textile and garment manufacturer, where he learned the environmental hazards of cheap chemical dyes. Although his company used more environmentally-friendly German dyes and neutralized the wastewater, he still felt drawn to natural dyes. Today BISA, his studio in Pejeng, produces hand-blocked and hand-drawn batiks using natural brown and indigo dyes.After much experimentation and research, Tjok Agung has imported seeds from different varieties of indigo plants from Thailand and Sumatra. Deeply concerned about environmental issues and sustainable livelihoods in Pejeng, he's already involved in several community projects. Growing indigo offers an opportunity for village farmers to benefit from a new crop while nourishing the rice fields. Planting indigo between rice crops allows the rice fields to rest or be sown, which has not been done in the land for a long time. “Not only can they sell the indigo to me, but the fields benefit from the extra nitrogen since some indigo plants are legumes."Some Objectives Include:
Understanding and learning first hand the process of designing, wax stamping, painting traditional batik 
Have a better insight into the various batik traditions specific to different regions in Indonesia 
Ecosystem of natural environment and community resources involved in making and sustaining these crafts and heritage 
Learn how this initial research journey can shape the next steps towards building a more responsible fashion system I aim to develop
Eventually, I want to be able to travel to other countries in, and surrounding, the Southeast Asian region, a broader idea of home and cultural heritage in which I relate to as a Singaporean. I want to know more about the traditions, textiles and crafts that belong to us as a region. For example: hemp weaving and indigo dying in Sapa, Vietnam; Intricately patterned hand-woven silks from Thailand; Lotus Silk Weaving in Myanmar; Nettle and Silk Weaving in Bhutan; Cotton farmers in India and Pakistan who are in the process of converting their farms into organic cotton farms… the list goes on. The shift towards a Western ideal for the sake of modernization happened so quickly  in the past half century that our invaluable cultural knowledge has often been diminished as a result. Fashion need not only take on western cultures -- I know it, you know it, but the industry at large needs more to show for it.
 
This research trip is crucial towards outlining my business model, ascertaining a production and supply chain, formulating the best way to communicate and exemplify values of transparency and community-building, and taking a bigger stride towards shifting existing modes of information and consumption in which the fashion industry currently relies on. This is not something that happens in a snap -- there is more research to be done after this one trip, but this is your investment towards building a world that has not existed yet, but we dare to dream of now. -$200 REWARD


An assortment of 9 original artworks for your smartphone(s)!





 







-$1000 REWARD


Model Study, Color Pencil, 2012 (approx. 18" wide)





 


Classroom Study, Color Pencil & Pencil, 2012 (approx. 18" height)





 


Portrait Study, Pencil, 2012 (approx. 18" height)





 


Word Study, Pencil + Ink + Gouache, 2012 (approx. 18" height)

description_risks:
Being the first step of this journey, I don’t have all the answers or figured out what this looks like. However, this is not on a whim and I have been deeply committed to these issues throughout my work thus far. I believe the learnings and outcomes from this research will inform my next steps in a way that is true to its origin -- and any meaningful step in the right direction can only be through first-hand experience and actual connections within the region. 

In addition, some of the best and most brilliant like-minded individuals in the industry happen to be close mentors and peers, many of whom are educators and academia at Parsons and professionals in the industry who are there to guide me every step of the way. So, take this big leap of faith with me and let's start this journey waiting to be written.

description_story:
StoryBad Boss - the card game









Ever been a victim of an overbearing Bad Boss or a backstabbing colleague?
Bad Boss is a simple yet fun card game that includes the most distinct characters you will ever find in the office!
The objective is to get rid of all the cards and stay away from the Bad Boss card. It's a quick game you can play during your break without getting fired!
We created this game while laughing at our own experiences from all our previous jobs. Our desire is to capture typical office characters using bold illustrations. Please support our Kickstarter campaign to make this game a reality. 
Maybe you can give a pack to your boss and a pack to that annoying colleague!




































Kickstarter exclusive limited edition A3 poster (frame not included)








Kickstarter exclusive limited edition Bad Boss white cotton tshirt 





























We sincerely hope that our card game will encourage people to laugh at themselves. Better humor than fists in the work environment!!

















In our humble opinion, the Bad Boss card game would make the perfect office gift exchange present so our production and delivery schedule is aimed towards the Christmas season!









We want the shipping of the card game to be affordable but yet reliable. Therefore we opted for registered mail which we think has the best balance. In addition, registered mail packages can be tracked for selected countries. To protect your Bad Boss card game from damage during shipment, bubble padded envelopes will be used.
Please note that the shipping rate above is for a single deck and will be adjusted accordingly with additional packs and items ordered.

















We are a small bunch of entrepreneurs who used to slog daily in our corporate jobs. Seeing all the different characters in the office gave us the inspiration to portray them in a humorous way. 
Ming - the creator and designer of the bad boss characters and game
Philo - she takes care of our customers and ensures prompt deliveries
Kong - he is the guy who made the video and drank all our coffee


Other ways you can help
Help us spread the awareness on bad bosses and co-workers today!
Beyond making a monetary contribution, we would greatly appreciate it if you could help us spread the word by sharing our campaign link on Instagram, Facebook or Twitter. Our dream is to create a fun community and more games about office politics and horrible bosses.

blurb: Hustle: A Singaporean Card Game is a funny and simple card game that lets you hustle to reach your goals, and sabo your friends too!
description: Hustle: A Singaporean Card Game is a funny and simple card game that lets you hustle to reach your goals, and sabo your friends too!
name: Hustle: A Singapore Card Game
title: Hustle: A Singapore Card Game
Title: Hustle: A Singapore Card Game
Description: Hustle: A Singaporean Card Game is a funny and simple card game that lets you hustle to reach your goals, and sabo your friends too!
Link: Hustle: A Singapore Card GameHustle: A Singaporean Card Game is a funny and simple card game that lets you hustle to reach your goals, and sabo your friends too!
description_story:
Story



















































































Support Us!
Back HUSTLE! and be one of the very first to own an exclusive Singaporean card game about the hustle culture. Purchase add-ons to get exclusive customised cards, sticker packs and behind-the-scenes updates!
Music credits: Bensound Royalty Free Music


The Backstory
Hi there, my name is Ah Long, and I’m the lead creator of HUSTLE!
I would deeply appreciate your help and support to get this passion project started. Your contributions will go a long way toward developing the local board game community, alongside helping me to improve the product's artwork, quality (with glossy cards if we reach $10,000 or more) and overall design. We will be teaming up with local retail logistics company blu for affordable home shipping and self-collection.
•The concept of 'Hustle: A Singaporean Card Game' arose when I was considering the impact of the pandemic, and the massive disruptions it had caused to our lives, jobs and communities. Amidst the chaos, there were stories of individuals who had found out ways to secure their financial independence and stay afloat through a variety of means - admittedly, both legal and illegal. In particular, the KTV hosts and Temasek mask thieves stood out to me.
There's also been much discussion in the media over the 'hustle culture' and 'side-gigging', and how many today have taken these hustles on to pursue both their passions and their financial freedom. The economy is a funny thing, and this brave new world has created a whole new range of opportunities for livelihoods.
I then thought, 'Why not create a card game to capture this crazy, wonderful, terrifying moment in time?' The silliness of HUSTLE! was born as a result. I'm deeply grateful to the many family members and friends who have offered their criticism (feedback is love!), time and encouragement to birthing this baby.
This game is dedicated to all trying to make the best of this pandemic, and in particular, to our heroic frontliners who continue to ensure that this society keeps running. Kudos to you all.
I hope you will enjoy this game as much I as did creating it, and that this game can set you on the path to understanding your own journey to financial freedom.
description_risks:
We want to be frank and honest with all our generous backers so that you get the most genuine experience with our product.  

PRODUCTION  
We are in the final stages of sourcing and procurement with a local production company for printing our prototypes and will plan to engage them for our official decks as well.  To mitigate the risk of delays, we will be producing our cards locally to get the decks straight to you as fast as possible, and restricting distribution to the local market. We are also currently extensively prototyping and checking the quality of the cards to ensure the best version of our cards gets to you quickly.  

STRETCH GOALS AND REWARDS  
With some backer rewards requiring custom cards playable in-game, this might cause a slight delay. Our stretch goals also include cards that are not necessary for the basic version of the game but offer a more unique and dynamic gameplay. If we were to hit this stretch goal, there would be a slight delay in production as we add in these cards. 
 
FUNDING  
Kickstarter has an "All-or-Nothing" policy where the campaign gets $0 funding if the campaign doesn't reach its target. It would mean so much to the HUSTLE team if you could help to spread and share the word about this game so it becomes a reality for you (and for us).  

The HUSTLE team genuinely believes in this game being able to start new conversations about what it means to be financially independent in Singapore in this day and age.  The risk we are taking with Kickstarter is that if we are unable to be fully funded, we are not able to get the funding needed. We may have to delay the release of CHAO RECRUIT! the card game if we are unable to secure the required level of funding. Nonetheless, the team will do our very best to get this card game out and deliver a high-quality, fun, and exciting card game by our proposed date.

blurb: Welcome to Your New Cleaning Ritual.
description: Welcome to Your New Cleaning Ritual.
name: Quinn and Oliver - Sustainable Powder Body Wash
title: Quinn and Oliver - Sustainable Powder Body Wash
Title: Quinn and Oliver - Sustainable Powder Body Wash
Description: Welcome to Your New Cleaning Ritual.
Link: Quinn and Oliver - Sustainable Powder Body WashWelcome to Your New Cleaning Ritual.
description_story:
Story











It’s no secret that our planet has suffered the consequences of urbanization in the past decades. With the increase in population comes mass production of goods, of which none had brought about more environmental harm than plastic. But have we paused to think if the short-term convenience brought about by single-use plastic products justifies the long-term harm of our environment?
While many of us conscientiously make the effort to recycle plastic products or reuse them, do you know that only 9% of plastic waste is recycled annually? Humans are producing and disposing of plastic at a speed faster than ever with 46% of annual plastic waste coming from plastic packaging.









The grim reality is that even the most technologically advanced recycling plants can’t keep up with our plastic consumption, which increases exponentially every year.









Quinn and Oliver’s mission is to help reduce damaging plastic footprints by changing how you go about otherwise unnoticed activities in day-to-day life, such as taking a shower.









































Quinn and Oliver products are biodegradable, cruelty-free, organic, vegan, halal-certified, and do not contain harsh chemicals typically used in body care products. Plant-based ingredients are carefully chosen to ensure our products are kind to your skin, as well as the environment.

























































































 (*) DISCLAIMER
Please note that recipients of the orders will be responsible for any and all costs associated with import taxes, custom duties, and fees levied by the destination country, subjected to the destination country’s regulations. Any such charges will be collected directly at the time of delivery by the courier company. Quinn and Oliver has no control over such charges and cannot estimate the exact amount. Please contact your local customs office for more information.
If you decline to pay these duties and taxes due to the courier company upon delivery of your order, the package may be considered abandoned, destroyed, or returned to Singapore (at an additional cost charged to Quinn and Oliver). Under these circumstances, we, unfortunately, cannot consider requests for replacement shipments or refunds.

















Our Story
3 decades of friendship and synergies in ideals form the bedrock of our professional experiences. Co-founders of a boutique creative agency with global beauty brands as our clients, we specialize in skincare products and also own a healthy, botanical body care line.
With the rise of the clean beauty movement and the desire to create products that are more environmentally friendly, Quinn and Oliver was born.
About Shanna:
I grew up using personal care products that smelled great with tons of suds. The more fragrant and suds, the better. As I became a mum and read about the detrimental effects on our planet as a result of human consumption and behavioral patterns, I am concern about the world my children will inherit. I worry about the things I used and bathed them with. Less became more. Lesser ingredients, chemicals, and more natural, the better. The world is still beautiful but it is at a different state now. It needs to heal. I believe we can do our part one way or another. Quinn and Oliver is a small step towards a bigger movement for a sustainable future. One that begins with you.     
About Jerrine: 
I have always been more of an animal lover than I am knowledgeable about environmental pollution issues. Watching how our daily life choices can cause a cascading detrimental effect on our environment and leading to animals’ suffering in recent years, I wondered what can be done beyond the usual recycling of plastics.
Quinn and Oliver is not just a body wash product. It is the ideology and approach that gives us a chance to stop creating the endless loop of destruction to our planet. The focus is not on us, it is on your important decision to effect a change we need. Because of your leap of faith in us, we hope we can all create a better, renewed world for a very long time to come. Welcome to your new cleaning ritual.
description_risks:
Our product is currently in the development phase and we will start full production if we reach our funding goals. We are planning to start shipping the first units around September 2021. Our mission is to convince people that switching to powder body wash is a better alternative to conventional liquid body wash. Changing of habits and mindset is our biggest challenge and we hope to effect the change our planet badly needs through the support of our backers. 


Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

description_story:
StoryAbout
“Oh god, here comes social interaction.”
For some, talking to people takes too much effort. It's easy to get lost in your own head, and sometimes, you even start to question your being when you’re too overwhelmed. It just maKES YOU WANT TO SCREAM!!! but you can't because you're in public. Through 'INTERNAL SCREAMING: The Book', we encourage you to visually share your happiness, fears, and deepest secrets. Or simply just destroy the pages when it gets that intense. The activities in this journal will allow you to be more honest with yourself, because hey, no one can hear you scream.Good Points:
It’s a safe space for you and your brain 
The activities will nurture you throughout your inner turmoil 
Learn more about yourself as you analyse the pages you’ve ‘destroyed’
There are no limits 
Bad Points: There are no limits JournalDrawing, destroying, and leaving kiss marks on ‘INTERNAL SCREAMING: The Book’ are encouraged. Packed with 170 pages of activities, this is an A5 sized journal, with durable paper, as we will ask you to do some pretty stupid shit. 





 Some examples include:  








 








 “By committing to the Visual Journaling Process, one can learn how to access their language of imagery, & express it both visual & verbally, while exploring the connection between image & word” – Michael Bell, Celebrity Artist.Hopefully, by the end of the journal, your copy of the book will be a huge mess that you can't even close.ContactIf you have any enquiries, please contact innovcolony@gmail.com
description_risks:
For 'INTERNAL SCREAMING: The Book', one of the biggest challenges is getting people to support and back us on Kickstarter. For this, we have rallied our friends and families to support us through backing us on Kickstarter, as well as show their support by spreading the word of 'INTERNAL SCREAMING: The Book' through social media. 

You too, can help us, by telling your friends, families, co-workers and pets about this phenomenal journal. Sharing and spreading the word will likely increase our chances of getting funded! The earlier we get the funds to start production, the earlier it will be in your hand.

blurb: A collection of Hard Enamel Pins featuring poke-dolls in Mimikyu plush theme.
description: A collection of Hard Enamel Pins featuring poke-dolls in Mimikyu plush theme.
name: Eeveekyu and Friends Plush Enamel Pins
title: Eeveekyu and Friends Plush Enamel Pins
Title: Eeveekyu and Friends Plush Enamel Pins
Description: A collection of Hard Enamel Pins featuring poke-dolls in Mimikyu plush theme.
Link: Eeveekyu and Friends Plush Enamel PinsA collection of Hard Enamel Pins featuring poke-dolls in Mimikyu plush theme.
description_story:
Story










Hello everyone! Previously, I have been making countless enamel pins with chibi designs! Holidays are one of the greatest joys in life. A time we look forward to every time of the year. This time, Halloween is just around the corner and I thought it's the best time to include a special little ghostie; Mimikyu!

 

   Originally, I got really interested in Mimikyu due to its story. A story about a cute little Pokemon trying to make friends! It inspired me to make my new series, Mimikyu Doll Plushie Friends! In this project, it includes Mimikyu dressed up in many different outfits to prepare for Halloween with many fan favourites like eeveelutions and many more! I hope that not only Mimikyu has a blast during this Halloween but also make a ton of new friends with everyone! I hope everyone is excited to have a new cute friend!










  Kickstarter operates via Pledge Now, Pay Later system. This means that Kickstarter will not charge you until the end of the campaign and only if our initial goal is funded.
  Pledges are entitled to modify their pledges (i.e. Edits/cancel) at any given point provided that it is made before the deadline of the pledging period.
  The pledges accumulated will initially unlock the starting goal, Mimikyu Pin ($300) as well as many others on the own respective milestones, with additional designs/ variants or special gifts the more milestones this project unlocks.
  By pledging, you'll get your favorite Pins at a discounted rate with freebies and also with standard grade (Grade A) - any extras Pins will then be sold on my Online Store at a higher price in the future.
  During the end of the pledging period, you will automatically be sent a kickstarter survey that asks inquire about your shipping details i.e. Delivery address, and which pin(s) you would like to receive. Please not that colors may slightly vary from monitor to monitor.










My Eeveekyu will all be made as Hard Enamel Pins, each with a classical metal plating in colour Gold. Size will vary between 1.25 to 1.5 inches accordingly. There are countless uses for pins such as accessories for clothing, collections, gifts and many more! We're aiming for the unlock or all our Elemental dragons and with that, bring about more hidden goodies! You will be eligible to pick any of the unlocked pins after the pledging campaign through a survey which will be sent to your e-mail!


Please refer to my Ig or update for photos. 


Important notes for existing backers!
♥ Add-ons $8 for washi tape your current pledge!
♥ Add-ons $8 for Acrylic charms your current pledge!
♥ Add-ons $15 for sticker pack of to your current pledge!
♥ Add $13 for each extra pins to your current pledge!
Also, freebies will be given for backers who pledge 6 pins and above!


(Do not hesitate to contact me via message through kickstarter or social media!)
I´m very active on Instagram and you can follow me for more information and updates!


Pledge Now, Pay Later! This means that Kickstarter will not charge you until the end of the campaign and only if our initial goal is funded. This helps to unlock the alternate designs as shown as stretch goals too!


When the project ends, you will automatically be sent a Kickstarter survey that asks for your delivery address, and which pin(s) you would like. Please note that colors may slightly vary from monitor to monitor.









August: The campaign runs.


August-September: The campaign ends, all pledges are collected/cards are charged, and I will get the backer reward surveys set up and sent out.


September-October: It takes about 2 weeks for Kickstarter to release the funds raised to me. Once I get the funds, production shall commence! Production should take around 2-3 weeks with about a week of transit time for the pins to arrive to me after being shipped out.


November-December: Pins arrive! I will quality check and review everything before starting to pack up rewards and send them to their new homes.


Ps. This is a tentative timeline. I have included buffer time for in-case there are production snags or any delays. I will update backers throughout the whole process on Kickstarter and Instagram.









Due to global slowdowns as a result of the Covid-19 situation, international shipping will be expecting an additional 2-3 months delay in addition to the usual shipping time.


All shipment will be ordinarily shipped from Singapore using SingPost's Standard Shipping. We will be providing registered mails for all pledges received. A tracking number will be provided with all pledges once the shipment is ready to be shipped. The update of the status for your tracking information is based solely on each individual country's postal services.


Please be informed that the shipping duration will be equal for all forms of mail. On average, packages may take up to approximately 4-6 weeks to reach their destination. However, in rare occasions packages may be delayed up to 3 months due to factors beyond my control such as delays at custom, high delivery load during festive seasons and many others.
description_risks:
Risks are always involved during the entire procedure to the final product. From the manufacturing errors to extended production and also shipping delays, there are many factors that needs to be taken into account when providing an accurate shipping time. For this reason, I have decided to allot an extra month for the completion of this project. I have been running kick-starter projects for two years running and had made multiple pin projects along the way! As such, I'm confident in my management capabilities in monitoring a smooth cycle through the experiences I gained along the way.

I'm currently anticipating the risks that could arise when dealing with the manufacturers. I'm doing my best to work closely with my designated manufacturers to reduce any chances of possible risks that might happen during the manufacturing period. You might experience a little variant in the colors as it varies from screen to screen. They may also look slightly different from the featured designed in accordance to their production. As most variants have minimal effect on the final product, it will not result in any changes to the overall aspects of the pins.

Therefore, with all the factors in mind, I would like to remind everyone that the time line may not be reliable due to the different factors out of my control which resulted in my decision to allot an extra month for the completion of this project. I will be relentlessly trying my outmost best to be able to provide a solution for any given situation at the shortest possible time frame. I will also be sure to keep everyone posted and updated on all situations. Thank you kindly for your support and Have a great day!

blurb: The most revolutionary backpack system with customizable StylePak accessories. Complete personalization for your evolving lifestyle.
description: The most revolutionary backpack system with customizable StylePak accessories. Complete personalization for your evolving lifestyle.
name: 22seven ORION Backpack
title: 22seven ORION Backpack
Title: 22seven ORION Backpack
Description: The most revolutionary backpack system with customizable StylePak accessories. Complete personalization for your evolving lifestyle.
Link: 22seven ORION BackpackThe most revolutionary backpack system with customizable StylePak accessories. Complete personalization for your evolving lifestyle.
description_story:
Story










The 22seven ORION backpack system is designed so that you can quickly pack for the day’s needs at work. Completely customizable to ensure your professional gear is organized and easily accessible.









What’s more, it looks and works great for after work get-togethers or even a workout at the gym too.

















And because everyone has a different style, we have two options – Stealth Black in ballistic nylon and Urban Heather in high weave polyester.

















Configured with its ergonomically designed FacePak, it offers you all the features you need for your busy lifestyle.









Or personalize your BasePak with the multi-dimensional StylePak accessories so that you have the flexibility to adapt during the day.









Unlike other brands that offer the same bag in different colors, we brought you two different backpacks. Both distinctively styled for individuality. 

















 Pick one that reflects your style. It is all about expressing your unique personality!






















































The BasePak features patented FIDLOCK magnetic snap fasteners. This ultra-reliable fastening system makes it quick to remove the FacePak and allows you to securely attach the optional StylePak accessories.









Configure it, however and whenever you need to. It is fun and easy too.









Back us now so that we can create more exciting StylePak accessories for your lifestyle, personalized. Be ready to adapt on the go and don’t get caught out by what the day throws at you!









Unlike other modular backpacks that offer several combinations for a few pre-conceived uses, the 22seven ORION backpack is completely adaptable with a wide range of StylePak accessories. This is beyond modularity. 









No two people have the same needs and style. Create your unique backpack and make a statement now!









We mean it when we say the 22seven ORION backpack is the only bag you need for a lifestyle personalized!









With these innovative StylePak accessories, the 22seven ORION backpack system will change how you work and how you live your life.









We need a successful Kickstarter campaign so that we can introduce our first series of StylePak accessories after the campaign. 









With the 22seven StylePak accessories, the power of customization is in your hands.









Help us bring the 22seven StylePak Ecosystem to life so that we can create even more innovative accessories!

















We know that practical functionality and ergonomics are the cornerstones of user experience. So we aim to maximize your convenience and satisfaction!









We designed it so that you have quick access to all your documents and gear. 









We want to help you keep your day organized.









Beyond just clever design and complete customization, we have selected top-grade fabrics and quality components for a premium look and feel on all 22seven products.











Of course, don´t just take our word for it! We have conducted extensive lab testing and field testing to ensure we deliver on our promise of performance and quality.

















Our experienced 22seven team members have longstanding relationships with some of the most technically proficient factories that are trusted by many of the world’s most established brands.


Help get us funded so that we can work directly with these partners to bring you not only the best craftsmanship but also ensure you get the greatest value too!









We all have several bags stashed somewhere around the house yet most times we end up using one bag for most occasions because it is just too much trouble swapping bags and repacking our stuff!









No one bag suits all our activities for the day but let’s face it, none of us like to carry more than one bag. So we spent three years creating the ONE customizable backpack for all your work and lifestyle needs.

















After years of designing and making products for major brands in the sporting and lifestyle markets, we have seen many great products brought to market but the unique “you” is still missing in the product.
So we put our brains together and founded a different kind of brand, focused on designing products of great value that truly make a difference to the way you live.
With our experienced developers and direct access to material suppliers and factories, it means we only invest in what truly makes the product better for YOU.
By creating and delivering premium products made of the best materials, modern manufacturing technologies and true craftsmanship, the result is a range of ever-evolving products that live up to your lifestyle needs.
At 22seven, we are dedicated to creating premium products that are timeless in design and adaptable to your changing needs for years to come so that you can live your lifestyle, personalized!
description_risks:
Unexpected issues with deliveries in light of shipping disruption during the current pandemic. 

However, we will keep everyone updated if there are any delays in shipping and will do our best to ship on time. 

All production will be subject to supply chain risks (eg. production or material delays etc.) or destination risks (eg. tax jurisdiction in some countries may collect taxes/duties) although our team has put in place robust measures to make sure you receive the product correctly and on time. 

Thanks for backing us!

blurb: A winter baby carrier cover
description: A winter baby carrier cover
name: MarkoMiles Cocoon
title: MarkoMiles Cocoon
Title: MarkoMiles Cocoon
Description: A winter baby carrier cover
Link: MarkoMiles CocoonA winter baby carrier cover
description_story:
StoryHelp MarkoMiles to launch its new range of affordable winter babycarrier covers. 
If you are a parent you may own a baby carrier and babywear often but how do you keep your child warm and protected from the elements in cold weather? Avoid layering bulky jackets in-between the both of you and use your combined body heat to create a cocoon of warmth for you and your child.
We are excited to launch a winter babywearing cover that is affordable, functional and looks as good as your carrier! 
The Cocoon is made from two fabrics. The front panel is made from a specially designed three layer fabric. It has a waterproof outer, windproof middle layer and a warm fleece on the inside. The back panel is made from a stretchy fabric.
It is:

  Unisex
  Can fit a range of sizes
  Waterproof
  Windproof
  Warm 
  Looks great underneath your jacket

Like a Cocoon the design makes sure wind and cold cannot pass in through the sides and allows body heat to become trapped creating a small oven of warmth.
description_risks: We already have manufacturing set up and have funded the initial development and sampling. The funding achieved from Kickstarter will help us to manufacture a our first round of Cocoons and bring them to market. All backers who commit $35 SGD or more will receive a Cocoon at half of the retail price they will sell for later.
