blurb: Selvedge denim sourced from the best mills, individually crafted to your specifications. Own a pair of denim that is truly yours.
description: Selvedge denim sourced from the best mills, individually crafted to your specifications. Own a pair of denim that is truly yours.
name: Custom Made Selvedge Denim Jeans - Journal Projects
title: Custom Made Selvedge Denim Jeans - Journal Projects
Title: Custom Made Selvedge Denim Jeans - Journal Projects
Description: Selvedge denim sourced from the best mills, individually crafted to your specifications. Own a pair of denim that is truly yours.
Link: Custom Made Selvedge Denim Jeans - Journal ProjectsSelvedge denim sourced from the best mills, individually crafted to your specifications. Own a pair of denim that is truly yours.
description_story:
Story






Instagram  |  Facebook  |   journalprojects.com







Made Well & Lived InJournal Projects is an independent label based in Singapore. Launched over a year ago, we had the simple belief of creating products that are timeless in its value and aesthetic. Our pioneering product was in small batch raw selvedge denim, we loved the high standards set in the artisanal denim market and were determined to strive for it.(Raw Selvedge Denim can only be woven on special shuttle looms and is differentiated by their coloured fray-less denim edges, a hallmark of premium denim. Unwashed and untreated, the denim fabric will fade and develop character with multiple wears.)


Raw Denim Worn For A Year





Individually Custom Made Our venture into custom-made selvedge denim was driven by customer demand and we believed that it tied-in well with the ethos of personalisation and wabi-sabi lifestyle that came with raw denim. Through customisation, you will own a pair of denim jeans that is truly yours. Each pair of denim is individually crafted to your specifications by the experienced hands of our family of craftsmen in Indonesia.Customisation is a 2-way collaboration between you and us and we believe in getting things right the first time. Therefore, we have created 5 easy steps to help you create your own custom made denim jeans.







Once you have pledged your reward, we will send out a survey to your email. Customize Your Selvedge Denim In 5 steps.1) Choose your Fabric2) Choose your Design (Front & Back Pockets and Fly)3) Choose your Buttons, Rivets & Thread4) Choose your Fit and Size (or key in your own measurements)5) Opt for any Free Add-ons (waist adjusters, cargo pockets) 









 









 

 

 

 









 









 Please refer to our size guide at the bottom of the page to get a more accurate fit. We have 3 fits available: Slim Tapered, Slim Straight and Regular Straight. Our sizes run from 26 to 42. If the 3 fits are not suitable, you also have the option of customizing all the measurements. (Waist, Seat, Front & Back Rise, Seat, Thigh, Knee, Leg opening)







 

 

 









 









 









 









 







 







                                                Thank you for your support! Size Guide Find your favourite pair of jeans/pants at home and measure the following parts to get an accurate fit.
description_risks:
Please note that every pair of denim is individually customized to your specifications and we cannot accept returns/refunds.

We try our best to ensure that every detail and measurement is made exact to your measurements. In the case of error, please give an allowance of up to +/- 2 cm.

We are conservative in our shipping estimates.  In the event of any delays due to either shipping or failure to pass our round of quality checks, we will update you personally via email.

blurb: A Swiss Made automatic watch with an iconic cushion-shaped design and screwed-down bezel. Delivered to you at an amazing price.
description: A Swiss Made automatic watch with an iconic cushion-shaped design and screwed-down bezel. Delivered to you at an amazing price.
name: SUPERELLIPSE - Swiss automatic watch, designed in Singapore
title: SUPERELLIPSE - Swiss automatic watch, designed in Singapore
Title: SUPERELLIPSE - Swiss automatic watch, designed in Singapore
Description: A Swiss Made automatic watch with an iconic cushion-shaped design and screwed-down bezel. Delivered to you at an amazing price.
Link: SUPERELLIPSE - Swiss automatic watch, designed in SingaporeA Swiss Made automatic watch with an iconic cushion-shaped design and screwed-down bezel. Delivered to you at an amazing price.
description_story:
Story







Jubileon is an independent and aspiring watchmaker in sunny Singapore. Jubileon was founded in 2015 – when Singapore celebrated the Golden Jubilee – by two mechanical engineers in the advanced manufacturing industry who are fanatical about mechanical watches.We have deep respect and reverence for the traditions of watchmaking, and our dream is to produce high quality Made in Singapore watches one day. Till then, every Jubileon watch will be of Swiss Made quality.







The Superellipse is a premium Swiss Made automatic watch at an accessible price point. Its unique and unorthodox design - a combination of the beautiful cushion case and screwed down bezel - is highly provocative and is destined to polarize opinions. The name of the watch is inspired by the superellipse curve, which is the mathematical representation of the cushion shape.Personally, we love it very much, and we hope that you will love it as much as we do!At a glance:
Swiss Made.
Designed and engineered in Singapore.
Swiss Made ETA 2824-2 movement.
39 mm wide, 9.4 mm thick, 50 mm lug-to-lug.
Sapphire crystals front and back.
50 m water resistance.
Stainless steel 316L case, brushed and polished.
Custom decorative screw heads for bezel and caseback.
Engraved logo on crown and buckle.
Dial with applied indices and date window. 

Leaf-shaped minute and hour hands with Super-Luminova C1.
First 500 pieces individually numbered.










 







Every detail matters - Many watchmakers opt for stock components in order to minimize cost and maximize profit. Not us. We have carefully designed and customized many of the components in Superellipse to ensure that it is an exquisite and truly unique watch.Masterfully engineered - With deep experience in the advanced manufacturing industry, we uphold the highest engineering standards when it comes to the engineering of the Superellipse. Every component is modelled on computer, so that our manufacturers know exactly what we want and we know exactly what you are getting.







 







"For me, it feels like a timeless choice, that should be at home in the office, with jeans, or with the Hawaiian shirt eating pineapple shaved ice. Some things are just modern classics."- WristWatchReview [Link to full review]







The quest for perfection - As perfectionists, we have impossibly high standards and don't settle for less. We have worked very hard with our manufacturers to ensure that the Superellipse is crafted meticulously to extremely high quality.







Swiss Made - A high quality watch must be manufactured by the very best, and that means Swiss Made. We are partnering with reputable and experienced partners in Switzerland who produce watches for several of the top brands in the world. It goes without saying that every Superellipse watch is hand-assembled in Switzerland by highly skilled watchmakers, as proven by the coveted Swiss Made brand.







 







The perfect package - When it comes to delivering quality and value, we don't cut corners. The Superellipse is an assembly of features typically found only in high-end Swiss Made watches.







Dimensions:
Case width: 39 mm.
Case width with crown: 43 mm.
Lug-to-lug: 50 mm.
Case thickness: 9.4 mm.
Lug width: 20 mm.








The dominant theme of the Superellipse is the iconic cushion shape, which is our personal favourite shape for watches. The cushion shape can be mathematically represented as a superellipse curve, which inspired the name of the watch. In Superellipse, the cushion shape is hinted through the bezel, the caseback, the crown, the minute markings on the dial (although the prototype photos do not currently feature this), and at the base of the three hands. 

 


Geometry definition of the bezel





 







The heart of the Superellipse is the Swiss Made ETA 2824-2 movement, an extremely rare choice for watches at this price point due its high cost. We chose ETA over other Swiss, Japanese and Chinese movements as ETA is one of the most trusted and established powerhouses in movement manufacturing. With a reliable workhorse powering every tick, the Superellipse will be your trusted companion for many years to come.







ETA 2824-2 features and specifications:
28,800 vibrations per hour (8 ticks per second). 
Swiss Made 25 Jewels. 
38 hours running time. 
Hour, minute, sweep second. 
Date window at 3H position.








The case is a 3-component assembly comprising the bezel, body and caseback. Each piece is made of medical grade 316L stainless steel. 





You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play


































Replay with sound









Play with 
 sound












00:00


00:00


































To manufacture, each piece is first stamped out from a blank to get an approximate shape, and then machined to the final form. A non-circular shape means that the Superellipse case is more difficult to produce, where a lathe alone is insufficient.Lastly, the chamfers are expertly polished to achieve the scintillating mirror finish, while the remaining surfaces are carefully brushed to get the beautiful hairline finish. The case has been meticulously designed, which is apparent from the many continuous curves on the case, such as the one joining the lugs to the side of the watch.








 







Being mechanical engineers, we make no secret of our love for screws, bolts and nuts. Naturally, rather than pressed-down, the bezel and the caseback are screwed-down to the main body with four screws each. The screws, which have customised screw heads that are beautifully polished, also double as ornamental adornments to the four corners of the bezel and the caseback. 







The word ‘SUPERELLIPSE’ is laser-engraved on the top half of the caseback, while the first 500 Superellipse watches additionally feature a limited edition running number (No. 1, No. 2, … , No. 500) at the bottom half.







 







Both the bezel and the caseback are encased with sapphire crystals, which stay practically scratch-free even after years. For the caseback, the sapphire crystal provides a clear window to the intricate inner workings of the ETA 2824-2 movement.We use sapphire crystals instead of mineral crystals even though they are several times more expensive. With hardness that is second only to diamond, the sapphire crystal is extremely scratch resistant and retain its brand new look even after many years in service. 







 







The dial is a combination of pad-printed minute markings and applied hour indices. The hour indices are our proprietary design, which have multiple chamfers to improve reflectivity. 





You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play


































Replay with sound









Play with 
 sound












00:00


00:00


































The length of each minute markings have been carefully modified so that they form a unique superellipse shape (which unfortunately has been left out in the present prototype, but will be included in actual product).For the wording layout, there are also two options:

Singapore edition - with 'JUBILEON SINGAPORE' on top and 'AUTOMATIC' below. This gives the dial a well-balanced feel.

International edition - with 'JUBILEON AUTOMATIC' on top and blank below. This is an alternate dial for backers who prefer not to have the word 'SINGAPORE' on the dial.








Note: You can choose the type of dial layout at the end of the campaign. 









Like many of the components in Superellipse, much attention has been paid to the design of the three hands. The leaf-shaped hour and minute hands are derivative of the superellipse shape – achieved by joining together two opposite curves in the superellipse shape.







In addition, each of the hand also sport a superellipse-shaped base. To ensure great visibility at low light, Super-LumiNova C1 pigments are applied on the hands, while an angled top surface (rather than a flat top surface) improves light reflection and legibility during the day.







 







To complete the Superellipse, we are offering three great strap options to pair the watch head:
Black genuine calfskin leather, embossed with crocodile pattern.
Black genuine calfskin leather, smooth.
Black woven nylon.
All three options come with a customised tongue buckle bearing the Jubileon logo, brushed to the same hairline finish as the case. We only have photographs of the first option at this moment and are working on high quality photographs of the other two.Note: You can choose the strap type at the end of the campaign.


Genuine calfskin leather, with embossed crocodile pattern





Also, we are exploring the possibility of working with a local leather artisan in Singapore to provide hand-stitched genuine leather as a premium option.







The Superellipse series is offered in three amazing styles:
Jet Black
Metallic Silver
Sunburst Grey
Each of the style pairs beautifully with the three strap options offered.
Note: You can choose the style and strap at the end of the campaign!








 









 







First backed, first served - The first 500 Superellipse watches are classified as Limited Edition and will be individually laser engraved with their respective number. The earlier you back, the lower your number will be!







 








We have not decided on any stretch goal for now, but we have some exciting ideas and so we are reserving this space!Do let us know if there is anything that you would love to see on the Superellipse!







Based on the first prototype, we have made several design enhancements. As these are minor changes, we have decided not to go through another round of prototyping to save cost and money (which ultimately translates into cost savings for backers). These changes are listed below:
Minute markings in superellipse shape.

Logo on crown and buckle updated with a cleaner version. 








 









 







 







We are committed to delivering products of the highest quality to our backers, and Superellipse is designed to be a timekeeping companion for many years to come. Therefore, we provide a limited warranty of manufacturing defects for a period of two (2) years for every Superellipse watch after the original purchase. 







The Superellipse has already been prototyped and is fully ready for production. Personally, we absolutely love the watch and have been wearing it for a daily basis. We would love to see this amazing watch on your wrist too.However, we run on a shoestring budget and cannot afford to pay for the tooling and parts required for a minimum order of the Superellipse. Therefore, your help and support will be needed to realize the production of the Superellipse. In return, we offer the Superellipse at a heavily discounted price (>40% off future retail price), which we think is a great value as branded watch of similar (or even inferior!) quality is several times more expensive.Also, your support will mean the world to us. Besides enabling the production of Superellipse, they fulfil our dreams of designing and manufacturing our own watch series, and will be great encouragement for us to continue innovating and designing more great watches in the future.Thank you very much!
description_risks:
We have already received the first prototype from our partner in the Switzerland. The quality and craftsmanship of the Superellipse is superb and eclipses the very high bar that we set for the product quality. For the dial, there is slight deviation between the minute markers printing in the prototype and our design, but we have since communicated the issue to our partner and have received assurance that it can be easily rectified for  the actual production batch.

With the method of production and the quality of the product already proven, you can be assured that a top-notch product will be delivered to you. As the watch assembly takes place in Switzerland, please be aware that unexpected circumstances beyond our control may lead to late deliveries.

In any case, we will be maintaining a regular and personal communication with our partner in Switzerland to ensure that the production is on schedule. Lastly, we will also be providing regular updates to our backers during the production process.

blurb: KIN is a beautiful everyday wallet that solves your everyday problem of keeping change.
description: KIN is a beautiful everyday wallet that solves your everyday problem of keeping change.
name: KIN - World's first wallet that sorts your cash in a cinch.
title: KIN - World's first wallet that sorts your cash in a cinch.
Title: KIN - World's first wallet that sorts your cash in a cinch.
Description: KIN is a beautiful everyday wallet that solves your everyday problem of keeping change.
Link: KIN - World's first wallet that sorts your cash in a cinch.KIN is a beautiful everyday wallet that solves your everyday problem of keeping change.
description_story:
Story


We are so humbled by the overwhelming response!! Thank you for the enthusiastic response and love! Please do continue to support us!





AS FEATURED ON




"Say goodbye to a messy wallet."





 




"シンプルながら画期的です。" - "Simple yet revolutionary"





 


"Of all the wallet designs out there, I've never seen one that could do this..."





 


"The tyranny of loose change is over."





 





Thank you so much for the support!



 

 For press/blogs, check out our press kit for high quality photos and GIFs!  

 THE DILEMMA



Have you ever experienced the embarrassment of holding up the queue from keeping change?





Accepting change is easy, but keeping it has always been a struggle. It's the year 2016, but we haven't really put a lot of thought into how we keep our change. So we wanted to create a wallet that would not only be beautiful, but would put our change receiving woes to rest.




Do you fumble with a coin pouch in your bag just to keep your coins?





 


Have you ever tried to improvise with your coin pouch, to no avail?





 


Do your coins magically disappear after you put them in your pocket?





MEET KIN 







KIN is the world’s first wallet that separates your cash and coins in a cinch. The wallet offers a simple solution to manage an age old dilemma, and is designed to manage coins and cash efficiently in ways not imagined! 
WHY YOU'LL LOVE KINKIN does the separating for you.
 We’ve always received our change together, so why do we separate our coins and cash? With KIN, simply put all your change from the top, and let the wallet do the separating for you.







 


KIN catches all your coins safely, so you don't have to worry about them falling out.






       
KIN makes coin management so much easier.



To take the coins out, simply open the flap on the side. Take what you need, and close it with a snap!





KIN holds as many coins as you need.



Lots of coins? Don't worry, KIN's got you.





SPECIFICATIONS








 



KIN does the job without adding unnecessary bulk to your wallet.





 



Many of you have asked us how thick KIN would be with cards. Here's a comparison of the wallets filled with 9 cards!





 




KIN is water resistant and built to last with state of the art industrial materials.





KIN comes in three beautiful colours, guaranteed to add a splash of fun and joy into your life.

 



KIN in original Burnt Sienna.





 



KIN in Olive Green.





 



KIN in Ultramarine.





 




NEW: KIN in Meteorite Grey





 



NEW: KIN in Kepler Black





 

 THE PROCESS
KIN was born when we noticed the problem of keeping change had gone by unaddressed for so long. After months of sketching, making, and creating, we have finally created something that we are truly proud of. 











 








  








 STRETCH GOALS



Meteorite Grey is our very first stretch goal, and you have helped us unlock it! Thank you so much!





 



For those who live for the colour black, we are excited to announce that KIN's new addition: Kepler Black is unlocked! Thank you so much!





  









 
THE TEAM
We are a team of industrial designers from Singapore who want to make meaningful products to solve everyday problems. We made KIN to make your life easier and more convenient, and we hope that you can back us to bring KIN to the world.








SPREAD THE WORD








 







Any questions about KIN? Don't hesitate to contact us at kinstudio.sg@gmail.com and we'll be sure to reply as soon as possible!
description_risks:

We believe in clear, transparent communication with our esteemed backers, and we wish to assure backers that any and all issues that may surface in the process will be relayed to you as soon as possible.

Currently, we are in talks with a manufacturer to bring KIN to life. However, our biggest challenge for this project will be meeting the minimum order quantities for manufacturing. This project can only become a reality with your help and funding!

blurb: DARBE is an ethical artisanal jewelry that upholds women's empowerment and aesthetics.
description: DARBE is an ethical artisanal jewelry that upholds women's empowerment and aesthetics.
name: DARBE
title: DARBE
Title: DARBE
Description: DARBE is an ethical artisanal jewelry that upholds women's empowerment and aesthetics.
Link: DARBEDARBE is an ethical artisanal jewelry that upholds women's empowerment and aesthetics.
description_story:
StoryAbout DARBE









DARBE is a Singapore-based, Bali-manufactured artisanal jewelry brand that upholds women empowerment and is made from sustainable materials. The brand promotes ethical business values by contributing to local initiatives and supporting artisans. 
DARBE in Javanese means the possession, ensuring the customer can possess one-of-a-kind pieces. DARBE is inspired by natural elements such as flowers, water, plants beautifully crafted by hand. Inspired by traditional craft combined with a modern twist.


In the midst of productive and busy days, women require statement yet easy to wear, sustainable jewelry. DARBE was created to provide women a range of semi-precious jewelry to elevate their look instantly.


DARBE promotes transparency and sustainability by only using sustainable materials such as recycled steel, metal, gold, and copper; complemented with pearls and gemstone. DARBE invites all jewelry enthusiasts to be conscious of their choices. 


The Products




Pesona Bracelet , Camani Necklace , Alur Ring , Rupa Earrings








Made from 100% Recycled Paper & Canvas ( It's Plastic Free! )





Each of the products will be delivered using 100% plastic-free packaging and made from recycled paper and canvas.


 DARBE is Supporting Local Artisans 









Our brand is supporting local artisans in Bali during the pandemic and also aims to embrace the power of craftmanship. 


About The Founder


DARBE is made possible by Miranthi Putri Fitrianda, a Student from Raffles Design Institute, Singapore as her final project. Striving for sustainability and creativity, she came up with the idea to conserve her Javanese heritage with a modern twist. She also wanted to create a business that made an impact on society and the environment in order to save mother earth.


The Rewards









Along with the opportunity to pre-order the pieces from our first collection, we are also offering our exclusive hand wrist tote bag made from recycled canvas that can be carried as a grocery bag or even your daily go-to bag! FYI: your shipping address and order details will be collected via a survey once the campaign closes.


How Your Money Will Be Spent
The fundraising goal for DARBE is $200. Funds raised through this campaign will pay for:
· Content production: Paying our brilliant contributors
· Kickstarter’s: There is a 5% platform fee and 3-5% processing fees.


Other Ways You Can Support The Project
· Follow Us On Instagram; @darbe__atelier
· Tell Your Friends To Follow Us On Instagram!
· Share The Kickstarter Link with your peers and family




Thank You!

blurb: Sustainable Business Plan (College Level Graduation Project ) that inspires and informs consumers about upcycling.
description: Sustainable Business Plan (College Level Graduation Project ) that inspires and informs consumers about upcycling.
name: TIMELESS Clothing - UpCycled Fashion Brand
title: TIMELESS Clothing - UpCycled Fashion Brand
Title: TIMELESS Clothing - UpCycled Fashion Brand
Description: Sustainable Business Plan (College Level Graduation Project ) that inspires and informs consumers about upcycling.
Link: TIMELESS Clothing - UpCycled Fashion BrandSustainable Business Plan (College Level Graduation Project ) that inspires and informs consumers about upcycling.
description_story:
StoryThe Timeless Clothing is a sustainable fashion brand that focuses exclusively on up-cycling old Sarees. It aims at creating a sustainable solution in our daily life, to inspire and inform people about a more conscious way of living with an emphasis on environmental sustainability and ethical fashion. Timeless Clothing creates garments made out of old Sarees and old materials, the collection is a mix of ethnic and modern fashion.Our Mission Statement is to reduce, up-cycle and personalise.Timeless Clothing has tied up with the best local tailors and fashion boutiques in Singapore to get the business running. We accept donations of Sarees, the undamaged sarees are sold 2nd hand, the others are converted into different garments and hold pop-up workshops.PRODUCTS (Prototype)Timeless Kit - Personalised clothing 1 Set clothing + 1or 2 item extra (depending on the availability of the material ) and 2 accessories (head scarfs, hair bands, neckties or bowties).Individual products - Can be purchased at the store or at the pop-up workshop







 






 








 







 Donation ‘One person's trash is another person's treasure. When you donate to Timeless Clothing we either convert it to a design of higher value or it is purchased by people who genuinely like it as it is.Pop- Up workshops Workshops will be held ones in three months in shopping malls around Singapore where artist and designers will teach sustainable techniques and spread public awareness about up-cycle by creating something that has better environmental value. Provide DIY & hacks to make simple garments by yourself from your own Sarees or materials.Funds raised through Kickstarter, we will be able to conduct a Pop-Up workshop and do a marketing campaign to kick-start our brand.We buy more clothes than what we need, cheap and low-quality clothes which is not environmental friendly as it is not sustainable, not renewable nor biodegradable. How can we contribute to creating a balance in the environment?Upcycling is a new emerging trend that serves the purpose of giving new life to items that are considered as waste material or items that are to be disposed of. The way we produce and consume clothes need to be changed and the change starts from within:
BUY LESS - Buy only what is needed to Know the story behind it - what is it made up of? who made it? is it ethical? 
Shop local or get your clothes tailor-made 
Up-cycle the clothes you stopped using as it helps reduce the volume of discarded clothes and waste materials that go into landfills every year. In turn reducing the production of new or raw material which also means a reduction in water wastage, air pollution, etc and helps in conserving natural resources.

StoryIts STRAPPA!
The shoe bag designed for all sports












Fits most size US 12/UK 13 shoes





The shoe bag that can strap to any bag that you carry.




Strappa on a backpack








Strappa on a drawstring bag





 Main features









Just place Strappa on top, and clip the strap around your bag.




Attaching to a backpack








Attaching to a sling bag





Your bag remains flat due to the sleek design

















It carries anything you'd need
2 rear flaps that help you carry your accessories.









Carry all your things with ease.









2 ways to utilise the flaps
Flat layout




For attaching to your bags





Compact carry




For carrying in your hand





A front pocket for all your small items









Always be prepared with all your necessities.




Putting items into the front pocket





Any other equipment to carry?




Attach Strappa to all your equipment





























Anywhere you go

























Get STRAPPA now!









Share with your friends, spread the word!

description_risks:
We know that no design is perfect, and are still looking to make minor improvements to the bag at the moment. What you see on this campaign page is still in the developmental stage and we are trying to make the best shoe bag we can before we send the design to the manufacturers. We will constantly provide updates on improvements, manufacturing and shipping along the way.

There may be unforeseen issues with manufacturing which may cause delays in shipping, so we hope that you understand that we will try our best to send the bags to you on time. We also want to ensure that every single bag passes the quality checks so that you will get the best quality products that we offer.

In order for this project to come to life, we need to hit the manufacturer's Minimum Order Quantity (MOQ) which is why we need your support in reaching our funding goal.

description_story:
Story







Tails of Magicat - Maogic pins are a collection of Hard Enamel pins featuring characters from Tails of magicat comic which I draw and paint weekly which you can read for free on webtoons!

























Tails of Magicat Maogic Pins are Gold plated hard enamel pins featuring the characters from tails of magicat and will be around 1.25 inches/3.2 cm with 2 pins rubber clutches to prevent them from running away!









































The pins will also be packed with a double sided, fully illustrated, 250gsm, wood free paper backing card!
















 Mao'm a starving comic artist who is too poor to pay for the manufacturing of the pins. By pledging to this project, mew help me pay for the manufacturing of the pins!  As gratitude, mew will get the maogic pins first before anymao else and at an exclusive kickstarter discounted price. 









The higher tier mew pledge, the more value it is for mew and if mew pledge at all the pins ($35) tier or above, mew will get some stickers for free! Mew can also purchase these stickers by adding the add on price!

























There are many other characters in Tails of Magicat which i would like to make into pins if we reach and surpass the stretch goals mao will start cweating more! Throughout the course of the campaign, Mao will be adding more stretch goals, so stay tuned! 

















Mew can purchase stretch goal pins at anytime during the campaign by adding your tier pin prices to mew pledge! If mew really want to have any character to be turned into a pin or feeling extra generous, mew can also pledge at the king pin tier!









Here's the plan for this project but if anything pops up, mao will be sure to update mew! 









































Mao'm magicatchoo, cweator of tails of magicat! Mao enjoys creating imaginary worlds and telling stories through picture! Mao dream is to start a studio one day! 
While waiting for mew pins to get made, feel free to read Tails of Magicat webcomic for free on Webtoon. Help support me and fund new projects on Patreon. You can also find me on Instagram or Twitter!









Pins will be cwafted by the fox knows a pin retailer/manufacturer! If mew are looking for more cute enamel pins, check out their social mewdia or website!
Thank mew so much for your support! It makes everything pawssible!


P.s. Special thanks to mao readers who continue sticking with magicat! It really encourages me to carry on!

description_story:
StoryTen years ago, there was a massacre of children who were kidnapped and experimented on in a secret, inhuman project made to replicate the supernatural abilities of a Light.   Only the wielders of Newton's Hammer, Metal Limit and Espionage Project survived.

 Now, a mysterious translucent castle suddenly appeared on the floating continent of Shooting Star, with an irresistible link to their past.

 What purpose does it serve? How will they break through that impenetrable wall?

 And how will they face their greatest nightmare, waiting for them at the finishing line?Hi, everyone. My name is DAINIME. That was the summary of the first book in the series, Light of The-Second Eyes.

Want to read more? Here are the first two chapter.

Chapter 1.

Chapter 2.The characters:


Axen, The Raging Meteor





 
 



Valerie, The Explosive Tomboy





 



Ray, The Lying Prankster





 



Dexter, The Stoic Comet




 



Wallace Blue, The Mysterious King





 
  

Cutting right to the chase, I'm raising funds for my next book's illustrations, including character designs and cover art. This is where all of the pledges will go to. It's a sequel to my first book, Light of The Second-Eyes. An Anime-esque action Light Novel full of heart-pumping action.As such, if you aren't into anime or such, I can't ask that you pledge for this.If you pledge enough for the first reward, you'll get the first book that's already completed for free in PDF. Please PM me for any other formats you prefer.If you pledge enough for the second reward, you'll receive both books. The second book will be delivered immediately when the illustrations are done.

blurb: The ONLY AI chess companion that brings together authentic chess playing experience, technology, and style.
description: The ONLY AI chess companion that brings together authentic chess playing experience, technology, and style.
name: AUTCHESS : The Exquisite Chess Companion
title: AUTCHESS : The Exquisite Chess Companion
Title: AUTCHESS : The Exquisite Chess Companion
Description: The ONLY AI chess companion that brings together authentic chess playing experience, technology, and style.
Link: AUTCHESS : The Exquisite Chess CompanionThe ONLY AI chess companion that brings together authentic chess playing experience, technology, and style.
description_story:
StoryMissed the touch and feel of chess pieces in a game of chess in today’s digital age? But finds it hard to play with someone these days?YES. We hear you and feel you!Moving into the digital age, technology has shaped the way we play chess and over time loses the essence and experience of traditional chess play. There is a need to recreate the communication and interaction one experienced in the game of chess again. Hence, we present to you AUTCHESS! AUTCHESS is an automatic chess system that lets you relive the joy and pleasure of chess playing by bringing back the more human side of playing chess and at the same time bringing other chess enthusiasts to you.
 







With the successful prototyping and testing of AUTCHESS Gen 1.0, we would like to bring to you a more appealing and better concept of our chess system – AUTCHESS Gen 2.0.
 









PLAY with an AI that responds & moves on its own knowing where you have movedAUTCHESS accurately ascertain the location of user’s moved chess piece, and allow automatic movements of opponent’s chess piece without having the user to key in any coordinates or move them manually. Our proprietary Location-Detection AI engine is able to determine the exact location of the moved pieces using hardware sensors and gameplay information. This algorithm of readings and confirmation assure an accurate response as though you are playing with a real player.

Specially crafted and designed, AUTCHESS is more than just chess set but also a stylistic deco that complement well with your interiors as a coffee table. Perfectly catered to the lifestyle personality in you even if you are not a chess fanatic!
 







 
Aesthetics Features
 















 
Technical Features
 









With a dual hardware-software confirmation approach, all possible positioning errors are greatly reduced so as to provide better playing experience.
Other game features include:

Set level closest to your ranking and play with AI or friends of your level. And if you are up to it, you can even challenge chess masters from around the world via Network Play!

Crack your brain, and solve famous Game Puzzles that are preset in the system.
What’s even cooler, reload a Saved Game and AUTCHESS will setup all chess pieces in their original positions!

 
Chess Set Themes
 









In return for your tremendous support, we hope to give back to the community and offer additional features when you help us reach our milestones:
 







 
Technical Specs
 









Below is a proposed technical specification of our product. It is subjected to change by new input and guidelines received from both the backer community and the product design team along the way:
Chess Set dimensions: 880mm (L) x 880mm (W) x 600mm (H)

Chess Piece dimensions: 30mm - 60mm (H) x 20mm (Radius)

Chess Set weight: 25kg (varies on material)

Chess Piece weight: 50g (varies on material)
 
 

















Great minds think alikeWe need your help to make AUTCHESS a reality for every CHESS LOVER~! Be part of our journey from the current version to full production. Your voice will be heard, and we can implement changes, stretch goals and more with your help.
Your contribution will be used to:

Finalize product design
Fund mechanical tooling of the product
Compliance testing
Order components
Pay for production, manufacturing and shipping costs
We sincerely appreciate every action you take to make AUTCHESS a reality. Help us out by sharing our project. Thank you!
description_risks:
As AUTCHESS involves assemblies and components from several suppliers, timely delivery and quality control of components are 2 primary risks, which may potentially result in a delay of product delivery to our backers.

Though so, we will always be there to make sure everything goes according to plan to meet the promised deadline and perform our hardest to ensure our product reaches your doorstep on time and in the best condition it can be.

description_story:
Story


Product features








We have 3 types of paid subscription plans; pro, star and legend. 





About us: CT was established with the aim of providing accessible first class education to the mass.
Why are we here? To build an "All-in-1" educational app that works as Universal Solution to all learning needs. 
The problem: Poor learning + Poor discipline = Failed grades & disinterested in studies (The elephant in the classroom)
Competitive advantages: 1) Gamification, 2) Our all in one app comprises Q & A forum, online courses and live tutoring features with gamification features. The 5G technology (2020) makes connectivity more efficient. 
Gamification features: 1) Tutor engagement (correct answers are voted to the top of the page and enhances a tutor's reputation and credibility, 2) Student engagement (played in teams and encourage discipline), 3) Ultimate goal (self directed learning, includes own-time-own-target games), 4) Leader board with slicing (increases user engagement).
"Brain research tells us that when the fun stops, learning often stops too."
Our solution: Online tutoring room, real-time LIVE lesson, recorded and archived lessons, online courses, forum Q & A = create a student community that exists for every student to use and support one another through gamification.
description_risks:
1) Scalability: Currently exploring Chemistry as an isolated vertical to demonstrate the product's feasibility. Upon proving its potential, other verticals will be built and it includes remodeling to other fields such as onboard training for new employees. 

2) Traction: number of organic downloads, number of forum posts per month, number of logins per month, number of unique visitors, number of paid subscription, number of video viewing hours.

3) Estimated market size = between $0.1 billion to $3 billion.

blurb: It’s simple: pick an animal and attempt to survive the Stampede by outsmarting and outracing your friends. Plus cute artwork.
description: It’s simple: pick an animal and attempt to survive the Stampede by outsmarting and outracing your friends. Plus cute artwork.
name: Stampede - A Game of Racing Critters and Animal Anarchy
title: Stampede - A Game of Racing Critters and Animal Anarchy
Title: Stampede - A Game of Racing Critters and Animal Anarchy
Description: It’s simple: pick an animal and attempt to survive the Stampede by outsmarting and outracing your friends. Plus cute artwork.
Link: Stampede - A Game of Racing Critters and Animal AnarchyIt’s simple: pick an animal and attempt to survive the Stampede by outsmarting and outracing your friends. Plus cute artwork.
description_story:
Story















Stampede is a 2-4 player game (best played with 4) pitting animals of The Savanna against each other in a race for survival.
Players reveal race tiles each turn to progress their animal’s journey, while playing Power cards to further their progress, or hinder other animals from winning. 

































Polly the Flamingo: Polly prophesied and convinced the animals of an imminent attack that could potentially annihilate all life on Earth. The animals shrugged the idea off, claiming Polly was just a nut-bird who lacked sleep. Despite that, Polly was undeterred. She knows the apocalypse awaits... And boy, was she right.









Cassie the Cheetah: Born out of a noble coalition of cheetahs, Cassie was imparted the rich etiquette and traditions of the Felinae family at a very young age. She has excellent posture, neat silky fur with elaborate spot patterns, and the face of a movie star; she even has a distinctive beauty mark - if you look close enough - on her left cheek.









Erica the Elephant: Separated from her parents and deported to a foreign traveling circus, Erica was only left with a charming pink cape - adorned with delicate floral embroidery - in her possession; a memorabilia bestowed by her mother before they parted. Erica soon fled the circus, and after months of drifting, found her way into The Savanna. 









Hank the Hippo: Hank has a long, goofy face, eats whatever he could get his hooves on, and weighs a ton. Oh, he smells funky too. A hippo that insists to be referred to as a ‘river horse’, Hank leads a rather bohemian lifestyle in The Savanna. 









Kobayashi the Kangaroo: This geeky marsupial may look nerdy and amicable, but was a highly skilled boxer back in the day. Kobayashi now spends his time as a full-time bookworm.









Theophila the Toad: After the fall of her native kingdom, Princess Theophila of the Royal Toad Family was exiled for months before seeking asylum in The Savanna. The other animals are always in awe of her grand tales of royalty and subsequent mishap. But as we all know, things only got worse.









Jazz the Norwegian Blue: The last of her kind, Jazz is a little bird with big dreams. She always imagined herself to be an ace-pilot; her body being the aircraft. The other animals are madly in love with her talent and irresistible beauty, making her highly popular among the animal community.









Nick the Crocodile: A Freshwater Crocodile that hails from Northern Australia, Nick is easily distinguished among his animal peers by his heavy Aussie accent. Through his turbulent childhood, Nick’s naturally fearsome appearance induces fear on the other animals; but he really doesn’t mean any harm, heck, he’s a closet vegan.









            

          









































 This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 1000+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $430M raised between them.
description_risks:
Risks and challenges
For all further queries and questions, you may also contact us at jonathan@startsomething.com.sg

MANUFACTURING & PRODUCTION

We have learnt a lot from producing Unbearable Winter and Burning Bridges. During the process, we've identified the right formats of artwork to send our factory and appropriate communication in terms of production materials. However, this is still our third game only - and we are still striving to improve our manufacturing process to deliver what we can at a better pricing and with high quality. It's important for us that you receive a great product based on all these fronts.

GAME DESIGN & PLAY-TESTING

We've playtested this game extensively with a wide range of players -- ranging from kids, to casual adult gamers, to seasoned tabletop enthusiasts. The game is fine tuned to ensure that every move is meaningful, and that there's tons of player agency, all the while retaining the fun elements of a race (where it's not over till it's over). With over hundreds of playtest sessions, and learning from the design processes and philosophies that we've learned from our previous releases, we're confident that Stampede is a balanced and fun experience for all.


SHIPPING AND FULFILLMENT

Getting your product to you on time is our goal, and that is why we are working very closely with our production and fulfilment facility to ensure that all products are trackable from when shipped out until delivery. We use our CRM system to capture all tracking codes and automate the issuing, while the community management team will be present to answer any queries you may have. In addition to that, we are also taking caution when shipping to countries with customs thresholds to ensure backers do not pay more than what they are supposed to. Shipping of our products come out of Singapore and China, depending on where the backer is located.


TRANSPARENCY, CONTACTING US, AND UPDATES

At the end of the day, there may be certain obstacles that are beyond our control, but we are committed to updating all our backers regularly during and after the campaign with full transparency. As backers of other games ourselves, we know the importance of being accountable, and as such we'll have our Discord channel and e-mails more than ready for you to contact us. We'll also be active in the comments section of our campaign page. During the campaign period, we want to communicate as much as we can with you, so feel free to reach out to us should you have any concerns.

blurb: This is a futurist inspired collection of 3D printed streetwear, born from post-covid19, focusing on aesthetics and functions.
description: This is a futurist inspired collection of 3D printed streetwear, born from post-covid19, focusing on aesthetics and functions.
name: Collection of Futurist, Covid19 3D-Print Streetwear
title: Collection of Futurist, Covid19 3D-Print Streetwear
Title: Collection of Futurist, Covid19 3D-Print Streetwear
Description: This is a futurist inspired collection of 3D printed streetwear, born from post-covid19, focusing on aesthetics and functions.
Link: Collection of Futurist, Covid19 3D-Print StreetwearThis is a futurist inspired collection of 3D printed streetwear, born from post-covid19, focusing on aesthetics and functions.
description_story:
StoryThis collection features a series of urban wear, exploring into 3D prints and traditional textiles as its medium. It draws inspiration from the events of covid19 2020, taking on a futurist projection for what is next in fashion. The collection explores the aesthetics of futurist themes and motifs of the pandemic, as well as the functionality of passive personal protection equipment (PPE), slow fashion and product design.
The inception of the project began in the midst of the pandemic, June 2020. The multitude of social and cultural changes throughout major cities drastically affected the lives of millions of people worldwide. These changes occurred on an institutional level and have forced countries to alter their social habits overnight. This collection stems from that curiosity of how these social and cultural changes would affect the industry of fashion in Singapore, and attempts to project a futurist aftermath of how Singaporeans can try to assimilate to these changes in terms of their relationships with wearables.




Entry Stickers of "I M Okay"




The firestarter to the series began with the single image of a wall of stickers. 
 To be specific, this wall of stickers began as a plain white facade but continuously became littered with “I M OKAY” stickers until a painting of polka dot green, yellow and red with tints of white alphabets is formed. This is a common sight in many Singaporean neighbourhoods as the stickers are used to mark patrons who are temporarily cleared to enter the supermarket premises and these walls are available to get rid of these stickers in case of litter. The concept of marking customers with such a bright neon colour draws reference to many fashion designers who had explored neon palettes in early spring/summer 2020 such as Christopher Kane and Brandon Maxwell. Furthermore, the emblem of “I M OKAY” proves to have some visual affiliation to urban streetwear and its ties to logos. Hence, giving rise to the idea of an entire collection revolving around covid19 motifs.
As covid19 overturns the norms of the world pre-2020, society has to face the fact that specific societal practices will never be the same. Common activities such as air travel or big group events are inhibited, and social lifestyle activities are erased into a blank slate. This applies to fashion as well, as the mentality of day-to-day living has been questioned- we have to question whether our choices for fashion might create a problem of the same magnitude in the future- this refers to fast fashion. Throughout the lockdowns of covid19 ; aviation, transportation and various factory related outputs have greatly reduced. China, for example, had their emission rate reduced by 25% at the start of 2020 due to compulsory lockdown. (Henriques, 2020) The statistics of the emission rate worldwide was what activists had advocated for unapologetically, yet only possible with the immediate threat of a viral pandemic. Luxury is placed on a microscope, as we dwell on the fact that whether air travel, social parties and freedom to not wear a mask is worth risking your own or other peoples’ lives. It is therefore, the perfect pedestal to start creating a new canvas of slow fashion, garments that do not harm the environment as much because we are not producing more than we can wear. These garments would be customizable and fully mendable, the “Chanel” equivalent of 3d printed futuristic garments that you can pass on. In the Journal “Fashion, Sustainability, and the Anthropocene”, we toss around the idea of a closed-loop recycling for fashion. Essentially we utilise unwanted garments as raw materials for another round of production for garments, instead of the detrimental cycle of manufacture, retail, usage and disposal. (Brooks, 2018)
In this collection, we covet the utopian ideal of printable, wearable plastic through a 3D printer. This practice has been around for ages, commonly rapid prototyping machines and 3D printers are owned by individuals and often linked to their own home computers. (Quinn, p144) Eventually, open sourced initiatives will be made available where people could print already designed files into wearable and usable pieces. The way we tackle the mentality of fast fashion is to fight fire with fire- that is attacking the need for individuality and luxury with the user’s own individuality and luxury. With the usage of 3D printing, garments could be fully customizable with the right adjustable pieces, where consumers could print different colours, different sizes, and different styles- all with the simple adjustment of their own computers. This provides an endless variety that negates the need to buy more clothing as it would be cheaper to manufacture for yourself, it would be faster to do it yourself and remove the redundancy of retail and shipping, and it would definitely be the correct sizing, taking away the excess need of overproduction.




3D Printed Vest








3D Print Beanie








Close up of "Chanel" inspired print








Close up of vest with streetwear logo








3D Print Beanie Closeup








3 Statement Pieces Sketch








4 Ready-to-Wear Sketches
description_risks: First and foremost, the first challenge for this project is the funding because 3D filament and fabric cost a lot. This is a self funded final year project, which led to the initiation of this kickstarter project. Secondly, another challenge of this project is ensuring that the 3D printing works because we are look for specific aims and functions. This might be problematic because 3D printing is specific and sensitive to the conditions that we set. Lastly, time is also a problem because this project is a year long exploration and a 7 piece collection of this scale might take a while.

blurb: Be Unique! Be Different! Be Brave! The Xtreme Diver 300 is Affordable & Full of Passion.
description: Be Unique! Be Different! Be Brave! The Xtreme Diver 300 is Affordable & Full of Passion.
name: Neminus Xtreme Diver 300 : Watches Built For Those Who Dare!
title: Neminus Xtreme Diver 300 : Watches Built For Those Who Dare!
Title: Neminus Xtreme Diver 300 : Watches Built For Those Who Dare!
Description: Be Unique! Be Different! Be Brave! The Xtreme Diver 300 is Affordable & Full of Passion.
Link: Neminus Xtreme Diver 300 : Watches Built For Those Who Dare!Be Unique! Be Different! Be Brave! The Xtreme Diver 300 is Affordable & Full of Passion.
description_story:
StoryLIMITED EDITION NEMINUS XTREME DIVER 300 







You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play


































Replay with sound









Play with 
 sound












00:00


00:00










































BACKGROUND
Neminus XTREME DIVER 300 is an extension to previously launched CuSn8 Bronze MASTER DIVER 1000. This new collection pays tribute to Xtreme Divers (who are also qualified Master Divers) for their love of diving and their commitment to their professions. Xtreme Divers work in some of the world's most treacherous and dangerous environments, which include servicing nuclear power reactors, salvaging marine vessels and platforms, harvesting underwater logs, swimming with sharks and crocodiles and so forth. 









REVIEWS 









THE COLLECTION
One of the key features of the Limited Edition Neminus Xtreme Diver 300 is the multi-colored and 3-dimensional dial or soul of the Xtreme Diver 300. Unlike most dials, where they're monochromatic, the dials of the Xtreme Diver 300 are each unique, dynamic and mesmerizing. Each dial produces different hypnotic effects under different lighting. 
The time and processes taken to make (from design to making the mold to color coating) the dials are 2 to 3 times more time consuming and complicated than for a monochromatic dial. The skills needed by the crafter to make the mold require patience and years of practice. Multiple trials and errors were committed when crafting the exact proportion of the dial to coating the colors on the dial. The ultimate aim for doing all these is to provide added experiences to the wearers and/or owners - be it in-the-water or out-of-water. 









NUCLEAR (REACTOR) DIVER

  Nuclear divers though work in suppression pools (because nuclear plants depend on vast amount of water to drive turbines, create energy and prevent the reactor core from melting), their job entails inspecting and maintaining tanks. While they're fortunate to dive in uncontaminated water, they're exposed to radiations. 
  Inspiration for the color of the dial is from the yellow nuclear symbol. The irregular formations of the dial resemble cracks that could be caused by nuclear blasts. 





Yellow Nuclear (Reactor) Diver











You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play


































Replay with sound









Play with 
 sound












00:00


00:00


































 DEADHEAD LOGGER

  "Deadhead Logger" is one of the most dangerous logging work in the world. The dangers include bites from poisonous snakes, alligators or 250 pound snapping turtles or getting caught in fishing lines and nets. However, the biggest risk is been pinned down to the bottom of the river from rapidly moving logs.
  Inspiration for the color of the dial is from the darken/black logs that are stuck in the rivers. The formations on the dial resembles that of charcoaled logs. 





Black Deadhead Logger











You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play


































Replay with sound









Play with 
 sound












00:00


00:00


































(MARINE) SALVAGE DIVER 

  The main job of a (Marine) Salvage Diver is rescuing vessels in distress. It's job entails solving problems of a ship or drilling platform when it leaks, sinks, crashes or catches fire. The dangers they faced include falling cranes or bulldozers, getting lost, or parts of the vessel collapsing onto them.
  Inspiration for the color of the dial is from the rusty hull of huge vessels roaming the open seas. The cracks resembles that of rust formed at the hull of the huge vessels.





Red (Marine) Salvage Diver











You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play


































Replay with sound









Play with 
 sound












00:00


00:00


























































ROULETTE DATE DIAL 
Another key feature of the Xtreme Diver 300 is the date dial. Unlike traditional date dials, inspiration for this creative design is derived from the colorful roulette wheel. The date dial is a colored roulette date dial with red and black background. To make reading the dates more interesting, the 31st is colored GREEN. 
 Another discreet design to reading the date is an unconventional date window to fit the colors nicely in.




Uniquely Designed Colored Roulette Date Dial & Date Window





LUME 
One of the brightest lume in the market, BGW9 Swiss Super-LumiNova Lume are used for the XTREME DIVER 300. The beautiful blue lume exposes the graphic numbers and indices on the ceramic inserts and dial. It also brings to light the unique design of the hour and minute hand. 









EMBOSSED BACK CASE  
Instead of an open back case, a more jovial and passionate skull is designed. Unlike most lightly engraved back cases, the XTREME DIVER 300's is an all-in-one case design and deeply embossed to provide a deep and solid 3D image. To instil motion when admiring the embossed skull, wavy waves are crafted in the background. 
Additionally, "LIVING DANGEROUSLY" is discreet engraved on the back case to pay tribute to the Xtreme divers.     









STATE OF MIND OF XTREME DIVERS
According to Maggie Roodt’s “Diving into danger : The 5 most extreme diving jobs”, “… whether you choose to live in a diving bell, dive (in) underwater caves, or simply dive deeper, nothing can weigh you down into eventual nothingness more than not pursuing a passion because of fear. While danger is very real, fear is optional.”
Thus, the word “NO FEAR” is discreetly embossed at the 6H position of the case to bring to light the state of mind of extreme divers - working passionately in the world’s most challenging, dangerous and treacherous environments.     









SCARCITY OF THE XTREME DIVER 300 
Limited pieces (ONLY 100 per model) are produced for the XTREME DIVER 300. The limited edition number is engraved between the lugs to remind owners of its scarcity. 









BEZEL
Rounded ceramic is used as the bezel insert to add toughness and aestheticism to the holistic design of the watch. Perfectly aligned at 12 o’clock, the bezel rotates anti-clockwise and 120 clicks. An applied PIP is added at the 12 o’clock position to provide more light (BGW9) in the dark.     









EMBOSSED CROWN
Deeply embossed is the NEMINUS logo to add aesthetics to the main crown. Crafted smoothly and robustly is the crown guard to protect the crown from unconscious hits and knocks.     









QUICK-RELEASE STRAP
Quick release strap is chosen for the XTREME DIVER 300. This simple mechanism allows easy removal of straps without any replacement tool. This adds ease for owners who like changing straps for different experiences.      









MULTI-LAYER RUSTIC STRAP
Customized for XTREME DIVER 300 is a unique strap comprised of 3 different layers of material – canvas, colored genuine leather & full-grain Horween leather on the underlay. Strap is stitched with colored thread that corresponds with the dial color. The loose strings/threads are purposely pulled to add ruggedness and “rustic-ness” to the strap. They are not due to poor quality control.  









CNC WAVY BUCKLE
Specially designed and customized, the 316L stainless steel buckle is CNC-ed to form the curvy and wavy flow of water to coincide with the nature of the collection – a dive watch. A detailed goggle is also engraved at the back of the buckle for added enjoyment of the beautifully designed and crafted buckle.   









SUEDE LEATHER WATCH ROLL FOR 4 WATCHES  









NO STRETCH GOALS TO UNLOCK
Two (2) extra straps are added to the package after the campaign is funded. All backers will get an extra premium rubber strap from ISO certified company and an extra leather NATO strap in corresponding color.  












Premium Rubber Strap Produced by ISO Certified Company
















































Specifications for Bronze Master Diver 1000













SHIPPING
description_risks:
RISKS & CHALLENGES

SHIPPING & DELIVERY
Backers are advised that some or certain countries/postal services are slow in processing packages. We, on our part will try to make sure our products are shipped either on time or earlier. If there is any delay, we’re keep you posted.  Upon shipping your watches, we’re email you the courier company, the tracking numbers and the link to use. Having said that, we seek your understanding that once the package leaves our hands, there’s very little we can do to speed things up. We request you check the tracking numbers for the status of the package.

Additionally, due to possible restrictions on shipping by our selected courier companies (EMS International Priority Shipping) during this pandemic period, there might be some delay (currently, mostly good and hopefully by the time we start shipping, the situation is better). If backers want to use an alternate courier company such as DHL, FedEx and so forth, backers will have to bear the additional cost associated with this switch. We will inform backers of the potential price difference.      


MANUFACTURING & QUALITY CONTROL 
Manufacturing, testing and assembling watches are by no means an easy task, especially when there are so many details and small parts that require discreet handling and management. And of course, we want to make them as good a quality as we can. That's why sometimes things don’t go smoothly or the way we want them to go. If that happens, we will make sure to inform you, the backers, well in advance and provide an estimated new shipping and delivery date.  Having said that, during production and quality control period, we will keep you abreast of all developments.  

IMPORT TAXES, DUTIES, VAT, GST 
Additionally, backers are made aware and responsible for any import taxes, duties, VAT or even GST for your country. Backers are also advised to check the value of the import taxes, duties, VAT and GST. MULTIVERSE ENTERPRISE is not responsible for any of backers import tax, duties, VAT or GST when they purchase any of NEMINUS products.  

If you have any queries, please contact us at neminushorology@gmail.com

blurb: I've created an 99.5% organic body care with natural sources ingredients from Thai's herbs & fruits.
description: I've created an 99.5% organic body care with natural sources ingredients from Thai's herbs & fruits.
name: The Organic Lane
title: The Organic Lane
Title: The Organic Lane
Description: I've created an 99.5% organic body care with natural sources ingredients from Thai's herbs & fruits.
Link: The Organic LaneI've created an 99.5% organic body care with natural sources ingredients from Thai's herbs & fruits.
description_story:
StoryTHE ORGANIC LANE : 99.5% Organic Body Care with Natural Ingredients from Thai's herbs and fruits.




Body Cleanser, Body Oil, Body Lotion, Body Scrub





The Organic Lane is business plan proposal created under the Future Fashion Project module, from International Fashion Business Faculty at Raffles College of Higher Education. The Organic Lane  Thailand’s homegrown organic body care, was found by Ms. Mingkamol Tangtamniyom in 2019. The Organic Lane is for ladies who love to pamper themselves in the comfort at their own home with the blissful Asian scent.  The products are cruelty-free, 99.5% organic with natural ingredients from Thailand with USDA and Ecocert certification, and Dermatologist test.  The ingredients include Thai’s signature Bamboo Charcoal, Thai Jasmine Rice, Carambola, Centella, Jasmine and Chamomile. We strongly ensure that our manufacturing process are good to the environment every step of the way.
Why creates The Organic Lane?
Since The Organic Lane first launch in Singapore. the warm and humid weather all year round can cause scorched skin drenched with salty sweat. Including, Stress is the number one health issue of Singaporean employers, stated by Willis Towers Watson’s 2017 Survey. For 60% of employees revealed to have high levels of stress. The built-in stress can highly effect your skin in a form of dryness, dull, flaky, breakouts, and more. In addition, Singaporean cases of sensitive skin are increasing such as eczema, which caused by new anti-ageing and whitening products (www.asiaone.com, 2018). 
From these issues, I came up with the idea to produce 99.5% organic body care for SEA women who has sensitive skin. Thailand is the neighbourhood country that is rich in natural resources, the herbs and fruits is not only use on Thai cuisine but also impressive arrays of health benefits. e.g. Centella is use for increases blood supply, Chamomile helps to reduce the stress, Thai Jasmine Rice provide anti-ageing benefits and plump skin with deep hydration. Therefore, the brand aim to provide organic body care that suitable for sensitive skin and console your stresses. Together with organic body care will helps to support the organic agriculture that have positive impact on biodiversity, humans, climate, and planets in long run (UN sustainability goals, 2019).

Mission 
As an ethical brand with a concern for sustainability, we offer pure quality of organic products made of natural goodness, that enrich women’s body, skin, and well-being.
The Organic Lane consists of 4 products 
1.Body Scrub (200ml)  : Bamboo Charcoal with Coffee (Purify & Anti-Oxidants)
2.Body Cleanser (192ml)  : Carambola & Centella (Brighten & Refresh)
3.Body Lotion (192 ml)  : Thai Jasmine Rice (Nourish & Youthful) 
4.Body Oil (118ml) : Jasmine & Chamomile (Anti-Aging & Mood Booster)
The plan
I need a little help from our kickstarter friends to support the business proposal to further explore on the real process of R&D of skincare from organic farming certified by USDA and Ecocert.  After produce the products, I plan to launch a first online store on January, 2020, offering our first Origin of Healthy Skin line of body care.
With your support we will: 

  Invest on R&D of The Organic Lane first products line with USDA and Ecocert certified manufacturer (S$260 / 1 product)
  100% recyclable or compostable packaging and shipping materials ($2,000) 
  The highest quality, unrefined, organic, fair-trade and ethical oils, butters and wax ($2,000)

Launch our website for online sales and print marketing materials 

  Website, labels and more ($500)
description_risks:
When purchasing local, sustainable, or fair-trade materials there are sometimes delays due to availability. Our campaign ends during 20 June 2019 and we expect that all our supporters will receive their rewards on time.

Shipping costs for backers from outside of Singapore region are added at checkout. Please message/dm us at 
1. @theorganiclane_sg (instagram)
2.TangtamniyomMingkamol@raffles-marketer.com

description_story:
Story















Hi there! I am Reyr, the artist behind Aethereyr. I like to draw cute and colourful things!


I am super excited to run this little Kickstarter campaign. I hope you will enjoy it!


Happy Pride Month! Summon your Pride and let your love shine through with rainbow colours~


























   Gold finish hard enamel pins
   2 back posts (to secure the pin and prevent rotation)
  Approx. 1.3" - 1.5" in size
  Mounted on a backing card 

What are Hard Enamel Pins?
Hard enamel pins (lapel pins/brooches) are decorative art that can be worn or otherwise displayed.




Past Campaign Sample Pins (Cherry Blossom Animals)








Past Campaign Sample Pins (Pokey)














   Pledge now and pay later.
  You can always change your pledge anytime during the campaign.
  You will not be charged until the end of a successful Kickstarter campaign.
  By pledging for all your desired designs even if they have not been unlocked, you will help the campaign work towards unlocking them.










Here is the estimated timeline if everything goes smoothly:

  Mid June to Start of July: Campaign funding phase
  Mid July: Surveys sent through Kickstarter for you to choose your preferred pins and add-ons
  Mid August to End of August: Products are received and shipped out to backers
  September to October: Products received by backers. Please allow additional time for international shipping.

After the campaign is fully funded, a survey will be sent through Kickstarter for you to specify your shipping address, preferred pins and add-ons. Please ensure that your shipping address is correct.
In order to prevent any delayed shipment, please fill up the survey as soon as possible.
Tracking numbers will be sent to you once the order is mailed.
I will do my utmost to make sure that all packages are properly packed. Thank you.









Heartfelt thanks to all of you for viewing the campaign. I hope you enjoyed it as much as I do! Feel free to share the campaign with your friends!
Follow me on Instagram for more of my art
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/aethereyr/
With love ❤ Aethereyr
description_risks:
Pin designs shown above are for illustrative purposes only and are subjected to minor changes during final production.

(1) Possible manufacturing defects

I have made many of my pins with my current manufacturers and they are of high standards. Hence, I have good faith that my current manufacturers will do the same for this collection of pins. However, if there should be any defect, I will reproduce the pins which may cause shipping to be delayed.

(2) Colour variations

Actual colours of the pins may differ from the images you see on your screen. I will try my best to ensure that the actual colours resemble the original pin designs.

(3) Line variations

Slight changes in the line art may be made if manufacturers need to do so, as the lines are made of metal and may fused into each other.

(4) Shipping duration

There may be unforeseen delay due to different countries' customs clearance procedures, which are beyond my control.

I will do my best to ensure that packages are packed properly and handed to my local courier service provider promptly. However, please note that anything that happens during the shipping process is beyond my control.

Any additional tax, fees or customs’ charges are the responsibility of the backer.

Backers will be responsible for any returned parcels due to negligence such as providing the wrong shipping address or failing to collect the parcels from their local post office during the collection period. Additional shipping cost to ship the parcels again will be charged accordingly.

If there should be any queries or issues with your orders, please contact me via Kickstarter and I will try my best to assist you.

blurb: Providing plasma air purifier technology to many affordably through in-house design, 3D printing and assembly.
description: Providing plasma air purifier technology to many affordably through in-house design, 3D printing and assembly.
name: 3D-printed Plasma Air Purifier For Everyone
title: 3D-printed Plasma Air Purifier For Everyone
Title: 3D-printed Plasma Air Purifier For Everyone
Description: Providing plasma air purifier technology to many affordably through in-house design, 3D printing and assembly.
Link: 3D-printed Plasma Air Purifier For EveryoneProviding plasma air purifier technology to many affordably through in-house design, 3D printing and assembly.
description_story:
StoryWhat got us started
Hello there, welcome to our Kickstarter project. We are Alex and William from Singapore, and we are aiming to make high functioning air purifiers cheaply available for all.
We started our journey because we wanted clean air on a budget. A quick look around the market found that a simple HEPA air purifier would set us back by more than SGD 100 per unit, and we wanted 5! Thankfully, our homegrown tech whiz Alex came to the rescue with all his skills in 3D modelling and printing, circuit design and electronics fabrication.
Since we were building our own air purifier, we thought we might as well get the best that technology had to offer. This was when we chanced upon plasma emitters and its effectiveness in killing bacteria and removing odors. To our surprise, we could hardly find such purifiers on the market, and those that are cost around SGD 300.
After some prototyping and cost estimates, we decided this can be produced much more cheaply if we retained functionality without excessive resources pumped towards exterior design, branding and marketing. It is our eventual aim to automate the entire production process to bring down the cost of each purifier down to its bare minimum (SGD 25 for a portable plasma air purifier, SGD 60 for a home plasma&HEPA air purifier). Your contribution will help go a long way in making clean air cheaply and widely available for all.
Design
The process started with hand sketching and then 3D modelling the external casing that houses the purifier components, including the power inlet, circuitry, plasma emitter and fan.




Hand sketch of the Home Air Purifier








3D model of the Home Air Purifier





This went through various iterations to better user experience, increase functionality and streamline production processes.
3D printing
Next we put the 3D model to print.









Assembly




3D printed exterior, fan, plasma emitter





Our Prototype: Presenting the Home Plasma&HEPA Air Purifier









The HEPA filter in blue is made using HEPA-12 (with 99.5% filtration efficiency) and can effectively remove allergens and particulate matter such as dust, pollen, airborne fibres etc). It is coupled with a plasma emitter which emits both negative and positive ions across two emitters, it creates ozone at a rate between 0.14 and 0.18 milligrams per cubic meter. While ozone is a great reducing agent that can both kill bacteria and remove odors, we had concerns about ozone poisoning, but found that the production rate is far below what the World Health Organization suggests is harmful to human health. (160 milligrams per cubic meter)









In effect, what plasma emitters would do for you is to bring the sanitizing effect of the sun into your indoor and enclosed living space.
And then it struck us that no one would lug a 30-centimeter air purifier around even if they wanted fresh air, and so we moved towards making the product portable.
Testing
In order to check that the product was indeed working and purifying air as per the design goals, we subjected the Home Plasma&HEPA Air Purifier to a smoke container test.
We were chiefly interested in particulate matter (PM) and odor, which can respectively be measured by the PM10 and PM2.5 indicators, and the latter by the Total Volatile Organic Matter (TVOC).
We are very happy to announce that within 5 minutes of the purifier's operation the off-the-chart measurements of PM2.5 and PM10 returned to safe levels, while TVOC was drastically reduced within 10 minutes. 

            

          

 Making it portable
We soon found HEPA filters would not fit a portable design, primarily because integrating a fan into it would be expensive and make it more bulky than we hoped. We thus resolved to make a lightweight, small and convenient plasma air purifier. The device features the same emission capabilities as the Home Purifier, but is only 10% of its bulk, and can be powered by portable batteries, computers or car USB ports. In terms of color, we decided to offer a black version to better complement your table top or car dashboard. You even get to choose a more rounded or squared version.

















The Larger Goal
We do not intend to stop here.
Currently production costs are still higher than we hope. In 2020, we will be designing and building a production facility which features robotic arms in a bid to automate the process of printing and assembling the air purifiers. Our eventual aim is to bring the costs of producing them down to SGD 25 for portable purifiers and SGD 50 for home purifiers. The reduction in manpower would be a crucial step towards producing a high performing air purifier which many more in the world can enjoy. We are also exploring the possibility of localizing production and assembly, which could be possible with the increasing availability of 3D printers and the robotic arm which we are in the process of producing.
Any contribution you make would make clean air possible for many more in the world.
description_risks: Piecemeal production is already possible, albeit at a slow rate of about 3 portable purifiers or 2 home purifiers a day. This is the reason why delivery dates are set at 6 months after the end of the Kickstart campaign. The larger challenge is to develop an automated production facility by 2020, but we are already working on refining the working prototype for the robotic arm, and think it is feasible to put them into use within 3 months.

description_story:
Story







Gifting is an important social culture in our everyday lives. We do it to maintain relationships, to feel appreciated and make someone feel appreciated.


Problems of Gifting





 But many-a-time, we don't know what to get for our friends and loved ones and sometimes, we find it difficult to find the time to go gift-shopping. 

Many gifting services online try to solve these problems by categorizing gifts based on group types or provide customization. However, we feel that categorising gifts leaves the gift items highly unpersonalised and customisation services are too expensive. At Shhhcrets, we provide a hybrid solution where we offer personalisation of gift boxes at affordable prices. Our Solution: ShhhBoxes









Choose from 4 different themes and we will personalise the gift items in the box for you.  Read on to see how our service would work!







Try out our questionnaireOur Team


Our Team





Testimonials
