However, be rest assured that we are willing to put down our own initial investment to ensure that our first batch of shhhboxes be sent out!

All we're missing is your support, and we look forward to provide you with our services!

blurb: 5 tracks of classic vintage pop originals penned by Miss Lou, produced by Mikal Blue (Colbie Caillat, Jason Mraz) and recorded in L.A.
description: 5 tracks of classic vintage pop originals penned by Miss Lou, produced by Mikal Blue (Colbie Caillat, Jason Mraz) and recorded in L.A.
name: Glamour Vintage Songbird - Miss Lou's debut EP
title: Glamour Vintage Songbird - Miss Lou's debut EP
Title: Glamour Vintage Songbird - Miss Lou's debut EP
Description: 5 tracks of classic vintage pop originals penned by Miss Lou, produced by Mikal Blue (Colbie Caillat, Jason Mraz) and recorded in L.A.
Link: Glamour Vintage Songbird - Miss Lou's debut EP5 tracks of classic vintage pop originals penned by Miss Lou, produced by Mikal Blue (Colbie Caillat, Jason Mraz) and recorded in L.A.
description_story:
Story


After a lifetime's worth of artistic pursuits (jazz band, acting in a school musical, Afro-Brazilian drumming, etc) and spending the past few years finding my identity as an artist, everything is finally culminating in my debut 5-track EP that I'm so excited to share with you. Some highlights/milestones from the past couple of years include:
Joining a televised singing competition on Singapore national TV 
Putting up 5 shows at the Esplanade Waterfront and Concourse stages
Amassing a wealth of performance experience with countless corporate events (DBS, SingTel, Rolex, F1, etc)
Receiving the Noise Award after being a mentee in the National Arts Council's Noise Music Mentorship programme 2016 
Transitioning into and embracing vintage style and glamour every day
To those who have been following my journey, it should come as no surprise that I absolutely adore the 40s, 50s, and 60s, and I believe it shows in my songwriting as well as the production of the songs. Taking a Big LeapIn April of this year, I decided to take my music career to the next level and flew out on my own to L.A. to record the Glamour Vintage Songbird EP with Mikal Blue, a producer and songwriter who is best known for his work with Colbie Caillat, Jason Mraz, and OneRepublic. After 10 days in the studio with Mikal Blue and Dean Dinning (bassist of Toad the Wet Sprocket), we've created a collection of classic vintage pop songs that I'm so proud of.


The record is currently in the process of being mastered by Eric Boulanger at The Bakery in L.A., which is a Grammy-winning mastering studio (La La Land OST, Colbie Caillat, Diana Krall).WHY 'GLAMOUR VINTAGE SONGBIRD'?I wanted to bring back what I love about the glorious past and breathe new life into them with updated 21st-Century methods, stories, and modern sensibilities. Expect to hear doo wop backup vocals, punchy horn lines, Motown drum beats and more, but all with a twist. The songs I've written and recorded for this EP are a result of my experiences navigating adulthood as a young woman and they revolve around themes like independence, heartbreak, beauty, and self-esteem. I wanted to write catchy, simple songs that people of all ages can understand and relate to - though some of them are really letters to remind myself of lessons I've learnt along the way. 




Recording in the beautiful studio A at Revolver Recordings. Photo by Alex Brown





WHERE IS MY MONEY GOING?Of course, nothing good comes cheap. Intent on making a world-class debut offering, I wanted to include the best talents in the creation of the Glamour Vintage Songbird EP.Here's a list of the costs that are involved in the completion, marketing and production of this EP:
Producer's fees
Musicians' fees
Mastering fees
Professional glamour photoshoot, complete with vintage hair and makeup styling, for all album artwork and promo 
Music video for first single
Overseas radio promotion fees
Super fun vintage-themed EP launch party (coming in September 2017)
Your contribution will go a long way in launching the first project of my career. REWARDS 
You'll find the summary of the different tiers and rewards in the column to the right, but here are the details of the various rewards.Miss Lou stickersEach sticker pack has all three designs and each sticker is 5cm in diameter.


3 designs in each sticker pack





Miss Lou metal pinMetal pin (worth US$11) designed by the Mas of wonderful Singaporean pin store The C Project.


Front and back of the pin





It's 1.5" in height and made of iron. I love it so much (': Get it before it runs out!Autographed Photo CardsWhile I was in L.A., I got the chance to do an AMAZING vintage-style photoshoot with Charles Torrealba, with hair and makeup done by the masterful hair stylist-glamazon Miss Rockabilly Ruby. Along with the main photo for this Kickstarter project, here's another sample photo from the photoshoot:


Photo by Charles Torrealba, Hair and makeup by Miss Rockabilly Ruby





I'm sharing the love by printing them into photo cards and autographing them and writing a personalised message to you on the back. Pre-launch Tea Party To thank you for contributing a significant amount to my campaign, there will be a private tea party that you'll be invited to:
Enjoy a delicious high tea in a central venue
Preview the tracks off the EP with a live performance by me
Chat and mingle with me and one another!
This will be held on 2nd September 2017 and open to anyone who will be in Singapore then.Private Customised PerformanceIf you're feeling exceptionally generous, I'd love to put up a great show for your event to thank you! Be it for an event, party, or just a living room private concert for you and your loved ones, I'd be happy to create a show just for you. This will be held anytime before September 2018 and open to anyone who will be in Singapore then.
description_risks: The Glamour Vintage Songbird EP has been mixed and is on track to being mastered. Barring unforeseen manufacturing incidents, all rewards should reach you ahead of schedule. In the unlikely event that such incidents do occur, all backers will still receive their digital download code to the Glamour Vintage Songbird EP.

blurb:
Support The Haque Collective as they debut their first play in a blackbox theatre!

A play by James Thoo
Directed by Kamil Haque
description:
Support The Haque Collective as they debut their first play in a blackbox theatre!

A play by James Thoo
Directed by Kamil Haque
name: The Haque Collective Campaign
title: The Haque Collective Campaign
Title: The Haque Collective Campaign
Description:
Support The Haque Collective as they debut their first play in a blackbox theatre!

A play by James Thoo
Directed by Kamil Haque
Link:
The Haque Collective CampaignSupport The Haque Collective as they debut their first play in a blackbox theatre!

A play by James Thoo
Directed by Kamil Haque
description_story:
Story







How did The Haque Collective come about?
We believe in the positive force of a global community to impact individual destiny. The craft of our democratic collective of global artists, all connected by the HCAC family, responds to the richness, diversity and complexity that is Singapore. We produce and present made-with-Singapore, original, contemporary, groundbreaking, provocative, culturally diverse work for the stage and screen. 
What is the point of the collective?
Because of its relative youth, the existing theatrical landscape in Singapore is small and as such cannot yet provide the variance of roles reflective of the extremely broad cosmopolitan population found here. So many wonderful and dedicated performers here unfortunately are not afforded the opportunities they deserve simply because of their background, experience, vague ethnicity or appearance. As such, the collective seeks to provide roles for these people.
While there are some drama groups that cater to this community, there are even fewer still that are able to perform work written in-house by a professional writer. Our playwright, James Thoo, has been a screenwriter by profession in LA for over a decade now, and by virtue of marrying a Singaporean woman, now finds himself here workshopping and developing original material for production. Our director, Kamil Haque, a Singaporean of multi-ethnic heritage, has spent over 30 years in the performing arts producing, directing and acting in several award-winning and critically-acclaimed productions in Singapore, USA, Malaysia and Australia. Both James and Kamil facilitate acting and writing workshops at Haque Centre of Acting & Creativity (HCAC).









For the pilot production; what is the work, and what is the development and rehearsal process?
Our inaugural production is 'The Jugular Vein'.
It is a play about a group of women on a bachelorette night who, over the course of the evening, come to realise that they don't all like each other as much as they thought. Tension builds, tempers begin to flare, and before long the entire situation breaks down into all out anarchy.
The other founding members of our collective, all alumni of HCAC, who will serve as actors in The Jugular Vein, are all women. This is a frequently cited issue as there are a lot of plays or shows produced in Singapore with roles for women but, seldom offer the range of characters or the breadth of definition to allow a performer to do their most interesting work. The Jugular Vein, features four strong female roles and no male roles. They are all wives and one of them is a mother, but this is not the thing that defines them as people.
Kamil, the director, knew that he wanted to produce a play for these four actresses, with James as the playwright. With everyone together for several weeks, we shared our current circumstances and frustrations surrounding our current artistic trajectory. James knew that he wanted to give the opportunity for the four actresses to play the kinds of roles that they were not given access to either due to their ethnicity, their background, or their gender. With that in mind, we escalated our discussion to our hopes and desires on what our debut production  would be. 
James devised the overarching plot and the characters, and then for two months Kamil worked with the four actresses on refining the characters, improvising scenes, developing back-stories and motivations whilst James refined the dialogue and story.
The final draft of the The Jugular Vein was completed on July 1st, and from there, the Collective will rehearse 4 times a week, and then every day until opening night.




Some our HCAC community at our 5th birthday!





The HCAC community
All founding members of The Haque Collective have met through the auspices of Haque Centre of Acting & Creativity (HCAC), Singapore's first professional acting studio. Our community is 6 years old and over 2000 members strong since our inception on June 3rd 2013. Many of our alumni have graced the screens of Hollywood blockbusters, international, regional and national TV series and theatre stages. Many of our community are considered Creative Double-Lifers who straddle a corporate job in the day time and on weekday nights and weekends have aspirations to be performance artists, have a creative outlet, network or perhaps pick up an essential skill from the arts that benefits their professional and personal lives. More information is available at: www.methodactingasia.com
Founding Members of The Haque Collective:
Kamil Haque is the Artistic Director of Haque Centre of Acting & Creativity (HCAC), Singapore’s first professional acting studio and Method Productions, a production company for all mediums of performing arts. 
As the only coach in Asia experienced in teaching the Lee Strasberg method of acting, Kamil has coached actors for the stage, major Hollywood films, international, regional and local TV series. Using theatre and storytelling techniques, Kamil’s work also includes training corporate leaders and employees in MNCs and statutory boards. 
As a Singaporean of multi-ethnic origin, Kamil has also produced, directed and acted in several award-winning and critically-acclaimed productions in Singapore, in USA, Malaysia and Australia.
__________
James Thoo is a writer formerly based in LA who now calls Singapore home. He served as the head editor of Joblo.com and his work has been featured in such publications as the Huffington Post and The New York Times. He wrote the award-winning film Jarum Halus in 2008 and his screenplay 'Sonata' was Scriptshadow's Best Unproduced Screenplay of 2015 Currently two of his feature film scripts are in production; 'Hurt' for Bruise Productions in Louisiana, and 'Sonata' for Phoenix Productions in Los Angeles. He teaches dramatic writing and provides dramaturgy at HCAC.
__________
Stephanie Bovis first dabbled in the field of acting as a model, starring in commercials, music videos, and in small roles on TV. She decided to grow her knowledge and understanding in theatre, prompting her to embark on her acting studies at HCAC in 2016. She was the recipient of the *SCAPE Audience Choice Award at the 2017 Singapore Monologue Slam. Through the numerous workshops Stephanie has attended, she found that acting also plays a vital role in her professions as a corporate emcee/host and health coach.
__________
Nadia Dayan discovered her love for acting while living in Seattle several years ago, taking classes at Freehold Theater. She continued her passion for acting after moving to Singapore and has been since a part of the HCAC family. 
She has also explored costume wardrobe, as she has a background in fashion design. 
__________
Aiswarya Nair has been performing from a young age in school plays back in India. She is also a trained dancer in Indian classical forms. She rekindled her passion for acting in mid-2014, after attending workshops at HCAC. She has since acted in various theatre productions, short films, TV series, commercials and corporate videos. Now she has taken a leap of faith and quit her corporate job to pursue her creative interests, full-time.
__________
Isabelle Roy started drama classes in Paris and continued acting in Singapore where she performed in a production of “Push up” by Roland Schimmelpfennig under the direction of Sophie Colombet from Cours Florent at the Alliance Française. After classes at La Salle, she integrated into the HCAC community where she has been taught and directed by Kamil Haque, David Glass, Giovanni Ortega and Scott Wings. She is part of both “The Haque Collective” and “The Theatre Factory” ensembles. She will perform “The Open Couple” by Dario Fo and Franca Rame in November 2019 at the Stamford Arts Center and in March 2020 in Hanoi, Vietnam.
__________
Jolene Wong is an actor and a storyteller. She's also learning acting, teaching acting, and learning to teach acting at HCAC. All the world's a stage, and when it isn't, it's a classroom. 
Jolene's past credits include Toy Factory's Here And Beyond, Caryl Churchill's The Skriker, and that generic Singaporean mum you've seen in commercials. She has been awarded Best Actor in the Crash Test Theatre Competition for the Lit Up Asia-Pacific Festival 2018.
__________
Funding Distribution:
We are raising funds for our debut production, The Jugular Vein, to be staged in a blackbox theatre in Singapore. We've already cobbled together $10,000 of our own money and we need your help to raise the rest. Our desire is to ensure the long term sustainability of The Haque Collective. We seek your help to produce at least one major production every year as producing theatre in Singapore can be a very costly affair. 
We're looking at raising a production fund of just $20,000 to start with. We would distribute the $20,000 in the following ways:











$5000 - Approx. 50% rental cost of theatre space for The Jugular Vein
$2000 - Technical Crew
$2000 - Props/Set Design/Costumes
$2000 - Marketing Efforts
$9000 - Seed funding for The Haque Collective Project 2020
description_risks:
85% of funding for the arts in Singapore comes from the government. Without their support, large swathes of the artistic community in Singapore would struggle to survive. Perhaps we may eventually seek government funding at the appropriate time. 

Our mission of producing made-with-Singapore shows means we want our global citizenry to feel like they are active contributors and patrons of the arts. We are fully prepared to self-fund the work of THC and have our Collective move forward even if it means at a loss for our debut production. Our hope is even if we don't hit our target with our first crowd-funding campaign, the quality of our first show will encourage future patronage

blurb: BIDOO is the totally discreet, portable and adaptable universal bidet for total bum cleanliness wherever you may be.
description: BIDOO is the totally discreet, portable and adaptable universal bidet for total bum cleanliness wherever you may be.
name: BIDOO the Universal Bidet
title: BIDOO the Universal Bidet
Title: BIDOO the Universal Bidet
Description: BIDOO is the totally discreet, portable and adaptable universal bidet for total bum cleanliness wherever you may be.
Link: BIDOO the Universal BidetBIDOO is the totally discreet, portable and adaptable universal bidet for total bum cleanliness wherever you may be.
description_story:
Story


































Having a bidet is great.
Apart from the fact that it is undeniably the best solution to total bum-hygiene, it also saves us a ton on toilet paper consumption... and the number of trees killed for our lifetime supply of it.












Surely toilet paper doesn't protect us either, from COVID-19! 🦠





But there's simply no portable bidets that are good enough.
Automatic bidets are troublesome to charge, and manual bidets simply aren’t portable enough, with their long nozzles and large bottles. The smaller ones are not ergonomic enough for easy squeezing and aiming. Many of them leak if there’s water in them... we just simply couldn't find the right one.




While many of them emphasize on functionality, few actually focus on the entire experience of using it.





Plus, filling a bidet at the public sink gets you weird stares.
There is still an unspoken taboo about using the bidet in many parts of the world, and because of this, using bidets outside of the home might be subject to curious stares which can be uncomfortable to the user. 




"What, you've never seen a bum-cleaning device like this before?"





So, we developed the solution.









A universal plug, bidet-style.
Our Bidoo™ Nozzle fits to most common PET bottles so you can use most available water bottles in your bag without compromising on space.









So for those times you’re really short on space, just pop the Nozzle in your pocket, and you’ll have a bidet with you for those emergency moments! 









Ergonomically designed for the best squeeze.
We spent months researching and testing the best materials, bottle shapes and nozzle lengths... even down to the angle of spray- so that comfort comes out tops during the entire washing experience.

























Seal in your own water source anytime, anywhere.
Say goodbye to filling bidets at the sink in public restrooms while people stare. Every Bidoo™ has its own cap to seal in the water so you can have a water source with you at all times and places.  



































































































Murat Ursavas is the co-founder of Bidoo™. From a young age he was trained to have a keen eye for marketing while selling electronic products at his parents’ store. He is our resident business strategist expert.
Having moved and lived in multiple countries all over the world, his expertise surely lies in understanding differences in cultural nuances and people’s behaviour. His passion for entrepreneurship and business as well as his avid interest in travel has accumulated to multiple successful crowdfunding projects over the short span of 3 years.
Meryem Chin is a co-founder and designer at Bidoo. In 2012, Meryem graduated from the School of Design and Environment in the National University of Singapore, with a thesis focused on merging sustainable practices into existing consumer behavior and manufacturing practices.
Currently living in Germany, she is on a mission to create well-designed, durable products which could potentially lessen the burden on the environment. With this project, she hopes she could contribute a universally adaptable travel bidet that can be used in all situations and places, lessening the impact of the toilet paper industry.
Ahmad Imtiaj is the cool PR guy- he's in charge of letting the world know what awesome things are brewing at Bidoo. Trained as a consumer insight analyst, he specializes in exploring the imaginative world of consumers and accommodating to their needs accordingly.
description_risks:
This is our second Kickstarter project and sixth successful crowdfunding project to date, hence, we are more than familiar with the importance of selecting the right manufacturer and the need to plan for possible delays. We have a very lean team of experts who are well versed in design and are able to make quick turnaround changes. 

Although we are still subject to external factors such as sudden manufacturing delays (especially due to the coronavirus), we have factored in enough grace period for us to sort out the problems in order to ship to our backers on time.

blurb: Your personal brain coach to start the year right, tick your life goals and end the year on a high.
description: Your personal brain coach to start the year right, tick your life goals and end the year on a high.
name: NEUROPLANNER, the brain hacking planner
title: NEUROPLANNER, the brain hacking planner
Title: NEUROPLANNER, the planner for brain hackers
Description: Your personal brain coach to start the year right, tick your life goals and end the year on a high.
Link: NEUROPLANNER, the planner for brain hackersYour personal brain coach to start the year right, tick your life goals and end the year on a high.
description_story:
StoryEvery science begins as philosophy and ends as art.







It arises in hypothesis and flows into achievement.-Will Durant 







It starts with your mind.  Enjoy a full year of goal hacking with NEUROPLANNER. It's a weekly habit that fits your schedule. It complements how your brain is designed to easily learn and practice.  With NEUROPLANNER, weekly hacking your brain is as easy as 1, 2, 3..







READ > Master your goals by knowing how your brain ticks  WRITE > Worksheets that make brain hacking stick  GOALS > Achieve weekly goals that impact the "big picture"  REPEAT > Progress as you learn a new brain hack each week 







NEUROPLANNER contains 12 monthly themes for a holistic life planning. You'll find yourself more productive and creative, adopt a mind fit lifestyle, and smarter in most areas of your life:







There are 4 weeks of brain hacking content each month. From the brain science to its worksheets, you'll get into the brain hacking in no time.


Brain science on the left and worksheet on the right.





 







NEUROPLANNER features brain tools that beautifully hacks your mindset, productivity, creativity, happiness, goals, and focus. There's a section in the planner that describes how to use each tool and which brain hack to refer to for further reading.







 










Your monthly dashboard perfect for visioning.








Spacious monthly spread to park all your needs.

Value short term goals with this focused and goal hacking weekly spreads.

NEUROPLANNER is based on over 30+ brain science references and shaped by more than 670+ seasoned planners. 135 of them used the alpha version for 1 week and 65 have used the beta version for 1 month. Here is what they have to say:ALPHA USERS

Costs are in Singaporean dollars. EXCLUSIVE OF shipping, customs, tax, and other handling fees, which you can pay for at the survey that will be sent after the project ends.







 







You'll find that your shipped planners include a paperclip set featuring the chemical formula of 3 happy neurotransmitters: serotonin, dopamine, and adrenaline. While you'll discover them when you go through NEUROPLANNER, below is an overview of where to use them:


Clip serotonin for learning, dopamine for past time, and adrenaline for adventures.

NEUROPLANNERD Journal and NotebooksThese are a hardcover lined 160-page journals (available in the US only) and softcover spiral 200-page notebooks (available in Australia only).  These additional perks are only SGD$25 and SGD$22 respectively plus SGD$8 shipping.





 







 







NEUROPLANNER was researched, designed, and tested for maximum planner functionality. It's finally available and exclusive to KICKSTARTER today. It will take 60 days for printing, packaging, and shipping so you'll receive your planner before the year changes.







 







 Learn more about the inspiration of creating NEUROPLANNER here."If the human brain was so simple we could understand it, we would be so simple we couldn't." -LYALL WATSON

blurb: Streamline your tabletop RPGs with Magitags - custom designed spell effect tokens that fit on your miniatures, not under them.
description: Streamline your tabletop RPGs with Magitags - custom designed spell effect tokens that fit on your miniatures, not under them.
name: Magitags - Spell Effect Tokens for Tabletop RPGs
title: Magitags - Spell Effect Tokens for Tabletop RPGs
Title: Magitags - Spell Effect Tokens for Tabletop RPGs
Description: Streamline your tabletop RPGs with Magitags - custom designed spell effect tokens that fit on your miniatures, not under them.
Link: Magitags - Spell Effect Tokens for Tabletop RPGsStreamline your tabletop RPGs with Magitags - custom designed spell effect tokens that fit on your miniatures, not under them.
description_story:
Story








What are Magitags?
Design Philosophy
Features
Price
Add-Ons
Stretch Goals
About Us

What are Magitags?



Magitags are designed for ease of use and to streamline play. Never lose track of ongoing effects again.





Magitags are colored acrylic tokens, engraved with symbols for your favorite spell effects. They're designed to be highly functional, yet aesthetic complements to any tabletop RPG game, card game, or board game.Design PhilosophyMagitags were conceived, designed, and redesigned after extensive play, with our Kickstarter release being Version 2 of our original. With Magitags, we don't just want to solve a problem. We want to create something that discerning gamers and avid tabletop RPG fans will recognize as a quality of life improvement for game masters and players alike. That's the driving philosophy behind Magitags, and why we emphasized clarity, effectiveness and ease of use in the development process. 
 
 

 


We made tokens that fit on miniatures, not under them.





This philosophy also pushed us to introduce a tapered groove into our design, allowing Magitags to be affixed to most miniatures so they can freely "float" above a character, allowing for greater visibility. 

Of course, you can place them under your miniatures too, and they'll fit in any typical 1" (5-ft) square.  Magitags will also be compatible with our future Kickstarter projects. Features


A set of eight (8) Magitags, with classic fantasy frame and custom iconography for (top row, left to right) Radiant, Necrotic, Acid, Cold and (bottom row, left to right) Electricity, Fire, Poison and Thunder effects, inlaid with gold paint.





Each individual Magitag is: 
Cut from superior, industrial-grade acrylic
Laser etched with classic fantasy frame and custom iconography designed by our in-house artists
Highly wear resistant
1" x 1", sized to fit on most map grids and the classic "5-ft square" 
Tapered groove allows easy, yet secure affixing to most miniatures
Smooth groove surfaces to help prevent damage to paint jobs 
Ships pre-masked and fully paintable, allowing you to customize the colors of frames and symbols on your Magitags
Compatible with future Kickstarter projects @THEGUILD



Crystallized Mana - A crystal clear alternative you can purchase in sets, or get as a bonus for participating in our Social Media Campaign.




 

PriceMagitags are competitively priced. Should we be funded, packages will include bonuses from Stretch Goals. We also intend to offer bonuses for backers who participate in Magitags related social media campaigns and giveaways. 


Our limited time Super Early Bird and Early Bird offers, for adventurers who seize the Initiative.





 



Our reward tiers are reasonably priced, and will include all Stretch Goals.





Add-OnsMagitags sport a classic fantasy frame and ship pre-masked, allowing you to paint the symbols and frames a color of your choice. We also offer Magitags with frames adorned with magical symbols and steampunk gadgetry at a nominal fee. Simply pledge the additional amount listed here, and indicate what add-ons you want when you complete the backer's survey.


Enchant your Magitags with our Add-On options.





Stretch Goals   Your positive reception and support will help us reach our goals. We also have Stretch Goals that will be unlocked whenever we hit a major funding milestone. 


Our Stretch Goals will bring enhancements and other improvements to the project.





About Us@THEGUILD ("At The Guild") is a Singapore-based creative collective and incubator for pop culture inspired initiatives, staffed by makers and marketers from Neo Tokyo Project and Repla. The team has an aggregate 25 years of experience curating, designing and fabricating pop culture content, and has serviced clients including major gaming companies, MNCs, consumers and communities. Everyone @THEGUILD is also an unabashed geek and gamer, which helps us better design products that matter to you.
description_risks:
While this is our first Kickstarter project, we have extensive experience in artisanal crafts and professional fabrication, having worked with a range of local and international clients. 

We intend to produce Magitags in our workshop using a plethora of tools and techniques. This will allow us full control of the production of Magitags, helping us ensure that they are made efficiently, of a suitably high quality and delivered in a timely manner. 

Being funded will also help us upgrade our infrastructure and to heighten our production process, allowing us to value add to Magitags and to make it even better. 

Magitags can only become a reality with your help, and we hope you can support us!

name: Cleyà Organics - World Changer in a Bottle
title: Cleyà Organics - World Changer in a Bottle
Title: Cleyà Organics - World Changer in a Bottle
Description: Skincare company that is inspired by the liquid gold that works magic on your skin. 100% pure and natural, good for you and the planet!
Link: Cleyà Organics - World Changer in a BottleSkincare company that is inspired by the liquid gold that works magic on your skin. 100% pure and natural, good for you and the planet!
description_story:
StoryHow It All Started -Born and raised Indonesia and currently studying in Singapore, I would travel back and forth often. My skin would go through many adventures due to the wildly varying climate—from extremely humid and sweaty hot days to dry sunny weathers. As a beauty enthusiast, my constant chase of different skincare products from many different brands ended when I stumbled upon the 100% pure Argan Oil, also known as the liquid gold and one of the rarest oils in the world. I simply wanted control over my skin and the ability to choose what goes on it and I just fell in love with this liquid gold; It’s light enough to use as an everyday moisturizer and powerful enough to soothe ailments such as dry and red skin.That is how Cleyà was born. My goal was always to highlight Argan Oil as a wonderful skincare product because of its amazing natural properties. Cleyà is derived from the word “Clear”. Feeling clear, hydrated and glowing can go a long way into making you reach your goals and living a successful and happy life; so if you haven’t found your daily care routine, I invite you to join the mindset!I want to share with the world a skincare line developed using 100% pure, sustainable, & ethically sourced Argan oil that is extracted from the Argania Spinosa tree. My product is 100% pure, no additives, or dilutions, good for you and our planet. Nothing is ever tested on animals. What is Cleyà Organics? -Cleyà Organics Liquid Gold is a daily beauty regimen for vibrant, healthy looking skin and hair - extracted from the Argania Spinosa tree that is endemic to Southern Morocco. With its high content of antioxidants, vitamin E, and essential fatty acids, the benefits of 100% Argan Oil naturally help hydrate and revitalize the skin, and consistently restore shine to dull lifeless hair to regain a youthful appearance.Why Cleyà Organics? -Our bottle of argan oil liquid gold is a “World-Changer in a Bottle”, organically grown, then harvested and processed by the Berber Woman of Morocco, who fully understood that the Earth is the way that can solve their financial and social problems. And I am certain when I planned this business, i want to combine environmental protection, local economic development, and also women’s empowerment. Cleyà want to source the materials in a way that can support the Berber’s Woman in economic and social empowerment to their workers, who work to conserve the Argan forest. Most importantly, I want to ensure my consumers to feel special when buying my products because they have contributed to saving the earth while getting the best treatment for their skin.I need your help to make my Cleyà Organics dream come true! -In order to truly advertise Cleyà as organic, and cruelty-free, there are a lot of tests we need to pass and certifications we need to acquire. With your help to reach my goal, I will be able to invest in the raw materials (ingredients) and packaging I need to create these awesome skincare product! Helping now will help us grow so we can create fulfilling and rewarding jobs, and provide safe, organic and affordable skincare to you. Great news is that by donating now, you get to enjoy natural, safe and effective Cleyà Organics Liquid Gold very soon! Each donation will allow you to be one of the first to enjoy our World Changer in a Bottle!Thank you! -I can't thank you enough for your support and belief in Cleyà Organics. I hope you enjoy our Liquid Gold as much as I do!


Cleyà Organics Liquid Gold



 


Cleyà Personalized Notebook




 


Personalized Phone Case




 


Cleyà Canvas "Nature Looks Good On You" Tote Bag

Because I am sourcing only the best ingredient from its main and original source, Morocco- there is also always a small risk of having shortages and logistics issues, which can delay delivery schedule by a few days or weeks. Also for the quantities required to get me started, this funding will help to minimize the risk. 

I have already source some manufacturers, and designed labels, and currently working on the import issues in Indonesia. However, if by some mischance, we fail to deliver a product on time, you can be sure we will offer you to replace it by another one with a greater value.

blurb: Protecting you from rain, sunshine, and all the other elements, our umbrella is advanced and effective.
description: Protecting you from rain, sunshine, and all the other elements, our umbrella is advanced and effective.
name: Cutting-Edge UPF Tech in Ultra-Strong Umbrella
title: Cutting-Edge UPF Tech in Ultra-Strong Umbrella
Title: Cutting-Edge UPF Tech in Ultra-Strong Umbrella
Description: Protecting you from rain, sunshine, and all the other elements, our umbrella is advanced and effective.
Link: Cutting-Edge UPF Tech in Ultra-Strong UmbrellaProtecting you from rain, sunshine, and all the other elements, our umbrella is advanced and effective.
description_story:
StoryIntroduction
When raindrops start falling, you need to know that you are prepared. You put too much time into your outfits and schedule too many important appointments to walk around soaking wet. You want to stay comfortable, and you want to be ready for whatever may come – including the most severe thunderstorms in the middle of an otherwise-sunny day.
Fortunately, help has arrived. After sending the HAILSTORM umbrella through three different versions, we are proud to present the final version – a superior umbrella sure to alter the umbrella industry forever. 











We understand the inconvenience of opening the umbrella when you have only one hand available. The umbrella automatically unfold itself with a press of a button.











Every step of the way, we have spared no expense in developing HAILSTORM. Unlike other umbrellas, our umbrella inverts upon closing, keeping the wet side closed off – and opening and closing with a single button press. 











The umbrella itself is made up of eight fiberglass ribs and a premium-grade stainless steel shaft, making it lightweight but durable. The ergonomic designed handle eases your pain by providing maximum comfort grip.




Wind Resistant Structure







The 41" canopy is made of two layers, one extremely water-repellent and the other rated for UPF 50+ in accordance with Australian Standards/New Zealand Standards (AS/NZ) 4399.




Anti-UV and Extremely Water Repellent







Since completing the latest version of our umbrella, we have also tested the fabric, which is rated at extremely low UVA and UVB detectable transmittance – 0.000 across the board, which is accordance with the highest standards for UVA and UVB detection.




UPF Result







This is a product months in the making. Since starting on the first version in January 2019, we have invested significant time and resources into making our umbrella the best umbrella possible, and we are proud to move forward with large-scale production.   




Our Journey





Color Options
HAILSTORM Umbrellas comes with 2 color options: Black or Teal. We would want to include as many color options as possible. However, this is possible only if we meet the Minimum Qty. When our funding reaches:

  S$9,730 (US$7,000) - Red color will be available.
  S$16,680 (US$12,000) - Blue color will be available.
  S$23,630 (US$17,000) - Yellow will be available.

Help us by contributing so that we can offer as many colors as possible! Please note that all umbrellas are black color on the underside.











Dimensions
The umbrella weighs 0.95 lb (430 g) and spans 41 " (104 cm). Making it ultra portable for its large size.











Warranty and Product Support
We are so confident that you are going to love HAILSTORM that we are covering it with a strong guarantee: a defect-free warranty that lasts one year from purchase and service within 24 hours of your initial contact. Feel free to contact us - Our contact information is printed on the fabric label.


Free Shipping World Wide!
Shipping for all our rewards are FREE regardless where you are. We ship Delivered Duty Paid (DDP) -  Which means, we bear the risks and costs, including duties, taxes and other charges of delivering the goods thereto, cleared for importation to your country so you don't have to! In other words, we have paid for all duties and taxes for your country upfront so you won't have hidden costs or delays in receiving your Umbrella.


Our Fundraising Goal
This is where you can help us. In order to scale up production and distribution efforts, we are looking to raise S$3,000 (US$2,165) in start-up capital. Every dollar that we raise helps us significantly, and we intend to use this capital to pay for materials and labor. Whatever we raise above our goal will go toward an effective marketing campaign, spreading the word about HAILSTORM far and wide.
To say thanks to everyone who makes a contribution to this campaign, we are offering some outstanding rewards exclusively through this campaign, including discounts on our cutting-edge umbrella.
You don't want to miss out on this. Before the next rainstorm hits, make a contribution to this campaign and claim your umbrella.


Other Ways You Can Help
In addition to making a monetary contribution to our campaign, you can help us by letting other people know about our advanced, state-of-the-art umbrella technology. Spread the word about HAILSTORM on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, and any other social media platforms you use. Our vision is of a city street, one filled with people bustling this way and that way, our umbrellas protecting them from the sun, the rain, and any other elements.
Together, we can make this happen. We appreciate all your support, both monetary and non-monetary, and we thank you for taking the time to read about our plans.
description_risks:
Our Challenge: The challenge we have is on our logistics. The year is coming to the end in just a few months. We foresee that many of the staff working under logistic sector will be going for holidays. Many people buy gifts during festive period, which adds on to longer delivery.

Our Plan: We work closely with our manufacturer to ensure the umbrellas to be made before End of Oct-2019. By end of November-2019, everyone should have received their umbrellas. Thus, avoiding the peak Dec-2019 period.

blurb: Diver Lifestyle Watch ( Limited to 50 pieces )
description: Diver Lifestyle Watch ( Limited to 50 pieces )
name: Eris Watch Group - New Series 1
title: Eris Watch Group - New Series 1
Title: Eris Watch Group - New Series 1
Description: Diver Lifestyle Watch ( Limited to 50 pieces )
Link: Eris Watch Group - New Series 1Diver Lifestyle Watch ( Limited to 50 pieces )
description_story:
StoryStarted with a passion
A conversation between friends, a Diver challenged a Watch fanatic to come up with an automatic diving watchAfter some research and many versions of design changes, Eris Series 1 is born.

Design from basic 







Initial design - Watch with that functional, sharp looking with a leather strap.







Incorporating Octagon shape in the case design of the watch - Octagon has 8 sides, which is good luck, thus, blessing to the divers.







 







First prototype was develop in stainless steel hence it does not have any "Om" factor that we were looking for, after much discussion and research, bronze(CuSn8) is the ideal material for this project.







Our selection of the new material, fine tuning the watch :Downsize the dial to 34mm, so that we can have a broader bezel.Crown guard was fine tune to allow it to sit comfortably on a 7 inches wrist.Taper end added to the crown to give a lifestyle look.Specially made sapphire crystal with a double dome is being used.AR coating applied on the internal of the sapphire crystal.

Prototype - Eris Series 1







Heated Treated Bronze Dial specially selected to give a richer tone to the watch. 2 colors for the plastic insert bezel - Red & Titanium.For the red bezel insert, it comes with an engrave heat treated bronze dial without lume.For the titanium bezel insert,  it comes with an engrave heat treated bronze dial with lume.







Close up of the dial. Vintage muster lume to give an overall vintage feel on the watch. The second hand will be seated in a recess which is created above the 6 O' clock marking. We also open up a date window at the 3 O' clock marking.Close up 







 







 







 







 







 







 







 







 Technical Details

Movement: Miyota 8218, Automatic movement with second hand at 6 O' clockCase Width: 47mm (excluding Crown Guard) Crown: SS 316, 8mm in diameterCase back: SS 316, Brush Finish Glass: Sapphire Double Dome, with AR coating Dial: Bronze Dial (CuSn8) heat treatment to show different tones of blueish,
two design; with or without lume Bezel: 120 clicks with plastic inserts, 2 Colour (Titanium or Red), with green luminous pearl sitting at 12 'O clockTotal height: 19mm (from case back to dome crystal)Lug width: 26mmWatch Pouch







Teaming up with Bosphorus Strap to produce single watch pouch with leather exterior with a velvet lining.

Watch Strap 


Vachetta Color





  


Montana01 Color






 


Vintage Orange Color





 


Gotham01 Color





 



Egypt Color





Straps are handmade by Adam Arsian, giving the strap a vintage effect.

Dimensions: 85/150Thickness: 4.5mm - 5.5mmLug width: 26mmAll straps come with a knife-edge sewn in bronze buckle.

Warranty

All Eris Watches are covered with two years of manufacturer’s limited warranty & does not cover damages by users. Return shipping & handling fee may apply to every warranty service.

blurb: Soy for joy.
description: Soy for joy.
name: Kandel: Sustainable scented candles
title: Kandel: Sustainable scented candles
Title: Kandel: Sustainable scented candles
Description: Soy for joy.
Link: Kandel: Sustainable scented candlesSoy for joy.
description_story:
Story The Inspiration

 




Photo by Joanna Kosinska on Unsplash





The inspiration for this project came from my obsession with the use of scented candles. I noticed many popular brands use paraffin wax. Paraffin wax is a non-natural based wax that may have adverse effects on your health and well-being, and also to the environment. From this concern, I came up with the idea of making a healthier solution for users and mother nature.
 About Kandel

 
Kandel is a sustainable scented candle made of 100% natural ingredients made with love by hand. The brand objective is to spread joy to people and the environment. The brand cares about your body and mind and each scent has a purpose and benefit to help customers relax.









All ingredients are natural and Kandel uses soy wax which is derived from vegetables - which makes it vegan and is cruelty-free. Other types of wax use animal products such as beeswax from hives of beeves. Soy wax also burns longer than other wax by 25 to 50%. It burns cleaner, and does not release harmful toxins into the air. Our products use natural essential oils derived from herbs and plants creating a soothing smell that is beneficial for our body and mind. Natural essential oils are proven to positively affect people's mental health. The wick is lead-free because lead may cause adverse effects on mental and physical development. Each candle is decorated with dry flowers that identifies each scent.
 Objective

 
The objective of the brand running a crowdfunding campaign is to build the prototype and knowing people's opinion about the product. The money will be used to purchase materials and ingredients needed to make the product. Through this action, I would like to know key things to be improved for the business.
 Our Scents' Purpose

 









Frangipani - inner peace and confidence









Jasmine - a natural remedy for stress, anxiety, and fatigue









Lavender - relaxes mind and body









Rose - anti-depressants









Sandalwood - concentration and calmness









Vanilla - increases the happiness level
description_risks: As I am currently a student, the challenge that I am facing is financial. I am planning to purchase materials and ingredients to experiment and imrprove the product's quality.

description_story:
StoryHello! I am Dinojar, and this is my 7th Kickstarter Campaign! You can check out my previous Kickstarter, Chibi Pets Series and Chibi Friends Series!
I'm super excited to run this Kickstarter and I hope you will enjoy them as well!
How does Kickstarter work?

   Pledge now Risk-Free and Pay later system! You can always change your pledge anytime during the campaign. You'll only be charged if the funding goal is met.
  All pledges help unlock new designs! Even if the design you want is still locked, you can still pledge to help unlock it!
  Click the 'Back this project' button and choose the tier you want. You can select your add-ons after you have chosen the main rewards.
   Survey form will be sent at the end of the campaign to choose your rewards.




















Total of 13 Designs for you to choose from! You will get the FREE mini pin if you pledge 5 or more pins from THIS CAMPAIGN! :)
All designs are available as pins or stickers. More design coming soon! You can also suggest your design in comment section or message.
Pin Features:

  Gold Plating
  Hard Enamel
  2 Rubber Clutches
  Standard Pins: ~ 1.25 to 1.5 inches (30mm to 40mm) 
  Mini Pin: ~1 inch height (25mm) 
  Mounted to beautifully designed Backing Card

 What are Hard Enamel Pins?
Hard enamel pins (lapel pins/brooch) are decorative art that can be worn or otherwise displayed. They have raised metal lines forming the 'line art' and the recessed sections between the lines are filled with colourful hard enamel. The piece is then polished smoothly so it can be at the same level as the metal lines.




Past Campaign Sample Pins (Chibi Pets 1)













Due to popular demand, you can add past campaigns' pins and stickers as add-ons.
Limited quantity available.




How do we know which design you would like?
At the end of the campaign period, we will send you a survey form for you to indicate the design you would like. You will be able to indicate which pins, stickers or add-ons you desire.










   4th Dec - Kickstarter campaign starts and runs for 15 days.
   19th Dec - Campaign ends. Backer surveys are sent out afterward to your email (to indicate your choice of pins, stickers, and add-ons).
   Early Jan - We receive the fund pledge from Kickstarter. (2 weeks after the campaign ends). Production begins.
   Feb/Mar - Pins and stickers expected to reach me - I will proceed with quality checks and grading.
   Feb-Apr - Pins and stickers will be shipped to backers.










I really thank all of you for making this dream come through! This project could never become a reality without your support! And I would be honored if you share the project with your family and friends!
~ Love, Dinojar | Instagram


If you have any question, feel free to ask me!
I will add any questions and their answers to the FAQ section as they are asked. If your question isn't on the list or you need further clarification on something, feel free to comment or message me!
description_risks:
REWARDS
The final pins may vary slightly from the designs shown here. Every single pin is handmade, there is expected to be minor defects or flaws. Standard grade pins will be used to fulfill pledges and these pins may have minor defects that are only visible under extremely close inspection. Pins with more noticeable flaws are lower grade and will NOT be used to fulfill pledges. The actual color or size of the pins may differ a little from the descriptions, but I'm confident that any differences will be minimal. I am working closely with an established manufacturer, to ensure smooth fulfillment of all the orders.

TIMELINE
Delays in shipping and production of pins may occur when creating enamel pins. This may happen because of production errors and manufacturing defects. If there are any delays, all backers will be immediately updated!

FULFILLMENT
I will update here on Kickstarter and Instagram so that backers have an idea when their rewards will be shipped out. Please double check your address in the reward selection confirmation email to reduce the chance of a package being lost! Once a package is mailed, it is out of my control but I will do my best to assist and accommodate for any lost packages for TRACKED shipment. We always encourage you to upgrade by adding TRACKING service to the shipping with a small fee for peace of mind.

ADDITIONAL FEES
Backers outside of the SG are responsible for any and all customs fees, import taxes, VAT, GST, or other additional costs associated with importing goods into their country, and those costs are NOT included in their pledge or shipping cost.

REFUNDS & CANCELLATIONS
Once the campaign is complete, refunds or cancellations will not be issued for any reason. Please fully read over the campaign, and only pledge if you understand & accept the above-estimated timeline and risks!

blurb: A brutal, action-packed dungeon crawler trilogy from a Hugo and Dragon Award nominated writer.
description: A brutal, action-packed dungeon crawler trilogy from a Hugo and Dragon Award nominated writer.
name: Dungeon Samurai
title: Dungeon Samurai
Title: Dungeon Samurai
Description: A brutal, action-packed dungeon crawler trilogy from a Hugo and Dragon Award nominated writer.
Link: Dungeon SamuraiA brutal, action-packed dungeon crawler trilogy from a Hugo and Dragon Award nominated writer.
description_story:
StoryWelcome to the Dungeon
Yamada Yuuki is an ordinary Japanese college student with an extraordinary hobby: the classical martial art of Kukishin-ryu. One evening, a demon rips through the fabric of space-time, abducts everyone in his dojo, and transports them to another world. To return home, Yamada and his friends must join forces with other abductees to conquer the dungeon that runs through the heart of the world. 
Standing in their way are endless hordes of bloodthirsty monsters, treacherous traps, invisible clouds of poison gas, and unfathomable horrors lurking in the lightless depths. Armed only with steel, faith and sheer guts, they must battle their way through the winding catacombs and confront the demon waiting at the bottom floor. 
Yamada was once a student. Now he must become a samurai.
Dungeon Samurai is a trilogy of military fantasy novels running to about 65,000 words per book. It is the story of a harrowing campaign into the unlighted depths of a monster-filled dungeon. No pity, no mercy, no room for error. 
If you ever wondered what old-school Dungeons & Dragons would look like if it were run like a military campaign, Dungeon Samurai is for you.
In the words of Matthew P. Schmidt, author of The City and the Dungeon:
"Like if Tom Clancy had written an isekai, this action-packed trilogy will blow your mind with its loving dedication to martial arts detail and grim, heroic violence. Faith, courage, and honor are weapons as well in this magnificently crafted world of dungeons and demons. Banzai!"
Who Is the Story For?
If you love the following, you'll love Dungeon Samurai:

  Dungeon crawlers
  OSR Dungeons & Dragons
  Darkest Dungeon
  Historical military fantasy
  Sword and sorcery
  Weird Tales in the vein of Robert E Howard
  Classical martial arts
  Isekai

A Taste of War
Want to know you're in for? Check out the sample below.
--
The world was an illusion. The sweat-stained gi plastered to his back, the armor weighing on his bones, the hot air trapped within his full-face helmet, the fatigue sinking into his muscles, they were all meaningless. There was only him, his sword, and his opponent.
Yamada Yuuki raised his weapon.
“HAJIME!”
The other man began circling to Yamada’s right. Yamada followed, slowly sneaking his feet forward, closing the distance between them. His opponent did the same. Yamada bided his time, stepping closer, closer, closer, seeking the proper ma-ai, the perfect combination of space and timing, to strike.
Now.
“EEEEEEEEEEEE!” Yamada yelled, stepping in with a powerful slash.
The other man shifted just so, and Yamada’s sword whooshed through empty air.
Yamada swung again.
“EEEEEEEEEEEEEE!” 
His opponent vanished.
“EI!”
A heavy blunt force thudded into his breastplate. 
Yamada stumbled away. His opponent had slipped out of his field of view and delivered the blow. Already the man had cleared the ma-ai, sword ready for the next exchange.
“Good hit,” Yamada admitted.
This was randori. Free play, not combat. His sword was a shinai made of flexible bamboo, not a katana built of live steel. Hiroshi Matsuo was his best friend, his childhood friend, not an enemy. 
Still, getting hit sucked.
But Hiroshi was just a tad too close.
“Let’s go,” Hiroshi said.
Yamada charged in, swinging at Hiroshi’s neck. Hiroshi parried. Yamada arced the shinai around, going for the other side of his neck. Hiroshi blocked.
“HO!” Yamada yelled, bringing his shinai down.
Hiroshi yielded, swinging his sword through a tight circle. Yamada’s arms dropped through empty space—and Hiroshi’s sword rapped his exposed wrists. 
“Daijoubu?” Hiroshi asked. Are you alright?
“Hai,” Yamada replied. Yes.
Hiroshi had supreme control. He had struck Yamada with just enough force to make him feel the blow without bruising anything more than his pride.
Again and again, the men clashed. Again and again, Hiroshi’s blade struck true, while Yamada’s found only air. Hiroshi had been studying the koryu longer than Yamada, and it showed. 
Still, Yamada had to land a blow. No matter what. This was his first randori. He had to show Sensei he had learned something.
Yamada readied his shinai. Hiroshi did the same. Warily, the men approached each other. Yamada breathed in. Out. In.
Stepped and cut—
Bamboo slapped against Yamada’s forearms. 
They reset. Advanced again. Yamada stepped in, closer, closer, his sword probing at Hiroshi’s, shielding his relentless advance while responding to Hiroshi’s maneuvers. The shinai circled and thrust and bounced off each other, testing strength, finding weakness, seeking a moment of opportunity.
Hiroshi’s sword batted down Yamada’s. Yamada flowed with the energy, circling his shinai back up and bringing it crashing down—
Hiroshi stepped aside and cut his arm.
Yamada stepped aside. He hated being hit so many times. But this time, he saw Hiroshi move. He was learning. Next time, he could land a hit. Yamada raised his shinai and—
Hiroshi stepped in and thrust at his throat.
They reset.
Yamada was doing something wrong. Hiroshi was a defensive fighter. He had the timing and the reflexes for it. Yamada did not. He had to do something else. He had to use his brain, to use what Sensei called heiho. Strategy.
What was it Sensei had said last week? There is an opening in every stance, and by skillfully positioning your weapon you could lure the enemy into a trap. But it wasn’t enough to simply pretend to lower your guard. You had to convince the enemy it wasn’t a trap. Selling the technique required a proper set-up.
They closed again, each feeling the other out. Yamada launched a barrage of slashes at Hiroshi’s neck, keeping him on the defensive, giving him no time to respond. One last cut and Yamada abruptly dropped his sword, as though fatigued, just enough to expose his head.
“EEEEEEEEEEEEEEE!” Yamada yelled, rearing up and pulling his sword low.
Hiroshi slashed at Yamada’s head.
“EEEEEEEEE!”
Yamada exploded into a rising cut, his shinai colliding with Hiroshi’s left arm. The arm went slack, but the sword continued to arc towards Yamada’s head.
“EEEEEEEEE!”
Yamada twirled the shinai around, cutting Hiroshi’s weapon arm and bashing it aside. Hiroshi staggered back, and Yamada closed.
“EEEEEEE!”
The shinai struck Hiroshi’s helmet.
Elation flowed through Yamada. He’d finally did it.
“Good one,” Hiroshi said. 
Yamada smiled. “Thanks.”
Three loud claps reverberated in the dojo.
“MATTE!”
Randori was over. 
Yamada unfastened and removed his helmet. The night air was cool against his face. He was soaked in sweat, his muscles burned, but he felt good. He felt right. Sure, he’d taken a beating and then some, at the hands of Hiroshi and at the other senior students, but he’d survived. He’d even managed to land a few hits. That counted for something.
The students gathered around Sensei. Sensei Sasaki Makoto was a slight, short man, coming up only to Yamada’s mouth. Sensei’s short hair had run to white, dark spots speckled across his skin, and his lined face seemed cast in weathered stone. But under his loose gi were muscles hard as iron and nerves trained to perfection, and when he stood his posture was perfectly balanced, ready to spring into action. Everywhere he went he radiated intensity of focus, and woe betide anyone who dared cross him.
“Everyone, well done,” Sensei said, his voice deceptively gentle. “What have we learned today?”
Sensei always ended classes with a brief recap of the day’s lessons, beginning with principles and techniques, concluding with general observations and mistakes.
As he wrapped up, he turned his gaze on Yamada.
“Aggression is, of course, necessary in combat. However, it must also be tempered with wisdom, with timing, with heiho. Blind courage merely leads to your death.”
Yamada nodded. He had to remember that.
His closing remarks finished, Sensei closed the class with meditation. Yamada knelt on the hard wooden floor, ignoring the pain in his joints and muscles, straightening his back and resting his butt on his heels. This was seiza, the traditional way of sitting. 
Yamada closed his eyes. Breathed in. Breathed out. Let the world fall away. Let every thought disappear. Let everything he had learned today sink into his body, his mind, his heart.
“You have been chosen.”
His eyes flew open.
Where had the voice come from?
Looking around, Yamada saw that a few others had broken meditative discipline. Including Hiroshi. 
And Sensei.
Sensei scanned the room. Returned to seiza. And closed his eyes.
Hiroshi followed. So did Yamada.
Yamada breathed. Maybe that was nothing. Or perhaps some idiot was playing a prank. If so, Sensei would ensure it would never happen again. It wasn’t his problem. He just had to focus. To breathe.
Two claps brought him back to reality.
The students bowed.
“Thank you for teaching us!” they recited.
Sensei bowed back. “Thank you for teaching me.”
A deep, gleeful, alien voice filled the room.
“And thank you for being my food.”
“Eh?” Yamada said.
Strange, intricate designs covered the floor, the ceiling, the walls and windows, filling the dojo with crimson light. Chains of interlocking circles, of circles within circles, branching off into spirals and horns and semisolid cubes composed of tiny interlocking pyramids whose sides melted and flowed into each other. Impossible shapes danced at the edges of Yamada’s sight, his brain almost but not quite recognizing the forms. Harsh voices whispered and cackled and gibbered, speaking in nonsense tongues that clawed at Yamada’s ears.
“Masaka!” someone exclaimed. Impossible!
Yamada covered his ears and gnashed his teeth. He snapped his head from side to side, and everywhere he looked he saw more circles, more alien geometries, more things that should not be. Men screamed and stumbled and lashed out at the things, Sensei himself was wobbling about, barely able to stand.
This was impossible. But he had to act or perish.
Men sprang to their feet, seizing weapons and scanning the room, barking observations and orders. Yamada clawed at a complex arrangement of triangles and lines with his fingers, but all he felt was solid wood.
“Everybody run!” Hiroshi shouted.
But there was nowhere to run. The windows were gone, the door engulfed in the disorienting designs.
“Find an exit!” Sensei ordered.
A student ran his hands along the wall, feeling for the doorknob, but found nothing. He slammed his palms against the walls to no avail. Other men pounded at the places where the windows used to be, but they were all gone, replaced by walls crawling with monstrous shapes.
The darkness grew deeper, the scarlet light brighter, the voices louder. Thunder boomed in Yamada’s ears. Cursing, Yamada dropped to his knees. A sudden chill shot through his bones, so cold he gasped in pain. He clawed at the closest design on the floor, a string of miniature globes that seemed both two-dimensional and three-dimensional at once, and electricity ripped through his fingers, his palms, his arms, his chest, blazing up into his brain. 
An atomic bomb exploded in his skull.
Then, darkness.
--
Of course, this is only the beginning. Blood and death, fire and steel, sorrow and courage, they are all waiting in the deeps.
About the Author
I'm Singapore's first Hugo and Dragon Award nominated writer, specialising in science fiction and fantasy. As Kai Wai Cheah, I wrote the Dragon Award-nominated novel No Gods, Only Daimons and its sequel Hammer of the Witches, published by Castalia House. I am also a contributing author to Silver Empire's Heroes Unleashed universe through my Song of Karma series, to be published soon.
With the name Kit Sun Cheah, I will be embarking on a new career in self-published pulp-style fiction, beginning with the Dungeon Samurai trilogy.
What Your Pledges Support
This campaign is to pay for cover art, printing fees and shipping costs. The novels are already written, edited and formatted. All that's left is to hire professional artists to create the covers, both digital and paperback.

description_story:
Story


As seen on ...





 


Stretch Goal 2: Integrated Leather Strap for S65 Sport Watch





Stretch goals are now published! So, we’ve heard your suggestions and are launching two tiers of stretch goals. Read on below or simply check out the updates page for a full breakdown!







 




"Bespoke was once an option only offered by high-end brands ... What is unique about Schaffen is that it includes the possibility of personalizing the rotor." - MONOCHROME





  




Designing Your Unique Timepiece (Overview)





 We're proud to introduce the Reference 65 Collection - the A65 Dress Watch & S65 Sport Watch - timepieces that capture your stories and express your unique individualities.Each Reference 65 timepiece is truly one-of-a-kind, because you are going to be co-creating the watch with us.At Schaffen, we aspire to take watch customisation to new heights. We like to ask - if every watch told a story, what would yours say?   









 







 


    







 







In self-winding automatic watches, most rotors come pre-built in the watch. In pushing the boundaries of custom-made watches, we decided to challenge this assumption and delve into the movement of the watch.The rotor, or oscillating weight, winds each movement and provides space for designing freedom, capturing stories and allowing for an even further expression of creativity!







 


After the campaign, send us your designs to create mockup previews





 










 


Sample of 3D-Printed Rotors (Actual Photo)





  









If you don't have a design in mind yet, that's alright! After the campaign, we will discuss with every backer and recommend personalised ideas and motifs which would make great designs on your rotor.







 


 







 


Dial Personalisation





To begin the creation of your Reference 65 timepiece, go bold by designing your own hour markers and/or choose to have your signature or motif on the dial.We can also recommend designs such as classic roman or arabic numerals. Shown above is a series of Burmese numerals commissioned and designed by a client.Alternatively, keep the dial simple for a clean look!







 







The devil is in the details, and we're proud to offer customisation to an unprecedented level of detail:Choose a black or white date window, or go without one for a purist look.
Select blue or silver watch hands, or go with a mixture, such as silver hour/minute hands & blue seconds hands.We have different customisation options available for each collection. Read on below to find out more!After the campaign, each backer will receive an exclusive invite to an online dashboard, where these components may be selected.




A65 Dress Watch & S65 Sport Watch





 







Inspired by dual-toned dials popular in the 50s & 60s, the dial of the A65 Dress Watch is vertically brushed in the centre, with a matte outer ring containing the appliqués.Both the appliqués and watch hands are faceted to catch light at different angles when rotating the watch. For additional contrast, the case-side has a brushed finish
 while the bezel is polished, finally completing it with sapphire crystals to the top and the case-back.




A65 Dress Watch with Silver, Blue & Grey Dials





 







 







 







 







 


 







A Genta-inspired design, the S65 Sport Watch bears an integrated bracelet while keeping the case at a versatile 39.5mm.Made of 316L stainless steel, the case comprises two bezels: a circular-brushed round bezel sitting atop a polished, rounded-hexagon sub-bezel. The dial is finished with a horizontally-ridged texture, a novel design which creates a unique stylistic element.




S65 Sport Watch with White, Blue & Grey Dials





 







 







 







 







 


 







We believe that designing your rotor is only meaningful when built on a reliable and recognised movement, making each watch worth keeping and sharing.We are proud to collaborate with Sellita Watch SA in using their "Swiss-Made" SW200-1 movements, a trustworthy caliber with 26 jewels. Our choice of movements are further regulated in Élaboré grade and completed with heated blue screws.









You are going to treasure and share your custom-made Reference 65 timepiece, and we want to give you our assurance.Each Reference 65 timepiece will come in a wooden box, with black PVC leather cushioning the watch. The box comes complete with a personalised warranty card & certificate of authenticity.Working with top-class manufacturers such as Sellita Watch SA, we are confident in the quality of our watches, providing a 2 year warranty on all our watches.







To realise the dream of truly customisable timepieces, we amassed resources and expertise from all over the world. The reliable and robust movement is made in Switzerland, while the rotors are individually 3D-printed by cutting-edge manufacturers in Leuven, Belgium.The rotors are then hand-polished and finished by jewellers in Singapore, before assembly by our watchmakers. We personally check through every single timepiece to ensure that each watch is a beautifully-crafted, well-made piece.







 







 







 





 







Hi, I'm Nicholas (right) and to share with you more about ourselves, I started this company with my brother, Jonathan, 2 years ago. I remember it was on 14 October 2015 that we started making watches.Working with jewellers and watchmakers we have known for years, the goal was simple: to create an exclusive collection for the family. The very first watch we made, we dedicated it to our father on his 50th birthday. And to make it a one-of-a-kind, we printed his signature on the dial, much to his delight!Word spread and before we knew it, the Republic of Singapore Air Force commissioned us to make a custom timepiece for a retiring colonel. This time, we had the colonel's name and years of service on the dial to make it a truly meaningful retirement gift.Since then, we have gone on to make hundreds of personalised timepieces, creating countless special moments for others... And it is because of these exact moments in our journey that led us to where we are now - the Reference 65 collection.The number 65 pays homage to the year of independence of our home country Singapore, and is also the birth year of our parents. It is therefore our dream to create valuable and meaningful keepsakes for every individual through this new collection.Our name Schaffen (ˈʃafṇ) means "to create", and this has represented our passion from day one. In this collection, we would love to work with you to co-create a timepiece that is truly the only one in the world... 







 
 


Check out our review by Monochrome








Check out our review by Wrist Watch Review






Check out our review by Watch It All About
description_risks:
Finding proper, good quality suppliers was a challenge that we had to overcome. We searched and experimented with over 20 suppliers before we finally found the ones which proved to be excellent.

Another challenge is that every watch will require certain lead time as watch production, individual rotor manufacturing and watch assembly take place sequentially. We have taken this into account in our lead time and fulfilment projections.

Over the past 2 years, in a previous watch collection, we have made over 300 watches and worked closely with our manufacturers and suppliers. Thank you for your support and we are fully confident in fulfilling our projected timeline.

description_story:
StoryWELCOME
********* Thank you everyone for the support and we are officially funded! **********
We decided to have a $1200 Stretch Goal which we will add 4 new pages of comic content!



Stretch Goal $1200




Pledge now and share with your friends to help us bring these pages to the book! 


********************************************************************************




Welcome to our 17 days Kickstarter campaign for Destiny and The UnXplainables 36 pages comic book. Hold on tight, for you are about to enter a ride of suspense and thrilling action! Destiny and The UnXplainables bring you onto a journey when two police inspectors face the unknown.









SYNOPSIS
Destiny (Story and Art by Kang Jing, Colours by Pavith C, Edited by CT Lim)
In his past life, Chung Wai Man was Constable Chung, the renowned constable of the imperial court in the Song Dynasty. A thousand years later, reincarnated as Chung Sir, Inspector of CID (Criminal Investigation Department), Chung Wai Man began having constant flashes and memories of his past life. Little did he know that his fate today, was determined by his actions in a previous lifetime. ‘Destiny’ is about a story where the present collides with the past.


The UnXplainables (Story and Art by Alan Bay, Edited by CT Lim)
In a safe little island, a mysterious case brought Inspector Dave and Jill to Aunt Lilian, a psychic medium who can connect them to the 'Netherzone'. What lies within it and how will the duo be entangled with the in-betweens and the unexplained?


PREVIEW
Getting excited yet? Wait till you see some amazing pages from the book!
 Destiny by Kang Jing and Pavith C




Destiny Cover Page








Destiny Page 1








Destiny Page 2





 The UnXplainables by Alan Bay




The UnXplainables Cover Page








The UnXplainables Page 1








The UnXplainables Page 2





Want to see more? Back us today and be the first to receive the comic book for both stories!
PRODUCT
By backing our Kickstarter campaign today, you will get to receive this exclusive 36 pages comic book featuring both Destiny and The UnXplainables. Not only will you get to enjoy two different art styles revolving around the same theme, you will also be able to enjoy both cover pages on the same book! We present to you the unique 'flip book'!




2 in 1 flip book. Enjoy both covers and both stories within the same comic book!





That's not all, by backing us at the higher tiers, you get to own not only 1, but 2 original commission pieces of varying sizes from both Kang Jing and Alan Bay at special rates. And to top it all off, Singapore backers enjoy free local postage! It can't get any better! Without further ado, check out the rewards below!


REWARD
By pledging and supporting the campaign, you can look forward to receiving different rewards depending on the tiers supported.
(For backers who are unfamiliar with Kickstarter, your credit card will not be charged unless the campaign succeeds.)

























ABOUT THE CREATORS
Kang Jing (Writer and Artist of 'Destiny')
Kang Jing (KJ) is an internationally published indie comic book creator from Singapore. In late 2019, KJ released his debut comic series, “The World My Arena”, through Kickstarter. The martial arts based series has since been featured on local media (justsaying.ASIA, CNA Lifestyle) and adapted into animated videos (ComicVid by VividThree Productions). It has also led to a spin-off bilingual webcomic series, "Save Me From Chloe". In addition, KJ has also worked on projects with various publishers, such as Graphic Mundi and Arcane Inkdustries.


Alan Bay (Writer and Artist of 'The UnXplainables')
Alan Bay is an illustrator and comic artist, whose art have appeared in comic books, cartoons and an extensive list of video game projects including Assassin's Creeds: Brotherhood, TMNT, Prince of Persia: Forgotten Sands, Ghost Recon and Romance of Three Kingdoms Online.
His first printed comic book titled Atlas (2010), was a collaboration between Media Development Authority of Singapore (MDA) and ChuangYi Publishing.
In 2020, Alan teamed up with tokuAsia’s Aydeel Djoeharie to create the graphic novel origin story of the tokusatsu-inspired live-action series Sacred Guardians, published by Asiapac Books.


Pavith C (Colourist of 'Destiny')
Graphic Designer by day, Comic Colorist by night. Pavith C is a Creative from Singapore, finding new and dynamic ways to breath a breath of fresh colours over your inks. Having coloured comics and covers both locally and internationally, you can rest assured knowing that your comic experience will be vibrant and immersive. One more thing you should know, he likes to colour outside the lines sometimes!


CT Lim (Editor of 'Destiny' and 'The UnXplainables')
CT Lim writes and writes about comics. He edits them too sometimes.


BREAKDOWN OF COST









The Kickstarter goal is the bare minimum required to print this comic, and to get it out to all the amazing backers. Roughly 50% goes to printing, 30% for production, 10% for shipping and 10% for Misc funds.
If we are able to hit beyond the goal, that would be amazing and we would be glad to introduce stretch goals to bring more rewards to everyone!


FINALLY
Thank you again for dropping by this Kickstarter campaign page and we truly hope that you will back this project, and help us spread the word on it! The campaign will only be live for a short period of 17 days till 31st May, 11pm (GMT +0800). Help us reach that goal! Help us break that goal! Help us smash that goal! Back us today!
description_risks: At the point of this campaign, the comic is 100% ready, with all pages completed. What remains is for us to hit the goal and raise the funds for printing, and get this amazing collaborative comic book into your hands! Backers can expect to receive their comic books within 2 months upon completion of the campaign.
