Link: All-in-One Wireless Router for Your Home and OfficeMeet Crux LX - Get rid of wired phone instruments, cordless phones, wires, answering machines and intercom
description_story:
StoryHello Backers:  Welcome to my project!
This is my first time on Kickstarter. It has been quite the journey from an idea to a market-ready product in less than a year. Today, I want to share my story with you, as to why; after working for over 20 years at Fortune 500 companies, a couple start-ups, being an engineer, and a recent graduate from a top-tier b-school (http://www.linkedin.com/in/grohit); I have decided to pursue a path of developing open-source based products for homes and small offices.
Working at large enterprises, I have experienced many technology solutions. However, I do not see most of these solutions in our homes or small offices. For example, at home, we use cordless phones and answering machines where as large businesses use soft-phones and voicemail. The reasons span factors of cost, complexity of skills, manageability, etc. This has motivated me to find lean ways to create high-end solutions at a cost-efficient price point. The journey with Crux LX has been full of challenges but we hope to find your support, which will make the journey worthwhile. We would love for you to support us, try this product, benefit from it, and share your feedback.














Your Story     BW Disrupt      TMCnet UC      K-Ten     Geeky Gadgets


































































































Follow us on Facebook, Twitter and LinkedIn or subscribe to our mailing list.
description_risks: Between July - September 2017, we concluded extensive beta trials across a variety of customers in different environments and industries, from corporate offices to manufacturing factories to hospitals and multi-acre education campuses. The 8 units sold to beta customers have performed flawlessly with no failures or defects reported over last two quarters. Crux Labs' demo unit is usually powered ON and in use for over 9 months now, and constantly monitored for issues. In our assessment, the unit is production ready. The trials, along with the testing that we have performed during development of product, along with no defects being found at any of the deployed locations over last quarter, minimizes your risk in backing this project. We are 100% committed to delivering the promised product into your hands before end of February 2018.

description_story:
Story First Class – The Making Of
An enthusiastic group of 12-year-olds look deeper into their home, Lengkok Bahru, through design thinking and game design, led by a fun group of facilitators who've grown up with them over the years. This box set of four games which pack fun, personality and aspiration, is the result of their year-long effort to share a perspective inspired by the people and places they grew up with.




Then and Now :)








First Class sessions in 'The Invincible Room', our studio at Enabling Village (Dec 2019)





















































































First Class : A boxset series of 4 games





The First Class boxset includes

   House of Cats: a fast-paced memory-matching game to find missing cats
   Swank Tank: a cooperative game to assemble fish tanks without scum
   Market Blitz:  a competitive card game to build a dream business empire
   Unleashed: a party game of persuasion and sabotage with neighbourhood dogs

Credits
Lead: Annusia Balan
Facilitators: Joyce Teo, Austin Chia, Grace Goh, Charis Anne Lim, Edwin Chen
Child designers: 

   House of Cats: Nur Shahanis Bte Johar & Maryangelly Jayabahan
   Swank Tank: Alfred Goh, Brandvan Yang
   Market Blitz: Huios Ow, Elvis Lim
   Unleashed: Raden Rauf Bin Radin Padli, Muhammad Afeeq Bin Muhammad Firdaus, Muhammad Azeeq Bin Muhammad Firdaus
description_risks: We hope to produce the box sets in time for Christmas and spread this project to as many families and schools as we can. One risk is our lack of experience in marketing game products, as we are primarily a non-profit arts company. We are enjoying this journey and hope more people can experience the creativity of our First Class children.

Link: Sustainable Hanbok Tech wear pantsIt is a sustainable tech wear brand, design inspired by Korean traditional wear 'Hanbok'. Using recycled material.
description_story:
StoryThe tech wear industry has been keep rising past few years. As the industry develops, the more tech wear brands are appearing everywhere in the world. Which can also direct to more garment wastes in the world. Although these tech wear clothings, that other companies are producing could look nice and functional, but it may not  be sustainable and it is harming the environment. 
Throughout the research, I have realised that the traditional garment ‘Hanbok’ from my home country, which is South Korea, has the similar aesthetics in the whole silhouette of techwear garments, and it’s functional at the same time. So I came up with an idea to combine the ‘Hanbok’ garment to modern tech wear garments, and make it sustainable by using recycled materials.
description_risks:
Rise of tech wear industry
Too much garments waste
Short life time period of garments

blurb: Illustrated children's books featuring tenacious women brought to life with Augmented Reality Technology
description: Illustrated children's books featuring tenacious women brought to life with Augmented Reality Technology
name: TiffinTown Books - Different Stories. Different Tomorrow.
title: TiffinTown Books - Different Stories. Different Tomorrow.
Title: TiffinTown Books - Different Stories. Different Tomorrow.
Description: Illustrated children's books featuring tenacious women brought to life with Augmented Reality Technology
Link: TiffinTown Books - Different Stories. Different Tomorrow.Illustrated children's books featuring tenacious women brought to life with Augmented Reality Technology
description_story:
Story







Stories shape who we are. It's time for different stories because our children deserve them! We at TiffinTown Books want to be a part of that change. By combining the diverse stories of women with AR technology, we want to build communities of future leaders.







The truth is, growing up, we couldn’t find many stories of women of colour. When we did, the journeys the women went on often sounded the same. There was one voice. One pathway to success. But what about the others?








 









We’re working with Amplified Robot, an established AR company, to bring our stories to life! A variety of features will be incorporated into our books, accessible through the TiffinTown Books app. 3-D rendering, for instance, will allow readers to enjoy lively visuals and entertaining scenes. 









Through our technology, readers will have a chance to travel through the forests of China and hear the animals Ruth Harkness encountered, and immerse themselves in the ocean to learn about marine life with Eugenie Clark. Our books will take children back in time to explore these women’s thrilling journeys.
To get more ideas on what the AR experience will look like, check out some of the great work Amplified Robot has done on their website.









Each of the women we write about falls under these seven categories: 
Every year, we release one book a month from one of the categories. Children will be able to see that women have always and will continue to shine in every avenue of life!








The first four books tell the stories of Josephine Baker, an internationally famous African-American dancer who fought successfully for desegregating theaters; Ruth Harkness, fashion-designer turned explorer who sparked public interest in panda conservation by bringing the first panda to America; and Eugenie Clark, a leading ichthyologist who explored the mysteries of the sea and championed marine conservation; and last but not least, our mystery woman! 









Hint: she was a hugely influential chef who transformed home cooking in America!








Our first book, the Story of Josephine Baker, is ready - written and fully illustrated. 
Here's just a few of the pages: 







 







 







 








You can read the first 10 pages here!
Now, we just need your help to get it printed! We're also working on the other three books and planning on what's to come in the following year!








 









Our books are suitable for anyone above the age of nine, who loves illustrated books about real, inspiring women and children from around the world!  








Tiffiners Magazine, our quarterly e-magazine, complements our books by providing a rich array of innovative and interactive content on relevant cultural, social, historical, and scientific issues. Our magazine makes learning about the world fun! Those interested in Eugenie Clark, for instance, can treat themselves to our section on sharks, while readers moved by Josephine Baker will be able to follow her moves as she dances across the screen. 








The magazines will also introduce our readers to children driving amazing change today. Age should be no limit to achieving great things. We want to work with these young leaders and showcase their stories to inspire other children and share their efforts with the world.








 








Here's a little look at the artworks of the artist who'll be drawing your personalized portraits! 








 









 









 








 








 








We’re Sneha and Gladys. We met while working at World Wildlife Fund’s Earth Hour Global Team in 2016! 








Sneha has always been passionate about making positive change and working at a nonprofit organization reinforced her desire to give back to society. She also loves books, particularly those that feature female protagonists and boarding schools! For her, TiffinTown Books was the perfect opportunity to work on her two favorite things: empowering girls and giving back to communities.
From ghost-writing to scriptwriting, Gladys always dreamed of becoming a full-fledged author, so when Sneha suggested starting a company that would not only leave the world a better place but allows her to live amongst books, she said yes immediately!
We would like to thank everyone who’s helped us in building TiffinTown Books from an idea in our head into this Kickstarter project that you see today! Special thanks to:
- Jules, our go-to for everything 
- Chelsy, our first book illustrator 
- Marie, our very own in-house designer of everything 
- Veronica, our social media post-creator 
- Natalie, our branding aficionado 
- Ernie, our illustrated video creator, director, and producer
description_risks:
With the first book complete, we’ve already begun work on the other three books. Printing and shipping have all been arranged. We just need the funding to get our books to you.

We are working with 12 artists for our books, and more will be involved for the production of our magazines. The biggest challenge for us: Time. But good things come to those who wait! We want to give our artists the most amount of time they need to truly showcase their best pieces for your children to enjoy, even if it does mean that the books will take a little longer to get to you.

We love the AR technology for our books, and we can't wait to show you.But tech is tech, so app glitches in the first version may occur. But don't worry! We've got a dedicated team on board who’ll resolve these issues as soon as they occur, so our children readers can enjoy a seamless and enjoyable reading experience.

description_risks:
The Last Artisan has received seed funding from National Heritage Board (NHB)  and Ngee Ann Polytechnic, which carries with it a requirement to complete the film in 2018. This deadline creates a sense of urgency to get the film completed so that the project is not prolonged indefinitely.

With the film already shot, our team is now at the post-production stage. The amount of animation and archival footage in the film is largely dependent on donor support - more funds will allow for more animation and costly archival content. Regardless, this film WILL BE COMPLETED and will play at festivals and through other outlets to reach an international audience.

How will the Kickstarter money be spent?


80% Post-Production (Editing / Subtitling / Sound Mixing / Color Correction) 
20% Kickstarter Rewards and Shipping


Be part of the synergy in helping us to make this film happen, and THANK YOU for your support!

Link: Girl and Past | Anime Short FilmThe Anime film tells a story of Emii a normal young woman, who's one day shares a connection to the afterlife
description_story:
Story







Hi! My name is Vieri, a freelancer animator artist! and a director of Miraculous Works - game and animation production.
It is my dream to produce my own animation and share it to the world, but i can’t afford the production costs, but with your help it will be possible!









How Kickstarter works? 
If you pledge for this project, you won’t be charged at the moment. Kickstarter only charge when the campaign reach the goal.









The protagonist of the story is Emii, a shy and insecure girl. Emii has always struggled to find a stable job and sincere friends. Her dream is to have a family and finally be able to stop being afraid.









Emii is a girl very close to the family, her sister and her grandparents.
Unfortunately, the health of the two elderly people is not very good, her grandma begins to suffer from senile dementia, forgetting the name of her grandchildren. And her grandpa starts to have severe back pain and suddenly dies during an intense heatwave.









Emii spends the next few days at home, depressed, and with no desire to do anything. To ease the pain, the girl starts eating chocolate she bought from a market.
Emii is anxious because the chocolate bar is the only thing that allows her to get a vision and to have serenity. The girl feels that her life is improving and does not want to go back to being the girl of the past.









We’re packing all rewards with as much content as we can gather, and the contents will almost certainly expand as we go through production. However, at a minimum, you’ll get:




























































































click to visit








click to visit













International shipping is a huge task, but we will ensure to provide fast and tracked shipments.


the pledge manager will be live
a few weeks after the campaign ends to submit your address and any additional details.
Therefore we can estimate the cost of shipment, and finding the best shipping partner.


Additional items may increase shipping costs.
Shipping cost includes tracked courier shipping in a highquality package.
description_risks:
Creating Anime is a really huge task, and requires lots of peoples and divisions involved. But this is not my first time working on an anime project, I’ve also been in anime studio as an Animator, Compositor, and Designer. And i’ve been working on hundreds of commissioned animation and illustrations online.

The biggest challenge would be the shipping and producing the physical item.
And please keep in mind that shipping rate and times vary from country to country. There may be possible delays in delivery due to the current pandemic situation.

blurb: A cuddly potato companion :)
description: A cuddly potato companion :)
name: AAA! Potato Plush and Pouch
title: AAA! Potato Plush and Pouch
Title: AAA! Potato Plush and Pouch
Description: A cuddly potato companion :)
Link: AAA! Potato Plush and PouchA cuddly potato companion :)
description_story:
Story







Hello!! 

           My name is Zhi xin or you can call me Zee. 
I am the creator/artist behind Potaytoeee on instagram! I animate in the day and be a couch potato creator at night. Welcome to my Kickstarter campaign and read on! :)

 
This is my second Kickstarter project and this time round, I’ll be bringing something different as compared to the previous project!

           This will be my very first potato plushie project and I hope you'll love this as much as I do! 
My first pins kickstarter project was a huge success with over 250 backers thanks to the lovely support from all the potato lovers!! I'm stoked to be able to create another big potato project and share it with you all!

 

           Owning plushies is a huuuuge part in my life growing up and never would I ever imagined making my very own plush!! 

           I’m really excited for you guys to cuddle with this little potato when this project comes true!!

 

           Let’s get started!!



























It all started with a random idea of my potato wanting to be a fearsome shark…

 











     It slowly evolved to wanting to be a toast, something closer to the carbs family just like him. 











             Then I thought why not make a French fries head, just like how I started drawing my potato! A potato with a French fries on his head! 











THE SPECS:
The plush is approximately 20 x 15cm in size 

             Comes with interchangeable head gears:

             1 x Baby shark fin (no sharks were harmed)

             1 x Toast 

             1 x French fries
DISCLAIMER:

  The shape of the plush maybe misshaped when you receive them, don’t panic! Just squish it a little :)
  Colors may vary between the actual product and what you see on your screen due to monitor differences and lighting
  As the plushies and pouches are all handmade with lots of effort and love, each of them may have small flaws like, loose threads, wrinkled fabrics or unevenness. 

           Please understand that they will not be 100% same to images shown :)



 Besides our plushie, we have the little potato pouch available as part of the project as well!!









This cute little pouch is approximately 12cm x 12cm

             Perfect for for coins / cards / tissue packs / keys / etc that you can fit in!

             (does not fit a phone)


































   EARLY BIRD TIER WILL ONLY BE AVAILABLE FOR THE FIRST 24 hours of LAUNCH

            Pledging on this Kickstarter gives you the benefit of getting these plush goodies at a discounted price! 

            They will cost more when it is released on my online store once the campaign ends so get them while it’s at a discount here!
   Prices are stated on the rewards tier (Prices in SGD)

 
  If you’d like to edit your pledge, 

            You may edit them at the top of the page. 

            Click “manage my pledge” > click your current tier and you can change your pledge from there.

            You are free to edit your pledge / add on more items within the duration of the campaign.

            (Please try not to request for change or add on once the campaign ends as it may cause confusion)
   You will only be charged once the campaign has ended! 





Besides our Plush and Pouch, there are other additional small merchandizes available for this Kickstarter as well! Check them out below!









Stickers and Mini Charms!

  A sticker tier for sticker lovers out there!
  Mini acrylic charms for you to hook anywhere you’d like! It can go with the potato pouch as well :)










NEW ADD ON ITEM!









New Lanyards available!
- Long lanyard : $6
- Short lanyard : $4
How to add on?
Click manage your pledge > edit rewards > click your current pledged tier (Do not change tiers if you are early bird tier or you’ll lose the early bird discounts!!) > add on the items you want > Confirm 









To thank you all for supporting my Kickstarter, 
Each and every pledge will receive sticker freebie from the physical reward tiers onwards!
Plushie Identity Card will be available to those who have pledged for a plush!

















International shipping :

   All Plush / pouch / charms packages will be fulfilled and shipped from Singapore with tracking.
   Please note that you are responsible for any additional customs/taxes/VAT fees. If you fail to do so, your package may be returned to me and have to be shipped out again with an additional fee.

Local shipping (Singapore)

   All packages will be shipped with tracking except sticker and mini charms only tier



Important shipping info for all: 

  Please make sure all your address are correct and double check them as returned parcels will be shipped with additional fees.
  Don’t miss out your building number / unit number etc! 
  We are not responsible for lost packages as shipment and custom delays are out of our control. 

As there are high volumes of mails all over the world, please be patient with the mailers and customs. Packages may take awhile to reach your destination.










  This is only an estimated timeline, any delays will be announced and updated to you guys! 
  Please remember to check your Kickstarter messages inbox and also timely updates on the project. Important messages will be sent there!










VERY IMPORTANT SAFETY INFORMATION! PLEASE READ: 

  Keep the head accessories away from kids below 4 years old as it may be a potential choking hazard.











  If you have any questions please feel free to dm me on Instagram @potaytoeee or drop me an email at potaytoeee@hotmail.com 

Risks and challenges

  This is my first Plushie project, a lot of time and research has gone into the process of preparation and finding a reliable manufacturer to make sure you get the best quality products.
   PLUSH QUALITY: The manufacturer I have chosen has a lot of experience in plush making and is professional in making them.
  Do note that minor defects like loose strings or slight irregular shapes are normal as these are all handmade!

In any case if some plushies come with huge flaws, they will be put for sale as B grades on my shop after the Kickstarter ends. If most plushies have a large defects in an unfortunate event, they will be remade, which will lead to the increase of production time and the timeline will be pushed back. Be rest assured that the plushies will be quality checked before mailing them.

  Colors may defer due to screen color differences

Cost Distribution:
10% Fees and Tax
60% Production
40% Shipping & Packaging


Art and creations:
Follow me on Instagram and Twitter @Potaytoeee for more cute art and updates!

description_story:
Story







 Hi! I'm Rachel, also known as @theconfettihands on Instagram! I have run a few similar campaigns before and I'm back again! 


In this campaign, I created a series of dragon enamel pins and other goodies to get you into the mystical and magical mood filling soon to fill the air this year!


The goals are listed below, so let’s unlock everything if you love the fantastical beast that is the Dragon!









 Kickstarter uses a pledge now - pay later all or nothing system. You will not be charged anything unless the campaign is successfully funded on 3rd october 2021.


Pledges are tied to pin quantities (1,2 or 3 pins) and not to pin designs so please pledge freely.  Surveys will be sent out to you once the campaign ends on 3rd October so that you can choose your pins and other goodies.


You can cancel/edit your pledge any time before the campaign ends but of course I would love if you keep your pledge. Every time I see someone pledge, it makes a small business owner very happy and is very encouraging.


If you have any questions, send me a message rather than post it as a comment as I will be paying closer attention to my messages.









 Choose from just 1, 2 or a whole set of 3 pins from the rewards tiers on the right.









































Items that will be included in every reward package.
1 Dragon Holographic Sticker
1 Dragon Card
Stickers are waterproof and best peelable only twice.


For both the sticker and the card it will be a random dragon but I will try to match it to your pin choice. They are feature 3 more dragons not from the pins so you may get a surprise dragon!

















[ Closed ]
Discounted price for 2 pin tiers (1 pin and all 3 pins)
2 Freebie Dragon Holographic Stickers instead of 1
Early bird promo ends on 19th September









 Add these items to your rewards through the add-ons page. I recommend the set of 3 filler pins! It's a first for me and I hope you will like them.


Sticker pack: Featuring 3 more dragons, making a total of 6 dragon stickers. 
Stickers are waterproof and best peelable only twice.
Sticker sheet: Perfect for scrapbooking and journaling (matte paper stickers)
Set of 3 Filler Pins: 3 smaller enamel pins that come only as a set.

































 A bonus keychain as a stretch goal reward! This keychain is double sided with two bonus dragons. Drag-on, drag-off! Get it? Get this through the add-ons page.
















 Local Shipping: Within Singapore through Singpost Normal Mail. If you would like Tracked Mail, please top up SGD 2.00 to your pledge and notify me through a message.
Your rewards package will reach 1-1.5 weeks


International Shipping: Only Singpost Tracked Mail is available to ensure your package is not lost. This is based on my past experiences.
You will be sent your tracking number and if you are unable to find it,  please send me a message. Track your package here: www.singpost.com/track-items/
Your rewards package will reach in maximum 8 weeks.


I hope to mail out within a week of receiving the enamel pins. Please check both the status of your individual rewards as well as the campaign updates. I can only mail out rewards once Kickstarter has accepted payment from your card/account.

























 9th September: Start of Campaign (Early Bird promo included)
19th September: Early Bird Promo ends
11pm (SGT) 3rd October: Campaign ends
First week of October: Surveys sent out to you (please check around this time to answer your surveys)
Mid October: Most of your packages should be sent out 
November: The dragon-loving people receive their happy pin mail! 



























 Thank you for your support, it means a lot to a small business owner like myself. Your pledges motivate me to do more and create more things. I hope you will enjoy your goodies. Please tag me @theconfettihands as I love would love to see these fantastical beasts aka dragons in their new homes. Let's turn this mystical, magical campaign into a reality!
description_risks:
During this ongoing pandemic, I will be disinfecting each item individually once I receive them. To ensure your safety and health, we encourage recipients to disinfect packages prior to and even after opening the package as a form of normal practice.

Based on our experience during COVID-19, they will take an estimate of 2 months from the date of mailing out for pledgers outside of Singapore.

I will post updates on the progress of the campaign and production if successful. Do drop me an email at theconfettihands@gmail.com if you have any questions.

blurb: A memory puzzle games that is playable with one hand. Expect demanding yet intriguing levels to play and enjoy! Perfect for commuters.
description: A memory puzzle games that is playable with one hand. Expect demanding yet intriguing levels to play and enjoy! Perfect for commuters.
name: Memory Palace
title: Memory Palace
Title: Memory Palace
Description: A memory puzzle games that is playable with one hand. Expect demanding yet intriguing levels to play and enjoy! Perfect for commuters.
Link: Memory PalaceA memory puzzle games that is playable with one hand. Expect demanding yet intriguing levels to play and enjoy! Perfect for commuters.
description_story:
StoryMemory Palace is a casual mobile game for the iOS. The game hopes to feature roughly 40 handcrafted levels which aims to showcase challenging yet fun gameplay experiences!* All Levels are individually handcrafted to give the best experience to the player.* Game is ergonomically easy to play, suitable for people to play while commuting to work/school. * A new twist towards the familiar memory genre games.GAMEPLAYPlayers would be given a blueprint of the current level they are on first. Once the player has memorised the pattern or the timer runs out, the player will be transported to the planning phase.Within the planning phase, players must regurgitate whatever they have just memorised and key in the steps in the correct order in an attempt to reach the end. The game will feature special tiles that requires the player to think more before placing down their steps. For example buttons that activate a falling spike on the adjacent tile, this requires players to move back and forth in order to avoid the danger. More of which will be within the game for the player to learn and explore. :DTHE FUNDSBasically all the funds will be used for the Apple Developer Account. It costs around SGD$ 128 after conversion. The stated price of $140 includes the commission and misc costs. I intend to to release the game for *Free* in the app store, my goal remains the same, I wish for everyone to be able to enjoy this game. The $140 would be very beneficial in assisting me to offset some of my financial burden. WHY SHOULD YOU FUND ME?It is because you guys out there will be kickstarting not only a single mobile game, but many, many more which I will strive to create. It's not easy upholding your passion in such a uptight and practical society, but I have decide to press on and pursue what I love. So, why not join me? :D





 Thank you all!
description_risks:
Current Progress:

- Core gameplay loop is already fully done.
- 10 fully functional levels.
- Player progression 

The entire gameplay is generally done, all thats left is the creation of more levels and bug testing. Level creation is already made to be modular therefore the creation of levels is not a major obstacle.

The greatest challenge now would be catching up with school assignments and play-testing for the game.

description_story: StoryGood Day Everybody,This is Tarry writing in regards to introduce our newly launched site Japarang, www.japarang.com. Japarang is a one-stop information website that aims to provide the latest updates of all Japanese and Korean-related businesses.Setting out as SG K-Wave, the established Kpop-centric community website has now rebranded and extended its scope to cater to a more diverse crowd. We hope to garner even more support with this rebranding of Japarang, and continue to be a lively and informative portal for all.Our aim is to spread the Japan and Korean love all over the world, starting from Singapore. The fund raised will be invested on a media team to produce viral contents such as videos and article related to everything Japanese and Korean!

blurb: Over the next 14 days, help us add the final touches to this fully voiced pause-for-tactics RPG, where magical masks & deception rule.
description: Over the next 14 days, help us add the final touches to this fully voiced pause-for-tactics RPG, where magical masks & deception rule.
name: Masquerada: Songs and Shadows
title: Masquerada: Songs and Shadows
Title: Masquerada: Songs and Shadows
Description: Over the next 14 days, help us add the final touches to this fully voiced pause-for-tactics RPG, where magical masks & deception rule.
Link: Masquerada: Songs and ShadowsOver the next 14 days, help us add the final touches to this fully voiced pause-for-tactics RPG, where magical masks & deception rule.
description_story:
StoryUPDATE: ASHLY BURCH and FELICIA DAY will be joining the cast of Masquerada!As featured on POLYGON.COM, FORBES.COM and THE ESCAPIST!













A huge THANK YOU to everyone for  your support and getting this project funded! We’ve got a little time left so we’re rolling out a few stretch goals we had sitting on the table. Now let’s try to get these unlocked for an even greater Masquerada!






































We’re Witching Hour Studios, and we’re stoked to present you with our upcoming tactical action RPG featuring pausable real-time combat, headed to Steam (PC/Mac) and PlayStation 4. Download the free demo of Masquerada on Steam right now!We’ll refresh the content of the demo halfway through the campaign, so do check out the one listed above while it's still available!For exclusive updates and surprises, like and follow us on Facebook and Twitter!







Masquerada: Songs and Shadows is a colorfully grim song of masked deception, set amid a Venetian-inspired city haunted by the shadows of civil war, misplaced faith and fey manifestations.
 







What is a mask? A craftsman would say it beautifies the sight of the human face. A criminal desires the mask for what it conceals: identity, intention, capability. But a mask is more than what we wear. We put up masks around our hearts so none may see what capabilities and intentions - for honour, for faith, for betrayal - lie within. In the world of Masquerada, masks are all that, and much more. The masks, now powerful artifacts which are known as Mascherines, bring out the innate destructive capabilities of man into reality. With a Mascherine, the everyman can channel nature’s elements into deadly magic.Now, magic isn’t just a game for spellcasters. Every battle in Masquerada will be a dance of steel and spells, where players set the pace. Feel the need to pause combat every few ticks and exert granular control over your party members’ positioning? Sure. Or think you’ve got the skills to dive in a la Diablo and set up crowd control in real time? Have it your way.







Our myriad inspirations for Masquerada are owed to superlative, genre-defining titles like Baldur’s Gate, Dragon Age, Transistor, and much more. 































(Proper Nouns are coming. You’ve been warned.)  In the turmoil-ridden Citte della Ombre, religion holds no sway. Only the songs sung of one’s deeds will carry an Ombrian’s legacy beyond death. Those who hold even the smallest morsel of power will make every effort to ensure their songs live on. Thus have the Mascherines become the cornerstone of a culture of class warfare between the power-hungry guildsmen known as the Masquerada and the impoverished lower classes, the Contadani. Five years ago, the War of Bearings descended upon Ombre. Ignited by Contadani rebels who had stolen Mascherines from the Masquerada, the war was severe and the scars of mistrust it drew across the Citte remain today. 


From the streets to the sewers, Ombre is fraught with a dichotomy of vibrant color and grim strife.





One who bears the heaviest of scars is our protagonist, Cicero Gavar – one of Ombre’s finest sleuths with a deeply haunted past. Originally banished for war crimes against the state, Cicero has been brought back from exile to solve the kidnapping of the diplomat Razitof Azrus.  During Cicero’s investigation, other members of the Masquerada will join his party with ulterior motives, each of them unable to trust in their fellow men and women within this culture of deception. As they discover a darker conspiracy lurking in the shadows, their faith will be tested to its limits.


Cicero’s party confronts members of the Sorelle, the blue Guild. Trust fall, anyone?













We’re making a game about battles where flutists bend wind to their will and war dancers kick up earthquakes, but Masquerada isn’t just a pretty face in combat.  







Players will bring in Cicero and two companions into every battle, each equipped with their own combat styles and magic. You can control one character at any given time while an AI partner drives the other companions. Pause combat at any time, and plan out the next few seconds of combat with precise positioning of your party: 


Unpause to crush your enemies and see them driven before you, exactly as planned.





Or, for the more cocksure amongst you, engage every battle like you’re playing at the frenetic pace of a MOBA, planning be damned: 


Orchestrate violence without skipping a beat.













Magic wouldn’t be magic if it couldn’t be used for crowd control or to inflict debuffs! Cicero and his companions have a variety of spells that can directly influence enemy movement and positioning, forcing opponents into an undesirable corner. 


A well-timed heal spell is absolutely essential in a sea of red. Just ask your raid leader.





Elemental spells can also be cast in succession to leverage element-based status effects, like blinding smog or a debilitating cloud of steam. For example, an earth spell inflicts an enemy with an earth elemental tag, which can be triggered by a water spell to ensnare the enemy in show-stopping mud. 


Being Ensnared doesn't sound nearly as bad as getting Smothered.





There are three main combat forms on the battlefields that offer differentiated selection of skills: the roguish Sicario, the monolithic Pavisierre, and the bardic Dirge. Each of Cicero’s companions specializes in one of these stances in combination with a specific element, while Cicero himself is able to choose his own element and swap between the stances at will. We’ll be finely tuning Masquerada’s combat systems such that players can experiment with different combinations of companion skills to find something that rewards their play style! 







Let’s get this out there: We’ve eschewed an inventory system. Masquerada isn’t meant to be a loot fest like Diablo. We aimed to create an experience that meaningfully balances deep combat mechanics with a haunting narrative. We don’t want you distracted by the grind for a +10 Sword of A Thousand Truths.  That said, every character still carries a signature weapon that can be upgraded with sigil engravings and ink patterning, which improves weapon strength and provide buffs to existing skills and magic. You’ll want to explore the vast hand-drawn environments that Cicero and team investigate, if you hope to find new sigils and plant inks!


Imagine what Man At Arms could do with these inks and engravings.








An engraved sword is a better sword.





There are more features we’ll be highlighting throughout the course of our Kickstarter campaign, so stay tuned to our updates! 







When we decided Masquerada was to be a narrative experience with a deeply dramatic and emotional core, we pulled together everything we had to bring on the very best voice talents we could get our hands on. Working with heavyweights like Matthew Mercer, Dave Fennoy and Jennifer Hale has been an absolute dream! Have a gander at our shortlist of the main cast: 


A former Inspettore (inspector general) facing an unwelcome return to Ombre. Cicero neglected to side with both the Masquerada and the rebels during the War of Bearings, and is haunted by the public branding of him as a coward and traitor.
















A young, reclusive woman who centres her life upon the study of an ancient civilization known as the Dimenticate. Amadea’s intense fascination with her work contrasts starkly with her acerbic attitude to the living, breathing people around her.
















Simple sincerity defines a man who is determined to guard his friends and family fiercely, and his secrets even more so. Kalden lives for the children of the orphanage he runs, but Ombre has taught him to be careful in revealing the nature of his heart.
















Stale platitudes and tired excuses dominate her speech, as if to weakly belie the thinly-veiled nature of her attachment to Cicero Gavar. Tiziana is a spy for her guild, and she will uphold her faith to the guild’s notion of justice, no matter the cost.
















A loud, flamboyant and witty bard who thrives on attention and isn’t afraid to let others know it. Vasco works for an information dealer known as the Bloodless, and few understand the dark intentions that lie beneath his facetious façade.
















A fellow Inspettore like Cicero, Lucia draws immense strength from her personal beliefs and faith in things yet to come. Through this, she commands and persuades effortlessly, for nothing impresses the faithless of Ombre more than one who believes.
















The epitome of baleful, unapologetic pride. Faveo is Tiziana’s guild leader, and in a guild that obsesses over order and discipline, Faveo will not stand to be argued against or challenged by anyone, even those who fall outside the establishment.













We would be remiss if we didn’t give a shoutout to our brilliant voice director, Michael Csurics of The Brightskull Entertainment Group, who assembled the amazing cast and engineered, well, everything voice-related. Hats off to you and your team, Michael. 







The wellspring of colours and 2D linework that you see in the environments of Masquerada are the hallmark of French comic books, reflecting the influences of renowned artists such Moebius and Hergé (the creator of the Adventures of Tintin). We want every instance of the game, whether in battle or in dialogue, to feel like the player could print-screen and land themselves a beautiful illustration anytime. 















Of course, the game must absolutely move as well as it looks in still life. We’ve invested a great deal of time into crafting a painterly 3D character animation style that harkens to both the golden age of Disney character animation and the iconic works of Don Bluth. We’d love for Masquerada to be played 10 years from now and have its timeless aesthetic still remain gorgeous. 




When the moment calls for in-depth action, a cutscene will kick in with richly illustrated comic panels.





















We have the inimitable Josh Whelchel as the composer on the soundtrack of Masquerada! Songs being as vital as they are to the culture of Citte della Ombre, we needed someone who could do justice to the complexities and drama of this world we built. Josh previously worked with us on the soundtrack for Ravenmark: Scourge of Estellion and he has also composed for games like Oblitus and Mojang’s Scrolls to mention a few. Have a listen to a selection of his OST: 


Backing up Josh with ethereal vocals on the trailer track “Broken Clay” is our homegirl, singer-songwriter iNCH. She’s been showcased twice at the South by Southwest music festival and we couldn’t be happier to have her contributing to Masquerada’s tapestry of music!Last but not least, another shoutout to our trusty audio crew at IMBA Interactive, who are responsible for balancing the complex soundscape of Masquerada. Between the voice acting, the sweeping soundtrack, and a whole boatload of mood-specific sound effects for the flora and fauna of Ombre, they have a huge task on their hands, and all we can say is, they’re incredible at it. Put on a good pair of headphones when you try the demo of Masquerada and you’ll see what we mean!







Now you’ve read all these wonderful things about our ambitious little RPG, and might be chomping at the bit to back our campaign. But you’re probably wondering: other than the game, what the heck do you get for chipping in? Well, we’re making the basic game available at a 20% discount from our intended retail price. However, we think you’d much prefer LIMITED EDITION rewards to sink your teeth into. Some of these rewards will never be produced again. A very limited quantity of these rewards will even be signed by the cast! All of these will be exclusive for people who helped us out in our time of need. Yes, that means no Slacker Backer type of schemes.Here's a detailed look at each individual reward:







The masterfully written original score and soundtrack of Masquerada with over 2 hours of listening pleasure. 















A book packed with pages of the vibrant art of Masquerada layered next to excerpts of the game’s narrative script. 


Note: Item shown is a 3D mockup. When shipped, the final production piece may differ in appearance.













A handsome fully hand-painted poster from our lead artist, specially designed for this Kickstarter campaign. 
















A flash drive branded with the sigil of the Registry, the organization that governs Ombre. Comes pre-loaded with the following:  
A DRM-free copy of Masquerada: Songs & Shadows 
A digital copy of the Masquerada Soundtrack 
A digital copy of the Masquerada Artbook 
A digital, high-resolution copy of our Kickstarter Special Poster



Note: Item shown is a 3D rendered prototype. When shipped, the final production piece may differ in appearance.













An intricately sculpted, 10 cm (approximately 4”) tall figure of Cicero Gavar. Dynamically posed and ready to take on whatever cursed Fey lie lurking in the shadows of your desk. 


Note: Item shown is a 3D rendered prototype. When shipped, the final production piece may differ in appearance.













A life-sized mask modelled after the very same Mascherine that Cicero dons in our cinematic introduction. The pièce de résistance of all our physical rewards, the mask will be produced just around 18 cm (approximately 7”) in height. Spells and abilities not included. 


Note: Item shown is a 3D rendered prototype. When shipped, the final production piece may differ in appearance.





 Now here's a look at the Reward Tiers we have to offer: NOTE: All rewards tiers will receive their copy of Masquerada: Songs & Shadows as a digital downloadable version of the game via a Steam (PC/Mac) key or a PSN code. 































































The team at Witching Hour Studios, hailing from the sunny island state of Singapore, are a diverse bunch. Our nutty family of 15 artists, programmers and designers led by Creative Director, Ian Gregory, have been hauling butt together for nearly six years now, working on RPG and strategy games that we hope have delivered on our core principles of thoughtful gameplay mechanics combined with meaningful storytelling and worldbuilding. If you’d like, check out our previous work on Ravenmark: Scourge of Estellion or Romans In My Carpet! 







We aren’t your usual rogue’s gallery of ex-AAA game developers. We may not have double-digit man-years of game making experience. What does matter is that we would like to prove you don’t need all that to make an incredible game! Hopefully what you’ve seen here gives you a sense of our dedication and our vision. 







We’re in the final stages of production for Masquerada, and we’re hauling ass right now to finish the game. In fact, we could release the game next month after telling you all these awesome things about it. Nobody would be more eager than us to push the game out right now so we can actually relax for a bit after 2 years of grueling work. However, eagerness does not equate to satisfaction. We could release the game next month, but we would not be satisfied with the final product. It’s like giving up on a personal best in the gym just because you’re really exhausted. Problem is, we don’t directly have the means to keep on working on the game.
Back in 2014, we signed a publishing partnership with Ysbryd Games to secure a funding warchest for the development of Masquerada that basically lasts until April 2016 (i.e. end of this month). Of course, because we don’t have the financial means to continue beyond April, we asked Ysbryd for a bit more to see us through this period of extra refinement. Unfortunately, even their hands were tied with respect to further funding. But they are helping us push out this Kickstarter, and now we need your help!It’s famously said in game development that the last 20% of production is the last 80%. We will work our bones off if we can grasp the chance to make the game feel exactly as we envisioned it. Our target funding keeps the lights on and feeds people for another three months so we can pour ourselves into this final stretch.With your money, we’re going to continue iterating on the hundreds of combat encounters in the game to ensure they are balanced in a deeply satisfactory way for all skill and character configurations. And we’re going to throw more tweaks and layers at our visuals, so that things don’t just shine, they’ll be eye-popping. (Well, ours might literally pop so that yours does figuratively. Just saying.)







Oh, before we forget. This Kickstarter campaign gives us a chance to put together physical rewards like what you've seen above! We love games and we’re even more manic about quality collectibles, so the opportunity to create and share tangible tokens from Masquerada’s world with you is really special. Naturally, a significant portion of what we raise will go towards the manufacturing and distribution of our pledge rewards. Here’s a chart detailing what we’ll be doing with the funds we receive:
description_risks:
Game development is a challenging endeavour we’ve become well familiar with over the last five years at Witching Hour Studios. With practically every new project we’ve undertaken, we've bitten into an apple that’s far more ambitious than what came previously.
 
Having come this far with Masquerada, we can assure you that the game is feature complete and primarily needs QA testing. Again, we could launch the game next month if we so desired. There is practically no risk that would impede the eventual release of Masquerada on Steam by the end of the summer, short of a force majeure situation where our office AND our off-site backup are simultaneously carpet bombed.
 
That brings us to the main issue of why we’re on Kickstarter – giving us enough time to polish the game and make it as perfect as we can. The biggest risk to you, the potential Masquerada audience, is that you get a game that delivers less than its full potential. If our campaign is successful, everyone gets what they want! (Except those people who want Half-Life 3.)
 
We could launch on Early Access, but we feel that isn’t the right venue for singleplayer RPGs. The RPG audience deserves an experience that’s been tweaked and fine-tuned to perfection; you don’t deserve to be guinea pigs. That would be more of a risk than asking you to pledge money to us.
 
Having said all of that, we’re determined to share Masquerada with the world, and we will figure out a way to ensure our labour of love is completed to our heart’s desire, one way or another. We have faith!

title: Area 51: Cocktail Recipes & Illustrations
Title: Area 51: Cocktail Recipes & Illustrations
Description: A toast to the brave souls storming Area 51 on Sept. 20
Link: Area 51: Cocktail Recipes & IllustrationsA toast to the brave souls storming Area 51 on Sept. 20
description_story:
StoryStorming Area 51 on the 20th September 2019 is going to be a monumental event, but not all of us can physically be there to support the effort. In light of this, I've decided to craft some cocktails for all of us to enjoy while watching the events unfold on social media. 
These cocktails are handcrafted by me, and they'll be drunk as a toast to those brave enough to free the aliens of Area 51.
In addition to the cocktails, I will be working with some of the finest student artists around to create a postcard and coasters depicting both the aliens and raiders of Area 51.





























This is a template of the post card. Our illustrator is still working on her sketches of her idea of the storming of area 51. 








Team Alien Coaster Template. Our illustrators are still working on it. 





We will post the rest of the illustrations during the third quarter of the campaign.


I do hope you'll support me in this campaign!
disclaimer: I'm sure the storming is just a meme, and I am in no way related to the organisers of the event. I do not endorse nor disapprove of the event, but I would watch whatever happens online while sipping on my cocktails at home.
description_risks: Hope my FBI agent doesn't see this

description_story:
Story







Hello! I’m Kar and I’m an artist based in sunny Singapore! ☀️ This is my first kickstarter project and I’m excited to bring you these Genshin pins that I’ve designed with much love. I've been playing Genshin since Xiao's banner and I have very much fallen in love with the lore and characters. 


I've created enamel pins before and I’d thought to try out something new this time, using clear resin to fill in the windows for this pin set 💖 I hope you love them as much as I do and thank you for taking interest,  supporting this kickstarter will help bring these designs to life!


UK/EU backers or PayPal orders - Head over to my Etsy shop run by me and my friends to place your order! Pins unlocked will be updated there, feel free to bookmark the page!









Project will last for 18 days! Once this kickstarter is over, pre-orders will continue take place at the Etsy shop for those who missed out during this time period. Extras will be sold at at higher price at a later date. 


🌿 ALL OR NOTHING! Unless this campaign reaches its initial goal of SGD 1,000, you will not be charged!
🌿 Unlock designs by pledging! You can increase, decrease, or cancel your pledge at anytime!
🌿 Choose your pin at the end of the Kickstarter campaign! Backers will choose their pins from funded designs though a survey at the end of the campaign.












































































































































































🌿 All orders will be shipped from Singapore
Shipping will be added at check out by selecting your country/region.


All shipping will be tracked for accountability, sorry about the additional expense, but I want your pins to reach you safely!


Delivery may take up to 2-12 weeks depending on the country and external circumstances.


I'm not responsible for any customs or VAT fees, any packages returned due to unpaid customs/VAT fees will be refunded the cost of the pledge minus the shipping and fees. 











Start Dec (18 days): Duration of Kickstarter
3rd Week Dec: Kickstarter ends! Surveys will be sent out. Pre-orders on Etsy will continue to be open for those who missed the campaign!
Jan - Mar: Pin production begins!
Mar - April: Pins will arrive and QC/grading will begin.
May: All pin orders to be shipped to backers!










   60% Production (Pins and other merchandises)
   30% Postage and packaging (Mailers, cards etc.)
   10%  Kickstarter fees and taxes



Note: Fan Merchandise
These pins are fan-made and are not official products, they are in no way related to MiHoYo. Click here (https://www.hoyolab.com/article/1372702) to read more on MiHoYo’s rules on fan merchandise. Any false copyright claims by individuals or groups that are not related to MiHoYo will be fought with official proof of these statements.


Here are some pins I’ve created ♡ 

















Help spread the word, rope in friends to pledge and unlock rewards! 💖 Thank you so much for taking interest and staying with me till the end!
description_risks:
Pins may also have a slight variation in the colour compared to the mock-ups due to display screens. Due to manufacturing requirements, some parts of the pins may look slightly different, however such changes are mostly spaces/width of the lines used in the design - the main design of the pin will not vary much. 

There may be unforeseen delays in pin manufacturing/shipping due to the pandemic, please be patient! Feel free to contact me if you have any queries.

name: Dynamics 3D printer

Title: Dynamics 3D printer
Description: New Era of 3D printer & Laser Engraving machine, Affordable, Compact, Large print volume, Superior print accuracy. Unique design.
Link: Dynamics 3D printerNew Era of 3D printer & Laser Engraving machine, Affordable, Compact, Large print volume, Superior print accuracy. Unique design.
description_story:
Story







 





You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play


































Replay with sound









Play with 
 sound












00:00


00:00


































                         About Dynamics 3D Printer
As a technology company, engineers, inventors, teachers, student & makers, we use 3D printer frequently for prototyping, be it teaching, making new thing, artworks and many other stuffs and we are frustrated with the limitation of most 3D printers on the market. Dynamics 3D printer is unlike any other printer before, it is created with all the advantages in mind,
Better Performance
Superior Printing Accuracy
Low Cost
Durable
Small yet large print volume
Dual function with Laser engraving & cutting module that can enhance your creativity beyond your expectation.


 The Fundamental function of Dynamics 3D printer is to create every print of superior quality. 

 





You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play


































Replay with sound









Play with 
 sound












00:00


00:00
































Why Dynamics 3D PrinterDynamics 3D printer is a new era of 3D printing machine with unique design and better functionality that utilizes innovative mechanism functionality. It is Light, Small, yet with large print volume that outperformed many established branded printer on the market.

 







                 Lead Screw Drive System with Anti-BackSlash Nut Dynamics 3D Printer uses Lead screw system with Anti-backslash nuts that ensure your every print is accurate and also longer lifespan for printer.

 









 Conventional rubber belt drive systems that will loses tension over a period of time.







  

Fixed platform, with Special heatbed surface optimized for PLA materialA stable platform for printing is extremely important.Many FDM/FFF 3D printers utilizes movable printing platform for easy mechanism design and movement and there are some disadvantages.For large object printing, on movable platform during normal to high speed, the printed object will lose grip at first layer if is not stick properly on the platform and later into the printing, the high rate of movement of the platform will creates vibration and that causes the grip to weaken further, thus warping will occurs more easily.If printing narrow, tall and thin object, moveable platform cause the end tip to resonate at the top and the layering will be stacked unevenly.Hence a Fixed platform is the most ideal.









Fixed Platform for stable printing, with special heated bed surface optimized for PLA.  

                                   Dual FunctionBesides creating a 3D printer with many good functions, we add more excitement into the realm of 3D printing machines by incorporating Laser engraving/cutting function to unleash your creativity to the next level.







 Laser Cutting on A4 size Paper. 







Laser Engraving on Note Book  


Laser Shield & Safety Glass





Enclosed Laser Shield & Laser Safety Glasses for additional protection  







3D printing on various model with different materials. Superior Layer Resolution







 






 





You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play


































Replay with sound









Play with 
 sound












00:00


00:00

































 







 Laser engraving on wood 





You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play


































Replay with sound









Play with 
 sound












00:00


00:00


































 




Divers last diving trip





 sourced from freakingnews.com


Minions greeting 'Hello' to backers





World First Smallest Direct Drive Extruder Module & High Efficient Laser ModuleWhere space is a luxury, after countless prototyping and testing, we had come out with a 3D printer design that is compact yet packs a huge punch above its weight in performance.We have developed the World Smallest Direct Drive Extruder Module and World Smallest High Efficient Laser module to match the purposes and functionality design and usage of Dynamics 3D printer.







 







 Small yet Large Print Volume (You get MORE for less)Many 3D printers are huge in size and have a small to acceptable print volume, to have larger print volume the printer size needs to be even bigger. We solve this issue with the creation of Dynamics 3D printer, small yet large print volume of 10143 cubic/cm that outperforming many 3D printers.This is only made possible by our unique mechanical design that utilizes every available space without sacrificing performance. Yet performance is enhanced using lead screw and other items mentioned.







 







 

 Portable and Easy StorageThis is achievable by the rotational symmetry of the Z-Axis housing via our robust mechanical clutch system that is able to rotate and hold steady on the Z-Axis Housing. It is a very unique and bold design, that is totally different from other 3D printer and we had tested and proven it works beautifully.









 







Most 3D printers are huge in size yet with small print volume, taking up a big space out of your desk and too heavy to carry it around.

With Dynamics 3D printer, you will never have this problem, it is portable and weight approximately only 5.5kg, you can keep it inside your cupboard when not in use to free up your spaces  and You can also carry it around easily. The unique ZEN design and beautiful fine surface finishing of the high grade aluminum body can also enhance your work desk looks.







  

           Robust Aluminum Body and Customized CNC PartsDynamics 3D Printer main body is made of aluminum by laser cut and stamping technique. The mechanism of the moving parts and other items are customized CNC parts and laser cut steel.Most of the parts (about 95%) are 100% made customized to meet the functionality of the Dynamics 3D printer and it is not buy off-the-shelf parts or 3D printed parts which make this printer extremely robust, unique and also costly to manufacture, but with your massive support, we can made it happen and only at kickstarter.com, we can achieve this prices for you.







                                Fully Assembled For You

Dynamics 3D printer consisted an approximately of 580 parts (Including Screws and Nuts)And it is Fully Assembled, Calibrated and Tested for you.







             Who uses Dynamics 3D printer?

 Anyone can use Dynamics 3D printer and it is so easy to use.- Engineers  - Teachers  - Students  - Inventors  - Artist  - Housewife- Hobbyist.
 

You do not need to have 3D design knowledge to use Dynamics 3D printerThere are many open sources website to download your favorite 3D model objects, example iPhone case, Pencil holder, Movie action figures, mini book shelf stands...etc.The 3D printed objects below are contributed by individual.









 Easy to Use







 Compare







   Choose Your Rewards







 Extra Add-On Purchase with your Rewards







 







 Timeline
description_risks:
To make a 3D printer that utilize every aspect of the advantages and shrink it smaller yet retain a huge print volume and enhanced performance is extremely challenging. This challenges are overcome by countless hours of careful planning and design before rigging up the first prototype by using acrylic sheets.

When the initial few concepts is working, we move on to fabricating the metal body and CNC parts. At this stage on June 2016, it is only the 9th prototype machine out of the 19th prototype(Final prototype as seen in this page) that we had made altogether.

Every space must be utilized hence all parts are CNC customized and Laser cut that made this 3D printer very unique with it own signature functionally and design.

A machine with approximately 580 parts to assembled, calibrated and tested for you is time consuming but we are confidence and with our knowledge and experience in manufacturing processes we will be able to navigate around the obstacles. Beside this, while designing Dynamics 3D printer, we have take into consideration of how the assembly process will be and most of the parts are snap on and screw on, thus it will be quick and an efficient process.

We will keep our backers updated and inform any issues we encounter or good progress as we more forward.

name: Brahmastra 's Series of Music Videos
title: Brahmastra 's Series of Music Videos
Title: Brahmastra 's Series of Music Videos
Description: Brahmastra consists of talented musicians and we are gathering to put a Music Video aiming to preserve Indian Arts.
Link: Brahmastra 's Series of Music VideosBrahmastra consists of talented musicians and we are gathering to put a Music Video aiming to preserve Indian Arts.
description_story: StoryWe will present Indian Contemporary music for the people as we raise awareness of the beauty of Indian Traditional Music. We will present original pieces showcasing other genres of music such as Jazz and Western Classical. The Music Production will be produced by local musicians and students. We do not have a full time job and we will have to sponsor the entire Music Production from our pockets. Your funding will help us to carry out this concert with much financial ease and will help us raise awareness about Traditional Indian Music. This is our basic structure  of the Video Production:Trailer 1 - Theme 1: Carnatic Music (We will invite best local Carnatic musicians to present Carnatic Music)Trailer 2 - Theme 2: Hindustani Music (We will invite best local Hindustani musicians to present Hindustani Music)Trailer 3 - Theme 3: We bring other genres namely blues and jazz. We will also fuse that genres with Indian Contemporary MusicTrailer 4 - Theme 4 : We will present Cinematic covers with our very own take.Project Timeline:Feb 16 to Feb 17 : Audio RecordingFeb 18 to Feb 19: MasteringFeb 24 to Feb 26: Video RecordingFeb 26 to Feb 30: EditingMarch 1: Release of First theme 1The following is the breakdown of the cost for this Video ProductionRental of Equipment: S$ 600 (For shoot days)Marketing: S$600Sound and Lighting Engineer: S$2000 (Brahmastra Productions)Videography and Photography: S$2000Payment for musicians = $ 1000The following is the crew for the Series of Video Production:Director: Rama KrishnaArtistic Director: Niranjan PandianArtist Liaison: M GopiMarketing Head: Viveck RaamDOP: Vishnu KandasamyEditing: Ramakrishna
description_risks: There is no risks involved with this project.

blurb: Critical visibility in case the bicycle light dies
description: Critical visibility in case the bicycle light dies
name: Blincclip : The first blinking super-bright reflector
title: Blincclip : The first blinking super-bright reflector
Title: Blincclip : The first blinking super-bright reflector
Description: Critical visibility in case the bicycle light dies
Link: Blincclip : The first blinking super-bright reflectorCritical visibility in case the bicycle light dies
description_story:
Story Meet Blincclip, the super bright bicycle reflector that blinks. 















 We know how important it is to be seen when cycling in the dark. Blincclip is a high-performance reflector which clips in seconds to virtually any saddle. It blinks dynamically under the power of your movement so you can be noticed by approaching drivers. Blincclip will always be there blinking and reflecting headlights.
 Original Blincclip is featured on: 









Here Are Some Testimonials from around the globe
"Sometimes it’s the simplest ideas that make the most sense. Case in point: Blincclip, a simple, double-sided flat card of reflective material that’s designed to blink while you ride. It uses no batteries, has no mounts to affix to (or break), and weighs less than a dollop of chamois cream."-- CyclingTips
"Just a couple weeks ago, I discovered that one of my blinking lights was not working as I was  leaving work in the rain, so I can definitely appreciate the value of a low tech backup." --James Thomas, Bicycle Design
"It is one of those simple, but very effective, 'why didn't I think of that' type products !"

  -- Mark Sander, UK, Designer of IF Mode, Strida folding bikes
"The Blincclip easily clipped on my saddle rails and has stayed there through sun, rain and high-speed descents. It is reassuring that it is there jiggling away and making me more conspicuous on the road." --Tom Webster, Singapore/London, Bicycle infrastructure engineer/amateur racer









 Worry the rear light dies during a ride? 
Have you ever experienced the frustrating moment, to start riding home at night and realize the light battery is dead? It is an incredibly palm-sweating experience to cycle at night with a dead rear light. The fear of being rear-ended will haunt you throughout the journey and it is definitely an awful experience. Even worse, most of the time we don't notice it is dead halfway during the ride. Frustrated with such situations we decided to create a super reflector for those emergency moments.









Why blincclip is a better reflector?
Blincclip is super bright, Blincclip can blink by itself. 
To attract the motorist's attention,  a blinking reflector is more powerful than a static reflector. In case your light suddenly dies, Blincclip will always be there reflecting headlights to get you noticed.









How can a reflector blink?
This is where the magic happens. It simply hangs freely over the seat rails and responding to every movement as you pedal. The material, shape, size, and weight are optimized for the great pendulum effect. Plus, It blinks dynamically throughout every situation. It is responsive to the speed you are riding, terrain, and wind. On top of that, it goes static when you brake! 




Easily clip in and clip out for extra visibility.





























As colorful as possible. You can flip it for daylight use with bright fluorescent yellow. Any additional brightness to your ride won't hurt.









Specs
Blincclip: 88 x 66mm. It is incredibly thin (1mm) and light (3.5grams). Carry one in your wallet for that spontaneous needs.









Blincclip is flexible, it can fit on any bike from foldie to roadie in a snap. No screw, no glue. Leaving your bike clean and sleek.









Material
We use 3M Diamond Grade reflector that is usually used for high-performance purposes such as in highways and airplane runway signs. It is incredibly bright and has an amazing viewing angle to ensure that you will be seen throughout any angle. It is also reassuring that Blincclip will be as durable as it can be.









Application
Have a saddle bag? No problem! with the included string, you can practically attach blincclip anywhere. So, you can go blincc blincc anytime.




Saddle bag hanging effect








Feeling creative?





















It works with your favorite cycling light. Blincclip is designed to be used with other cycling accessories as additional visibility. 

















This is us~~
Designed by the community for communities




Francis and David





We have amazing collaborators and testers that come together to make Blincclip great. Our community is growing and We hope you can join our ride too!




Hands in the air!








Thank you collaborators! These are just some of them. Unfortunately, we can't put everyone inside the picture.








A Line of Blincclips











Started from this





 How it all started
It started back in 2011. Francis was involved in promoting safe-cycling in the community. He realized it is important to catch the driver's attention from far, and that allows more time for the driver to respond to the cyclist. He developed several versions of "safety flag" which move dynamically to attract attention from the drivers. The latest version is the Blincclip!









It looks incredibly simple! However, every material, shapes, sizes, weights and ways of attaching effect greatly in the blinking performance. Hence, Together with the community, we identify the needs, possibility and opportunity to make Blincclip perfect! Super Simple & Super Effective, KISS




Size matters! Blincclip were fine-tuned to blink at the best rate 





  Help us share our project :)




































a Blinccat for a good luck : A material that is inspired by the cat's eye













IMPORTANT NOTE** Blincclip is not meant to substitute or to replace a normal cycling light. Blincclip is designed to be a 'smarter' reflector and a quick backup for extra visibility. Kindly refer to your own local rules and law for further clarification. Ride Safe!

blurb: Made with heart and our commitment to help create sustainable income for disadvantaged and under privileged.
description: Made with heart and our commitment to help create sustainable income for disadvantaged and under privileged.
name: Hope Rainbow Handmade Art Earrings Made Of Recycled Paper
title: Hope Rainbow Handmade Art Earrings Made Of Recycled Paper
Title: Hope Rainbow Handmade Art Earrings Made Of Recycled Paper
Description: Made with heart and our commitment to help create sustainable income for disadvantaged and under privileged.
Link: Hope Rainbow Handmade Art Earrings Made Of Recycled PaperMade with heart and our commitment to help create sustainable income for disadvantaged and under privileged.
description_story:
Story







Our Story: Hope 
Environmental concerns have become more important to consumers, leading to our project direction to design products around sustainability principles. Not only that, we also aim to support disadvantaged and under privileged women/families from different regions around the world, by providing them opportunities to earn an income with their own abilities.
We advocate the following principles:

  Creating unique design accessories/products using environmental friendly materials. (FSC-Certified)
  Promoting self-reliance among disadvantaged and under privileged women/families so that they are able to realise their capabilities and ability to make a living. 

HOPE: Rainbow Earrings Collection 2.0 is our second project. We hope with your support, we can successfully fund our collective effort to produce artistic and trendy earrings while contributing a small part to build a better life for especially under privileged women and children.
HOPE: Rainbow Earrings Collection 2.0




Hope Rainbow Earrings 2.0





HOPE Rainbow Earrings Collection 2.0 is an extended project focusing on introducing 9 new designs to our collection of handmade art earrings based on quilling techniques. All our earrings are crafted by our skilled, persistent and passionate artisans. 
Our collection is named after Rainbow because it symbolises peace and serenity. More significantly, rainbow is often seen after a rainstorm when the sun breaks through the clouds. This provides us with a very powerful and important message. Good and beautiful things often follow the darkest storms.
Rainbow can motivate us to continue and endure through dark times. Another way that rainbow provide us with hope and motivation is by being a symbol for good luck. Rainbows are often thought to bring good fortune.

























Art of Quilling
Paper Quilling is an art form that involves the use of strips of paper that are rolled, shaped, and glued together to create decorative designs. In our earring collection, papers are rolled, looped, curled, twisted and manipulated to create shapes which make up our earring designs. Quilling starts with rolling a strip of paper into a coil and then pinching the coil into shapes that can be glued together.
View The Collection Details
Design 1: Heart2Heart









Design 2: Cherry Blossom









Design 3: Positive Vibes









Design 4: Red Beauty









Design 5: Classy Me









Design 6: Flaming Hot









Design 7: Calm & Cool









Design: Siren









Design 9: Blooming Green









Our Best Sellers From Last Kickstarter
Top Seller No.1: Sophisticated









Top Seller No.2: Simplicity Me









Top Seller No.3: Wildly Bloom









 Top Seller No.4: Happiness









Top Seller No.5: Glory









Special Release of Galaxy Necklaces & Bracelets
Introducing the Galaxy collection of necklaces and bracelets. Each bead is shaped like a planet with its unique color and design made out of FSC-certified papers. It makes you feel like wearing a galaxy on your neck or wrist. Be the first to get it. We will only produce limited pieces for now. 
G1: Bold Galaxy Necklace




Est. length 28cm, each bead size 2.5cm x 3cm





G2: Slim Galaxy Necklace




Est. length 30cm, each bead size 3cm x 1cm





G3: Bold Galaxy Bracelet




Est. length 9cm, each bead size 1.5cm x 2cm





G4: Classy Galaxy Bracelet




Est. length 9 to 13cm (stretchable), each bead size 1.5cm x 1.5cm





G5: Fun Galaxy Necklace




Est. length 19 to 22cm (adjustable), each bead size 1.5cm x 1.5cm





Backers' Pledge Rewards
Your support to our project will contribute a helping hand towards our work in environmental space and creating sustainable income to support the disadvantaged and under privileged women/children/families.
Pick your rewards for Group of 3, 5 or 8 (14 Rainbow designs to choose from):





















Mystery Box 5 Reward
Everyone loves surprises. Pledge for the Mystery Box 5 and we will randomly pick 5 Hope Rainbow Earrings for you.  

























Galaxy Collection Reward
Pick one of our latest Galaxy necklaces and bracelets as reward. To select G1 or G2, add $8 during pledge check out.  

















Customised Pledge
If you like to back for our earrings reward + necklaces/bracelets, you may contact us for additional request and we discuss your pledge seperately. 


About E.S Studio
I am Ling, the founder of E.S Studio. "E" also stands for Environment Friendly, while "S" stands for Sustainability. We aim to create craft arts into fashion accessories based on environmental sustainability practices.
