blurb: Drinking made healthy
description: Drinking made healthy
name: Kassini Zero-proof Genever
title: Kassini Zero-proof Genever
Title: Kassini Zero-proof Genever
Description: Drinking made healthy
Link: Kassini Zero-proof GeneverDrinking made healthy
description_story:
StoryOVERVIEW
Kassini Zero-proof Genever is a graduate project of Kanishka Tripathi, an International Fashion Business student of Coventry University (UK) at Raffles College of Higher Education, Singapore.
Being a gin enthusiast for as long as I have been legal, my passion for creating a non-alcoholic variation stems from my own taste for botanicals, without having to go through the health deterring effects of alcohol.


KEY FEATURES

  A sustainable non-alcoholic gin distilled using renewable/ solar energy
  Crafted in a micro-distillery in Singapore with artisanal and traceable botanicals sourced from all around the world
  A glittered refreshing drink made from juniper berries, cardamom pods, coriander seeds, lemongrass and citrus bitters (lemon and orange)
  A healthy drink for any time of the day
  Product specifications: 800ml
  Each bottle comes with a crystal charm that can be used as a pendant




































CAMPAIGN STORY









In light of COVID-19, people have resorted to various wellness and pseudoscientific methods of healing and maintaining health. Particularly Gen-Z and millennials are emphasising on having “clean fun” by adopting no and low alcoholic beverages in social situations.
Kassini is an alcohol-free alternative to traditional gin— a revolution in the beverage industry.
Developed and manufactured in Singapore, Kassini makes drinking healthy!


What We Need
I am looking for contributors who believe in the potential of this product and the methods adopted to manufacture Kassini, complied with United Nations Sustainable Development Goals 3, 7 and 12:









The first funding needed in order to put the plan into action is $1000. With these funds, I will progress with product sampling and allocate a portion of resources on product development as needed.
Being a sustainable and environmentally-responsible brand, Kassini will also need to buy machinery and equipments such as copper-pot distillation kits and solar panels.


The Impact
As many of us make a switch to healthier lifestyle alternatives, we believe you shouldn't have to compromise on what brings you most joy-- satiating your taste buds.
Kassini is an excellent alternative to anybody who must abstain from alcohol for any reason.









Any and all help that you can provide will help us climb an additional step on the ladder of success. We want to give you a product that you truly believe in, a product that you trust has potential.


Other Ways You Can Help
If you trust the potential of Kassini and want to support without making any contributions, there is still so much you can do!

  Please share the idea and campaign forward across social media platforms or simply Indiegogo share tools! Remember, even the smallest stone makes a ripple!
description_risks:
Launching a sustainable business, particularly in the FMCG industry is a challenge in itself.

We are aware that our ingredients and end-products may be susceptible to microbial contamination. To counter this problem, we will be taking utmost care of our hygiene standards through effective detection methods and all goods will undergo a strict quality control before distribution.

Besides that, glass is fragile especially during transportation. To prevent breakage, we will be individually wrapping all our bottles in inflatable sustainable column air bags. In any case that consumers receive damaged goods, replacements will be immediately dispatched free of cost!

description_story:
Story







Hello! I am Dinojar, and this is my fourth Kickstarter Campaign!
I'm super excited to run this Kickstarter and I hope you will enjoy them as well! By supporting me through this campaign, not only you will see these designs be brought to life, but you will also get huge discount! Any leftover products will retail in my shop at higher price.
How does Kickstarter work?

   Pledge NOW and Pay LATER at the end of the campaign! You can always change your pledge anytime during the campaign. You'll only be charged if the funding goal is met.
   If we succeed, Kickstarter will process your payment once the campaign is over on Feb, 4th. Surveys will be sent at the end of the campaign to choose your rewards.
  Click the 'Back this project' button and choose the tier you would like. You can select your add-ons after you have chosen the main rewards.

















Total of 12 Designs for you to choose from! You will get the FREE mini pin if you pledge 5 or more pins!
You can also get additional mini pin by selecting it from the rewards and add-ons!
Pin Specifications

  Gold Plated Hard Enamel Pins
  2 Rubber Clutches (1 for mini pin)
  Standard Pins: ~ 1.25 to 1.4 inches height 
  Mini Pin: ~1 inch height 
  Mounted to beautifully designed Backing Card

Acrylic Charm Specifications

  Golden "Star" keychain clasp
  Double Sided
  Height ~ 1.5 inches  

 What are Hard Enamel Pins & Acrylic Charms?
Hard enamel pins (lapel pins/brooch) are decorative art that can be worn or otherwise displayed. They have raised metal lines forming the 'line art' and the recessed sections between the lines are filled with colourful hard enamel. The piece is then polished smoothly so it can be at the same level as the metal lines.
Acrylic charms are made with a solid, clear acrylic material that can be printed in full color and cut to any shape.



Past Campaign Pins








Past Campaign Acrylic Charms













 Due to popular demand, you can add past campaigns' pins and stickers as add-ons.









How do we know which design you would like?
At the end of the campaign period, we will send you a survey form for you to indicate the design you would like. You will be able to indicate which pins, charms, stickers or add-ons you desire.










   22 Jan - Kickstarter campaign starts and runs for 14 days.
   04 Feb - Campaign ends. Backer surveys are sent out afterward to your email (to indicate your choice of pins, charms, stickers, and add-ons).
   18 Feb - We receive the fund pledge from Kickstarter. (2 weeks after the campaign ends). Production begins.
   Mar/Apr - Pins, charms, and stickers expected to reach me - I will proceed with quality checks and grading.
   Apr/May - Pins, charms, and stickers will be shipped to backers.










I really thank all of you for making this dream come through! This project could never become a reality without your support! I would be honored if you share the project with your family and friends!
~ Love, Dinojar | Instagram
description_risks:
REWARDS
The final pins may vary slightly from the designs shown here. Every single pin is handmade, there is expected to be minor defects or flaws. Standard grade pins will be used to fulfill pledges and these pins may have minor defects that are only visible under extremely close inspection. Pins with more noticeable flaws are lower grade and will NOT be used to fulfill pledges. The actual color or size of the pins may differ a little from the descriptions, but I'm confident that any differences will be minimal. I am working closely with an established manufacturer, to ensure smooth fulfillment of all the orders.

TIMELINE
Delays in shipping and production of pins may occur when creating enamel pins. This may happen because of production errors and manufacturing defects. If there are any delays, all backers will be immediately updated!

FULFILLMENT
I will update here on Kickstarter and Instagram so that backers have an idea when their rewards will be shipped out (you can change the shipping details if needed up until then). Please double check your address to reduce the chance of a package being lost! Once a package is mailed, it is out of my control but I will do my best to assist and accommodate for any lost packages for TRACKED shipment. We always encourage you to upgrade by adding TRACKING to the shipping with a small fee for peace of mind.

ADDITIONAL FEES
Backers outside of the SG are responsible for any and all customs fees, import taxes, VAT, GST, or other additional costs associated with importing goods into their country, and those costs are NOT included in their pledge or shipping cost.

REFUNDS & CANCELLATIONS
Once the campaign is complete, refunds or cancellations will not be issued for any reason. Please fully read over the campaign, and only pledge if you understand & accept the above-estimated timeline and risks!

blurb: A compact and versatile tool, adding on to conveniences in life. Using it as a hands-free tool, phone stand, money clip and many more!
description: A compact and versatile tool, adding on to conveniences in life. Using it as a hands-free tool, phone stand, money clip and many more!
name: CLIPIT - New Concept of the Multi-functional Clip
title: CLIPIT - New Concept of the Multi-functional Clip
Title: CLIPIT - New Concept of the Multi-functional Clip
Description: A compact and versatile tool, adding on to conveniences in life. Using it as a hands-free tool, phone stand, money clip and many more!
Link: CLIPIT - New Concept of the Multi-functional ClipA compact and versatile tool, adding on to conveniences in life. Using it as a hands-free tool, phone stand, money clip and many more!
description_story:
Story
















  Isn't it stressful to keep holding onto essential items when you are out or traveling? Or isn't it a bother to keep opening and closing your bag to take out the items?
  Isn't it a hassle for bringing huge or bulky wallet around these days? And there’s a high demand for wireless transactions. 
  Do you need a phone stand urgently?

We introduce our new product, CLIPIT!
 For Press Inquiries — dan@mad-d.com

































































Ever seen a clip like this before? 
A totally new versatile concept clip with a multi-purpose feature. 
“CLIPIT” is a hands-free tool, adding on to conveniences and benefits in life. It can also be used as a phone stand, money clip. 









1. As a Hands-free tool for Backpack
CLIPIT solves the trouble and make it hassle-free! Simply use CLIPIT on your backpack strap and insert various items into the band!  
It's just that simple and convenient!









 CLIPIT is compact size and easy to install.









Be hands-free for various items such as earphones, charging cable, handy fan, selfie stick, sunglasses, portable umbrella and even more! 
Use CLIPIT as a backpack-clip, clip on the bag strap and insert various items into the band to be hands-free.









Make use of various items such as earphones, charging cable, handy fan, selfie stick, sunglasses and more.
 2. As a Money Clip
Isn't it a hassle for bringing huge or bulky wallet around these days? And there’s a high demand for wireless transactions.  









Simple is best!
Why not just bring a few cards and notes out instead? Using CLIPIT, it’s hassle-free! 
Simply insert cards into the upper band and insert the cash in the clip part! (Note: coins are impossible)

















3. As a Phone-stand

















Utilize CLIPIT as a phone stand when you need it anytime, anywhere. 
Place CLIPIT on the table with the band side facing down and insert any of your a card into the gap of the clip to create a support for your phone. 
CLIPIT will be useful when you need a phone stand outside urgently.
 4. As a fashionable accessory
CLIPIT is designed as a fashion accessory that goes well with any apparel, belts, pockets, bags and even looking cool as a necklace pendant or keychain.









































CLIPIT is essential in various situations.
Indeed, a problem solver. 

















PORTABILITY









 CLIPIT is compact and light (15g only)!  Let's just bring a few cards out!  Just put it inside your pocket simply!
 EXPANDABILITY









 CLIPIT can be used with both sides depends on purpose.
SUIT TO ANYWHERE









We can install CLIPIT on Sling bag as well. CLIPIT is suit to any bag string size and thickness. (best thickness : 2~8mm)
 STABILITY

  CLIPIT is strong and stable when clipped and the elastic band holds items tightly.
  We use good quality for elastic band that can hold tightly. 



















  We still have tested with prototypes and the bands might be upgraded such as stitched silicone type or better type for the best result.










  You can meet MBAND on two rewards, 
'CLIPIT X MBAND EDITION' & 'MBAND DUAL PACK'









 We introduce one more our product, MBAND, a perfect partner with CLIPIT.
MBAND is earbuds and cable magnetic organizer with minimal design you setting up a more effective and easier solution for wire management.  

   *MBAND is not included in the CLIPIT basic package. Choose 'CLIPIT x MBAND EDITION' ,if you want to get MBAND.
   MBAND DUAL PACK is also available for extra use. *No CLIPIT in this reward. 











   Quick and Easy to Install.
  Tie the Magnet Bands(MBAND) on your any earbuds or phone cables then you can attach it to CLIPIT firmly. It's really simple but effective.
  One MBAND pack contains two magnetic Bands. (1pair)
  Suitable wires' diameter from 1.5mm to 10.0mm (about 0.06~0.4 inches)


























 In the CLIPIT basic pack

  1 x CLIPIT (metal clip) - black
  1 x Elastic band - black
  1 x Manual

*We will update more option depends on stretch goal.






























The shipping will sent out by regular mail. But service is not available currently. 
*Due to COVID-19 issue, shipping will be started after regular mailing service available again. Please note that delivery may be delayed or may proceed as originally in September depends on COVID-19 issue. 










































  Currently both the band and metal clip parts of the CLIPIT are being tested with samples.
  Delivered items might be further enhanced and delivered. *Final design may differ from the images used.
  Please check the production status via our update.

 We have chosen black (dark gray) as a default color that matches everything. Other colors and design options will be launch depending on the funding goal.

























 WE DESIGN PRODUCTS, BRANDS, AND EXPERIENCES.
We are product and brand designers who create, define and design brands by connecting creative flair and smart thinking. We are determined to create meaningful and brand experiences through a dynamic approach and a collaborative process.









 We are dreamers who always reach for the most ambitious goals.









Meet The Team
Dan is the senior product designer. He loves to explore, face new challenges in life, get inspired and never afraid to go beyond boundaries. 12 years in industrial design field and leaded many successful projects. Achieved many renown awards from competitions. 
Mary is a visual communicator and marketing executive. She is a dreamer, cause without dreams, there will be no goal and determination. She believes that our transparent process of meticulous collaboration with everyone involved allow us to challenge each other and push the boundary.
Design Process
It took us around 8 months to finish this work, and the quality still has been upgrading in it coming from the form of modern & industrial. 









Why back us? 

  The main reason why we choose Kickstarter is to introduce our idea and our attractive product, CLIPIT! This is first showing!
  To achieve an affordable price we set for Kickstarter with high-quality materials, we need more supporters. 
  We had tested our products and done many prototype to ensure the best quality and measurement.  So now, we really need your support to make this project a reality!  
  We need to reach around 3,000pcs MOQ (minimum order quantity) for manufacture. We need your help to place our first purchase order and in return you will get this best our product. 
  Thank you!
description_risks:
About the Manufacturing
There's always a risk that suppliers do not fulfill orders on time during manufacturing due to the complexity of the production. However we are working very closely with our manufacturer, who has decades of experience, to make sure production goes smoothly. We even plan to deliver before the expected dates if possible.

About the Shipping
Due to the current global COVID-19 issue changing everyday, production and delivery dates could be subject to change though our factory has assured us that their production line and schedules have not been affected. We will make sure to keep everything transparent and ensure every backer is updated on a regular basis on the progress of production and shipping.

And there are shipping restrictions countries by Covid-19 issue. We hope this issue ends until our shipping date. We will try to ship reward as soon as this issue over for these countries. 

*If there are any delays or roadblocks down the road, we assure you transparent and regular updates.

About shipping fee
Currently due to the COVID issue, there’s a limitation for courier and flights for shipping, therefore, the high hike for shipping cost. So we have decided using regular mail due to decreasing much the shipping cost.

We will hold shipping until regular mailing service available again after COVID-19 situation of the courier lightens up. Please note that delivery may be delayed or may proceed as originally on September. We will also try to find third party courier and shipping services. Let's pray hard until situation better. 

We hope you to understand.

About the Tax
The product price does not include VAT or import tax of your country.  You will be responsible for any applicable duty / VAT charges.

About the Customs
Some countries are very slow with customs from our experience. We are sorry that we cannot push the customs department to process deliveries faster, but we will ship the package as soon as possible. Kindly be patient and we’re sure you’ll receive your lovely package.

About faulty product
*This cases are not faulty product. Please note when you back us.
CLIPIT may have a little scratches on production or small cutting marks removed from the guide.
If you used for a long time, the paint may come off.

*We'll be updating the project progress frequently, so stay tuned!

blurb: Colored glitter chips are glued to the surface of the metallic dice, and in total four surface treatments are needed to achieve this ef

name: Geocentric Light /Metallic RPG Dice
title: Geocentric Light /Metallic RPG Dice
Title: Geocentric Light /Metallic RPG Dice
Description: Colored glitter chips are glued to the surface of the metallic dice, and in total four surface treatments are needed to achieve this ef
Link: Geocentric Light /Metallic RPG DiceColored glitter chips are glued to the surface of the metallic dice, and in total four surface treatments are needed to achieve this ef
description_story:
StoryThe creation of the Geocentric Light Dice was inspired by the imagination of earth’s core. If we could see it, what would it be like at a temperature of 6,800℃ there? Will there be scalding lava? Radioactive substances? Or high energy manganese crystals? What will be hidden in that highly compressed space?









The processing technology of this set of dice is very complicated, and it takes four surface treatments to achieve the current effect. For the first layer, the internal metal is demolded before the surface polishing. For the second layer, the anodizing process is applied on the surface to add the background color of the dice. For the third layer, glue is applied onto the numbers and edges, and the dice is rolled through the glitter material. Finally, the cured layer is sprayed onto the entire surface to prevent the glitter material from falling off. The last two steps are all done manually. It is with this difficult processing that the beautiful design is produced.

















There are three series of dice.

  Radiant Light: The glitter part is formed by glitter chips of three colors including golden yellow, brownish read and dark green.











  Treasure Light: The glitter part is formed by glitter chips of three colors including purple, ocean blue and light green.











  High-energy Manganese Crystal: The glitter part is composed of peacock green glitter chips, and the edges are made colorful through high temperature process.（Have unlocked）










**Add a new unlock target！！**

  Deep blue earth：Tinted with dark blue crystalline powder, the metal parts are anodized in silver.( 6500USD Unlock )











  Poisonous Light:The metal parts were dyed with green crystalline powder and anodized with gold.( 8000USD Unlock )











  Specially-made box with built-in light system for Geocentric Light Dice.











  Leather drawstring bag with exclusive logo.
description_risks: The biggest cost of making metal dice is the mold. Fortunately, the factory I’ve chose provides me with the current molds and spares me from worrying about the problem. This allows me to devote most of my energy to improving the production process. Judging from the samples produced, this method is almost perfect. And now I am able to make gorgeous metal dice.

blurb: A card game of strategy and luck for dog lovers, astronomers and those who love a little mischief
description: A card game of strategy and luck for dog lovers, astronomers and those who love a little mischief
name: Space Puppies
title: Space Puppies
Title: Space Puppies
Description: A card game of strategy and luck for dog lovers, astronomers and those who love a little mischief
Link: Space PuppiesA card game of strategy and luck for dog lovers, astronomers and those who love a little mischief
description_story:
Story





You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play


































Replay with sound









Play with 
 sound












00:00


00:00


































 WHY SPACE and WHY PUPPIES?
E V E R Y O N E is talking about space!
Elon Musk recently said “… I can’t think of anything more exciting than going out there and being among the stars”. He’s kinda right, though, I mean if you can why wouldn’t you? So for all of us who can’t go to space until we make our billions, why not play a card game that takes you there for 15-20 mins? That’s longer than Jeff Bezos and Richard Branson spent in space in their super cool aircrafts.
And we get to do it with Space Puppies!
So let's get right into it!
Space Puppies is a fun family card game that depicts the adventures of astrodogs who serve in the space-borne peace-keeping armada of the Su-paw Star Enterprise. They're tasked to bring the planets back to their orbit, time and time again to restore peace and balance in the universe.
Paws for dramatic effect.
That’s right! Space Puppies, together with your help, will go where no dog has gone before.









Your job is to collect 3 packs of unique dogs who will save individual planets. A complete pack of dogs will earn you a planet. If playing a points version of the game, collect enough planets to make 40 points.




designs not final





 Use ACTION CARDS to help you sabotage your opponent or boost your mission.




designs not final





But, watch out, it could all backfire and the course of the game can change if the opponent uses their protection cards. So use them wisely and plan your strategy!




designs not final





There are 12 unique action cards that will keep you and your kids on your toes throughout the 20 minute game. And then you start all over again, a new adventure to save those planets!
A game of strategy and mischief, designed to bring the family together on a cosy night in or test the strength of relationships over Christmas! 


















  Quick to learn, thanks to simple, elegant rules system and clear instruction sheet
  Surprising depth and replay value once you get the hang of it.
  What’s not to love about Dogs and Space!
















You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play


































Replay with sound









Play with 
 sound












00:00


00:00










































Set Up
Place all planets, face up, in the middle.
Dealer deals 5 cards to all players. Don’t show your cards to anyone. Rest of pile becomes the draw pile, keeping space for the discard pile next to it. Person with the loudest bark starts.
On your turn
Play up to two cards at a time. That could mean, start placing dog cards in front of you or play action cards.
Action cards all have a description on them. Play Action cards by placing them in the Discard pile and following the instructions on the card.
When you complete a dog set, pick up a planet that is named on the dog card. If your first choice isn’t available, pick the next one.
In the points version of Space Puppies, player needs to achieve 40 points. Each planet carries a point value. Note, there is an alien card that wins you 5 points. Keep that up your sleeve in the points version!
Who wants to play?

blurb: The Kofuku Kit is designed to train people's mind to be on the positive side and to bring out the strengths in them.
description: The Kofuku Kit is designed to train people's mind to be on the positive side and to bring out the strengths in them.
name: The Kofuku Kit [The Happiness Kit]
title: The Kofuku Kit [The Happiness Kit]
Title: The Kofuku Kit [The Happiness Kit]
Description: The Kofuku Kit is designed to train people's mind to be on the positive side and to bring out the strengths in them.
Link: The Kofuku Kit [The Happiness Kit]The Kofuku Kit is designed to train people's mind to be on the positive side and to bring out the strengths in them.
description_story:
Story







It's a kit with instructions to help improve your life by training your mindset. 







To kickstart your whole journey towards a better you, the Kofuku Starter Pack will guide you through it. The Starter Pack consists of a monthly Gratitude Journal, a Face Your Fears Journal, A Better You Journal and a Self Care List. So what are these about?01. Be Grateful







 Write down at least one thing in the journal that made you smile or happy today. What are you thankful for today? Train your mind to always look for the positive things in life first! This is an everyday activity!02. Face Your Fears







 Use this book to guide you through your fears. Figure out why you’re afraid and fill in the charts. You will see that maybe there’s nothing to be afraid of!03. A Better You







 This is a book for your strengths. No weaknesses should be mention in it. Set realistic goals and celebrate them. Before the start of each day, write down three compliments to yourself and the goals of the day. It can be anything even if it’s small. If you find your confidence dropping slightly, write down why then read what you wrote in the morning. You are an awesome you!Because the quality dropped, the activities here are:
3 Compliments of the day to yourself (AM)
Goals of the day (AM)
Did your confidence level drop? If yes, why? Then read the compliments to yourself again. (PM)And if you want to go one step further:04. Let It Go















It’s not a daily journal. We all have things that still bother us no matter how long it’s been. It’s time to let them go. Write them down and the reasons why they affect you so much. Let go of your anger, sadness, and frustrations out in the book. Curse as much as you want. And when you close the book, let it go.Because letting go is another way of loving yourself.A LITTLE MORE ABOUT ME.Hello, my name is Noeleen and I am basically everything behind The Kofuku Kit. It all started when I reached a certain down period when I first started my own brand; it was never planned to be this. So I’ve lost a lot of confidence and got a little negative. That feeling was something that I really hate which was why I started reading up on how to train myself to be positive and these are the ways I’ve come up with for now. First, we need to be grateful, even for the simplest thing. 
Second, let go of your fears, trust yourself. Since most of the time, the fears come from the negative thoughts of your brain. 
Third, forgive others to let go of your pain. I’ve tried all methods on my own. It’s not magic, it won’t work immediately just because you did it for a day. I’ve been writing in my monthly gratitude journal for about four months and it helps. That was when I started changing the direction of the plan of my own brand. And I hope that what I’m doing will be of help to all of you.
description_risks:
This is the start of my journey to be of help to the society. However, I know it’s not going to be easy to start a project like this, especially without the help I need. Here are some of my biggest worries.

ONE – Production
Everything is handmade from the scratch, from the covers to the inserts and to the books, because of the small capital I have. However, my plan is to have the covers produced with sturdy leather material so that the users will have a better experience using the kit.

TWO – Marketing
It took me a while to finally decide to start a project on Kickstarter because of the risks. The thing about Kickstarter is that if the funding didn’t reach its target, everything goes back to Zero. It’s not easy to really get the words out. So, it would be really helpful if you spread the words to your friends; who knows this kit might actually be what they need.   

THREE – Disappointment
I’ve had some experiences with contacting suppliers and sometimes, things go wrong and the delivery date/production quality might be affected. However, to really thank you for the support, I will try my best to foresee everything so you get your well-deserved reward.

blurb: Backed by a lifetime warranty because that's how long the Astray Rolltop Backpack will last you.
description: Backed by a lifetime warranty because that's how long the Astray Rolltop Backpack will last you.
name: Astray Rolltop Backpack | Built to Last a Lifetime
title: Astray Rolltop Backpack | Built to Last a Lifetime
Title: Astray Rolltop Backpack | Built to Last a Lifetime
Description: Backed by a lifetime warranty because that's how long the Astray Rolltop Backpack will last you.
Link: Astray Rolltop Backpack | Built to Last a LifetimeBacked by a lifetime warranty because that's how long the Astray Rolltop Backpack will last you.
description_story:
StoryThey Just Don't Make Backpacks Like These Anymore
“ They don’t make things the way they used to anymore!” That was what my Dad used to say all the time. And it became evident what he was saying is true when I was looking to buy my third backpack in 2 years. It suddenly dawned on me that we were buying into the idea that things were not supposed to last and that fast fashion was the norm. That was when we decided to start Astray Goods Co. We wanted to create a brand that takes pride in how things were made. Where every piece was crafted individually by hand, slowly, deliberately, honestly.




Astray Rolltop Backpack in Mustard / Vachetta





The Rolltop Backpack
The Rolltop Backpack is our first product at Astray Goods Co. Sticking to our brand promise, the Rolltop Backpack is built to last a long time and we have spared no effort in making sure of this. This is achieved through the use of time tested materials and processes.



Waxed Canvas Field Test








Astray Rolltop Backpack in Mustard / Vachetta








Astray Rolltop Backpack in Black / Black








13 Copper Rivet Reinforcements








Tough Enough for All Your Journeys





Built To Last
Right from the beginning, it was very clear that the main feature of our bags will be their built quality. We work with Craftsmen who have years of experience in bag making to create each bag by hand with features that enable them to stand the rigours of daily use. 


16oz Hand-Waxed Cotton Canvas
3mm Full Grain Leather Straps
Solid Cast Full Brass Hardware
Copper Rivets Reinforcements
Bartack Stitching Reinforcements
8oz Twill Canvas Lining
Latex Foam Paddings







3mm Full Grain Leather Straps
















Solid Cast Full Brass Hardware








Bartack Stitching
















Copper Rivet Reinforcements





To make sure the bags will stand up to our promise, we sent it for Load Testing. On our pull test, our bags load strength per strap is in excess of 100 kg (220 lb).
Warranty
Lifetime Warranty: Our vision when creating Astray Goods Co. is to create carry goods that last a lifetime, and we are starting with the Rolltop Backpack. Like all goods produced by Astray Goods Co. going forward, the Rolltop Backpack will be backed by a lifetime warranty against all manufacturing defect. If something breaks, send it back and we will repair it for you. If it is something we can't repair, we will replace a new one for you.
As Seen In

















Features & Specifications

20-23L
Weather Resistant 
3 Color Options
Conway Buckle for Fast Unbuckling
Hidden Fast Access Zipper
Padded Laptop Compartment (Up to 15")




20L With Rolltop Rolled Down





The Rolltop Backpack is crafted out of 16oz Waxed Canvas. We use Bees Wax to wax our canvas as it is more environmentally friendly and provides better color protection and fastness for the fabric. The waxed canvas provides a weather resistant outer to protect your belongings.



Weather Resistant Waxed Canvas








Astray Rolltop Backpack in Black / Black








Astray Rolltop Backpack in Mustard / Vachetta








Astray Rolltop Backpack in Gray / Vachetta





While the centre bar buckle is the traditional way to fasten a strap, it can be too cumbersome and slow. We found the solution in the Conway buckle which provides the secure fastening of a traditional buckle with quick unbuckling. 



Conway Buckle for Fast Unbuckling





Hidden at the back of the backpack is a quick access zipper to reach the main compartment of the bag.



Hidden Quick Access Zipper





The interior of the Rolltop Backpack is lined with 8oz Twill canvas. A padded compartment holds laptops up to 15" in size.



Laptop Compartment for Laptops up to 15" in Size








Interior of Rolltop Backpack





Things to Note:
The Rolltop backpack is created using natural materials such as waxed cotton canvas and natural leathers. As such, each and every piece will be unique. When new, the bag will be stiff due to the wax content within the fabric. With use, white lines will appear on the waxed canvas and over time the fabric will soften after breaking in. The Vachetta leather used the bags will darken and create a patina over time.
Add-On Rewards
Leather Bifold
Kickstarter: S$50 (USD36) Retail: S$99 (USD73). 
Comes in two colour options: Vachetta and Black. Just add S$50 per wallet to your pledge.
























Brass & Leather Keychain
Kickstarter: S$8 (USD6) Retail: S$13 (USD9). 
Comes in two colour options: Vachetta and Black. Just add S$8 per keychain to your pledg

















 Timeline









 Team
















               



Get Your Project Funded Today!








Get Cash Back on the Projects You Love!






Look Book

Our team is led by two seasoned entrepreneurs and a full team of 3 product designers and 3 prototypers that are dedicated to make the Rolltop Backpack a reality for our backers.

We work with different vendors and partners to enable the features that make the Rolltop Backpack as tough as it is; from the canvas to the bees wax supplier to the solid brass factory to the rivet suppliers and finally to the manufactures and shippers. We have worked with these vendors and partners for years and are confident in delivering our promise to you in the time mentioned.

To reduce risks, and to speed up production we are working with multiple partners in our manufacturing stage.

Description:

With all the years of playing many new games, I shall put it into making a game
Link:
Revelation (The End of Days)Been playing games at the age of 6. Never regret it.

With all the years of playing many new games, I shall put it into making a game
description_story: StoryI have always loved playing games. But there is not one game that has made be hook for years except Runescape Classic. Which was known as Runescape in 2007. This was a game that I enjoyed so much just fighting rats in the sewers to make my character strong to fight in the Wilderness. The satisfaction feeling when you annihilate someone and plunder their items makes me want to pvp even more. The fun had never stop for me. Until.........The game had undergo big updates and become more 3-dish. Combat system has been changed. And ever since that day, I had never found a game as satisfying as Runescape Classic.It is the time to revive the 3 round combat system.. With many more weapons, equipment, updates and NPCs.As you know, Game Development cost a bomb to make. Therefore, I find that Kickstarter is the only way, a fantastic game can be made by You! With your help, I am confident that we can make game for old timers and for generations to come.We are inspired to make a game that has the same combat mechanics as Runescape classic. Where it is a 3 round battle system. The gameplay will be very similar and will make tweaks here and there to improve it.GamePlay:-MMORPG-Character Progression System-3 rounds combat system ( will be able to run after the third round)-Multiplayer with PVPVE elementsStory Plot:Lucifer was second most power being in the Heavenly Realms next to God. However, he was very envious that the human race worship God and God only. At this, he started to think to himself 'Why cant I be worship for being the most powerful angel in the Heavens?' He was filled with anger and pride that God banished him to the deepest depths of Hell to be punished at the appointed time.Knowing that God loves the Human race so much, Lucifer created 7 Deadly creatures to go into Earth to take as many lives to Hell so that they will not be with God. They were named after the sins that God hates the most. The names were Lust, Gluttony, Greed, Sloth, Wrath, Envy and Pride. They caused so much destruction to Earth that Lucifer was called Satan, 'The enemy of God'.At this, God was in great sadness for the lost of human beings for thousands of years. He decide to send his one and only trusted Messenger to Earth, on a quest to destroy the 7 Deadly Minions and Satan for the final battle. The Battle for Good Against Evil.We are still in the midst of discussing on what we can add to the game to make it more enjoyable. Let's make the game a epic blast this year 2017.
description_risks: Risk: The cost of the game is mainly coming from my own pocket. Please understand that if I am able to cover the cost, there will be delay in the release of the game and limited features due to budgeting.

description_story:
Story





You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play


































Replay with sound









Play with 
 sound












00:00


00:00













































Contraband Insider is a deduction board game:

  For 3 to 5 players
  45 to 90 minutes to play (inclusive of the time for setup and learning the game)

The game is played over 3 rounds, which each round will determine points that add up to the final score. At the end of the game, the player with the highest score wins the game.

















































































 In summary, these are the phases for each round of the game:




























We tried our best to design and produce Contraband Insider as a fun and engaging board game. There are also additional features and upgrades we would like to introduce with love and support.




















Shipping cost will be confirmed after the campaign ends via the pledge manager. As shipping cost fluctuates from month to month and possibly affected by COVID-19, we can quote a likely accurate amount closer to production.
description_risks:
DELAYS AND MANUFACTURING DEFECT

Given that the product requires mass physical manufacturing and fulfilment, there is a margin of error during production and delivery. Certain parts' colour might be slightly off due to the large scale printing and parts may have slight defects. We pledge to provide replacement parts that defects make the game unplayable at our discretion.

Customs, shipping, clearance, delay in production, and COVID-19 might cause delays in delivery. However, we aim to be as transparent about the process as possible, providing constant updates whenever these incidents take place.


REFUND POLICY

As Contraband Insider is being funded in SGD, refunds will also be made in SGD at our discretion. Usually, this excludes any applicable fees that have already been applied to it. We are not responsible for the changes in the rate of foreign exchange.

The refund will be processed through Kickstarter and will be applied through whatever payment method you provided to Kickstarter.


TERMS & CONDITIONS

By pledging to Contraband Insider, the backer acknowledges that:
1) The backer has agreed to the risks of delays, manufacturing defect, and terms of our refund policy.
2) All pledges will automatically be confirmed 14 days after the campaign has ended.
3) Shipping will be made to the address that the backer has provided in our Pledge Manager and that the address provided is deliverable by normal methods. (Please note that we are unable to ship to PO Boxes)
4) Upon delivery to a common carrier for such shipment, the backer has acknowledged that title and risk (such as import duties or any other duties that may be payable to the relevant tax authorities) will be passed on to the backer as our responsibility is to ship the backer's order as entered into our Pledge Manager.
5) The backers are fully liable for incorrect shipping details and any other incorrect information that would cause the pledge to be delivered to an incorrect location or become lost in transit.
6) The backer will be added to our Kickstarter mailing list. The backer can choose to unsubscribe in the next mail from us if they do not wish to be updated.

If you do not accept these terms, we urge you to wait for the general release instead.

description_story:
Story







For people new to Kickstarter: You may  pledge  now and change/cancel your pledge anytime later, your cards  would not be  charged until the kickstarter campaign is complete.
Hello! I'm back with another intricate spinner enamel pin that I would love to share with you!
For EU backers: Please head over here on Etsy as I'm unable to process EU pledges directly on Kickstarter!
The timeline for this project has been shortened to 15 days instead of the usual 30; as I wish to release Princess Mononoke before October :D I have another big project upcoming that I would love to share with everyone here! More updates will be released on my instagram.









My launches of previous Ghibli Pins were a great success, and I'm back with more!
People who missed out on previously will also get another chance to grab the previous pins together with Totoro :)


Due to production costs concerns, I will unfortunately have to space  out the pins into separate Kickstarters. I will try to release them in 4  phases, one each for June, July, August and September! Delayed shipping  options will be available for people wishing to collect the whole set. Everything will be shipped by December :)

























Here is a photo of Chihiro's Pin to help visualize what it will look like :) The other pins are still in production and some early samples are due to arrive sometime in late August. I'll take photos when they're ready!

























































I'm Yuu from Tea & Buns and I'm a 3D Artist based in Singapore. I have been actively participating in local  conventions since 2012. 
You can check out my Etsy, Instagram, and Facebook here~!
I do wish to produce more works in line of this pin if this is funded successfully so please do follow me on these platforms if you would like to see more art from me!
Here is a sample of my other products, you can see more on my etsy!









Thank you for your time!

✤ In the current state of affairs, it is a sad reality that postal services have been badly affected by the pandemic, I will try my best to expedite all orders, but do take note that the postal efficiency is not what it was. I thank you for your understanding and patience!

description_story:
Story



Scribe in Stone is created to provide alternatives to frequently used items, we hope to expand our offering to packaging and other products to replace traditional pulp paper. By using existing excess materials, we are not putting anymore strain on mother nature, planting more trees for future generations to enjoy. Do you know that you can only recycle pulp paper up to 7 times, and each time you'll need to add virgin pulp....Stone paper can be recycled continuously and we can use the trees to provide us with oxygen, shade and ensuring continuity of life on this planet.
description_risks: Main risk identified would be to scale up to larger quantity, as stone paper manufacturers are not as many as traditional paper pulp, the quantity they can produce is only limited and costwise it is still more expensive than traditional paper to make due to economies of scale.

blurb: Sweet portable, comfortable, chin-on pillow, with interchangeable stylish covers!
description: Sweet portable, comfortable, chin-on pillow, with interchangeable stylish covers!
name: komfi. | Travel Pillow for On-The-Go Nappers
title: komfi. | Travel Pillow for On-The-Go Nappers
Title: komfi. | Travel Pillow for On-The-Go Nappers
Description: Sweet portable, comfortable, chin-on pillow, with interchangeable stylish covers!
Link: komfi. | Travel Pillow for On-The-Go NappersSweet portable, comfortable, chin-on pillow, with interchangeable stylish covers!
description_story:
Story Komfi.'s Origins - Everyone needs breaks, without the problems and distractions.
Daily commutes are more than just a cheap and reliable way to get from one place to another. The time spent travelling allows people to unwind, relax and reflect as they get to their destination. Be it a long day at work or going somewhere after a tough all-nighter, everyone needs a short yet blissful break.




Photo by Alex Iby on Unsplash





Straying Away from Traditional Travel Pillows
While traditional travel pillows have developed to be more comfortable every year, style and portability are some key features that are often neglected. After all, travel pillows are quite unpopular in public transports due to their bulky design and hard-to-match look. komfi. aims to change that!









 How to use komfi.
It's simple, really! Hang and keep it on your bag when you are on-the-move, putting the 'travel' in travel pillows. 









Then, flip it up and tighten straps (engaging the pillow!) when you feel like having a short nap on your commutes.









komfi. is also easily detachable so you can set it down on the table and use it as a normal pillow, huggable bolster and wrist/elbow rest!


Say Goodbye to Awkward Moments on Your Trips
Have you ever slept on the shoulder of a total stranger on the train? Well, I certainly did and I still fear those moments. With the ergonomic chin and neck support komfi. provides, not only will you be able to nap in comfort, you don't have to worry about landing yourself in awkward situations anymore!




Use komfi. to take a nap, without the worry of leaning on the person next to you





Rethink how things can be kept, with the EZ strap!
With the EZ strap concept, bringing a travel pillow on-the-go has never been easier. Using the strap is simple. Just set, loop and tighten the straps, and you are good to go! While komfi. works best with laptop backpacks, don't let it stop you from being creative and bringing it around in different bags. The EZ strap has a simple two-way mechanism that allows you to hang on one loop or both!




komfi. on an office bag








komfi. on a tote bag





Keep komfi. looking FRESH everyday with stylish, swappable covers
Not feeling a specific colour today? Don't worry! Since komfi. comes in two parts (Pillow and Cover), You can easily swap the current pillow cover, with another!









As for the colours available... It all depends on you! There will be a vote among backers to decide the top three colourways that will be to be sold! 
While there will three available colours at first, a colourway slot may be added for each funding milestone hit, which means more colour choices for everyone to choose from.


Meet the Team:
On deck - 
Me and my sewing machine, the dynamic duo.








Filmed by one-time camerawoman - my sister


Pillow Dimensions























Keep up with komfi.!
description_risks:
Risks - 
1. This is my very first Kickstarter project! While I am excited and have prepared all that I could, I am still uncertain of the journey ahead, especially on the topic of business. However, I am dedicated to being honest and earnest in my work, I hope to communicate and work with every backer as we tackle them one by one!

2. A lot of thought, drafts and prototypes have been made to reassure you that the travel pillow is plump, comfortable and of course, as stylish as promised in the video.

Challenges - 
1. I am currently doing this project by myself, which may mean delays and issues keeping up with all my backers. However, there will be regular updates on the progress, shipment and other useful information to keep everybody on track of my progress.

3. I am still an amateur when it comes to fabrics and sewing, but I assure you that proper quality control and checks will be done honestly and to the best of my ability.

4. Lastly, due to the ongoing Covid-19 pandemic, do expect delays in production and shipping. If I do find out about such incidents ahead of time, I will let you all know! Please stay healthy and wash your hands!

Thank you for reading and your understanding, I hope you will support komfi.! :)

description_story:
StoryWho is Startself?
Startself is all about inspiring you to get started on making changes in your life so that you can live the life you dream of living. We want to motivate you and support you throughout all the challenges you face, helping you to push yourself with all our products and services.
We know that everyone is struggling to find meaning and purpose, and we want you to know that there is help available. You are never alone along your journey, and however daunting your challenges may seem, there is a way to move beyond them and to do what you want to do. Whatever it is that you envision yourself, greatness is possible. 
Life is filled with ups and downs, and sometimes you just need to refocus your direction and reemphasize your purpose, which drives all your hard work and growth. This is where happiness comes from. By being clear about your goals and your plan for reaching your goals, you can optimize the effort you are putting into any area of your life.
That’s Why We’ve Created the Startself Planner









The Startself Planner is operated on the guiding steps and concept behind Startself which help people to "Start. Change. Achieve | The Life You Dream of Living". No matter what your age or station in life, it is not too late to make a change.
The Startself eBook ~ "Start. Change. Achieve | The Life You Dream of Living"




DOWNLOAD Your FREE Copy Here!





 


Other Main Features of the Startself Planner Include ......







 What's Inside the Startself Planner!









The Startself Planner is Designed to Last for 6-Months or 180 Days of Usage.







How to Use the Startself Planner?Every Startself Planner comes with a Planner's User eGuide to tell you what are the planners inside and how to use them. Check out this Video!


 Closer Look Into the Planners Inside!









 Example: LIFE PURPOSE PLANNER







 









 Example: GOALs PLANNER







 









 Example: START TRACKER







 









 Example: 6 MONTHS PLANNER







 









Example: MONTHLY PLANNER 







 









 Example: MONTHLY REVIEW







 









 Example: DAY PLANNER







 









 Example: FREE PAGES









Specification of the Startself Planner







 

The Impact
The potential impact of this book on readers’ lives is enormous. This is your chance to reclaim your purpose and to point yourself in a direction forward. We want the best for you, and we have designed the Startself Planner with that in mind, intending to make your path a simple one, one that you can follow on instinct.

What We Need & What You Get
Right now, we are looking to you for help raising $10,000. This operating capital will cover the costs that we at Startself are facing as we try to make the Startself Planner a reality. You can help out by making a contribution to this campaign through getting yourself the Startself Planner. At the same time, also you will get our ......+ Starself Planner's User eGuide+ Startself eBook ~ "Start. Change. Achieve | The Life You Dream of Living"







Other Ways You Can Help
Beyond making a monetary contribution, you can help us by sharing our campaign with all your friends and family. Go ahead and post the campaign URL on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and any other social media platforms you use. The more people are aware of what we’re doing, the larger our impact will be. If you’re ready to make a change and live the life you dream of living now, get your copy of the Startself Planner.
description_risks:
For any new product launch, there are always risks and challenges come along. However, we have already sourced and established relationship with our printer. The risk or challenge is to ship out the planners as soon as possible within the planned timing once the project is successful. We are aware there are always events outside of our control that could delay shipping. But we will give our best to avoid it.

Another challenge is to ensure we have a quality Startself Planner that is delivered to our Backers as early as possible. We will work very closely with our printer to ensure the quality of the planners. Currently our Printer  is ready to produce the Startself Planner as soon as we give them the green light. 

Thanks for your support!

description_story:
StoryIntro
Hi hi, Nice to meet you! My name is Yin Yan and i'm a rookie illustrator, based in Singapore, trying my hand at making my own merchandise. I love drawing cute round animals. A few months ago, I created a tiny enamel pin collection for bubble tea bunnies and I've been loving the process of making pins since!


Campaign
The initial funding goal will cover the production cost of Pin #1, with the other adorable designs unlocking, in order, as stretch goals are reached.
Pin Details:
-Rose Gold Plating
-Hard Enamel
-1.25 inches tall
-Rubber clutch
-Packaged individually in plastic wrap
Backers will be able to select their design(s) of choice from the unlocked designs at the end of the Kickstarter campaign. Since Kickstarter is an "all-or-nothing" format it means that if a project doesn't get funded, you will not be charged.
You can increase, decrease or cancel your pledge at any time during this Kickstarter campaign. Pledging helps to unlock designs and fun freebies during the campaign! You can pledge for all the items you want, regardless of their locked/unlocked status.
You will only be charged when the Kickstarter campaign ends. If we don't reach our goal by the end of the campaign date, you will not be charged. It's that simple!
Note: When the campaign ends, you will NOT be able to change your pledge amount.
If you ever have any questions about how this works, or about this campaign in general, feel free to contact me via Instagram direct message @ohpenyo!


Stretch goals
Pin #1 Cosy Raccoon - SGD$650 (Initial campaign goal!)
Pin #2 Chirpy Chicken - SGD$1300
Pin #3 Zen Cat - SGD$1950
Pin #4 Pearlie Pancake - SGD$2600
Pin #5 Artist Cat- SGD$3250









Early Bird Information
For EARLY BIRD backers: To add additional pins to your pledge once more designs are unlocked, add $10 per pin to your pledge amount. To change your pledge amount, click the "Manage Your Pledge" button located at the top of the campaign page, then click the "Change Your Pledge" button. Add $10 per pin to the current pledge amount.
(Example: Early bird 3 pins + 1 additional pin would be $27 + $10 = $37)


Timeline
January 20 - Kickstarter Launches
February 15 - Kickstarter Ends + Surveys sent out to Backers
Early March - Production order made to pin manufacturer
Early April - Pins arrive + inspected for defects
Mid April - Orders packed and sent out to Backers


Shipping
Packages will be sent via Singpost using Normal mail (no tracking number). Shipping fees are to be paid by Backers.
For international shipping, backers selecting 3 or more pins will be automatically opted for postage with tracking numbers.
For shipping within Singapore, normal mail (no tracking number) will be used for all reward tiers. If you would like to upgrade your package to registered mail (with tracking number), please include an additional SGD$3 to your pledge.


Cost Breakdown
60% - Pin production (includes manufacturing of pins, their clutches and shipping from supplier to me)
30% - Packaging and Shipping (includes shipping materials and postage fees)
10% - Kickstarter Fees (includes Kickstarter campaign fees and transactional fees from using Kickstarter)


Contact Information
You can always contact me via these platforms:
Instagram Direct message: @ohpenyo
Email: chanyy74@gmail.com
You can find more photos of my previously produced pins and other artworks on my Instagram page or online store!
https://tinyurl.com/vrf3qua
description_risks: Pin manufacturing may come with small errors, as is the norm with any pin. To combat this, pins will be inspected by me before being sent out to Backers. I have worked with my manufacturer for a few pins in the past and they have given me good quality work consistently. In the unlikely event that there are major defects found on any pin, a new order will be placed for its replacement and new pins will be sent out as soon as possible.

blurb: Little Big Boss - Everything you need for your child to launch their business and access all learning materials.
description: Little Big Boss - Everything you need for your child to launch their business and access all learning materials.
name: Empowering kids to kickstart their entrepreneurship journey!
title: Empowering kids to kickstart their entrepreneurship journey!
Title: Empowering kids to kickstart their entrepreneurship journey!
Description: Little Big Boss - Everything you need for your child to launch their business and access all learning materials.
Link: Empowering kids to kickstart their entrepreneurship journey!Little Big Boss - Everything you need for your child to launch their business and access all learning materials.
description_story:
Story





You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play


































Replay with sound









Play with 
 sound












00:00


00:00


































Little Big Boss idea started from a parenting journey. As parents, we are constantly thinking about how to engage our children to learn beyond a classroom setting.
We live in a society that is well known for its cookie-cutter education system. Young students go to school to get drilled in passing exams with flying colors. But how many of us actually put these mathematical formulas or scientific facts that were drilled in us to good use later on in our lives? Here lies the opportunity for us to develop an alternate platform for our children to develop life-long skills that can assist them to succeed in life.
Skills like critical thinking, creativity, communication, are equally or if not, more important than academics. And these are the very skills that entrepreneurship cultivates. In Little Big Boss, we provide an early start for children to experience entrepreneurship. Children will embark on this entrepreneurial journey in which they will acquire business knowledge via our online resources. Thereafter, they can put their little ideas into business concepts and launch their businesses at our children friendly business portal where they will be carry out real business activities with other like-minded young entrepreneurs and consumers. 
We hope to raise $10,000 with this campaign. The money that we raise will be used to fund the production of our Little Big Boss Starter Kits.
How it started?
It all started when 7 years old Xander who was in Primary 1 asked Ray for additional allowance to purchase a keychain each for him and his brother. The next day, Xander returned home with 6 keychains. Ray realised that Xander did not understand the value of money, and to his surprise Xander proposed to sell his extra keychains to his friends. The following day, he managed to sell the rest with a small profit. Ray saw that this was a great learning opportunity for Xander and would like every kid to have an opportunity to build on their life skills from being an entrepreneur. 









What's in the starter kit?
The Little Big Boss starter kit will include a year of subscription to access the portal (online market place and resources), business journal, an activity kit or book on entrepreneurship, a handphone stand, a pin, an erasable pen, and 5 customizable business cards.
The portal will allow kids to access online resources to pick up Business101 in children friendly terms, launch their businesses and interact with like-minded young entrepreneurs.
Meet the Founders









See See has an Honors Roll in MSc in Technopreneurship and Innovation and an entrepreneur running shoe business. Ray has been in the technology advisory and human resource industry for more than 10 years. Dave is a cofounder overseeing the operations in various countries.
What's in the box?







You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play


































Replay with sound









Play with 
 sound












00:00


00:00


































Timeline









What's in for Little Big Bosses and Parents? 









What's next?
We have big plans for Little Big Boss and we like you to join us in this journey. We envision Little Big Boss to be a continuous learning process for our young entrepreneurs. There will be regular updates on our online resources and as soon as it's safe, we plan to roll out a series of physical events for our little big bosses to put their acquired theories into practices.
description_risks:
While risks and challenges exist with any project, we truly believe we have vigilantly prepared for the production of little big boss. Our business journal is completely designed and ready for print. Each of the products in our boxes has been sampled to ensure a quality product from a quality supplier. 

Risks involved include:
1) Timing. We have knowingly planned in extra time to complete your order because we import products from overseas. We have received samples from and found shipping to be punctual with each of our suppliers. However, there are a lot of moving parts with importing. Unplanned or unforeseeable events may delay shipment from our suppliers due to the current pandemic.

2) Quality Control. This risk exists anytime a product is outsourced. We have personally handled each of our products and find them to be of excellent quality. We will work diligently to replace any damaged goods at no cost.

description_story:
Story










The Ridiculous Gaming Studio is back with a brand new playing cards series "Fervor". This brand new series will feature renowned artists from the industry across the world, bringing new and exotic design to playing cards collectors!
For our first series, we are featuring artist Naoko. A popular and rising artist who is well known for drawing "Naoko" a designed original character by the artist. 

   Designed by: Artist: Lynus 
   Produced by: The Ridiculous Gaming Studio 
   Cards printed by USPCC (United States Playing Card Company)
   Card Material: Classic Crushed Paper 
   Tuck Box: Standard Tuck box 
   Seal Stamp: Custom Seal Stamp
   Cards total: 52 cards + 2 Jokers





















Cover Box





The cardstocks come with a black-core center layer to prevent light shining through your cards. Deep air pockets further defined to trap air for excellent handling. This is ideal for collectors. The card will have a gold gilt edge to give it a special premium feel to your collection!

























Posters Design:




Click on this image to see the design in full

We really hoped that this project would succeed so as to bring you more awesome designs in the future.

blurb: An app that shows you how healthy a product is by simply scanning your receipts.
description: An app that shows you how healthy a product is by simply scanning your receipts.
name: Good nutrition starts with smart choices
title: Good nutrition starts with smart choices
Title: Good nutrition starts with smart choices
Description: An app that shows you how healthy a product is by simply scanning your receipts.
Link: Good nutrition starts with smart choicesAn app that shows you how healthy a product is by simply scanning your receipts.
description_story: StoryMany times we buy groceries without knowing what goes into the ingredients of those products, are they healthy or harmful for our bodies. Am I consuming more than the recommended sugar intake per day? Am I consuming foods that could lead to diseases in future?These are questions we don't register daily but are crucial in preventive healthcare.At ODOSH we want to help people live better, healthier lives through data, by providing users with a health rating of your grocery purchases. Sorta like those marvel superhero cards collection we had when we were kids, where each product has a rating of Fiber, Calcium, Vitamins and Minerals, Protein which are beneficial to your health.We hope that by raising this awareness, you can be empowered to make better choices in your purchases, and prevent future diseases from affecting you.
description_risks:
Our main challenge right now is getting users onboard. The only way for us to provide users with rich meaningful data is by having more data collected, but not many users would want to be the first to sign up since we don't have much information on board.

So for the initial stage, we plan to purchase data of marketing companies but that would cost us some money and that is what we hope to use your supporting funds for.

In addition, we want to get our word out of what we plan to do, the more people know about us the better we get traction and data, so some funds would be put in marketing and outreach.

Lastly, we want to improve on our app and provide beautiful graphs and a wonderful UX so that it is easy and fun to use, perhaps add a "fun" element to the app so you get entertained and motivated to use our app.

description_story:
Story *EDIT* NO-BRAINER IS FUNDED! 
 *EDIT* WE NEED 1 MORE BACKER TO HIT THE LAST STRETCH GOAL! 



Exclusive Saru-Oni Print for the Stretch Goals!





 75 backers (REACHED!)
- Exclusive Saru-Oni 4" x 6" print added for all physical backers.
- 75th backer will get a 4" x 6" original sketch commission  
 100 backers (1 MORE!!!!!!)
- Exclusive 7" x 10" Saru-Oni print added for all physical backers 
(upgraded from 4" x 6")
- A randomly chosen backer from 90-100 will get a 7" x 10" original commission! 
Like these:




KENNY OOOOOOOOOMEGAAAAAA








Evil Usagi Yojimbo








Nappa








See what I did there with the subliminal message?





You know what they always say, either you go big or you go....to Japan. 
Yes that's right, No-Brainer is back with issue 3 with 44 pages, almost twice that of No-Brainer #1 and #2, and for the first time, No-Brainer is going Manga!









What is a No-Brainer?
No-Brainer is a solo comix anthology featuring different stories in different styles by the same cartoonist. Each issue contains a main serialized story in the first half along with a bunch of shorter stories in the second half. 
The short stories range from kids growing up and dealing with changing friendships, to salmon trying to survive the treacherous upriver journey to their spawning grounds. To kick things off, I'll hand you over to the host of No-Brainer, Grandpa Cassius.









Okay, that didn't go too well, anyway, let's move on...












Standard Edition - Paintball!








Exclusive Variant Edition - Monkey Busters Manga!






  Both covers are wraparound covers.
  The exclusive variant edition will be signed and numbered and only printed for backers of this campaign.

Patreon-Exclusive Cover




Patreon-Exclusive Cover (Not Included in this campaign)





This cover is not included in this campaign, but I thought to let you know that I have a Patreon page which I use to document the making of all my comics, including No-Brainer #3, and also, to publish my comics. All subscribers to the physical books tiers will have each new issue of any comic I publish sent to them directly, with a patreon-exclusive cover. This is is the same for No-Brainer #3, and not only does it come with a special cover, the book is printed in standard size as well, so if you'd like, join me on Patreon :)









 Thoomgard: Final Mission Chapter 3 (22 pages) 
"Earths greatest protector gets retrenched after five decades of service, due to declining performance and a new wave of upcoming talent. As he struggles to come to terms with reality, he embarks on what seems to be his final mission - be a panel speaker at the academy's recruitment expo."
As depressing as that sounds, Thoomgard is essentially a buddy sci-fi action-adventure where a gorilla man and his cat-like sidekick fights ferocious aliens.
*Catch up with Chapter 1 and 2 in No-Brainer #1 and #2 respectively in the add-ons section*

















Here's some preview pages for chapter 3:

































 Monkey Busters (16 pages)
STRONG. FEMALE. LEADS
If you're looking for them, look no further.
Based on a true story, the Monkey Busters are a trio of elderly ladies in Japan who decided to set up a task force to defend their town against invading bands of monkeys. It's a true story . Since it's set in Japan, I took the chance and tried my best to attempt to draw in manga-style :)









Here's some preview pages:

























Eddie's Life Tips: How to have fun at the Supermarket (2 pages)
Sandwiched between these two action packed stories is a short instructional comic that will be essential to the enrichment, or should I say nourishment, of your life ;)

























For this campaign, we are introducing the RAW EDITION!
This Raw Edition is a 68-page perfect-bound standard-sized book and is will be perfect for process junkies who would like to take a look behind the scenes of how No-Brainer #3 is made. The entire comic will be readable with the raw scanned original art of the interior pages and the covers, and the back of the book will not only contain the scripts from the stories, but also the digital thumbnails for a side-by-side comparison of how the story evolves. 
This will be available in the different reward tiers listed below :)

            

          









The book will be in both digital and physical forms.
Digital - A 41-page PDF file
Physical - A 44-page saddle-stitched ashcan-sized comic book
The comic is printed at a smaller size than the standard comic book, for cheaper prices, easier shipping and takes up less space in your storage. For the collected editions in the future, it will be standard-sized :)
Here's a comparison:  






















*All Prices are in Singapore Dollars (SGD)* 











































Original Art Tiers
*All original art is 11" x 17" bristol board unless otherwise stated*
Pages from No-Brainer #2 and #3 will be available. 

  Catalog of original art will be sent over as a PDF once pledged.
  You can get multiple pages, just inform me of the page code, and I'll notify you of the increased pledge amount.
  First come, first served - If you backed first but did not inform me of which page you want before subsequent backers, the page will go to the other guy.

*All Prices are in Singapore Dollars (SGD) and includes shipping*

Snake Claws is a fun and wacky martial arts series following the exploits of Snake Claws, a villainous pugilist dealing with the guilt of his former actions.  You can read it for free on my website. However, if you'd like to get a physical collected edition, feel free to add it on to your pledge :)

blurb: Aloe House (a college level grad project) is an online sustainable resort wear brand offering aloe vera infused garments.
description: Aloe House (a college level grad project) is an online sustainable resort wear brand offering aloe vera infused garments.
name: Aloe House - A line of Breathable resort wear
title: Aloe House - A line of Breathable resort wear
Title: Aloe House - A line of Breathable resort wear
Description: Aloe House (a college level grad project) is an online sustainable resort wear brand offering aloe vera infused garments.
Link: Aloe House - A line of Breathable resort wearAloe House (a college level grad project) is an online sustainable resort wear brand offering aloe vera infused garments.
description_story:
StoryAloe House (a college level grad project) is an online brand offering a line of sustainable resort wear garments infused with Aloe Vera extracts. This line of breathable resort wear garments are enhanced by small embroidery patterns done by the women of North India in order to generate employment for women and support the cause of women empowerment. Aloe House does not only produce the product ethically but also believes in working for a cause and solving a problem. The line is manufactured in India in order to generate employment and would be sold online through our website. Based on research we saw a gap in the market and decided to launch a line which was never heard off or seen before in the market and so we came about with Aloe House. As a sustainable brand, we believe in slow fashion and ethical production practices. The brands objective is to provide a line to consumers that would satisfy their needs and support the cause of women empowerment. 







 







 








 







 








 







  


Pledge $20 and take away this aloe-infused clutch bag made from left over fabric pieces during garment production, for your perfect beach holiday!





 


Pledge $49 and take away this aloe infused leaf printed sarong!





 


Pledge $99 and take a step forward in empowering women and  take away this blue embroidered sarong!
description_risks:
1) The availability of fabrics and depending on our suppliers for the same.
2) Transportation from India to Singapore.

StoryThere are more and more plastic bags appear in the world to solve the problem of people’s convenience. We need the convenient life but we cannot forget to protect our environment. The concept of the project is to have the low-carbon life. We use the Tyvek paper to do the reusable bags which is a kind of compound paper. It is waterproof and resistant of wear-out.
