blurb: Rachta continues her 2019 Artist Journey with a yearly Art Book. Over 50 pages of handcrafted drawings, travels & inspiration.
description: Rachta continues her 2019 Artist Journey with a yearly Art Book. Over 50 pages of handcrafted drawings, travels & inspiration.
name: 2019 - Artist Journey of Rachta Lin
title: 2019 - Artist Journey of Rachta Lin
Title: 2019 - Artist Journey of Rachta Lin
Description: Rachta continues her 2019 Artist Journey with a yearly Art Book. Over 50 pages of handcrafted drawings, travels & inspiration.
Link: 2019 - Artist Journey of Rachta LinRachta continues her 2019 Artist Journey with a yearly Art Book. Over 50 pages of handcrafted drawings, travels & inspiration.
description_story:
Story

One question we often get at conventions is: "When is 2019's art journal coming out?", or "When's the next book?". Rachta's annual Artist Journal is the sum of her year's art & travel collection, fueled by her desire to share her passion with the community, and inspire the next generation of creators.
This year's journal, foreword by Collateral Damage Studio's KC Ng, is filled with many of Rachta's latest illustrations. With over 50 hand-designed pages of her art; experiences; friends; (and food!), and combined with the all-new Inktober Sketchbook, this year's journal is bound to please!   

















Rachta's fascination with manga and animation got her bit by the geek culture bug early. She took a leap-of-faith by quitting the security of her full-time job to pursue her passion for the arts. In the last 5 years, she has traveled the world to share her creations while making many new friends and experiencing diverse cultures. This year, she visits Seoul for the first time while sharing moments with friends in far-off cities like New York and exotic Japan. 









 For the 4th year running, Rachta shares her 2019 adventures and illustrations in this perfectly bound journal, each of the 50 pages lavishly hand-designed in full-color. And for the first time ever, Rachta makes available her Inktober artworks, all collected into one convenient sketchbook. 









 This year, we are extremely fortunate to have KC Ng, General Manager of Collateral Damage Studios, pen the foreword for the journal. KC and his team are extremely talented and have been gracing us with beautiful artworks such as those in Anime Expo's badges and banners. We are really blessed to call KC our friend.  

































 Inktober was originally created as a challenge and is an event held each year during the month of October where artists from around the world create one ink artwork each day. Rachta participated with over 20 sketches of her favorite characters this year. Each of these is collected and carefully arranged into one sketchbook for your enjoyment, and available to her wonderful Kickstarter backers!

































 Rachta's fascination with manga and animation got her bit by the geek culture bug early. Since leaving her full-time job to pursue her passion for drawing, she has been traveling to share her art with the world, proving that the ability to create is within all of us. Her adventures and experiences influence her creations and are expressed in her original manga which she currently creates.

















































Add-ons provide you the ability to customize your Supporter Package. Some of these add-ons are Kickstarter-exclusive and cannot be found elsewhere! To include an add-on, simply add the value of it to your pledge. We will contact you after the Kickstarter campaign completes to confirm the add-on. Shipping for add-ons are free! (For example: If you have pledged SGD45 and want an SGD50 Custom Sketch, simply pledge SGD95).
























  Here's an example of one of Rachta's special animated augmented art will look like!

            

          









Rachta is so blessed to have her artist journey so strongly supported by the wonderful community. Last year's journal was crowdfunded in a record breaking time of 3hrs and 38min (compared to 16hrs in the previous year). Thank you so much! Here are some highlights:


























































  Year 2019: Artwork & Adventures!
  Dec: ISBN book registration 
  Jan: Writing the book
  Jan: Editing of the book 
  Late Jan: Design of the book      
  Feb: Production file sent to printer
  Late Feb: Production proofs
  Feb: Start mailing out Digital tier rewards. 
  Mar: Production
  Apr: Start mailing all Backer Rewards tiers to you!










We have confirmed convention attendance for Doujin Market and Anime Expo in 2020. You may choose to collect your rewards (tiers that include art books only) at Rachta’s booth in these conventions. The self-collection rates are much more affordable (VS shipping) and already include Kickstarter’s fees and packaging materials. The difference in shipping rates will be refunded after you self-collect the rewards. Rates and event information are listed in the 'Shipping Rates’ table in the following section. 
What you will need to collect your rewards at the booth:

  Photo ID (Driver’s License, Passport, National ID etc) 
  Proof of Kickstarter Backing (Screenshot of Kickstarter Backing, Backer’s Email etc) 

Note: The rewards will be mailed to you should you miss self-collection at the event.









2019 - Artist Journey of Rachta Lin is thoroughly thought out to feature high-quality materials while still maintaining shipping efficiency. The team learns from experience and we are always on the look out for ways to lower logistic costs for you. All Supporter Rewards are shipped from Singapore via registered mail with tracking. 
We experimented with a new, more efficient packaging method last year and found it to be successful, with zero shipping incidents or mishaps. As a result, shipping costs are reduced this year.
description_risks: The team is well experienced in both the creative and production aspects. Rachta Lin, an artist of over 27 years of creative experience is being assisted by a production team with over 18 years of exhibition-scale production and logistic experience. The team has provided production support for over 330 events, of which over 60 are of Rachta's events & appearances. Naturally, all manner of risk cannot be removed. However, we have kept the amount of risk to a minimum with our experience and incorporated buffers for all potential issues that might arise. Nevertheless, we are committed to staying on schedule and communicating any deviations that may occur. We are glad to share that we did not encounter any problems or delays with our previous Kickstarter campaign (2018 - Artist Journey of Rachta Lin) and delivered Backer rewards ahead of schedule.

blurb: The LAB is Singapore-based perfume house dedicated to freshly hand blend high quality fragrance and personalize the label to your name.
description: The LAB is Singapore-based perfume house dedicated to freshly hand blend high quality fragrance and personalize the label to your name.
name: The LAB Fragrances
title: The LAB Fragrances
Title: The LAB Fragrances
Description: The LAB is Singapore-based perfume house dedicated to freshly hand blend high quality fragrance and personalize the label to your name.
Link: The LAB FragrancesThe LAB is Singapore-based perfume house dedicated to freshly hand blend high quality fragrance and personalize the label to your name.
description_story:
StoryWe believe that perfumery deserves to regain its artisanal aspect and revert to its craftsmanship roots.We attempt at bringing exclusivity back to the perfume industry: We freshly hand blend highest quality fragrance and personalize your label for your name.   Inspired by natural flowers, herbs and aromatic botanicals, our finest fragrances gain their unique character with our precisely blended precious raw materials and our meticulous final handcrafting. 
 
 Our products contain no methyl alcohol, no sulphates, no gluten, no phthalates, no paraben, no artificial colorant, no animal byproducts and no carcirogen/mutagenic and reproductive damaging chemicals.  Fine scents and craftsmanship, this is all The LAB Project is about!We made our brand launch at Insead Singapore campus on 20th of September where not only we sold many bottles of our first two scents Agar and Iris, but also collected all the material to build our facebook and instagram pages (such as our "happened at the lab shop" series on Instagram).Our aim is to go beyond controlled environments and really reach to the public with a physical location. This is why we wanted to kickstart our project here: We aspire to secure the rent for our first public appearance in Singapore. Our Kickstarter campaign ends at 20th of November. From 20th of November until 3rd of December, we intend to open a sales stand at the following events in Singapore for our first public appearances: 1 - The Christmas Pop-Up Fair at 9 Raffles Boulevard (S$ 950)
 2 - The Christmas Glamour at Fullerton Hotel ($380)
 3 - The Enchanted Christmas Fair at Tanglin Club (S$ 550)4 - Fairs and Bazaars
Christmas 2017
Pan Pacific Orchard
 (S$ 580)The plan is to finance these four events with Kickstarter (hence the threshold of S$ 2460) and then to use the income generated there, to open a proper shop. The LAB's operating model will be simple: Once you select the 'The LAB' scent, we freshly hand blend your bottle. Now we have two scents ready to commercialize: Agar and Iris. So the rewards of big flacons will be given with these two scents only. Nevertheless, we are also able to produce small sized samples with our future scents. So, we added small reward options to offer sample size sets from our future scent collection. The LAB will be happy if you love our scents as we do! And we dream to keep sending our great fragrances to you wherever you are in the world (as long as custom regulation allows).  


Flacons of 1ml eau de parfum





 


2ml eau de parfum (Note: Your name will be printed on the label)





 


10ml eau de parfum and its box (Note: Your name will be printed on the label)





 


The LAB Agar 100ml Eau de Parfum Boxed  (Note-1: Packaging is as pictured for 30ml, 50ml and 100ml. Note-2: Your name will be printed on the label)





  


The LAB Perfume Box





 


The LAB Perfume Compounding





 


The LAB Perfume Bottling





 Fine FragrancesThe LAB names its fine fragrances on the most prevalent ingredient.On the top of its first fragrances Agar and Iris, The LAB intends to offer 6 more perfumes in the near future: Pepper & Tobacco, Lily, Peach & Musk, Ginger, Rose Oud and Earl Grey. Below, we tried to define all our scents, beginning with Agar and Iris.Agar


Agarwood





Agar wood is one of the most precious ingredients in a perfumer's lab. 
Along with cardamom and exotic rosewood accords, this smoky, beautiful and powerful blend creates a sensation of warmth and sensuality.

 Top notes: 
Rosewood, Cardamom, Pepper

 Middle notes: 
Oudwood, Sandalwood, Vetiver

 Base notes: 
Vanilla, Amber, Tonka Bean
...Iris


Iris





Iris makes the origin of this elegant fragrance, which opens with fruity flavors fortified with jasmine and orange blossoms.
 The base is warm, gourmand and powdery due to almond like accords of tonka bean, patchouli and vanilla.

 Top notes: 
Blackcurrant, Pear

 Middle notes: 
Iris, Jasmine, Orange Blossom

 Base notes: 
Patchouli, Vanilla, Tonka Bean
...Pepper & Tobacco:


Pepper & Tobacco





Pepper & Tobacco is a blast of spices softened by an encompassing freshness. 
 It is a mixture of two clashing accords: blazing spices of pepper and saffron with the breadth of tobacco and bursting fresh notes of bergamot and grapefruit.

 Top notes: 
Bergamot, Grapefruit, Pepper

 Middle notes: 
Saffron, Cinnamon

 Base notes: 
Tobacco, Vetiver, Leather   
...Lily:


Lily





Lily is a light and tender fragrance with a mixture of citrus and floral notes. Mandarin and orange blossoms give the fragrance its zesty, sparkling scent and body, while the lilies, peonies, and heliotrope provide an invigorating floral essence. 

 Top notes: 
Orange Blossom, Lily of the Valley, Mandarin

 Middle notes: 
Lily, Peony, Heliotrope

 Base notes: 
Patchouli, Rosewood
...Peach & Musk:


Peach & Musk





Peach.&.Musk is a well-balanced combination of sweet fruity and musky scents. It is an exquisite and sensual fragrance infused with a bouquet of sweet fruit including peaches, raspberries and pears on a strong base of musk wood. Top notes: 
Passionfruit, Peach, Raspberry, Pear Middle notes: 
Lily of the Valley Base notes: 
Musk, Sandalwood, Vanilla, Patchouli ...Ginger:


Ginger





Ginger is a sophisticated fresh fragrance on a contrasting warm woody base. 

 It opens with a sparkling fresh mix of bergamot and ginger before settling into semi-spicy mix of pepper, vetiver and cedarwood. Rich and full, but inoffensive. 

 Top notes: 
Ginger, Bergamot, Lime

 Middle notes: 
Basil, Pepper, Violet

 Base notes: 
Vetiver, Cedarwood
...Rose Oud:


Rose Oud





Rose Oud is a unique and powerful fragrance with oriental woody notes. 

It begins with an enchanting aroma of elegant roses intermingled with a hearty dose of exquisite oud wood and softens into a rich, vanilla-scented amber accord.

 Top notes: 
Violet

 Middle notes: 
Oudwood, Rose

 Base notes: 
Vanilla, Amber
...Earl Grey:


Earl Grey





Earl Grey is a sensual fresh fragrance captivating with its ecstatic tranquillity. 

 Uniqueness of this fragrance is reflected in delicate floral notes blended with characteristic freshness of tea and bergamot and warm aromas of sandalwood and amber.

 Top notes: 
Bergamot, Tea, Lime

 Middle notes: 
Orange Blossom, Tiare, Heliotrope, Pepper

 Base notes: 
Amber, Musk, Sandalwood, Vanilla
description_risks:
The rewards I put on Kickstarter are risk-free, because the raw materials are already purchased. 

All we need to do is to handcraft and bottle the fragrances to prepare the awards. And this is what we love to do. 

So as soon as the reward is merited, there is no risk intrinsic to the project, which can prevent us from producing and sending the fine fragrances to their owners.

The money raised at Kickstarter will be fully allocated to finance the rent of the sales events mentioned at the story part. We won't use the money to buy more raw material.

blurb: World’s longest-lasting lashes ever made. Easy to wear. Ultracomfort. Realistic. Designed to enhance eye shapes of all ethnicities.
description: World’s longest-lasting lashes ever made. Easy to wear. Ultracomfort. Realistic. Designed to enhance eye shapes of all ethnicities.
name: Bambi Lashes: The Easiest, Fastest Lashes You'll Ever Wear
title: Bambi Lashes: The Easiest, Fastest Lashes You'll Ever Wear
Title: Bambi Lashes: The Ethnicity Lash that Enhances Eye Shapes
Description: World’s longest-lasting lashes ever made. Easy to wear. Ultracomfort. Realistic. Designed to enhance eye shapes of all ethnicities.
Link: Bambi Lashes: The Ethnicity Lash that Enhances Eye ShapesWorld’s longest-lasting lashes ever made. Easy to wear. Ultracomfort. Realistic. Designed to enhance eye shapes of all ethnicities.
description_story:
StoryWhat is Bambi Lashes - The Ethnicity Lash?

Bambi Lashes is created by models and makeup artists, based on the Golden Ratio of different ethnicities, to enhance eye shapes. Bambi Lashes is the world's first longest-lasting lashes that is made with realistic eyelash fibers and provides ultracomfort. Made quick and easy-to-wear.







 Featured on:







 







  








Why wear Bambi Lashes?
Bambi Lashes can make a difference in your life.Enhance your Eye Ehape Effortlessly, Without Makeup.Using Golden Ratio formulas, Bambi Lashes can enhance your eyes effortlessly without makeup. 


Wearing "Latina Almond"





Beginner-Friendly, Saves Time.Because Bambi Lashes' lash band is flexible yet sturdy, putting them on can take as fast as under 1 minute. Learn how to use Bambi Lashes in 4 easy steps. As simple as - Measure. Trim. Glue. Snap it on! At the end of day, peel it off.


How to wear Bambi Lashes





World's Longest-Lasting Lashes.Every pair of Bambi Lashes can last 35 times of usage, or more when taken well care of.







Accurately Realistic Eyelash Fibers.Every Bambi Lashes is designed with soft, realistic eyelash fibers - just like your very own grown lashes!







Experience Ultracomfort.No more poking your eyes and discomfort. Bambi Lashes ensures that you can stay absolutely comfortable and feel lightweight throughout your day.







Versatile.The lashes can also be versatile with more makeup depending on your preference. 


With Bambi Lashes and no makeup





 




With Bambi Lashes and makeup





Vegan.Our lashes have absolutely no animal derivatives and only human models-tested.







 







Golden Ratio - The Math Behind BeautyBambi Lashes are designed according to the Golden Ratio - a mathematical formula that measures beauty in a face.







 










LASHES SERIES
Bambi Lashes is available in 14 lashes of your choice (we will send you a survey for you to select when campaign ends):AFRICAN-AMERICAN







 ASIAN







 CAUCASIAN







 LATINA







DRAMATIC RANGE (STRETCH GOALS)Dramatic Range is now unlocked and available to select from!!! Dramatic range will be unlocked at $3000 funding goal. 







 

LIMITED EDITION GOLD BOXEach pair of lashes will come with 1 kickstarter limited edition gold box.







 









 Where can I use Bambi Lashes?








 When wearing Bambi Lashes, there are really just no limits as to where and when you can use it. Becoming a bride or attending a wedding? Wear Bambi Lashes for ultracomfort throughout the day and look like you own a great set of lashes for close-up photos. Have a photoshoot or a selfie day? Wear Bambi Lashes that helps to enhance your eyes effortlessly- even without extra eyeshadow and eyeliner. (Yes, the lash band also helps to act as an eyeliner!).Running late for school? Bambi Lashes is made quick and easy-to-wear even for beginners. Have an important meeting? Bambi Lashes is versatile and can be played up with more eyeshadow/eyeliner, or less. Without eyeshadow and eyeliner, it looks appropriate for an office wear. Depending on the occasion you're in, you decide your look! Getting ready for a date? Realistic-looking eyelash fibers will help that flirting go on well. Wearing plasticky synthetic falsies or smudgy mascara is going to freak your date out! Uh.. Did we mention about getting styes on eyes from eyelash extensions? That's freakier.







But I already have eyelash extensions on, do I still need Bambi Lashes?
Eyelash extensions may seem like the easiest way out to get lashes to fit your eyes and lengthen them, but your beautician will probably not tell you about the side effects. Not only are eyelash extensions troublesome in maintenance, they also can cause traction alopecia. This is the condition which your natural lashes may not regrow permanently. Read here to learn about why this procedure is not recommended for you.
Ophthalmologists have also proven that eyelash extensions have caused injuries the eyes. The fibres of your extensions can cause your cornea to get scratched. Additionally, the glue used for your eyelash extensions may cause allergic reactions (especially formaldehyde).
Another issue that most people dislike about eyelash extensions is that makeup(such as eyeliner) is difficult to remove without damaging the extensions. Most girls would have makeup trapped in their eyelashes and this can result in infection.








 









But I don't wear lashes. Would I enjoy Bambi Lashes?We think so! If eyes are the windows to the soul, then your lashes should be the perfect curtains to it. Maybe you fumble a lot with makeup like eyeshadow and eyeliner but still want a polished, enhanced look. Bambi Lashes is designed to help everyone (including beginners) put on lashes easily! Because it is also lightweight and ultracomfortable, you won't feel it's there - you'll feel like Bambi Lashes are your very own eyelashes!







Rewards.We want to thank you for believing in us! Check out our rewards below:







 









Founder of Bambi LashesI'm the founder of Bambi Lashes - a model and a part time nerd from Singapore with a scientific approach and a mission of creating beauty products that are cruelty-free, comfortable and enhance facial features. I work with renowned makeup artists and models, whom I'm very thankful for, to collect feedbacks to create Bambi Lashes. Thank you for supporting Bambi Lashes from the bottom of my heart. Find me on Instagram @bambieyesgirl!








 

 Where are you in the process?We had a number of prototypes previously and in 2017, we've redesigned our lashes according to mathematical formulas and science - so it's all rounded in terms of aesthetics, durability and comfort. We've also veganized our product to ensure there's no animal derivatives. In order to make one pair for you, we need a minimum order to make this possible. And only in Kickstarter will you be the first to try out our lashes.What does your timeline look like?







Bambi Lashes has been an idea way back before 2015 with the mission of providing comfort and an easy-to-wear experience to girls. We sold some of our very first prototypes to Singapore and grew a humble fan base within Asia. In 2016, we decided to redesign our lashes. Bambi Lashes is now based on Golden Ratio of different ethnicities, and have been designed through countless experiments with makeup artists and tests on different eye shapes. (We worked unimaginable, crazy hours each day to make sure we got it right - including the formula to create hyperrealistic eyelashes and the easiest false lashes you'll ever wear) Our products are also now vegan and have absolutely no animal derivatives.We are super excited that you get your hands on them and try them! We work hard every day to ensure that each and every Bambi Lashes gets to every one of you on time.
description_risks: This is our first Kickstarter project and we've delivered our past prototypes on time and grew a humble fan base. Should there be any delay, we will provide you our honest communication as we believe in being clear and transparent towards our supporters.

blurb: Manage a pair of Dinosaurs within an ecosystem of carnivores and herbivores, trying to survive and emerge as the top Dinos of the herd
description: Manage a pair of Dinosaurs within an ecosystem of carnivores and herbivores, trying to survive and emerge as the top Dinos of the herd
name: Dinoverse: A Dinosaur Card Game
title: Dinoverse: A Dinosaur Card Game
Title: Dinoverse: A Dinosaur Card Game
Description: Manage a pair of Dinosaurs within an ecosystem of carnivores and herbivores, trying to survive and emerge as the top Dinos of the herd
Link: Dinoverse: A Dinosaur Card GameManage a pair of Dinosaurs within an ecosystem of carnivores and herbivores, trying to survive and emerge as the top Dinos of the herd
description_story:
Story







Welcome to Dinoverse, a prehistoric world where dinosaurs roam. It is here that you will learn how to survive with your pack against the ever-changing landscape. Will you be able to adapt fast enough and manipulate the herd to your advantage, or will the transformations leave your pack broken?



















Use the Carnivores to cull the Herd and benefit from the rising body count.  Expand the Herd with Herbivores and defend yourselves against the bloodthirsty Carnivores with all the tools available to yourself. The fate of the Herd is in your hands, will you lead them to abundance? Or devastation?









Dinoverse is a 2 to 5 player game where each player is assigned a Pack, consisting of 2 Dinosaurs, that journey alongside the Herd. The Herd is a central pool of dinosaurs that will interact with one other. Use each Dinosaur's unique ability to manipulate the Herd to your advantage. Carnivores eat other Dinosaurs and score from the rising body count while Herbivores grow the Herd, and earn points by defending it against the Carnivore's onslaught. Manipulate the game end events to your advantage based on the type of Dinosaurs in your pack. The player with the most points at game end, wins!









Each Dinosaur in the game has a unique ability and unique scoring method. The game uses 5-7 different types of Dinosaurs out of 11 types and using different permutation of Dinosaurs will result in a fresh playing experience!
From the makers of finance games such as Dirty Money and Zombielife Insurance, Dinoverse also comes with their fan favorite Gamification Guide where designers explain how they design game mechanics in relation to the characteristics of each dinosaurs.

























Check out the "How to play" videos to get a better grasp of how the game works.

            

          




            

          









Dinoverse is available on virtual tabletop platform Tabletopia. Note that the cards may not be the same as the final product as they are still work in progress. Click the link here to access to the virtual room.









































































You can add the value of any optional buys onto Kickstarter add-on and the shipping fees for the optional buys will be collected during the pledge manager phase. Please refer to the estimated shipping cost of each add-on at the "Shipping Fees" section. 






















































































If you are a retailer or an individual who wishes to do a bulk purchase of 12 copies or more and enjoy more discount on the shipping, drop us an email at info@capitalgainsgroup.com.



















The shipping fees are not included in this campaign and will be collected during the pledge manager. The current fees are based on the most recent rates and Capital Gains Studio will be subsidizing a large portion of the shipping cost as a promotion for our campaign.
Shipping rates have shot up in recent months due to a shortage of shipping capacity due to COVID-19 pandemic and rising energy prices. We are hoping that the shipping rates will come down in the near future so that we can lower the shipping fees when the games are being shipped.
We may also ship the games in separate packages as there is a large jump in shipping fees for packages that are 2KG and above. Therefore, it becomes more economical to ship in smaller packages as a bid to help our backers save on shipping.
We also reserve the right to decline any shipping to countries with an active armed conflict or a country with a high chance of non-delivery. We will refund any pledge made in this case after a review with our logistics partners.
In the case there are additional charges or fees due to taxes or customs, do drop us an email and we will reimburse any relevant custom fees to our backers.
The expected delivery date of Dinoverse is Jan 2023.









Capital Gains Studio is a Singapore-based tabletop publisher, best known for publishing finance focused games. Our games, "Cryptocurrency" and "Dirty Money" have won the gold award at Serious Play International and "Debtzilla" is a nominee for best family game plus at IG Game Awards. We have also worked with government agencies, multi-national corporations and individuals in Asia to help them design and publish tabletop games to engage and educate their stakeholders. The team also set up Mercat Games with the aim of publishing games for the Asian families and features family friendly theme and game play.
Steve Ng was fascinated by games as a kid, and began creating games with pencil and paper from the age of 8. His games spoke of adventure and heroism, and proved popular amongst his peers. It was not until later in his years of education in game design did he discover the world of board games beyond Monopoly. Something ignited within him, calling him towards a path of designing board games. Yes, his favourite boardgame is Scythe. Steve is the designer of Cryptocurrency which won a gold award in International Serious Games Awards.
Trashzilla is an indoor illustrative gremlin who lives in the intersection between visual storytelling and pop culture. She has under her tool belt, experience in children's publication illustrations and communication designs in advertising, social media and design research. As a hobby, she takes great joy in bringing her followers across different art styles. Approach with smiles and savoury snacks!
Jaslyn Lim has many years of experience working in the banking and finance industry and continues to helm the finance role at Capital Gains Studio.  With an eye for detail, she helps with proof-reading, translation and also assists with the writing of gamification guide. Unleashing her creativity juices, she participates actively in the brainstorming process during the creation of games.
Fenny Chong is an artist who is interested in environmental illustration and design. She gained an interest in video games after exploring many different games, and getting immersed into the worlds. She has experience in illustration and graphic design.
description_risks:
Capital Gains Studio has designed and published more than 2 dozen games, both in-house and for corporate customers and individuals and we are confident that our team has a solid grasp on the process of designing, developing, manufacturing and delivering high quality tabletop games. When it comes to a project like this, there are always risks regarding production and delivery that are beyond our control and may cause delays. However, we are confident of delivering by the stated dateline.

Due to the uncertainty of the impact of COVID-19 on international freight services, the shipping rates may be adjusted to reflect a possible spike in shipping rates though we will try as much as possible to absorb small increases in shipping rates.

As with any foreign production/logistics, we may still be faced with unforeseen circumstances such as manufacturing and shipment delays or errors. If we were to meet with an issue, we promise to keep everyone updated and will share details of the problems and our solutions.

Check out our previous campaigns on the kind of communication you can expect due to any manufacturing issue or shipping delay. If you have any question or concern, please do not hesitate to contact us at info@capitalgainsgroup.com.

We may produce additional copies for the Kickstarter editions of the game as a result of the manufacturing process and we will sell these excess copies through our website or through special events and conventions.

Thank you in advance for believing in us and supporting our project!

blurb: Vario's 2nd watch collection inspired by Art Deco period
description: Vario's 2nd watch collection inspired by Art Deco period
name: Vario Empire Automatic | Handwound Watch
title: Vario Empire Automatic | Handwound Watch
Title: Vario Empire Automatic | Handwound Watch
Description: Vario's 2nd watch collection inspired by Art Deco period
Link: Vario Empire Automatic | Handwound WatchVario's 2nd watch collection inspired by Art Deco period
description_story:
Story































If fashion is a cycle, then it’s time we revisited the Golden Era of Art Deco.
Inspired by sleek geometry, elegant typography and bold designs of the 1930s, Vario’s Empire Art Deco Watch Collection is merging time with timelessness.
We’ve opted out of impersonal stock parts, choosing instead to give each watch in the collection its own custom-made case, dial, crown, and hands for visual drama. We’ve also pared down the pronounced horn lugs for a more refined, contemporary look. At its core, the sapphire glass-covered Miyota 6T33 Hand Wound Movement allows for a smooth winding ritual.  An optional Seiko NH38A Automatic Movement will be offered if we hit our stretch goal of $US$36k/S$48k (UNLOCKED). 









Silver Dial / Heated Blue hands / Navy Blue Italian Leather strap 









Silver Dial / Heated Blue hands / Navy Blue Italian Leather strap 









Gunmetal Tuxedo Dial / Silver hands / Maroon Italian Leather strap 









Gunmetal Tuxedo Dial / Silver hands / Maroon Italian Leather strap 









White Dial / Heated Blue hands / Grey Italian Leather strap 









White Dial / Heated Blue hands / Black Italian Leather strap 









White Tuxedo Dial / Silver hands / Black Italian Leather strap 









White Tuxedo Dial / Silver hands / Black Italian Leather strap 




Specifications 
Diameter: 38mm 

                   Lug to Lug: 46mm 

                   Thickness: 11mm (6T33) , 11.5 mm (NH38A)

                   Strap Width: 20mm 

                   Movement: Miyota 6T33 Handwound or Seiko NH38A Automatic

                   Crystal: Sapphire on front and exhibition caseback with inner AR coating

                   Water Resistance: 5 ATM

                   Warranty: 1 Year Global warranty
Strap: Choice of vintage style Italian leather with slight bi-colour effect (20mm taper to 16mm) or Harris Tweed strap (20mm taper to 18mm)
Choice of Straps









Vintage style Italian Leather  Provincia di Vicenza  with slight bi-colour effect and cream colour stitching - 20mm taper to 16mm ( Black / Navy Blue / Grey / Maroon / Wine ) Strap comes with Quick Release and is stain and scratch resistant. Length 115mm/75mm









Genuine Harris Tweed from Scotland - 20mm taper to 18mm ( Lavender / Merlot / Pecan / Coal / Ash / Cobalt / Peacock ) Length 115mm/72mm


































Stretch Goal 1 (UNLOCKED)

           If we hit US$36k/S$48k, we will order an additional 300 automatics using reliable workhorse Seiko NH38, keeping the same specs for the watch but at 11.5 mm thickness and a closed caseback. Automatic Dial will be 3 layer instead of Handwound's 2 layer to enhance the 3D effect. Prices for Automatic and Handwound will be the same.  













Stretch Goal 2 (UNLOCKED)

          Additional new variant - Cream Dial with Rose gold hands and numerals for Automatic watch. 




reference colour similar to this Vulcain model





Stretch Goal 3

           Exhibition caseback (sapphire) for Automatic watch. 1 FREE Light Grey or Blue watch case for every watch backed.


For those of you who want to top up watches or straps, click manage your pledge and change the pledge amount. We will send out a survey after the campaign and tally the figures and if there's a shortfall, we can use paypal to top up later if necessary.
https://help.kickstarter.com/hc/en-us/articles/115005126814-How-can-I-change-my-pledge-amount- 











Photos,Videos and Reviews from Watch Lovers 

            

          









            

          

Shane from Relative Time 

































Kirk from Link and Tag 









            

          

Scott from Watches Galore 





















 Alan from Eclectic Collector 

















 Qi Le from Wah So Shiok

























 Mike for The Time Bum 

























Shane from WATCHA 

            

          

Peter from Peter Von Panda 

            

          

Aron from OFD Watch Channel 



            

          



 Chris from Marshall Time 

            

          

Mike from Average Bros (6-9 mins review on strap)

















Michael from WatchuSeek

























Gabriel from the.mensch




Vario Eclipse (Previous Watch) Testimonials 



















We've had 4 successful crowdfunding campaign (2 Kickstarter and 2 Indiegogo) and delivered thousands of products to hundreds of backers before this so we understand the process. We will certainly do our best to make sure that the watches arrive on time so we can get them to our Kickstarter backers as soon as possible. 











Vario’s Empire Art Deco Watch Collection is your piece of a defining period in history. Pre-order starts 30 April on Kickstarter. 
Production of 1st 300 commenced in March but we have only secured 200 handwound movements so we will only have 50 handwounds for each of the 4 designs. We will release up to 40 of each variant on Kickstarter and the 1st 160 handwound watches will be ready in June. 
If we're lucky enough to hit US$36k/S$48k (UNLOCKED), we will order an additional 300 automatics using the reliable workhorse Seiko NH38A, keeping the same specs for the watch but at 11.5mm thickness and a closed caseback. Prices for Automatic and Handwound will be the same. 2nd batch will start production in June after the Kickstarter campaign and we will send out the automatic watches by end September so it pays to get in Early!

In some cases there can be some potential risks that are unforeseen and we will keep our backers up to date on any unexpected occurrences.

We would like to thank you for your support! We are very excited to have this project come to life! Please help us share this campaign with your friends

blurb: The BOLDR Journey watch was built to accompany you on every step of your journey. So strap one on and begin your adventure.
description: The BOLDR Journey watch was built to accompany you on every step of your journey. So strap one on and begin your adventure.
name: BOLDR Watches - Every Journey Begins With a Single Tick.
title: BOLDR Watches - Every Journey Begins With a Single Tick.
Title: BOLDR Journey Chronograph
Description: The BOLDR Journey watch was built to accompany you on every step of your journey. So strap one on and begin your adventure.
Link: BOLDR Journey ChronographThe BOLDR Journey watch was built to accompany you on every step of your journey. So strap one on and begin your adventure.
description_story:
Story







Worn and Wound  |  TrendHunter  |  CoolHunting  |  CoolMaterial  |  Hey Gents  |  Upscout  |  The Coolector |  Man of Many  |  Mr Montre  |  MikeShouts  |   GearHungry  |  Design-Inspiration  |  TimeBum  | Wrist Watch Review  |  Bezels  |  Everyday Carry  |  Suave Watch  |  Masses







BOLDR is dedicated to the men and women of the world who have taken the path less travelled; who make new discoveries, find fresh experiences, break records, or achieve the impossible. BOLDR celebrates your can-do attitude, by building products that accompany you on your journeys, that always keep going - and never give up, just like you. 


BOLDR Journey Chronograph Sopwith: Silver Orange dial with Dark Bourbon strap





At BOLDR, we’re dedicated to building lasting products that accompany you on your journey through life. We’re proud of our high-standards of quality, and trademark style. In each BOLDR Watch, you'll find that:

Boldness runs deep: BOLDR watches are always more than meets the eye - each product is engineered to look good, while also being functional in more ways than one. 

Sense of spirit: Each BOLDR watch possesses a unique personality, something that makes it as unique as you are. For example, the BOLDR watch line comes with a unique caseback art that ties into the spirit and personality of each timepiece

Style and substance: BOLDR watches are always produced to exacting quality, while looking pretty damn good too. Meticulously designed and always delivered in a distinct, stylish package - we can’t wait for you to unbox it for the first time.


BOLDR Journey Chronograph Warhawks: Black Vintage Brown dial with Dark Bourbon strap













This watch was built to measure our most, most precious resource: time. The Journey is based on the popular BOLDR Voyage concept, with a vintage, aviator-inspired design. The Journey has a unique Seiko meca-quartz movement that keeps impeccable time, beneath a durable box mineral glass lens. It’s the first BOLDR watch to feature a limited-edition art piece on the caseback, and only on the first limited-edition Kickstarter run.







Watch MovementThe Seiko VK64 Meca-Quartz Movement is a hybrid of quartz and mechanical movement for the chronograph, combining the best of both technologies. The timekeeping mechanism is quartz, with a crystal regulator, powered by a battery. This gives the watch a mechanical feel, while still containing a quartz crystal so you never miss a tick. 







Limited Edition Caseback Artwork
The BOLDR Journey was designed to celebrate first steps. In line with that, the custom art on the Journey’s caseback is based on the theme of taking the first step in your adventure - crafted by Malaysian tattoo artist Kevin Tan. Each BOLDR line of watches will possess a unique, custom-designed artwork on the case back - carefully created to represent each BOLDR line of watches, and what it represents.  
 







Unique Domed Mineral Glass Lens 
The domed shape of the box mineral glass lens lends the watch a vintage look, while creating a curved canopy, reminiscent of antique aviation dials. The mineral glass lens brings out the dial characteristics and highlights the watch face, while also scattering and breaking the light on the sandwich dial, creating a soft, even tone of light on the textured watch face. 









Vintage, Aviation-inspired designMixing the best of the old and the new, the BOLDR Journey uses different textures on the double-layer sandwich dial to bring out the watch’s character. The watch face features a classic “Disc-Track” texture on the subdial to further highlight and accent the layers, while the numerals take inspiration from vintage aviation instrument arrangements, found in planes during the 30’s and 50’s.


BOLDR Journey Chronograph Wasp: Black Lightning Yellow dial with Midnight black strap

























The Journey Chronograph come in a variety of colours to suit all styles. To honour their vintage aircraft rooted design, each model is named after mechanical aircraft from yesteryear. This also celebrates the BOLDR Journey commitment to accompanying you on every journey you take.






























Manufacturing Process We work with an industry-leading manufacturer in Hong Kong with more than 50 years of timepiece manufacturing and assembly experience to ensure the top-notch quality of our watches. Our components are hand-finished to a high standard, on par with the top brands in the market - to ensure the personal attention and touch when it comes to the mechanics of our watches. On the other hand, we make use of high-tech CNC-machining for the production of the watch case to ensure the most precise and accurate dimensions. We use certified materials and components that are free of harmful chemicals that are used in some other factories - we only employ nickel-free metal components for the watch manufacturing process. We’ve personally visited our manufacturers factories before and during production to personally review and oversee the production of BOLDR. We adhere and insist upon a high standard of compliance - every component that enters the production plant and goes into your watch is controlled to the finest detail - to ensure that its dimensions, aesthetics and quality are flawless. Each BOLDR is made to exacting detail and impeccable quality - we’re so certain of this, we offer a one-to-one replacement should any defect be found (but you won’t find any!)International Warranty We are committed to deliver the best quality product to our wearers. Every BOLDR Watch comes an international limited warranty of flaws in workmanship and materials for TWO (2) years after original purchase date. 

































 We love to share our journey and watch with editors, stylist, and television. Contact travis@boldrwatches.com, BOLDR Journey watch available for borrow or review upon request. 
























       










































                                                      
Save
description_risks:
Team BOLDR has come a long way in our journey to create the perfect product for our backers. We do not anticipate delays beyond our timeline above, however unanticipated situations could occur during production. Team BOLDR is known for transparency and communication with our backers, rest assured that we would keep our Kickstarter community in the loop. 

Our previous project was fully backed, however due to unforeseen we were forced to cancel the Kickstarter campaign before the deadline was up. When that happened, we endeavoured to be honest and transparent with our backers, and returned all the funds to the backers promptly, with our sincerest apologies. 

In any case, feel free to drop us an email at support@boldrwatches.com for any queries you may have and we will be glad to answer them.

blurb: LGBT Flags based Card Deck
description: LGBT Flags based Card Deck
name: Pride: A Playing Cards Project
title: Pride: A Playing Cards Project
Title: Pride: A Playing Cards Project
Description: LGBT Flags based Card Deck
Link: Pride: A Playing Cards ProjectLGBT Flags based Card Deck
description_story:
Story










 Contents:

  Introduction
  Where it all began
  Card Designs
  Kickstarter Rewards
  Timeline










Simply put, Pride celebrates the LGBT community. Flags have come to symbolise groups of people, identities and serve as a symbol that unites, regardless of place, culture or even time. In a similar vein, LGBT flags have become powerful symbols, empowering those who fly the flags as their own.  Pride  is an homage to these flags, and the people behind them who raise it as a part of their identity.




3D Render of the Card deck, cards and custom designed tuck-box





Where it all began
Being an asexual, I'd always held an affinity for the ace card as a sign for asexuality. Both subtle, and a pun. The Ace flag, specifically the colour scheme, was also something which I had taken a great liking to, an understated, and subdued design. 
Unable to sleep one night, I came up with a potential design to celebrate Pride month as a poster on Displate. In the morning I quickly worked out a design in Photoshop based on what I had come up with in my head at night. 




1st iteration of the Ace Card design





It was supposed to end there. Maybe come up with a few more puns for fun and move on to my next art project. Sometimes in life however, one can never predict where it can go.  Sending the design to one of my LGBT friends for fun, his response was unexpected, yet simple.
"You know, I think you could come up with a whole deck for the community"
And that, was how it began.











Inspired by a neon, minimalistic style, these cards combine the colours of various iconic LGBT flags with an overall darker theme. Text at the sides of each card identifies which LGBT identity the card was inspired by. Together, these design elements result in a subtle yet striking design in terms of colour and aesthetic. 




Card based on the LGBT flag





Many of my friends are part of the LGBT community as well, which is also one of the reasons which inspired me to do an entire card deck. Our differences do not divide us, rather, they have allowed us to come together and celebrate our differences. Pride is an ode to everyone in the LGBT community, and allies who support it.




King Suite of Cards - Inspired by the male gay flag








Pansexual Card Designs








Transexual card design rendered in 3D








Asexual card designs rendered in 3D





Card Specification
- Manufactured by MakePlayingCards
- Standard poker sized card
- Standard Smooth (S30) with full colour printing and MPC game card finish









Of course, what would a Kickstarter be without the rewards, and this project has its fair share of exciting and unique rewards for backers who want that little bit extra.


1.  Digital Pride Deck
- Fully digital copy of the deck sent straight to your email
- .png format
- Includes reverse face of card


2. Behind the Scenes: Card Sketches
- Digital drawings of the various card designs
- Glimpse how some of the card designs were initially planned, and how they evolved into their final iterations


3. A3 Poster of Card of your Choice
- Choose a card of your choice
- Design will be printed in A3 size and mailed to you


4. Uncut Sheet
- Complete sheet displaying all the cards in a single sheet

blurb: Dusty Raging Fist is a fast-paced beat'em up action Game with unique support mechanics. 3 player local and online co-op. (PC/ MAC)
description: Dusty Raging Fist is a fast-paced beat'em up action Game with unique support mechanics. 3 player local and online co-op. (PC/ MAC)
name: Dusty Raging Fist: A New Take On The Beat'em Up Game Genre
title: Dusty Raging Fist: A New Take On The Beat'em Up Game Genre
Title: Dusty Raging Fist: A New Take On The Beat'em Up Game Genre
Description: Dusty Raging Fist is a fast-paced beat'em up action Game with unique support mechanics. 3 player local and online co-op. (PC/ MAC)
Link: Dusty Raging Fist: A New Take On The Beat'em Up Game GenreDusty Raging Fist is a fast-paced beat'em up action Game with unique support mechanics. 3 player local and online co-op. (PC/ MAC)
description_story:
Story














































 









'Dusty Raging Fist' is a prequel to 'Dusty Revenge', an award winning game released on Steam in early 2014.   'Dusty Raging Fist' is a fast-paced action brawler with tactical support combat. You play as Dusty and his allies (via local or online co-op) traversing different lands to bring down evil and restore justice. The game is a traditional beat'em up genre refreshed in a modern way. Apart from good old fashion hack and slash, you are equipped with elemental powers (collectible throughout the game) to use them against enemies in your brawl fight. On top of a 3 player co-op set up, we have designed a unique combat system for you to call upon your sniper support character to snipe single targets, or use your support artillery character to bomb enemy clusters. This unique combat mechanics in a beat'em up game allows you to tactically manage your combat decisions.


Dusty Raging Fist - Wind & Fire Elemental Power Display








Dusty Raging Fist - Calling Your Sniper Support








Dusty Raging Fist - Iron Fortress








Dusty Raging Fist - Up to 3 Player Local or Online co-op








Dusty Raging Fist - Summoning of Mythical Guardian





'Dusty Raging Fist' is set in a world where powers of Mythical Guardians are scattered across the lands. Our heroes, Dusty, Kitsune and Darg are tasked to obtain the powers of the elements from the Guardians to fight against a dark, ancient evil that resides in the Catacombs. Mythical Guardians are also collectibles. They can be summoned to help you deal more damage to enemies, as shown above.'Dusty Raging Fist' is a spin-off of 'Dusty Revenge', the studio's 1st 2D action platformer (see below).


Dusty Revenge Sreenshot





To learn more about 'Dusty Raging Fist', let's start with the standard features.









 - 3 playable characters, and 2 support characters.- Local and Online Co-op.- Collect different elemental skills to unleash powerful attacks. - Collect powerful guardians to aid you in your quest. - Utilize your unique support characters to aid you in combat. - Sniper and Cannon support characters aid you from different vantage points.

- Fast paced action beat'em up fused with modern art and game play.- Crazy boss fights to make your day!!


Dusty Raging Fist Boss Fight Scenario (work in progress)








Dusty Raging Fist Mini Boss Fight








Lighting Guardian on Summon

















Set in a time before 'Dusty Revenge' (released on Steam in Feb 2014), 'Dusty Raging Fist' features a younger vigilante Dusty aided by his team of skillful fighters. The story began when a young visitor from a faraway land sought our hero’s help, the little boy spoke of a peculiar phenomenon of lost children and deadly minions that plagued the lands. The once peaceful and brightly lit sky had produced two dark moons, an oddity that was once extinguished by the legendary Knight of the Iron City centuries ago. In a time of uncertainty and chaos, the Mythical Guardians have beckoned our heroes to come forth and harness the Guardians’ great powers. A journey thus begun. What is the evil behind all these chaos? Will our heroes cross paths with the lineage of the legendary Iron Knights? Will the powers of the Mythical Guardians prove equal or greater than the oncoming evil? Dusty's gang must ride this journey in order to seek answers and restore peace to the land.    


Background art - Kitsune in the Ice Guardian's cave seeking the Power of Ice








The route to the Ancient Tomb - An Ancient Evil lies ahead








Background Art - Kitchen on a Ship













'Dusty Raging Fist' style of combat combines melee attacks with ranged attacks. You start off with basic attacks which allow you to earn combo moves, you can juggle in the air, perform uppercuts, roll, dash, air dash, smash down, and combine all these moves to chain more combos. Your characters are also equipped with range attacks. Dusty will be equipped with dual pistols, Kitsune uses shuriken, and Darg throws a large boomerang. As you progress in the game, you will need to collect the 3 key combat elements: 1) Elemental Powers, 2) Support Characters, and 3) Mythical Guardians. Different elemental powers are used for different purposes. Support characters lends artillery and sniping abilities. You are also equipped with the powers of the ancient Guardians for full carnage attacks. Let's talk about Elemental Powers first:







There will be 6 different types of elemental powers available:




Elemental Powers








Ice Elemental Freeze








Lightning Elemental Shock





Each elemental powers will have different effects on enemies. For instance, Ice Elemental will freeze enemies, giving you and your friends extra time to damage them. Lightning Elemental electrocute enemies, other enemies that comes into contact into electrocuted enemies will get electrocuted as well, creating a domino effect.







To aid you further, two other support mechanisms comes in handy when situation gets sticky. You will be able to call upon your sniper support from a zoomed out view to take down pesky enemies, or bring forth your cannon support to blast away enemy clusters.


Using Support Character 'Snow' as a Sniper.





When using your sniper support, a zoom out view of the sidescrolling game layout will be presented, you can then take aim at the enemies that may be higher up in the air for more effective combat for instance.Stronger or bigger enemies may require the use of your artillery support character. Forcing your enemies in a cluster before taking them out is also a good way to use the artillery support mechanism for instance. See below.




Using Cannon Support Character 'Leo' to bomb Enemy Clusters
















Darkness Guardian on Summon - Sucking enemies into a black hole





You can also summon your chosen Mythical Guardian for ultimate carnage, as above. Different Guardians may have different effects on different enemies. For instance, the Darkness Guardian will suck enemies into a black hole, eliminating them at the expense of gaining health or XP orbs. There are also Guardians with healing powers.The use of Mythical Guardians is a powerful feature inspired by JRPGs. We've decided to incorporate it in a beat'em game setting to add more depth and interest to the game play. Use these Guardians wisely and they will save you in dire times of need.

















Dusty has a great sense of righteousness and will not hesitate to stand up and do the right thing.







Kitsune is from the far east. Originally an enigmatic assassin, she has come to respect Dusty and many a times follow him on his quests. But being the skeptic she is, she will challenge Dusty's decisions.







Darg is a childhood friend of Dusty, he places a lot of trust in Dusty. And he will follow Dusty to the end of the world.







Ex-militia trained, Snow did not favor the military practices. Instead, he longed for freedom to fight his own justice. He followed Dusty as he finds Dusty's code of justice similar to his.







Originally an arms maker, Leo decided to travel with the gang to test his powerful cannon and fight for justice.







Sir William guards the stars and maintain world balance. From the lineage of the Iron Knights with extreme power and strength, is he a foe or friend?


'Darg' in Action, using Earth Elemental Power








Lead Character 'Dusty' Taking a Ride Inside an Elevator








Upgrade your characters and skills with XP collected





The characters in 'Dusty Raging Fist' can be upgraded. All you need to do is to fight your way through the onslaught of enemies inside the game to collect as much XP as possible, in order to distribute them to various skills and powers of your characters!In summary, 'Dusty Raging Fist' is a 2.5 D sidescrolling beat'em up action game, a traditional genre refreshed in a modern way. There will be local and online co-op, up to 3 players. In addition, the game features the sniper and artillery combat support system (as seen in Dusty Revenge). It is a unique combat system designed by us and not seen in other beat'em up games. There are 6 elemental powers to collect (Fire, Ice, Wind, Earth, Lightning, & Darkness). Elemental powers have their own unique properties. Also, mythical guardians can be collected and summoned in times of need. These mythical guardians serve different purposes, and they are used generally in dire times. There will be platforming elements, so be prepared to dodge, roll and jump out of dangers too! 'Dusty Raging Fist' is a passion project by us, the creators, growing up playing classic games such as 'Streets of Rage', 'Double Dragon, and many more. Throughout our growing up years, we have also enjoyed playing modern games such as the 'Devil May Cry' & 'God of War' series. Hence, 'Dusty Raging Fist' was conceived, to fuse modern game play and awesome art into a classic game genre.

















































































































































To thank our backers further, we've included a special 'Hall of Fame' webpage dedicated to the personalities that would make Dusty Raging Fist possible. Backers of all Caricature Tiers will be included in this special feature.















Like most indies, we need strong support from the community. Although we have a good team internally, we still need additional public support to see us through. We need involvement from the public to help us better our game. Your feedback will help us greatly. And we definitely need the funds to help us get to the end point, which is ultimately releasing an excellent and fun game, 'Dusty Raging Fist'. 

'Dusty Raging Fist' was conceived because we wanted to create an extremely fun side-scrolling beat'em up taking cues from modern games, fusing traditional stylized 2d game play in a modern way. At the same time, we wanted to improve vastly from our earlier game 'Dusty Revenge'. To be candid, our earlier game 'Dusty Revenge', although award winning, did not fully lived up to our own expectations because we lacked funds to improve the game. One of the issue with 'Dusty Revenge', was our lack of experience in building a large game using an old game engine that subsequently resulted in some technical glitches. The whole experience strengthened us as a team nonetheless, and we aspire to improve ourselves from then on. The pre-production for 'Dusty Raging Fist' actually started some time back, but due to the business environment where we have to cover realistic running costs, we have also  been actively engaged in other client based projects while we were working on 'Dusty Raging Fist', in order to keep the team afloat. Right now, we will like to break the cycle and dive right into the production of this game full steam ahead. And we hereby appeal to you, our generous backers to help us achieve that.

We need your support, in every small little way. For the full completion of this game, we are looking at another 9 months of additional work, including all game testings. We've come up with really cool awesome tiers that you will find very enticing. In return for your help, we'll deliver a fun and exciting game, and we hope to have you involved in this project. So join us in our game making journey! 















KJ – The Lead Game Designer for 'Dusty Revenge', and for 'Dusty Raging Fist'. He comes from a 3D artist and animator background before producing 'Dusty Revenge'. 

Ken – Co Designer, and Producer. He started the studio in 2006, and have since produced countless productions for a wide range of clients, and in 2010 together with KJ went all out to make 'Dusty Revenge'. 

Yinghol – Lead Game Artist. He works on all characters, animations and background art. Pretty much everything else.Naoki – Game Artist. She works on characters, animations, and UI art. Pretty much everything else.Kok Kiang – Lead Programmer. He works on Boss fights, AI and everything else. Daniel – Game Play Programmer. He works on Player controls, AI, platforming and everything else.*Credits to Jesse Lowther for lending his excellent voice in the videos. Jesse is a professional voice actor who has done numerous voice acting with a wide range of portfolio. We can't thank him enough.















PD Design Studio is an independent game development studio in Singapore. We are a passionate bunch of video gamers turned game makers. We are also caffeine addicts. Our 1st game was 'Dusty Revenge' where we won Excellence in Audio at IGF, China 2013, Best Game Audio at Casual Asia Connect Indie Prize 2014, and nominated for Best Desktop Games in Casual Asia Connect Indie Prize 2014 among several other nominations. Our game making journey although pave with many challenges thus far, have been extremely rewarding. Right now, we plan to charge ahead to deliver a fun and excellent 'Dusty Raging Fist'.







 Bonus Pictures:


Artbook and Instruction Manual Sample








Catacomb Boss Design - Work in Progress
description_risks:
Game development delays are the most common challenges faced by small indie teams. We acknowledge that. To keep to our side of the bargain in return for your help, we intend to keep to the timeline and deliver our game timely.

How can we do so? 

- We are asking for a realistic sum of funding (coupled with what we have), to cover our  remaining tasks.
- Having gone through our 1st game release, 'Dusty Revenge'. we have learnt a great deal as a team, and will be able to minimize mistakes and hiccups.
- Our team is committed and have been working on 'Dusty Revenge' through to 'Dusty Raging Fist'.
- Although we are a small team, and 'Dusty Revenge' was our 1st game, we have existed as a company since 2006. We have provided professional services to numerous other clients, we believe we can deliver the game professionally and on time, as long as we have the budget to accomplish it.

blurb: A 300m diver's watch that ages with you. Inspired by the past, built for the future. Automatic movement that never runs out of power.
description: A 300m diver's watch that ages with you. Inspired by the past, built for the future. Automatic movement that never runs out of power.
name: Ventus : Mori Brass Diver 300m
title: Ventus : Mori Brass Diver 300m
Title: Ventus : Mori Brass Diver 300m
Description: A 300m diver's watch that ages with you. Inspired by the past, built for the future. Automatic movement that never runs out of power.
Link: Ventus : Mori Brass Diver 300mA 300m diver's watch that ages with you. Inspired by the past, built for the future. Automatic movement that never runs out of power.
description_story:
Story






 
After 2 wildly successful Pilot watch projects, Ventus is proud to present the Mori Brass Diver. 







Mōri Motonari “The legend of the three arrows” is a story about Mōri Motonari. In an effort to get his sons to work together, he gave them each an arrow to break. This was done easily, and he challenged his sons to repeat it with three arrows bound together. This proved to be unbreakable. Our Design Philosophy - Inspired by the past, built for the future







From the lesson of Mōri Motonari, we wanted to design an awesome diver's watch by focusing on 3 aspects. The 'Three Arrows' story is reflected on the dial, when the dive bezel triangle, dial triangle and Ventus logo line up. Aesthetic DesignThe Ventus Mori was designed with the diving watches of the 1950s in mind. A highly legible dial and an unimposing case gives it a rugged elegance. The Mori is a watch that fits under your shirt cuff, yet tough enough to be taken on a dive. The case is also made from Brass, a material which patinas as you wear it. This makes each watch unique to its owner and every watch will have its own story to tell.







The dial is produced with a sandwich effect which gives a sense of depth to it. The dial design was kept clean and legible, with a date wheel printed in matching colors to the luminous paint.  Mechanical craftsmanship







Even though the Mori looks like a watch from the 1950s, it has been designed with the latest advancements in technology. Its slim 12.5mm case (without crystal) is able to withstand a very respectable 300m of water pressure.To commemorate its vintage roots, the caseback features a diving helmet design that has been stamped to give it an amazing 3D effect.







The double domed sapphire crystal ensures scratch resistance during dives. A 120 click unidirectional dive bezel keeps precise timing and the brightest C3 or BGW9 superluminova glows brightly in the murky depths. 


BGW9 Lume





 



Vintage Lume (C3)





Inside, a reliable Seiko NH35 automatic movement ensures that your watch will run for years without ever needing a battery.







Production QualityEach watch is built to last and this will be achieved through precise production and careful assembly techniques. Having worked with our production partner on many projects, we are confident that quality will exceed expectations.Rewards








 From Left to RightM-1B - Black Bezel with Blue LumeM-2B - Brass Bezel with Blue LumeM-1V - Black Bezel with Vintage LumeM-2V - Brass Bezel with Vintage LumeBonus Stretch Goal Colors





M-3 Brown dial with brown bezel insert and vintage lume





M-4 Blue dial and brass bezel with vintage lume







Specifications 







41mm Case Diameter. 14mm height (12.5 excl crystal)48mm Lug to Lug length. 20mm lug width300m Water ResistantDouble Domed Sapphire Crystal with inner AR coatingSeiko NH35 Automatic MovementBrass Case with Stainless Steel caseback Brass Bezel with optional Aluminium insertSandwich DialC3 or BGW9 Superluminova Delivery Timeline







 About Ventus  Ventus was conceptualized to offer classic timepieces with unique twists, while remaining affordable. It was founded by two close friends who both share a passion for watches. Elshan, who has been involved with five successful KS watch projects, and Shane, a passionate collector of mechanical wristwatches.What others are saying about VentusA detailed 10min video review of the Ventus Black Kite TheTimeBum - "A cool brass pilot at an unbeatable price."WatchReport - "I highly recommend picking this one up in some variation."WornAndWound -"Overall it looks like a great, affordable entry into the Observer watch market"
description_risks:
Having delivered over a thousand watches on our previous campaigns, we have learnt a lot and have plans to prevent any problems that we can foresee.

Production delays have been prevented as we have the final prototypes for production, with all specifications and details locked down with the manufacturer.

Shipping via DHL express is free for all backers.

Shipping does not necessarily include customs and taxes applicable for all countries. Rates are based on a normal transaction via a logistics service such as DHL and applicable fees may apply in some countries.

blurb: Handmade Vintage Style  Leather wallet
description: Handmade Vintage Style  Leather wallet
name: Hand Crafted Vintage and Classic Leather Wallet with Scripts
title: Hand Crafted Vintage and Classic Leather Wallet with Scripts
Title: Hand Crafted Vintage and Classic Leather Wallet with Scripts
Description: Handmade Vintage Style  Leather wallet
Link: Hand Crafted Vintage and Classic Leather Wallet with ScriptsHandmade Vintage Style  Leather wallet
description_story:
StoryThe movement of technologies have inevitably destroyed many legacies and history that we used to cherish, most of which were buried and forgotten over the time. But some legacies managed to endure the perfect storm by the technologies and shines even brighter in front the world. Hand craftsmanship is one of those. It includes watch making, leather making, art making and other old fashion that carry ancient wisdom and culture in the modern days. For example, the traditional watch making industry were nearly wiped out by the evolution of quartz watch in the 70s. But today it is still considered one of the greatest arts in the human history. Because legacy is what defines who we were and what we are. 
The use of wallet becomes less relevant in today's world, with various payment mode embedded in our smart phones. We can live without a wallet but we cannot live without a phone, which would sound ridiculous if it was 10 years ago. But it doesn't mean that we shall forget about the wallet, on the contrary, the hand craftsmanship is becoming more relevant now. 
"In an age where many things are mass-produced, you don’t get a sense of how they might have been put together. Items no longer seem to have their own personality."
Says Mr Tom Van Deijnen who devotes himself to repairing and reviving vintage textiles just to give a second chance to the world. 
This project is dedicated to awake the appreciation of hand craftsmanship before it eventually turns into a lost art some day.  Each of the wallet is hand crafted and singly made one at a time to upkeep the quality. 
The wallet is a typical cardholder style that serves as both a cardholder and wallet at the same time, which is not usually the hot pick in the market, due to multiple reasons, such as commercial restraints, mass production limitation, etc. This wallet consists of a  coin pouch, 5 credit card slots and a bill compartment that fits most of the currency notes. It is carefully made, stitched, wax, colored and embossed.
If this project is successfully funded, each backer will have their own edition of wallet at an exclusive price before it comes into commercial production, where each of the wallet will be with their own signs, such as preferred nickname, city name or short words on the wallet.
description_risks:
The potential risk is the uncertainty of leather material due to current global supply issues, where it might cause unexpected rise in price that inevitably hit the cost hard before we are unable to launch the production. 
Meanwhile, the prototyping process isn't easy, as we are expected to produce the wallet with long last quality, which inevitably results increased wastage and repeated adjustment to the desired quality standard. 
Therefore, we will need extra funds to procure the material in a bigger bulk to fulfill the order and mitigate the risks.

description_story:
Story“Sleep is the golden chain that ties health and our bodies together” - Thomas Dekker









Science has proven that the Japanese’s way of sleeping can extend one’s lifespan. I was pleasantly surprised to know that one of the secrets was bedding! 








By combining modern production techniques and traditional craft, I recreated the magical bedsheet.  
Product 
"The quality behind Blux is amazing. As a consumer, I feel safe and that my money has value. I’m based in Singapore and these sheets are truly a blessing for a humid country like ours. No more static and sweat!" – Huan Guo Singapore, Singapore

It Only Takes a Bedsheet to Convert Your Home into A Luxury Resort.








Waikite Blux Bedding | Lux Linen Bed Sheet Meets Innovation
Our linen, anti-mite and anti-bacterial lux bedsheet will transport you from your bedroom to a 5-star resort every night.
Why you’ll love Blux:

Heavenly Soft for Your Body Skin
Sensational and Natural Sheet
Premium Raw Cotton Bud
Remarkably Long Lasting
Meticulous Experience
Kickass Essential Features
24/7 Protection For Your Children & Family
Trusted – Manufactured by 5-star hotels and resorts’ manufacturer.

Features:
Feature 1: Heavenly Soft for Your Body Skin









300 thread count & 100% long-staple cotton in a soft sateen weave allows you to truly enjoy sleeping bare and snuggle all night long.  
Feature 2: Sensational and Natural Sheet 









Blux Sheet is super breathable, ensuring you and your family a sweat-free and static-free night. This is especially important for Blux that is to be used for the different seasons throughout a year.
Feature 3: Premium Raw Cotton Bud 








Blux ensures that every 100% Egyptian long staple cotton used to make the sheets has the 4 Vital qualities required. We bring to you the epitome of class without the price tag. 

10 hours of sunlight exposure
Grown on a high altitude landscape
Mature for 200 days instead of standard 100
Using 33mm cotton buds 

*Only premium brand linens would use 33 mm cotton bud 
Feature 4: Remarkably Long Lasting









Built to last, Blux will not fade even after 2 years’ worth of washing. Blux can withstand the toughest wash cycle and hence, ensuring proper hygiene. 
Feature 5: Meticulous Experience 








Keeping Japan’s minimalistic design in mind, we’ve added simple yet powerful features to improvise on design. 



A dedicated soothing music library to promote better sleep just by scanning the QR code
And a durable yet undetectable zipper to keep it snug and classy
Duvet covers have internal corner ties and zip closure

Feature 6: Kickass Essential Features









Regular washing is vital to ensuring your bed’s proper hygiene. Responsibly created, Blux is washable and certified by OEKO-TEX to be free of harmful chemicals.
Feature 7: 24/7 Protection For Your Children & Family










In addition to high-end features, health is important too. The Blux fabric is anti-mite, allergen-free and water-spills resistant to prevent bacterial contamination.













With our linens, your four-legged friends and kids can still cuddle and snuggle without bringing their unwanted 'friends' with them!
Feature 8: Supplied to Major 5-Star Hotels & Resorts









Manufactured by the same manufacturers most major hotels and resorts use, the best quality is guaranteed. 
 Feature 9: Specification
Color:









The initial launch would include 2 colors. After the end of the campaign, depending on the crowdfund raise, you get to choose more designs. 

Immaculate White
Elegant Grey



Colors & Strips designs option:
















Sizes:
After the end of the campaign, you get to choose the 6 different standards: Twin, Twin XL, Full, Queen, King, Cal King.
The following is the table of the sizes in inches and cm. King and Cal King Suite Sets come with king pillowcases.








Where we are 








"I finally found the secret to “beauty sleep”! As one of the first few beta testers, I must say Blux exceeded my expectations." – Lori L Casey, New York, USA

Rewards/ Top up:
Get this for Spring!












From our successful experience with Waikite pillow, we are able to ship Blux successfully to any corner of the world. 


*Why in Singapore dollars? Crystal’s Papa, Mama, Brother & Granny are all in Singapore.
For buyers not from USA & Singapore, kickstarter would automatically top up Rest of the World @ USD $30/ $40 for shipping of single Standard & Suite Blux respectively. 


Top up options:




Additional pillowcase: USD $18/ SGD $24 (shipping cost is exempted)
Additional bolster case: USD $28/ SGD $37 (shipping cost is exempted)
Additional set of Blux: USD $125/ SGD $165 (shipping cost is exempted)
A customized dimension of Blux for your unique bed? Yes we are offering during this sales! Buy the set first. Dimension will be asked after the presales ended. Contact us for more details.



Stretch Goals








 





Beta Users' Reviews: 








•	I requested for a specific design and I can’t believe Blux considered it! My needs are unique and it’s hard to find an ethical company that actually listens to their consumers. Thanks Blux! – Kathryn K Peters, Mansfield, USA
•	Ever since I switched to Blux, I feel like my skin is clearer (I have very sensitive skin and its important to have clean sheets always). I’m in love with Blux!  – Xun Ye Singapore, Singapore
•	I got Blux sheets for my kids and they’re loving it. I sleep better knowing my kids are protected from bacteria even during their sleep. It’s also great that it’s anti-spill! – Leo K Sims, Grants Pass, USA
As Seen At:








Timeline









January/Feb - Kickstarter Launch!  
March - Production Run 
April - Assembly/Packing, quality control and testing
April/ May- Shipping out all rewards!  











**Congratulation to the Giveaway Winners (we will contact you).

description_story:
StoryWHO IS GREAT TWINS?
Great Twins is a design, production and distribution company for  collectible toys and high-end premium merchandise. We also serve as a  consultant in building ideas from scratch to a unique finished product.
Made up of a dynamic team of creative and adventurous souls,  featuring a diverse talent pool from various fields of expertise, we  conceptualize, manufacture and distribute authentic high-quality  collectible/designer toys (including vinyl figures, action figures,  poly-resin/fiberglass statues, plush toys, etc.) and unique premium  designer lifestyle merchandise.
We aim to take the lead internationally for the genre of products we design and produce.
With our global network of retailers, we have a toy and merchandise  distribution arm that helps potential brand market, wholesale and  distribution of products. Bringing the best product to our customers is  our utmost priority.
From transforming raw ideas into great products, starting from  concept development through various stages of processing, production,  packaging, and distribution of final products, Great Twins is the ideal  place to help clients (government organizations, corporations or private  individuals) make their collectibles and toy-dreams become reality.
MERLION COLLECTIBLE FIGURE
Being a tourism icon, Merlion is one of the most popular and  recognisable mascots in Singapore and internationally. Since it's  creation in 1964, the now 43 year old half-lion and half-mermaid  character had since been manifested on souvenirs and memorabilia  dedicated to tourists worldwide.
In 2017, the Merlion had been conceptualised, redesigned in-house and  produced by Singapore company "Great Twins", and given a fresh new  lease of toylife as a trendy designer collectible for the new  millennium, with an emphasis on it's "cool" factor, now levelled up to  welcome the pop culture world, with a playful flick of it's mermaid  tail!
Truly a "fusion" character that has become apart of everyday life for  both Singaporeans, and is synonymous with our country island worldwide,  Merlion will be available in a kaleidoscope of colours and hues, sizes  (2 inches tall and 8 inches tall), and as well collaborations with  designers and artists to release new cool designs, all with the aim to  promote Singapore and the booming industry of designer toys in Asia.
