blurb: A one of a kind Travelling Multi Usage Space tentage. Lightweight, inflatable, lighted, tall & rectangular. Usable indoor & outdoor.
description: A one of a kind Travelling Multi Usage Space tentage. Lightweight, inflatable, lighted, tall & rectangular. Usable indoor & outdoor.
name: Travelling Musollah cum Multi Usage Space
title: Travelling Musollah cum Multi Usage Space
Title: Travelling Musollah cum Multi Usage Space
Description: A one of a kind Travelling Multi Usage Space tentage. Lightweight, inflatable, lighted, tall & rectangular. Usable indoor & outdoor.
Link: Travelling Musollah cum Multi Usage SpaceA one of a kind Travelling Multi Usage Space tentage. Lightweight, inflatable, lighted, tall & rectangular. Usable indoor & outdoor.
description_story:
Story

Concept

  A Travelling Musollah cum MultiUsage Space, acronym TRAMUS. 
  This is a lightweight, portable, inflatable, lighted, tall rectangular tentage. 
  Designed for Multi Usage.

 - For  Muslims to perform their daily obligatory prayers, indoor or outdoor, where there are no proper place made available. For this purpose, it will be accessorised with pegs to ground the tentage for outdoor use. Also a slender bottle spray pump will be included for taking the ablution prior to performing the prayers. Thus hassle free.

  TRAMUS can also be used as a 2 man tent. Ideal for those who loves the outdoors 
  TRAMUS is also ideal as a makeshift changing room, usable indoor and outdoor. Great for those selling clothes at fairs or flea markets where there are no proper changing room to try out the outfits.
  TRAMUS is also ideal for use as a Security tentage for Law Enforcement Agencies usage for the crime scene forensics investigations or even in areas such as Airport gatehold rooms or Immigration checkpoints, where a person is subjected to a body search, thus away from public views. This can also be deployed for use at events where there are heightened security coverage. 
  TRAMUS can also be use for other purpose such as a temporary shelter during events, both indoors and outdoors.
  Additionally, TRAMUS can alao be use as a temporary shelter for storage of stores or equipments. 
  TRAMUS is designed to be lightweight, spacial, portable and be very simplistic in its setup. Each tentage comes with internal lighting and a portable pump for inflation and deflation. 

History of TRAMUS
The inception of creating TRAMUS came to me about 8 years ago. It was initially aimed for Muslims to be able to perform their daily obligatory prayers.
 Unfortunately, my initial drafts and ideas was severely crippled by my fellow peers critical comments of its viability. It was shelved. 
The idea was revisited over the years but development was obstructed by the high  development cost. 
Funding became the greatest issue even to develop the prototype as I do not have the financial means to fund the  project. 
This year, the idea was once again aroused. Whilst sharing my thoughts, a stranger came to me told me that not only was this project useful for the community, but it also has other viable market potentials. I was also introduced and advised to the crowdfunding platform to fund the project. 
This inadvertently spurs me on and I am now adamant to make the idea a reality. 
Product Design & Versatility
TRAMUS is designed to be simplistic, practical for outdoor and indoor usage, spatial and its portability. It is also lightweight as the entire sructure will be made with lightweight canvas material. 
The framework structure uses inter-connected air tubes, which can be inflated and deflated with the use of a pump. This allows TRAMUS to be easily folded and be carried easily. 
Another interesting feature is that it comes with LED Lights. Thus remove the hassle for additional or seperate and bulky lamps for night usage. 


Marketing Strategy
Over the last couple of months, I have started doing preliminary market research locally to gather feedbacks and gauge TRAMUS viability and marketability, for its primary and secondary uses. 
I have personally spoken and promote the idea to my acquaintances, friends and colleagues. I have also spoken to strangers on the streets to gauge their responses. Of these, more than 95% of those I spoken to have shown interest to purchase TRAMUS. 
Once the prototype has been developed, my next approach is to rigourously promote the product through various means for greater exposure. 
These includes:



  Via various social media platforms as well as other online marketing platforms. A video clip of the product will also be featured in. 
  Roadshows at various venues and events to showcase and promote the product first hand. These includes Mosques, community events, picnic grounds, trade fairs and trade exhibitions. 
  Personalised emails to various government agencies and other relevant private companies to promote TRAMUS secondary usage.

Additionally, a local major event organiser, whom I shared my idea, has expressed their interest to promote the product with their business clientele as well as assisting in marketing the product by providing sales booth during their on going events and trade shows. 
Furtherence to this, this event company has also plan to market the product in the neighbouring countries through their extensive contacts with the nation celebrities and business retailers to greater promote it. 
Appeal
This journey has took me 9 years in the making. 
I have completed the draft design for TRAMUS. I have also engaged a company to begin developing the prototype and eventually manufacture the product.
I strongly believes that TRAMUS has a huge market potential for both its primary and secondary usage. I am now even more committed and determined to bring the idea of TRAMUS into being. 
The groundwork has already begun and the prototype development for TRAMUS has been initiated. Henceforth, I am now reaching out to you in seeking your assistance for your support in funding this project. 
My sincere appreciation and gratitude to you.
description_risks:
The main challenge is to identify a trustworthy company that is able to develop the product in its entirety. 

Other challenge involves developing the inflatable structure with the use of air tubes. The tent structure should also be able to withstand a certain degree of wind resistance for general outdoor use.

description_story:
Story"Super Sonic Mini Zoo" Project:
Hi, I am Dollra and i am a designer who also happen to share a household with 4 little Furry friends:
Meet My Lovely Furry Kids also my studio assistants:




Zorro The Husky, Jr The Bun, Bella The Meow, Jacob The Macaw





They are my motivation to keep going, Zorro & Bella also assist me with the important task of running my creation in Royal Chewy, Where i sell my designed product of Cats & Dogs clothes, accessories and gifts boxes.
During factory visit, we found lots of waste fabrics with beautiful prints and of quality material been throw into bin. So Bella & Zorro came out with an ideal of Re~Cycle Re~New Re~Use, from the small bits & pieces we bought from the factory and some of our own left over fabrics. we started our little UpCycle project.
Every toy fabric vary as all the fabric are Upcycle fabric from left over bits from factory's here are some sample of the fabrics that we have bulk purchase from the factory.




First Batch of Scrap Fabric We Purchase From the Factory








is Zorro off day, hence Bella is supervising on production





After we pick up all the fabric that is of the fitting size, we start drawing the shape we have designed such as Fish, Dog Bone, Snake, Crab etc




Prototypes





This Mini Zoo are made of recycle fabric such as cotton, 100% Japanese cotton. They are very durable and fill with 70% USDA Certify Organic Catnip with 30% fiber fill to make them flurry.




Little preview of our crab design in raw material





They are about 3" - 7" inch which make them spin real fast, so your furry friend will keep going after them and get entertain while you are busy at work.
After rigorous product testing by friends and in house QC supervisor ...

 sound

Bella inspecting the prototype products, making sure its of the best quality for our furry friend around the world. And Bella have officially approved this product after rounds and rounds of testing from friends in Singapore and oversea!!







You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.

What can our furry owner help with?
In order to offer my Super Sonic Mini Zoo toys at an affordable price, i need to buy my materials in bulk and not just any materials we need to get materials that is safe for cats and dogs to chewy on. Your help in funding this project will give me the seed money necessary to go around factory buying over more recycle fabrics and to purchase all of the other necessary materials in large quantities at lower prices. My goal is to eventually offer my toys collection to retail shop world wide, so all furry friends get to play with our toys.
And nor for the REWARDS!
... a Token of Appreciation for the furry owner
Check out the pledge rewards over in the right-hand column. At each pledge level there's something fun & cool for our furry friend and owner.
Super Sonic Mini Zoo
Most of our reward levels includes your choice (of animal shape, fabric are random as is Recycle hence are not able to fix the print) of one or more of Super Sonic Catnip Toys pictured above, depending on your furry family's needs.
As for the I.D Card below are the sample template you can pick from

blurb: A Meditation Card Deck to help you build a sustainable mindfulness practice for your everyday life.
description: A Meditation Card Deck to help you build a sustainable mindfulness practice for your everyday life.
name: Mindfully Me - Meditation Card Deck
title: Mindfully Me - Meditation Card Deck
Title: Mindfully Me - Meditation Card Deck
Description: A Meditation Card Deck to help you build a sustainable mindfulness practice for your everyday life.
Link: Mindfully Me - Meditation Card DeckA Meditation Card Deck to help you build a sustainable mindfulness practice for your everyday life.
description_story:
Story





You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play


































Replay with sound









Play with 
 sound












00:00


00:00


































Hello! My name is Kathy Gabriel and I'm thrilled you've stopped by to check out my Kickstarter project!




Mindfully Me Card Deck





Mindfully Me is a meditation card deck that has taken me close to 2 years to create, thoughtfully researching and curating some of my favourite meditations and those I have been deeply inspired by throughout my years of practice. As a full time yoga and meditation teacher, this deck has been put together with my students and clients in mind. Through my work with them, I’ve found that these meditations and mindfulness techniques have not only been helpful but also really simple to practice and integrate into their everyday life. 
This deck has a total of 54 cards. 50 of them detail a different mindfulness exercise that is inspired from various traditions and spiritual practices. The 4 blank cards are included for you to add your own mindfulness rituals or affirmation practices to make this deck uniquely yours. These exercises have been curated to create a timeless and spiritually neutral deck for all ages. 
In the deck, you will find a thoughtful mix of mindful movement, breathing techniques, chanting/ mantras, visualisation exercises, self-massage methods and affirmation meditations. The exercises can be practised seated upright, lying down or unless stated otherwise. All of them will take you no longer than 5 minutes to do so you can do them on the go, whenever you need a dose of calm, reset or the kick of energy to go about your day. 
There will be a simple guidebook that will give you more information about the practices along with some creative suggestions of how to use your deck for yourself or others.




Mindfully Me Title Card





Details

   Artwork - The entire deck is made up of original Watercolour images that were painted by a local artist who I worked closely with to match all the art with the meditations and the felt-sense of the various practices. These are intended to inspire your visualisations and to spark fun or joy in your practice
   Main Deck Illustration - The Cherry Blossoms are cherished symbols in my life as they remind me of my mother who passed away from cancer when I was 14. Her journey showed me how courage and strength can help us weather through any hardship and was exactly what set me on my path of meditation and self-healing.
   Illustration & Typography - I also worked closely with a professional designer to tie the whole look and feel of the deck together





Main Deck Illustration








Mindfully Me Guidebook Inside





How To Use This Deck
All you need to do is shuffle and draw a card. Indulge in the meditation that is written on the card itself. Depending on how much time you have, you can draw more than one. You are also welcome to ask a question or seek guidance before you draw, as you would do in tarot reading, and see what meditation practices can guide you into a space for more clarity and purpose. 
Meditations can be broken down into a few distinct categories:

  Breathing  
  Movement 
  Sound & Voice 
   Visualisation 
  Touch & Self Massage
   Felt-Sense Practices 
   Positive Psychology, Mantras & Affirmation





Meditation - Humming Bee Breath








Exploring Sensations





Production Information

  Card dimension / 91x129mm
  54 original cards, 50unique designs and 4 blank cards with background painting
  printed on heavy playing card stock 400gsm, matte lamination
  premium cardboard box 1200gsm, matte lamination
  Guidebook / art paper, 157gsm





Mindfully Me Card Box








Mindfully Me Guidebook





*All images of the deck and boxes you see in these photos are prototypes. The finished product may vary slightly from what you see here – backers will be kept up-to-date of any  minor changes that may occur. The overall design and theme will remain  UNCHANGED throughout the funding and printing process.







You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play


































Replay with sound









Play with 
 sound












00:00


00:00


































Get a feel of the texture and thickness of the cards - Here's a video comparison of the standard tarot card (left) vs the thickness to be printed for Mindfully Me (Right).
About the Creator
Kathy Gabriel is a Yoga and Meditation Guide based in Singapore even though she frequently travels the world sharing her practice and love for yoga. She is the founder and co-director of Urban Yogis, an international yoga collective offering immersive experiences around the world. She is deeply passionate about the art of presence and explorations of the body and mind, and believes in helping people connect more deeply in order to live a more conscious and empowered life. Her training background includes Yoga, Thai Massage, Reiki, STOTT Pilates, Structural Integration by Anatomy Trains and Biodynamic Craniosacral Therapy Practitioner Training.  To learn more about Kathy, visit: kathygabrielyoga.com
Project Planning
Time

   July: project funding
   August: layout adjustments, text finalisation
   September: production
   October: shipped to Singapore, repacking
   November/December: start shipping

Budget

   S$5,000: production costs
   S$1,000: packaging and shipping
  S$560++ Kickstarter and credit card fees(5%+3%)

Stretch Goals

   S$6,000 - Funded
   S$7,000 - Tissue gift stuffing for Card Box
   S$8,000 - 2 New Meditations Added to Deck 
   S$9,000 - Special printed card pouches, great for storing the cards and other objects of comfort including crystals, beads, malas etc
   S$10,000 - Limited Edition Wooden Box Keepsake for card storage and display
description_risks:
The biggest risk is production/packing delays and/or not meeting the MOQ (Minimum Order Quantity). Please also note that this is an ALL OR NOTHING CAMPAIGN. If I do not reach the campaign goal, I do not get any of the funds to process the payment to the printer. PLEASE ALSO NOTE THAT THIS IS ALL DONE BY A SINGLE INDIVIDUAL AND NOT A TEAM. It will take me time to pack such volumes and to assess for all quality checks in order to make sure your order comes in perfect condition - that is my guarantee to you.
I also plan on updating backers regularly on each step of the process. 

There is also the risk of postponements due to COVID-19. I will comply strictly by Singapore Governing Laws  so if there are measures that require further delays, then that will take priority. Also factor in certain countries applying restrictions in deliveries/shipping. Please only purchase a deck if you are willing to accept delays that could lead a few months! That being said, my aim is to get this deck to you within the 6 month framework so definitely something you can consider as an early Christmas Gift! Should the printing be done early, I will mail out completed decks before the time indicated.

It is possible that if stretch goals are unlocked, I may need to extend my delivery date. If that's the case, I plan on notifying all the backers well ahead of the deadline (preferable shortly after the completion of the Kickstarter) with my new intended delivery date.

My name is Tzuyan and I'm an aspiring artist that really hopes to run a small business selling trinkets of things we hold dear to. I'm a current student in art school, in Singapore!


"The Winds Of Us" Enamel Pin series is inspired by GhibFilms , the legends that fufills our fantasy and wildest imaginations at any age.

Link: Diah - The modern mini-light with endless applicationsWrap, hook or string many Diahs to make complex lightscapes. This portable, multi-purpose LED light brightens any space - big or small.
description_story:
StoryCheck out our video (above) for a look into the endless applications Diah can offer! 
Meet Diah - A flat, multi-purpose, paper-thin light that turns on in one easy snap!







It’s easy to assemble - Just snap the two magnetic ends together and your space is lit.
 






 







It’s lightweight & portable - Weighing in at 18 grams per light, Diah can also be packed flat and slipped right into any bag.







Modular form & function - Diah is more than just a pretty tea light. Snap many together to make wider bases. Just like lego, you can get creative and make complex lighting structures.







Omni-directional illumination - Our unique hollow design enables light to emit in all directions. A definite step up from traditional bulb lighting, you now have the ability to wrap your lights around any object.  48-hour battery life - Powered by 2 replaceable cell batteries, this light powers on for 2 days straight. Replace them if you need them to go on for longer. Endless applications - Here are a couple of scenarios in which Diah can turn a bland moment into the perfect #mood. .- Fairy Lights 
- Tea Light
- Dining Chandelier
 - Accent Light 
- Wall Sconce
 - Night Light
 - Camping/Glamping 
- Pop-Up Lighting & more!







How does it work? 
Clasp the magnetic ends of this flat piece of paper and have your Diah transform into a beautiful light. Should you want it off, simply flatten it and slide it back into your bag. 










Surprise yourself with Diah  - Be delighted by the endless combinations Diah offers.  Its hollow design and magnetic clasps give you the opportunity to wrap it around tree trunks, poles or even, wine bottles. You can also create larger configurations such as chandeliers and halos if you’re into DIY. 








Inspiration:
"How can we do more with less?"
This question, in particular, inspired Diahs' design.We started out with the goal of creating a structurally minimal product both in size & weight that when assembled, would command a presence far greater, than the sum of its parts.Everything from the structure, electronics and even the manufacturing processes, have been stripped and reassessed to use as little as possible. We believe that driving sustainability is not only defined by materials used, it goes down to the final detail of shipping, packaging and minimising waste. To stick by these principles, we've minimised weight and designed for flat packability making shipping easy. Specifications:







 **Do note: Colour options will only be available once we reach our stretch goal of 50,000$. If we only hit our initial goal of 20,000$ we will issue gold as the standard colour. Diah Timeline:April 2017 - The first forms of Diah were prototyped.August 2017 - Once we were happy with the functionality of Diah, we created a small batch of 50 Diahs to observe possible lead times with our vendors. We also used them for our brand video. Our inner circle of friends and family also got a chance to see our prototype and offer feedback.October 2017 - After a few tweaks and a lot of 3D printed mock-ups of possible multi-functional hooks, we ordered in our first batch of 500 Diahs that are currently being used as marketing samples. November 2017 - We launch on Kickstarter! We're waiting to hit minimum order to hit the go button with our vendors! The sooner we reach our goals, the sooner we get production going.We're also refining Diah to have a single clasp with a multi-functional hook like the one below.







December 2017 - Shipping of the first batch of Diahs begins! Rewards:









 







  







  







 







How to back Diah - If this is your first time backing a Kickstarter campaign, don't worry! Below is a simple guide to backing our campaign.

Step 1 - Choose your reward.
Choose the reward you'd like to back. You can only select 1 reward level during a Kickstarter campaign.

Step 2 - Pledge!
Press the pledge button and follow the instructions thereafter. We will reach out to you for additional info (like shipping details) via email once the campaign ends.We will make sure we answer any question you guys have for us. Don't hesitate to shoot us a direct message here on Kickstarter or by email at hellodiah@mana.sgPlease note: 
Diahs' utility & design is patent pending and for the time being, is protected by a provisional patent.International shipping:
Shipping of Diahs will be limited to India, Australia, Canada, Japan, S. Africa, Hong Kong & the United States of America for a set of 20 & 40 Diahs.WE SHIP WORLDWIDE FOR REWARD BUNDLES OF 2, 5 & 10 DIAHSWe also ship to South Africa & Hong Kong but only for certain rewards levels.
Shipping fees and tariffs will be charged as you check out on Kickstarter.
Any unforeseen costs with VAT and tariffs will be taken care of by the backer.Local shipping (Singapore):
Local backers will be responsible for applicable postage fees. Shipping fees and tariffs will be charged as you check out on Kickstarter.
Any unforeseen costs with VAT and tariffs will be taken care of by the backer.Product Reviews & Press: JustSaying AsiaHype&StuffProduct HuntGadget FlowThe Grey Alley

Little Black Book
description_risks:
Risks and challenges:
We've spent a lot of time building strong partnerships with experienced manufacturers to mitigate as many risks as possible, but we know there will still be unexpected challenges along the way. We will always be transparent and inform our backers of potential hurdles.

Ship date:
We have built in extra time for the manufacturing process and are confident we will ship by the projected dates. We will always keep you informed if things take longer than planned.

Product:
We have taken the following steps to ensure that we deliver the best quality product: - Built over 15 working prototypes. We will only make design refinements to enhance the product experience. - Extensively tested prototypes for performance and durability.

Manufacturing:
We have established relationships with experienced contract manufacturers to mitigate the risk of delays by material suppliers and to ensure quality control is implemented to the highest level. We have built test prototypes with our manufacturer and they fully understand our product, specifications and production timeline.

A shout out to everyone who has supported and made Diah what it is today. It really does take a village!

A special thank you to Herbert Pradjaja, Antariksh Jain & Egan the trio behind the beautiful images and video. Thank you to Melissa Tan, Opal, Manish Melwani & Natasha Singh for being our amazing talent for the videos.

description_story: StoryCherry Bosom - A Radical Concept, Empowering WomenPhase 1 - Photographing The Collection.Breast Cancer is the No.1 killer of women in Singapore.I want to photograph a collection of portraits which captures the beauty of 4 good pairs of breasts, to portray an awareness to the young women especially on how precious their breasts are and that they should treasure it even more.There will be a couple of Themes that I envisioned to portray. Such as, a small pair of breasts, a larger pair of breasts, a breast milk leaking portrait and a portrait of Breast Cancer survivor's breasts.These Photos will then go on to Phase 2  Which will then aim to create awareness to the public about the detrimental visual effects of how losing one's breasts can affect a person.The Photos will not feature any offensive nude themes. They will however accentuate the oultine of the Breasts and the women would be braless behind a tank top. No faces will be shown for privacy protection. Photos will be from Neck to Waist.Backers will get to have, prints of these photos depending on their level of contribution.I sincerely need your help you fund my project so I can engage these women who would participate in our cause to show their support for the fight against Breast Cancer.

blurb:
Promote your sense of touch through an
interesting and competitive gameplay, suitable for all ages.
description:
Promote your sense of touch through an
interesting and competitive gameplay, suitable for all ages.
name: Foodsory Play: Engaging Sensory Board Game
title: Foodsory Play: Engaging Sensory Board Game
Title: Foodsory Play: Engaging Sensory Board Game
Description:
Promote your sense of touch through an
interesting and competitive gameplay, suitable for all ages.
Link:
Foodsory Play: Engaging Sensory Board GamePromote your sense of touch through an
interesting and competitive gameplay, suitable for all ages.
description_story:
StoryWhat is Foodsory Play?
With a fun and engaging experience in mind, Foodsory Play aims to stand out from other board games by stimulating our sense of touch through the textured game pieces, offering a competitive and engaging game play. 









Description
Foodsory Play promotes our touch ability which is crucial among the 5 senses—sight, sound, smell, taste, and touch. Hence, we believe that the game would be enjoyed by all ages. 
Every game piece is meticulously handcrafted with jesmonite and comes with an acrylic game board frame. The combination of jesmonite and acrylic gives the game a sense of premium build.















You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play


































Replay with sound









Play with 
 sound












00:00


00:00


































At Foodsory Play, we offer a clean and simplistic visual representation of fruits and vegetables.




Game Pieces





The game pieces are designed for the players to feel the texture around the entire piece.




Fruits and Vegetables Label Cards





With the help of the fruits and vegetables label cards, players are able to identify the game pieces easily and familarise themselves with the textures before the game.




Game Cards





The introduction of the game cards brings out the competitive spirit in players as they feel out the textures to answer questions such as finding the fruits or vegetables and move the game pieces around.




Multiplayer Mode





It can be played as both single player and multiplayer mode.


How to Play
1. Memorise the textures by making use of the fruits and vegetables label cards









2.  Place all the pieces on the game board frame, facing down. 









3. Start playing! The game cards provide easy to follow instructions to aid with the gameplay. 









4.  Single Player Mode: Take this as a time to stimulate your sense of touch and improve your muscle memory.
Multiplayer Mode: This promotes competitiveness among players and the player to answer the most number of cards win!


Refinements




Iteration 1








Iteration 1





Initially, the first iteration had 16 game pieces and the frame is made of plywood and hard styrofoam.




Iteration 2





We cut down to 9 game pieces in the next iteration so that we could ensure that the pieces would have more consistency in the overall appearances. We made use of bent acrylic to create the game board frame.


User Testing
Usability tests allow us to test out the functionality and the game mechanics of Foodsory Play.  This allows us to sieve out any usability or design issues and make improvements to it. By testing out with individuals of different age groups, this ensures that we can cater to their requirements.




User Testing





Goals
Foodsory Play aims to reach out to a wide demographic and provide an unique and engaging experience to players through our sense of touch which is important to everyone! 
It makes use of high quality materials to manufacture the end product, making use of jesmonite to handcraft the game pieces and clear acrylic to provide a sturdy support for the frame, offering a premium quality.
With your support,  we would be able to refine further and reach our funding goal to make this gameplay a reality!


Contact
Feel free to check out our instagram and facebook for our latest updates at:
https://www.instagram.com/foodsory_play/ 
https://www.facebook.com/Foodsory-Play-104587514976741/ 
Email: foodsoryplay@gmail.com
Music Credits: 
www.bensound.com
description_risks:
Our team has worked very hard and went through many reiterations and rigorous testing to reach this stage. Along the past months, we have sourced out and experimented with different materials such as 3D printing and acrylic, to manufacture Foodsory Play. 

We are currently still in talks with the manufacturers and suppliers on how we can go about producing Foodsory Play in bulk. The production process may be long as the game pieces require casting as well.  

Despite the restrains and challenges, we will try our best to deliver the final product in premium quality and manufacture on time. 

With the support from the community, we promise to be transparent and honest by providing regular updates along the way. Thank you for trusting and supporting Foodsory Play!

blurb: Because we need more representation of Asian bodies in books
description: Because we need more representation of Asian bodies in books
name: {Un}Inhibited: An Asian Vulva Photo Book
title: {Un}Inhibited: An Asian Vulva Photo Book
Title: {Un}Inhibited: An Asian Vulva Photo Book
Description: Because we need more representation of Asian bodies in books
Link: {Un}Inhibited: An Asian Vulva Photo BookBecause we need more representation of Asian bodies in books
description_story:
Story{Un}Inhibited is the first elaborate vulva photography book focusing Asian vulvas. It is designed to educate Asian women about their vulvas and their anatomies so that they can understand their bodies and sexualities better.   A 9x9" colour photo book, we aim to feature images of at least 20 Asian vulvas. The book will also feature quotes from interviews with the models, as well as educational content on the different parts of the vulva. The full transcript from each interview will be posted on the project’s website www.uninhibited.asia.
WHAT IS THE VULVA?


Photo taken by Kelvin Lim of www.kelvinlim.com.sg





Your vulva is the part on the outside of your genitals, the clitoris and the labia - which have an inner and outer set of lips. 'Vulva' doesn’t mean anus or your vagina – your vagina is actually inside, leading up to your womb. 
WHY A VULVA BOOK?
1) This book, solely focused on Asian vulvas, would be the first of it’s kind in the world.
 
2) I have been asked by many Asian clients about what [‘normal’?] Asian genitals actually look like [add: “are ‘supposed’ to look like?’].
3) I have also found that the lack of sexual anatomical knowledge that causes a significant  percentage of the sexual difficulties people encounter.
4) The aim of this book is not to  reduce sexuality to only body parts, and ignore the spirituality of our being/sexuality. But rather, with this book, we hope to help and empower people with knowledge of their own and their partners’ bodies.   
5) Due to resource constraints, we are focusing on Asian depictions. 
  

6) A photo book featuring Asian vulvas would facilitate education, and healing around sexual inhibitions for many people, especially women.
 






Photo taken by Kelvin Lim of www.kelvinlim.com.sg





WHAT IS THE MONEY FOR?
We’re raising funds to print 100 copies of the book at S$40 per book. We are absorbing the costs of design, storage and transcription of interviews with the models so that our fundraising money will go towards the design and printing of the actual book. We are offering each volunteer model a copy of the book as well as a high-resolution digital image of their choice. We are not paying ourselves for this work.



Photo taken by Kelvin Lim of www.kelvinlim.com.sg





A WORD FROM THE AUTHOR DR MARTHA

I’ve been practising as the only Singaporean Chinese Clinical Sexologist with a doctorate in human sexuality in Singapore since April 2009. When I was in sex school (Institute for Advanced Study of Human Sexuality), I was embarrassed to admit to myself (and to my classmates) that even though I am comfortable with my body and with expressing my sexuality – I didn’t know what “vulva” referred to, was confused between Vagina and Vulva, and knew even less about the different parts of the female sexual anatomy. 
It took me eight attempts researching numerous online websites, books, and various other resources to begin to make sense of all the different parts of the anatomy. 
What’s so confusing, you might ask? Well, for starters: there are not three “holes” (vagina, anus, and urethra) in the vulva (external female sex organs). The vulva includes the mons pubis, labia majora, labia minora, clitoris, vestibular bulbs, vulval vestibule, urinary meatus, the vaginal opening, and Bartholin's and Skene's vestibular glands. One can visibly see seven “holes” if they knew where to look (Bartholin's and Skene's vestibular glands). What had added to my confusion was that there wasn’t a single anatomical diagram I could find that named every single part of the vulva!
 
If I was confused, there must be others who are too! I came across the seminal vulva photography book Petals by Dr. Nick Karras (USA) – capturing the variation and beauty that each woman possesses in sepia. Led by my intent to better support others, I started collecting vulva photography books around the world as a possible resource for my future clients. They include: I'll Show You Mine (Canada), and Heart of the Flower (Australia). I liked parts of, and disliked parts of each of these books. 
 
Yet none of these books stated the ethnicity of the vulva owner – by not making it a race thing, it didn’t answer one fundamental question: “Do I look different “down there” to other women like me?” I wanted a better vulva photography (and being Asian, an Asian) book! This was the same question my clients, especially my Asian female clients with Vaginismus (a condition where penetrative sex is difficult or impossible – usually due to fear of pain) asked – what is common or normal, and how am I different? I had no answer as we poured through these books together. Over the years, the desire to publish such a vulva book never left me. I explored with different photographers in Singapore but did not find anybody I could work with. Until Kelvin Lim introduced himself via e-mail. 
 
Before we arranged to meet, I looked him up and understood he was a seasoned and well-established portrait photographer who also does boudoir photography. How does he look like – not sleazy, I decided. When we met, he brought his wife and it was clear that their partnership was a complimentary one. As we explained our work and got to know another through, I finally shared… my long-time dream of a vulva book. Cautious about whether he is my photographer, “How interested are you to do this?” “200%” was the prompt reply. And so, our work began…
 



Martha's Selfie at Kelvin Lim's Studio





A WORD FROM THE PHOTOGRAPHER KELVIN

Early in my career, I was photographing clients with a highly-specific, pre-determined set of expectations - what to wear, what backdrop to use, where to shoot, how to pose. Four years on, with a strong portfolio and an established clientele, I began to question the purpose of my work. Why are people so focused on backdrops and shooting locations? Why are clients so concerned about their outfits, their makeup and hair, their poses? Why was I asked to photograph everything but the individual characters themselves, the real people?  
I began to find ways to simplify my portraits by minimising distractions, and maximising the expression of real feelings.  No fancy backdrops or poses, no fancy outfits.  Without distractions and props, all I had was light, and the person in front of me.  The only thing left to do was to start a conversation.

 
It was through these conversations that I discovered how people really felt.  It wasn’t just about getting great-looking shots that look pretty on the outside.  When people come for personal portraits, they’re asking, “How do I really look?” “Am I normal, or different?” “Can you show me how beautiful I can be?”

 
It is this emotional bond between a person and her portrait that kept me going for more than 16 years.  It was also for this reason that I was drawn to Dr Martha Tara Lee’s work.

 
When Dr Lee first expressed her idea of publishing a vulva book, and described one such photo-book showing the different forms of female genitalia, I was hesitant.  I didn’t want to be involved - again - in something that was simply graphic, decorative, and shallow.  However, as she explained what she liked and disliked about each such book she read - how she didn’t want the photographs to be dressed-up in distracting embellishments, how she loved the stories written by the women being photographed - it became clear that we both want something that connects emotionally to the reader. Furthermore, the book will be immensely useful for Dr Lee and many other professionals around the world in handling cases of Vaginismus - a condition which I never thought was so common, until I met Dr Lee and understood the work she does so passionately. 
The subject of this book can easily be misunderstood, especially in our Asian culture where the slightest hint of intimacy is considered taboo.  But there are real issues - both clinical and emotional - that can be addressed in this project, regardless of race or culture.  I cannot be more privileged for the opportunity to contribute to the work of Dr Lee. 



Photo taken by Kelvin Lim of www.kelvinlim.com.sg





ABOUT MARTHA
Since 2009, Dr. Martha Tara Lee has taken the path less traveled to support individuals and couples to uncover their human potential as a Relationship Counselor and Clinical Sexologist. As an empath and highly sensitive person, she combines intuition, compassion and humor in all her private coaching sessions (over 2,100 to date) and training (with the biggest being 550 people). 

She holds four degrees includes a doctorate in human sexuality and masters in counseling. She is only certified sexuality educator and certified sexuality educator supervisor by the American Association of Sexuality Educators, Counselors and Therapists (AASECT) in Singapore. In addition, she holds certificates in counselling, coaching and sex therapy.

Often cited in the local media, Dr. Lee is the appointed sex expert for Men’s Health Singapore, and Men’s Health Malaysia. She was recognised as one of ‘Top 50 Inspiring Women Under 40′ by Her World in July 2010, and one of ‘Top 100 Inspiring Women’ by CozyCot in March 2011. She has published three books: Love, Sex and Everything In-Between, Orgasmic Yoga, and From Princess to Queen. 



Photo taken by Kelvin Lim of www.kelvinlim.com.sg





 ABOUT KELVIN
Kelvin Lim was born in Singapore in 1971. In 2002, Kelvin left a promising IT career to be a wedding photographer. It was his first taste of life as a full-time artist. 

 
Despite enjoying great popularity and commercial success, Kelvin felt restricted by mass expectations of staged romance and surface beauty, and started questioning the authenticity of his own work. Beneath the gorgeous outfits, backdrops and poses, Kelvin sees a real person - a beauty waiting to be discovered. 

 
Driven by a desire to understand people as unique individuals, Kelvin started photographing people outside weddings. Instead of trying to get that “perfect” shot, he spent his time listening to people, one at a time. In an undecorated studio with plain backdrops and simple lights, Kelvin welcomed people of all race and status - from famous personalities to the common passers-by, from wealthy businessmen to the odd-job worker, from newly-weds to wrinkled old couples, from newborns tasting life, to the terminally ill. 

 
Kelvin’s subjects range beyond paying clients. Besides telling real-life stories of the less-privileged, Kelvin embraces the minorities, the lonely, and communities that conservative society considers taboo. In a career spanning 16 years thus far, he is heavily involved in several humanitarian projects, including: 

 

A major project with Home Nursing Foundation, culminating in an island-wide exhibition 
and a book of portraits of the elderly, and stories on the lives of the poor. 

 
An art residency with Exactly Foundation, documenting and telling real-life stories 
depicting the reality of caregiving in Singapore. 

 
An exhibition and a calendar of portraits for Breast Cancer Foundation, celebrating the 
beauty and courage of breast cancer survivors. 

 

Among Kelvin’s notable achievements was the Best Portrait Photography Award by Singapore Tatler, and being listed among Singapore’s finest services. 

 
Kelvin continues to express beauty through honest conversation and deep listening. In his own 
words: “We have an opportunity to give back to society every time we photograph someone—
anyone. The camera isn’t just a tool to capture the obvious. If we take the time and heart to 
listen and empathise, we will discover a beauty beneath how people look on the outside. It’s a wonderful blessing for us, as artists, to have this ability to touch people’s lives." 




Kelvin Lim of www.kelvinlim.com.sg
description_risks:
* Search for Vulva Models - Our photo shoot began on Friday, 17 August, and to date we have completed photography sessions with 11 models. We aim to include at least 20 women in the book. It has been challenging enlisting vulva models, especially with Malay and Indian women, with a rejection rate of about 50%. Any Asian woman open to being a vulva model is encouraged to contact us. Each model will receive the printed book as well as a digital image of their choice.

* Publisher - We may well end up self-publishing the book. However, since the intention is to help women, especially Asian women, who wonder how their genitals look, we are actively seeking an international publisher. Any leads will be greatly appreciated.

* Cost of publishing - While the photographer Kelvin Lim and I (the interviewer/author) are volunteering our time, we are bracing ourselves for the costs involved in publishing such a book. We have promised each of the models a copy of the book, as well as our Kickstarter contributors of S$40 or more. With printing, bigger quantities will mean a lower cost but we do not relish storing lots of these books. 

* Other parts of the series in the works - We are committed to publishing an Asian breast book and an Asian penis book  as parts of the series. Any interested models, partners, sponsors, and funders are welcome.

blurb: Bringing green coffee beans from Myanmar to the world!
description: Bringing green coffee beans from Myanmar to the world!
name: Burmese Coffee - Green Beans
title: Burmese Coffee - Green Beans
Title: Burmese Coffee - Green Beans
Description: Bringing green coffee beans from Myanmar to the world!
Link: Burmese Coffee - Green BeansBringing green coffee beans from Myanmar to the world!
description_story:
Story







 
In the Shan state of Myanmar, where hardworking and heart-warming people live, national parks flourish and British architecture within townships abound, tourists are often welcomed not only to the impressive temples and the sight of occasional hot air balloons, but also to the people whose family values attract that human touch. Opening up to the world, tourism aside, Myanmar has plenty to offer, with farms of high quality produce coming from arable land abundant with fresh sources of water and nutrients. Hidden like a gem for some time, with Arabica coffee being a specialty of the Shan state, these quality farm produce would eventually find their way around the world. Improving export is the next step farmers look forward to. These beans are offered green, so that unique roasts could be experiment on. 







We bring you to Ngu Shwe Li, an excellent coffee farm on the scenic hill town of Pwin Oo Lwin. They farm and process coffee, with machinery and a healthy thriving circle of workers sweating to pull off the abundant harvest every season. Care for quality in the farm could only be described as professional and efficient, which could only give in to productivity that turns coffee cherries into packs of processed beans in large seasonal batches.







Moving on to Ywangan, which is located within the Taunggyi Township of the Shan State. Mountainous landscape fill the horizons, and greenery so lush it takes the mind a moment to process. Farms that not only strive on coffee plantations, at 1200 meters above sea level where the rain could only bring untainted minerals along with freshness of the air, that would nurture the best in any plant produce. Detail placed in organising the plantation, experienced farmers to cultivate delightful coffee shrubs, prudently interspersed amongst macadamia trees, and grown alongside dragon fruits, brings diversity to the soil and the propensity to infuse delightful character in the coffee cherry.







When produce exceeds processing ability of an individual farm, which happens. In the neighbouring area of these farms, a processing plant with both wet and dry processing facilities, regularly managed tanks and machinery scrub away in unison to humble the coffee cherry to its essence. Coffee seeds that are processed go thru selection and sorting, they are graded, packed and sold according to washed, honeyed or natural processed types, where meticulous processing would allow quality to increase after filtering where only the best of the batch survive till before packaging.







When lightly roasted, honey processed SL-34 beans would cup with flavours of nuts and citrus, and at medium roast a more chocolaty profile. The wash processed Ywangnan beans give clean nutty notes, while the peaberries bear hints of dark chocolate.Also, visit us at: http://heartofbeans.asiaMusic clips (video): foolboymedia_forest-song, setuniman_etude
description_risks: After obtaining the requisite phytosanitary and various certifications, then bringing the beans into Singapore for a hastier delivery, shipping out to various countries remains a challenge. Having sourced for couriers, sorting out countries with import duties and setting an appropriate shipping cost, it is indeed challenging for a startup, but not impossible. Thanks for all the support we get on Kickstarter!

blurb: Customizable Double Electric Breast Pump
description: Customizable Double Electric Breast Pump
name: LoveAmme TailorMade Pro Breast Pump
title: LoveAmme TailorMade Pro Breast Pump
Title: LoveAmme TailorMade Pro Breast Pump
Description: Customizable Double Electric Breast Pump
Link: LoveAmme TailorMade Pro Breast PumpCustomizable Double Electric Breast Pump
description_story:
Story















Created by mums, for mums, LoveAmme's TailorMade Pro was conceived over the years through talking with a lot of mums on our breastfeeding challenges and journeys. Being breastfeeding mums ourselves, we were deeply dissatisfied with current breast pumps as the painful issues mums encounter with breastfeeding continued to reduce us to tears. 
Because each woman's body and breastfeeding journey is unique, we decided to design a bespoke system tailored to each mum’s breast and breastfeeding need. 







































You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play


































Replay with sound









Play with 
 sound












00:00


00:00










































1 out of 10 women who breastfeed will experience mastitis, and even more will encounter clogged ducts. Symptoms of mastitis include swelling, flu-like symptoms, and pain when breastfeeding. Sore, cracked or bleeding nipples are also common grievances we have heard from mums. TailorMade Pro aids recovery from a range of painful issues through:
a. Individualised breast settings that enable mums to customise the pump session to each breast's condition;
b. Deep Expression Phase to clear blocked ducts and help you empty your breasts completely;
c. Custom-fit breast shields that ensure a near-perfect fit, thus increasing the effectiveness of each pump session.

























Breasts can be rock-hard when engorged, or tender to touch when infected. Our proprietary FlexSkin™ Breast Shields departs from hard, unfriendly plastic cups, and are made of 100% Food-Grade silicone. The soft material firmly, yet gently conforms to sensitive skin and breast contours to reduce spills. It is able to support pumping in semi-lying positions so mums can rest while they pump. Using individual settings for each breast, it can also aid mums with uneven supply to increase the milk production of the breast with lower yield.
Coupled with pliable silicone, our custom-fit FlexSkin™ Breast Shields increases comfort-levels with a massaging effect as gentle as expressing by hand, enabling mums to keep pumping and feeding through issues.

















 Despite its gentle suction, TailorMade Pro is one of the most powerful breast pumps available. Our FlexSkin™ breast shields make it possible for mums to select higher suction strengths when compared to hard breast shields. This enables mums to empty their breasts completely to stimulate more milk production. Using individual settings for each breast, it can also aid mums with uneven supply to increase the milk production of the breast with lower yield.































You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play


































Replay with sound









Play with 
 sound












00:00


00:00


































Developed by mums, for mums, the TailorMade Pro is a revolutionary breast pump system that truly solves problems encountered by mums, For seasoned mums, it offers unparalleled comfort and saves time. For first-time mums, its a life-saver.  

























While it is standard practice to put default breast shield sizes into every breast pump box, at LoveAmme™, we are appalled by the idea of having a “default” breast size, as it’s common for a woman to have two different breast sizes! 
Our FlexSkin™ Breast Shield comes in 5 sizes and is custom-fit to ensure each breast gets its most accurate size. It will even fit women with inverted or flat nipples, including those who cannot achieve a proper latch with their babies.









It's important to get the right size for each breast as this would enable the most efficient, most comfortable expression, and also reduce spillages. You can download the nipple ruler here and measure up!







You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play


































Replay with sound









Play with 
 sound












00:00


00:00










































At LoveAmme™, we don't sell milk bottles. TailorMade Pro enables you to pump directly into the bottle you want to feed with. This removes the hassle of having to pour your precious breast milk from bottle to bottle to help you save every drop! Eliminating the pouring process also reduces contamination risk. 
We have T-Joints that fit most of the world's leading wide-neck milk bottle brands, including Tommee Tippee, Philips Avent, Pigeon, MAM, NUK, Snapkis and Hegen (requires adaptor from Hegen).

































Includes:

  1 x TailorMade Pro Double Breast Pump
  2 x Tubings for Double Pumping
  1 x USB Cable
  1 x User Manual
  2 x T-Joints (Please indicate milk bottle brand - Tommee Tippee / MAM / Pigeon / Philips Avent / Snapkis / Hegen (own adaptor required) / Spectra)
  2 x FlexSkin™ Breast Shields (Please indicate size for each breast 19/22/25/27/30mm)
  2 x Bottle Stands (Fits Tommee Tippee / Pigeon / Spectra / Philips Avent Classic Only / Snapkis)
















LoveAmme Backer Tiers





*Do note that our Kickstarter is based in Singapore, actual conversion rates will vary.




Fulfilment Timeline
description_risks: While we have stress tested our pump personally and with a group of lead users, we have piloted an initial batch of products in Singapore, Malaysia and Hong Kong to sieve out any potential issues and improvement points. So far, our users have expressed wishes for wider compatibility of milk bottles and bottle stands and a wider range of breast shield sizes, which we hope to deliver when we are able to achieve certain production volumes.

description_story:
StoryABOUT THE BOOKWe all have goals, but few of us manage to realize them. Too often, we get paralyzed by the amount of work and possibilities in front of us.My goal is to help everyone around the world to stand up for their dreams. Self-improvement books are often too theoretical and hard to digest. 
"Your goals, My method" provides a refreshing, inspiring and practical method to prioritize your goals and take action to make them come true.
The book includes tools as well as motivational short texts that will provide you with the right state of mind to get started (see sample pictures of the book below).


Whatever your background and occupation, this 4-stage method will help you to shoot for the moon and reach for the stars.
I know you are capable of doing it: believe in yourself and go for it.WHAT WE NEEDIn order to produce the book at an affordable price, we need to produce a batch of at least 1,000 copies. 
I have applied this method with my clients for over 10 years. Feeling like trying it out?
One book is a small investment and has the potential to change your life.

blurb: A Multi-Collaborative illustrated 40-card Oracle Deck with an accompanying guidebook and merchandise for the full golden experience!
description: A Multi-Collaborative illustrated 40-card Oracle Deck with an accompanying guidebook and merchandise for the full golden experience!
name: Epitaffio Oracle Deck
title: Epitaffio Oracle Deck
Title: Epitaffio Oracle Deck
Description: A Multi-Collaborative illustrated 40-card Oracle Deck with an accompanying guidebook and merchandise for the full golden experience!
Link: Epitaffio Oracle DeckA Multi-Collaborative illustrated 40-card Oracle Deck with an accompanying guidebook and merchandise for the full golden experience!
description_story:
Story







What we need isn’t bravery from being back into a corner, what we need is resolve. Resolve is the ability to forge a path through the darkest night!









⠀⠀EPITAFFIO is a collaborative Oracle deck crafted by 48 passionate contributors around the world. In this, you will find that everyone on board are fans like you; people who have experienced the story through manga and/or anime, and have come together to create something that can be used on a daily basis, something that continues the love for these characters. With so much love poured into this project, we hope you’ll be able to see it in EPITAFFIO.
What is an Oracle Deck?
⠀⠀An oracle deck is a thematic card deck that can provide the readee answers and guidance regarding a certain inquiry among the topic the deck is crafted towards.
⠀⠀It differs from Tarot in that it does not follow a system strictly, and it can be anything because it is not bound by any rules. An oracle deck is what its creator designs it to be, so every oracle deck is different. And because an oracle deck is relatively unstructured, it can be an easier starting point for beginners. It can be used on its own or paired with tarot spreads, so it is a really flexible divination tool!
Why an Oracle Deck instead of a Tarot?
⠀⠀Other than the oracle deck’s accessibility to readers of any level, we saw that its freedom and unstructured nature would house our Part 5 characters best. Each character has their own unique symbolism and themes that would be limited under Tarot’s system, so we chose to create an oracle deck to be able to showcase the maximum possible potential of each of our beloved characters.

























⠀⠀EPITAFFIO features the writings and illustrations from 8 writers and 28 artists around the world. The messages this deck primarily holds pertain to inner growth, self-discovery, overcoming adversity, developing trust, and accepting the self to name a few, just like how our heroes evolved in their journey with their conviction and resolve.
⠀⠀Beginning as a 32-card deck that showcases major characters of Part 5, it is automatically upgradable to 40 cards through the stretch goal. We start off with the boy who has a dream, who eventually grows into his bloodline, then meeting the people who change his life as he does theirs. As his journey unfolds, so do the people he meets get depicted in the deck. 









⠀⠀The cards will measure 70x120mm (standard tarot size), and be printed on 350gsm white core paper, with a matte varnish finish. Gilded edges for the cards is available for upgrade as another stretch goal. The deck will be housed in a two-piece rigid box, with the cover designed by Lanhacy!


THE GUIDEBOOK









⠀⠀The accompanying guidebook is a 72-page book that comes in PDF version with every purchase of the deck. Inside contains each card’s individual artwork and its interpretation, plus unique spreads that can be used with this Oracle deck.
⠀⠀The guidebook is also available in physical copy as a SGD$21/USD$15 ADD-ON.









⠀⠀The guidebook will be printed as a 148x210mm perfect-bound paperback on 170gsm matte paper stock, complete with a matte cover. The paper stock and size of the physical book are available for upgrade as stretch goals. 
⠀⠀Every physical copy of the guidebook comes with a bookmark designed by Dyalexa.

















⠀⠀Our talented contributors have helped to manifest this deck. With their love for these characters and this project, they worked hard to bring EPITAFFIO to life.  For the full list of contributors with their portfolio links, please visit our Carrd!









































































⠀⠀We have prepared some stretch goals in order to keep moving forward in our journey! These goals include improving the quality of the items offered. This project wouldn’t have been possible without the interest and support of many of you all these months, so we hope to give back as much as you all have given us!









⠀⠀★⠀Deck expansion — Unlocks at SGD$4,325. When the goal is met, every order placed for the deck will automatically be upgraded to 40 cards at no extra cost!
⠀⠀★⠀Gilded card edges — Unlocks at SGD$7,220. When the goal is met, all 40 cards of the deck will get a gilded edge finish at no extra cost!
⠀⠀★⠀Free acrylic charm — Unlocks at SGD$10,315. When the goal is met, every order placed on bundles with physical merch (Crescita and Sogno bundles) will get an additional charm at no extra cost!
⠀⠀★⠀Paper stock upgrades — Unlocks at SGD$15,900. When the goal is met, the Guidebook will be upgraded to have a soft-touch cover along with thicker paper, and A5 prints will be produced on a thicker card stock.
⠀⠀★⠀Physical guidebook size upgrade — Unlocks at SGD$24,780. When the goal is met, all orders with physical guidebooks will be upgraded from A5 to A4 size at no extra cost!









PAYMENT INFORMATION
⠀⠀Kickstarter works with most major-brand credit and debit cards worldwide that allow international payments.
⠀⠀If the project were to not be successfully funded, Kickstarter’s system would not charge your credit card for your pledge amount. Your card will only be charged if the campaign is successful and we have reached our main goal of funding the project.
⠀⠀In the payment section, you can pick up the physical guidebook with the bookmark as an add-on to your pledged bundle.









⠀⠀★⠀I don’t have a credit/debit card but still want to purchase. What can I do?
⠀⠀If the campaign is successful, we will be opening a preorder period on Etsy for backorders (duration to be announced later). Etsy allows alternate payment methods such as Paypal. If you happen to miss this period, in the future we will be selling the leftovers in the store as well.
⠀⠀* Take note that we will be offering within the bundles the stretch goals that get unlocked during the Kickstarter campaign.
⠀
IMPORTANT FOR UK CUSTOMERS
⠀⠀We are NOT able to accept any physical orders from the United Kingdom (UK) at this time due to the recent changes, as of January 2021, made to their VAT regulations. If you are a UK customer during this leftover sale period, we will unfortunately be refunding your pledge. For more information, please visit the UK government guidance website discussing VAT taxes in overseas businesses.
⠀⠀UK customers can wait until the backorder period since Etsy’s platform allows us to manage VAT from purchases.
⠀
⠀⠀★⠀Can I choose to pledge later instead then?
⠀⠀We highly advise against it unless you truly have no means to pledge to Kickstarter, since it could affect the development and success of the campaign itself and the stretch goals to be unlocked. We hope you understand and lend us cooperation in these matters.
⠀⠀Backorder period is meant to be for people who: 

  Don’t have any payment method accepted by Kickstarter; 
  Are from the UK due to VAT regulations; or, 
  Happened to find the project late after the campaign closed and still wish to pre-order.

 










SHIPPING INFORMATION
⠀⠀Backers will be charged for shipping after the campaign successfully ends. When filling out your information please ensure that your address is correct and valid when we prepare to ship backer orders out.
⠀⠀We will be shipping from the United States with the United States Post Office (USPS). Backers will receive their orders and be provided with tracking numbers after our production is complete and we ensure that all items are of the utmost quality. We will make sure all backers are aware of when our shipping period begins.
⠀⠀If you need to request an address change before the shipping period begins, please inform us as early as possible so that we will have an adequate amount of time to correct your address.









GENERAL INFORMATION
⠀⠀This is a general idea of what will happen once this Kickstarter campaign ends, for those who may be unfamiliar with the process. 









Please refer to the FAQ section for more questions answered!

-Potential delays in manufacturing and shipping have to be taken into account given the ongoing global pandemic.

blurb: A book of getting along with nature and wildlife.
description: A book of getting along with nature and wildlife.
name: JOJO Children's Picture Book
title: JOJO Children's Picture Book
Title: JOJO Children's Picture Book
Description: A book of getting along with nature and wildlife.
Link: JOJO Children's Picture BookA book of getting along with nature and wildlife.
description_story:
StoryMEET THE INSPIRATION BEHIND THE BOOK
Hi, my name is Aria. I am a first-time author, a mother of two, and wife to the adventurous hubby! We love nature so much that we spend most of our time outdoors with the kids. We have thrived and grown so much through interacting with nature.
In return, I wrote the story Jojo to raise awareness in kids to protect our nature.  
INTRODUCTION
Jojo is a fiction picture book about getting along with the wildlife. The main character, Jojo, is a special girl who can speak to animals. In the story, she solves the conflict between her brother and the animals. Her special ability has also brought her to the treasure keeper of the rainforest. 



Jojo's father hunted animals for his family.








Jojo is strange among her people because she doe not eat meat.








She accidentally discovered her ability to talk to animal








Abhi need to learn to get along with the animals.





*It is a 30 pages fully illustrated digital picture book, best for age 6 and above. 









The main character, Jojo, is based on the image of my daughter, Boo. Jojo is the virtual image of Boo, who is going on a mission to save the rainforest.
Watch the story of Boo here. 









Jojo is UNIQUE, LOVING and BRAVE. 
Jojo is UNIQUE among her people, because she doesn't eat meat. That is because she wants to protect the animal. Jojo is LOVING. She risked her life to save her brother from the animal. Jojo is BRAVE to negotiate with the animals when she was rescuing her brother.
We hope to bring the positive energy to kids all around the world!
 OUR MISSION 









We want to raise awareness in kids to protect mother nature through the picture book Jojo. We would like to encourage kids to immerse themselves in mother nature as well.
Besides that, we also pay attention to kid’s wellbeing. We want to encourage kids to be unique, courageous, and adventurous at the same time.
 CONTRIBUTE TO Mother Nature 









Rainforests are an important part of life on our planet. They provide us with the air we breathe, and they are home to plants and animals too. Yet, towards the end of 2019 and the start of 2020, forest fires started to destroy the forests of the Amazon, Australia, and Indonesia.
We have lost several forests within half a year, but to regrow a forest takes decades. With all the forest we have lost, the time to start regrowing them is now.
Half of your pledge will go to Danau Girang Field Centre (DGFC). DGFC is a collaborative research centre located in the east coast of Sabah and dedicated to the applied conservation of tropical ecosystems and the effective management of wildlife in a fragmented landscape. FOLLOW THEM HERE.
By repairing areas of rainforest, we will be increasing forest connectivity which is an essential part of saving the orangutan and other endangered species.
Danau Girang Field Centre will manage the donation and use our donation to regrow the rainforest on appropriate sites.
The number of trees planted will be monitored and reported back. Danau Girang Field Centre will track the growth of the planted trees. We will get the updates on the amount of carbon taken out of the atmosphere, as well as other social, environmental, and economic impacts.
EXTRA VALUE!!!!









 We decided to go green this time. We do not want to cut down any tree to print our book since we are going to regrow the rainforest. 
In addition to thank you for supporting our Kickstarter project, we will be adding another ebook in the pledge!
Jojo features indigenous people, Sun Bear, Clouded Leopard, Proboscis Monkey, Orangutan, and some other endangered animals. Your pledge will include an ebook that introduces the endangered animals of Borneo that were featured in Jojo.
Let’s learn about the endangered animals of Borneo with Jojo!









Follow Woah Wild Wild (www.instagram.com/woahwildwild) to get more information.
With a combination of personal funds and your pre-orders/contributions, it will help us pay for the following:

  Illustrations
  Regrow the rainforests and protect the wildlife
description_risks:
There is really no risk in contributing. Our e-book has been in the works well over a year, and we are beyond excited to get it to kids and families all over the world.

We have copyrighted our e-book. We have already personally invested a large sum in bringing this e-book to life, and we are so close to making this dream a reality.

Thank you so much for coming along on this journey with us. We appreciate you all so much!

blurb: OFFWIIGO is a multi-functional and stylish bag brand, that specifically offers cross-body/belt bag for both genders.
description: OFFWIIGO is a multi-functional and stylish bag brand, that specifically offers cross-body/belt bag for both genders.
name: OFF WII GO
title: OFF WII GO
Title: OFF WII GO
Description: OFFWIIGO is a multi-functional and stylish bag brand, that specifically offers cross-body/belt bag for both genders.
Link: OFF WII GOOFFWIIGO is a multi-functional and stylish bag brand, that specifically offers cross-body/belt bag for both genders.
description_story:
Story





about OFFWIIGO OFFWIIGO is a multi-functional and stylish bag brand based and developed in Singapore. Our main priority was to offer a high-quality utility bag for both boys and girls. We specifically developed cross body bags that can also be worn as a belt bag, that is suitable for a casual day out and when traveling.behind OFFWIIGO 
The idea to specifically build a cross body bag brand is because, cross body bags are still considered frivolous by the majority, but has a unique appearance to me. Somehow the cross body bag seems very practical and brings a different character and fashion out of me. I wanted my hands on one of these bags. My search was halted when I found that the cross body bags I wanted are either too expensive or extremely hard to purchase during to its exclusivity. When finding cheaper alternatives, I was sad to see there were only functional cross body bags that weren’t stylish. Rather than to continue my search I set a plan to create my own cross body bag and bring my personality into the brand.Features and SpecsAll of OFFWIIGO’s cross body bags are multifunctional, in a sense that it can be worn on both the chest and waist. With two options, you can pull off two different looks with just the one piece.





OFFWIIGO is made with Nylon, to protect the interior from rain and water. Every bag is built with a compartment inside the bag, that easily fits an iPhone plus models. There are many compartments in the bag that fits travel documents and everyday necessities such as passport, cigarette pack and power bank.All three designs of OFFWIIGO are available in three different colors; Black, Blue and Olive. All three styles comes in three different sizes. OFFWIIGO1’s size is 10.5”W x 7.5”H x 3.5”D OFFWIIGO2’s size is 10.5”W x 7.5”H x 3”D OFFWIIGO3’s size is 11”W x 6.5”H x 4.2”DHOW WE BEGAN


Mood-board of OFFWIIGO





 



Technical Drawings for all three designs





 







 





 





 TIMELINEJuly - Research and Development of OFFWIIGO October - Kickstarter crowdfunding campaign begins November - Crowdfunding ends December - Production begins February - rewards fulfilled to backers

blurb: Thought Bubbles is a card game created by psychologists to help kids & adults get to know their thoughts in a fun & light-hearted way!
description: Thought Bubbles is a card game created by psychologists to help kids & adults get to know their thoughts in a fun & light-hearted way!
name: Thought Bubbles - The Card Game
title: Thought Bubbles - The Card Game
Title: Thought Bubbles - The Card Game
Description: Thought Bubbles is a card game created by psychologists to help kids & adults get to know their thoughts in a fun & light-hearted way!
Link: Thought Bubbles - The Card GameThought Bubbles is a card game created by psychologists to help kids & adults get to know their thoughts in a fun & light-hearted way!
description_story:
Story"How does an adorable card game manage to be so confronting and affirming at the same time? As someone who's navigating a rewarding but demanding career and still relatively new at married life, I found Thought Bubbles to be a wonderful tool, helping me  to take an aerial view of how I (and others) see myself - but also a close look at what these perceptions mean and how they can shift and change over time. It's easy to play but throws up deep questions along the way. I can't wait to share this with more of my friends and family." - Corrie Tan, Writer and Researcher."I got these cards because I think they would be a really fun and tangible way to talk about helpful and unhelpful thoughts with the kids. I already have a few clients in mind whom I can use them with!" - Alyssa, Clinical Psychologist.





Thought Bubbles is a 56-card deck featuring 7 endearing characters that represent different ways of thinking. Created by a team of psychologists, it offers:
a hands-on way to help children and adults notice and choose their thoughts
a fun activity for family and friends 
an excellent resource for counsellors and therapists
a platform for self-discovery and growth 
As psychologists, we recognise that thoughts are closely tied to the way we feel, act and respond to the situations that occur in our lives.
 There are many types of helpful and unhelpful thoughts but in our line of work, we have found that the Worrier, Victim, Judge and Controller thoughts are especially salient in conditions of stress, anxiety, depression and anger, and often lead to poor self-confidence and low self-esteem. 








When helping people cope with difficult situations and the thoughts and feelings that come with them, psychologists use a range of interventions and approaches.
Some of these interventions include stepping away from the situation, noticing thoughts and feelings with an open mind, considering different ways to see and approach the problem, acceptance and letting go, being kind to self and others, and viewing experiences as opportunities for learning and growth. These ideas and techniques are embodied in the Observer, Problem Solver and Healer thought profiles. 








 There are so many ways to use the cards. These are just THREE examples:
Penny for Your Thoughts
The aim of this activity is to be more aware of your current helpful and unhelpful thoughts – how they impact your life, where they may have come from, and to consider if change may be helpful.

From the pile of cards, pick 5 that best represent how you view the world.
Have a discussion with someone you trust on any of the following – (i) how these thoughts have impacted the way you deal with the world; (ii) how these thoughts came about; and (iii) to consider the possibility of substituting 1 card with another, to cope with the world in a more helpful way.
You can keep a representation of that card with you and notice if it impacts the way you deal with the world.     
​ 
You can also have another person pick 5 cards that best represents how that person views you, and then have a discussion on the difference between how you see yourself and how that person see you. However, this additional suggestion is not recommended in situations where there is some tension between yourself and that person.

Thought Swop
The aim of this game is to collect 1 card from each of the 7 thought profiles to form a set of 7 cards from different profiles. 

Shuffle all the cards and deal out 7 cards to each player.
Starting with player to the left of the dealer, each player picks a card from his hand and tells a short story that is related to the thought without showing the card. 
After each player's turn, other players can then request to swop that card with one of theirs.
The storytelling and exchange of cards continue until one player has accumulated a set of 7 cards from each of the 7 thought profiles. This player is the winner.

Spare a Thought
 
The aim of this game is to be the first to clear all the cards in your hand.
 

Shuffle all the cards.
Deal out 7 cards to each player. Put the rest in a deck in the centre of the table. 
The player to the left of the dealer starts by putting down a card. The next player puts down another card that is in a different thought profile. Subsequent players have to put down cards that are not in the same thought profiles as the ones already on the table. If a player does not have a suitable card, he has to take a card from the deck and keep it in his hand. 
Once thoughts from all 7 profiles have been placed on the table, the set is put aside and a new set starts. 
The winner is the first player who clears all the cards in his hand.


For more examples of ways to play Thought Bubbles, visit our website at www.thoughtbubblesgame.com.
With so many ways to play, the versatility of these cards is limited only by your imagination. Think out of the box!
description_risks:
We are a team of 5 psychologists and a 12 year old artist-in-the-making. It has been several months of working through the concept, completing the artwork and refining every detail to make it a product that we just can't wait to get our hands on. We are so excited that our card game will be coming to you soon!

Please note that while these cards were created by psychologists and may be used as a tool in therapy, they should not be used as a substitute for therapy. Do consult a mental health professional if you need help coping with difficulties in your life.
