blurb: A fun and interactive story about harnessing a love for nature and the actions children can take to help the Earth.
description: A fun and interactive story about harnessing a love for nature and the actions children can take to help the Earth.
name: Bucky The Dino Goes Green Children's Picture Book
title: Bucky The Dino Goes Green Children's Picture Book
Title: Bucky The Dino Goes Green Children's Picture Book
Description: A fun and interactive story about harnessing a love for nature and the actions children can take to help the Earth.
Link: Bucky The Dino Goes Green Children's Picture BookA fun and interactive story about harnessing a love for nature and the actions children can take to help the Earth.
description_story:
Story







A big buck tooth dinosaur who is loved by many children all around the world. Bucky is a character I have been drawing since 15, and I have always dreamed about doing a children's picture book series with him as the main character. Thanks to Kickstarter, my dream came true when I published my first children's book "Bucky The Dino". This campaign is the second book from the Bucky The Dino series.  









Bucky The Dino Goes Green
Bucky loves exploring! But one day, as he was having a snack during his exploration, his sandwich wrapper dropped to the ground. Mr Robin saw and told him, "It's time for you to go green!" 
Join Bucky on adventure to find out what going green means and how you can join him on this journey when you purchase the book!









The story is for children ages 3-8, as it focuses on harnessing the love for nature and actions they can take on to help this planet. At this age, it is best for parents to focus on strengthening their child’s relationship with nature and making them aware of what is around them. So when they grow older, they would have cultivated a habit of protecting the world and appreciating the beauty of nature.

























The story follows Bucky on his journey to find out what going green means. It covers three main learnings – The earth being our home, what are the 3 Rs (reduce, reuse and recycle) and shows examples on how to do it, lastly how to plant and care for a seed. 

















At the end of the book, your children will receive a special Bucky's Go Green Club membership card on the last page, where they can make a pledge by filling in their name and commit to going green! The end of the book also includes a glossary and an infographic with environmental terms and their meanings so they can easily refer to it if they do not remember.









They can also immediately apply what they learn with the items provided in the Bucky's Go Green Club reward.  

















THE GARDENING KIT: The Go green club includes all the items and instructions you need to create your own plant terrarium and a monster recycling bin out of recyclable materials.
For the plant terrarium: Plant the seed paper in the container and use the air dry clay to create clay figures to go along with it. A detailed video tutorial on how to build a Bucky clay figure is included.
For the monster recycling bin: Learn about the different recyclable materials in the PDF environment activity booklet and scavenge for these recyclable materials to build your own monster recycling bin. A detailed video tutorial on how to build one is included. 




Example of plant terrarium and monster recycling bin 













Climate change is a world problem that we all face. We as adults have to play our part to tackle the issue and one of the best things adults can do is to educate young children about how vital it is for us to play our part to help the Earth. After much research, I learnt that many parents want to talk to their kids about caring for the environment but do not know not how and where to start. So I thought what better way to teach kids through a fun and interesting story. 




























Details of items in the go green club reward package





































Writing, drawing and working with children is my passion. As I continue my journey a self-published author illustrator, I hope to find more ways to help bring awareness to important issues that children face through books. I also hope that Bucky can become an icon of positivity to everyone in the world. With your help, we can make this book happen and share this fantastic story so that many children will not only enjoy reading it, but also understand the importance of taking care of our environment.

















The Support
I want to thank my family and friends who have always supported me in pursuing my dreams, especially Jun is always there for me.
Any questions about Bucky The Dino? Don't hesitate to contact me at buckythedinosaur@gmail.com

However due to COVID-19, there might still be unforeseen production delays. Even then, I will do my very best to deliver the rewards by the provided date and keep you all updated.

blurb: A beautiful timepiece for the modern sophisticated woman.
description: A beautiful timepiece for the modern sophisticated woman.
name: Twilight Glint: Ladies' automatic watch
title: Twilight Glint: Ladies' automatic watch
Title: Twilight Glint: Ladies' automatic watch
Description: A beautiful timepiece for the modern sophisticated woman.
Link: Twilight Glint: Ladies' automatic watchA beautiful timepiece for the modern sophisticated woman.
description_story:
Story


















Links to the reviews can be found at the bottom of this page





























Our Watch Collection   












































Top right photo of "The Silver" courtesy of @thatwatchwriter





Our design features 












































































An exploded technical view of the Twilight Glint



















You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play


































Replay with sound









Play with 
 sound












00:00


00:00


















































Why wear an automatic watch? 
Mechanical watches have hundreds of tiny gears moving together as one and are characterised by the smooth glide of the seconds hand across the watch face. They are powered by hand-winding and in the case of an automatic like ours, the motions of the wearer's wrist are converted into energy by means of a rotor and powers the watch- there are no batteries in our watches! 
Generally, the world of mechanical watches is a niche market, and one dominated by men. Mechanical wristwatches comprise only 3% of the international watch market, out of which three-quarters comprises men’s watches. This means that less than 1% of watches in the world comprise of ladies mechanical wristwatches. We hope to introduce women to the beauty of mechanical watches and change the way women wear and think about watches, one watch at a time!    




Close-up wrist picture of the Twilight Glint in Rosegold
















Want to see more photos? A gallery of high-resolution images can be found here.





Rewards
Select a reward for any watch(es) in our collection. You will receive a survey to specify the model, colour and strap afterwards. 

























Can't decide between the metal bracelet and Italian calf leather strap? Why not get both since our straps are inter-changeable anyway! Or, get an additional strap. 
After you select your reward, manually add US$60 / S$80 to your pledge amount for each additional strap. We will contact you to select the colour of the strap and buckle after the campaign ends. 
Production Schedule
We will deliver the watches worldwide by May 2020.  




Production Timeline: Delivery worldwide by May 2020





About our founder  




Sherrie Han, Founder of The Eliana Timekeeper





I started The Eliana Timekeeper as a passion project and it has now taken on a life of its own. It was difficult for me to find a mechanical watch that I liked or could afford; the options available were either too masculine or overly-decorated. Most of my friends were unaware of the difference between a mechanical and a quartz watch, while those who were aware, felt that mechanical/ automatic watches were either too expensive or chunky. This is why I wanted to make my own watch- to introduce more women to mechanical watches. The watches are named after my firstborn,  and I hope you'll enjoy our watches as much as I know she will.
If you have any thoughts or queries, feel free to reach me directly at sherrie@elianatimekeeper.com. You can also view our media kit here. I hope you'll enjoy our watches!
                                                                                                Yours Sincerely, Sherrie Han
Links to reviews of the Twilight Glint:
1. MasterHorologer 2. The Time Bum 3. Haulogerie, 4. Wristwatch Review UK 
5. Crown, 6. Wah so shiok!
description_risks:
Risk on your end is minimal as production has already started. We have already purchased all the movements and are ready to start mass manufacturing as soon as the orders are collated.  

An in-house support capability has also been established to handle the rare occurrence of any mechanical/ workmanship issues on our end, meaning your warranty is well-validated.

Import Duty & VAT will be an additional cost for some countries. We do not take responsibility for any additional cost incurred that is subjected to your countries import rules and regulations.

Delays in manufacturing are the biggest challenge. We have mitigated the risk of delay by launching our Kickstarter with a limited-edition run of only 360 watches. This small production run allows us to have greater quality control over each timepiece and the manufacturing timeline. 

Customs delays are another challenge- we will keep you updated if we face any unexpected delays here!

blurb: Equipment To Navigate The Uncertainties of Our External Environment
description: Equipment To Navigate The Uncertainties of Our External Environment
name: Archetype System-01: Engineered For Our Evolving Environment
title: Archetype System-01: Engineered For Our Evolving Environment
Title: Archetype System-01: Engineered For Our Evolving Environment
Description: Equipment To Navigate The Uncertainties of Our External Environment
Link: Archetype System-01: Engineered For Our Evolving EnvironmentEquipment To Navigate The Uncertainties of Our External Environment
description_story:
Story







SYSTEM-01 - Equipment For Navigating An Evolving Environment









THE BEGINNING
Since the beginning of humanity, what we wear have always imbued us with protective qualities, from weather conditions (physical) and perceptions by society (psychological). We are going back to this fundamental quality of clothes — to explore and evolve the protective qualities of what we wear according to our evolved environment. We started with this question to help us define the scope of this project: how are we able to reimagine what we wear to better navigate this current climate?









We have already been developing protection-driven products what we thought could help individuals commute better. From the start, we wanted to realise a wonder material, Graphene, that we discovered two years ago, into a product. Extensive sourcing took us through many forms of graphene on the market. Finally, we have discovered a blend that can boast performance and comfort that is completely aligned with our objectives in this scenario.

















Together with our team of experienced tailors, we crafted these fabrics into a system of three highly functional garments - a short-sleeve T-Shirt, a long-sleeve turtle neck T-Shirt, and a technical hoodie/jacket to form this starting launch. This utility-driven drop forms the foundation pieces for readying any wardrobe for our lives in our new future. Every face covering within this series has been integrated with an additional layer of replaceable filter.


Pro Techwear - Evolved Techwear That Protects
SYSTEM-01 is techwear that is meant to improve the existing protective functions of the garments by imbuing it with antimicrobial and antiviral technology (With respect to Kickstarter's new guidelines and regulations, do visit our website for a detailed breakdown of the technology). Even as you are reading this, the work continues - we continue to improve our products, with the central objective around creating products that helps individuals better navigate the changes in our current evolving environment.











Important: 
These products are not medical/health devices or personal protective equipment to prevent the current viral threats and are not substitutes for following the relevant social distancing guidelines which include practicing good personal hygiene, such as frequently washing your hands and not touching your face. 
Please adhere the rules and safety regulations set by your respective medical and scientific authorities at all times. Archetype Equipment makes no claims about the medical benefits of using this product.


Thyra - Short-Sleeved T-Shirt
Made with graphene-infused yarns and embedded with an expandable side  seam zip, Thyra conceals an inner travel pocket for ease of access and security, designed for mobility and as a base layer for a life that is constantly on the move.

















Leja - Long-Sleeved T-Shirt w/ Built-In Mask
Constructed with a combination of Graphene and Sorona, and lined with copper-ion infused yarns at strategic areas, the Leja incorporates a built-in mask/snood that not only shields the wearer against airborne liquid particles from the external environment, but also doubles up as a heat regulating neck warmer when unfolded.

















Hakaan - Technical Jacket/Hoodie w/ Detachable Mask
The Hakaan is developed with a removable mask/snood and a hood integrated with a moulded visor for additional protection against the harmful elements of the environment (e.g. UV rays). Packable and modular in nature, the jacket is adapted for the current needs and integrable with future Archetype products.

















ENGINEERED GRAPHENE GARMENTS
We hate to admit it but like everybody else, we do not like wearing a mask. It is cumbersome and inconvenient but it saves lives. Masks have become increasingly important accessories for us to protect ourselves in the current pandemic. Created with the primary objective of providing accessibility and enhanced protection against the harmful elements of our current external environment, System-01 focuses on the leveraging on the protective properties of Graphene, Copper and Titanium Dioxide while extending functionalities well beyond our current challenges. Every garment has been crafted with its own unique features to drive utility and performance for your daily commute. We have even included copper-ion infused lining at strategic areas on Leja and Hakaan (as indicated) to improve the facial shielding of the user against threats from our external environment.

















System-01 is just one of many systems that will be introduced into Archetype's future range of designs. Continual improvements will be made to the system through the development of new add-ons and products as we reiterate our products to better serve your evolving needs.

































These gears are designed to fit both genders. For woman's sizing, just  order a size down (e.g. if you usually wear a size S, order an XS).  Please refer to the following table for a more concise fit.









If you have any additional questions about the sizing and fit, do let us know via emailing us at help@archetypeeqmt.com.









Like most black garments, we recommend you to wash with like colours and  mild detergent on cold. Do not tumble dry and line dry instead. Do not iron and do not dry clean. Do not bleach or use fabric softeners as  these chemicals will damage the structure of the graphene and the integrity of the fabric and additional coating.













About Archetype
Archetype is built upon a foundation of overcoming adversities and an innate curiosity around new technology and  advanced materials. We believe that innovation happens as a response to extraordinary circumstances and we are defying the status quo to enable individuals in realising their human potential by pushing the boundaries of technological applications and material evolution.


We are driven and united by the pursuit of utility and performance, advancing human potential by pushing the boundaries of technological applications and material evolution. We are redefining how we interact with and solve problems within a rapidly shifting environment.
description_risks:
Our team has a combined of more than 50 years of experience manufacturing garments and international business. It has definitely taken some time for us to put the team together, to ensure that we will be able to deliver you a quality product at the end of the campaign. We are extremely confident of our partners and have done extensive sampling and testing with them to ensure that we are able to do right by our supporters/backers.

We are definitely expecting obstacles along the way during production. But like any other adversity, we are going overcome these hurdles. The most important thing for us to you backers is communication. We will communicate to you clearly when any problem arises, and in a transparent manner. We will provide you the reassurance with our updates to inform you on our phases of developing solutions to resolve the issues.

Supply Chain:

We are working with numerous suppliers and specialists to ensure the highest quality of the product is made before assembling it together in Singapore. Especially with the ongoing trade war between China and USA and the pandemic, we are navigating the different trade routes and larger volume manufacturers (should the need arises) in order to ensure that we are able to deliver the items to you at the lowest cost possible. Fabric delays are the norm in this industry due to customs issues but we have set a time buffer for us to resolve that. There will always be a contingency plan.

Thank you so much for making this happen!

title: Pramie Trifold Wallet
Title: Pramie Trifold Wallet
Description: Full-grained Smooth Leather Wallet, RFID-blocking technology and quick access to your cards for a sleek style to complement your EDC
Link: Pramie Trifold WalletFull-grained Smooth Leather Wallet, RFID-blocking technology and quick access to your cards for a sleek style to complement your EDC
description_story:
StoryWe're really passionate about the wallet industry, and we believe that minimalism and sleek designs are the way to go in the future. We are determined to spearhead this revolution towards tinier, thinner wallets, without compromising style, utility and storage.


We created a design to fit your everyday-carry into and brought it to life using full-grain smooth leather. The wallet is not only thinner than most and minimally larger than the size of the card, the pull-tab function of the wallet allows you to instantly access your cards, avoiding that awkward moment when a waiter waits for you to whip out your credit card. 


Any contribution at all will take us a step nearer towards fulfilling our dream of revolutionising the everyday-carry industry by helping us with the capital required to achieve such a goal.



Mystic Blue








Stone Black








Leather Brown
description_risks:
Given the fact that we have already done a pilot run with the design and materials, the product will be relatively easy to manufacture and deliver. There will not be any nasty surprises along the way or products that turn out drastically different from our ideal.

However, the cost price of such products are not cheap for such premium materials, and without a sizeable outreach, it is difficult for us to depend on economies of scale to produce these wallets.

description_story:
StoryIs this you?







We’ve all experienced the problems lost socks brings. The rush, the fuss and the never ending madness; in search of that runaway sock. Why are socks designed only to look good with their other half? That’s exactly what we thought.

Missing Socks a norm?







The mystery of missing socks have been around for ages.Many even try wearing only 1 type of sock to combat the issue. Regardless the solution, it’s almost impossible to keep track of every single sock we own. To err is human and losing socks might just be part of our genetics - think about it.Fret not, here's something just for youIntroducing...




Heart is a Shape





 




Very Very Straight





 


Doting Love





 



The Polyamorous Socks





The Polyamorous Socks







 


12 designs to go nuts over & 132 combinations to fall in love with!





 









Designer Socks without the MarkupWe need your support to make this dream come true! What's better, you get good quality designer socks without the unnecessary markup like those you get from those design stores!







Design PanelWe only want the very best. Hence, we've worked with some people to give you only the best.


Design Panel





These socks you see here went through rounds of eliminations and iterations, under the scrutinising eyes of our design panel.







With countless prototyping, endless rounds of mismatching, and sleepless nights on our part, you’ll never need to worry about ugly socks ever.Designers go for Quality







 


Extreme Stretchability fits all feet sizes





 









Timeline







Find Us







  







  PressIf you find our idea interesting and would like to connect with us, please do not hesitate to drop us an email at hello@thepolyamoroussocks.com. Download our press kit here.
description_risks:
The only risk we can think of is the socks getting lost in transit, but that's not possible since we're not transporting it in the socks eating washing machine that's in your house.

On a more serious note, should the factory not be able to meet our production deadline, we may need to delay the delivery by a maximum of one month (estimated). 

Additionally, we're not responsible for any polyamorous relationships between your socks, you and your socks, or you and anyone else, or anyone else with anyone else.

For any queries, please do not hesitate to contact hello@thepolyamoroussocks.com

blurb: A cybernoir adventure inspired by the classic Carmen Sandiego games.
description: A cybernoir adventure inspired by the classic Carmen Sandiego games.
name: Chinatown Detective Agency: Globetrotting Mystery Adventure
title: Chinatown Detective Agency: Globetrotting Mystery Adventure
Title: Chinatown Detective Agency: Globetrotting Mystery Adventure
Description: A cybernoir adventure inspired by the classic Carmen Sandiego games.
Link: Chinatown Detective Agency: Globetrotting Mystery AdventureA cybernoir adventure inspired by the classic Carmen Sandiego games.
description_story:
Story

WE'RE 100% FUNDED (AND COUNTING!)
TIME FOR SOME STRETCH GOALS!









REWARDS UPDATE!
Hey there! We're overwhelmed by our backers' support and decided to sweeten the deal for some of our reward tiers by including some new stuff - no extra charge, completely free (including for everyone who has already bought these tiers)!
ALL TIERS FROM $150 AND ABOVE (STARTING FROM THE SENIOR DETECTIVE TIER) WILL NOW INCLUDE A NEW REWARD:




There was an urgency in his voice. He said he was fine, but his nervous tone gave me an inkling that he was in danger...





AND BECAUSE OF POPULAR DEMAND, OUR SOLD-OUT TIER, TALKING SUPER SLEUTH, IS BACK IN THE FORM OF A NEW TIER: LOQUACIOUS SUPER SLEUTH! THIS TIER, ALONG WITH ALL HIGHER SUCCEEDING TIERS, WILL ALSO INCLUDE A NEW REWARD:




Dubai, Mexico City, Jakarta... the souvenir magnets on her refrigerator hinted at a life well travelled. I wonder where she disappeared to this time...





We can't update the descriptions of the old reward tiers, but rest assured it'll be part of the respective tiers. Please check out the FAQ for more info.




























Just some of the news and content outlets that have covered Chinatown Detective Agency.





            

          

The world is in flux, as the global economy nears the nadir of its decade-long collapse
Singapore stands as a last refuge of order but even here the government struggles on the brink of chaos. Private detectives are now the first call for those citizens able to afford a semblance of justice.




Amira Darma, the game's protagonist, is no thug. But she's no pushover either...





That’s where you come in. You are Amira Darma, once a rising star at INTERPOL, now a freshly minted Private Investigator in the heart of Chinatown, and your first client is about to walk through your door...




Old mentors make great first customers.





























































From the studio behind indie game Terroir, Chinatown Detective Agency is a cybernoir point and click adventure blending stunning retro design with innovative mechanics. Manage your agency and use real world research to solve cases as you unravel a global conspiracy.
Inspired by the classic Carmen Sandiego games of the 80s and 90s, Chinatown Detective Agency is a mystery adventure game that will take you across Singapore and the world in hot pursuit of criminals, witnesses and clues. Solve puzzles and uncover leads using real research and investigation, and manage your time and money to solve cases from clients both well-intentioned and nefarious.
Along the way, untangle a web of conspiracies and plots that threaten to push the Lion City over the edge.
Unravel a global conspiracy
Explore a rich cybernoir future of mystery and intrigue in a world inspired by Blade Runner, The Da Vinci Code and Black Mirror. Travel the globe from your base in Singapore in search of leads, and talk with dozens of uniquely voiced characters each with their own mysterious agendas. 




Sometimes, the clues hide in plain sight.








Not every door is open to Amira. But that's nothing a little hacking can't solve.





A story with multiple outcomes depending on which client you decide to help
Nothing’s ever simple in Singapore. What starts as a routine recon job might be the spark that ignites this whole city. Your choices matter: do you side with the shadowy underworld informant, or root out corruption for a junior politician? In Chinatown Detective Agency, the cases you choose will tell a story all their own, for better...or for worse.




As a private detective, Amira will need to be ready for any situation - including potentially dangerous ones.





Real-world research
Leads and clues are the lifeblood of the detective. In Chinatown Detective Agency, each piece of evidence affects the outcome of your cases, and many puzzles require real investigation through internet research, code breaking and more.




Research. Decipher. Uncover truths. Rinse and repeat.





Although most of the main quest can be finished entirely in-game, if you want to earn your stripes, you’ll have to dig a little deeper. Solving side quests will require genuine investigation, from googling clues, checking an encyclopedia or scouring a map, meaning you’re not just playing an investigator, you’ll have to become one yourself. 
 Work smart (and never skip a meal) 
For a P.I., time is a precious resource. The daily grind of the working Joe is a one-way ticket to fatigue, and tasks have a funny way of taking longer as you tire. It's up to you to make good use of the time you have and to keep your agency, and yourself, alive.
If Amira forgets to take a break, her energy and focus is going to crash. Luckily, there’s the Endurance meter to help you keep tabs. Go too long without food or rest and watch as everything grinds to a halt, quick as a case without leads.




Endurance plays an important role in how well Amira can perform her duties.





Replenish yourself by travelling to the city's best hawkers for a delicious local dish, but remember that nothing in this town is free - some items can turn a budding new detective into a down-on-their-luck bum in the space of a meal.




Restoring Endurance with a hearty local dish is all part of the game.





Assemble a team
You’re new to the P.I. game, but over time you’re bound to make contacts, build a network, maybe even hire some staff. Part of owning your very own private detective agency is having the right kind of support on deck, whether it's an admin assistant to help organise your bills for you and run the office while you're away, or an eager young researcher trying to make a name for themselves.




You never know who you'll meet in Chinatown Detective Agency, so keep an eye out for potentially useful characters.





Chasing down leads and gathering up evidence may pay the bills, but Amira’s not just a detective: she’s a businesswoman. You’ll need to keep your staff happy, and the office running smoothly.
Lose yourself in the future
Neon lamp-light reflected in pools of rainwater. Anti-government graffiti daubed across aging subways. The encroaching murk of riverside London. Explore 30 stunningly rendered tableaus from artist Ricardo Juchem and immerse yourself in the chaotic future of 2032.




Following leads will take you deep into the underbelly of future Singapore.













The game will feature over 30 locations across Singapore and around the world. Travelling is a fundamental part of any detective’s toolkit, so you'll be taking Amira to different cities and locations worldwide.
In Singapore itself, you'll travel to various places inspired by real world locations.




Singapore's Chinatown








The historic Civic District of Singapore








The side streets of Geylang 





Each main location may have a number of sub-locations within, meaning more people and objects for Amira to investigate.




The locations in the game will come alive with NPCs, both human and factory-assembled.





Amira’s no slouch, but even Singapore can be a big place when you're traveling on foot. Getting around efficiently will mean taking the extensive MRT train system that crisscrosses the island.




Travel across the island through the rapidly deteriorating but still-functioning MRT system of Singapore.





Missions will also take you to different locales in every continent around the world. Luckily, the game's HORUS flight booking system is there to make grabbing that last minute red-eye as easy as falling out of bed.




Chinatown Detective Agency is a globe-trotting adventure - and you can't globe-trot without booking your flight tickets. Just keep in mind flights cost money, so make sure you double check your leads to avoid wasted flights.








Inspired by the classic Carmen Sandiego games, you'll be traveling the world as you pursue one lead after another.








The blinding lights of Dotonbori, Osaka








Drones fly past Galata Tower in Istanbul at sundown








The Petronas Towers shine like a beacon above downtown Kuala Lumpur








The encroaching darkness is kept at bay by the faint light of makeshift bonfires in riverside London





Like the locations in Singapore, these cities will have sub-locations that Amira can visit in pursuit of a breakthrough in her cases. The cities we'll be featuring in the game include: London, Osaka, Istanbul, Kuala Lumpur, Toronto, Shanghai, Rio de Janeiro, Dubai, Mexico City, Ho Chi Minh City, Kigali, Athens, Hong Kong, Perth (Australia), Manila, Cairo, Seattle, Busan, Lima, Paris, New Delhi and Jakarta.









Chinatown Detective Agency is a narrative-driven game - and that narrative is anchored in a diverse cast of colourful characters. 

























































Many of the game's important characters are voiced acted, mostly by voice artists from Singapore in order to preserve the nuances of Singapore's own brand of colloquial English (Singlish) and local slang. But the main reason we opted to voice the dialogue is to convey the tension and drama of the story. Here's a sample of an exchange between protagonist, Amira, and one of her most important clients, Rupert Zhou:

            

          









The whine of a lonely synth. The pulse of an electronic bass line. Music plays a crucial role in establishing the atmosphere of Chinatown Detective Agency.
We looked to some of the greatest composers in film for inspiration, with a focus on those who have scored suspense, thriller, mystery and detective movies. Perhaps the most influential were Trent Reznor and Atticus Ross, especially their work on The Social Network and Gone Girl. Other influences include the soundtrack of cult classic Twin Peaks, as well as those songs from the 80s that evoke (at least to Mark when he was writing the game's backstory) an image of Tokyo or Hong Kong caught in the lingering glow of neon lights - "In The Air Tonight" by Phil Collins, "Live to Tell" by Madonna, as well as basically anything by Foreigner.

            

          

The game's soundtrack is being composed and produced by two different musicians: Sean Kolton and Dmitrii Muchkin. Working independently, Sean creates the more contemplative and ambient tracks used during gameplay, while Dmitrii is working on the upbeat and dynamic tracks that you'll hear in the main menu and transition scenes.









We've a selection of varied and rewarding tiers for our backers.
Let’s be honest: we want to make sure a majority of our funding goes straight to the development of the game. To this end we’ve limited our physical rewards to just a couple of items. But because we also want to give our Kickstarter backers the exclusive opportunity to have a hand in the development of the game, we've got something even better,  the ability to add a city of your choice in the game - or you could even be one of the three backers who'll help write a mission in the game!




I got to the drop-off early. No sense waiting around.








There's...something familiar about this place...








Hey...what's that sound?








I never was one for art, but I liked what I saw.








Take this...I'll call you when it's safe.








Singapore is a fine city. Specially for those who keep a mountain of overdue library books at home...








The card was blank...or so I thought.








The Triad wore black, you wore white.








These pages have a clue on them... someone wants to be found.








Just try not to make a scene.








Careful... these walls have ears.








I was going nowhere fast, I needed a change of pace.








As soon as I saw it I knew: this case was the real deal.





You can help bring the game to life by buying one of our available tiers, each with different rewards. Some of them are limited in number, so if you like what you, go and grab it! 

























































































General Interactive Co. is an indie game dev collective consisting mainly of Creative Director, Mark Fillon and Lead Programmer, Jenny Hide. Our lineup changes with every project, but Mark and Jen form the core duo behind each game.
Mark is a writer and digital media creative director by trade, and spent most of his high school years modding the classic games of his generation for his own amusement, including Age of Empires II and Neverwinter Nights. 
As General Interactive Co., Mark and Jenny released Terroir, a winemaking tycoon game in 2017. It was greenlit by the Steam community in 2016, and has been given a generally positive rating by its players. The game is available on Steam, GOG, the Humble Store and the Windows Store.




Click to go to Terroir's Steam page





















Jenny has been programming for the past 7 years, and is also one-half of the indie game label, Fox Tor Games - a recipient of a UK Games Fund sponsorship. Her upcoming game with Fox Tor, CULTIVATE: Before Time, has been in development since 2018, and is planned to be released in 2021.




Jenny is the calmest of the bunch. Seen here is her fixing a game-destroying bug that has turned sentient and has evolved into ransomware. Probably.








Click to visit Fox Tor Games' website













Ricardo Juchem is Chinatown Detective Agency's Art Director. Over the past four years, his work, which has a particular focus on pixel art, has generated a large following (including well known artists in the video game industry), and has graced everything from video games to magazine covers. 




Ricardo is also a certified interior designer. From the University of Awesome Battle Station Design.








Click to visit Future Flashback's website













Alex Kool is the team's animator extraordinaire. With over 7 years experience as a multimedia artist, Alex animates in both 2D and 3D, blending them to create visually striking scenes in the game.




Like many of the characters in the game, Alex is a shadowy figure. We've only ever seen his hands...








Click to follow Alex on Twitter





Sean Kolton and Dmitrii Muchkin are the video game composers behind Chinatown Detective Agency's soundtrack, each with their own unique style designed to give the game two distinct musical tones. Sean composes the more contemplative, analog, Twin Peaks-inspired tracks, while Dmitrii does the more electro-ambient stuff.




Dmitrii Muchkin, Composer





Marvin Paule is a programmer that focuses on the game's U.I. mechanics, as well as the team's QA specialist (our official bug hunter, if you will).
Raf Banzuela is General Interactive Co.'s branding and 2D asset artist. He was the lead 2D artist on Terroir, as well as the artist behind Chinatown Detective Agency's physical products and rewards.
Hinchel Or is the creator of Chinatown Detective Agency's cover art, as well as a character artist.
Charlene Lebrun, Chris Patrick and Adolfo Aguirre - under their PR firm, Player Two PR - oversee Chinatown Detective Agency's marketing, community building and PR efforts. Charlene, formerly of SEGA Europe, has been helping indie devs build their audience and image for over 5 years.
How are we using the funds?
Most of the base game has already been created, and a majority of the funds will go towards producing and developing more content. By content, we mean things like new character locations and environments, new case missions, new characters, more animations, more voice acting -- basically things that make the game richer, more vibrant and have more play-time. Here is a basic breakdown of where the funds will go if we are successful:









More than half will be allocated to programming and art (which includes animation), as these are the essential to content creation, while the next largest share goes to music, audio and voice acting, to give the game a more immersive feel. The rest goes towards marketing the game and the fulfillment of backer rewards.
These allocations aren't set in stone - if there's one thing we learned from doing this before, it's that situations change as the development of the game progresses and new challenges are uncovered (including taking into consideration player and fan feedback - something we try our best to incorporate into our decision making).
description_risks:
We've done our best to make sure our rewards can be created and fulfilled for our backers as easily as possible. We've limited our physical rewards, and instead, have offered rewards that allow backers to be part of the game and its development. We are committed to the quality of the game, and if successful, the campaign will give us runway for the remainder of the year - which should be enough time to complete the game.

Having said that, this doesn't account for unforeseeable events that can and will affect any project - changing team members, quality assurance and testing, issues arising from Unity and the other platforms we depend on and, most of all, the global uncertainty created by the COVID-19 pandemic. None of these challenges and risks are unique to us. We prepare for them by keeping the game's scope focused, and having a network of professionals and freelancers available to fill in gaps that my come up during development.

As a single player game with a semi-linear story, we're confident we can deliver on the game. However, should there be delays, this will affect our release date - and you will be informed beforehand. We'd rather delay Chinatown Detective Agency than release a sub-par version of it.

description_story:
Story
  SHORT SUMMARY
  Picture someone wearing a lot of skull designs – on their jacket, shirt, pants, all over. You’d know immediately what image they were trying to project. Now, do you picture that same person fitting into a professional environment?
  High-paying workplaces often spell sartorial compromise. But there’s still a personality beneath every go-getter and team player. What if you could wear just one skull, in a strategic place where it looks smooth and subtly stunning? Could they pull it off in a professional ensemble?
  French Yuppie recognizes the need in each person, to give a nod to their rebel soul, no matter what social context is holding them down. That’s why our new line is sure to get a look of admiration when noticed topping off your workday ensemble. It’s called “Cranium.”
  We feature six varieties – five featuring the skull, and one fleur-de-lis whose contours hint at the cranial. Pick your favorite, or splurge on the entire collection if you’re all about skulls. ONLY 100 PIECES WILL BE PRODUCE EACH WITH INDIVIDUAL EDITION NUMBER regardless of the material use (Titanium or Sterling Silver )
  These rings retail will at US$330 for Titanium and US$285 for sterling silver. But contributors to this campaign will get discounts the public will never see again – nearly 40% off.
  The savings compound the more you contribute. And, for the distinguished buyer who can’t bear to split up this collection, we have an extra special offer. Receive 3 rings and one of our high-craft leather-and-sterling-silver bracelets for free – up to a $60 value.
  Want to make it your own? Get it engraved on the inside, up to 13 characters. Looking for a bit of a different shade? We can cast these designs in gold or other metals. For an extra price, you can claim these custom features for a truly one-of-a-kind ring.


  THE COLLECTION
  


POISON





 




GRILLES





 




HONEYCOMB





 




SHADOW STRIPE





 




BLACK SHEEP





 




FLEUR-DE-LIS







EXTRA REWARDS



DOUBLE WRAP SILVER TOGGLE BUTTON BRACELET





 



SILVER TOGGLE BUTTON BRACELET





 



TWISTED DOUBLE-BAND BRACELET





 



  WHY WE NEED YOUR SUPPORT
  As you can see, French Yuppie already has a system in place to produce sleek and tasteful sterling silver rings. However, that system can be better and faster.
  French Yuppie is reinvesting its profits toward in-house production equipment. This means we can test out more new lines faster, offer you an expanded array of inventory, and offer them to you at a lower price.
  These special discounts are my way of giving back to a community that believes in our vision. We can’t wait to build a network with people who shop crowdfunding sites for new fashions – some of the smartest and most savvy around. You can join this network with any small contribution. Our aim is to link you up with the styles you love.



  SPREAD THE WORD
  Skulls in the workplace? There’s a lot of meat there for a lively debate on social media. Use a link to our campaign on social media to illustrate that debate – especially if you picture yourself in something like French Yuppie. We appreciate the buzz that can only come from the world’s most stylish shoppers like you.
  Website: frenchyuppie.com
  Facebook: /FrenchYuppie
  Instagram: /frenchyuppie

name: Shades of Gold: Modern Tarot Deck in the "New World"
title: Shades of Gold: Modern Tarot Deck in the "New World"
Title: Shades of Gold: Modern Tarot Deck in the "New World"
Description: Reconnecting you with your true self to EXPERIENCE, LOVE,& HEAL
Link: Shades of Gold: Modern Tarot Deck in the "New World"Reconnecting you with your true self to EXPERIENCE, LOVE,& HEAL
description_story:
StoryABOUT SHADES OF GOLD - EXPERIENCE, HEAL & LOVE











Shades of Gold Tarot is for those interested in experiencing the old teachings in the "New World". It’s intended for those willing to deepen connection with their true selves, accept and make small changes that will ultimately lead you toward the true divine nature of yourself. The tarot is extremely unique that the drawings and design were created by the Author itself through meditation and intuitive downloads of guided Divine messages for the collective in the now.
Your current life journey depicts not just how strong you as an individual has become, but what you can change and how you can trust to continue to develop as a true God-within soul. Shades of Gold  assists you on this journey, helping you in any blockages, reaffirming the paths you have embarked on and most importantly provides you with the answers you are seeking.
This is not your traditional tarot cards instead, it’s unique on that has been created with one of its own yet identifiable through the hidden messages and identification numbers to that of the old in major and minor cards although not all. Once you have learnt the book, the cards, and most importantly what the images mean to you, you are requested to utilise your intuition for different circumstances and work accordingly with the Divine.


STRUCTURE OF THE DECK
Shades of Gold comprises of the following cards:

  22 Major Arcanas, 
   16 Court Cards + 4 Aces,  
  7 Chakra cards, and 
  10 Special Cards.



 MAJOR ARCANAS 
The major arcana does not utilise common archetypes as traditional tarot although it still embraces the underlying meaning to an extent. Every card symbolises a more evident sense of looking at self, the changes, the possible occurrences incoming and the past being let go in a World where the old must be retained in terms of value in meaning but has to make way for looking at more of a new viewpoint.




Major Arcanas 





COURT CARDS AND ACES 
Aces and court cards in this deck maintain the elemental symbols and the growth of self. They symbolise an individual’s growth, what they have and know, how they can or have transformed and the essence of themselves and Divinity they acquire within. It embraces who you were, are and most importantly what you can become.




Court Cards & Aces of All Elements





CHAKRA CARDS 
The Chakra cards hold the meaning in all the 7 chakras in a higher perspective viewpoint. They teach you how aligned you are or if you are experiencing blockages. It gives a chance for individuals to understand that the circumstances and their viewpoints can be changed by working on proper alignment and guarding the energy within.




Chakra cards





UNIQUE HIGHER MESSAGE CARDS
The Unique Higher Message Cards are very special as the individual only is requested to use and pull them out of the deck when the necessity arrives that they are Divinely guided. The essentiality of these cards is for those who are on the spiritual journey or higher purpose and have pressing questions to whatever they may be experiencing that cannot be deciphered by the norm. These cards are unique as they are the only ones not to be read in reversals due to the higher messages they truly hold.




Unique Higher Message Cards 





Look at the cards and let them speak to you intuitively. Take time to understand what they mean to you by looking at the aspects of the images and how they can translate for different situations in today's world.


 THE COMPLETION SPREAD
The idea of this spread is to discover the conscious and subconscious mind, shining lights of who you are, were, and capable of becoming. Before beginning, meditate with your eyes close, take 5 slow, deep breaths and when ready, shuffle them and lay them out as described below.




The Completion Spread







First Card: The Antedecent
This card symbolises the circumstances you were in and what you have left behind as an individual.


Second Card: The Prevalence
The next represent who you currently are at this moment and the circumstances surrounding your possible behavior.


Third Card: The Vocation
The context of this card resembles the forthcoming of the journey you can embark on and your hopes and dreams which will be widely based on what falls out following the second card, your present.


Top Cards: Blessings
The upper cards encompassed two cards that represent higher messages designed to guide you to have faith to either transform/continue on the journey you have embarked on.


* 1 SGD dollar from each pledge that you make will be donated by us to either of the 3 following charitable organizations in Singapore: 

  Habitat for Humanity Singapore 

https://www.habitat.org.sg/project-homeworks

  Metta Welfare Association 

(https://www.metta.org.sg/hq/), 

  Make-A-Wish Singapore 

https://www.makeawish.org.sg

As of now, I have finalized the illustration of the cards, the box, and the guidebook. It is almost coming to the completion of the production.

Given the situation of the pandemic happening in Singapore, I am unable to confirm if the logistics arrangement may be disrupted.

Link: INNI NailsINNI Nails brings the world’s largest nail sticker collection and possibility to create your own design, shipped to your home
description_story:
Story


The sky is the limit - let your imagination flow!



INNI Nails is a new way to get amazing and unique nails. Our new technology allows customers to create their own nail stickers or select from thousands designs that other INNI users have created. High-fashion shapes, gradient colors, photo of your favorite band or picture of your pet - everything is possible with INNI Nails. Visit our beta site: www.inni.comHow does it work?Using INNI Nails is super easy. You can pick from existing designs that our users have done or create your own design with our easy-to-use INNI Nail Studio. You can upload any image from your computer or load images from the internet. You can add symbols, use brushes or gradient tool to make outstanding designs for your nails. Check out the video above!


INNI Nail Studio is done in-house, 100% sweat equity from the team



And if you want to go nuts with your design, you can use our INNI Paint. It's like Photoshop, but it works directly from your browser. You can use hundreds of brushes, layer effects, different filters and much more. Visit beta version (requires Flash Player): www.inni.com/paint


INNI Paint is based on SumoPaint, also in-house product from the team members



Who are we?The driving force behind INNI Nails is Katja Koutaniemi. As CEO she have researched and developed the concept for high-quality, low-cost, colorful, customizable nails.The technology for the website is developed by Lauri Koutaniemi, Katja's husband. INNI is based on his award-winning SumoPaint, online Photoshop with community.


Katja has forced Lauri to test nail stickers and nail polishes to understand women needs



Where we're at?We launched the beta site out last November and we've been testing the app with our friends and family, also sending sticker prototypes to some magazines and bloggers.


Sharp image quality allows you to see even the smallest details



The feedback has been encouraging! Everyone loves their custom nail designs and there has been blog posts about our product with great reviews:http://www.nihrida.com/2013/11/review-inni-nail-vinyls.html http://capitalpolish.blogspot.sg/2014/02/inni-nail-strips.html


Blogger Nihrida made this design using her family photos



We’ve been working on this project for over 9 months. First months was all about developing the website/app and testing different tape materials and printers. Lauri was coding and Katja used all her time for printing their wedding photo on different tapes.


It took a lot of time to test different printers with various materials



Last summer we finally found the perfect tape material and printing technology to produce high quality nail stickers that lasts up to 10 days. Now we have also found manufacturer, who can produce thousands of nail stickers with this technology.With your support, we can automate and scale up the process and deliver stickers all around the world faster and cheaper than doing everything from our tiny office with our tiny hands.


We have been printing, cutting, packaging and sending, doing everything ourselves



Your contribution will also help us to: * Automate the process for manufacturing stickers
 * Localize the website and the production (+shipping)
 * Improve our app to work with all browsers and mobile devices
 * Create new features for the site and new options for sticker materials
 * Add social media features, like commenting and sharing designs


We have been testing silver, gold, hologram and glitter materials for the stickers



RewardsEach INNI Nails sticker set has a total of 30 nail stickers with 13 different sizes for both hands, so you will definitely find your nail size. You'll also receive a compact nail file, instructions how to apply the nails and measures for finding the correct size.


INNI Nails sticker set includes 15 stickers for each hand



All rewards include free shipping, virtual surprise and early access to our new website.Pledge 3£: We love you! Thanks for your support! Help us launch the project and get a post card with cute nail file and thanks from our team.Pledge 9£: Two sets special! Receive two nail sticker sets with your own design or any design from the gallery. Special gift included.Pledge 20£: Five sets special! Receive five nail sticker sets with your own design or any design from the gallery. Two special gifts included in the package.
Pledge 30£: Ten sets special! Receive ten nail sticker sets with your own design or any design from the gallery as low as 3£ per nail sticker set with 30 stickers. Three special gifts included in the package.Pledge 35£: Go Pro! Back us with 35 pounds and we will give you INNI Pro for 3 years and 10 nail sticker sets (total value of 70£). You will have all Pro tools (including INNI Paint Pro) and other Pro benefits. Special (Go Pro) gift included.Pledge 50£: Get our limited INNI Metal + Glitter collection. You will get 10 INNI nail sticker sets with our special materials, including gold, silver, hologram, mirror, and glitter nail sticker sets. Of course you will also receive a photo of INNI crew with a ”thank you” note on the back side.Pledge 75£: Make INNI crew member wear your design + 10 nail sticker sets! You’ll receive ten nail sticker sets with your own design or any design from the gallery. Also INNI crew member will wear one of your desings and send you a photo with the evidence of that.Pledge 100£: Create your own INNI Campaign. We will have campaigns for Rio Carnival, Sochi Olympics and much more, but we are sure you are full of ideas and we'd love to hear them. You will get your own campaign website + 10 nail sticker sets with your own design.Pledge 500£: Get your own INNI Store! If you have a great brand, network or just want to start your own nail business, get your own INNI Store domain (for ex. fashion.inni.com) and reserve a possibility to start making money with your friends, colleagues and business associates. You will get INNI Store license for 2 years and beta access to tools, where you can customize your own INNI Store. This reward is valid only for Kickstarter users and during this campaign (after that 1000 eur/year).Pledge 3000£: Get flights to Finland to meet the team and enjoy great finnish summer with us. We have a special program for you: You will receive 2-way tickets to Finland, accommodation for one week in pre-selected locations and much more. Give us this ultimate support and we will take care of you!All stickers will be made in Finland, with our manufacturing partner, who have shown us incredible commitment by working with us for the past months to ensure that we can cut, print, package and send hundreds of nail stickers a day with great quality. We know how to scale things up, so we can produce even thousands sticker sets a day.Why Kickstarter?Now it is time to go global and big. We have a great product, but we want to make it even better and automate the production, so the stickers can be delivered faster to our customers. We are so excited about the future, and hope that this project will help us to reach our goals. It's tempting to think that Kickstarter is just about the money, but it isn't. Far from it.


One of our beta testers suggested us to do Kickstarter project :)



Today, it's hard to get visibility even if you are a great startup. There's so many people doing so many cool things, that it's hard to get noticed. We think that one of the key benefits of a successful Kickstarter campaign is visibility. With your support, we can get noticed, and get people trying our new customized nails. We have been showcasing INNI Nail prototypes in couple of start up events, but it takes much more time and money and we don't have that at the moment (see video below).
Also, if we're lucky enough to get your support, it's a valuable indicator that we're genuinely on the right track. We have our fingers crossed that you'll give us your seal of approval by supporting our campaign. And by doing so, other people will take a more serious look at us, which hopefully will lead to more help and more opportunities.


With gradient tool, you can create great looking effects (try this with nail polish!)



We also want your feedback and your ideas for how to improve INNI Nails, how to launch it successfully, and how to reach more people. We want you to try our nails stickers, give your input and tell your friends. Even if you're a guy (and many of you are), you can introduce us to your wife, girlfriend, daughters, or your best friend.


Combining different designs is fun and it looks great



But, of course, the money is critical. We have a lot to do, and it all costs money. Every cent you contribute will help us improve INNI Nails in terms of our website, the overall system, the design capabilities of our Nail Studio, our production quality, and our order fulfillment capability. It will also help us with marketing and directly impact our further funding situation.Main goal (£10,000): Heavy duty production and localizationSo far, we're being told that our nail vinyls are great. We are happy with that kind of feedback, but we know it can be even better. We have identified several potential production partners using state-of-the-art dye sublimation printing technologies, who can capture the full range of vibrant colors and designs, and print them on heavier duty vinyl, backed with stronger adhesive. We also feel that we need to make an investment in a more industrial cutting and forming tool as manufactured specifically for the plastics industry. And, we have identified an important post-printing step of applying a high-gloss, protective laquer to the printed nails so they stay super-shiny with eye-popping colors for 2-3 weeks. New production equipment chews up a big chunk of our initial budget, and the balance covers the software developmentrequired to make changes related to these new processes, and to add commercial-quality payment processing from a wide-range of online and phone-based payment methods. Overall, this is a key step which allows us to deliver the highest quality, most durable nail vinyls, while increasing production capability to thousands of orders per day (fingers crossed that we'll get that some day).As part of our proof of concept, we've created the first version of our Nail Studio. It's quite versatile and simple, and it allows you to design and customize nail designs based on some initial templates we've created. It allows you to save these designs for your personal use only, or as a public design for others to admire, customize, and use for their own nails.


Sneak peek of our HTML5 based editor, it is still missing a lot, so we need your help



INNI Nails is based on SumoPaint which we spent several years working on, and which we're pleased to say has a large creative community of millions of users around the world. It's like Adobe Photoshop online, an image editor and creative painting application working inside the browser. However, it's too big and has many more features than we need for INNI Nails. It's also based on Adobe's Flash technology, which means it won't run on mobile devices. So, addressing this shortcoming by releasing a HTML 5, cross-platform version of Nail Studio 2.0 is a huge step forward, and allows the widest range of people to design and order INNI nails on almost any computer or smartphone. In the process, INNI Nails 2.0 will get smaller, simpler, and faster, which is also a good thing.


If we reach our big goal, we would go nuts: Ooh, Woah, Aaargh!



And the last word from the boss...We have been working really hard on this, and we all sincerely appreciate your support and input. With your help, I believe we can launch INNI Nails with a bang!We pay a lot of attention to the quality of our products. We used a lot of time to find a perfect very flexible nail strip material, which will cover nails flawlessly. INNI nail stickers will not leave any wrinkles on your nails and last up to 10 days.Please contact us if you have any questions or queries: info@inni.com.


Thank you again for your help! Love, Katja, CEO
description_risks:
INNI Nails is not a figment of our overactive imaginations! It's already a working website (beta) with a low-key soft-launch to friends and family just couple of months ago. The early feedback has been very encouraging, but there's lots and lots of things for us to do to improve the number and quality of designs, make our design tools faster and funkier, streamline our production systems, accelerate fulfillment, get the word out and make the transition to full-on commercial sales and production. Fortunately, these are incremental improvements, not huge, scary obstacles, but we can't address them without your help.

Moreover, the INNI Design team is a credible, experienced group with substantial involvement in previous technology successes with millions of customers around the world. We're growing, and we believe we have what it takes, but Kickstarter will help us make it happen, and Kickstarter will help us get bigger, faster. 

Of course, things can always go wrong. But we have production already in place, and we will soon, with your help, also have back-up systems. There are minor quality issues that have been identified by some early customers, but we are already considering potential solutions, and, with your help, these will be addressed by upgrading to more sophisticated production equipment. Also, we do use normal mail (courier, tracked packages are simply too costly for a low-cost product like ours), so a few orders have gone astray, but we always send a new set free of charge. Overall, all potential issues are manageable, and we assure you that, if you fund us, every Kickstarter reward package will be produced and delivered right, and INNI Nails will launch officially to the world, thanks to you. We appreciate your support and your faith in us, and we promise that we won't let you down!

description_story:
Story







Hey there everyone!


This is Jean here and I make my own original characters mochibuddies, a group of mochi that are very good friends! This is my very first kickstarter project and I really hope to get it successfully funded.


The art, created with love series features my original characters momo(unicorn), spottie(dog), floflo(bunny), katkat(cat) and panpan(panda). They are all having fun creating their master pieces.


I hope to be able to bring the joy of creating across to everyone.


This is a fixed goal campaign with all pins designs unlocked as I am looking at doing the full series.


This project will last for 16 days only.
You will not be charged for the pledge until the end of the successful Kickstarter campaign
description_risks:
Manufacturing Defects Incident
As the pins are handmade, there might be incidences of defects. 
I had been working with the same supplier for a period of time and her pins are at least 80% great.
Pins would all be graded and assessed before mailing, only good quality pins will be sent out to you.

Colour Differences
Unfortunately, colours translate differently on different devices.
However, I will try my best to make sure that the colours are accurate.

Shipping Duration & Delays
Due to the ongoing pandemic, do expect shipping delays.
Shipping duration varies and depends on the country and state backers postal services.
But do rest assured that all overseas pledges package comes with track mail, which are insured.
For SG pledges, price paid does not include tracking and we highly recommend you to top  up $2 to better insure your package. Only 3 enamel pin pledge and ultimate bundle pledge comes with tracking by default.

blurb: This fuzzy asshole is packed with an outrageous amount of sarcastic voice messages to help you with reality check.
description: This fuzzy asshole is packed with an outrageous amount of sarcastic voice messages to help you with reality check.
name: Reality Check Bear – The Ideal Gift To Wrap Up 2020.
title: Reality Check Bear – The Ideal Gift To Wrap Up 2020.
Title: Reality Check Bear – The Ideal Gift To Wrap Up 2020.
Description: This fuzzy asshole is packed with an outrageous amount of sarcastic voice messages to help you with reality check.
Link: Reality Check Bear – The Ideal Gift To Wrap Up 2020.This fuzzy asshole is packed with an outrageous amount of sarcastic voice messages to help you with reality check.
description_story:
StoryHave you ever wanted to have someone to cuddle with, and who'd talk shit about you? Look no more! Reality Check Bear is what you need. 
Meet your new best asshole friend forever.









Over 20 unique insults… I mean, voice messages.
Do you think you are awesome, smart and everyone likes you? Then you need Reality Check Bear for real. 
This fluffy piece of shit is more than a stuffed toy with a voice function. It’s packed with an outrageous amount of sarcastic and smart messages to help you with reality check. 
Also, you can always use it as a punchbag. If you need stress relief or disagree with what it has to say (because you know it’s probably true), just punch the lil' bitch.









You get what you deserve.
We strongly believe that you deserve a 10 inches Reality Check Bear. Stuffed with 200 grams of awesomeness (and crap). Made of soft plush. The toy is well-built to withstand all of your microaggressions.

























Wired with a voice module with a replaceable battery, so it will never shut up.









Look at this cute mug. It will steal your heart and then crush it.









Un-bear-lievable Deals
Hurry up for our Early-Bear and Kick-Ass-Starter Special deals + FREE DELIVERY.

































And if you need 10 of them (god knows why), here is a super sweet deal for you, the best person ever — it’s 50% OFF and FREE DELIVERY.









*To make it simple, the prices are displayed in USD. Kickstarter automatically converts prices based on exchange rates.


 Free Delivery
If you are from the USA, Canada, Europe, Australian, New Zealand, Japan, Korea, China, or Singapore, good news. For you, we made delivery free of charge. 











Timeline and Delivery
We project 3 months from funding to delivery to your doorsteps carefully packed in a premium biodegradable trash bag – this is our effort to be environmentally friendly and using sustainable materials.









Meet the makers
Sergey Mast









CEO, also CCO, CFO, CTO, and Chairman of Reality Check Bear Incorporated in Your Butts. Mr. Sergey Mast is the genius behind Reality Check Bear and many other brilliant products. He is just so awesome. Very humble and down to earth boss. He was named the best CEO of 2019 and 2020 by the respected Reality Check Bear Magazine.
Sam Young









Junior copywriter. She embedded her sarcastic personality into this bear. She said that her boss, the great CEO, was her inspiration for the Reality Check Bear. When writing the voice messages, she was thinking about him.
description_risks: Risk is our middle name. For reals now. The chances that we are gonna screw this up are relatively low, like 2%. Where we see the potential problem is the timelines due to global production and supply chain turbulence. But rest assured that we are gonna work our butts off to make this happen. For you.

description: Pokemon inspired hard enamel pins depicting heartfelt emotions with flowers.
name: Eeveelution Flower Language Enamel Pins (Now with Vulpixes!)
title: Eeveelution Flower Language Enamel Pins (Now with Vulpixes!)
Title: Eeveelution Flower Language Enamel Pins (Now with Vulpixes!)
Description: Pokemon inspired hard enamel pins depicting heartfelt emotions with flowers.
Link: Eeveelution Flower Language Enamel Pins (Now with Vulpixes!)Pokemon inspired hard enamel pins depicting heartfelt emotions with flowers.
description_story:
Story










Inspired by flower languages and the meanings behind gifting flowers, I have created a series of 9 Eeveelution Pins; each carefully paired with each other, to deliver a meaningful message for yourself or a loved one. 











✤All pins would come with its own backing card. 
✤All shipping are registered  and comes with a tracking code.



















































































UPDATE:


I have the add-on option enabled! After selecting the tier you want, just follow the instructions to add as many pins as you like to your pledge :)









 Edit: Glittery flowers will now have shiny coloration!
Edit 2: Pouch designs are confirmed! You will be able to choose a color in the final survey.

















 ✤ All stretch goals unlocked! They will be available as options in the survey.
 ✤ You may pledge an extra 23.5USD(pair) or 12USD(single) to your tier and let me know when the surveys are sent out to get them :)

































✤ Timeline is subjected to change depending on when the goal is reached.  


✤ Delivery duration depends on the postal service. I use Singpost which passes mail to your local service once it touches down.


✤ Delivery WOULD probably be adversely affected by covid, as with everywhere else :(


✤ As of now, shipping to SERBIA has been suspended for a while,  and I'm not sure when it will resume. If you are from Serbia please take note! I will update this section if there are any changes.


✤Some photo updates!
✤All main eevee design colors have been filled, awaiting screenprinting and lineart filling~









✤Testing of glitter effect on the flowers



















✤ 70% - Production fees
✤ 20%- Shipping and handling fees
✤ 10%- Kickstarter and other fees











I'm Yuu from Tea & Buns and I'm a 3D Artist based in Singapore. Thank you for checking out my first ever kickstarter! I have been actively participating in local conventions since 2012. You can check out my Etsy,  Instagram , and Facebook.
Here is a sample of my other products, you can see more on my etsy!









Thank you for your time and kind support!
description_risks:
✤ Even though this is my first Kickstarter, I have >6000 successful sales on Etsy and have been actively creating batches of self-funded pins for years. I have a very trustworthy and efficient manufacturer who has never failed to deliver quality pins.

✤ Pin colors might differ slightly than what you see here due to everyone's personalized screen settings.

✤ In the current state of affairs, it is a sad reality that postal services have been badly affected by the pandemic, I will try my best to expedite all orders, but do take note that the postal efficiency is not what it was. I thank you for your understanding and patience!

blurb: The First Ever Swim Shorts That Transition Into Stylish Tailored Shorts, Engineered For All Day Comfort, Performance and Style.
description: The First Ever Swim Shorts That Transition Into Stylish Tailored Shorts, Engineered For All Day Comfort, Performance and Style.
name: Bondi Swim Co || The World's First All Day Swim Shorts
title: Bondi Swim Co || The World's First All Day Swim Shorts
Title: The World's First All Day Swim Shorts
Description: The First Ever Swim Shorts That Transition Into Stylish Tailored Shorts, Engineered For All Day Comfort, Performance and Style.
Link: The World's First All Day Swim ShortsThe First Ever Swim Shorts That Transition Into Stylish Tailored Shorts, Engineered For All Day Comfort, Performance and Style.
description_story:
Story







At Bondi Swim Co, we live for summer, and to have the perfect summer you need the perfect summer swim-shorts! The problem is most swim-shorts just don't tick all the boxes. Swim-shorts; they're either too long, too short, too wide, or too tight. They compromise on either function, comfort or style, and to make it worse you have to change them all the time. We know this swim-short problem has needed fixing for years, so over the past 18 months we have been working non-stop on designing the ultimate pair of swim shorts, that you will be able to live in all summer long.









 




Every pair of Bondi Swim Co Swim-shorts features our bold signature ribbon design, so you can transform these shorts from a high performance swim-short into a tailored summer short. Simply fold up the cuff to change the look, length and style of these shorts into a designer short. Now you have a swim-short that you can wear all day, and go straight from the beach to the beach bar or wherever your day takes you. 









 




The perfect swim-shorts need the perfect fabric and we spent months and months working with our manufacturers to engineer the ultimate swim-short fabric. Our specially designed premium fabric is a unique polyester microfibre which features amazing stretch performance technology and with durability for long lasting use.
With the increased flexibility in these swim-shorts you will feel comfortable all day, and your movement will never be restricted. Whether you like swimming, running, partying or just relaxing these all day swim-shorts have you covered.








 



Our customised premium fabric is also infused with water resistant hydrophobic technology, so water and liquids will bounce off these shorts keeping them dry unless fully submerged. 
The quick drying properties in these swim-shorts will have you dry in the fastest possible time, so you will never need to worry about taking a second pair of shorts with you to the beach. They are designed to drip dry as quick as possible so you can head straight from the beach to the beach bar, or wherever your day takes you.











 









These swim-shorts feature a specially built in hidden zip pocket on the side, to give you the perfect place to store your keys and phone, so you can keep your valuables safe and secure. Our 5 pocket design swim-short also features two foldable back pockets for extra storage, so you will be prepared for anything, wherever your day takes you.












 









These swim shorts have the style of a classic European tailored short, designed to look great in every occasion. They are also the perfect length, sitting just above the knee, to make sure that your movement is never restricted. For a shorter length, simply fold up the cuff, which will shorten the length of these swim-shorts to that of a designer short. 
The wrinkle free properties embedded in this fabric will ensure that these shorts will remain crease-free, and always look great in and out of the water.








 







 







 









 






















 NEW COLOUR UNLOCKED - BLACK








 









Bondi Swim Co bases all its sizes on international standards. If you are usually a size Medium, then go for that size. If you are in-between sizes, we suggest selecting a larger size and then using the button tabs to adjust the short to the perfect fit. 








Designed in Sydney Australia, these shorts have been designed for all-day use to handle whatever your day demands. We spent 18 months on prototype development and extensive fabric testing, until we came up with the perfect swim-shorts we have always wanted. Our swim-shorts are styled with a classic European tailored cut, designed to look good in any situation.
 

  









When we started Bondi Swim Co 18 months ago, cost was a motivating factor. We wanted to make a premium quality swim-short at an affordable price point. The current retail margins, through avenues such as wholesaling and physical retail stores are very high, particularly when sourcing the best quality fabrics on the market. In a retail setting, our swim-shorts would cost over $200 in retail, but by being on Kickstarter, we are able to accomplish our goal of making the perfect premium swim-shorts at a great price.









 









If you like our campaign, we would really appreciate your support by sharing our campaign on your social networks by clicking these links below.

  








 








 







 










 


  









Interested in writing about us? Our press pack is available for download here.
description_risks:
1. Quality Assurance

After years of product testing and prototype development, we have developed a strong relationship with our key manufacturer, and are confident that you will love our premium swim-shorts.

2. Communication

We will be communicating with our backers regularly, to keep them updated on our campaign, with manufacturing updates.

3.. Timely Delivery

As soon as we are funded, we are confident we will be able to ship our premium swim-shorts to you as per our expected Timeframes.


Please feel free to email us directly at team@bondiswim.co if you have any questions or concerns.
