blurb: It's the ideal for touch ups on-the-go & travel on-the-go application.
description: It's the ideal for touch ups on-the-go & travel on-the-go application.
name: #CarryAlight: Minimal Travel Makeup Brush
title: #CarryAlight: Minimal Travel Makeup Brush
Title: #CarryAlight: Minimal Travel Makeup Brush
Description: It's the ideal for touch ups on-the-go & travel on-the-go application.
Link: #CarryAlight: Minimal Travel Makeup BrushIt's the ideal for touch ups on-the-go & travel on-the-go application.
description_story:
StoryMakeup brushes usually takes very much space, so it is important to not overpack. It’s always the hardest to cut down on makeup brush necessities.That’s what this brand is inspired by. Alight inspires to create a travel-friendly, cruelty free, multifaceted beauty tools and solutions with high-quality selection of makeup brushes. 






The makeup brush is designed to be portable and easy-to carry with the safety cap and plastic material. The product will be made of plastic, so then it won’t break easily for you to carry around.The makeup brush consists of 3 different brush heads. Each brush heads are stackable and switchable, they are compactly designed to fit each other. Not only are they taking less space, they may be stacked into three to form a regular-sized length for comfortable use.For comfort, Alight makeup brush uses soft, synthetic bristles with designated handle. The makeup brush is hexagon-shaped for more control and easy grip.Stackable 3 in 1 Makeup Brush






 







 SustainabilityAlight strives to make beauty sustainable by minimizing resource wastage from production to consumer use. Each product is cruelty-free and vegan quality that is purity and never tests on animals nor using animal products.The brand donates one percent of sales to help lead the transition to sustainable planet and society. 1% of sales profit will be given to Friends of the Earth organization.
description_risks:
We are just a step away from a final production model. We need to meet our goal as quickly as possible. 

The sooner we meet it, the sooner we can commission our manufacturers to start producing Alight makeup brush. The sooner we do that, the sooner we can get it to you.

Our production specifications have been sent and we have already chosen a reputable manufacturer that has a strong record for reliability and quality.

title: GhostFlash : X-Cross Desk
Title: GhostFlash : X-Cross Desk
Description: Cutting edge multi-purpose stationary revolutionize pedestal desk.
Link: GhostFlash : X-Cross DeskCutting edge multi-purpose stationary revolutionize pedestal desk.
description_story:
Story GHOSTFLASH X-Cross Desk 
Product Description
The “X-Cross Desk” is essentially a sit-down Vewlix style cabinet. It is a modern style industrial to home architecture by design and multi functions by use. “X-Cross Desk” is design to give you the chance to get hold of a very affordable and yet sturdily built multi-purpose desk right into your homes. The design was made for easy slot-for-screw-in set up for a quick and seamless assembly. Positioned nicely for common seating configurations, you can get accustomed to the comfortable posture and easily endure many hours of gameplay, work, studies, etc.


Product Prototype & Functionality 
Stage 1 - 









Stage 2 -

 sound

 sound

00:00




































Sturdy construction and built
The cabinet derives itself from 18mm thick builds on the main top and side frames, with other aspect to support its frame. The evident rigidity of the cabinet, proven by its weight signifies solid quality in its built. A cabinet that would last long in time fresh to death!
L38.25 X W28.72 X H45.53 inches











Dark matte black in colour, giving a sleek modern feel
This simple black matte colour brings a modern sophisticated ambience to the room space and within. Polished with a smooth finish, nothing could go wrong with black.




T-Molded finish on edges
- The cabinet ends are sealed with thick T-Molds, applied firmly to give a neat set of curves to the already solid body











Adjustable screen height by VESA mount
- The back panels meant for holding up TV screens are attached with adjustable VESA mounts. VESA mounts come in standard configurations. This ensures flexibility of user to adjust the balance between eye comfort level of screen viewing height and seating posture.
- Max size/weight limit of flat screen monitor or TV up to 42 inches.











Mini gap for wire/cable routing
- A small slit gap of 15mm is in the tabletop rear before the major top hub. This is to allow cables and wires plenty of access to pass through the back portraying a clean non-messy view.




Storage spaces
- Panel top open cupboard for minor storage









- Swing doors for major storage, with removable split deck

















Add-ons (by request optional)
- Custom vinyl sticker design for cabinet




Recommended use:
- Digital music applications: DJ mixer set table set-up, Music editing desk station, Keyboard
- Digital function use: Drafter workspace, Online interview station, Digital Art station
- Entertainment workspace: Podcasting, Youtubing, VLoging Setup.
- For arcade lover usage of: Mame, PC emulation, Retro Arcade console.
- Other gaming desk-console: PS5, Xbox, Nintendo Switch, Wii, etc.)
- Education study, writing space.

description: Set in 90s Singapore, Pencil tells the story of two best friends whose friendship is tested due to an incident.

title: Pencil The Short Film (笔芯）
Title: Pencil The Short Film (笔芯）
Description: Set in 90s Singapore, Pencil tells the story of two best friends whose friendship is tested due to an incident.
Link: Pencil The Short Film (笔芯）Set in 90s Singapore, Pencil tells the story of two best friends whose friendship is tested due to an incident.
description_story:
StoryHave you ever bought a mechanical pencil with a missing eraser?(This video is just a teaser and is not a representation of the actual film in terms of production, casts, locations. We will only commence filming this December 2016.)







Wenxin spots her best friend Joanne stealing something from the bookshop. She faces the impossible dilemma of choosing between friendship and her moral principles.







 









Our decisions define who we are and sometimes we make bad decisions to take the easy way out.I grew up in Singapore in the 90s and at a very young age, my mother would always ask me three questions after school: If I completed my homework, if I talk in class, or if I was late for school. I guess all this mattered to her as a parent – that I was a good student.I thought that these were the attributes of a good student, and even going through years of Civics and Moral Education ／《好公民》did not prepare me for the moral dilemma that I was about to encounter – witnessing my best friend stealing something from the bookshop.The universal themes of honour, morality and the conundrum of doing the right things versus doing things right is portrayed in this short film. I wish to tell a story of how making the right decisions will render you unpopular and unlikable, which are situations that we as adults face all the time.“Pencil” is a short film based on my personal experience and I hope sharing it would evoke a thought. Then, I feel like I have accomplished something worthwhile.







 







We are hoping to raise S$6,000 more to cover production expenses in the following areas:- casts
- crew
- art direction
- equipment
- locationWe will commence principal photography in late December 2016 and wish to complete the film late January - early February 2017.







 







Regina Tan (director/writer)Having a keen eye for drama, Regina directed the provocative documentary, “Transit,” about a Muslim transvestite's inner struggle both with his identity and with his mother. “Transit” was awarded the Best Documentary at the prestigious Cecil Awards at Chapman University and won the Bronze at the Singapore Crowbar Awards. “Transit” was also nominated for the prestigious David Wolper Award for Student Documentary from the International Documentary Association (IDA). 
 
Another short film directed by Regina is “Filial Haven,” a heartfelt story of a young man who has to send his mother to an old folk’s home. “Filial Haven” was accepted for the 2016 Cannes Short Film Corner. After graduation, Regina has been working as a freelance 1st Assistant Director for features, commercials as well as television series. She also completed directing 4 episodes of "The Munah & Hirzi show,” featuring the comedy team that have fast become two of the top Singaporean YouTube stars. 
 
Armed with a Film and Video Diploma from Ngee Ann Polytechnic, Regina graduated from Chapman University’s Dodge College of Film and Media Arts in Singapore with a BFA in Creative Producing.  Always eager to keep working, she is also developing several film and television projects. Her experience with different genres has proven her to be a versatile director and producer with a sharp sensibility.

Lifestyle.Kenneth is developing several feature films and was the official participant from Singapore at the Rotterdam Lab 2016, a by-nomination-only lab for filmmakers all over the world to network and exchange experiences.Having a keen eye for aesthetics, Kenneth is also behind the multi-platform design for Pencil. Much recently, he launched an online comic strip Perils of Freedom with local artist Brandon Chng that chronicles the lives of a creative freelancer.Joanna Ying Ng (producer/writer)JOANNA YING NG graduated from Ngee Ann Polytechnic with a diploma in Film, Sound and Video as well as a BFA in Creative Producing from Dodge College of Film and Media Arts' Chapman University. Joanna has been producing for various productions which include television commercials, short films and feature films. Having directed as well, her take on producing has always been an interesting one as she is very much involved in the creative development of the script, which makes the experience an even more pleasurable one.Some of the notable works include 'My Sister's Secret' which was awarded the Cathay Organization Film Prize; 'BLOW!' a controversial documentary which went on various film festivals and broadcasted on PBS Southern California Broadcast Station; 'Villain' a short film that won Best Script as well as Special Mention for Best Performance at the 4th Singapore Short Films Awards; and 'Standing in Still Water / 溺' a feature film that stars local casts Dawn Yeoh and Zhang Wen Xiang. She hopes to be able to continue to share this passion of filmmaking and storytelling with the rest of the world.


(From L to R) Kenneth Hu (producer), Regina Tan (director) and Joanna Ying Ng (producer)





Our wonderful creative team:Assistant Producer / Casting Manager - Lim Siew RongProduction Manager - Siew Shu Hui1st Assistant Director - Lim Jiayun2nd Assistant Director - Roy PaulinusLocation Manager - Li Huan WennEditor - Janice Chua Director of Photography - Cecilia WeeCamera Assistant - Feng KexinGaffer - Jason Tan

Besides the memorabilia and special edition DVDs, we hope to organize screenings and panels to thank our backers personally. Your support means a lot to us!We wish to send the short film to international film festivals in 2017 and we hope our backers from abroad can also enjoy the film, watch this space for more updates.







 









Support us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/penciltheshortfilmsg

blurb: Starting a nano brewery that offers a wide variety of quality craft beers in Singapore!
description: Starting a nano brewery that offers a wide variety of quality craft beers in Singapore!
name: Big Bad Wolf Brewery
title: Big Bad Wolf Brewery
Title: Big Bad Wolf Brewery
Description: Starting a nano brewery that offers a wide variety of quality craft beers in Singapore!
Link: Big Bad Wolf BreweryStarting a nano brewery that offers a wide variety of quality craft beers in Singapore!
description_story:
StoryHow it all startedI always go around Singapore to try craft beer from microbrewey with my girlfriend because I love the taste of craft beers. One day at the brewery a thought came to me. I got curious how beers are made. I went back home and search up the internet and learn that I can create my own beer from home. I told my girlfriend about it and she likes the idea so we went on to buy ingredients to brew. Immediately, I fell in love with my beer the moment it sits in my mouth. Since then I have made different batches at home, practicing and experimenting different kind of tastes. There is a few times my beer got contaminated as I did not sterilies properly. I learn from my mistake and got better every brew. I feel that I have become so good at brewing I would like to share my craft with people out there.Big Bad Wolf Brewery I will produce small batches of beer and each batch will not be the same. Every time a batch is finish a different beer will be in the tap. This is to let every person who comes to feel fresh every time and not having the same taste of beer every time they come back. I feel that brewing beer is a work of art as different brew will produce different taste and with great taste is most important in a beer. I brew mostly IPA and ESB because I love the taste of it. Personally I prefer the british recipe as the taste is still strong but the alcohol level is low so I can enjoy drinking more rather than getting drunk so fast.   The concept The brewery is very straight forward. To allow people to come in and have a drink just sit around do their own stuff like how people would normally hang out at Starbucks. Why I need your helpIt all started out of curiosity and I fell in love doing it. I studied marketing and will apply what I have learn into the business. Now I'm ready to take the next step to make money out of my hobby. However, I just graduated last year and it will take me years to save up and start my dream. Since I'm still young there is not much of credibility so it will be pointless for me to go talk to the bank or investor. I need your support to kick-start my dream of sharing my craft beer with everyone! Here is how I plan to use these Kickstarter funds:
Brewing equipments
Renovation
Purchase of furniture, tables and chairs etc...
Licensing fees
description_risks:
In Singapore, there are only less than 50 breweries people were drinking more of the staples like Heineken or Tiger. Not many people here know about home brewing or even a brewery becasue its limited. My goal is to let craft beer reach out to more people in Singapore. Statistics show that Singapore millennials love to drink!

Doing it in small batches will be hard to keep up with the demand in the near future as the business gets popular. My biggest challenge is fermenting the beer fast enough to make sure everyday, everyone who step into the brewery can taste my beer.

I have made up all my budget and all the necessary information gathering like licensing, location and brewing equipment. Most of my fundings will be for buying brewing equipments and aquiring license fees like liquor license act and manufacturing license.

With all the information I gathered I also found that there is a growing demand here in Singapore. I'm only left with the very last and most important thing, the funds. Give me your support and help expand the craft beer community in Singapore!

description_story:
Story

Hi I'm Lucius a design student on Kickstarter today to share with everyone my latest food steaming creation out of my love for red bean buns. Growing up, i like to have red bean buns for breakfast daily. Every morning, i'll get them out of the freezer, put them on a plate and steam them in a pot waiting 8 minutes before it's ready for consumption. However the frustration i feel to get that hot plate out of the pot just irritates me despite every tool or method i have tried over the past few years. My unsuccessful attempts often resorts me to physically stabbing my buns to retrieve them but i don't like it when my buns look misshapen.Today i have before you a life changing food steamer every household should own. The Paulor steamer makes food steaming a hassle free task with 2 simple tools. A redesigned steamer bowl to put your buns on to steam and a handle that reaches through the bowl's center before fishing it out of the pot. 
Its easy as 1, 2, 3! Just get lay on any type of food you would like to steam onto the steamer bowl, pour about 300ml of water into the pot before placing your Paulor steamer bowl in. Set the heat to the appropriate temperature of what your're heating and wait for that few minutes till it's cooked and ready. Lift the pot lid open and reach for your Paulor handle, carefully dipping it through the center of the steamer bowl till it slides in and there you hook your meal out of that pot through the designated gaps for the catch between both tools. There it's that simple!
It is also dishwasher friendly making it easy to clean and maintain after usage. 
This creation has made food steaming a simple 2 step process that makes my eating experience more enjoyable and i hope you will too by funding my page. Cheers!

Link: smart"SHABDH" A LIVE alert deviceA simple low cost device that can send "LIVE" alerts to loved ones, healthcare units (any situations, emergencies & attempted thefts)
description_story:
StoryMedical Dispensing Device with “LIVE” Tracking & Monitoring Features
Smart SHABDH™ is a medicine dispenser for patient’s / aged people, to consume their weekly / bi-monthly medication, with smart features incorporated for LIVE tracking / monitoring by their health care centers / family members.
Key Features of smart SHABDH™?
- Enables medication tracking / monitoring of patient’s / aged people by their health care centers and family members respectively
- Reminding patients with medication schedules   - Alerting patient’s for low battery status and re-charging
- Alerting patients with open / close status of the medicine dispenser to avoid exposure to atmosphere
Why LIVE tracking / monitoring?Certain critical patient’s are required to be tracked / monitored for their regular (day to day) consumption of medicine provided by their medical centers to make sure their patient’s do not miss out their medication schedules. This will enable the medical centers to monitor and manage their patient’s from getting in to serious health conditions due to possible irregular medication schedules. Currently medical centers face a challenge for managing their patient’s medication practices. It becomes quite expensive / stressful for both centers and patient’s in case of daily visits to the centers. Also, certain patient’s are not allowed to access bulk medication for reasons beyond medical centers control.
How does smart SHABDH™ work?
Smart SHABDH™ will send an alert signal to the designated Healthcare centers or authorized call centers, whenever a patient activates the medicine dispenser, to consume his / her medication (as prescribed). The health care centers / call centers will be able to manage all their patient’s incoming alert data and track / monitor their patient’s. The centers will be able to call back and remind their patients for medication, in case there is no patient alert status received by their database system. Devices with other options available are, with a medication reminder and an automated (hands - free) medication dispensing. All options are enabled with alerts to the respective centers when medication is dispensed.
description_risks:

Product has already been trade marked already for copy protection.

Continuous new features / cost reduction also can keep competitors in check

description_story:
StoryWelcome to LAYMAN DESIGNS







Hello everyone! LMD Deck is my very first creation here in Kickstarter. Just like what the brand name signifies, this deck is created from the very basic, from a layman's point of view. A logo plays a major role towards success for most businesses and in this case, I feel that designing a logo deck is a perfect way for me to introduce the brand to fellow cardists, magicians and playing card collectors around the world.










Pandora by Dan & Dave

LMD logo primarily consists of 4 triangles, coming together from different directions to form the picture. They represent the driving force for my creative process, the 4 key fundamentals of my life; Faith, Love, Respect, and the ability to Dream.

THE MONOGRAM - I am a huge fan of symmetrical and monogram designs. Needless to say, I have to use them in my very first playing card design. The logos are placed in such a way that looking at the negative space, you can see the letter H (which is the initial of my last name), and 2 arrows representing the ups and downs that are inevitable in life.







BACK DESIGN - Featuring the monogram with 2 logos in blue overlapping the thin border, LMD Deck creates an interesting soundwave visual that interlinks the cards when fanned, spread or during flourishing moves.


Spin Doctor by Nikolaj Pedersen
















The Werm by Dan & Dave













FACE DESIGN - LMD Deck is 100% customized. The pips are formed out of the logo itself. They will also be used in future for our more Cardistry styled decks.

$17000 USD: LMD DECK: Magic Edition print by Cartamundi with B9 finish. Limited to 1000 decks 








My name is Vince from Singapore. I am a Graphic designer by day, Layman Cardist, Magician & Playing Cards Designer by night. I stumbled across the amazing world of Cardistry when I found this video on Youtube featuring a group of people shuffling, tossing, flipping playing cards around. I was intrigued by the aesthetically pleasing moves. That video was from the Virts SS16 deck.






You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play


































Replay with sound









Play with 
 sound












00:00


00:00


































 This video is made entirely by myself with my layman cardistry skill. Enjoy!









In the past, my perspective towards playing cards had always been a negative one, it has been years since I touched a deck of cards. To me, they were inevitably associated with gambling, which was a major factor to many broken families, including mine.




My EDC





I was amazed by how the use of a deck of playing cards has changed throughout the years, evolving into a perfect canvas for designers and artists to create stunning art pieces that are interactive and essentially formless.
Without a doubt, the creator in me, awakened from the slumber, is determined to set on a trip to create my very own deck of Playing Cards. Currently in transition between jobs, I put everything on hold because I want to be 100% focus on this project. This might just be a turning point for me.
My philosophy: We are constantly learning new things in life. At any point in time, all of us are considered laymen in one way or another. Given the opportunity and the courage to take a step forward, a layman can one day excel in the things they do.My inspiration: I am constantly thinking of new ideas for my next creation. I draw inspirations from all things awesome. From high fashion, streetwear to popular culture, nerdy stuff like movies, comics, toys, and awesome cardists and magicians from across the globe.Thank you for making it this far! Hope you like what you see here. I love to do what I am doing now and I am taking a step closer to realise my dream. Help me to continue doing this. Help me bring LMD Deck to live!PeaceVince H.Disclaimer: Photos of prototype and images used are for reference only. Colors or finishing of the final product may vary. I prefer to call it Fine-tuned to Perfection.Do follow us on instagram @lmd_deckSpecial Thanks to my friends for the help on this campaign! Do check out their instagram too!

description_story:
Story





















































































































You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.

 sound












00:00


00:00





















































































Pre-order now. Pay after the campaign ends.













































 Cocoon essentially took all the best qualities from all three modalities that would cost you over $3,200 and solved every problems (bulky, unable to move, single purpose, leaking wet mess, constant shifting about) they brought. Cocoon will cost you less than 3% of that amount and free from all the issues.

























Cocoon meets the following hot cold wrap safety standard:

   ISO 13485 from TÜV Rheinland, Germany.

Cocoon also meets all other requisite standards required of consumer medical devices set by the FDA and CE.

   FDA in the United States.
   CE in Europe.












Pledges will be collected in Singapore Dollars (SGD).
















Help us spread the word and get 15% CASH BACK








Get first dibs on being our partners!





 THE ORIGIN STORY
COCOON started when Jarrick, who designs custom spine braces for those with scoliosis, experienced many aches, soreness and inflammations from the frequent training and races - which wasn't fun at all.









Over the next few months, something important happened: After neglecting sports and a social life, Jarrick listened to Mariah Carey Greatest Hits on repeat and developed a cold wrap made of fructose and a zip-lock bag that actually works and brought the idea to life.









While this is my first Kickstarter, I've already created a mass production ready prototype, readied our mold templates, and our manufacturing partners are waiting for our signal to go ahead.
It hadn't been easy...




The journey has been long, but we are ready.





HELP ME MAKE COCOON A REALITY
I wanted to put this project on Kickstarter because it's the fastest way for me to get Cocoons into your hands and make improvements as a community. I think this iceless cold compression sleeve is great, but I need your help making it even better.
So, if an easy to wear cold compression sleeve that lets you float like a butterfly, doesn't leave you in a wet mess and won't shift around is something you want, please back this project and help me make Cocoon a reality!
With mucho love,
-Jarrick

























SHIPPING WILL BE CHARGED AFTER THE CAMPAIGN (VIA CROWDOX) and prices may go up or down depending on your choice of accessories and global shipping rates when we get to the fulfillment stage. This project will be US, Canada, EU and Australia friendly!




Cocoon is UK-friendly as well





 Many Kickstarter campaigns have disappointed their backers by not thinking through their shipping and logistics strategy. That's why we've partnered with a global fulfillment and logistics company, Floship, and passed their 7 point comprehensive review. 




Cocoon is pleased to work with floship to ensure efficient and cost effective reward delivery. Click on the image for proof and a comprehensive, professional review of our shipping and fullfillment plan.





During these uncertain times, shipping costs are changing every week. We believe that the rates will improve in the coming months and will strive diligently to achieve the right balance of shipping speed and cost efficiency for you.
Any savings we can find, we will pass them on to you.
Here are our estimates of what shipping would be. 




Sample shipping rates as at October 25, 2020





* Prices do not include taxes for Non US, Canada, EU, UK and Australia backers. That will be subject to the laws and regulations of each country. We have tried to subsidize the import taxes and duties as much as we can.
** Note that these prices are dependent on the situation, final order and global shipping rates when we get to the fulfillment stage. We make no money at all from shipping.
description_risks:
Unlike most Kickstarter campaigns, Cocoon actually has a working, mass production ready prototype of the product. This means that not only will we definitely deliver the product to you, we will also deliver a product that has been perfected though all the feedback we've gotten from the prototype we mass produced and beta tested.

However, it is important to understand that unexpected things may happen along the way, which are very hard to predict now. For example, delays in shipping can occur due to factors like viruses, travel restrictions or even, trade wars.

If any delays were to occur due to such circumstances, we will definitely update all our backers with full transparency and of course, aid you with any of the doubts you have along the way.

REFUND POLICY
90% pledge back guarantee since Kickstarter retains about 10% of your pledge for various fees. You have 7 days after the campaign ends to receive a refund for the products you ordered on Kickstarter. After 7 days, we will start placing the POs for the products and will NOT issue any refunds or returns.

EXCHANGE & RETURN POLICY
If you receive the wrong size, we appreciate the opportunity to replace or exchange it. Our exchange policy lasts 30 days from when your product arrived according to the tracking # we sent you. To be eligible for an exchange, your item must be unused, free from dirt, dust or damage and in the same package and condition that you received it, you will be responsible for shipping it back to us.

SHIPPING POLICY
If our shipping carrier attempts delivery and you don't get it because you’re not there, wrong address, moved without notifying us, and the package returns back to our warehouse, you will be responsible for the shipping fees to have it resend to you.
** When you receive your tracking #, please keep an eye out for the package. **

description_story: Story
description_risks:
Most people says,
"You have to see it to believe it."

With Kickstarter, we like to say,
"Sometimes you have to believe it, to see it."

Make it happen.
For you. For me. For all of us kickass peeps.

There might be unforeseen factory delays (which we would try to minimise as much as we could without compromising quality), there might be shipping delays (which we would also take measures to prevent), but we assure you nothing compares to the news of us telling you "Sorry, we didn't have enough funds to make it happen."


(Steve Jobs: Here's to the crazy ones.
The misfits, the rebels, the troublemakers, the round pegs in the square holes, the ones who see things differently.
They're not fond of rules, and they have no respect for the status quo.
You can quote them, disagree with them, glorify or vilify them.
About the only thing you can't do is ignore them.
Because they change things - they push the human race forward.
And while some may see them as the crazy ones, we see genius.
Because the people who are crazy enough to think they can change the world, are the ones who do.)

blurb: Contemporary playing cards characterized by symbols of change and transformation. Fully customized. Limited Edition.
description: Contemporary playing cards characterized by symbols of change and transformation. Fully customized. Limited Edition.
name: Agenda Playing Cards
title: Agenda Playing Cards
Title: Agenda Playing Cards
Description: Contemporary playing cards characterized by symbols of change and transformation. Fully customized. Limited Edition.
Link: Agenda Playing CardsContemporary playing cards characterized by symbols of change and transformation. Fully customized. Limited Edition.
description_story:
Story







The Agenda Playing Cards is the outcome of Flagrant Agenda's unceasing endeavour to explore alternative means of expressing our ideas. Playing cards are fascinating medium for communication - from visually impressive execution of cardistry flourishing, mind bending and clever exhibition of magical illusion, to navigating imperfect information in game of chance showdowns. It is amazing how something so simple can be used for expression in so many ways.







We have finally unlocked our STRETCH GOAL 2. BLACK AGENDA is now available! We have added 4 new rewards specially catered to BLACK AGENDA: 
The Covert Nonconformist 
The Insurgent 
The Revolutionary+
The Freedom Fighter
 

All existing rewards except the Nonconformist and Revolutionary will become split equally into the same number of WHITE and BLACK AGENDA decks. We have also included 2 new add-ons, the BLACK AGENDA Uncut Sheets and 1 deck add-on for BLACK AGENDA.Do check out the rewards and add-ons sections for more details.BLACK AGENDA







We have made the following add ons available for all the Nonconformists, Objectors, Dissidents, Rebels and Revolutionaries out there: Uncut sheets for WHITE AGENDA, premium cotton tees in white and black screen printed with our Ace of Spade, 1 deck add-on for WHITE AGENDA and special WHITE AGENDA mini decks.WHITE AGENDA MINI


Limited to 100 decks





Our STRETCH GOAL 1 has been unlocked! All the decks will now come with embossed tuck cases! We are embarking onto the next STRETCH GOAL, a milestone that will give us BLACK AGENDA. BLACK AGENDA features:
Spot UV Printed Tuck Case on Thick Matte Black Stock
Tuck Case Embossing
Printed with metallic silver ink on court cards, card backs and faces
Foil Numbered Sticker Seal
Limited to 1000 Decks


























The theme in the deck is that of responsible change and transformation. This theme extends Flagrant Agenda's maxim of making a point to making a change. Various symbols related to change and transformation were included in the design of the tuck case, card back and the court cards. We strive to keep the whole design clean and simple without losing the details and symbology. We hope that the deck design would be timeless and spread the message of responsible change and transformation.























The lack of eyes in our court cards expresses the lack of truth, honesty, wisdom and moral conscience we sometimes see in authority – the Kings, Queens and Princes of our society – and why there is an impetus for a call for change.







The mandala is infused in our card back and Aces designs to convey that all change should strive for eventual stabilization, integration and ultimately a better inner self as propounded by Carl Jung.























The top of the Joker resembles a triangle and carries with it the meanings we are imbuing throughout the deck – the trinity of thoughts, emotions and actions and change. The sphere that the Joker is standing on stands for completeness with the three rounded shapes in the top and bottom embodying the past, the present and the future, both good and bad. All of history is defined by change.
















Fully Customized Deck with 2 Jokers
Spot UV Printed Tuck Case on Thick Matte Stock
Printed by Expert Playing Card Company with Damask Finish
Tuck Case Embossing (UNLOCK at STRETCH GOAL 1)
Clean & Monotone Design with 2 Colour Scheme - WHITE AGENDA & BLACK AGENDA (UNLOCK AT STRETCH GOAL 2)
Limited to 1000 Decks (per colour)
Silver & Red Foil & Numbered Sticker Seal





Numbered Sticker Seal













FUNDING GOAL // SGD$5,000WHITE AGENDA







STRETCH GOAL 1 // SGD$7,000 <UNLOCKED>TUCK CASE EMBOSSING on WHITE AGENDA







STRETCH GOAL 2 // SGD$12,000 <UNLOCKED>BLACK AGENDA with SPOT UV PRINTING and TUCK CASE EMBOSSING

















































For add-ons, you need to be already pledging for a reward. You can then click on ‘Manage your pledge’ and under the pledge amount of the reward you pledge, increase the amount accordingly to each of the add-ons price (see below). After the campaign is concluded, we will be sending a survey to ask you for the details of your add-ons. To help us with this process, you can drop us a message after you have adjust your pledge to include the add-ons with the details of your add-ons. If you have any question, do feel free to drop us a message as well.









WHITE AGENDA MINIThe mini decks will be printed with Make Playing Cards using 310gsm French casino quality card stock with black core (linen finish) with MPC card finish. 







 







UNCUT SHEETAuthentic uncut sheets of playing cards pulled straight off the factory press.







 AGENDA TEEPremium cotton tees in white and black screen printed with our Ace of Spade. Available sizes from XS to XL.































Flagrant Agenda is a Singapore-based, street fashion label that designs apparels with a contemporary and urban overtone with a strong focus on graphics and illustrations. We set up Flagrant Agenda in 2014 to serve as an outlet to express ourselves on issues we feel strongly about.We are influenced by issues related to our surroundings, the environments we grew up in, what we encounter in our everyday lives and the society at large. We seek to understand how people who grew up and live in different cultures, interpret these themes and hope that by doing so, allows us to gain insights into similarities and differences in the way how people think.The Agenda Playing Cards is a new undertaking for us to expand beyond what we have already done with our apparels. We hope that this Kickstarter project can move us into new directions and avenues for expressing ourselves.Regardless whether this project is funded (we certainly hope that this project can be a success!), we hope to trigger people’s curiosity to find out more about the concept behind the deck and inspire them to engage in conversations on and ponder more deeply about the issues related to the concept.
description_risks:
For a project like Agenda Playing Cards, the risks can come in 3 aspects, the finalization of the deck design, the production, and the fulfilment. We have look into these aspects and got them covered.

For the deck design, we have finalized all the designs and they are ready to be sent to the printer once the project is funded. What you see on this page would be what you see when the decks arrived at your doorstep, if you back our project. 

For production, we are working closely with Expert Playing Card Company. You can be assured of the quality of the handles and printing. Extra attention will also be given to ensure that the production schedule is timely.

For fulfilment, we have the guidance of Card Experiment Playing Card Company, who has years of experience fulfilling playing cards orders of their own decks. We will be using reliable postage services to make sure that your playing cards reaches you in the quickest possible time.

blurb: The New Zero Waste Toothpaste GEL.                          100% Natural and Refreshing.
description: The New Zero Waste Toothpaste GEL.                          100% Natural and Refreshing.
name: NOICE toothpaste. All of the taste & none of the waste!
title: NOICE toothpaste. All of the taste & none of the waste!
Title: NOICE toothpaste. All of the taste & none of the waste!
Description: The New Zero Waste Toothpaste GEL.                          100% Natural and Refreshing.
Link: NOICE toothpaste. All of the taste & none of the waste!The New Zero Waste Toothpaste GEL.                          100% Natural and Refreshing.
description_story:
Story







What do you do every morning & every night? Ooh la la, behave yourself! You brush your pretty white teeth of course :)
Do you know that billions of plastic toothpaste tubes end up in landfills annually? C’est terrible!
Did you think natural toothpaste is totally tasteless? That’s what we thought too… so we made a delicious alternative, and it’s sure to put a smile on your face. 





















NOICE is 100% natural, and COSMOS-ORGANIC certified by Ecocert. NOICE toothpaste offers complete care – we worked with dentists to keep your breath fresh, your gums healthy, whiten your teeth, and prevent cavities.
Packed in an eco-friendly, endlessly refillable bottle we made NOICE simple & affordable. Voila!




























You don't need to be a superhero to help save the planet. It's as simple as brushing your teeth :)
The result? An endlessly reusable bottle that can be topped-up using compostable refill pods and arrive in a fully recyclable cardboard pack at your doorstep.
NOICE is the first GEL toothpaste in the world with a zero-waste concept! C’est Magnifique!














We worked day and night with dentists from around the world to ensure our formula is great for your health, teeth, and gums. Of course, it had to taste tres tres bien!














NOICE employs a subscription model so there’s no need to go to the store! We know when you’re about to run out and send you refills when you need them. You can also reorder refill pods online or from our ambassador stores. 





















We want NOICE to be inexpensive. We are proud to say that NOICE is on average more affordable than other oral-care products on the market!
Extra refill pods can be purchased for as little as US$15 for 3 pods. That’s only US$5  per month! (free delivery included) 














Today we need you to make NOICE a reality. 
Toothpaste should be simple. Let’s keep it that way using a natural toothpaste delivered right to your doorstep with a zero-waste concept.
We hit over 110%!! THANK YOU!! We now launched the production at scale. You can continue to ORDER NOICE on IndieGogo to Keep Brushing!





























We promise to tell you the tooth, the whole tooth, and nothing but the tooth! Our ingredients have been carefully selected with dentists with always a specific purpose. NOICE is vegan, fluoride-free, sodium lauryl sulfate-free and contains no artificial flavors, sweeteners, colors or preservatives. All our organic ingredients are sourced from responsible producers and are certified EcoCert Cosmos Organic.  














Of course, we want to share our delicious zero waste toothpaste with the whole world! But we are super aware of the responsibility that it puts on us to go the extra mile.
Today, our production is in Thailand. In the future, we aim to localize NOICE in major markets.  And in the short term, NOICE will off set 100% of its carbon footprint from the shipping of your orders. So happy brushing!





















A smile communicates trust, trust creates connections, and connections enable collaboration. We want to use NOICE – a contraction of NICE and VOICE– to raise our voice, in a nice manner, and propose solutions. This is what we call positive propaganda!
Clement
The inventor of NOICE and an active member of Jumanji Studio, a collective of entrepreneurs committed to sustainability. Clement created his first startup when he was only 26 years old, and has now decided to focus his energy on sustainability and social businesses.
Morgane
Joined NOICE adventure to put her dedication & hard work at the service of meaningful cause. Strong of 5 years in branding & advertising, Morgane wants to lead NOICE brand to be an example in sustainable and zero-waste personal care products.   







 BRAVO if you scrolled down here! Thank you :)
description_risks:
We will do our utmost to deliver as promised, however, we can’t guarantee an exact date when you will receive NOICE. We have specified a delivery timeframe of 4 months and we will do everything we can to surpass this expectation.

What we guarantee is 100% transparency about every challenge that comes in our way with frequent updates. We are fully dedicated to you receiving your order of NOICE.

blurb: A card game that you can play on your own or with your friends, to laugh, cry, get mad and hopefully find closure over your ex.
description: A card game that you can play on your own or with your friends, to laugh, cry, get mad and hopefully find closure over your ex.
name: After The Break-Up: The Card Game
title: After The Break-Up: The Card Game
Title: After The Break-Up: The Card Game
Description: A card game that you can play on your own or with your friends, to laugh, cry, get mad and hopefully find closure over your ex.
Link: After The Break-Up: The Card GameA card game that you can play on your own or with your friends, to laugh, cry, get mad and hopefully find closure over your ex.
description_story:
StoryAfter the Break-Up...
It probably sucked. Depending on the type of person you are and who ended it, maybe it didn't hurt so bad but we all know that there'll always be that twinge of emotion whenever you part ways with someone.
Everyone faces break-ups differently. Some choose to purge their emotions through tears, finding comfort in ice cream, their bed, alcohol, sports, friends, etc. Others turn their sadness into hate, making it a temporary mission to defile their memory of their ex and reassuring themselves that the break-up was a good thing because now they can move on with their lives without that POS. A lucky few are able to move on quickly and calm, accepting the break-up and making the best out of the situation. For myself, I've been through all three methods and more, when coping with heartbreak. 
What I realised, however, is that I instinctively go down the route of pushing away all the happy memories with my exes and many times, turning them into the villain just to protect myself. I've read up that it's recommended to forget and move on, to do whatever it takes to make you feel better. That's what I thought I did, but after three years of different types of break-ups, I sensed that maybe I didn't have closure. After all, whenever the topic came to my ex, all I can do is passive-aggressively badmouth them. But my relationships weren't all that bad. 
Sure, there were bad and very bad moments from their side. But there were self-discovery moments too where my own insecurities and unpleasant qualities were the problem. By always villainising my exes, I rid myself of any faults that I should have owned up to and confronted so that the same mistakes will stop repeating in any present and future relationships I have, be it romantic or not.
So in light of this sudden realisation on my side, and because I love playing cards, I've decided to create my own card game called 'After the Break-Up'! 
This game can be played by yourself (Just read and talk to the mirror, I guess) or with your friends! If you're feeling wild, bring in your family and exes too. This game will make you question the past relationships you've had and hopefully help you have a clearer idea of what happened, thus building the foundation for your current and future relationships. 




Visuals





Instructions

  There are 3 Cards Categories: Questions, Story-time, Dares. These Cards have the same cover (Black) and will be shuffled together into the Deck. 
  Each player will also receive two Reply Cards: "Yes" & "No". These cards will have a different cover from the other cards (Pink). 
  Each player takes turn to draw from the Deck. If they draw a Question, they get to choose which question to say out loud to everyone else. All players must then answer the question with the Reply card 'Yes' or 'No' faced-down so no one else can see. Once everyone is done putting down their answer, the placed Reply cards are shuffled and revealed. 
  The player who drew the Question Card must then guess who put down the minority answer. They will only have as many chances to guess as there are minority answers (e.g. Have 2 chances to guess who answered 'Yes', if there are 4 'No's and 2 'Yes'). If there is a draw, there will be no need to guess. Everyone will get back their Reply Cards after the guessing is done. 

[For better visualisation, think of the game 'Black or Red' played with Poker Cards]

  If the player draws a Dare Card, they have to do 1 of the dares on the card. 
  If the player draws a Story-time Card, they have to story-tell a personal experience, prompted by the image on the card.





In each deck: 

  Question Cards: 15
  Dare Cards: 15
  Story-Time Cards: 15
  Pairs of Reply Cards: 8

... But more will be added if you decide to pledge enough to hit the Break-Up Crew reward <3
The funding goal is low because I just need to pay for nourishment and the materials to help me paint the cards (I'll be recycling poker cards that are missing majority of the deck). If the goal is exceeded, I'll very much consider hand-painting or printing the whole deck as an extension to this project c: Thank you!
description_risks:
Everyone will definitely get the PDF files since I just have to send it over digitally. 

The only risk I see is that there may be a delay with the Thank You Letters that include the hand-painted cards, due to any unexpected delivery troubles but they'll definitely get to you before December, at the very latest. If anything pops up, I'll let you guys know straightaway!

blurb: Candy coloured popsicle pin!
description: Candy coloured popsicle pin!
name: The Popsicle Pin
title: The Popsicle Pin
Title: The Popsicle Pin
Description: Candy coloured popsicle pin!
Link: The Popsicle PinCandy coloured popsicle pin!
description_story:
Story







Hi everyone! We are Made by Mate from Singapore. Our name derives from the idea of making things for a friend, from a friend ;) And we hope to create thoughtful design for friends like you! Both of us are graphic designers, and after slogging our ass in the field for a few years, we decided to channel our creativity into something we truly enjoy doing instead. Like what people say, do more of what makes you happy :) This is our first ever Kickstarter campaign and we are pretty excited about it.  We have a lot of ideas that we hope to make them come true with the help of you fellow backers! So if you enjoy and like what we do, please do support us! Thank you!The Popsicle Pin
 







We started Made by Mate in May 2017, and we have been constantly trying to make our ideas come alive, but we often met with financial constraint of producing those ideas. The idea of The Popsicle Pin came about some time in mid-December, we wanted to kickstart of our 2018 the "sweetest" way we could, and thus we decided to release a series of candy coloured popsicle pins.







These popsicle pins are made by us from scratch. They are made with 2.5mm hard acrylic and spray painted individually by us. The base and the toppings are secured with chloroform. Each pin measures at 43mmH x 25mmW.  







Each pattern on the toppings are done with the help of a vinyl stencil that we created, and carefully spray painted on as well, they are further coated with a satin glaze.







The pin is carefully glued on the back of the popsicle as seen. 







What's special about the popsicle pin is that they are all done in random mix of colours and patterns from our  palette, hence, there are many permutations and it is very difficult to find more than 1 or 2 that are alike! 









What will you get?The minimum pledge of S$8 will get you a set of our popsicle stickers! A small one with each popsicles at 40mmH and a big one with each popsicles at 60mmH. 








Any pledge from S$16 to S$48 will be random, either full popsicles or munch popsicles from our mix!







Stretch GoalsIf we are able to hit S$2500 or more, we will be able to do customisation based on your favourite colours and patterns from our palette! 







Our Funding GoalWe hope to be able to fund at least S$2000 to kickstart this project. Here is a breakdown of where our funds will go.1. The cost of acrylic and lasercutting - 30%2. The cost of spray paint. (pastel paint colours are more expensive than the normal ones) - 20%3. The cost of vinyl stencils, chloroform, and pin backing. -10%4. Printing of packaging -10%5. Shipment - 20%6. Kickstarter Fees - 10%







Thank you for taking your time to go through our first project! We have a few other works that we have launched ourselves, and we also hope to bring them to Kickstarter in the future. Do follow us on instagram @madebymate or you can take a look at www.madebymate.co!If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact us!
description_risks:
The entire process of making the popsicle pin (besides lasercutting the acrylic) is entirely handmade. There may be slight imperfections, but we will try our best with it! We are proud of the process of hand-making each pin, as it encompasses not just the finished product, but the effort and dedication we put in to create it. 

The project will be funding for 30days, if it is successful, please allow us about 1.5 months - 2 months to complete all orders. Which means we hope to complete them by end of March. We gave a slightly longer timeline as it is only the 2 of us doing it :)

Thank you!

blurb: Shake on It- the First  fully Animated project about Sales that puts the focus on the Basic skills to make anyone a great salesperon
description: Shake on It- the First  fully Animated project about Sales that puts the focus on the Basic skills to make anyone a great salesperon

description_story:
Story"Shake on it"  project is a new way of teaching  -a more focused, easy to follow and enjoyable experience.The idea was born with a vision to bring the public a unique concept that will turn any individual to a qualified and successful Salesman.  It all began from a certain need raised from the Sales floor- as consumers we will always appreciate a good service to accompany our shopping experience.
The truth is- we are very far from it, most of the sales people we face on a daily basis are simply not up to the job, can be unresponsive or unprofessional enough to be selling their merchandise or services.





You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play


































Replay with sound









Play with 
 sound












00:00


00:00





























The First Module- Goals





 The situation is not getting better when looking spesifically at traditional retail. When we come to purchase an item or service we could benefit immensely if only the Salesperson we encounter is a good one, meaning they would show knowledge about the Item or service they offer and will help us making the right decision about the purchase we make. "My Goal is to Simplfy the learning process for You and your Sales team"The companies today are facing many challenges when they want to train their teams-•	today learners are impatient- they need everything fast, short and in tiny chewable pieces •	it is very hard to get all of the team in one place at the same time•	it is hard to keep track of the team's progress   "Shake on it"  solutionI made it very simple for everyone, I Created 8 Modules that will get the individual or Team to being Sales oriented succesfully - 1. Short and fun animated videos(5-7 minutre long)to keep student focused2.Learn on your own free time on Any device-Mobile ,PC or Tablet3. Seven modules- Any module covers a specific topic from the sales process 4.Any module has a quiz to test what's been learned The Modules :


Setting Goals- learn how to set goals

First impression- how to make the best first impression

Building Rapport- how to control the chemistry between you and your customer

Uncover needs- how to determine what your customer real need 

Objections- how to handle objections when selling

The Formula- the elements you must integrate to make your sale succesfull

Influencial Communication- the right way to communicate in order to make a change in your customer's mind 
Bonus Material- Cold call- build the best conversation strateegy when make a cold call to a customer

perfect the animation, voice over etc'. we had quite a few rejects until perfection was achieved almost a year later. 
the Course is sitting on an LMS (Learning management system) that can provide a great answer to videos and quizes online with multiple user interface and broad range of other elements to make the learning expariemce a whole- it is very costly however.
This is the reason I could not fund the entire set of modules and need your help to get the project on the right path and guarantee its go live.
I also would be really happy if i will be able to produce the course in more languages to spread the word in. my first choise would be Chineese.

blurb: The first perfume that capitalises on groundbreaking skin research to deliver 12h longevity and 3m sillage! More than 2x anyone else.
description: The first perfume that capitalises on groundbreaking skin research to deliver 12h longevity and 3m sillage! More than 2x anyone else.
name: DESIGNER PERFUME DISRUPTION: The Forever Lasting Perfume
title: DESIGNER PERFUME DISRUPTION: The Forever Lasting Perfume
Title: DESIGNER PERFUME DISRUPTION: The Forever Lasting Perfume
Description: The first perfume that capitalises on groundbreaking skin research to deliver 12h longevity and 3m sillage! More than 2x anyone else.
Link: DESIGNER PERFUME DISRUPTION: The Forever Lasting PerfumeThe first perfume that capitalises on groundbreaking skin research to deliver 12h longevity and 3m sillage! More than 2x anyone else.
description_story:
Story


















Have you ever bought a $100+ dollar of perfume, only to realize that it barely lasts a few minutes on your skin, and no one else can really smell it? Did you consider spraying more of your super expensive perfume, only to find out that didn’t work either?You’re not alone. After accumulating a collection of super fancy, highly reviewed perfumes, I noticed that reapplying them every hour on the hour was futile. I tried cologne, EDT, and even perfume, but nothing seemed to work.So I decided to consult a number of leading perfume-oligists (the guys who make the stuff) only to find out that the essence in perfume is actually diluted down into cologne (95% dilution), EDT (85-90% dilution) and perfume (80-85%) dilution. The real stuff is actually oil based, and in fact is healthier for your skin than the alcoholic dilutions we buy in stores!When I started using the oil, my scent would last over 10 hours with a projection of about 3 meters! Way better than the 20 minutes, 30 cm projection that every perfume used to give me. What's more, I learned that if your skin is like mine and drinks everything you apply, then applying it to a concealed piece of proprietary fabric my brother and I designed makes it last even longer!Gíoderma Botanical Essences is exactly what the industry does not want you to know about. It's the stuff people use to use in the 18th century before modern corporations decided to dilute the stuff and charge more.What I want to achieve:My goal is to bring what I’ve been personally using for 2 years to others because I know the scents you buy in stores just aren’t enough. I want to provide affordably priced perfume that will really last, without breaking the bank!Scents we offer:






- Rose- Lavender- Mandarin - Jasmine
All scents are unisex :)

description_story: StoryGamerSays is a card game for us gamers who don't die (we respawn). It contains 580 cards built upon what we have experienced in most (read: online) games.After experiencing so much cancer,  we decided that we had enough and  created cards that immortalizes what we as gamers experience on a day by day basis.The game is real simple, even a noob can do it. If you can’t understand, GGWP. Tutorial: (READ OR FEED)Each round, one player draws a Black Card. Everyone else answers with their funniest Yellow card.
description_risks:
-No one supports us :I play carry all the time
-Busy Gaming online and no friends to play this with
-Bang Keyboard and destroyed, unable to reply to our Emails.
-Creators Busy Gaming and Raging

Jokes aside, we know it's tough trying to learn the mechanics of a new game and getting used to the community. Getting people to back and support this project is an uphill task for us as well.

We've been busy racking up contents and polishing it for everyone. YOU can help us too, by sharing it with your guildmates, friends and family. 

On a second thought, maybe skip the family portion, as it can be awkward when you draw a card that says "10 year olds sleeping with your mom".

.....

Anyway, sharing and spreading this project around increases our chances of getting funded. And you know what that means, more games for all of us! 

//If you've read till this far, thanks for the support bruh, really. We know we have crapped a lot, probably caused even more cancer for you guys. But seriously, we are damn thankful for all of your support. 

Commended~❤

description_story:
StoryI would love to make these illustrations into Star Sign pins. Each star sign is a different project and if the goal amount is reached  - the equivalent of 50 pieces of the pin - then I will be able to successfully manufacture them and mail them out to you! The goal amount of S$600 equals to 50 pieces of each pin - that's S$12 for each pin, shipping included.The pins will have rose gold plated metal and three colours including iridescent glitter for parts of the design.Aries







 





 







Below is an example of the star sign before - Pisces, also with soft enamel fill and rose gold plated metal and the backing card it comes with. The back is secured with a black PVC rubber clutch (not blue, like in the picture)







 These are examples of soft enamel pins I have manufactured before, to give a clearer idea of what the Aries pin will look like.The end date for each sign is about a month before that sign starts. I have started late with Aries, so the closing date is much closer to the start of the Aries star sign - Aries starts March 21st.







EDIT: End date is on 17th March, not the 10th. I will create a new project for Taurus once this project ends because only one project can be live. Below is the Taurus design which will be launched on 18th March after Aries ends. Do keep an eye out for it!





Let's hope all the star signs get made into pins!

 EtsyWebsiteInstagramTumblr

blurb: Ethereal — Kickstarter's first ever Deep Space photo book that will literally take you out of this world.
description: Ethereal — Kickstarter's first ever Deep Space photo book that will literally take you out of this world.
name: Ethereal | Literally out of this World
title: Ethereal | Literally out of this World
Title: Ethereal | Literally out of this World
Description: Ethereal — Kickstarter's first ever Deep Space photo book that will literally take you out of this world.
Link: Ethereal | Literally out of this WorldEthereal — Kickstarter's first ever Deep Space photo book that will literally take you out of this world.
description_story:
StorySince the beginning of time, humans have looked up into the night sky and be in awe with the broadness of the universe. On dark, clear nights, the most we can see with our naked eyes (or captured with our DSLRs) is only this much. That hasn't changed at all since the start of human history! Added with the fact that many of us are now living in concrete jungles, the stars we can see are only a mere handful with all the light pollution...


The typical night sky on a dark, clear night





 









With innovations and technologies by astronomers and NASA, the Hubble Space Telescope is able to capture images of nebulas and galaxies deep in space.


The Carina Nebula





 


Part of the Large Magellanic Cloud (LMC)





Since we are unable to see this part of the Universe just by looking out of our windows, the team here at Jr. Studio have come up with a solution. A solution that brings Deep Space to you and allows you to admire the beauty of Deep Space in the comfort of your home — Ethereal.Note: While NASA and Hubble Space Telescope is the source of the images published in the book, the publication and distribution of the photo book, "Ethereal | Literally out of this World", on Kickstarter is not sponsored or endorsed by NASA and Hubble Space Telescope.







Ethereal is Kickstarter's first ever Deep Space photo book that will literally take you out of this world. Ethereal is a book that consists of images of nebulas, galaxies, constellations, stars and everything in between taken by the Hubble Space Telescope. Every page of Ethereal is covered top to bottom with jaw-dropping, high quality, crisp images that have been stringently filtered out among the thousands of images the Hubble Space Telescope has taken.

 




*Image shown is only a mock-up of Ethereal. Actual copies of Ethereal have more legible captions and are more vibrant.





 


*Image shown is only a mock-up of Ethereal. Actual copies of Ethereal have more legible captions and are more vibrant.





 



*Image shown is only a mock-up of Ethereal. Actual copies of Ethereal have more legible captions and are more vibrant.





 


*Image shown is only a mock-up of Ethereal. Actual copies of Ethereal have more legible captions and are more vibrant.





 


*Image shown is only a mock-up of Ethereal. Actual copies of Ethereal have more legible captions and are more vibrant.





Every image on Ethereal is accompanied with a short - but substantial - caption consisting of its name, details and description. Ethereal is not only a stunning book to admire at, it is also the perfect book to learn about the universe beyond what our eyes can see.Ethereal features easy to read captions that is ideal for all occasions - even as bedtime stories for kids that are curious about Space!


*Examples of each caption.





Ethereal is the best "decor" that you can get for your tabletops! We dare say that it is as interesting as the latest blockbuster movie. Great way to entertain your guest while you prepare that scrumptious feast for dinner!


*Image shown is a softcover mock-up of Ethereal. Actual copies of Ethereal have a quality hardcover backing.





 









Publishing a book is a very tedious process. Even for a photo book! From gathering of the necessary images and details to designing and printing is a lot of hard work. Getting quality photo books at a great price is hard as printing in itself is extremely expensive. We were quoted S$193 (~USD$134 / ~£109) for a single copy of Ethereal.That is why we decided to reach out to the Kickstarter community. With the help of crowd funding, we are able to make Ethereal affordable to all at just S$39 (~USD$27 / ~£22) per copy while still retaining the high quality. That's right! For just S$39, you can get to enjoy the hidden beauty of the universe through Ethereal. Having the whole universe right in your palms is no longer an imagination. 







Ethereal is Kickstarter EXCLUSIVE! Even if it does enter the market due to overwhelming demand after the Kickstarter campaign ends, you will never get Ethereal at such a great price!Ethereal contains 87 stunning images of nebulas, galaxies and constellations. 7 of the best images are spread out across 2 pages to achieve the "surround" effect while the rest (80 images) are single, full-paged images.


*Bold names imply that the images are spread across 2 full pages.





 



*Example of images that are spread across 2 pages when viewed in PDF format.





Specifications of Ethereal are as follow:
Quality Imagewrap Hardcover
11" x 8.5" (280mm x 216mm)
Medium Landscape Format
100 Pages
Though costs are kept to a minimum, quality on the other hand is top-notch.
The Imagewrap Hardcover will give Ethereal a modern look, perfect for any tabletops. It is binded with durable PUR perfect binding with reinforced spine backing so Ethereal will last a lifetime for you to enjoy Ethereal over and over again.
Images on Ethereal are printed using offset printing that uses plates to transfer images onto paper. It provides very real colour reproduction and crisp professional looking printings so you can experience amazing image quality with unmatched image reproduction and superb colour consistency for all images. 








As seen above, the more copies of Ethereal you plan on getting the more you save! So grab your friends, family or anyone down the street and choose your reward together!For backers who are interested in getting the PDF version of Ethereal, here are some great news! The PDF version of Ethereal up for downloading will be the version we sent for printing. That's right! The PDF you will be receiving is of print quality and you can print out your very own high quality and visually stunning Ethereal if you so wish.  







 







Stretch goals, everybody loves them! But we certainly do not want to count our chickens before they hatch. We have some plans in mind but we have to first meet our funding goal of S$13,000 before we think big. We believe that we can achieve it together with your support! Stretch goals will be announced once the funding goal has been met and we definitely look forward to that!







If your friends or family love Deep Space, or they simply love to read and enjoy the little pleasures in life, share this project with them! Even better, get them this book as a gift! No one will ever decline a visually stunning book like Ethereal.For queries and bulk orders of more than 10 copies of Ethereal, e-mail us at jrstudio.sg@gmail.com. We love e-mails!

The greatest challenge that we have lies with producing the best quality book possible for you. But not to worry! We have partnered with Drummond Printing Pte Ltd who have more than 35 years of experience in the printing industry so as to ensure that every copy of Ethereal will take your breath away.

Currently, our biggest concern for this project will be meeting the minimum order quantities for bulk printing. Ethereal can only take you out of this world with you and your friends' and family's help and funding!

blurb: Celebrating Singapore's 55th National Day
description: Celebrating Singapore's 55th National Day
name: Voices of Singa Cubs: Why I love Singapore
title: Voices of Singa Cubs: Why I love Singapore
Title: Voices of Singa Cubs: Why I love Singapore
Description: Celebrating Singapore's 55th National Day
Link: Voices of Singa Cubs: Why I love SingaporeCelebrating Singapore's 55th National Day
description_story:
StoryIt all began in 2020 when the pandemic hit the whole world so badly. I wanted to encourage the children In Singapore to look forward and stay strong together as a nation with a nation-wide colouring contest. Thus, I organised the “Singapore National Day Colouring Contest” for all schools. There was overwhelming response from the schools! There were prizes worth $10,000 that were given away to the top 100 winners. However, I felt the voices of these children and their passionate artworks for our country deserves to be shared. Therefore, I am proposing the “Voices of Singa Cubs” project.
This book project not only feature the celebration of Singapore's 55th Anniversary as an independent country but also the patriotism our children have for Singapore. It consists the Lion Symbol artwork and a message why they love Singapore. This book portray the  hearts of the Singa Cubs and why Singapore is one of the most beautiful and safest cities in the world with unity.
Lastly, I want the children who contributed to their talents in this book to feel appreciated and be encouraged greatly to see their works published and shared widely. This would also inspire others to pick up art and writing as a hobby. 
The e-book will be sent to the children who participated in the Singapore National Day Contest. This book will be marketed to schools in Singapore. 


The bigger picture would be to publish this book in physical form. This may happen if this current project would be a success. The plan is to distribute few thousands copies of this book to all school libraries so every child can have the chance to enjoy this book.
description_risks: The challenges will be the production area in getting the works typeset and designed beautifully, cover artist for an attractive cover, editor and lastly managing the project. However, with my experience and connections, these challenges are part of the process and can be dealt with.

blurb: A tsunami tore their lives apart seven years ago. They are still there, still recovering, and still trying to forget...
description: A tsunami tore their lives apart seven years ago. They are still there, still recovering, and still trying to forget...
name: After The World Forgets - A documentary
title: After The World Forgets - A documentary
Title: After The World Forgets - A documentary
Description: A tsunami tore their lives apart seven years ago. They are still there, still recovering, and still trying to forget...
Link: After The World Forgets - A documentaryA tsunami tore their lives apart seven years ago. They are still there, still recovering, and still trying to forget...
description_story:
StoryDAOYU PICTURES PRESENTSA Documentary by Ong Chao Hong | Produced by Ted Yu Shen Chen, Bonnie Chia & Ong Chao Hong






About the DocumentaryHambantota, a small town in southern Sri Lanka was the second worst affected district in that country when the tsunami of 26th December 2004 struck. While Sri Lanka is predominantly Buddhist, Hambantota has a significant Muslims population, most of which lived in the old town by the sea that was ravaged by the tsunami.Seven years after the disaster, filmmaker Ong Chao Hong follows PhD researcher Ted Yu Shen Chen to Hambantota and finally meets survivors of the tsunami, who had previously only existed in his memory as statistics in the news. Through interviews and house visits, he discovers the role of religion and family values in the building of resilience in the community, and witnesses how a PhD research evolves into a personal journey of faith for the deeply religious Ted.'After The World Forgets' is a documentary that has evolved from researcher Ted Chen's PhD study into the spiritual dimension of disaster reconstruction. It hopes to speak to the world about not looking at disaster reconstruction as simply relief, but a process that involves decisions which have long term consequences that is not just physical but central to whether people regain their quality of life, have a sense of well-being and return to normalcy with will to continue living.






The Fundraising CampaignIn June 2011, over a mutual friend's wedding banquet in Singapore, Ted invited Ong Chao Hong, a filmmaker from Singapore, to collaborate on a documentary film about the tsunami survivors he has met in Hambantota, Sri Lanka. Armed only with a video camera and a slim travel guidebook, Ong Chao Hong embarked on a 3-week journey on which he heard first-hand stories of survival, love and loss, religious revelations, housing project controversies, and even one about a wild elephant attack.The film was shot with a borrowed video camera and tripod, and fueled by the goodwill and support of our friends in Sri Lanka, Singapore, Taiwan and Australia. Now, with more than 30 hours of footage and no budget to carry on, the filmmakers have decided to call out to their friends, family and colleagues from around the world. Hence, we have started a Kickstarter page, through which you can contribute to our budget. The money will mainly go towards post-production such as rental of studio for voice recording, a proper audio mix and color grading, as well as distribution costs such as DVD duplication and film festival fees, etc. In return, we will give you some perks! (see details on the right!). The campaign runs for 60 days and we will only receive the funds if the goal is reached (your credit card will only be charged if the goal is reached). If you would like to support our modest project, please pledge a donation today. We'll be grateful for any amount you give!If you prefer to donate through other methods, please contact us at daoyupictures@gmail.com. You can also see a preview of the documentary at our website www.daoyupictures.comThank You.The Daoyu Pictures TeamProducer | Researcher TED YU SHEN CHEN 
In 2007 Ted had the opportunity to travel to Sri Lanka for a vacation. As a practising architect in Australia, he wanted to see the damages that had been caused by the 2004 Indian Ocean Tsunami and the efforts in reconstruction carried out by the local government and international aid organisations. 
'After The World Forgets' is a documentary that has evolved from Ted's PhD study into the spiritual dimension of disaster reconstruction. It hopes to speak to the world about not looking at disaster reconstruction as relief. The decisions made in reconstruction has long term consequences that is not just physical but central to whether people regain their quality of life, have a sense of well-being and return to normalcy with will to continue living.
Producer | Writer | Director 
ONG CHAO HONG 
An award-winning short film director and screenwriter, Ong Chao Hong has years of experience in film and television production, and was previously based in Taipei, where he learnt the ropes of filmmaking from renowned director Tsai Ming-Liang. His script for Tsai's 2005 telemovie, My Stinking Kid, won the prestigious Golden Bell Award for Best Telemovie.
After returning to Singapore in 2009, he worked as Assistant Director to filmmaker Boo Junfeng on Sandcastle, and later as Assistant Director to visual artist Ho Tzu Nyen for his Venice Biennale video installation, The Cloud of Unknowing.
Chao Hong has also been hired as Multimedia Producer for Singapore's National Day Parade in 2010 and 2011, proving his capability in handling large-scale multimedia projects and delivering quality work under tight schedules.
He is also a 3-time recipient of the Singapore Film Commission's Script Development Grant and has won the top prize in MTV Asia's regional film treatment competition.Producer 
BONNIE CHIA 
Bonnie Chia brings with her more than 5 years of experience in the world of consumer and commercial communications, including public relations, marketing and advertising. She has worked in international PR and Advertising agencies in the US, Taiwan and Singapore and excels in strategy planning and client servicing, with extensive experience in conceptualizing and executing integrated media campaigns.
Bonnie also has a strong passion for community work and believes in the power of visual storytelling in effecting changes for a better future.

description_story:
StoryWappTimes is a digital media publishing company based in Singapore. We discuss content on Science, Internet & Business.
Why WappTimes? Well, Wapp is short for Web + Apps. We seek to communicate to our readers the very best content you can find on your computer, mobile or tablet!
www.wapptimes.com
I have passion for all things sciencey and love watching documentaries that educate and bring us closer as humanity. Since I'm adulting, why not try my hand at publishing science and business related articles.
I believe in making information and education accessible to everyone on the globe.
Science - we work with academics to publish cutting edge science posts.
Internet - we provide developers and programmers media outreach for their software, apps or website. 
Business - we discover prudent and sound business advice and share them with you. 
You may check out samples of my articles on the website www.wapptimes.com
I have worked with the following organizations Public Library of Science (PLOS, https://www.plos.org/), Slack (https://slack.com/intl/en-sg/) and Sync (https://www.sync.com/).







You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.

I am raising funds, SGD$45 000, for equipment and wages. Funds going towards equipment will be used for purchasing a laptop and a camera.
A successful Kickstarter campaign will grant me the resources to produce even more interesting and in-depth content. 

















If you share my vision of inspiring the world and creating an awesome internet,
Please support me! 
Thank You!
