description_risks:
Limited readership. 

WappTimes is a relatively new start up, readership of our website and publications are still in its infancy. For WappTimes to remain sustainable, we would have to gain a loyal following. This would incur substantial costs for marketing campaigns. 

Small pool of collaborators.

WappTimes is still growing its connections with academics and developers to churn out content for publications. The current strategy is to offer our services free of charge while we grow our connections. We would eventually move on to a paid service by charging developers for advertising their products on our publications.

name: Charby Edge: 100W USB-C Transition Cable | Bridge to Future
title: Charby Edge: 100W USB-C Transition Cable | Bridge to Future
Title: Charby Edge: 100W USB-C Transition Cable | Bridge to Future
Description: Fastest for both USB-C & USB-A Devices | 100W PD & QC | The Most Flexible Adapter | Ballistic-fiber [2m/6.5ft cable]
Link: Charby Edge: 100W USB-C Transition Cable | Bridge to FutureFastest for both USB-C & USB-A Devices | 100W PD & QC | The Most Flexible Adapter | Ballistic-fiber [2m/6.5ft cable]
description_story:
Story























 1 Cable Fastest Speed For 2 USB Standards 
& We Guarantee It

















Enjoy the fastest recharging whether for your future USB-C devices or the older USB ones up to 100W speed. 
Upgrade to Pro. And you'll never worry about cable again. No matter what random USB port or device you meet, you'll be able to charge and data sync just fine with only one cable.


Every Fast Charging Supported




































The Solution: One That Plugs Into Everything

























 Incredible Built Quality









Crafted With Only Durable Materials
























The Chip That Guarantees 100W









Without E-Mark Chip, USB-C to C cable CANNOT negotiate up to 100W Power Delivery.
Extra, Extra, & Extra Long (2m / 6.5ft)









Because some outlets just have to be in awkward, far-from-comfort locations. Now you control where you sit (or sleep). 
Precision Designed, Eco-Friendly Adapter




Specially designed to fit Charby Edge





We designed and tested different iterations of the lock on their size, endurance, and flexibility. The current design we’d picked allows for a secure lock and effortless removal.
Effortless Removal = Endless Flexibility




Engineered for effortless snapping








Switch sides instantly





Making use of USB-C’s tech advantage (that they can be both input and output), the  Easy-Lock & Remove Adapter lets you switch output/input on the fly. If it is fixed, you’d have to rotate the entire 6.5 ft cable around.


 No Chance Of Losing It




When needed, it's secured









You Don't Always Need Adapter









 Charby Edge VS Others









The Specs

















What Others Think Of Charby Edge 

            

          

How To Know If E-Mark Is There?








Does Charby Edge Really Work?
We've Tested It For You:
0:02 - Charby Edge delivering 100W output
0:29 - Fast charging Protocol: Charby Edge vs generic adapter
1:25 - Data sync: Charby Edge vs generic adapter






You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play


































Replay with sound









Play with 
 sound












00:00


00:00

































tl;dr: Charby Edge is tested to support fast charging (up to 100W) & data sync while generic adapter doesn't. 
*Speed adjusted automatically to a device’s max limit. No risk of damage.


How Fast Can Charby Edge Charge?
 *The lab tested fast charging time according to each device's maximum power intake










Why Back Us On Kickstarter? 










As thank you for your early support in making Charby Edge a reality, we're offering drastically below-retail prices that are only available on Kickstarter for 30 days. And we're covering your shipping fee too for all Early Bird - Twin & Family Pack. 




Free complementary strap to tidy up your bag













How Charby Edge Began
One day, our co-founder found himself unable to charge his iPad Pro: his car, backup power bank are all USB-A's, and the cable he carried for his latest iPad Pro is USB-C to C. It came to him that this hassle is caused by the lopsided transition of USB-A to USB-C. Though solutions existed, he realized that having a fixed adapter forever dangling around or an OTG adapter that goes missing easily is inconvenient.
Then the idea struck him -- a convenient, no-compromise solution. He gathered the team and introduced the "Transition Cable". And so 9 months and a few prototypes later, we took Charby Edge from an idea to what you're seeing now.









Design Sketches









 Timeline - From Idea To Shipping









Who Are We?
We're a product design team in Malaysia with a curiosity and passion for engineering. We (Charby) have been around since 2017, and have partnered with qualified manufacturers in Shenzhen who have tons of experience manufacturing quality products that pass certifications by CE and FCC.
We've had experience in bringing crowdfunding innovation to our backers' hands. Notably, with our debut product Charby Sense on Indiegogo, which we are now consistently shipping all around the world. And another Indiegogo campaign now in mass production. Now, we're raising funds here to share our project to the Kickstarter community, and to hit the minimum manufacturing quantity to make Charby Edge happen.
Hello There!









And Hello To Our Design Partner




OITO Design team













 This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 1,100+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $460M raised between them.
description_risks:
We push ourselves to deliver innovative and quality products that will ultimately solve your problems. To that end, we had nitpicked credible manufacturers as our partners. But as manufacturing goes, unexpected hiccup might still occur. But rest assured that if any do arise, we'll address them promptly and ensure that the quality of the final products we ship you is uncompromised.

Since our manufacturing partners' operations have recovered from the Covid-19 outbreak in China, we managed to get the lead time for mass production before structuring our timeline. Hence, we're confident in delivering Charby Edge to you on time even as a pandemic rages on.

On top of that, we're also working with a 3rd party Quality Control Agent who will monitor strictly the production process.

Understandably, now isn't the brightest time to launch a crowdfunding campaign. But since charging cable is an essential of the electronic devices era, we've decided to proceed and make Charby Edge available at its lowest possible prices. 

All in all, we hope everyone (and your closed ones) will continue to be safe from this pandemic. Stay healthy everyone!

description_story:
Story







Hello! My name is Tiffanie/Tiff, and I am the artist and designer behind the brand Truffle Arts! I run a small stationery shop based in Singapore that sells cute & colourful illustrations in forms of stickers, prints, keychains, enamel pins and so much more! This has always been my dream and I am so happy that I get to do this as my full time job! I have had 2 successful campaigns on Kickstarter so far :)
For more updates on this campaign, I regularly update on my Twitter and Instagram.




All enamel pins have 2 pin posts and my branding stamped on the back of them.
















Add-Ons are available after you select a tier!














  Kickstarter campaign starts (Mid August)
  Campaign ends + surveys given out (Early September)
  Funds reach me (Mid September)
  Manufacturing begins (Mid August - Late September)
  Pins arrive + Mailing them out (Late September - Early October)
  Reward reaches backers! (Mid October-)










 United States & Canada Shipping

  Backers from USA & Canada are shipped out from a fulfilment place based in the US.
  All USA & Canada orders are shipped with TRACKED SHIPPING. Takes about 1-3 days, subjected to delays.

International Shipping

  All International orders are shipped with TRACKED SHIPPING. Takes about 8-30 days, subjected to delays.
  All backers especially UK & EU backers are responsible for customs and import taxes that may apply. I'm not responsible for delays due to customs.
  For FINLAND backers, please note that customs is really strict and your parcel may be held back for months (based on my previous experiences) I will be sending a message out to Finland backers only so the risks are known.

Domestic Shipping (Singapore)

  All rewards are shipped without tracking. Takes about 2-7 days, subjected to delays.













Merch that I have made/drawn!






  Shop (International): https://www.trufflearts.com/ 
  Twitter: https://twitter.com/trufflearts 
  Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/truffle.arts/ 
  TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@trufflearts 
  Email: trufflearts@hotmail.com
description_risks:
PRODUCTION
- Since enamel pins are handmade, it's normal for them to have minor imperfections such as scratches etc. Though I will be grading them and making sure it is up to standard before sending it out.
- I have settled all the pantone colours digitally, the colours might look different depending on your screen.

SHIPPING
- Due to COVID-19 mails being delayed are inevitable.
- To make sure all backers get their reward all pins will be shipped out using TRACKED mail, except for Singapore mails.

REWARDS
- Once the campaign has been successfully funded, surveys will be given out! backers are responsible for filling it out by the given deadline. Or else your pledge will be refunded.

If you have any questions feel free to email me at trufflearts@hotmail.com and or my socials @trufflearts (Twitter) and @truffle.arts (Instagram)

blurb: Capturing the brand secrets of 17 Singaporean contemporary brands in a beautifully designed book.
description: Capturing the brand secrets of 17 Singaporean contemporary brands in a beautifully designed book.
name: Brand Guide: Singapore Edition - A City's Branding Secrets
title: Brand Guide: Singapore Edition - A City's Branding Secrets
Title: Brand Guide: Singapore Edition - A City's Branding Secrets
Description: Capturing the brand secrets of 17 Singaporean contemporary brands in a beautifully designed book.
Link: Brand Guide: Singapore Edition - A City's Branding SecretsCapturing the brand secrets of 17 Singaporean contemporary brands in a beautifully designed book.
description_story:
StoryIn BriefBrand Guide: Singapore Edition is a 400-page dossier on the secrets to success of 17 contemporary brands in Singapore. The city-centric guide documents insights behind the works of branding. It scrutinises the process of translating what manifested as thoughts that grew into an idea and  ultimately, to reality. 


Brand Guide: Singapore Edition





We narrate the process through the considered use of photographs, brand reports, and graphic pullouts. The monotony of thumbing through a book is now a tactile experience; not just for you, but for us as well. Unlike a regular publication, the work does not end with the printer. Every Brand Guide is hand assembled by us, with lots of love. If you’re lucky enough, your copy might have a drop of sweat on it.


A dossier with 5 booklets & various inserts





 


Foreword by Armin Vit (UnderConsideration)





 






 






 





 













 





Fret not if that’s the case. You can give that drop of sweat some friends when you use Brand Guide as a travel guide to supplement your time in the consistently humid Singapore.


Our Version of Local Attractions





Being Independent As an independent studio, each one of us sold our soul to get the first print run of Brand Guide: Singapore Edition going. It wasn’t in vain, because it was sold out within months. Now that a second print run is needed to satisfy the requests for extra copies, we are looking to you for help.For your kindness, we humbly offer these (rewards):1. Brand Guide with cover in the color of Pistachio and Furoshiki-wrapped (A kickstarter exclusive)2. Brand Guide Production Manual & Colour Proof3. Foreign Policy’s 10th Anniversary Limited Edition Tote Bag 

4. Honorary mention in print for our backers



Brand Guide: Wrapped in Furoshiki Cotton





 




Production Manual Sneak Peek #1





 




Production Manual Sneak Peek #2





 


Limited Edition Tote Bag





Features and Accolades 

You must be thinking, “I can’t trust them, they sold their souls!”We can’t say that your speculation is groundless, so here are some words from credible sources where we were featured. Hopefully it will be of soul-redeeming quality (pun intended). “Brand Guide does an admirable job highlighting the region’s most innovative local brands, and the people behind them—people you can pay compliments to in person, on your next visit to Singapore.” - Wired   ******“With its unique design and meticulously laid-out pages that simply reflect the enthusiasm and devotion that make these Singapore brands shine, this is more than just a book filled with pretty pictures… With plans to publish books for other cities in the future, the Brand Guide series might soon become the design-oriented entrepreneur’s indispensable travel companion.” - Yatzer    ******“Foreign Policy Design Group, who we featured on the site last year, has nailed the art of collating diverse and sometimes complex ideas into a beautiful, cohesive publication. ” - It's Nice That   ******“A gem for any one with even a fledgling interest in design, the creative process, print guides, and the city of Singapore.” - Spottly Insider   ******"Brand Guides have probably never appeared on a summer reading list, but after seeing Foreign Policy Design Group's take on the genre, we're telling everyone to move it to the top of their stack." - AIGA Eye On Design


And many more...





 




Honoured!





Brand Guide: Singapore Edition has also clinched awards from D&AD, TDC, Tokyo TDC, Art Director’s Club, and the Singapore Creative Circle.

 SaveSave
description_risks: We have established a solid relationship with our printer, Colourscan and have a clear understanding of the production process. We will ensure that every Brand Guide: Singapore Edition of the second run is assembled with as much love and care as the first run.

description_story:
StoryHi! 
We’re Kirei Affinite and for our first Kickstarter project, we are pleased to present to you part 1 of our Horoscope pins :) In this part 1 series, we have included 2 fire signs and 1 earth sign. 
First up, representing the Greek god of war whose ruling planet is Mars. Passionate, bold and natural leaders. They are also highly symbolized by the colour red. Have you guessed it yet? Drumrolls YES! It’s the first astrological sign – Aries! For those of you who were born between 21st March and 19th April, or those whose rising/sun/moon sign belong to Aries, this pin is definitely a must get!  









The 2nd pin we have is the next fire sign. Leos', born between 23rd July and 22nd August. Known as the magnificent lions who are guided by their pride and loves attention. The Leo sign is represented by the colour yellow or gold and is ruled by the planet Sun. For the proud Leos out there, its time to adorn this pin and show it off ;) 









Lastly, we have the earth sign. Known as the headstrong bull associated with the colour green, Taurus is ruled by Venus aka the planet of love. 20th April to 20th May babies, your horoscope for 2019 predicts that you will earn a good amount of profits ;) So spend some of that profit on getting this cutie pin! 









Pledging & Rewards
Tier Rewards:









 NOTE: Shipping fee to your location is not included.
Goals
This project’s funding goal will set at US$1.5k. 
If project funding goal is not attained, production will not commence and no deduction will be needed. Rewards will also not be given out. 
After
During our pre-order period, backers who have pledged with rewards will be contacted through email for further confirmation on shipping address and choice of pin (if applicable). We will then proceed to ship out these pre-orders to our backers according to the timeline as stated below. 
After which, store will be open and backers will no longer have priority in obtaining the pins earlier. Pins will also be charged at a higher price than those on our Kickstarter. 
After 20th April, pins will then be sold at US$11 each. 
Timeline
Kickstarter Campaign – March 6th to April 6th
Pre-order & Funds Collection – April 7th to April 11th
Manufacturing – April 9th to May 25th
Packaging/Shipping for Pre-orders – May 25th to June 17th
Store is open – June 18th
Shipping for orders – June 24th, weekly 
Others
Thank you for supporting Kirei Affinite ∞ You can follow us on our other social sites :)
~ Instagram@ KireiAffinite 
~ Etsy Shop@ KireiAffinite 
Check out our latest releases!! Our popular #TakeMeToNeverland enamel pin as well as our BlackPink decal pack which are both available for purchase on Instagram and on Etsy <3

Do note that minor changes might be made to the pin design in order to ensure manufacturing process flows smoothly. Furthermore, rewards and policies of this campaign can be subjected to change anytime while the project is still live. Thank you for your understanding.

However, we have fully ensured that our quality checks and packing materials will deliver the product to you with minimal defects (small scratches, etc.)

We seek your understanding that this is a crowdfunding project and no one will be charged until this project meets its funding goal of US$1.5k and the funding period ends.

description_story: StoryIf you are a health freak like me, you might have been searching for "The perfect breakfast". Especially if you are someone who is better informed about the nutritious aspects of food. Every day its a struggle for me. Being a working food scientist, I am very much aware of what goes into food and what it could do. My philosophy is "You are what you eat". (Read more on my ideology at "About me")1st StageAiming to start off by providing dedicated patrons each week's supply of breakfast. Almond milk and Muesli home made. Pick up every weekend. Funding is for this stage, to buy a mixer, oven, dehydrator and packing supply.2nd StageTeaming up with dedicated partners to realise my dream of opening a cafe that serves set breakfast. ie the most healthy and delicious you could think of. I have the knowledge of technology, recipe and nutrition etc from my training. Need passionate individuals to share the joy.3rd StageCreate commercial shelf ready premium breakfast products
description_risks:

2nd stage:- Lack of leadership and commitment from cafe workers (common complaint from cafe owners)
Solution:- My workers are my partners. Let us share the fruits of hardwork

blurb: Set in a beautiful remote fishing village, this film follows the complicated friendship between a young girl and a transgender woman.
description: Set in a beautiful remote fishing village, this film follows the complicated friendship between a young girl and a transgender woman.
name: Jellyfish - A Short Film Set In Borneo
title: Jellyfish - A Short Film Set In Borneo
Title: Jellyfish - A Short Film Set In Borneo
Description: Set in a beautiful remote fishing village, this film follows the complicated friendship between a young girl and a transgender woman.
Link: Jellyfish - A Short Film Set In BorneoSet in a beautiful remote fishing village, this film follows the complicated friendship between a young girl and a transgender woman.
description_story:
StoryBlossoming sexuality, teenage desire and jealousy - A coming of age story that questions gender, sexuality, and isolation.
Set in a small rural fishing community, Jellyfish is a film about Suri, a 13 year-old girl who befriends a mysterious transgender woman who arrives in her village one day. Realizing that Riya is troubled and has nowhere to go, Suri hides Riya in her home. Suri soon forms an attachment to the alluring Riya, desiring her as both mother and lover.






Suri struggles with her emotions, and harbors fantasies of being with Riya. However, her illusion is broken when she discovers that her father and Riya are together. The day after her discovery, Suri takes Riya out fishing. Enraged and confused, Suri considers the unthinkable.The Purpose Of JellyfishJellyfish explores the themes of teenage desire, blossoming sexuality, and jealousy – all set in the context of a small fishing village in Borneo.As I director and writer, I created this project out of a pressing urge to understand how it would feel to be a young girl growing up in a remote fishing village, and trying to understand herself and her own sexuality.What would it be like to live in a tiny village in which one sees the same people every day? How would a young woman feel desirable when she fishes all day long, when her hands are rough and callused, when she doesn’t have a mother or female influence in her life? How would she understand her own feelings of desire? Would her inability to understand her own confusing feelings drive her towards violence in the right situation? Jellyfish was born of the need to explore these questions.I am lucky to be collaborating on this project with Faye Lum - who is of the Malaysian and transgender community, in addition to being an excellent writer. She has been an invaluable source of information and inspiration, as well as a critical editor of material. A promising screenwriter, her works have been featured on national television in Malaysia.

blurb: A Touge Racing Simcade
description: A Touge Racing Simcade
name: Touge Shakai
title: Touge Shakai
Title: Touge Shakai
Description: A Touge Racing Simcade
Link: Touge ShakaiA Touge Racing Simcade
description_story:
Story







Touge Shakai (Mountain Pass Society), or TougeS for short, is an online Touge Racing Game based on Japanese car culture in the 90s. With an emphasis on balance between realism and fun gameplay, the physics are tailored for competitive drift racing, while giving a challenge to all players. The game is built upon our fan-made creation Initial Unity.









In Touge Shakai, the driving physics are mainly simulated, but not to the extent of hardcore racing simulators. The driving characteristics of each car is tailored to be distinctly different from the others, to prevent the feeling that each car feels the same, just with different performance numbers. The objective of the physics is to be fun while remaining believable. However, there's a twist to the driving physics: Drifting is faster than grip driving for most rear-wheel drive vehicles.


The goal for this campaign is to replace all art assets with original content, add new features, and get the game to Steam Early Access











Time Attack









Race against the clock with various cars and courses to improve your pace and compete on the leaderboards. Players can also challenge the “ghosts” of other players, which are apparitions of their previous runs to learn from their driving. Medals are awarded with target timings, and provides progression for customization for each car.


PvP Battle









 Classic touge-style battle. Battles rules include "First to finish" and "Cat and Mouse".  Cat and Mouse has a leader and a chaser, with the leader trying to pull away and the chaser trying to keep up. The leader wins when they finish the course by a fixed distance from the chaser, while the chaser wins if they manage to overtake by the finish. The race moves on to the next round in a draw, with their positions reversed. Cat and Mouse mode is recommended as it provides the fairest battle, as overtaking is difficult and dangerous on the touge.
Team battles consist of multiple PvP Battles ongoing at the same time, with the team with the most wins coming out on top.


Free Ride









Practice, socialize and start impromptu races with others on the touge and just have fun! Learn from others and enjoy the course without the pressure of winning or losing. Showcase your rides and hang out with other racers and teams.











These are some notable features that Touge Shakai will have:



  Dedicated servers
  Cosmetic car customization - Car parts and livery editing
  Online matchmaking and ranking
  Multiple online game modes
  Driver and team profiles
  Replay camera editor - Setup race cameras using key frames
  In-game music player - Load your own tracks into the game
  Different weather conditions - Rain, fog
  Progression - Unlock new cars and parts as you hit objectives
  Steering wheel support with Force Feedback
  Virtual Reality Support

*Note: Not all features will be available on the first version of Early Access, and will be added progressively through updates











Touge Shakai is about building a community that is enthusiastic about Japanese Mountain Racing. After running a successful Discord Server for Initial Unity, it helped shape the game and gave us ample feedback by directly interacting with our players daily. We would like to continue having same relationship with our players, to be able to improve and build on the game we dream to create.











The personnel we currently lack are 3D artists. 3D models seen in the trailer and screenshots above are modified models of mods made by the community for other racing games. The majority of the funds will go to hiring 3D artists to produce original, optimized assets for the game. Smaller requirements are to acquire resources and hardware to support more controllers, wheels and peripherals such as VR. The rest of the funds and any excess will go towards general development of the game, and hiring more artists to generate more content for the game.



  3D Artists : 60% 
  Steering wheel Support : 10% 
  VR Support : 5% 
  General Development : 10% 
  Kickstarter + Processing Fees: 15% 










Lead Developer: @AugGust
Co-developer: @Auranapse


Project Website: https://www.touge-shakai.com
Follow us on Youtube, Twitter or join our Discord server to get updates and ask us questions about the project!
description_risks: The amount of content will be limited based on the funds we manage to gather. However, we intend to release it in steam early access, with the worse case with very limited number of cars and tracks. Revenue generated will be put into further content generation to expand the game

blurb: The manliest way to cover up those pimples on your face.
description: The manliest way to cover up those pimples on your face.
name: Brave Face for Men
title: Brave Face for Men
Title: Brave Face for Men
Description: The manliest way to cover up those pimples on your face.
Link: Brave Face for MenThe manliest way to cover up those pimples on your face.
description_story:
Story











Let's say your a cool, well-groomed dude.  
You use beard oil to give your facial hair the perfect, hipster glow. 
You use cologne to give yourself a fresh scent before a hot date. 
You even purchased face wash to keep your skin looking good. 
But, let's say you get a pimple.  What's a dude to do? Introducing Brave Face.  Scare those pimples right off your face.  Use our product personally matched to your skin to cover those pimples right up.Don't worry. Brave Face comes in a manly tinture bottle, so she'll never know.





We're Tam & Alan, a half-American / half-Canadian couple living in Singapore, working at Google and traveling around Asia.  Last week before a BBQ, Alan got desperate and used some of Tam's make-up to cover up a blemish.  





No dude wants to do that.In a world with an influx of male hygiene products, why not have a cover-up designed only for males in an unassuming bottle?We've contacted a cosmetics & tincture bottle distributor and are ready to get started with Brave Face if we can get $50,000 of pre-orders for the product.  The manufacturer has 25 years of experience producing facial products in the North America & Europe.





We need $50,000 to make out dream come true, so we can develop Brave Face at scale.  All backers get a bottle of Brave Face, personally matched to their skin using a "selfie."If you're not ready for Brave Face, tell your guy friends.  Make some noise!
description_risks:
We are confident that our manufacturer for the Brave Face cover-up are high quality and able to product a small batch (2000+ bottles) for trial.  He's a family friend with over 25 years of experience in the facial products business.

As with any entrepreneurship project, there can be delays in the delivery date if there are any problems in the supply chain.  It will also take time for us to hand match the right Brave Face color to the "selfies" submitted by backers.
